1b1(rgyud 'bum): rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya sarbata thA ga ta a d+hiSh+Tha na hId yA gus d+hA trA kar mU /
1b2(rgyud 'bum): nA ma d+hA ra Ni ma hA yA na sU tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi
1b3(rgyud 'bum): byin gyi rlabs kyi snying po gsang ba ring bsrel gyi za ma tog ces bya ba'i gzungs/ theg pa chen
2a1(rgyud 'bum): po'i mdo/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo//
2a2(rgyud 'bum): 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das yul ma ga d+ha na dri ma med pa'i kun dga' ra
2a3(rgyud 'bum): ba dang / rin po che sna bdun gyi rdzing na/ byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun chen po dang / nyan thos kyi
2a4(rgyud 'bum): dge 'dun chen po dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam
2b1(rgyud 'bum): mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang / mi ma yin pa bye ba mang po rnams dang / yul gyi mi 'bum phrag du ma
2b2(rgyud 'bum): rnams kyis yongs su bskor cing mdun du byas nas thabs cig tu bzhugs so/ / de nas 'khor gyi nang de na bram ze chen po shing sA la chen po
2b3(rgyud 'bum): lta bu mkhas pa/ mdzangs pa/ gsal ba/ yid gzhungs pa/ mthong na dga' ba/ dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam yongs su bzung ba/ dri med
2b4(rgyud 'bum): legs snang zhes bya ba zhig yod de/ de'ang gcig tu dkon mchog gsum la dad cing gus la phyag byed pa'i dge ba'i bsam pa dang ldan pa/ zhib
2b5(rgyud 'bum): mo brtags pa/ sems can thams cad dang dge ba'i don la brtson pa/ nor che ba/ longs spyod che ba/ phyug pa/ rdzas mang ba/ yo byad phun sum
3a1(rgyud 'bum): tshogs pa yin no/ / de nas bram ze chen po dri med legs snang bcom ldan 'das gal bder dong ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum
3a2(rgyud 'bum): bskor ba byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das la me tog dang bdug pas mngon par mchod do// na bza' rin 'bum ri ba'ang gsol/ bcom ldan 'das la mu tig gi do shal
3a3(rgyud 'bum): 'bum ri ba'ang gsol nas/ zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol
3a4(rgyud 'bum): to/ / bcom ldan 'das sras kyi tshogs kyi 'khor dang bcas pa bdag gi sdum par gdugs tshod la spyan 'dren na/ de'i slad du bcom ldan 'das kyis snang bar
3a5(rgyud 'bum): mdzad par ci gnang / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bram ze chen po dri med legs snang gis spyan drangs par thugs su chud nas/ ci'ang mi gsung bar gyur par
3a6(rgyud 'bum): gnang ngo / / de nas bram ze chen po legs snang bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas cang mi gsung bas gnang bar rig nas/ des rings pa rings par rang gi khyim du
3b1(rgyud 'bum): song ste/ de nyid kyi mtshan mo 'das pa dang / zhal zas dang / yo byad dang / zhal zas ro brgya pa mang po bshams nas/ bkod pa chen pos bkra shis kyi gzhal med chen po dang / gzhal med khang chen po sna tshogs
3b2(rgyud 'bum): dang / me tog dang / bdug pa khyer te 'khor mang po dang / sil snyan dang / pheg rdob pas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das la dus la bab par gsol to// de nas bcom ldan 'das la/
3b3(rgyud 'bum): bram ze chen po dri med legs snang gis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'di ni gshegs pa'i dus lags te/ bcom ldan 'das gshegs pa'i dus tshod la bab na/ bdag la snang bar mdzad pa ci gnang / de nas
3b4(rgyud 'bum): bcom ldan 'das kyis bram ze chen po dri med legs snang dbugs phyung nas/ nyid kyi 'khor la gzigs te bka' stsal pa/ 'khor ji ltar lhags pa thams cad deng don chen por mdzad par 'gyur gyis tshur shog/ de nas bcom
3b5(rgyud 'bum): ldan 'das gdan de las bzhengs nas/ bcom ldan 'das gdan de las bzhengs ma thag tu/ bcom ldan 'das kyi sku las 'od zer tha dad pa sna tshogs byung ste/ 'od zer gyi snang ba des phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams
3b6(rgyud 'bum): cad snang bar byas nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la yang dag par bskul te gzigs nas gshegs par shes so// de nas bram ze chen po legs snang gis mchod pa dang / bkur sti chen pos mchod cing / bcom ldan
3b7(rgyud 'bum): 'das kyi gshegs shul mdzes pa cher byas so/ / 'khor mang po dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / brgya byin dang /
4a1(rgyud 'bum): tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba dang / dbang phyug chen po dang / sred med kyi bu dang / rgyal po chen po bzhis kyang gshegs shul mdzes par byas so// de nas bcom ldan 'das dang ha cang mi ring ba'i
4a2(rgyud 'bum): lam gyibar gyi nang zhig na skyed mos tshal bde byed ces bya ba zhig yod de/ skyed mos tshal de'i nang na mchod rten rnying pa chen po zhig yod de/ zhig pa/ tsher mas gang ba/ rtsa dang / shing dang / gyo mos kun tu gang ba phyag dar
4a3(rgyud 'bum): gyi phung po lta bu zhig yod de/ de nas bcom ldan 'das de'i drung du gshegs pa dang / mchod rten rnying pa phyag dar gyi phung po lta bu de'ang kun tu 'bar zhing 'od zer 'bar ba kha dog sna tshogs pa dag byung ngo // phyag dar gyi phung po de
4a4(rgyud 'bum): las kyang legs so zhes bya ba'i sgra byung ngo / / de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa legs so legs so// deng ni gshegs pa'i ltas bzang ba'o// bram ze chen po de bzhin gshegs pa spyan drangs pa na yang khyod legs so//
4a5(rgyud 'bum): deng khyod la don chen po mdzad par 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pas mchod rten rnying pa phyag dar gyi phung po lta bu de la yan lag lngas phyag mdzad nas/ nyid kyi sku las na bza' bsil nas
4a6(rgyud 'bum): mchod rten rnying pa phyag dar gyi phung po lta bu de la gsol to/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis mchi ma byung ba chen po phyung bas bshums pa mdzad nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dzum pa mdzad pa bstan te/ 'dzum pa bstan pa des phyogs
4a7(rgyud 'bum): bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad lag mthil na bzhugs pa bzhin du mthong ngo / / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyang spyan mchi mas gang zhing bzhugs so// de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad kyis kyang 'od zer
4b1(rgyud 'bum): da rnying 'i nga ma ldan pong nga zhugs so/ / denas 'tsha mang po 'dus pa de sa mtshan chen por gyur cing / yi ched de 'khod par gyur to// de nas gnod sbyin gyi rdzi dpon chen po lag rnga
4b2(rgyud 'bum): 'ang shing shA mi thul/ rdo rje rnaMms tshanang mis pa rings par bcom ldan 'das gal ba der song sa phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi napas gnyis la mag pas phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das pa 'dom
4b3(rgyud 'bum): ces gsol to/ / bcom ldan 'das bshums pa'i snga sgras chen po gapa phe gang gis nA/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan mchims gang bar bstan pa'i sna lus gda' ba bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ ci'i srangs
4b4(rgyud 'bum): bcom ldan 'das kyi 'khor 'di'i nang du zhu ba 'di skabs dbye bar ci gnang / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// lag rdo rje ring bsre
4b5(rgyud 'bum): gyi phung po de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten de bzhin gshegs pa bye ba til gyi gang bu snyed thams cad kyi snying po'i gzungs kyi phyag rgya'i mchod rten gyi chos kyi rnam grangs yod de/ lag na rdo rje chos kyi rnam grangs 'di
4b6(rgyud 'bum): gang na gnas pa der/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'bum phrag bye ba til gyi gang bu snyed gnas shing / de bzhin gshegs pa khar las khar yas zhes bya ba snyed kyi sku gdung ring bsrel rnams gnas so// chos kyi
4b7(rgyud 'bum): chos kyi phung po brgyad khri bzhi stong gnas so/ / de bzhin gshegs pa 'bum phrag bye ba til gyi gang bu snyed dgu bcu rtsa dgu'i gtsug tor dang spyi bo'ang de bzhin du gnas so// lag na rdo rje gang na chos kyi rnam grangs
5a1(rgyud 'bum): 'di gnas pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten du lung bstan to/ / lag na rdo rje chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni 'di ltar phan yon che zhing mthu che ba yin no// lag na rdo rje chos kyi
5a2(rgyud 'bum): rnam grangs 'di ni phan yon che ba yin no/ / lag na rdo rje chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni bkra shis thams cad rdzogs par byed pa yin no// de nas bcom ldan 'das las 'khor mang po 'dus pa de dag gis chos kyi
5a3(rgyud 'bum): rnam grangs 'di thos nas chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul med cing dri ma dang bral la/ de nas nye ba'i nyon mongs pa dang bral lo// kha cig gis ni rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob bo// kha cig gis ni dgra bcom
5a4(rgyud 'bum): pa nyid thob bo/ / kha cig gis ni rang byang chub kyi 'bras bu'o// kha cig gis ni phyir mi 'ong bab 'bras bu'o// kha cig gis ni phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'o// kha cig gis ni byang chub sems dpa'i sa la gnas
5a5(rgyud 'bum): kha cig gis ni m+b+hi chub tu yang brtan pa tho ga/ / kha cig gis nis dang theg/ kha cig gis nis gnyis du'o// kha cig gsum pa'o// khacig gis nis bani pa'o// kha cig gas nas
5a6(rgyud 'bum): stsalag/ / bcin zhe nas ga/ mtshas ni zhes dran pa'o// 'jiganas nis brgyad pa'o// khacig gis nis pa/ gags nis brgyal gnas pa thub/
5a7(rgyud 'bum): byin drug pa tshugs so// bram pa chen pa pa shes mab cing rdzim dang bral ba dang / se ldapa cag ga nga bral par gyur to// bad tsu gyi po can po gan rnaM po
5b1(rgyud 'bum): 'di lta bu mthong nas ngo mtshar dang rmad du byung ba chen por gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs kyi mtshan thos pas kyang phan yon gyis brgyan pa 'di lta bu thob na
5b2(rgyud 'bum): bcom ldan 'das gang gi slad du phud dud dang bkur sti shin tu mang po bgyid par 'gyur ba lta ci smos te/ bcom ldan 'das de bsod nams kyi phung po ji lta bu'ang mthong bar 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal
5b3(rgyud 'bum): pa/ lag na rdo rje khyod nyon cig/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo 'am/ dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge snyen nam/ dge snyen ma gang la las chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'dri bar byed na/ lag na rdo rje
5b4(rgyud 'bum): des de bzhin gshegs pa 'bum phrag bye ba khrag khrig til gyi gang bu snyed dgu bcu rtsa dgu'i bsod nams kyi phung po dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa dang ldan par 'gyur zhing / de bzhin gshegs pa de rnams kyis rjes su gzung
5b5(rgyud 'bum): bar 'gyur ro/ / gang zhig klog par byed pa de dag kyang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gsungs pa'i mdo sde rnams bcangs par 'gyur ro// gang zhig chos kyi rnam grangs 'di lta bu 'dzin pa de dag phyogs bcu'i de
5b6(rgyud 'bum): bzhin gshegs pa 'bum phrag bye ba drug zig til gyi gang bu snyed dgu bcu rtsa dgu dang / phyogs bcu'i phyogs re re'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis gzung bar
5b7(rgyud 'bum): 'gyub ring / nyin gcig bzhin gzigs par 'gyur ro// gang dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la mchod pa byed pa dang / khong du drad par byed pa dang / me tog dang / bdug pa dang / dri dang / me tog 'brang chung
6a1(rgyud 'bum): drug pa dang / na bza' dang / lhab lhub dang / rgyan gyis mchod pa byed pa'i rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma des/ phyogs bcu dang phyogs re re'i
6a2(rgyud 'bum): de bzhin gshegs pa 'bum phrag bye ba khrag khrig til gyi gang bu snyed dgu bcu rtsa dgu la lha rdzas kyi me tog dang / bdug pa dang / dri dang / me tog 'phreng rgyu dang / byug pa dang / na bza' dang / lhab lhub dang / rgyan
6a3(rgyud 'bum): gyis mchod par 'gyur ro/ / phyogs re re'i de bzhin gshegs pa la/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod pa'i sprin rin po che sna bdun las byas pa'i ri rab chen po tsam gyi phung po'i yon tan byung ba 'byung bar 'gyur ro//
6a4(rgyud 'bum): de nas lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang mi ma yin pa de rnams dang / sems can gyi tshogs chen po de rnam
6a5(rgyud 'bum): kyang ya mtshan du gyur nas/ gcig la gcig 'di skad du mchod rten rnying pa phyag dar dang gyo mo'i phung po de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis byin gyis brlabs nas/ 'di ni rdzu 'phrul gyi 'phrul chen po ston pas
6a6(rgyud 'bum): mthu che ba yin no zhes zer ro/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rjes 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'di sus phyag dar gyi phung por bgyis pa las rin
6a7(rgyud 'bum): po che'i mchod rten du gda' ba bgyis/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lakan rdo rje 'di phyag dar gyi phung po ma yin gyis/ 'di ni rin po che sna bdun las byas pa/ rin po che'i mchod rten chen po
6b1(rgyud 'bum): s nun+tu rnas na smyi rgyu rgya rnams kyang ba gshegs pa mamanas camam ma ca ni '
6b2(rgyud 'bum): jig pa 'am 'gyes par mi 'gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdo rje'i snying po'i sku ji ltar 'gyes par 'gyur/ 'on kyang sems can rnams kyi las kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin par snang ba las kyang nub par
6b3(rgyud 'bum): gyur to/ / lag na rdo rje gzhan yang phyi ma'i dus phyi ma'i tshe sdig pa kun tu spyod pa dang / sdig pa can dang / dmyal ba la gzhol ba shin tu tshabs cher 'byung bar 'gyur/ sangs rgyas ma yin/ chos
6b4(rgyud 'bum): ma yin/ dge 'dun 'chol ba ma yin zhing / dge ba'i rtsa ba dag kyang skyed par mi byed de/ rgyu de dang rkyen des dam pa'i chos nub bo// lag na rdo rje de'i phyir nga'i mig gnyis mchi mas gang la/
6b5(rgyud 'bum): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyang mchi ma byung ngo // dam pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di lta bu ni nub par 'gyur gyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten ni ma gtogs te/ de la de bzhin gshegs/
6b6(rgyud 'bum): pa thams cad kyis byin gyis rlob par 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rjes 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das gang zhig chos kyi rnams
6b7(rgyud 'bum): grangs 'di bris te mchod rten gyi nang du 'jog na dge ba'i rtsa ba ci zhig skye bar 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lag na rdo rje gang zhig chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bris te mchod rten gyi nang du
7a1(rgyud 'bum): bzhag pa de/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i snying po'i ring bsrel gyi mchod rten du 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gzungs kyi snying po gsang
7a2(rgyud 'bum): bas byin gyis brlabs pa'i mchod rten du 'gyur ro/ / de bzhin gshegs pa til gyi gang bu snyed dgu bcu rtsa dgu'i mchod rten du 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gtsug tor dang
7a3(rgyud 'bum): spyan gyi mchod rten du byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur ro/ / gang zhig sangs rgyas kyi gzugs brnyan nam/ mchod rten thams cad kyi nang du 'jog par byed na/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs
7a4(rgyud 'bum): brnyan rin po che sna bdun gyi rang bzhin du byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur ro/ / 'khor lo'i 'phreng ba dang / dril bu g.yer ga'i dra bar sbrel ba dang bcas pa dang / bkra shis dang / char khab kyi gzug
7a5(rgyud 'bum): dang dril bur bcas pa rin po che sna bdun gyi rang bzhin du byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur ro/ / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang / chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i mthu dang / byin gyis rlabs dang /
7a6(rgyud 'bum): bden pa dang / dam tshig gis byang chub kyi snying po la thug gi bar du byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur ro// sems can gang dag mchod rten de la phung dud dang bsti stang byed pa de dag nges par phyir mi ldog
7a7(rgyud 'bum): par 'gyur zhing / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// phyag 'tshal ba gcig dang / skor ba gcig gis mnar med pa la thug gi bar la sogs
7b1(rgyud 'bum): pa rnams las yongs su thar par 'gyur zhing / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ro// gnas gang na mchod rten nam gzugs brnyan 'di lta bu gnas pa'i
7b2(rgyud 'bum): sa phyogs de'ang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur ro/ / phyogs der klu mi bsrun pas kyang mi tshugs par 'gyur/ sad dang ser bas kyang mi tshugs par 'gyur//
7b3(rgyud 'bum): gnas der srog chags mi bsrun pa dang gdug pas kyang mi tshugs par 'gyur/ gcan gzan gyis kyang mi tshugs par 'gyur/ bya mi bskrun pa dang / ne tse dang / ri skegs dang / byi ba dang /
7b4(rgyud 'bum): sre mo dang / sha sbrang dang / sbrang bu dang / byi ba dang / sbrang ma mchu gsum pa dang / mchu rings dang / rta bla'i 'jigs pa'ang mi 'byung bar 'gyur/ sbrul gdug pas kyang mi tshugs par
7b5(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur/ phyogs der yams kyi nad dang / nad 'go ba dang / 'khrug pa'ang mi 'byung bar 'gyur/ gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / 'byung po dang / yi dgas dang / 'dre dang / brjed
7b6(rgyud 'bum): byed kyi 'jig pa'ang mi 'byung bar 'gyur/ gdon thams cad kyis kyang mi tshugs par 'gyur/ rims thams cad kyis kyang mi tshugs par 'gyur/ nad thams cad dang / 'bras dang /
7b7(rgyud 'bum): po la mig dang / lhog pa dang / mtshan par rdol ba dang / rkang shu dang / g.yan pa dang / mdzes kyang mi tshugs par 'gyur zhing / mchod rten de mthong ba tsam gyis thams cad 'byang bar 'gyur ro//
8a1(rgyud 'bum): phyogs der ba lang gi nad dang / phyugs nad dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas rnam pa mang po gzhan dag gi nang dang / skyes pa dang / bud med dang / khye'u dang / bu mo'i nad kyis kyang nam
8a2(rgyud 'bum): yang mi tshugs par 'gyur/ dus ma yin par 'chi bas kyang dus ma yin par 'chi bar mi 'gyur/ dug gis ma yin/ mtshon gyis ma yin zhing / me dang chus kyang nam yang mi tshugs par 'gyur/ pha rol
8a3(rgyud 'bum): gyi dmag tshogs kyi 'jigs pas kyang ma yin/ lo nyes kyi 'jigs pas kyang nam yang mi tshugs par 'gyur ro// rgyal po chen po'i dmag gi 'jigs pa'ang mi 'byung bar 'gyur ro// rgyal po chen po
8a4(rgyud 'bum): bzhi'ang rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par sa phyogs de srung bar byed/ yongs su skyong bar byed do// gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po nyi shu rtsa brgyad po de dag kyang rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par srung ba dang / skyob pa dang /
8a5(rgyud 'bum): sbed par byed par 'gyur ro// rgyu skar nyi shu rtsa brgyad dang / zla ba dang / nyi ma dang / mjug rings chen po'ang nyin mtshan mthun par byed par 'gyur ro// klu'i rgyal po thams cad kyang rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par
8a6(rgyud 'bum): mdangs mi 'phrog cing / legs pa kho nar char gyi rgyun 'bebs par 'gyur ro// lha thams cad kyang mchod rten chen po de la phyag 'tshal ba dang / bkur sti bya ba dang / mchod pa bya ba'i phyir gnas sum cu rtsa
8a7(rgyud 'bum): gnyis nas dus gsum du 'ong ngo / / yul du gnas pa thams cad kyang mchod rten dang gzugs brnyan de'i drung du dus gsum du 'ong ngo // bstod par byed/ skor ba byed par 'gyur ro// lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya
8b1(rgyud 'bum): byin yang lha'i bu mo dang / lha'i tshogs rnams dang lhan cig rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par mchod rten nam gzugs brnyan de'i drung du nyin mtshan dus gsum du 'ong ste phyag 'tshal ba dang / mchod pa la 'ong ngo // de bzhin
8b2(rgyud 'bum): gshegs pa thams cad kyang rtag par dgongs pa dang / byin gyis rlob cing bzhugs so// mchod rten dang gzugs brnyan ji lta ji lta bu las byed pa sa'i 'am/ rdo'i 'am/ shing gi 'am/ dngul gyi 'am/ gser
8b3(rgyud 'bum): gyi 'am/ zangs kyir byed pa dang / chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'ang bris te de'i nang du bzhag na/ bzhag ma thag tsam gyis rin po che sna bdun gyi rang bzhin du 'gyur ro// byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur ro// 'phang dang
8b4(rgyud 'bum): them skas dang / kha sran dang / 'khor lo'i 'phreng ba dang / bkra shis dang / gdugs dang / dril bu 'phyang ba dang / ba dan dang / dril bu g.yer ga'i dra ba thams cad kyang rin po che sna bdun gyi rang bzhin du
8b5(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur ro/ / phyogs bzhi'i kun na'ang de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs brnyan gnas par 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byin gyi rlabs kyis byin gyis brlabs pa'i mchod rten rin po che dang
8b6(rgyud 'bum): sku gdung gi snying po'i mchod rten dang / mchod gnas su 'gyur ro// sku gzugs dang / mchod rten de 'og min gyi gnas kyi lhas kyang yongs su bskyang ba dang / mchod pas yongs su gzung bar 'gyur ro//
8b7(rgyud 'bum): de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rjes 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i yon tan gyi khyad par ji lta bur 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
9a1(rgyud 'bum): @bka' stsal pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyi rlabs kyi snying po gsang ba ring bsrel gyi za ma tog gi phyag rgya'i gzungs yin te/ lag na rdo rje des na mthu 'di ni yon tan gyi
9a2(rgyud 'bum): khyad par 'di lta bur byin gyi rlabs kyis byin gyis brlabs pa yin no/ / rdo rje 'dzin gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das rin po che'i za ma tog gi phyag rgya'i gzungs kyi chos kyi rnam grangs bshad par ci gnang
9a3(rgyud 'bum): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lag na rdo rje nyon cig/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba dang / gang dag yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i sangs rgyas
9a4(rgyud 'bum): bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gsum ste/ chos kyi sku dang / longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku dang / de bzhin du sprul pa'i sku ste/ dus gsum pa thams cad kyi ring srel gyi za ma
9a5(rgyud 'bum): tog gi phyag rgya'i gzungs kyi chos kyi rnam grangs yin no/ / na ma s+t+rai ya d+hi kA nAn/ sar+b+ba ta thA ga tA nAn/ oM b+hu bi bAn ba ra ba tsa re/ tsu lu tsu lu/ d+hu ra d+ha re/ sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta/ d+hA tu d+ha re/ pad+ma ma
9a6(rgyud 'bum): b+ha ti/ dza ya ba re/ a tsu le/ sma ra ta thA ga ta/ d+har+m+ma tsakra/ pra bar+Ne ne badz+ra/ bo d+hi maN+DA a laM kA ra/ a lo kr-i te/ sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta/ a d+hiSh+Ti ti/ bo d+ha ya bo d+ha ya/ bo d+ha ni bo d+ha ni/
9a7(rgyud 'bum): bud+d+ha bud+d+ha/ saM bo d+ha ni saM bo d+ha ya/ tsa la tsa la/ tsa lan+tu sar+b+ba A ba ra NA ni/ sar+b+ba pA pa bi ga te/ hu ru hu ru/ sar+b+ba sho ka bi ga te/ sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta hri da ya/ badz+ra Ni/ saM b+ha ba saM b+ha ba/ ta thA ga
9b1(rgyud 'bum): gra h+yA/ d+hA ra Ni mu dre/ bud+d+he bud+d+he/ su bud+d+he/ sarba ta thA ga ta a d+hin+ti te/ d+hA tu gar+b+he swA hA/ sa ma ya a d+hiSh+NI te swAhA/ sarba ta thA ga ta hri da ya/ d+hA tu mu dre sAhA/ su pra tidz+dzi te/ stu pe ta thA ga ta a
9b2(rgyud 'bum): tin+ti te/ hUM hUM swA hA/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta uSh+NI Sha d+hA tu mu dra Ni swA hA/ sarba ta thA ga tA na sA d+hA tu bi b+hu Shi ta a d+hin+ni te hu ru hu ru/ hUM hUM swA hA/ bcom ldan 'das kyis ring bsrel gyi za ma tog gi phyag rgya'i
9b3(rgyud 'bum): gzungs 'di bshad ma thag tu/ phyogs bcu dang phyogs re re kun nas de bzhin gshegs pa 'bum phrag bye ba khrag khrig til gyi gang bu snyed dgu bcu rtsa dgu gshegs nas/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa la
9b4(rgyud 'bum): shAkya thub pas sems can thams cad kyi don du 'dzam bu'i gling du chos kyi rnam grangs 'di lta bu'i chos kyi gter bzhag pa dang / ring bsrel gyi snying po'i mchod rten byin gyis brlabs pa legs so legs so zhes
9b5(rgyud 'bum): bya ba byin no/ / 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig dang byin gyis rlabs yin no// gang na ring bsrel gyi phyag rgya'i gzungs 'di ston par byed dam/ mchod rten gyi nang du 'jog gam/
9b6(rgyud 'bum): gzugs brnyan gyi nang du 'jog par byed pa der/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyang gcig tu rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par rjes su 'brang zhing bzhugs par 'gyur ro// thams cad du de bzhin gshegs pa'i
9b7(rgyud 'bum): byin gyi rlabs kyis byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur ro/ / de nas gzungs bshad pa dang / ji tsam na mchod rten rnying pa phyag dar gyi phung po lta bu de rin po che sna bdun gyi rang bzhin gyi mchod rten du mngon
10a1(rgyud 'bum): par 'phags shing / 'phang dang / legs par rnam par 'phyes pa dang / 'khor lo'i 'phreng ba dang / bkra shis dang bcas par gyur to// bcom ldan 'das dgyes te de
10a2(rgyud 'bum): skad ces bka' stsal nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rje dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye
10a3(rgyud 'bum): chen po de dag dang / lha dang mir bcas pa'i 'jig rten bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la yi rangs te mngon par bstod do// 'phags pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po gsang ba ring bsrel gyi
10a4(rgyud 'bum): za ma tog ces bya ba'i gzungs theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so/ / / rgya gar gyi mkha mo bid+yA ka ra pra b+ha dang / zhu chen gyi lotsob ban d+he btsangs de ben dra rak+Shi tas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phabs
10a5(rgyud 'bum): pa/ rgya gar skad du/ bo d+hi gar+b+ha lad+hA ra lak+Sha d+hA ra Ni/ bod skad du/ byang chub kyi snying po rgyan 'bum gyi gzungs/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems
10a6(rgyud 'bum): dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ / oM na mo b+ha ga ba te/ bi pu la ba da la kany+tsa nod k+Ship+ta/ pra b+hA sa ke tu mur+N+Na ye/ ta thA ga tA ya/ ar+ha te/ samyaka sa~M bud+d+hA ya/ na mo b+ha ga ba te shAkya pu na ye/ ta thA
10a7(rgyud 'bum): ga tA ya/ ar+ha te/ sa myaka saM bud+d+ha ya/ tad+ya thA/ bo d+hi bo d+hiHbo d+hi ni bo d+hi ni/ sarba ta thA ga ta gau tsa re/ d+ha ra d+ha ra/ ha ra ha ra/ pra ha ra pra ha ra/ ma hA bo d+hi tsit+ta d+ha re/ tsu lu tsu lu/ sha ta rasmi
10b1(rgyud 'bum): sats+tshe di tai/ sarba ta thA ga tA b+hi Shi ka te/ grA Ne gu Na ba te/ sarba bud+d+ha g+haSh+Ta b+h+yA se/ mi li mi li/ ga gan ta le/ pra tiSh+Thi te/ sarba ta thA ga ta a d+hiSh+Thi te/ na b+ha sta le/ sha ma sha ma/ pra sha ma pra shA me/
10b2(rgyud 'bum): sarba pA paM pra sha ma ne/ sarba pA paM bi sho d+ha ni/ hu lu hu lu hUM/ ma hA bo d+hi mArga saM pra tiSh+Thi te sarba ta thA ga tA su pra tiSh+Thi te shud+d+he swA hA/ mA la man+ta/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta bya ba lo ki te/ dza ya dza ya swA hA/ hr-i da yaM/
10b3(rgyud 'bum): oM hu ru hu ru/ dza ya mu khe swA hA/ u po hr-i da yaM/ oM badz+ra A yu She swA hA/ dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma 'am/ gzhan yang rigs kyi bu 'am/
10b4(rgyud 'bum): rigs kyi bu mo gang la zhig gzungs 'di bris te mchod rten byas la/ mchod rten de'i nang du gzungs 'di bcug na des mchod rten gcig byas na 'bum byas par 'gyur ro// lha rdzas kyi me tog dang / dri dang //
10b5(rgyud 'bum): 'phreng ba dang / brug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan la sogs pas kyang mchod par 'gyur te/ mchod rten 'ba' zhig mchod pa ma yin gyi/
10b6(rgyud 'bum): sangs rgyas dkon mchog dang / chos dkon mchog dang / dge 'dun dkon mchog rnams la'ang mchod pa'i yo byad de dag gis mchod par 'gyur ro// dga' bo ngas mdo 'di bshad pa ni bsod nams
10b7(rgyud 'bum): zhan pa dang / ma dad pa dang / lta ba log pa dang / the tsom za ba dang / mtshams med pa byed pa dang / tshe thung ba dang / sems can dmyal ba dang / byol song dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten dang /
11a1(rgyud 'bum): mtshams med par 'gro ba'i sems can de lta bu dag gi phyir gzungs 'di bshad do// dga' bo phyi ma'i dus phyi ma'i tshe khyim na gnas pa dang / dge slong las phal cher gzungs 'di klog
11a2(rgyud 'bum): pa dang / mchod par mi byed pa rnams ji ltar khyim pa rnams sdug bsngal bar bshad pa de bzhin du rab tu byung ba rnams kyang sdug bsngal bar 'gyur ro// de ste de bzhin du sangs rgyas mchod cing 'di la nyan pas
11a3(rgyud 'bum): mchod rten gcig byas na chos kyis brgyan pa brgyad khri bzhi stong rnams kyang mchod par 'gyur ro/ / gzhan yang bsod nams kyi phung po dpag tu med par 'gyur ro// sdong pos brgyan pa bklags shing kha ton
11a4(rgyud 'bum): du byas par 'gyur ro/ / 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dkyil 'khor du'ang zhugs par 'gyur ro// byang chub kyi snying po'i rgyan 'bum las btus pa 'bum gyi gzungs rdzogs so//
11a5(rgyud 'bum): rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya dA da sha bud+d+ha kan nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa sangs rgyas bcu gnyis pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/
11a6(rgyud 'bum): sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na bya rgod phung po'i ri la/ dge slong stong nyis brgya
11a7(rgyud 'bum): lnga bcu'i dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang thabs cig tu bzhugs te/ byang chub sems dpa' mi pham pa la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' khri nyis stong gi byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun chen po dang yang
11b1(rgyud 'bum): thabs cig go/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa la bka' stsal pa/ byams pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas shar phyogs logs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing
11b2(rgyud 'bum): bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag brjod du med pa bcu'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams mu tig can zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
11b3(rgyud 'bum): dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nam mkha'i dpal dri med rdul sel rab mdzes yon tan gyi tog gi 'od me tog pad+ma bai DUR+Ya'i 'od zer rin po che'i gzugs lta bu'i sku dang ldan pa/ spos mchog dam pas mchod
11b4(rgyud 'bum): pasku rnam par spras shing legs par brgyan pa/ gtsug tor gyi gtsug nas nyi ma'i 'od zer dpag med zla 'od smon lam gyis brgyan pa/ rab sprul bkod pa chen po chos kyi dbyings las mngon 'phags
11b5(rgyud 'bum): chags med rin chen rgyal po zhes bya ba da ltar yang bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston to/ / su rgyal ba'i mtshan 'dzin pa de bskal pa chen po 'dzam bu'i gling gi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi bskal
11b6(rgyud 'bum): par 'khor ba las ldog go/ / de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dri med ces bya ba lung bstan te/ de de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nam mkha'i dpal
11b7(rgyud 'bum): dri med rdul sel rab mdzes yon tan gyi tog gi pad+ma bai DUR+Ya'i 'od zer rin po che'i gzugs lta bu'i sku dang ldan pa/ spos mchog dam pas mchod pa/ sku rnam par spras shing legs par brgyan pa/ gtsug
12a1(rgyud 'bum): tor gyi gtsug nas nyi ma'i 'od zer dpag med zla 'od smon lam gyis brgyan pa/ rab sprul bkod pa chen po chos kyi dbyings las mngon 'dag chag med rin chen chul po de yongs su mya ngan las 'das
12a2(rgyud 'bum): pa'i dam pa'i chos nub ma thag tu bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa
12a3(rgyud 'bum): dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na med pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das chu zla gzhon nu nyi ma'i sgron
12a4(rgyud 'bum): m a zla ba'i me tog pad+ma gser sdug nam mkha' lta bu'i sku rnam par snang mdzad 'od zer rab brgyan thogs medo 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor phyogs bcur 'od zer rab 'byin 'jig rten khams kun snang byed tog gi rgyal mtshan rgyal
12a5(rgyud 'bum): po zhes bya bar 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ / shar phyogs de nyid kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bkod pa dri med 'od ces bya ba'i mtshan yang gzung ngo // tshig 'don to//
12a6(rgyud 'bum): phyag bya'o// lho phyogs kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas spobs pa'i rgyal la dgongs pa zhes bya ba'i mtshan yang gzung ngo // yid la bya'o// nub phyogs kyi de bzhin gshegs
12a7(rgyud 'bum): pa dri med zla ba'i tog gi rgyal po grags ldan zhes bya ba'i mtshan yang gzung ngo / / phyag bya'o// byang phyogs kyi de bzhin gshegs pa me tog bkod pa snang bar mdzad pa zhes bya ba'i mtshan yang gzung ngo // phyag bya'o//
12b1(rgyud 'bum): shar lho'i phyogs mtshams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa 'od mdzad ces bya'i mtshan yang gzung ngo // phyag bya'o// lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen mchog gi togs grags ldan zhes bya'i mtshan
12b2(rgyud 'bum): yang gzung ngo / / phyag bya'o// nub byang gi phyogs mtshams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dri med rnam par gzigs zhes bya ba'i mtshan yang gzung ngo // phyag bya'o// byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams kyi de bzhin gshegs
12b3(rgyud 'bum): pa 'jigs bral bag tsha mi mnga' spa zi mi byed ces bya ba'i mtshan yang gzung ngo / / phyag bya'o// 'og gi phyogs kyi de bzhin gshegs pa seng ge bsgyings pa'i mid pa zhes bya ba'i mtshan yang gzung ngo //
12b4(rgyud 'bum): phyag bya'o// steng gi phyogs kyi de bzhin gshegs pa gser 'od gzi brjid 'jigs bral rgyal po zhes bya ba'i mtshan yang gzung ngo // phyag bya'o// byams pa dang dad pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/
12b5(rgyud 'bum): rigs kyi bu mos bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bcu gnyis po 'di dag gi mtshan brjod la/ nyi ma bcur sdig la thams cad kyi nyes pa
12b6(rgyud 'bum): bshags par bya/ dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad la rjes su yi rang bar bya/ sangs rgyas thams cad la bskul ba dang / sangs rgyas thams cad la gsol ba 'debs pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba
12b7(rgyud 'bum): thams cad chos kyi dbyings su yongs su bsngo bas yongs su bsngo bar bya'o/ / 'on tang sdig pa thams cad zad par 'gyur ro// las kyi sgrib pa thams cad rnam par 'byung bar 'gyur ro//
13a1(rgyud 'bum): de'i 'og tu sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa phun sum tshogs pa dang / mi 'jigs pa phun sum tshogs pa dang / mtshan phun sum tshogs pa dang / byang chub sems
13a2(rgyud 'bum): dpa'i dge 'dun phun sum tshogs pa dang / gzungs phun sum tshogs pa'ang 'thob bo// ting nge 'dzin phun sum tshogs pa'ang 'thob bo// bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs
13a3(rgyud 'bum): su dag pa phun sum tshogs pa dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen phun sum tshogs pa'ang myur du yongs su 'dzin to// bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las nyams par mi 'gyur zhing
13a4(rgyud 'bum): yongs su nyams par yang mi 'gyur ro/ / 'khor ba na 'khor ba'i tshe'ang kun tu mdzes pa dang / de'i longs spyod phun sum tshogs pa dang / rigs phun sum tshogs pa dang / skye ba phun
13a5(rgyud 'bum): sum tshogs pa dang / rus phun sum tshogs pa dang / gzugs phun sum tshogs pa dang / rigs 'dra ba'i skye bo'i 'khor phun sum tshogs pa'ang yongs su 'dzin to// de la
13a6(rgyud 'bum): 'di skad ces bya ste/ / gang dang gang du skyes pa yi// tshe rabs tshe rabs thams cad du// mthong na dga' zhing dga' byed dang // 'od byed pa dang mthu che dang // 'byor pa chen por 'gyur ba yin//
13a7(rgyud 'bum): gzungs kyi gsang sngags kyi gzhi rnams kyang brjod par bya'o/ tad+ya thA/ a khe ma khe sa maM tu mu khe/ sau ti muk+te/ ne ruk+She pra b+he/ sa ma yo ge/ tsit+ta tsit+te/ a khe ma khe/ ma da ne
13b1(rgyud 'bum): bi bar+Ne/ sa man+ta muN+Da/ sad d+hA ra me/ yuk+te pra yuD+h+we/ hi li mi li/ ma sa le/ A na le/ tsam/ a tsi Ti a tsi rbi/ 6tse/ a ra he/ bahud tshe/ mA yu gra he/ he ma ba ti/
13b2(rgyud 'bum): dz+yo ti ba ti/ d+har+m+ma tsit+ta/ ts+tsha ti b+ho gi/ a bik+Sha be ra b+hIk+Sha me/ skaM d+hi ba b+hak+te/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis gsang sngags
13b3(rgyud 'bum): kyi gzhi rnams grub par gyur cig/ de la 'di skad ces bya ste// gzungs 'di dag ni bzung byas na// phyogs bcu dag na gang bzhugs pa'i// bye ba drug cu'i drang srong rnams// de dag de la
13b4(rgyud 'bum): dgongs par 'gyur/ / skye ba dag ni kun tu yang // dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnyed par 'gyur// cung zad dge ba gang yin pa// don rnams thams cad 'byor par 'gyur// pad+ma'i snying por
13b5(rgyud 'bum): bzhugs pa yi/ / sangs rgyas rnams ni mngon du mthong // gzungs 'di dag ni 'dzin byed pa// mkhas pa dpal ldan rdzus te skye// dran dang blo gros rtag pa dang // mos dang shes rab rab tu
13b6(rgyud 'bum): 'phel/ / thos pa thams cad 'dzin par 'gyur// thos pa rnams kyis yongs mi nyams// 'jig rten mgon po 'di dag gi/ mtshan rnams su zhig brjod byed pa// ngan 'gro thams cad
13b7(rgyud 'bum): spangs nas ni/ / bzang 'gror myur bar 'gro bar 'gyur// ting nge 'dzin dang gzungs kyi mchog/ de dag de la mngon du 'gyur// byang chub rab tu de 'tshang rgya// zhing ni bye ba phrag stong
14a1(rgyud 'bum): dag/ gser gyis bkang ste sbyin byin pas// gang zhig de bzhin gshegs rnams kyi// mtshan rnams 'dzin par byed pa yi// bsod nams phung po de ches mang // rtag tu tshe rabs/
14a2(rgyud 'bum): dran par 'gyur// byang chub spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe// mi khom thams cad rnam spangs te// sangs rgyas 'byung ba rab mdzes rnyed// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mnyes par byed// dad pa bla na
14a3(rgyud 'bum): med pa 'thob/ / sangs rgyas rnams la rab dad cing // mchod pa dam pa byed par 'gyur// sangs rgyas 'byung ba mnyes byed de// mthong nas ston la rab tu dad // 'jig rten sgron ma
14a4(rgyud 'bum): mthong nas ni/ / mchod pa bzang po byed par 'gyur// mtshan rnams 'di dag 'dzin byed pa// bskal pa bye ba grangs med du// 'khor ba rnam par spangs nas su// byang chub myur du
14a5(rgyud 'bum): 'tshang yang rgya/ / nyin zhag bdun du tshang bar ni// mtshan rnams 'di dag 'dzin byed na// gang gis 'dren rnams mthong 'gyur ba'i// rgya chen mig ni sbyangs par 'gyur// 'jig rten mgon
14a6(rgyud 'bum): po de dag gi/ mtshan rnams mi gang 'dzin byed na// skye ba gang dang gang skyes par// de ni phyag bya'i 'os su 'gyur// mtshan rnams 'di dag 'dzin byed pa// bskal pa bye ba bsam yas
14a7(rgyud 'bum): su/ bkur sti ma yin thob mi 'gyur// 'jig rten dgon grags pa 'thob// mtshan rnams 'di dag 'dzin byed pa// de la bskal pa du mar ni// lha rnams bsti sdang byed par 'gyur/
14b1(rgyud 'bum): byang chub myur du 'tshang yang rgyu// mtshan rnams 'di dag 'dzin byed pa// mos med shes rab 'chal mi 'gyur// g.yo dang sgra ni rnam par spangs// rtag tu sangs rgyas rnams kyang mthong //
14b2(rgyud 'bum): mtshan rnams 'di dag 'dzin byed pa// lha dang dri za klu dbang dang // mkha' lding lha min gsang ba pa// rtag tu de la srung bar byed// gzugs dang mtshan ni phun sum tshogs// nor che khyim du skye
14b3(rgyud 'bum): bar 'gyur/ / sems can kun la sbyin par byed// dpa' zhing gtong phod ser sna med// bskal pa bye ba rgya mang por// lha yi tsan dan dmar po dang // shin tu dri zhim spos kun gyi// spos dang
14b4(rgyud 'bum): de yi kha nas 'byung / / mtshan rnams 'di dag 'dzin byed pa// bskal pa bye bar sgra skad 'di// tshangs pa'i dbyangs dang ldan par 'gyur// rtag tu chos rgyal tshul dang ldan// mtshan rnams
14b5(rgyud 'bum): 'di dag 'dzin byed pa/ / rin chen sna bdun pad+ma'i 'dab// bye ba stong phrag mang yod las// 'byor chen de skye lha gzugs ldan// mtshan rnams 'di dag su 'dzin pa// de ni pha ma spyan sdug
14b6(rgyud 'bum): dang / / skye bo dag gi tshogs rnams dang // 'bral bar 'gyur ba mi mthong ngo // drang srong chen po rnams kyi mtshan// bud med kyis ni bzung byas na// bud med lus la ma chags nas// skyes
14b7(rgyud 'bum): pa blo gros ldan par 'gyur/ / mi yi lus ni thob gyur nas// bla med byang chub thob 'gyur te// chos kyi 'khor lo rab bskor nas// 'dod pa ji bzhin mya ngan 'da'// mtshan rnams 'di dag su
15a1(rgyud 'bum): 'dzin pa/ / de yi lus la mtshon dang ni// dug dang me dang rgyal po dang // g.yon can rnams kyis mi tshugs so// mtshan rnams 'di dag su 'dzin pa// de yi sems la
15a2(rgyud 'bum): nams kyang ni/ / dpung dang bzhon par bcas pa yi// bdud kyis glags rnyed mi 'gyur ro// 'di dag gi ni mtshan gyi rnams// mi gang 'dzin par byed pa de// zhing ni bye ba bsam yas par// nam
15a3(rgyud 'bum): mkha' la ni 'gro bar 'gyur/ / sangs rgyas bstan pa rnams mchod nas// 'jigs pa med par zhu ba zhu// de dag de yi bsam mkhyen nas// rgyal ba de dag lung ston 'gyur// sangs rgyas mgon
15a4(rgyud 'bum): po de dag las/ / lung bstan pa ni thob gyur nas// de ni shin tu yi rangs ste// rgyal ba'i bstan la the tsom med// mtshan rnams 'di dag 'dzin byed pa// 'jig rten mgon po rnams las ni//
15a5(rgyud 'bum): zab mo'i chos ni thos 'gyur te// thos nas thams cad 'dzin par 'gyur// de nas pha rol phyin pa dang // mi 'jigs pa dang stobs rnams dang // mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po rnams// ma lus
15a6(rgyud 'bum): bar ni rdzogs par 'gyur/ / sangs rgyas de dag rnams kyi ni// gang gi zhing du 'dong 'gyur ba// der ni bla med yang dag rdzogs// byang chub rtogs nas 'tshang rgyar 'gyur// skyes pa 'am ni bud med
15a7(rgyud 'bum): gang / mtshan rnams 'di dag 'dzin pa yi// yon tan 'di dag gzhan dag kyang // sangs rgyas bskal par rgyun du gsung // bag yod ldan par gyur nas ni// yon tan phun sum 'di thos nas//
15b1(rgyud 'bum): rdzogs pa sangs rgyas grags ldan pa// de dag mtshan rnams 'dzin par 'gyur// sangs rgyas 'di dag dpal snying po// sprin gyi rgyal po mo yi mchog/ 'jig rten mnan po 'di dag gi
15b2(rgyud 'bum): mtshan ni bskal par gang nyan dang / / gang dag 'di rnams mtshan nyan cing // thos nas gus par byed 'gyur ba// de dang de dag shes rab che// rkang gnyis rnams kyi mchog tu gyur// drang
15b3(rgyud 'bum): srong chen po de dag gi/ / 'di 'dra'i mtshan dag thos gyur nas// bgayod ldan zhing mkhas gyur la// shes rab ldan mi su mi waM// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas// byang chub
15b4(rgyud 'bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang / dge slong de dag dang / thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang
15b5(rgyud 'bum): dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// 'phags pa sangs rgyas bcu gnyis pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so//
15b6(rgyud 'bum): / rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang / dA na shI la dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba ban de ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te/ skad gsar bcad kyis kyang bcos nas gtan la phab pa//
15b7(rgyud 'bum): rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya sap+ta bud+d+ha kan nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa sangs rgyas bdun pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/
16a1(rgyud 'bum): sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das ti sa'i ri'i rtse mo lha'i gnas na drang
16a2(rgyud 'bum): srong gi spyod pa dang ha cang yang mi ring ba zhig na/ dge slong lnga brgya tsam gyi dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa' lnga brgya la 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
16a3(rgyud 'bum): po byams pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i snying po dang / kun tu bzang po dang / mtha' yas me tog dang / kun nas me tog dang / de dag la sogs pa skye
16a4(rgyud 'bum): ba gcig gis thogs pa sha stag dang thabs cig tu bzhugs so/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis ri'i rtse mo'i nags khrod de nyid na/ dge slong zhig 'byung po sa zin nas brdol zhing gcer bu gos
16a5(rgyud 'bum): med la lag pa bsgreng ste ngu zhing 'dug pa gzigs so/ / de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i snying pos bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar te/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha ngas la
16a6(rgyud 'bum): btsugs nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das nam mkha'i dkyil na kyi hud ces sgra 'byin
16a7(rgyud 'bum): pa 'di dang / dge slong gcer bu gos ma mchis la/ lag pa bstod pa cig shos 'di'ang su zhig lags/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam
16b1(rgyud 'bum): mkha'i snying po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ / nam mkha'i snying po 'di ni nad kyis btab pa yin no// cig shos 'di'ang nad kyis btab pa yin no// de nas bcom ldan 'das la/
16b2(rgyud 'bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i snying pos 'di skad ces gsol to// nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar bgyid pa dang / 'byung po bzlog pa'i rig sngags bcom ldan 'das kyis
16b3(rgyud 'bum): bstan du gsol/ / bka' stsal du gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis sangs rgyas sprul pa mdzad de/ de nas nam mkha' la de bzhin gshegs pa drug byung ngo // bdun pa ni sangs rgyas
16b4(rgyud 'bum): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa'o/ / de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par gzigs steng gi nam mkha' la bzhugs te/ sems can thams cad la phan pa'i don dang / nad thams
16b5(rgyud 'bum): cad rab tu zhi bar bya ba dang / 'byung po thams cad bzlog pa'i phyir gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag bka' stsal to// na mo bud+d+hA ya/ na mo d+har+m+ma ya/ na maHsaM g+hA ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM ha la ha la/
16b6(rgyud 'bum): hi li hi lA ya/ na mo dza ga na mi tsa nA ya/ na mo na maHswA hA/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par gzigs kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i snying po la 'di skad ces
16b7(rgyud 'bum): bka' stsal to/ / nam mkha'i snying po gang la la zhig rig sngags 'di 'chang ngam/ klog gam/ kun chub par byed na de'i lus la mtshon gyis mi tshugs/ chu dang sdug bsngal ba'i nad kyis 'chi
17a1(rgyud 'bum): ba'i dus byed par mi 'gyur ro/ / dus ma yin pa'i 'chi bas 'chi ba'i dus byed par mi 'gyur ro// des dug zos kyang zas bzhin du 'gyur ro// zas dang skom la lan
17a2(rgyud 'bum): bdun bzlas brjod byas te zos na pha rol gyi gnod pa mi 'byung ngo / / nad thams cad kyis btab par mi 'gyur ro// ring du 'tsho bar 'gyur ro// thos pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro// de bzhin
17a3(rgyud 'bum): gshegs pa bdun gyi gzugs mthong bar 'gyur ro/ / mtshan btab pa'i rna bar bzlas brjod byas la sna ma'i mar sbyin no// mdze dang skrangs nad kyis btab pa rnams la/ sna ma'i mar dang / ut+pa
17a4(rgyud 'bum): la sngon po dang / shu ti dang / nye'u shing pa rnams bsres pa'i mar byin na nad thams cad sos par 'gyur ro// las thams cad la'ang sbyar bar bya'o// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa gtsug tor can
17a5(rgyud 'bum): steng gi nam mkha' la bzhugs te/ sems can thams cad la phan pa'i don dang / nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar bya ba dang / 'byung po thams cad bzlog pa'i phyir gsang sngags kyi gzhi dag bka'
17a6(rgyud 'bum): stsal to/ / na mo bud+d+hA ya/ na mo d+harmA ya/ na maHsaM g+hA ya/ oM pa tsa pa tsa pA tsa ya pA tsa ya/ sarba b+hU tA nA~M/ tsin+ta ya/ kI lA ya/ ba ra bi d+ha nAM sAhA/ nam mkha'i snying po sems can thams
17a7(rgyud 'bum): cad la phan pa'i don dang / nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar bya ba dang / 'go mnyes pa dang / rmi lam ngan pa thams cad bzlog pa dang / dus ma yin par 'chi ba dgag pa'i phyir sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig
17b1(rgyud 'bum): brgya stong phrag du mas gsungs shing / ngas kyang da ltar bshad pa'i snying po 'di zung zhig/ nam mkha'i snying po gang la la zhig nga'i snying po 'di nyin lan gsum yid la byed na de la pha rol gyi gnod pa 'byung
17b2(rgyud 'bum): par mi 'gyur ro/ / gnyid kyis log pa'i rmi lam na de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs mthong bar 'gyur ro// gshis ngan du 'chi bar mi 'gyur ro// 'di nas shi 'phos nas de bzhin gshegs pa
17b3(rgyud 'bum): dang phrad par 'gyur zhing mnyes par byed par 'gyur ro/ / de nas 'di'i cho ga gzhan ni nad thams cad la skud pa bcing bar bya'o// 'dus pa las gyur pa la ni sna ma'i mar la bzlas brjod byas te sbyin no//
17b4(rgyud 'bum): chus phyogs bcing bar bya'o// skud pas bdag bsrung ngo // byis pa rnams kyis gdon dag la skud pa sngon po gdags so// mtshon btab pa'i rna bar lan bdun bzlas brjod bya'o// gzhan dag
17b5(rgyud 'bum): la'ang rang gi blos sbyar bar bya'o/ / de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad skyob steng gi nam mkha' la bzhugs te/ sems can thams cad la phan pa'i don dang / nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar bya ba dang /
17b6(rgyud 'bum): 'byung po thams cad bzlog pa'i phyir gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag bka' stsal to// na mo bud+d+hA ya/ na mo d+har+m+ma ya/ na maHsaM g+hA ya/ oM ka la ka la/ ki li ki li/ ku lu ku lu
17b7(rgyud 'bum): ku long sA da naM/ ku ru sarba gra hA NAM swA hA/ nam mkha'i snying po gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag ni bskal pa bzang po'i de bzhin gshegs pa 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba
18a1(rgyud 'bum): @#thams cad kyis gsungs shing / ngas kyang da ltar bshad de/ nam mkha'i snying po khyod kyis gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag zung zhig/ gang la la zhig 'dzin tam/ klog gam/
18a2(rgyud 'bum): kun chub par byed na/ de'i lus la mtshon gyis mi tshugs// dug gis mi tshugs/ dbyig dug gis mi tshugs/ rims nad kyis mi 'debs shing / chu dang / dus ma yin par 'chi ba dang /
18a3(rgyud 'bum): gshis ngan du 'chi bar mi 'gyur te/ sngon gyi las kyi sgrib pa rnam ni ma gtogs so// dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma gang la la zhig nang par langs
18a4(rgyud 'bum): nas mgo bkrus te de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan sngar lan brgya rtsa brgyad brjod na/ de'i las kyi sgrib pa thams cad byang bar 'gyur ro// de la sems can sdang ba gang dag rgyal po rnams thog mar smra
18a5(rgyud 'bum): bar 'gyur ro/ / sems can thams cad de'i dbang du 'gyur ro// 'jig pa thams cad kyi nang du yid la bya'o// 'thab pa dang / 'thab mo dang / rtsod pa dang / 'gyed pa thams cad du
18a6(rgyud 'bum): skud pa dkar pos gdags so/ / mig nad la shing 'o ma can las skud pa byas te rna ba la gdags so// dmag rengs par byed par 'dod pas zho dang sbrang rtsi la bsngags pa'i 'bras yos lan brgya
18a7(rgyud 'bum): rtsa brgyad sbyin sreg bya'o/ / rA dzA nA rA dzA ma tra ma bA shi kAr tu kA me na/ 'o ma can gyi shing gi spar shing gi me bus la bsreg bya til dag la lan stong sbyin sreg bya'o// bdag dang sems can thams
18b1(rgyud 'bum): cad kyi sgrib pa thams cad dang / sdig pa sbyangs shing dpal chen po dang / nor gyi phung po chen po sgrub par 'dod na/ 'o ma can gyi shing gi sbar shing gis me bu sa la bsreg bya til dag lan stong sbyin
18b2(rgyud 'bum): sreg bya'o/ / sdig pa ji snyed pa thams cad sbyang bar 'dod pa dang / rig sngags thams cad sgrub par 'dod pa dang / bdag bkru bar 'dod pas shu ti dang / na lad dang / khre dang / shi ri
18b3(rgyud 'bum): sha dang / rgya spos dang / gur kum dang / bla sgang dang / in+d+ra ba ru na dang / byang chub kyi shing dang / a mra'i mgo thogs dang / 'di rnams kyis bkru bar bya ste/ sangs rgyas kyi spyan
18b4(rgyud 'bum): sngar nyin zhag gcig smyung ba bya zhing bum pa gsar pa gzhag ste/ zla ba nya la sangs rgyas kyi gzugs kyi spyan sngar snying po la lan stong rtsa brgyad bsngags la khrus bya'o// dug mi gdug
18b5(rgyud 'bum): par byed par 'dod pas sangs rgyas kyi spyan sngar seng ldeng gi phur ma spyi bor bsnyugs la brgya rtsa brgyad ming nas smos te sbyin sreg byas na dug mi gdug par 'gyur ro/ / gdon dang / bsrung ba dang /
18b6(rgyud 'bum): 'byung po la sogs pa'i las thams cad la'ang sbyar ba byas na bde bar gnas par 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa log par dad sel steng gi nam mkha' la bzhugs te/
18b7(rgyud 'bum): sems can thams cad la phan pa'i don dang / nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar bya ba dang / 'byung po thams cad bzlog pa'i phyir gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag bka' stsal to// na mo bud+d+hA ya/
19a1(rgyud 'bum): na mo d+har+m+ma ya/ na maHsaM b+hA ya/ na maHkra kuts+tshan dA ya/ ta thA ga tA ya/ aH te/ samyaka saM bud+d+hA ya/ oM ka Ta ka Ta/ ka r+Na ka Sha/ ki tsi kir+thi/ ki Shi ki r+Na
19a2(rgyud 'bum): ki TA pa ya na maHswA hA/ nam mkha'i snying po de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas log par dad sel ces bya ba gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag gis gsungs shing
19a3(rgyud 'bum): rjes su yi rang ba'i snying po 'di khyod kyis zung zhig/ blangs shing bzung ste kun chub par byas na/ phyi ma'i tshe dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma dag de'i tshe dkon
19a4(rgyud 'bum): mchog gsum la dad pa rnyed nas khrus byas te/ bcom ldan 'das la me tog dang / bdug pa dang / spos dag gis mchod pa byas nas gsang sngags 'di lan brgya rtsa brgyad brjod par 'gyur te/
19a5(rgyud 'bum): tshe rabs bdun du tshe rabs dran par 'gyur ro// lha rnams kyi nang du lha'i che ba nyid thob par 'gyur ro// yang na mi rnams kyi nang du 'khor los sgyur bar 'gyur ro// yang na cho ga bzhin du bsgrubs na
19a6(rgyud 'bum): de mir skye ba tha ma thob par 'gyur te/ 'di nas shi 'phos nas 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du skye bar 'gyur te/ tshe 'di la'ang rtag tu brjod na nad thams cad las thar par 'gyur ro// thos pa
19a7(rgyud 'bum): 'dzin par 'gyur ro/ / zas dang skom gyi rnam pa la lan bdun bsngags te zos 'thungs na nad thams cad las thar par 'gyur ro// ci ste skom zhi bar 'dod na bza' thams cad la lan stong rtsa
19b1(rgyud 'bum): brgyad kyis bkru bar bya'o/ / lkog rgal bcad na zangs khab kyis bya'o// 'thab pa dang / rtsod pa dang / bcings pa thams cad las thar par bya na lan bdun bzlas brjod bya ste/ rtag
19b2(rgyud 'bum): tu nor yang 'phel bar 'gyur/ bgegs dang log 'dren thams cad las kyang thar par 'gyur ro// ci ste de bzhin gshegs pa mthong bar 'dod na/ des phyogs gtsang mar 'jig rten gyi
19b3(rgyud 'bum): 'khor sar dkyil 'khorabaskus la a ka rus bdugs te/ lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas la/ de'i drung du sngas shar phyogs su bstan te nyal na/ de bzhin gshegs pa
19b4(rgyud 'bum): mthong bar 'gyur ro/ / yid la ci smos pa thams cad ston to// tshe 'am/ stobs sam/ 'pham rgyal thams cad kyang ston to// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa gser thub steng
19b5(rgyud 'bum): gi nam mkha' la bzhugs te/ sems can thams cad la phan pa'i don dang / nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar bya ba dang / 'byung po thams cad bzlog pa'i phyir gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di
19b6(rgyud 'bum): dag bka' stsal to/ / na mo bud+d+ha ya/ na mo d+har+m+ma ya/ na maHsaM g+hA ya/ na maHka na ka mu na ye/ ta thA ga tA ya/ arba te sa myag saM bud+d+ha ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM sa ra sa ra/
19b7(rgyud 'bum): sa ra sa ra/ si ri si ri/ si ri si ri/ sI ra ya/ d+ha ma d+ha ma/ d+ha ma d+ha ma/ d+hu ma d+hu ma/ d+hu ma d+hu ma/ d+hu mA ya/ na mo na maHka ra ki mu na ye/ ta thA ga tA ya/ a
20a1(rgyud 'bum): @te samyaka saM bud+d+hA ya swA hA/ de nas bzhin gshegs pa gser thub kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha'i snying po la 'di skad ces bka' stsa kha to//
20a2(rgyud 'bum): nam mkha'i snying po gang la la zhig snying po 'di 'dzin cing rtag tu bzlas brjod byed pa de la mtshon gyi 'jigs pa mi 'byung / me dang / chu dang / lce 'bab pas 'chi ba'i dus byed par mi
20a3(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur/ dug thams cad kyang zas dang 'dra bar thub par 'gyur/ dus ma yin par 'chi bas 'chi ba'i dus byed par mi 'gyur/ gshis ngan du 'chi bar mi 'gyur/ tshe ring por 'gyur/
20a4(rgyud 'bum): longs spyod che bar 'gyur/ rtag tu de bzhin gshegs pa dang ldan par 'gyur/ de bzhin gshegs pas byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur ro// dus gsum du bzlas brjod byas na sngon gyi las
20a5(rgyud 'bum): kyi sgrib pa thams cad byang bar 'gyur ro/ / ci ste pha rol nang las thar bar byed par 'dod na ci nus su gtor ma gtong zhing pog gam/ a ka ru'i bdug pas bdugs la/ gza' thams cad
20a6(rgyud 'bum): kha khrus bya'o/ / mdze dang / skangs nad dang / mchin sman la shu dag 'jam po btags la sbrang ci dang bsres te/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar lan stong rtsa brgyad bsngags la
20a7(rgyud 'bum): bskus na mdze nad thams cad sos par 'gyur ro/ / zhag bzhi pa la sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar sna ma'i me tog gi 'phreng ba la lan stong rtsa brgyad bsngags te/ mi'i mgo la bcings na
20b1(rgyud 'bum): zhag bzhi pa'i rims sos par 'gyur ro/ / mtshon btab pa'i rna bar bzlas brjod byas na brjed byed las thar par 'gyur ro// lus srul pos zin pa rnams la sangs rgyas la phul ba'i me tog gis
20b2(rgyud 'bum): bdug go/ / de la sogs pa'i las rnams byed de/ las thams cad pa zhes bya'o// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa 'od srungs steng gi nam mkha' la bzhugs te/ sems can thams cad la phan
20b3(rgyud 'bum): pa'i don dang / nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar bya ba dang / 'byung po thams cad bzlog pa'i phyir gsang sngags kyi gzhi dag bka' stsal to// na mo bud+d+hA ya/ na mo d+har+m+ma ya/ na maHsaM g+ha ya/ oM ha ra
20b4(rgyud 'bum): ha ra/ ha ra ha ra/ ha ha ha/ na maHkA sh+yA pA ya/ ta thA ga tA ya/ ar+ha te sa myaka saM bud+d+hA ya/ sid+d+han+tu man+ta pA da swA hA/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa 'od srungs kyis / byang chub sems dpa' sems
20b5(rgyud 'bum): dpa' chen po nam mkha'i snying po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ / nam mkha'i snying po snying po 'di nI sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang+gA'i klung sum cu rtsa gnyis kyi bye ma snyed dag gis gsungs pa ste/
20b6(rgyud 'bum): nam mkha'i snying po khyod kyis kyang snying po 'di zung zhig/ kun chub par gyis shig/ gang la la zhig 'dzin tam/ klog gam/ kun chub par byed dam/ nyin mo 'am mtshan mo lan gsum gsum bzlas
20b7(rgyud 'bum): brjod byed na/ mdor na rmi lam na de bzhin gshegs pa mthong bar 'gyur ro// de'i las kyi sgrib pa tham cad kyang byang bar 'gyur te/ sngon gyi las ni me togs so// las thams cad la'ang sbyar bar bya'o//
21a1(rgyud 'bum): mdze dang sha gar la sogs pa la sangs rgyas la phul ba'i me tog la sangs rgyas kyi spyan sngar lan stong rtsa brgyad bsngags te bklags shing bskus na sos par 'gyur ro// klad pa na
21a2(rgyud 'bum): ba la sangs rgyas la phul ba'i me tog sangs rgyas kyi spyan sngar bzhag ste/ sangs rgyas kyi spyan sngar lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bya'o// thams cad du'ang sbyar bar bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das
21a3(rgyud 'bum): de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa steng gi nam mkha' la bzhugs te/ sems can thams cad la phan pa'i don gyi phyir rig sngags 'di dag bka' stsal to// na mo bud+d+hA ya/ na mo d+har+m+ma ya/ na maHsaM g+ha
21a4(rgyud 'bum): ya/ tad+ya thA/ g+hu me g+hu me b+h+yA ma/ ma hA g+hu me/ ta le ta le/ ma hA tA le/ tsa le tsa le/ ma hA tsa le/ d+hu re d+hu re/ ma hA d+ha re/ ti ri ti ri/ ma hA ti ri/ ki li ki li/ mai hA ki li/ tsu ru r+tha
21a5(rgyud 'bum): ru/ ma hA tsu ru/ mi l-i mi l-i/ ma hA mi laM/ ti li ti li/ ma ha ti li/ d+hu me d+hu me/ ma hA d+hu me/ tsa laM tsa laM/ ma hA tsa le/ khi ri khi ri/ ma hA khi ri/ tsi li tsi li/ ma hA tsi li/ sA hA/
21a6(rgyud 'bum): de nas de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i snying po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// klad pa'i nang bsal na mtshon dang lag mthil gyis bya'o//
21a7(rgyud 'bum): sprin bzlog na shing ka ra wI ra'i lcug mas so// dug spon chus bya'o// las gzhan rnams kyang bya'o// khrus kyi tshogs sbyar bar bya'o// cho ga thams cad dus thams cad du sbyar bar bya'o//
21b1(rgyud 'bum): bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i snying po yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// 'phags pa
21b2(rgyud 'bum): sangs rgyas bdun pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so/ / rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya sarba bud+d+ha aM ga ba ti nA ma d+hA ra Ni/ bod skad du
21b3(rgyud 'bum): 'phags pa sangs rgyas thamacad kyi yan lag dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/
21b4(rgyud 'bum): bcom ldan 'das gang+gA'i klung chen po'i 'gram na/ 'jig rten skyong ba bzhi dang thabs cig tu bzhugs te/ de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis/ rnam thos kyi bu la sogs pa rgyal po chen po bzhi la 'di
21b5(rgyud 'bum): skad ces bka' stsal to/ / rgyal po chen po dag skyes pa dang / bud med dang / khye'u dang / bu mo rnams la 'jigs pa chen po bzhi po 'di dag 'byung ngo // bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/
21b6(rgyud 'bum): rga ba dang / na ba dang / rgud pa dang / 'chi ba'o// de la'ang 'jigs pa chen po gcig ste/ 'di ltar 'chi bdag gi 'jigs pa chen po ste/ bcom pa med pa/ gnyen po med pa/ rtag tu
21b7(rgyud 'bum): phyi bzhin 'brang ba'o/ / rgyal po chen po dag de la 'jigs pa chen po gcig pu de'i gnyen po ngas 'dir brjod par bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ rgyal po chen po bzhis 'di skad ces gsol to//
22a1(rgyud 'bum): bcom ldan 'das gang gi slad du/ bcom ldan 'das kyis srog rab tu stsal bas skye dgu rjes su gzung ba 'di ni/ deng bdag cag gis rnyed pa legs par rnyed do// de nas bcom
22a2(rgyud 'bum): ldan 'das shar phyogs su thugs mngon du phyogs te bzhugs nas/ se gol gyi sgras de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la bskul te/ 'di skad ces/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag
22a3(rgyud 'bum): par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang su dag sems can rnams la thugs brtse ba'i slad du/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa de dag bdag gi grogs mdzod
22a4(rgyud 'bum): cig/ des na bdag 'dir sangs rgyas thams cad kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis byin gyis brlabs nas/ sems can thams cad kyi dus ma yin par 'chi ba rab tu bzlog par bgyi'o// sngon ma bskor ba'i
22a5(rgyud 'bum): chos kyi 'khor lo gnyis pa'ang bskor bar bgyi'o zhes gsung ngo / / de bzhin du lho dang / nub dang / byang dang / steng dang / 'og gi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la bskul te/ 'di skad
22a6(rgyud 'bum): ces de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang su dag sems can rnams la thugs brtsa ba'i don du/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs
22a7(rgyud 'bum): par sangs rgyas pa de dag bdag gi grogs mdzod cig ces gsung ngo / / de bzhin du phyogs mtshams rnams su'ang 'di skad ces/ gang gi phyir 'di dag tshe dang / stobs dang / kha dog dang ldan pa
22b1(rgyud 'bum): yongs su grub cing / dus ma yin par 'chi ba'i 'jigs pa 'byung bar mi 'gyur ba/ sangs rgyas thams cad bdag gi grogs mdzod cig ces gsung ngo // de nas phyogs bcu'i sa'i khams ji snyed
22b2(rgyud 'bum): sangs rgyas kyi spyan la snang bar gyur pa de snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams dag sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis til gyi gang bu bzhin du gang ste/ de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i grogs mdzad par
22b3(rgyud 'bum): zhal gyis bzhes nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad 'di skad ces gsung ngo // tad+ya thA/ tsa la tsa la tsa le/ bi na ti/ swasti ke/ tsakra aM ga ti/ pra sha maM du/ sarba ro ga a na te/
22b4(rgyud 'bum): kur+N+Ne kur+N+Ne ma hA kur+N+Ne/ tsa re tsa re re/ he ma gi ri/ he ma gau ri/ he ma ni shun+di/ he ma si si/ kau ra be kau ra ba be/ he ku ra re ku ra re/ ku ma ti/ bi Sha sa ma Ni/ shi Shu b+hi/ tsa le tsa le/ bi tsa
22b5(rgyud 'bum): le/ mA bi laM ba hu mu hu mu swA hA/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po ji snyed pa thams cad kyang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang nye bar 'dug nas/ de dag gis smras pa/ hUM hUM/ si si swA hA/
22b6(rgyud 'bum): de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mi snang bar gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bus 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan
22b7(rgyud 'bum): 'das bdag gis kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis bsrung bar bgyi'o/ / dus ma lags par 'gum pa las bzlog par bgyi'o// tad+ya thA/ shwe te shwe te shwe te/ le li li/ 'phags
23a1(rgyud 'bum): skyes pos kyang smras pa/ mA taM ge mA taM ge/ mA taM gi ni/ shu mA shU mA/ yul 'khor srung gis kyang smras pa/ tsa re tsa re re swA hA/ mig mi bzang gis kyang smras pa/ ba li
23a2(rgyud 'bum): ba pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rgyal po chen po gang la la zhig sangs rgyas thams cad kyis gzigs pa'i rigs sngags 'di nyin rel lan re 'don na/ rigs kyi bu
23a3(rgyud 'bum): 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de la ston pa'i 'du shes bskyed par bya'o// rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de ngan song gsum du 'gro bar mi 'gyur ro// 'dis sems can thams cad kyi
23a4(rgyud 'bum): srog la phan btags par 'gyur ro/ / gang zhig sems canathams cad kyi don du nyin gcig bzhin du tshig tu 'don pa dang / gang yang 'di klog pa de la dus ma yin par 'chi ba'i
23a5(rgyud 'bum): 'jigs pa med do/ / de'i lus la nad ngan pa 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro// chus 'chi ba'i dus byed par mi 'gyur ro// mes ma yin/ mtshon gyis ma yin/ dug gis ma yin/ lce 'bab
23a6(rgyud 'bum): pas ma yin no/ / gang la la rgyal ba'i bu dag rig sngags 'di 'don pa'i sa phyogs de sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis dgongs par rig par bya'o// yi ger 'dri ba 'am 'drir
23a7(rgyud 'bum): 'jug pa des/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la rim gro bya ba thams cad kyis bsti stang byas par 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sems can rnams la rim gro byed pa ni sangs rgyas la rim gro byed pa yin
23b1(rgyud 'bum): no/ / zhes de bzhin gshegs pa rnams gsung ba'i phyir ro// su zhig gis 'di bris nas yan lag la btags na de'i yan lag thams cad bsrungs par 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces
23b2(rgyud 'bum): bka' stsal nas/ rgyal po chen po bzhi dang / thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dag dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
23b3(rgyud 'bum): gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/ / 'phags pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yan lag dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so// / rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang / dA na shI la
23b4(rgyud 'bum): dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba ban de ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te/ skad gsar bcad kyis kyang bcos nas gtan la phab pa'o// / @rgya gar skad du/
23b5(rgyud 'bum): Ar+ya bu d+hA hri da ya nA ma d+hA ra Ni d+harma parA ya/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa sangs rgyas kyi snying po zhes bya ba'i gzungs kyi chos kyi rnam grangs/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/
23b6(rgyud 'bum): 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod yul/ chos kyi dbye dgon pa rin po che bkod pa'i 'khor gyi khyams/ ye shes kyis rnam par spyad pa/ sngon
23b7(rgyud 'bum): gyi sangs rgyas kyis byin gyis brlabs pa/ sems can thams cad kyis mngon par bstod pa/ byang chub sems dpa' chen po'i gnas/ rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa/ chos thams cad mnyam pa
24a1(rgyud 'bum): @#nyid kyi rjes su spyod pa/ kun nas 'od zer gyi khang bzangs kyi dbus na/ byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma thams cad kyang 'jig rten gyi khams tha dad pa nas lung
24a2(rgyud 'bum): bstan pa/ thams cad kyang 'jig rten gyi khams tha dad pa nas 'dus pa/ thams cad kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi rgyal po'i sras/ thams cad kyang gzungs dang ting nge 'dzin sna tshogs thob pa sha stag gis
24a3(rgyud 'bum): yongs su bskor cing mdun gyis bltas nas thabs cig tu bzhugs te chos ston to/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor rgya chen po la bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu dag skye bo mang
24a4(rgyud 'bum): po la phan pa dang / skye bo mang po la bde ba dang / 'jig rten la thugs brtse ba dang / lha dang mi'i skye bo phal po che'i chos kyi don dang / phan pa dang / bde ba'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
24a5(rgyud 'bum): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyis gsungs pa/ sangs rgyas kyi snying po zhes bya ba'i gzungs kyi chos kyi rnam grangs yod do// rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la sangs rgyas
24a6(rgyud 'bum): kyi snying po zhes bya ba'i gzungs kyi chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'chang ngam/ 'dzin tam/ klog gam/ kun chub par byed dam/ gzhan dag la'ang rgya cher yang dag par rab tu ston tam/ dad dam/
24a7(rgyud 'bum): lhag pa'i bsam pas mos par byed na/ de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur/ chos thams cad 'dzin pa dang mi 'bral bar 'gyur/ sangs rgyas bcom
24b1(rgyud 'bum): ldan 'das rnams dang mi 'bral bar 'gyur/ de bzhin gshegs pa la lta ba dang bsnyen bkur byed pa dang mi 'bral bar 'gyur/ chos nyan pa dang mi 'bral bar 'gyur/ dge 'dun la rim gro byed pa dang mi
24b2(rgyud 'bum): 'bral bar 'gyur/ bskal pa stong du 'khor ba'i srid pa'i rgya mtsho phyir snyil bar 'gyur/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi bar du tshe rabs dran par
24b3(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur/ myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur/ de la 'byung po'i tshogs thams cad srung bar 'gyur/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin
24b4(rgyud 'bum): dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang / mi ma yin pa thams cad dga' bar 'gyur/ de'i lus la nad kyis mi tshugs par
24b5(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur/ pha rol gyi gnod pas 'chi ba'i dus byed par mi 'gyur/ chad pa spang ba dang / mtshon cha spang ba dang / dug gzhil ba dang / 'chi ba'i dus byed par mi 'gyur/ de la bdud sdig can gyis glags
24b6(rgyud 'bum): rnyed par mi 'gyur/ bdud kyi ris kyi lha rnams kyis skabs rnyed par mi 'gyur te/ gang du yid la byas pa der bdud kyi ris kyi lha de dag thams cad skrag cing dngangs la/ dngangs par 'gyur zhing / phyogs
24b7(rgyud 'bum): bcur 'bros par 'gyur ro/ / de la 'di dag ni sangs rgyas kyi tshig go// sangs rgyas kyi tshig chen po'o// sangs rgyas kyis gnang ba'i tshig chen po'o// sangs rgyas thams cad kyi tshig go/
25a1(rgyud 'bum): bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi tshig yin no// tad+ya thA/ bud+d+he su bud+d+he/ ma hA bud+d+he/ i hA bud+d+he/ ta tra bud+d+he/ bud+d+he bud+d+he/ bud+d+ha ma ti bud+d+he/ sarba bud+d+ha/ a nu ma
25a2(rgyud 'bum): sar+b+ba bud+d+he/ a nu dz+nyAn te/ bud+d+he/ prad+d+ha/ bud+d+ha/ bud+d+ha/ bud+d+ha/ bud+d+ha/ bud+d+ha/ bud+d+ha/ bud+d+ha/ bud+d+ha/ sangs rgyas kyi yul mtha' yas te/ chos bstan pa'ang mtha' yas mod kyi/ gcig
25a3(rgyud 'bum): yid la bya ba ni mdor ni chos bsgom pa'o/ / gzungs 'di ni sems can rnams la thugs brtse ba'i phyir/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyis gsungs pa ste/ chos thams cad kyi phyag rgya yin no// tad+ya thA/ shud
25a4(rgyud 'bum): d+he/ su shud d+he/ su shud d+he/ sho d+ha ni/ saM sho d+ha ni/ nir+m+ma le ma la a ba ga te/ ga ti sa mA d+hi taM ti/ kra me sa ma sa re/ sa rA sa ra pa ri a sho ka/ bi sho ke/ ba sho ka sha ma ni/ shAM te/ u pa
25a5(rgyud 'bum): shI te/ pra shr-I te/ a ba b+hA se/ sar+b+ba praN+ye pa ri ma ti te/ sar+b+ba d+har+m+ma pra ti miN+Da te/ ha ra ha ra/ ma la ha ra/ tsa ra tsa ra/ saM tsa ra/ tsa la tsa la saM tsa la/ ta la tA la ma ta la/ sa ma ta la/ ri Ne ri
25a6(rgyud 'bum): Ne/ su ri Ne/ sa ma ri Ni/ ri Na ma ti lo ka d+ha re/ lo ka d+hA ra NaM/ d+ha ra d+ha ra/ Da ra Da ra/ ro d+ha ro d+ha/ ma hA bi dza ya/ bA hi ni/ ha na ha na/ sar+b+ba bud+d+he/ he pre shi tra si/ sar+b+ba dz+nyA pa the/ sar+b+ba dzA pa
25a7(rgyud 'bum): ri mi ta/ ma hA pra ti b+ha na/ saM ban+d+he/ sa man+ta/ A lo ke bud+d+ha/ bidza ye/ bud+d+ha/ pra ti maM Di te/ b+ha ga ba te sa ra sa ra/ pra sa ra pra sa ra/ bi sa ra bi sa ra/ pra sa ra sar+b+ba sho ka a ba ga te sA hA/
25b1(rgyud 'bum): bcom ldan 'das kyis sangs rgyas kyi snying po gzungs kyi chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad ma thag tu ri dang gnas su bcas pa dang / tshal rnam pa drug tu g.yos/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi
25b2(rgyud 'bum): khams kyi sa'ang g.yos/ rab tu g.yos/ kun tu rab tu g.yos so// rgya mtsho chen po'ang 'khrugs/ rab tu 'khrugs/ kun tu rab tu 'khrugs so// ri'i rgyal po ri rab ldeg cing 'gul to//
25b3(rgyud 'bum): bdud kyi gnas thams cad skrag nas/ bdud kyi ris kyi lha rnams dang / bdud sdig can rnams shin tu sdug bsngal zhing yid mi bde bar gyur nas nyam thag go// sems can gang dag sa chen po g.yos par
25b4(rgyud 'bum): mthong ba de dag gis/ de bzhin gsheg pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal
25b5(rgyud 'bum): lozhes ched du brjod pa lan gsum ched du brjod do/ / lha gang dag sangs rgyas la mngon par dad pa de dag gis/ lha'i me tog man da ra ba dang / man da ra ba chen pos bcom ldan 'das la gtor mngon par
25b6(rgyud 'bum): gtor nas/ gang dag sangs rgyas la skyabs su dong ba de dag thams cad rab tu dga' ba skyes so// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ shAkya seng ge yang dag rdzogs pa yi// sangs rgyas skyob pas skad cig/
25b7(rgyud 'bum): yud gang la// sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ni snying po yi// gzungs 'di dag ni rab tu bshad pa yis// skad cig yud de ra sa yang rnam drug g.yos// rgya mtsho 'khrugs shing bdud kyi gnas kun kyang /
26a1(rgyud 'bum): rab tu g.yos nas bdud kyi rigs rnams ni// lha dag rab tu dngangs shing 'khrugs par gyur// bdud yid mi bde sdug bsngal mya ngan non// de tshe lha rnams ngo mtshar rab thos
26a2(rgyud 'bum): nas/ 'jig rten mgon la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir// nam mkhar gnas nas me tog man da 'thor// gang dag sangs rgyas mngon dang gzhan rnams kyis// se mo do dang do shal spos rnams dang // phye ma
26a3(rgyud 'bum): dag dang byug pa gos rnams dang / / rgyan dang dpung rgyan dag kyang rab tu 'bul// brgyad po 'di dag ni de'i yon tan gyi phan yon gyi rgyan du 'gyur ba'o// brgyad gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub kyi sems
26a4(rgyud 'bum): mi brjed pa'i rgyan dang / thos pa thams cad yongs su 'tshol bas mi ngoms pa'i rgyan dang / chos zab mo rnam par nges pa rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i rgyan dang / sems can thams cad kyi dbang po mchog dang
26a5(rgyud 'bum): mchog ma yin par shes pa'i rgyan dang / ji ltar thos pa dang ji ltar khong du chud pa'i chos rnams la tshul bzhin so sor rtog cing dpyod pa'i rgyan dang / sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir chos thams cad
26a6(rgyud 'bum): mi dmigs pa'i rgyan dang / rgyan de'ang sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis thabs la mkhas pa'i rgyan dang / gzungs thob pa'i rgyun te/ brgyad po de dag ni de'i yon tan gyi phan yon gyi rgyan du 'gyur ro//
26a7(rgyud 'bum): gzungs 'di ni rtag tu rgyun du yid la bya'o// sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa bsgom par bya'o// gzungs kyi gzhi 'di dag rnams yid la byas na/ las kyi sgrib pa thams cad yongs su byang bar 'gyur ro//
26b1(rgyud 'bum): pad+ma rnam par bkod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin kyang thob bo// nad thams cad dang na ba thams cad la lag pas byab par bya'o// bzlas brjod kyang dpag tu med pa bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad
26b2(rgyud 'bum): ces bka' stsal pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag dang / nyan thos chen po de dag dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/
26b3(rgyud 'bum): bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// 'phags pa sangs rgyas kyi snying po zhes bya ba'i gzungs kyi chos kyi rnam grangs rdzogs so// /
26b4(rgyud 'bum): rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya puSh+pa ku Ta nA ma d+hA ra Ni/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa me tog brtsegs pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo//
26b5(rgyud 'bum): 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das mtsho chen po ma dros pa na/ klu'i rgyal po ma dros pa'i khang pa na/ dge slong lnga brgya'i dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs
26b6(rgyud 'bum): te/ byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs chen po 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan dang gzhan dag nas 'dus pa/ byang chub sems dpa' stong du tshang ba thams cad kyang gzungs thob pa/ ting nge 'dzin thob pa/ skye ba
26b7(rgyud 'bum): gcig gis thogs pa/ sa bcu la rab tu gnas pa/ de ma thag tu rgyal tshab tu dbang bskur bas dbang bskur ba/ go cha chen po bgos pa/ sangs rgyas kyi yon tan thams cad la the tshom med pa sha stag
27a1(rgyud 'bum): dang thabs cig go/ / de'i tshe na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po seng ge rnam par rtse ba zhes bya ba 'khor de nyid du 'dus par gyur te 'dug go/ de nas byang chub sems dpa'
27a2(rgyud 'bum): sems dpa' chen po seng ge rnam par rtse ba stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der logs su thal mo sbyar ba
27a3(rgyud 'bum): btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa bgyis na/ de'i bsod nams ji snyed cig/
27a4(rgyud 'bum): skyed par 'gyur/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po seng ge rnam par rtse ba la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu 'am/
27a5(rgyud 'bum): rigs kyi bu mo gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa bgyis na/ de'i bsod nams ji snyed cig skyed par 'gyur zhes seng ge rnam par rtse ba khyod de skad ma zer cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de bzhin
27a6(rgyud 'bum): gshegs pa ni tshul khrims dpag tu med pa/ ting nge 'dzin dpag tu med pa/ shes rab dpag tu med pa/ rnam par grol ba dpag tu med pa/ rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba dpag tu
27a7(rgyud 'bum): med pa ste/ seng ge rnam par rtse ba gang gi phyir de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas yon tan gyi tshogs dpag tu med pa dang ldan pa de'i phyir/ de la mchod pa'i
27b1(rgyud 'bum): rnam par smin pa de'ang dpag tu med par shes par bya'o/ / seng ge rnam par rtse ba gang la la dag de bzhin gshegs pa bzhugs kyang rung / yongs su mya ngan las 'das kyang rung ste/ mchod pa byed pa
27b2(rgyud 'bum): de dag thams cad ni/ 'di lta ste/ nyan thos kyi theg pa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa 'am/ theg pa chen po 'am/ theg pa gsum las theg pa gcig gis yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar
27b3(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur ro/ / seng ge rnam par rtse ba yang gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mthong nas sem dang bar gyur la/ dad pa'i sems kyis rnyed pa dang /
27b4(rgyud 'bum): na bza' dang / zhal zas dang / gzims cha dang / bsnyun gyi gsos sman dang / yo byad dang / bde bar sbyar ba thams cad kyis bsti stang du byas shing / ri mor byas te/ mchod cing
27b5(rgyud 'bum): rjed la/ rim gror byas pa dang / gang zhig gis de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i ring bsrel yungs 'bru tsam gyi mchod rten la mchod pa byas pa'i rnam par smin pa ni mnyam
27b6(rgyud 'bum): par shes par bya ste/ bye brag gam tha dad du bya ba med do// seng ge rnam par rtse ba byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa gang zhig gis nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / de bzhin gshegs
27b7(rgyud 'bum): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la rin po che'i phung po ri rab tsam dbul bar phul ba bas/ byang chub sems dpa' gang rab tu byung nas/ ka ra sha pa Na gcig
28a1(rgyud 'bum): @tsam dbul bar phul la/ phul nas kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngos na/ dge ba'i rtsa ba snga ma des dge ba'i rtsa ba phyi ma'i brgya'i char yang
28a2(rgyud 'bum): nye bar mi 'gro/ / stong gi cha dang / 'bum gyi cha dang / grangs dang / cha dang / bgrang ba dang / bskrun pa dang / rgyur yang nye bar mi 'gro ba nas/ dpe'i bar du'ang mi bzod do// seng ge rnam
28a3(rgyud 'bum): par rtse ba gang zhig gis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la lo gcig gam/ lo brgya 'am/ lo stong yang rung ste/ bde ba'i yo byad thams cad kyis
28a4(rgyud 'bum): bsnyen bkur byas pa dang / gang zhig gis de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i mchod rten la byang chub kyi sems kyis yang dag par zin pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod
28a5(rgyud 'bum): pa'i phyir me tog 'ga' 'bul lam/ chu snyim pa gang tsam 'thor ram/ byug pa'i thig le bri 'am/ me tog gi nyal nyil 'phyag gam/ byug pa 'bul lam/ spos 'bul lam/ me tog
28a6(rgyud 'bum): 'bul lam/ bdug spos 'bul lam/ 'phreng ba 'bul lam/ rol mo'i sil snyan 'bul lam/ dugs 'bul lam/ dri 'bul lam/ dpyangs pa 'bul lam/ rgyal mtshan 'bul
28a7(rgyud 'bum): lam ba dan 'bul lam/ dar 'bul lam/ mar me 'bul zhing / phul nas dga' ba'i sems kyis gom pa'i gar stabs 'ga' bor te/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de la phyag
28b1(rgyud 'bum): 'tshal lo/ / zhes smra ba de dag ni seng ge rnam par rtse ba bskal par ram/ bskal pa brgya 'am/ bskal pa stong du 'am/ bskal pa 'bum du'ang ngan 'gro log par ltung bar 'gro bar 'gyur ba de'i
28b2(rgyud 'bum): gnas med de/ 'di la dogs pa 'am/ yid gnyis sam/ the tsom za bar mi bya'o// seng ge rnam par rtsa ba me tog brtsegs pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs yod kyis/ skye bo mang po la phan pa
28b3(rgyud 'bum): dang / skye bo mang po la bde ba dang / 'jig rten la snying brtse ba dang / lha dang mi'i skye bo phal po che'i don dang / phan pa dang / bde ba'i phyir de bshad par bya'o// seng ge rnam par rtse ba gang la la
28b4(rgyud 'bum): zhig me tog brtsegs pa'i gzungs 'di 'dzin tam/ 'chang ngam/ klog gam/ yid la byed dam/ kun chub par byed dam/ gzhan dag la'ang rgya cher yang dag par 'chad pa de rtag tu tshe rabs
28b5(rgyud 'bum): dran par 'gyur ro/ / de ngan 'gro log par ltung bar 'gro bar mi 'gyur/ ngal ba rnyed par 'gyur/ nam du'ang dkon mchog gsum dang mi 'bral bar 'gyur/ nam du'ang de bzhin gshegs pa
28b6(rgyud 'bum): dang mi 'bral bar 'gyur/ nam du'ang sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa dang mi 'bral bar 'gyur/ nam du'ang byang chub sems dpa' dang mi 'bral bar 'gyur/ nam du'ang byang chub kyi sems dang ma'i bral
28b7(rgyud 'bum): bar 'gyur ro/ / nam du'ang dbang po ma tshang bar mi'i gyur/ nam du'ang rigs dma' bar skye bar mi 'gyur/ spobs pa sna tshogs zab mo phun sum tshogs par 'gyur/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten
29a1(rgyud 'bum): gyi khams grangs med pa dag gi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams mthong bar 'gyur/ tad+ya thA/ d+hA ra Ni/ d+ha ra ni/ mu ni prA b+hA sA re/ sid+d+he/ tsaN+DA re/ nA maHtsi ni he re/
29a2(rgyud 'bum): a ro ga ba ti/ bud+d+ha ma ti d+her+ye/ oM ka ra te/ ga ga ra te rA dza bi ta/ bi shu la bud d+hi/ d+har+m+ma a ba b+ha sa/ ak+ShA ya kalpe/ kalpa ba ti/ a mra kal+le hUM tA sha naM/ te dzo ba ti/ ni d+ya sa hi te/
29a3(rgyud 'bum): te dze gra ba/ tiSh+NI na dri ye bud d+hi swA hA/ seng ge rnam par rtse ba gang la la zhig gis me tog brtsegs pa'i gzungs 'di'i ming dang / yi ge dang / tshig mtha' dag shes te kun chub par byed pa des/
29a4(rgyud 'bum): dpyid zla tha chung dang / dbyar zla ra ba dang / ston zla tha chung yar gyi ngo'i tshes brgyad nas bzung la/ bco lnga'i bar du sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa bsgom par bya ste/ nyin lan gsum mtshan lan
29a5(rgyud 'bum): gsum bsam zhing / de bzhin gshegs pa la rtse gcig tu yid la byas la/ bcom ldan 'das la spos dang / me tog dang / mar me dang / bdug spos kyis mchod na sangs rgyas bcom
29a6(rgyud 'bum): ldan 'das pad+ma'i snying po'i seng ge'i khri la bzhugs shing / chos kyang ston pa bco lnga mthong bar 'gyur ro// gzungs rab tu thob par 'gyur/ dran pa dang ldan par 'gyur/ blo gros dang ldan par
29a7(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur/ rtogs pa dang ldan par 'gyur/ blo dang ldan par 'gyur/ yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'i bar du tshe rabs dran par 'gyur ro// thos pa thams cad dang / bstan bcos thams cad
29b1(rgyud 'bum): dang / bzo thams cad dang / las thams cad rab tu shes par 'gyur/ ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyang de'i sems la gnas par 'gyur te/ 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi ni ma gtogs so// de ci'i phyir
29b2(rgyud 'bum): zhe na/ chos de dag ni zag pa med par gtogs pa'i phyir ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po seng ge rnam par brtse ba dang / byang chub
29b3(rgyud 'bum): sems dpa' de dag dang / dge slong de dag dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do//
