29b4(rgyud 'bum): 'phags pa me tog brtsegs pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so// rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya bi ma la nA ma d+hA ra Ni/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa dri ma
29b5(rgyud 'bum): med pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na bya rgod phung po'i
29b6(rgyud 'bum): ri la bzhugs te/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' blo gros rnam par dag pa la bka' stsal pa/ blo gros rnam par dag pa/ tshul khrims yongs su dag pas de bzhin gshegs
29b7(rgyud 'bum): pa yongs su dag go/ / blo gros rnam par dag pa/ ting nge 'dzin yongs su dag pas de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su dag go// blo gros rnam par dag pa/ bzod pa yongs su dag pas de bzhin gshegs pa

30a2(rgyud 'bum): dag pas de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su dag go/ / blo gros rnam par dag pa/ snying rje yongs su dag pa dang / dga' ba yongs su dag pa dang / btang snyoms yongs su dag pas de bzhin gshegs pa
30a3(rgyud 'bum): yongs su dag go/ / blo gros rnam par dag pa/ rnam par grol ba yongs su dag pa dang / rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba yongs su dag pas de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su dag go// blo gros rnam
30a4(rgyud 'bum): par dag pa/ stobs yongs su dag pa dang / mi 'jigs pa yongs su dag pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos yongs su dag pas de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su dag go// blo gros rnam par dag pa
30a5(rgyud 'bum): thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes yongs su dag pas de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su dag go/ / blo gros rnam par dag pa/ de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su dag pa la/ su zhig me tog dang /
30a6(rgyud 'bum): 'phreng ba dang / spos dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan la sogs pa dang / rol mo'i sgra dang / byug pa rnams kyis bsti stang byed pa de'i bsod nams kyi phung po'i mtha' rtogs par mi nus te/
30a7(rgyud 'bum): de'i mtha' ni theg pa gsum po las theg pa gang yang rung bas mya ngan las 'das pa'i mthar thug pa ma gtogs par/ bsod nams kyi phung po de phyi ma'i mthar yang zad par mi nus so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/
30b1(rgyud 'bum): blo gros rnam par dag pa/ ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pas sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyi tshad med pa de bzhin du/ de bzhin gshegs pa la yon phul ba'ang chang med do// mtha' yas so// bsam
30b2(rgyud 'bum): gyis mi khyab bo/ / mtshungs pa med do// grangs med do// dpag gis mi lang ngo // brjod du med do// blo gros rnam par dag pa/ su zhig de bzhin gshegs pa nga lngar bzhugs te/
30b3(rgyud 'bum): 'tsho zhing gzhes pa la bsti stang du byed pa dang / bla mar byed pa dang / ri mor byed pa dang / mchod pa dang / rjed pa dang / phyi ma'i tshe phyi ma'i dus lnga brgya tha ma la su zhig de bzhin gshegs pa yongs
30b4(rgyud 'bum): su mya ngan las 'das pa'i ring bsrel yungs 'bru tsam la bsti stang byed pa dang / bla mar byed pa dang / ri mor byed pa dang / mchod pa dang / rjed pa dang / yang dag par sems mnyam
30b5(rgyud 'bum): par bzhag ste/ byang chub tu gzhol ba'i sems bskyed pas phyag 'tshal ba dang / phyag byed pa dang / bsti stang byed pa dang / bla mar byed pa dang / ri mor byed pa dang / rjed par byed
30b6(rgyud 'bum): pa dang / mchod pa dang / gsol ba dang / bsngags pa dang / skor ba byed pa des phan yon lngar shes par bya ste/ lnga gang zhe na/ dran pa dang ldan par 'gyur
30b7(rgyud 'bum): ba dang / rtogs pa dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang / ngo tsha shes shing khrel yod pa dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang / myur du bcom ldan 'das mthong bar 'gyur ba dang / mthong nas kyang dad pa
31a1(rgyud 'bum): skyed par 'gyur ste/ phan yon lnga po dag tu shes par bya'o// de nas gzhan yang chos bzhir shes par bya ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pas
31a2(rgyud 'bum): bstan pa'i tshig so sor 'dzin pa dang / de dag kyang ji skad bstan pa de bzhin du sgrub pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang nye bar 'gyur ba dang / myur du sangs rgyas kyi zhing
31a3(rgyud 'bum): yongs su dag par skye bar 'gyur ba ste/ chos bzhi po de dag yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur ro// blo gros rnam par dag pa/ byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na/ bdud dang bdud
31a4(rgyud 'bum): kyi ris kyi lha'i bu rnams kyis mi brdzi bar 'gyur te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ rigs che ba dang / btsas ma thag tu sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams yid la byed pa dang / phyi ma'i dus na
31a5(rgyud 'bum): dam pa'i chos 'dzin pa dang / rtag tu de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur ba ste/ blo gros rnam par dag pa/
31a6(rgyud 'bum): byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na/ bdud dam bdud kyi ris kyi lha'i bu rnams kyis mi brdzi bar 'gyur ro// blo gros rnam par dag pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa la
31a7(rgyud 'bum): yang dag par zhugs pa gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten mthong nas dad pa bskyed de/ pus mo gnyis ka'i lha nga sa la btsugs nas phyag 'tshal te/ de bzhin gshegs
31b1(rgyud 'bum): pa skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis sku legs par brgyan pa de ci 'dra bar bdag kyang de 'dra ba'i lus thob par gyur cig ces de ltar mos pa bskyed na/ blo gros rnam par dag pa
31b2(rgyud 'bum): bsod nams kyi phung po de'i mtha' brjod par mi nus te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la gnas pa'i phyir ro// bsod nams kyi phung po de ni rgyal po nyid dam/ brgya byin nyid
31b3(rgyud 'bum): dam/ tshangs pa nyid dam/ nyan thos nyid dam/ rang sangs rgyas nyid dam/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyid kyis kyang zad par byar mi nus so//
31b4(rgyud 'bum): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ blo gros rnam par dag pa/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo des bsod nams kyi phung po bsam gyis mi khyab pa yongs su bzung ba yin te/ blo gros rnam
31b5(rgyud 'bum): par dag pa/ 'di lta ste/ dper na de bzhin gshegs pa bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa grong du 'jug gam/ gtsug lag khang ngam/
31b6(rgyud 'bum): grong khyer du 'jug kyang rung / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad du rgyu'ang rung / 'chag kyang rung / 'greng yang rung / 'dug kyang rung / chos ston kyang rung / stong gsum gyi stong
31b7(rgyud 'bum): chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na sems can lnga 'am/ klu 'am/ gnod sbyin nam/ dri za 'am/ lha ma yin nam/ nam mkha' lding ngam/ mi 'am ci'am/ lto 'phye chen
32a1(rgyud 'bum): po 'am/ mi 'am/ mi ma yin pa 'am/ shing ngam/ ri'am/ khung bu 'am/ bya skyibs kyang rung ste/ thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa ga la ba der
32a2(rgyud 'bum): logs su 'dud pa dang / rab tu 'dud pa dang / kun tu 'dud par mi byed pa de gang yang med de/ ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad dang ldan par byed pa de bzhin du/
32a3(rgyud 'bum): rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de dag grong ngam/ grong khyer ram/ grong rdal lam/ yul 'khor ram/ pho brang 'khor na rgyu ba la sems can rnams 'dud/ rab tu 'dud
32a4(rgyud 'bum): kun tu 'dud par 'gyur ro/ / bcom ldan 'das 'od dpag med la phyag 'tshal lo// a mi tA ma te pra b+he/ ma hA pra b+he/ pra b+ha ba ti[:]pra b+ha ba ti/ pra b+ha ba ti/ pra b+ha ba ti/ pra b+ha ba ti/

32a6(rgyud 'bum): ma na ga sa c

32b1(rgyud 'bum): sau ma na s+ya mu pa na ya/ sau ma na s+ya mu pa na ya/ sau ma na s+ya mu pa na ya/ sau ma na s+ya mu pa na ya/ sau ma na s+ya mu pa na ya/ sau ma na s+ya mu pa na ya/ so ma na s+ya mu pa na ya/ sau ma na s+ya mu pa na
32b2(rgyud 'bum): ya/ sau ma na s+ya mu pa na ya/ shrI khi shi khI/ shi khi shi khi/ shi Shi shi khi/ shi khi shi khI/ shi khi shi khi/ zhi bar gyur cig/ nad med par gyur cig/ bgegs med par gyur cig
32b3(rgyud 'bum): pra b+ha ba ti/ ma hA ma t+ye/ rash+mi/ rash+mi/ rash+mi/ rash+mi/ rash+mi/ rash+mi/ rash+mi/ rash+mi/ rash+mi/ rash+mi/ rash+mi/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'di dag gi mtshan yang
32b4(rgyud 'bum): gzung bar bya zhing phyag bya'o/ / 'di lta ste/ bcom ldan 'das rin chen 'byung gnas dang / bcom ldan 'das rin chen nyi ma dang / bcom ldan 'das rin chen bla ma dang / bcom ldan
32b5(rgyud 'bum): rin chen 'khregs pa dang / bcom ldan 'das rin chen me tog dang / bcom ldan 'das rin chen 'od 'phro dang / bcom ldan 'das rin chen mthu dang / bcom ldan 'das mi 'khrugs pa dang /
32b6(rgyud 'bum): bcom ldan 'das 'od dpag med dang / bcom ldan 'das dbyangs dpag med dang / bcom ldan 'das thub dka' dang / bcom ldan 'das grags pa mtha' yas dang / bcom ldan
32b7(rgyud 'bum): 'das rin chen 'od dang / bcom ldan 'das bde chen brnyes dang / bcom ldan 'das skar ma'i 'od dang / bcom ldan 'das bden dbyangs dang / bcom ldan 'das nad kyi dri ma bral
33a1(rgyud 'bum): ba dang / bcom ldan 'das zla ba dkar dang / bcom ldan 'das dri med 'od dang / bcom ldan 'das nyi ma dkar dang / bcom ldan 'das nyi ma'i 'od dang / bcom ldan
33a2(rgyud 'bum): 'das 'od dpag med dang / bcom ldan 'das rin chen mtha' yas dang / bcom ldan 'das rin chen snying po dang / bcom ldan 'das rin chen 'byung dang / bcom ldan 'das zla ba'i sgron ma dang /
33a3(rgyud 'bum): bcom ldan 'das pad+ma'i sde dang / bcom ldan 'das pad+ma'i sgra dang / bcom ldan 'das pad+ma'i mchog dang / bcom ldan 'das yan lag mchog dang / bcom ldan 'das gser 'od dang /
33a4(rgyud 'bum): bcom ldan 'das tshangs pa'i dbang phyug rgyal po dang / bcom ldan 'das gser lta bur snang ba dang / bcom ldan 'das gser gyi 'byung gnas dang / bcom ldan 'das klu'i dbang phyug rgyal po

33a6(rgyud 'bum): bcom ldan 'das mtshon cha spong dang / bcom ldan 'das dpal gyi snying po nor bu rin chen snang dang / bcom ldan 'das dpag med rtogs 'od dang / bcom ldan 'das seng ge sgra dang /
33a7(rgyud 'bum): bcom ldan 'das seng ge dbang phyug rgyal po dang / bcom ldan 'das mthu chen brtson 'grus nges 'byung dang / bcom ldan 'das snying pos zil gnon dang / bcom ldan 'das rnga sgra'i
33b1(rgyud 'bum): rgyal po dang / bcom ldan 'das zla ba mchog dang / bcom ldan 'das pad+ma zil gnon dang / bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten sgron ma dang / bcom ldan 'das me dang / bcom ldan 'das
33b2(rgyud 'bum): skrag byed dang / bcom ldan 'das rin chen mu khyud dang / bcom ldan 'das rtag tu yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa dang / bcom ldan 'das blo yangs dang / bcom ldan 'das rin chen dpag
33b3(rgyud 'bum): med sbrul 'od dang / bcom ldan 'das ri rab ltar rnam par gnon pa dang / bcom ldan 'das phyag na rin chen mchog dang / bcom ldan 'das rin chen 'dus pa'i dpal dang /
33b4(rgyud 'bum): bcom ldan 'das phyir mi ldog pa'i 'khor lo rin po che'i tshig gi dpal dang / bcom ldan 'das kun nas rnam par snang mdzad rnam par dag pa rnyes pa dang / bcom ldan 'das nyi zla sgron
33b5(rgyud 'bum): ma dang / bcom ldan 'das lhun po dang / bcom ldan 'das lhun po chen po dang / bcom ldan 'das ri rab dang / bcom ldan 'das shin tu lhun po dang / bcom ldan
33b6(rgyud 'bum): 'das ri rab lta bu'o/ / tad+ya thA/ ba ta pa ta/ nga ma da ma/ b+ha ma g+ha ma sAd/ shar phyogs logs na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'di dag la sogs pa 'khor dang bcas pa
33b7(rgyud 'bum): gang dag bzhugs pa 'dren pa de dag la phyag 'tshal lo/ / de dag gis kyang bdag 'khor dang bcas pa la nad med pa dang / zhi bar mngon du srung du gsol/ lho phyogs logs na sangs
34a1(rgyud 'bum): rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag bzhugs pa 'dren pa de dag la phyag 'tshal lo/ / de dag gis kyang bdag la nad med pa dang / zhi bar srung du gsol/ nub
34a2(rgyud 'bum): phyog logs na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag bzhugs pa 'dren pa de dag la phyag 'tshal lo/ / de dag gis kyang bdag la nad med pa dang / zhi bar srung du gsol/ byang
34a3(rgyud 'bum): phyogs logs na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag bzhug pa 'dren pa de dag la phyag 'tshal lo/ / de dag gis kyang bdag la nad med pa dang / zhi bar srung du gsol/ 'og gi phyogs
34a4(rgyud 'bum): logs na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag bzhugs pa 'dren pa de dag la phyag 'tshal lo/ / de dag gis kyang bdag la nad med pa dang / zhi bar srung du gsol/ steng gi
34a5(rgyud 'bum): phyogs logs na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag bzhugs pa 'dren pa de dag la phyag 'tshal lo/ / de dag gis kyang bdag la nad med pa dang / zhi bar bsrung du gsol/
34a6(rgyud 'bum): phyogs 'tshams logs na sangs rgyas ldan 'das gang dag bzhugs pa 'dren pa de dag la phyag 'tshal lo// de dag gis kyang bdag la nad med pa dang / zhi bar srung du
34a7(rgyud 'bum): gsol/ tad+ya thA/ bi ma le bi ma lA/ ka re bi ma la saM b+ha be swA hA/ bi ma le/ bi ma le/ bi ma le/ bi ma le/ bi ma le/ bi ma le/ bi ma le
34b1(rgyud 'bum): bi ma le/ bi mA la/ bi ma lA ka re/ bi ma lA ka re/ bi ma lA ka re/ bi mA lA ka re/ bi ma lA ka re/ bi ma lA ka re/ bi ma lA ka re/ bi ma lA ka re/ bi ma lA
34b2(rgyud 'bum): sa mung+ga te/ bi ma lA swa mung+ga te/ bi ma lA sa mung+ga te/ bi ma lA sa mung+ga te/ bi ma lA sa mung+ga te/ bI ma lA sa mung+ga te/ bi ma lA sa mung+ga te/ bi ma la sa mung+ga te
34b3(rgyud 'bum): bi ma lA sa mung+ga te/ rig sngags 'di ni rig sngags che// lha rnams kyis ni brjod pa yin// 'di ni dus gsum brjod byas na// nang rnams las ni yongs su thar//
34b4(rgyud 'bum): mi ma yin gyis gang byas dang // sdig pa gang dag sbyor byas sgrol// de dag dran pa brjed mi 'gyur// gzung ba rnams kyang chud mi za// de dag skye ba rnams su yang // rtag
34b5(rgyud 'bum): tu sangs rgyas 'bral mi 'gyur/ / su zhig dri ma med pa'i gzungs// 'di ni dga' bas 'dzin par byed// zhing rnams kun tu rgyu ba rnams// dpal ldan pad+ma'i snying por
34b6(rgyud 'bum): 'byung / / mtshan rnams kyis ni legs par brgyan// yan lag 'od zer dra ba 'byung // tad+ya thA/ ku Ti ku Ti/ ku tA tsA lo// e la e la/ muSh+Na/ kong thA lo//
34b7(rgyud 'bum): e ri ri/ ro mr-i ti swA hA/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo gros rnam par dag pa dang / lha dang
35a1(rgyud 'bum): ming d+ya/ lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// 'phags pa
35a2(rgyud 'bum): med pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so/ / rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya tsan dan aM ga na ma d+hA ra Ni/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa tsan
35a3(rgyud 'bum): ngan gyi yan lag ces bya ba'i gzungs/ / sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan
35a4(rgyud 'bum): 'das rgyal po'i khab na/ dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dge slong khri nyis stong lnga brgya'i dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rab tu mang
35a5(rgyud 'bum): po dang / gzhan yang lha khyad par can mang po dang thabs cig tu bzhugs te/ de nas bcom ldan 'das gdan bshams pa la de bzhin gshegs pa'i cho 'phrul gyis lham me/ lhan ne/
35a6(rgyud 'bum): lhang nger bzhugs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ 'khor der byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang / zla 'od gzhon nur gyur
35a7(rgyud 'bum): pa la bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu 'jig rten gyi khams 'di'i pha rol gyi'ang ches pha rol 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag gang+gA'i klung grangs med pa'i bye ma snyed 'das pa na/
35b1(rgyud 'bum): tsan dan gyi dpal zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas tsan ngan gyi yan lag ces bya ba da ltar yang bzhugs
35b2(rgyud 'bum): te 'tshe zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston to/ / gang 'jig rten gyi khams de'i sems can de dag thams cad ni phyir mi ldog par 'gyur pa sha stag ste/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa
35b3(rgyud 'bum): dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas tsan dan gyiyan lag des/ sems can thams cad kyi don gyi phyir tsan ngan gyi yan lag ces bya ba'i gzud kyi rig pa'i gsang sngags kyi gzhi gsungs
35b4(rgyud 'bum): pa 'di thos nas phyir mi ldog ste/ sdig pa dang bral bzhin byang chub kyi sems dang mi 'bral lo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag med dang / de bzhin gshegs
35b5(rgyud 'bum): pa mar me mdzad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad dang / gzhan yang 'das pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis kyang sngon chad gsungs te/ ngas
35b6(rgyud 'bum): kyang nga khyed rnams la bshad kyis/ sems can thams cad rjes su gzung ba'i phyir legs par rab tu yid la zung zhig dang / phyi ma'i tshe phyi ma'i dus lnga brgya tha ma la dam pa'i chos
35b7(rgyud 'bum): rnam par 'jig pa'i tshe/ thams cad chos dang mi ldan pa/ mtshams med pa byed pa/ dam pa'i chos la smod pa/ mchod rten 'dral ba/ dge 'dun gyi rdzas la tu
36a1(rgyud 'bum): phrog byed pa/ dge sbyong ma yin par dge sbyong du khas che ba slob dpon dang mkhan po spong ba dag 'byung ste/ de dag rjes su gzung ba'i phyir tsan dun gyi yan
36a2(rgyud 'bum): lag gi gzungs kyi gsang sngags kyi gzhi sangs rgyas thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs pa 'di bshad kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams ngal nyon cig/ de nas byang chub sems
36a3(rgyud 'bum): dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang / zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas bskul ba/ byang chub sems dpa'
36a4(rgyud 'bum): sems dpa' chen po rnams dang / gzhan yang sems can bye ba khrag zhig 'bum phrag rnams la thugs brtse ba dang / sdig pa byang bar bgyi ba'i srad du/ bcom ldan 'das
36a5(rgyud 'bum): bshad du gsol/ bde bar gshegs pa bshad du gsol/ de bzhin gshegs pa bshad du gsol/ bdag cag gis kyang gzungs kyi gzhi de dag gzung bar
36a6(rgyud 'bum): bgyi ste/ sems can thams cad kyi don du rgya cher yang dag par bshad par bgyi'o// sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// tad+ya thA/ cir
36a7(rgyud 'bum): te/ ma ri tsi ke/ dur dme/ dur dAn ti/ dur rA nu/ pra biSh+Te/ tsan da naM gadze/ sa man+ta pa ri sho d+ha ni/ bi shud+d+ha shI le/ tsa rit+tA ba ti/ a na tser+ya pra ti b+hA na
36b1(rgyud 'bum): sarba bud+d+ha a d+hini/ b+ha ga ba t+ti/ pA pak+Sha ye/ A shA me pa rI pUr yA s+yAT+Ta/ rigs kyi bu po 'am/ rig kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gzungs chen po'i gsang sngags 'ang
36b2(rgyud 'bum): dngag 'dzin tam/ klog gam/ ston tam/ kun chung par byed na/ de'i tshe 'di nyid la mig rnam par dag par 'gyur ro// thos ma thag tu sdig pa'i las las rab tu grol bar 'gyur
36b3(rgyud 'bum): byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs kyang mthong bar 'gyur/ zla ba byed kyi bar du bzlas pa byas na// 'phags pa spyan ras
36b4(rgyud 'bum): gzigs dbang phyug dang / zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pa mthong bar 'gyur/ mtshams med pa lnga'i sdig pa byas pa'ang 'byung bar 'gyur/ skye ba dran par 'gyur/ tshe rjes nas kyang lha rnams kyi nang
36b5(rgyud 'bum): du skye bar 'gyur/ khyim bdag chen po skyid pa dag gi nang du skye bar 'gyur/ skye bo thams cad dga' bar 'gyur// 'di ltar sa chen po ma lus pa 'di ni grum par 'gyur yang srid// rgya mtsho ni bskam
36b6(rgyud 'bum): yang srid/ de bzhin du ri'i rgyal po ri rab ni 'jig par 'gyur yang srid/ rlung ni zhags pas bcing du rung yang srid/ zla ba dang nyi ma ni sa'i steng du lhung yang srid/ nam mkha' ni lag pa gnyis kyis
36b7(rgyud 'bum): mnan du rung yang srid/ me ni chur 'gyur yang srid/ 'byung ba chen po bzhi ni gzhan du 'gyur yang srid// sems can thams cad kyi sems ni gcig tu 'gyur yang srid kyi/ de bzhin gshegs pas
37a1(rgyud 'bum): gsungs shing byin gyis brlabs pa ni gzhan du 'gyur mi srid do/ / sus kyang bskyod pa 'am bsgul bar mi nus so// 'di la ni bdud sdig can gyis glags rnyed par mi 'gyur
37a2(rgyud 'bum): ro/ / de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis/ bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis
37a3(rgyud 'bum): kyang gzungs 'di'i cho ga bshad par bgyi'o/ / chos kyi rgyal po'i mchod rten ring bsrel dang bcas pa 'am/ sangs rgyas kyi sku gzugs kyi spyan sngar tsan dan dkar po'i dkyil 'khor
37a4(rgyud 'bum): bgyis te/ me tog sil ma gtor la/ tsan dan gyi bdug pas bdugs te/ zla ba tshes nas brtsams nas tshes bco lnga'i bar du dus gsum du khrus bgyi zhing / gos kyang lan gsum/
37a5(rgyud 'bum): du brjes te/ kha zas bsreg bya 'tshal zhing gso sbyong dang ldan pa/ sems can thams cad la sems snyoms pa dang / zla ba nya'i nyin par zhag gcig sbyang bar bgyis te/ rtsa bam gyi steng du
37a6(rgyud 'bum): mchis shing / rtswa ba ma bting ba'i steng du nyal la sems rtse gcig tu bzlas pa bgyi zhing / me tog dri zhim po lan brgya stong du gtor nas sa g.yo bar 'gyur/ bdag nyid kyang bcom ldan 'das
37a7(rgyud 'bum): de bzhin gshegs pa 'og dpag med dang / spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug mthong bar 'gyur/ gzungs chen po thos ma thag tu ci 'dod pa de thob par 'gyur/ thos pa 'dzin par yang 'gyur/
37b1(rgyud 'bum): las kyi sgrib pa thams cad kyang 'brang bar gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ dge slong de dag dang / byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang / thams cad dang
37b2(rgyud 'bum): ldan pa'i 'khor de dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod ngo // 'phags pa
37b3(rgyud 'bum): tsan dan gyi yan lag ces bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so/ / / rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya pra ti t+ya sa mut+pA da ba ri hr-i da ya d+hA ra Ni/ bod skad du
37b4(rgyud 'bum): 'phags pa rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i snying po'i cho ga'i gzungs/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// chos gang rgyus byung de dag ni// rgyu la 'gog
37b5(rgyud 'bum): pa gang yin pa/ / de bzhin gshegs pas bka' stsal to// de skad gsung ba dge sbyong che// tshig 'di sgrub pa'i cho ga ni// sems can rnams la phan byed pa// las kun grub par
37b6(rgyud 'bum): byed pa'i phyir/ / de bzhin gshegs pas rab tu gsungs// rigs kyi bu dag gang gi phyir// dang por sangs rgyas bcom ldan la// gus shing dang ba'i sems bskyed nas// bcom ldan
37b7(rgyud 'bum): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ / rten 'brel zab mo cho ga bshad// thams cad las dang mthun par gsungs// dang po 'jug pa'i tshig gsungs pa// 'di ltar las dang nyon mongs yod
38a1(rgyud 'bum): gyur na/ / sems can rnams ni 'khor bar 'gro 'gyur la// las dang nyon mongs med na 'khor ba las kyang ldog/ bden pa 'di yis bdag gi bsam pa grub gyur cig/
38a2(rgyud 'bum): sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo// chos la phyag 'tshal lo// dge 'dun la phyag 'tshal lo// yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed bzhugs pa la phyag 'tshal lo// rang
38a3(rgyud 'bum): sangs rgyas rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/ / dgra bcom pa rnams la phyag 'tshal lo// rgyun du zhugs pa rnams la phyag 'tshal lo// 'phags pa byams pa la sogs pa'i byang chub sems
38a4(rgyud 'bum): dpa' rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/ / brtul zhugs grub pa rnams la phyag 'tshal lo// sems can rnams kyi sman pa rnams la phyag 'tshal lo// nor bu grub pa rnams la phyag 'tshal lo//
38a5(rgyud 'bum): / 'di lta ste/ na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ oM yaM d+harmA he tu pra b+ha bA he tun+te ShAn+ta thA ga to h+ya ba data/ te ShAny+tsa yo ni ro d+ha e baM bA dI ma hA shra ma NaHswA hA/ las rnams kun gyi cho ga la// tshigs su bcad
38a6(rgyud 'bum): pa 'di dag brjod/ / bsam rgyu rang gi lag mthil la// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi sku// skyes bu chen po'i mtshan gyis brgyan// dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus spras// me yi
38a7(rgyud 'bum): khams la zhugs pa bsgoms/ / de ni lha dag rjes su dran// de ni sbyor ba'i las bshad de// rim po bzhin du so sor bstan// rims kyis btab nas na ba dang / klang pa na dang mig nang dang // khong
38b1(rgyud 'bum): nang la sogs nad rnams la/ / tshigs bcad 'di dang snying po 'di// mang por bzlas shing langs nas ni// lag pa g.yas pa'i khu tshur gyis// dbyung ba'i thabs su byab par bya//
38b2(rgyud 'bum): nad rnams thams cad sos par 'gyur// nyin gcig nyin gnyis nyin gsum dang // nyin bzhi rtag pa'i rims rnams la// bu mo gzhon nus bkal ba yi// skud pa dkar po sum
38b3(rgyud 'bum): bsgril la/ / bzlas brjod nyi shu brgyad bzlas nas// mgul du btags na bde bar 'tsho// nad la phan pa'i sman rnams la// gzungs sngags 'di dag bzlas shing gtang // snying
38b4(rgyud 'bum): nang rtsib logs na ba dang / / khong na nad rnams ci yod la// chu la sngags 'di mang bzlas nas// blung na phan zhing bde bar 'gyur// nad la phan pa'i sman rnams la// bzlas shing
38b5(rgyud 'bum): btang na 'tsho bar 'gyur/ / g.yan pa dang ni 'brum bu dang // phol mig dang ni rma rengs la// grog tshang sa la snying po 'di// mang du bzlas te btab na 'tshe// gzhang 'brum gzhang nad
38b6(rgyud 'bum): za gu dang / / pho mtshan skrangs shing na ba la// skyer ba'i kha d+ha'i ril bu 'am// byang chub sems dpa'i ril bu la// nyi shu bzlas shing bskus na phan// nad kyi rnam pa gang na yang /
38b7(rgyud 'bum): nad tshabs che chung tshod brtags nas// tshigs su bcad pa'i bzlas brjod la// mang nyung nad dang sbyar nas su// lus la byab cing bzlas na phan// 'khru ba ga nad kyis btab pa la//
39a1(rgyud 'bum): sman nam ril bu kha zas la// bdun nam nyi shu bzlas nas kyang // khong du btang na phan par 'gyur// de yi bzlas brjod snga ma ste// 'di dag rab tu bzlas par
39a2(rgyud 'bum): bya/ na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ oM ya d+harmA he tu pra b+ha bA he tun+te ShAn+ta thA ga to h+ya ba data/ te ShAny+tsa yo ni ro d+ha e baM bA dI ma hA shra ma NaHswA hA/ de dag bzlas na nang rnams 'tsho// de ni nang rnams 'tshe
39a3(rgyud 'bum): ba'o/ / de nas lang ni bka' stsal pa// nas dang gro dang sran ma dang // 'bras dang sran chung mon sran dang // shing thog rkun 'brum a ru ra// de dag kun la za ba yi// srin bu sngur bu phye
39a4(rgyud 'bum): ma leb/ / bye'u dang byi ba ne tse dang // lo tog za ba kha bcing na// zhing gi khyon dang sbyar nas kyang // bye ma sa dang thal ba la// bzlas brjod brgya ni rtsa brgyad bzlas// zhing dang shing thog
39a5(rgyud 'bum): gtor byas na/ / de dag kun kyang kha bcings 'gyur// ha cang char pa ches pa na// bcom ldan 'das la phul ba yi// me tog dman ma re re la// bzlas brjod nyi shu rtsa gcig bya//
39a6(rgyud 'bum): gtsang zhing bde ba'i gnas dag tu// dkyil 'khor chen po'i dbus dag tu// bum pa gang ba'i steng dag tu// kham phor gtsang ma'i nang du yang // me tog gtsang ma bzlas pa de// bsregs na char
39a7(rgyud 'bum): pa chad par 'gyur/ / ser ba drag po 'ong ba na// se ba nyid phrag lcug ma la// bzlas brjod brgya ni rtsa brgyad bzlas// gser ba gang nas g.yo ngos su// klang la bskor zhing byabs na 'chang//
39b1(rgyud 'bum): yang na thal chen yungs kar la// bzlas brjod brgya ni rtsa brgyad bya// thum po byas te lcug ma la/ btags te btsugs na ser ba 'chad// 'byung po sha za yi dgas dang // brjed byed
39b2(rgyud 'bum): gdon gyis zin pa la/ / dkyil 'khor 'dom gang gru bzhi la// bum pa gtsang ma lnga bzhag ste// gu gul dud pas bdugs nas kyang // yungs kar ga pur tsan dan dang // gla rtsi la sogs sman
39b3(rgyud 'bum): sbyar te/ / bzlas brjod brgya ni rtsa brgyad bzlas// gos dang zas ni dkar po sbyar// dkyil 'khor de yi nang du bzhug/ bum pa'i chu yis bkru bar bya// sangs rgyas sku bsil byas
39b4(rgyud 'bum): pa'i chus/ / bkru zhing brung na rab tu phan// nang dang gnod pa kun las thar// 'byung po brjed byed sha za yis// glags kyang rnyed par mi 'gyur ro// bus pa gdon gyis 'jigs pa
39b5(rgyud 'bum): la/ gi'u wang la ni sngags bzlas nas// snying po stobs chen 'di bris gdags// oM badz+ra kro d+ha ma hA ba la// ha na da ha pa tsa bi d+ha na sa ya dza Ti/ laM po da ra/ uts+tshaSh+ma kro d+ha hUM phaT swA hA/
39b6(rgyud 'bum): gtsang sbra byas te mgul par gdags// de bzhin yungs kar dag la yang // bzlas brjod byas te gtums la gdags// mkha' 'gro'i gdon gyis zin pa na// yungs kar dang ni
39b7(rgyud 'bum): gu gul la/ / sngags gnyis lan ni bdun bdun bzlas// dud pas bdugs na 'tshe bar 'gyur// de la the tsom mi za'o// bus pa gdon dang nang las thar// bud med bu ni thogs gyur
40a1(rgyud 'bum): na/ / chu la bzlas brjod lnga bdun byas// blud na legs par btsa' bar 'gyur/ bud med mo gsham bu med la// sangs rgyas sku bsil byas pa'i chu//
40a2(rgyud 'bum): la bzlas brjod nyi shu bya// khrus byas lus ni gtsang ma la// chu de brud na bu tsha 'phan// rigs brgyad dag ni 'phel bar 'gyur// lam du zhugs te 'gro ba na// skud pa dang ni gos kyi
40a3(rgyud 'bum): gA ra/ bzlas brjod bdun bzlas mdud pa bdun// mdud cing bzlas te song ba na// bde bar 'gro zhing don yang 'grub// dgra dang nye zhe med par 'gyur// yid ni gzhungs par 'dod
40a4(rgyud 'bum): pa na/ / shu dag tshon gang tsam pa la// mar srang sum brgya drug cu la// bzlas brjod byas te bsres nas kyang // bum pa gcig tu blugs la dkrug/ nyi ma re re lo gcig tu/ shu dag
40a5(rgyud 'bum): gi ni dum re dang / / mar srang dag ni re re la// bzlas brjod re re bya zhing bza'// de ni yid gzhungs blo ldan 'gyur// de bzhin pa ni ser skya ma'i// mar dang 'o ma dag la yang // bzlas
40a6(rgyud 'bum): brjod brgya ni rtsa brgyad du/ / bzlas te 'o thug dkrug cing bza'// yid gzhungs pa yi mchog tu 'gyur// mi dang 'grogs shing mdza' 'dod na// gang dag yid dang 'thad pa la// me
40a7(rgyud 'bum): tog dang ni rtswa shing ngam/ / 'bras bu 'am ni 'ji ba dag/ lag pa g.yas pa'i chang par bcug/ bzlas brjod brgya ni rtsa gcig gdab// gang gi lag tu byin pa na// de dang rtag tu mdza' bar
40b1(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur/ / rta la sogs pa'i phrugs rnams kun// 'chi bar nye bar gnas pa na// chu dang yungs kar bcas pa la// bzlas brjod brgya ni rtsa brgyad bya// de la gtor na sos par
40b2(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur/ / yang na yungs kar brgya brgyad la// bzlas pa'i thum po mgul du gdags// de ni nad med bde bar 'gyur// mi rnams 'chi bas 'jigs gyur na// yungs kar la ni bzlas brjod
40b3(rgyud 'bum): bya/ / thum po byas te mgo la gdags// bzlas brjod pargyu stong 'bum yang bzlas// mi nad dang ni phyugs nang kun// ming yang med cing bde bar 'gyur// de dag kun gyi bzlas brjod ni//
40b4(rgyud 'bum): 'di dag kun tu rgya cher gsungs// na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ oM ye d+harmA he tu pra b+ha bA he tun+te ShAn+ta thA ga to d+ya ba data/ te ShAny+tsa yo ni ro d+ha e baM bA dI ma hA shra ma NaHswAhA/ rtag tu bzlas brjod byas na
40b5(rgyud 'bum): ni/ / bsam pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur// gnod pas cis kyang tshugs mi 'gyur// dam chos yongs su gzung bar 'gyur// tshigs su bcad 'di dag ni// mthu dang rdzu 'phrul
40b6(rgyud 'bum): bsam mi khyab/ / cho ga 'di dag thams cad ni// gang la dad pas yid ches na// 'grub par the tshom med par 'gyur// bzlas brjod 'bum ni byas gyur na// dgos pa thams cad 'grub

47a7(rgyud 'bum): pa'i khang bzangs 'dir sdus shig/ tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen pos/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin no zhes gsol te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar mnyan nas/ skad cig de
47b1(rgyud 'bum): nyid la rang gi rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs kyis ri rab kyi rtse mo la 'dug ste/ stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams skad kyis go bar byas pa/ bde gshegs slob ma sems can gang su dag/ 'jig rten khams
47b2(rgyud 'bum): 'dir gnas pa kun nyon cig/ deng 'dir ston pa chos kyi char 'bebs kyis// gang dag nyan par 'dod pa 'dir gshegs shig/ de'i tshe tshal chen po'i khang pa brtsegs pa'i khang
47b3(rgyud 'bum): bzangs su dge slong bzhi khri 'dus par gyur te/ de dag lhags nas bcom ldan 'das mthong ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la lan
47b4(rgyud 'bum): gsum bskor ba byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ / de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ sangs rgyas kyi mthus skad cig de nyid la 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag gi rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du
47b5(rgyud 'bum): bya ba gang mngon par 'du byas pas/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/ nyan thos kyi theg pa can nam/ rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa can nam/ theg pa chen po'ang rung
47b6(rgyud 'bum): ste/ dge slong ji snyed gnas pa de dag thams cad tshal chen po'i khang pa brtsegs pa'i khang bzangs su 'du bar 'gyur ba de 'dra ba'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba mngon par 'du ba gor ma chag snyam so// de nas
47b7(rgyud 'bum): dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba de lta bu mngon par 'du byas te/ rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba de mngon par 'dus byas pas/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten
48a1(rgyud 'bum): gyi khams na nyan thos kyi theg pa can nam/ rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa can nam/ theg pa chen po can yang rung ste/ dge slong ji snyed gnas pa de dag thams cad
48a2(rgyud 'bum): tshal chen po'i khang pa brtsegs pa'i khang bzangs su 'dus par gyur te/ de dag lhags nas bcom ldan 'das mthong ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te
48a3(rgyud 'bum): bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis skad cig de nyid la/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams
48a4(rgyud 'bum): la bka' stsal pa/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mthong ba don yod ces bya ba dang / 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems
48a5(rgyud 'bum): dpa' chen po ngan song thams cad spong ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mya ngan thams cad kyi mun pa nges par 'joms pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
48a6(rgyud 'bum): sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dra can gyi 'od dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yul thams cad kyi mun pa nges par
48a7(rgyud 'bum): 'joms pa'i blo gros dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mthu chen tho ba dang / byang chub
48b1(rgyud 'bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yid yongs su mi skyo ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spos kyi glang po che dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dpa' bo dang /
48b2(rgyud 'bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha' mdzod dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'od dpag med dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zla 'od
48b3(rgyud 'bum): dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ye shes tog dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzang skyong dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo gros rgya
48b4(rgyud 'bum): mtsho dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo gros mi zad pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' po rdo rje snying po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam
48b5(rgyud 'bum): mkha'i snying po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rje dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
48b6(rgyud 'bum): chen po spobs pa brtsegs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa la bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu dag khyed deng la/ phyogs bcu thams cad kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing
48b7(rgyud 'bum): gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dab na/ byang chub sems dpa' srid pa tha ma pa dang / skye ba gcig gis thogs pa dang / phyir mi ldog pa 'am/ mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob pa 'am/ dad pas
49a1(rgyud 'bum): mos pa ji snyed gnas pa de dag thams cad tshal chen po'i khang pa brtsegs pa'i khang bzangs 'dir sdus shig/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag
49a2(rgyud 'bum): gis bcom ldan 'das kyis ltar mnyan te/ bcom ldan 'das legs so legs so zhes gsol nas/ skad cig de nyid la ltas de lta bu byas te/ ltas de byas pas tshal chen po'i khang pa brtsegs
49a3(rgyud 'bum): pa'i khang bzangs su byang chub sems dpa' srid pa tha ma pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong brjod du med pa'i brjod du med pa bye ba khrag khrig 'bum dag lpags par gyur to/ / byang chub sems dpa' ste
49a4(rgyud 'bum): ba gcig gis thogs pa bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag brgya stong phrag dgu bcu dang / byang chub sems dpa' phyir mi ldog pa bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag brgyad cu dang / byang chub
49a5(rgyud 'bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob pa bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag brgya stong phrag sum cu dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dang
49a6(rgyud 'bum): pas mos pa bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag brgya stong phrag brgyad lhags par gyur to/ / de dag thams cad lhags te bcom ldan 'das mthong nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos
49a7(rgyud 'bum): phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'khong ngo // de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus byang chub sems dpa' 'dus pa chen po de mthong
49b1(rgyud 'bum): nas/ skad cig de nyid la 'di snyam du sems te/ zhus pa lung bstan pa ji lta bus/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di dag gis som ni thams cad spong bar 'gyur ba dang /
49b2(rgyud 'bum): sgrib pa med pa'i ye shes dang spob pa myur du thob par 'gyur ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad
49b3(rgyud 'bum): la chos bstan pa thos par 'gyur ba dang / thos nas kyang 'dzin par 'gyur zhing / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi bar du brjed par
49b4(rgyud 'bum): mi 'gyur ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis spyod pa yongs su dag pa gang yin pa bzhi po de dag rjes su thob par 'gyur ba ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/
49b5(rgyud 'bum): sems can yongs su dag pa dang / chos yongs su dag pa dang / smon lam yongs su dag pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa ste/ de dag rjes su thob par
49b6(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur ba dang / gya nom pa yid du 'ong bar byed pa'i chos bzhi rje su 'thob par 'gyur te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ lus yid du 'ong ba dang / ngag yid du 'ong ba dang sems
49b7(rgyud 'bum): yid du 'ong ba dang / skye ba yid du 'ong ba rjes su 'thob par 'gyur ba dang / gzungs kyi sgor 'jug pa bzhi 'thob par 'gyur ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sgo mi bzang pas bskabs
50a1(rgyud 'bum): pa'i gzungs kyi sbyor 'jug pa dang / sems can rnams kyi dbang po la mkhas pa'i gzungs kyi sgor 'jug pa dang / las dang rnam par smin pa la mkhas pa 'dus ma byas
50a2(rgyud 'bum): kyi gzungs kyi sgor 'jug pa dang / chos zab mo la bzod pa'i gzungs kyi sgor 'jug pa rjes su thob par 'gyur de lta bu zhu ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la
50a3(rgyud 'bum): bdag gis zhu gor ma chag snyam mo/ / de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bus zhu ba ji skad smos pa/ ji ltar bzung ba/ ji ltar yid la byas pa/ ji ltar kun chub par byas pa de dag/ sangs rgyas bcom
50a4(rgyud 'bum): ldan 'das la rgya cher gsol to/ / 'di skad ces kyang gsol te/ bcom ldan 'das zhu ba ji skad smos pa/ ji ltar bzung ba/ ji ltar yid la bgyis pa/ ji ltar kun chub par bgyis
50a5(rgyud 'bum): 'di dag gis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di dag gi spyod pa ji ltar yongs su dag par 'gyur ba de ltar/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bshad du gsol/ de skad ces
50a6(rgyud 'bum): gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// shA rI'i bu legs so legs so// shA ri'i bu khyod de bzhin gshegs
50a7(rgyud 'bum): pa la don 'di zhu bar sems pa khyod yang legs so/ / shA ri'i bu de'i phyir khyod legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung zhig dang ngas khyod la bshad do// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bus/
50b1(rgyud 'bum): bcom ldan 'das de ltar 'tshal lo// de bzhin no zhes gsol te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar mnyan pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// shA ri'i bu
50b2(rgyud 'bum): 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang chos thams cad khas mi len cing 'dzin par mi byed pa des/ gzungs kyi gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di dag gzung bar bya'o// /
50b3(rgyud 'bum): tad+ya thA/ oM a Ne ma Ne/ a khe ma khe mu khe/ sa man+ta mu khe/ dz+yo ti sau me sa twe sa t+yA rA me/ sau ti yuk+ti/ ni ruk+ti/ ni ruk+ti pra b+he/ hi li hi li kalpi/ kalpa si sA re/ swa ra wa ti/ hi le hi
50b4(rgyud 'bum): le hi li/ hi le hi le hi le/ hi le hi le/ hi li le/ ma hA hi li l-i/ ti le tur+N+Na/ tsaN+De/ tsa wa naM/ tsa rA tsa ra Ne/ a tsa le ma tsa le/ a nan+te/ a nan+ta ga te/ a nan+ta mu khe/ a ra Ne/
50b5(rgyud 'bum): nirma Ne/ nirba pa Ne/ nirbar+t+ta ne/ ni d+hAn+te/ d+har+m+ma d+hA ne/ ni hA re/ ni hA re/ bi ma la/ bi sho d+ha ne/ shI li bi sho d+ha ne pra kr-i ti/ dI ba ne/ b+ha wa/ ni b+ha ba/ bi b+ha wa ne/ a sang+ge/ a sang+ga/ bits+tsha
50b6(rgyud 'bum): re/ da me/ sha me/ bi ma laM/ bi ma la prA b+he/ si mA kaR+Sha Ni/ d+hi re/ d+hi d+hi re/ ma hA d+hi d+hi raM/ ya shro ya sho wa ti/ tsa le/ a tsa le/ ma tsa le/ sa ma tsa le/ dr-i n+ye dr-iD+h+we san+d+hi su s+thA wa ra/
50b7(rgyud 'bum): a sang+ga/ a sang+ga bi hA re/ a sang+ga ni hA re/ ni hA re bi ma le/ ni ha ra sho d+ha ne/ dr-i d+ha so me/ sI re s+thA ma/ s+thA ma wa ti/ ma hA pra b+he/ sa man+ta pra b+he/ bi pu la pra b+he/ bi pu laM rasmai sam+b+ha wa
51a1(rgyud 'bum): mu khe/ sarba tA nu ga te/ a nats+tshe d+ye/ a nats+tshe d+ye pra ti b+hU ne/ d+hu ra Ni d+hA ra ne/ d+harma ni d+hA ne/ d+harma ni d+hA na go tre/ sa man+ta b+ha dre/ sarba ta thA ga ta hr-i ra ya/ a d+hiSh+ThA na a d+hiSh+NI
51a2(rgyud 'bum): swAhA/ shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzungs 'di dag 'dzin pa ni 'dus byas dang 'dus ma byis kyi chos rnams la rlom sems su mi byed/ dmigs par mi byed
51a3(rgyud 'bum): slong par mi byed/ btang snyoms su mi byed/ 'dzin par mi byed/ rtsom par mi byed/ de dag thob par bya ba dang / spang bar bya ba dang / bsgom par bya ba dang / rnam par 'phel bar bya/
51a4(rgyud 'bum): ba'i phyir mi byed/ rnam par mi byed/ mngon par mi byed/ mtshungs par ldan pa'i chos rnams kyang mi mthong / ldan pa ma yin pa rnams kyang mi mthong / chos rnams kyi skye ba'ang mi
51a5(rgyud 'bum): mthong / 'gog pa'ang mi mthong / 'das pa'i chos rnams kyang mi mthob ma 'ongs pa'i chos rnams kyang mi mthong / nga ltar byung ba'i chos rnams kyang mi mthong chos rnams
51a6(rgyud 'bum): kyi 'phel ba dang 'grib pa'ang mi mthong / chos gang yang sogs par yang mi byed/ 'grib par yang mi byed/ rnam par rig par yang mi byed par sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa 'ba' zhig
51a7(rgyud 'bum): sgom ste/ de sgom pa na gzugs su ma yin/ gzugs med par ma yin/ mtshan du ma yin/ mtshan med par ma yin/ dpe byar bzang por ma yin/ dpe byad bzang po med
51b1(rgyud 'bum): par ma yin/ rnam par shes par ma yin/ rnam par shes pa med par ma yin/ nyon mongs par ma yin/ nyon mongs pa med par ma yin/ tshul khrims su ma yin/ tshul khrims med
51b2(rgyud 'bum): par ma yin/ ting nge 'dzin du ma yin/ ting nge 'dzin med par ma yin/ shes rab tu ma yin/ shes rab med par ma yin/ rnam par grol bar ma yin/ rnam par grol ba med par ma
51b3(rgyud 'bum): yin/ rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong bar ma yin/ rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba med par ma yin/ skye bar ma yin/ skye ba med par ma yin/ rigs su ma yin/ rigs med
51b4(rgyud 'bum): par ma yin/ rus su ma yin/ rus med par ma yin/ 'khor du ma yin/ 'khor med par ma yin/ gnas par ma yin/ gnas med par ma yin/ thob par ma yin/ thob pa med
51b5(rgyud 'bum): par ma yin/ mngon par rtogs par ma yin/ mngon par rtogs pa med par ma yin/ nyon mongs pa zad par ma yin/ nyon mongs pa ma zad par ma yin/ phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched
51b6(rgyud 'bum): du ma yin/ phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched med par ma yin/ shes par ma yin/ shes pa med par ma yin/ chos ston par ma yin/ chos mi ston par ma yin/ bdag
51b7(rgyud 'bum): rnam par dag par bya ba ma yin/ gzhan rnam par dag par bya ba ma yin/ sems can rnam par dag par bya ba ma yin/ sems can med par rnam par dag par bya ba ma yin/ bdag gi don du
52a1(rgyud 'bum): ma yin/ gzhan gyi don du ma yin/ chos su ma yin/ 'dul bar ma yin/ lus rnam par dag par ma yin/ ngag rnam par dag par ma yin/ yid rnam par
52a2(rgyud 'bum): dag par ma yin/ spyod pa rnam par dag par ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha'i spyod pa rnam par dag par ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha'i spyod pa rnam par dag par ma yin/ da ltar byung ba'i spyod pa rnam par
52a3(rgyud 'bum): dag par ma yin/ bdag gi rnam par ma yin/ gzhan gyi rnam par ma yin pa 'di ni/ shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i chos thams cad mi 'dzin pa la 'jug pa zhes
52a4(rgyud 'bum): bya ba'i sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa zhes bya'o/ / don dam pa bsgrub pas chos thams cad yang dag par 'du ba la mi 'jigs pa thob par byed pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs so// gcig tu nges pa
52a5(rgyud 'bum): thob pas bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad gzhan la rag ma las pa'i ye shes sgrub pas chos kyi gter mtshan dang dpe byang
52a6(rgyud 'bum): bzang po'i rigs zil gyis mi non pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs so/ / dam pa yongs su 'chol ba la mkhas pas bdud kyi las thams cad las yang dag par 'da' ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs so//
52a7(rgyud 'bum): shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' gang dag no mtha' yas pas sgrub pa'i gzungs 'di'i don thob pa de dag ni phyir mi ldog cing / myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par
52b1(rgyud 'bum): rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shA ri'i bu 'dir sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos dang yon tan thams cad kyi gter nges pa'i phyir ro// dmigs pa med
52b2(rgyud 'bum): pa'i spyod pa dang ldan pa'i gzungs 'di nyid las/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thams cad kyi bye brag mchog yin pa'i phyir ro// rab tu dbye bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro//
52b3(rgyud 'bum): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to// chos rnams stong par ngogs med cing // byang chub ched du spros mi byed// chos rnams
52b4(rgyud 'bum): 'khrugs par mi byed na/ / de phyir gzungs ni thob par 'gyur// mdo sde 'di ni mnyan par bya// 'di la gzungs 'di zad pa med// ye shes sbyor 'di 'di la ste// des na byangs
52b5(rgyud 'bum): thob par 'gyur/ / byang chub sems dpa' 'jigs med pa// gzungs 'di rab tu bzung byas na// phyog bcu dag gi sangs rgyas kyi// chos bstan pa ni thos par 'gyur//
52b6(rgyud 'bum): don dang tshig 'brus bskyed kun gyi// mchog gi chos ni rnam par shes// nyi ma'i 'od zer ji snyed pa// de snyed tshig rnams shes par 'gyur// gang dag chos kyi mchog 'gyur ba/
52b7(rgyud 'bum): rlabs chen gzungs kyi sgo rnams te// gang zhig mdo sde 'dzin de la// thams cad rtag tu mngon du 'gyur// gal te sems can thams cad kyis// de la bskal par ngogs dris te/
53a1(rgyud 'bum): the tshom thams cad chad gyur kyang // de yi ye shes mi zad do// mdo sde 'di la su dga' ba// de ni chos kyi rgyal po'i sras// byang chub mchog la nye ba ste//
53a2(rgyud 'bum): yid brtan gyur dang chos 'dzin pa'o// gzungs 'di 'dzin par su byed pa// de la sems can thams cad dga'// sangs rgyas rnams kyang de la dgyes// grags pa 'jig rten 'byung bar
53a3(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur/ / su zhig mdo sde 'di 'dzin pa// de ni 'chi ba'i dus byed tshe// sangs rgyas bye ba brgyad cu mthong // lag pa de la nye bar 'jog/ gzungs 'di 'dzin par byed pa ni// bskal pa bye
53a4(rgyud 'bum): ba stong rnams su/ / sngon chad sdig pa gang byas pa// zla ba gcig gis byang bar 'gyur// byang chub sems dpa'i bsod nams gang // bskal pa bye bar sgrub pa kun// gzungs 'di 'dzin
53a5(rgyud 'bum): par byed pa yis/ / zla ba gcig gis zil gnon 'gyur// khams gsum sems can ji snyed pa// gal te thams cad bdud gyur kyang // mdo sde 'di ni gang 'dzin pa// de la bar chad
53a6(rgyud 'bum): byed mi nus/ / byang chub 'tshang rgya bar du de// dran dang blo gros rtogs ldan 'gyur// gzungs kyi dam pa gang yin pa// de yi lce yi rtse mor gnas// ji ltar mdo sde bstan 'di la//
53a7(rgyud 'bum): gzungs ni so sor nges pa bzhin// 'di las thams cad mkhyen pa stan// 'di las byang chub thob par 'gyur// gzungs 'di bshad ma thag tu yang // mar me zhes bya nga lung bstan//
53b1(rgyud 'bum): skad cig de la sangs rgyas ni// gang+gA'i klung gi snyed mthong // gang zhig sangs rgyas thams cad kyis/ bstan pa 'dir ni rtogs 'dod cing // mdo sde 'di la bstan pa des//
53b2(rgyud 'bum): thams cad myur du thob par 'gyur// sangs rgyas zhing ni rnam dag dang // nyan thos phun sum tshogs pa dang // 'od dang mtshan kyang rnam dag pa// mdo sde 'dis ni byed par 'gyur// de bas
53b3(rgyud 'bum): bag ni yod gyur la/ / zhag bdun bar du 'di sems pa// sangs rgyas bye ba brgyad cu yis// de yi 'og tu gzungs sbyin 'gyur// bsam bya sems par mi bsam ste/
53b4(rgyud 'bum): bsam bya min pa'ang mi bsam mo// soms shig 'gal bar ma sems shig/ de yi 'og tu gzungs thob 'gyur// dper na rgya mtshor phyin pa'i mi// nor la som nyi med pa ltar//
53b5(rgyud 'bum): de bzhin gzungs 'di thob gyur nas// bde ba la yang som nyi med// 'di las rdzogs pa'i byang chub nye// de bas 'di la sbyor bar gyis// zhi ba'i gnas ni thob gyur nas// rdzogs
53b6(rgyud 'bum): pa'i byang chub thob par 'gyur/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis yang / tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos bzhi dang
53b7(rgyud 'bum): ldan na gzungs 'di thob par 'gyur ro/ / bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ 'dod pa rnams la lhag par chags pa med pa yin/ sems can thams cad la phrag dog med pa yin/ bdog
54a1(rgyud 'bum): pa thams cad yongs su gtong zhing 'gyod pa med par sbyin pa'i tshul can yin/ nyin mtshan du 'dod cing chos kyi kun dga' la dga' ba yin te/ nyin mtshan du chos la
54a2(rgyud 'bum): dga' zhing chos 'dod pa yin te/ / shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na gzungs 'di 'thob par 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das
54a3(rgyud 'bum): kyis tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to/ / ngan cing bdud kyi spyod yul ba// 'dod pa dri nga spang bar byos// de dag sems can dmyal ba'i rkyen// ngan song rnams kyi rgyu
54a4(rgyud 'bum): yang yin/ / shes kyi khe dang rnyed dang grags pa'i phyir// pha rol dag la phrag dog mi bya ste// dga' ba'i mig gis seMn can bltas byas na// mthu che ba dang gzugs kyang mdzes par
54a5(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur/ / sems can gang dag kha cig rtsod 'gyur ba// de yi gzhi rtsa yongs su 'dzin pa ste// de ltas gang la sreg par 'gyur ba spongs// sred pa spang ba byas na gzungs su 'gyur//
54a6(rgyud 'bum): gal te byang chub 'dod na gzhan ma sems// nyin dang mtshan du chos ni btsal bar byos// chos tshig 'di 'dra 'di dag sten byed na// de la gzungs ni mngon du 'gyur bar 'ong // shA ri'i bu/
54a7(rgyud 'bum): gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos bzhi dang ldan na gzungs 'di thob par 'gyur ro// bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ dgon pa dang dben pa la gnas pa dang / chos
54b1(rgyud 'bum): zab mo la bzod pa'i stobs bskyed pa nyid dang / rnyed pa dang / bkur sti dang / tshigs su bcad pa la lhag par chags pa med pa dang / sdig pa'i dngos po thams cad la mi lta zhing
54b2(rgyud 'bum): tha na lus dang srog kyang yongs su gtong ba ste/ shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na gzungs 'di thob par 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das
54b3(rgyud 'bum): kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to/ / rgyal bas bsngags pa'i dgon par gnas par gyis// de la gnas pas gzhan la brnyas mi bya// zab mo'i bzod la 'dun pa
54b4(rgyud 'bum): bskyed nas su/ / bag yong mgo la 'bar bzhin gnas par gyis// de ltar tshul 'chos byed kyi gzhir gyur pa'i// shes khe rnyed pa rnams la gnas ma byed// bya dang 'dra bar
54b5(rgyud 'bum): ngan ngon dag gis cho ga byas te/ / mir gyur pa yi 'bras bu yod par byos// kye ma sangs rgyas bstan pa legs par rnyed// sdug bsngal mang po'i rtsa ba khyim yang spongs// lus dang
54b6(rgyud 'bum): ngag dang yid kyang yongs dag pas/ / sangs rgyas dang ni chos la gus par gyis// rnyed 'dod dran pa ma yin shes rab min// dang ngang tshul khrims ma yin chos sems min// de ni byang
54b7(rgyud 'bum): chub ring ste gnams bzhin/ / de ltas rnyed pa yongs su spang bar bya// shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na gzungs 'di thob par 'gyur ro//
55a1(rgyud 'bum): bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ yi ge 'bru brgyad kyi don khong du chud par bya'o// brgyang po de dag gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ pa zhes bya ba don dam pa chos thams
55a2(rgyud 'bum): cad la bdag med pa la 'jug pa khong du chud pa dang / la zhes bya ba mtshan dang dpe byang bzang po dang / mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po med par de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi sku la 'jug pa khong du chud
55a3(rgyud 'bum): pa dang / ba zhes bya ba byis pa'i chos rnams dang mkhas pa'i chos rnams ji lta ba bzhin du gnyis su med pa la 'jug pa khong du chud pa dang / dza zhes bya ba skye ba dang / rga ba dang / 'chi ba dang /
55a4(rgyud 'bum): skye ba dang / rga ba dang / 'chi ba med pa'i 'gro ba mi skye mi 'gag pa la 'jug pa khong du chud pa dang / ka zhes bya ba las dang rnam par smin pa dang / las dang rnam par smin pa med pa la
55a5(rgyud 'bum): 'jug pa khong du chud pa dang / d+ha zhes bya ba gzungs kyi chos kyi rnam grangs kyi stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / chos kyi dbyings la 'jug pa khong du chud
55a6(rgyud 'bum): pa dang / sha zhes bya ba ni gnas dang / lhag mthong dang / lhag mthong med par chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid khong du chud pa dang / k+Sha zhes bya ba chos thams cad skad cig pa ste gzod
55a7(rgyud 'bum): ma nas zhi ba'i phyir zad pa med pa dang / 'jig pa med pa dang / rgyu med pa dang / chos thams cad mya ngan las 'das par 'jug par khong du chud ba ste/ de ltar yi ge 'bru brgyad po de dag
55b1(rgyud 'bum): gi don khong du chud par rtogs par bya ba 'di ni don khong du chud pa dang po'o/ / gzungs kyi chos kyi rnam grangs 'di legs par bris te gzung bar bya ba 'di ni don khong du chud pa gnyis pa'o// zla ba
55b2(rgyud 'bum): phyed phyed cing gzungs kyi chos kyi rnam grangs 'di rtag tu klog pa dang / rjes su dran par bya ba'i phyir brtson par bya ba 'di ni don khong du chud pa gsum pa'o// gzungs kyi chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la
55b3(rgyud 'bum): mchod pa mngon par brtson pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sems can thams cad yang dag par dga' bar bya ba dang / yang dag par 'dzin du gzhug pa dang
55b4(rgyud 'bum): yang dag par gzengs ba stod pa la gzung ba'i phyir brtson par bya ba 'di ni don khong du chud pa bzhi pa ste/ shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan
55b5(rgyud 'bum): na gzungs 'di thob par 'gyur ro/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to// yi ge 'bru brgyad 'di dag bsam par bya// mdo sde
55b6(rgyud 'bum): 'di ni bris nas bcang bar bya/ / zla ba phyed cing rtag tu bklag par bya// sems can rnams kyang 'di 'dzin gzhug par bya// shes rab rgya chen byang chub nye ba ste// shes
55b7(rgyud 'bum): rab rgya yang che ba ste/ / phyogs bcu rnam na sangs rgyas gang su dag/ bzhugs pa thams cad des ni mdun du mthong // de phyir 'dun pa bskyed de 'ji la bslab// shA ri'i bu
56a1(rgyud 'bum): bzhi po 'di dag ni gzungs 'di la mngon par brtson pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i phan yon yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/
56a2(rgyud 'bum): phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad de la dgongs pa dang / de la bdud kyi las mi 'byung ba dang / de'i las kyi sgrib pa myur du 'byung ba dang / spobs pa rgyun mi 'chad
56a3(rgyud 'bum): pa myur du 'thob pa ste/ / shA ri'i bu bzhi po de dag ni gzungs 'di la mngon par brtson pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i phan yon yin no// de nas bcom ldan 'das
56a4(rgyud 'bum): kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to/ / sangs rgyas kun gyis de ni yid la mdzad// de la bdud kyis glags ni rnyed mi 'gyur// de yi las kyi sgrib pa myur du
56a5(rgyud 'bum): 'byung / / spobs pa mtha' yas rnams kyang thob par 'gyur// shA ri'i bu sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/ bskal pa grangs med pa'i yang ches grangs med pa yongs
56a6(rgyud 'bum): pa rgya cher gyur pa/ tshad dpag tu med pa de'i tshe de'i dus na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen dpal gyi gzi brjid rgyal po lta bu
56a7(rgyud 'bum): zhes bya ba rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na med pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs
56b1(rgyud 'bum): bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten du byung ste/ shA ri'i bu bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen dpal gyi gzi brji nga rgyal po lta bu de
56b2(rgyud 'bum): yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i dus kyi tshe/ 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po snang ba 'dzin ces bya ba/ mi'i dbang po rin po che sna bdun dang ldan pa zhig byung ngo // de'i bu yon tan rin po che
56b3(rgyud 'bum): bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dpal zhes bya ba zhig yod de/ de skyes nas lo bcu drag lon pa dang / des sgo mtha' yas pa sgrub pa'i gzungs kyi chos kyi rnam grangs 'di/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
56b4(rgyud 'bum): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen dpal gyi gzi brjid rgyal po lta bu de las thos te/ des gzungs 'di thos ma thag tu thob par bya ba'i phyir brtson par gyur
56b5(rgyud 'bum): to/ / de lo bdun khrir rmugs pa dang gnyid kyis ma brten to// non par ma gyur to// de lan 'ga' yang rgyal srid la dga' ba 'am/ nor la dga' ba'am// bdag la dga' bar ma
56b6(rgyud 'bum): gyur to/ / de lo bdun khrir lan 'ga' yang sa la glos ma phab ste/ gcig tu nges par nang du yang dag 'jog la gnas so// sangs rgyas bye ba phrag dgu las chos bstan pa thos te/
56b7(rgyud 'bum): thos nas kyang nyams su blangs so// thams cad bzung ngo // gzungs nyams su blangs nas kyang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen
57a1(rgyud 'bum): dpal gyi gzi brjid rgyal po lta bu de nyid la rab tu byung ngo / / de rab tu byung nas lo dgu khri 'das pa dang / des sgo mtha' yas bsgyung pa'i gzungs 'di bsgrubs te/ bsgrungs
57a2(rgyud 'bum): nas kyang sems can rnams la rgya cher yang dag par bshad do/ / des tshe ga cig pu de nyid la sems can bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag brgyad cu bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yang dag par
57a3(rgyud 'bum): 'dzin tu btsud cing / phyir mi ldog pa'i sa la bkod par gyur to// shA ri'i bu 'khor de na tshong dpon gyi bu zla ba'i tog ces bya ba zhig yod de/ nges sgro mtha' yas pa sgrub pa'i gzungs
57a4(rgyud 'bum): kyi chos kyi rnam grangs 'di chos smra ba'i dge slong de las thos so/ / thos nas kyang rjes su yi rang bar gyur te/ de rjes su yi rang ba'i mod las skyes pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba des sangs rgyas bye ba
57a5(rgyud 'bum): phrag dgu bcu las chos bstan pa thos so/ / thos nas kyang nyams su blangs so// thams cad bzung ngo // thams cad du'ang gzungs thob pa thams cad kyi mchog dang / tshig
57a6(rgyud 'bum): btsun pa dang / gzungs su bzung ba'i tshig dang ldan pa rnams kyi mchog dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spobs pa rgyun mi chod pa rnams kyi mchog tu gyur to//
57a7(rgyud 'bum): nges bskal pa gsum du de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag mnyes par byas so// mnyes par byas nas bskal pa gsum 'das mas
57b1(rgyud 'bum): blan med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu badzin par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/ / shAdri'i bun rna ma de'i dris mong dpon kyi d+ha rdza ngas ga rgyas bya bar gyur pa ldanan nis yin nam
57b2(rgyud 'bum): yid gnyis sam ra gyu / shA'i bu byung kyis de sa mil // @raro/ bcom ldan 'das ba ma shegs pa
57b3(rgyud 'bum): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mar me mdzad de'i tshe de'i dus na tshong dpon gyi bu zla ba'i tog ces bya bar gyur to/ / shA ri'i bu de'i tshe de'i dus na yon tan rin po che bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dpal
57b4(rgyud 'bum): zhes bya ba chos smra bar gyur pa de gzhan zhig yin pa snyam du khyod som nyi dang / yid gnyis sam/ the tsom za bar gyur na/ shA ri'i bu khyod kyis de ltar mi blta'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ bcom ldan
57b5(rgyud 'bum): 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas tshe dpag med de de'i tshe de'i dus na dge slong chos smra ba yon tan rin po che bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dpal zhes bya bar gyur to/ / shA
57b6(rgyud 'bum): bung dang bskal pa bzang po'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis kyang de'i tshe gzungs kyi chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos so/ / thos nas kyang rjes su yi rang ba'i mo las skyes pa'i dge
57b7(rgyud 'bum): ba'i rtsa ba des/ ngas bskal pa bye ba 'bum phrag bzhi khrir 'khor ba phyir bsnyil to// sangs rgyas bye ba phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgu las chos bstan pa'ang thos te/ thams cad du'ang
58a1(rgyud 'bum): gzungs thob pa rnams kyi mchog dang / tshig btsun pa bzung ba'i tshig dang ldan pa rnams kyi mchog dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spobs pa rgyun
58a2(rgyud 'bum): mi gcod pa rnams kyi mchog tu gyur to/ / shA ri'i bu de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'chang
58a3(rgyud 'bum): rgya bar 'dod pas/ tha na gzungs kyi chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la rjes su yi ring bar yang brtson par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de nyid byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
58a4(rgyud 'bum): de'i bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi ched du phyir mi ldog pa'i sa dang / chos smra ba rnams mgu bar byed pa'i rgyur 'gyur na/ gang yi ger 'dri ba dang / lung 'bog
58a5(rgyud 'bum): pa dang / 'dzin pa dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa dang / gzhan dag la rgya cher yang dag par ston pa lta ci smos te/
58a6(rgyud 'bum): bsod nams kyi phung po de'i tshad ni de bzhin gshegs pa ma gtogs par/ sems can thams cad kyis kyang shes pa 'am bsam par mi nus so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe
58a7(rgyud 'bum): tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to/ / mdo sde thos nas rjes su yi rang dang // yi ger bris dang bzung dang bklags pa yis// bsod nams chu bo ji tsam bskyed pa ni// sems
58b1(rgyud 'bum): mthun gyis shes par yongs minas/ / des ni ma bas kun tu rgyal ba rjong // de dgal yang dang ba bsamasas rnyed// mang snga rnamam mams ma shes par 'gyur// ngan nga
58b2(rgyud 'bum): byang chub mchog 'tshang rgya/ / bla med byang chub ma reg bar du yang // de ni ting nge 'dzin dang mngon shes dang // gzungs rnams dang ni gzugs dang longs spyod dang // sangs rgyas mtho
58b3(rgyud 'bum): las nyams par yongs mi 'gyur/ / rjes su dran pas sngon gyi cha rabs na// tshong dpon bus ni gzungs 'di thos gyur nas// sangs rgyas gang+gA'i byi snyed mthong gyur te// des ni 'dor
58b4(rgyud 'bum): bzhin byang chub rnam sangs rgyas/ / mar me mdzad pa de tshe tshong dpon du// sngon gyi tshe rabs 'od zer mtha' yas gyur// de tshe chos smra sangs rgyas tshe dpag med// nga ni bskal pa bzang
58b5(rgyud 'bum): dang bcas yi rang / / byang chub myur du reg par su 'dod dang // bdud rnams myur du gzhom par su 'dod dang // bsod nams brgya yi mtshan bzang su 'dod pa// 'di la brtson na
58b6(rgyud 'bum): rnyed par dka' mi 'gyur/ / gang+gA'i klung gi bye snyed 'jig rten khams// gang gis rin chen bkang ste sbyin byin yang // bris dang bzung ba'i bsod nams gang yin pa// de la sbyin pas
58b7(rgyud 'bum): dper yang mi 'gyur ro/ / de ltas thos nas rtse gcig bag yod par// byang chub sems dpa' mkhas pas 'di bzung ngam// gzungs 'di bris shing sems pa de dag ni// byang chub
59a1(rgyud 'bum): rnyed pa dka' ba med par bshad/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu sgo mtha' yas pa sgrub pa'i gzungs 'di la
59a2(rgyud 'bum): mngon par brtson pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lus la/ gangs la gnas pa'i gnod sbyin brgyad gzi byin mdangs 'jug cing nyin mtshan du srung ba dang skyob pa
59a3(rgyud 'bum): dang sbeng bar byed do/ / brgyad gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ gnod sbyin dpa' bo zhes bya ba dang / brtan po dang / bdag po dang / sred med kyi bu'i stobs dang / spyod pa'i blo gros
59a4(rgyud 'bum): dang thub ka dang / 'jigs su rung ba dang / gnod sbyin lag bzang zhes bya ba ste/ gnod sbyin brgyad po de dag 'ong bar bya ba'i phyir shin tu khrus bya ba dang / gos shin tu gtsang ma bgo ba
59a5(rgyud 'bum): dang 'chag sar 'gro ba dang / sems can thams cad la ni 'gras pa med pa'i sems su bya/ gzungs kyi chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'ang yid la bya ste/ de ltar byas na de la gnod sbyin brgyang
59a6(rgyud 'bum): po de dag myur du bzhin ston par 'gyur ro/ / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha rnams kyi nang du skyes pa brgyad po 'di dag kyang de la sems par 'gyur te/ brgyad gang zhe na/
59a7(rgyud 'bum): 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam par snang byed ces bya ba dang / sdang byed dang shes rab 'ong dang / nyi ma'i 'od dang / yang dag par skul byed dang bsam pa
59b1(rgyud 'bum): thams cad yongs su rdzogs byed dang / skar ma'i rgyal po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyod pa'i blo gros zhes bya ba ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brgyad pa
59b2(rgyud 'bum): de dag des gzungs thob par bya ba'i phyir mngon par brtson par 'gyur ro/ / gzungs 'di la brtson pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos kyang bden pa'i dam bca' bar bya'o//
59b3(rgyud 'bum): byas pa gzo ba dang / byas pa tshor ba can dang / chos 'dod pa dang / chos la dga' ba dang / zab mo'i chos la bzod pa mngon par brtson par bya'o// byang chub sems
59b4(rgyud 'bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzungs la brtson pas kun 'gyed/ bgo bsha' byed pa'i ngang tshul du bya ste/ des ji ltar chung ba dang / ji ltar nyung ba las kyang sbyin pa sbyin par bya na/
59b5(rgyud 'bum): mang po las lta smos kyang ci dgos/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gzungs kyi chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa na/ byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma sum
59b6(rgyud 'bum): cus ni sgo mtha' yas pa sgrub pa'i gzungs 'di thob ste/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par gyur to// lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin gyi skye dgu sngon
59b7(rgyud 'bum): sems bskyed pa dkrigs pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong 'bum phrag drug cus ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ tshe dang ldan
60a1(rgyud 'bum): gnas gtsang ma'i steng gi nam mkha'i dkyil na gnas pa/ rin po che sna bdun rab tu phye bas rnam par spras pa na/ byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs grangs med pa dang thabs cig tu bzhugs te/
60a2(rgyud 'bum): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams la bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu dag khyed kyis 'gro ba thams cad la phan pa dang bde ba'i phyir sgo drug pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs
60a3(rgyud 'bum): 'di zung zhig/ de 'di lta ste/ bdag 'khor ba na 'khor ba'i tshe sdug bsngal gang la la myong ba de sems can thams cad mnyam pa nyid du mi shes pa'i mtshan nyid du ma gyur cig/ bdag gis
60a4(rgyud 'bum): 'jig rten pa'i phun sum tshogs pa'i bde ba gang la la myong ba de sems can thams cad dang thun mong du yongs su spyad par gyur cig/ bdag la sdig pa mi dge ba'i las kyi sgrib pa gang la la yod pa de
60a5(rgyud 'bum): so sor bshags pa bla na med pas so sor ma bshags par ma gyur cig/ bdag la bdud kyi las gang dag yod pa de dag yongs su shes pas bla na med pas dngos su mi shes par ma gyur cig
60a6(rgyud 'bum): bdag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa/ 'jig rten nam 'jig rten las 'das pa gang yang rung gang ci yod pa de bla na med pa'i ye shes kyi 'bras bur gyur cig/ bdag gi
60a7(rgyud 'bum): rnam par grol ba gang yin pa des sems can thams cad rnam par thar par gyur cig/ 'khor ba dang mya ngan las 'das pa la bdag gnas par ma gyur cig/ tad+ya thA/ oM kA ma
60b1(rgyud 'bum): pa shA ri'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to/ / bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i ming ci lags/ 'di ji ltar gzung bar bgyi bcom ldan 'das
60b2(rgyud 'bum): kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu de'i phyir khyod kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di sgo mtha' yas pa sgrub pa'i gzungs zhes bya bar zung zhig/ byang chub sems dpa' gcig tu nges par ston par
60b3(rgyud 'bum): 'phags par byed pa zhes bya bar yang zung zhig/ bdud thams cad rnam par 'jigs par byed pa zhes bya bar yang zung zhig/ gcig tu nges pa rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid shin tu
60b4(rgyud 'bum): thob par byed pa zhes bya bar yang zung zhig/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu dang / dge slong de dag dang / byang chub sems dpa'
60b5(rgyud 'bum): de dag dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// 'phags pa sgo mtha'
60b6(rgyud 'bum): yas pa sgrub pa'i gzungs zhes bya ba'i mdo rdzogs so/ / rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya ThaT mu khi nA ma d+hA ra Ni/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa sgo
60b7(rgyud 'bum): drug pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das 'khor gyi khyams
61a1(rgyud 'bum): k+Sha ma/ dmed me/ dAnAM dAH/ d+had+beHr+tha/ sud+hadwe smaH/ su b+ha d+he/ n+deHn+te/ surban+d+re suHstAM/ tsan+ta u0f7f t
61a2(rgyud 'bum): san+d+rA ba ti/ te dzo ba ti/ d+har+m+ma ba te/ ya sho ba ti/ brah+ma ba ti/ sar+b+ba kle sha bi sho d+ha ri/ sarba ar+tha sa d+ha ni/ sarba ar+tha pra sha ma ni pa re mAr+tha sad+ha ni/ kA ya bi sha~M d+ha ne/ bAg
61a3(rgyud 'bum): bi sho d+ha ne/ na maHsaM sho d+ha ni swA hA/ rigs kyi bu dag rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la las sgo drug pa'i gzungs 'di nyin lan gsum mtshan lan gsum brjod na/ de las kyi sgrib pa

61b3(rgyud 'bum): phan pa dang snying brtse ba'i bsam pa la zhugs pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi 'bel ba'i gtam 'dri ba sha stag la/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'

62a1(rgyud 'bum): rnams dang / srin po'i bdag po thams cad dang / gnod sbyin sum brgya dang / gzhan mu stegs can spyod pa pa dang / kun tu rgyu dang / gcer bu pa drug
62a2(rgyud 'bum): stong dang / nam mkha' lding gi rgyal po bdun dang thabs cig tu bzhugs te/ de dag thams cad kyis de bzhin gshegs pa la bskor ba byas nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa'i las bya ba'i

64b1(rgyud 'bum): can nga'i bstan pa la ma dad pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa'i mdo sde la mngon par ma dad cing yid mi ches la/ tshig 'di skad du 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa'i mdo sde ma

65b1(rgyud 'bum): 'das byang chub sems dpa' dgon pa la gnas pas ji ltar bgyi lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'di lta ste/ khyim na gnas pa yongs su spang ba dang / mi dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi 'du 'dzi

66a1(rgyud 'bum): de bzhin gshegs pa la bla ma'i sri zhu byed cing / me tog dang / bdug spos dang / spos dang / me tog 'phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / gos dang rgyan rnams dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan
66a2(rgyud 'bum): dang / ba dan rnams kyis mchod pa byed pa de ni dus ma yin par 'chi bar mi 'gyur ro// pha rol gyi dmag tshogs kyi 'jigs pa'ang med/ mu ge'i gnod pa'i 'jigs pa'ang med/ bu las gyur

66a6(rgyud 'bum): spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug ces bgyi ba ci'i slad du de skad ces bgyi lags/ bka' stsal pa/ gang gi phyir 'di ltar 'jig rten thams cad la lta bar byed/ rtog par byed/ tshim par byed/ yongs
66a7(rgyud 'bum): su skyong bar byed/ yang dag par dbugs 'byin par byed cing / snying rje'i sems dang / bde ba'i sems dang / byams pa'i sems dang / snying brtse ba'i sems dang ldan la/ bsam pa thams cad yongs
66b1(rgyud 'bum): su rdzogs par byed pas na/ de'i phyir spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug ces bya'o// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag rdo rjes gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'das spyan ras gzigs
66b2(rgyud 'bum): dbang phyug gi ming tsam la rtog pa gang legs pa de'ang bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par gyur na/ gang dag de bzhin gshegs pa mngon par mchod pa dang / chos kyi rnam grangs 'ong la mngon par dang
66b3(rgyud 'bum): pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / yi ger 'dri ba dang / yi ger 'drir stsol ba dang / gos dang rgyan gyi mchod pa chen po dag gis mchod pa bgyid pa dang / rgyan gyis brgyan nas yi ger 'dri ba dang /
