66b6(rgyud 'bum): byang chub sems dpar gyur pa na/ de bzhin gshegs pa rgyal ba'i dbyangs las blangs te thob pa'i mod la'ang sa bcu thob par gyur la/ srog chags stong phrag du mas kyang chos la bzod pa thob par gyur to//
66b7(rgyud 'bum): de nas byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das gzungs mthu chen po bstan par gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa bya ka la bing ka'i sgra dang gdangs
67a1(rgyud 'bum): sgrogs pas gzungs 'di bka' stsal pa/ tad+yaSh+Tha/ dza yadza ya/ dza ya ba ha/ dza ya baha/ kha baH/ hu lu phu lu/ pad+ma be/ A ba ma ba me/ sa ra sar Ne d+hi ra d+har/ dang
67a2(rgyud 'bum): tA/ a nu pA lA ne/ yud d+ho da tA ra NI/ pa ra tsakra ni bA ra Ni/ pU ra ya/ b+ha ga bA na/ sarba A shAn/ ma ma sarba karma k+Sha pa ya/ bud+d+he a d+hiSh+ThA ne na sA hA/ rigs kyi bu 'di ni rgyal ba can zhes bya ba'i
67a3(rgyud 'bum): gzungs yin te/ sdig pa thams cad zad par byed pa/ nor dang 'bru rnam par 'phel bar byed pa/ pha rol gyi dmag tshogs zlog par byed pa/ mu ge'i gnod pa rab tu zhi bar byed pa/ tshe nur bar byed
67a4(rgyud 'bum): pa ste/ 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi yab yum dang 'dra ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs yin no// rigs kyi bu la la zhig gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di dang / gzungs kyi gsang sngags kyi tshig
67a5(rgyud 'bum): rnams la phyag 'tshal zhing bsam pa yongs su dag pas mchod par byed de/ yi ger 'dri ba 'am/ yi ger 'drir 'jug pa dang / mchod pa chen pos chos smra ba de la mchod pa byed pa de ni las kyi sgrib
67a6(rgyud 'bum): pa thams cad zad par 'gyur ro/ / dus ma yin pa'i 'chi bas 'chi bar mi 'gyur ro// tshe 'di nyid la'ang bde ba myong bar 'gyur te/ bus yid bde bar 'gyur ba dang / chung mas yid bde
67a7(rgyud 'bum): bar 'gyur ba dang / khyim gyis yid bde bar 'gyur ba dang / rgyal srid kyis yid bde bar 'gyur la/ bsam pa thams cad kyang yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ byang
67b1(rgyud 'bum): chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rjes 'di skad ces gsol to/ / bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la phyag 'tshal lo// chos smra ba de dag dang / chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yi ger 'dri ba rnams dang / 'cha
67b2(rgyud 'bum): ba rnams dang / klog pa rnams la'ang mchod par 'tshal lo// gang la la chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la mchod pa dang / chos smra ba de dag la gos dang / rgyan rnams dang / gdugs dang / bzhon pa rnams kyis
67b3(rgyud 'bum): mchod pa de dag gis ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la mchod pa bgyid pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das de ni bdag dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la'ang mchod pa'i mchog gis mchod pa bgyid
67b4(rgyud 'bum): pa lags so/ / rgyal srid thams cad la'ang bdag gis bsrung bar bgyi'o// bsam pa thams cad kyang yongs su rdzogs par bgyi'o// rgyal srid thams cad la'ang mchod par 'gyur bar bgyi'o// bcom
67b5(rgyud 'bum): ldan 'das bdag gis kyang chos nyan pa de dag gi don du gzungs kyi gsang sngags kyi tshig rnams rjes su btsal bar 'tshal lo/ / bsam pa thams cad kyang yongs su rdzogs par bgyi'o// snying slas su'ang
67b6(rgyud 'bum): bgyi'o/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu sems can gyi don gyi phyir smos shig/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rjes gzungs kyi gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di dag smras so// na
67b7(rgyud 'bum): maHsarba ta thA ga tA nA na/ na mo a mi tA b+hA ya/ ta thA ga tA ya/ na maHsarba bo d+hi satwa nA ma/ na maHsarba ma hA ra hi ke b+h+yaHtad+ya thA/ hu hu he he/ ma ti ma ti/ ma hA ma ti ba/ badz+ra ma ti/
68a1(rgyud 'bum): D+ha badz+ra ma ti/ ta thA ga tA/ a nu pa ri pra li dr-i/ sa ra sa ra/ a yo mu ge/ b+h+r-i ku Ti/ b+h+r-i ku Ti/ mu khi/ kr-i bi kr-i pA lu ke/ sat+ya ba tsan/ ma nu s+phA ra/ b+ha ga ban/ dz+ra
68a2(rgyud 'bum): pA Ni/ sarba kar+m+ma A ba ra NA ni/ k+ShA pa ya sarba A shrI pa ri pA ra ya/ de hi me ba raM/ bud d+ha sat+ye na/ bo d+hi satwa sat+ye na swA hA/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gang la la byang chub sems dpa'i sa 'tshal ba dang /
68a3(rgyud 'bum): de bzhin gshegs pa blta ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing du skye ba dang / rgyal srid dang longs spyod 'tshal ba dang / yul gru 'tshal ba dang / nor 'tshal ba dang / 'bru 'tshal ba de ni chos kyi rnam grangs
68a4(rgyud 'bum): 'di dang chos smra ba de la mchod pa chen pos mchod par bgyi'o/ / gang yi ge ra 'dri ba dang / 'tshong ba dang / klog pa de la'ang spos dang / me tog 'phreng dang / byug pa dang / mal cha dang / stan dang / gos
68a5(rgyud 'bum): dang / rgyan rnams dang / gdugs dang / bzhon pa rnams kyis mchod par bgyi ste/ bcom ldan 'das de la ni bdag gis bsrung bar bgyi'o// rgyal srid thams cad la'ang ches mchod par 'gyur bar
68a6(rgyud 'bum): bgyi'o/ / ji ltar 'tshal ba bzhin du sems dang yid bde bar bgyi'o// bu gcig pa bzhin du yongs su bskyang bar bgyi'o// gang la la bdag mthong bar 'tshal ba dang / stobs kyis 'khor los
68a7(rgyud 'bum): sbyar bar 'gyur ba dang / ting nge 'dzin thob pa dang / thos pa 'dzin par 'gyur ba dang / khams rnam par smin par 'gyur ba dang / lus mi snang bar 'gyur ba dang / nam mkha' las mchi bar 'tshal ba
68b1(rgyud 'bum): des ni/ zla ba yar gyi ngo tshas brgyad la nyin mtshan du smyung bar bgyis la gzugs bgyid du stsal te/ rdo rje 'chang gi gzugs 'dam bu mda' rgyu'i mdog can/ rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ zhi ba'i
68b2(rgyud 'bum): tshul can sku gdung dang ldan par bgyi'o/ / dbus su ni de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa bzhugs par bgyi'o// g.yas logs su ni 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug lag pa bzhi pa/
68b3(rgyud 'bum): rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ sku gdung dang bcas pa gzhag go// g.yas g.yon dag tu rgyal po chen po bzhi mchod par bgyid pa gzhag go// sgrub pa po'i rigs kyi bu des kyang gtsang sbra bgyi ba dang /
68b4(rgyud 'bum): dus gsum du khrus bgyi ba dang / dus gsum du gos brje ba dang / sems can thams cad la'ang byams pa'i sems su bgyi'o// zla ba yar gyi ngo tshas brgyad nas brtsams te/
68b5(rgyud 'bum): zla ba phyi ma nya ba'i tshes bco lnga'i bar du zas su nas kyi 'o thug 'tshal zhing / dus gsum du bzlas brjod bgyi'o// bdug pa ni a ka ru dang / tsan dan dang / lce pog dang / gu gul
68b6(rgyud 'bum): dbul lo/ / lan gsum gyi bar du bzlas brjod bgyis te/ de ni sngar bsnyen par bgyi ba lags so// sku gdung dang ldan pa'i mchod rten nam/ dpon pa'i gnas spos dang / bdug pa dang /
68b7(rgyud 'bum): me tog sna tshogs dang / ba dan sna tshogs kyis kyang mchod par bgyi'o// dkar bag gi lha bshos kyang dbul bar bgyi'o// chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i nga yi ger 'drir stsal cing / gos dang /
69a1(rgyud 'bum): rgyan dang / lhab lhub dang / gdugs dang / bzhon pa rnam pa sna tshogs kyis mchod par bgyi'o// de nas zla ba nye ba'i tshes bco lnga'i bar du sems can thams cad
69a2(rgyud 'bum): la snying rje'i sems dang ldan pa/ dus gsum du khrus bgyi ba dang / dus gsum du gos brje bar bgyi ba ste/ dkyil 'khor gru bzhi pa ba lang gi lci bas bskus la/ me tog sna tshogs kyis
69a3(rgyud 'bum): khebs par bgyis te/ bum pa gang ba bcu drug dang / mar me bcu drug kyang gzhag par bgyi'o// gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan sna tshogs kyis kyang sa phyogs de brgyan par
69a4(rgyud 'bum): bgyi'o/ / ro sna tshogs sbyar ba'i lha bshos rgya chen po phab la/ spos chab kyis phyogs der chag chag btab nas/ nam sku gzugs dang / sa gzhi 'gul ba dang / bdag nyid kyang dga' bar gyur
69a5(rgyud 'bum): pa'i bar du bzlas brjod bgyi'o/ / de nas des 'di ni gcig tu nges par 'grub par 'gyur ro snyam du shes par bgyi'o// de nas de'i 'og tu bdag gis rmi lam du bstan par bgyi zhing 'bel ba'i gtam
69a6(rgyud 'bum): bgyi'o/ / bsam pa thams cad kyang yongs su rdzogs par bgyi'o// bu gcig pa bzhin du yongs su bskyang bar bgyi'o// dam pa ci 'tshal ba'ang skal bar bgyi ste/ gang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di
69a7(rgyud 'bum): la ma dad cing spong bar bgyid pa ni ma gtogs lags so/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lag na rdo rje khyod kyis tshig de skad smras pa legs so legs so// de nas byang chub sems dpa'
69b1(rgyud 'bum): 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis/ byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces smras so// rigs kyi bu chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni sems can bsod nams chung ngu rnams kyi
69b2(rgyud 'bum): yul na spyod par mi 'gyur ro/ / 'di ni sems can bsod nams chung ngu rnams kyis yi ger 'dri ba'am/ yi ger 'drir 'jug pa 'am/ 'chang ba 'am/ klog par mi nus te/ de dag la bdud kyi bar
69b3(rgyud 'bum): chad byed par 'gyur ro/ / rigs kyi bu bzhi po 'di dag ni chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yi ger 'dri ba dang / klog pa dang / nyan du 'jug pa'i bdud kyi las yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ le lo dang /
69b4(rgyud 'bum): ma dad pa dang / bla ma la sri zhu med pa dang / chos smra ba'i sems mi brtan pa ste/ rigs kyi bu des de la 'di ni bdud kyi las yin no snyam du shes par bya'o// gzhan yang bdud kyi las bzhi yod
69b5(rgyud 'bum): de/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen la 'dun pa med pa dang / yid la mi byed pa dang / khengs pa'i tshig smra ba dang / 'jig rten 'di la sems pa ste/ 'di snyam du 'jig
69b6(rgyud 'bum): rten 'di la'ang 'jig pa med do/ / 'jig rten pha rol la'ang 'jigs pa med do// sdig pa'i lus rnams kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa'ang med do// bdag la tshig mi gsal ba'ang med do//
69b7(rgyud 'bum): yid rtul ba'ang med do// bdag ni mdzes pa yin no// bdag ni dbang phyug dang ldan no snyam du mi sems shing khyim dang bu smad rnams la zhen to// de dag ni bskal pa du mar sdug bsngal bar 'gyur
70a1(rgyud 'bum): te/ bzhi po de dag ni de dag gi mi dge ba'i bshes gnyen yin par blta bar bya'o// gzhan yang bdud kyi las bzhi yod de/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ nor la brkam
70a2(rgyud 'bum): pa ste/ de dag bskal pa du mar sdug bsngal myong bar 'gyur ba dang / de dag mi dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang dgod cing smra ba dang / chung mas yid bde ba dang / chos nyan pa de dag gi 'dun pa zlog par
70a3(rgyud 'bum): byed pa ste/ 'di lta ste/ blon po dang 'khor rnams de dag gi thad du lhags nas/ 'di skad du sbyin pa'i rnam par smin pa med do// chos smra ba 'di ni sdig pa byed pa/ dbang gis rgyags pas
70a4(rgyud 'bum): myos pa 'dod pa la log par g.yem pa/ phra ma la dga' ba yin te/ 'di ni khyod kyi srog gi bar chad byed par 'gyur la/ khyod ni chos la gnas pa ste/ khyod kyis chos mang du byas so// khyod
70a5(rgyud 'bum): ni mdo sde klog pa dang 'drir 'jug pa yin no zhes 'dzer te/ de dag mdo sde 'di yi ger 'drir 'jug par mi byed/ mchod par mi byed de/ de dag la ni tshe 'di nyid la'ang bar chad mang bar 'byung
70a6(rgyud 'bum): bar 'gyur la/ phyi ma la'ang sems can dmyal bar 'tsho bar 'gyur te/ de'ang rigs kyi bu des bdud kyi las yin par rig par byas la/ de'i dbang du 'gyur bar mi bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis
70a7(rgyud 'bum): bka' stsal pa/ grogs po dgangs lan gnyis lan gsum du tshig gis bsgo ste/ bag yod par gyis shig/ phyis sems can dmyal ba dag tu btso bar gyur na 'gyod par gyur ta re/ de nas bcom
70b1(rgyud 'bum): ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to/ / ngas ni mdo sde'i rgyal po bstan// byang chub la ni sems can du ma bkod// sangs rgyas tshul yang de yis bstan par gyur//
70b2(rgyud 'bum): de thos nas ni bag kyang yod par gyis// khyed rnams phyi dus rab tu 'jig pa'i tshe// log par lhung bar 'gro bar gyur ta re// mdo 'di la ni rtag tu gang dad pa// de ni nges par nga yi bu yang yin//
70b3(rgyud 'bum): mdo 'di la ni rtag tu gang mchod pa// de ni sangs rgyas zhing du skye bar 'gyur// gang phyogs mdo sde'i rgyal po 'di gnas pa// der ni 'byung po gnod sbyin srin po dang // yi dgas grul bum lte
70b4(rgyud 'bum): 'phye chen po dang / / gshed byed byang ste mA rnam kyis yong mi tshugs// de ni bsam pa thams cad yongs rdzogs shing // de ni bde bar byang chub 'tshang yang rgya// de'i tshe rgyal po chen po bzhis tshigs
70b5(rgyud 'bum): su bcad pa 'di dag thos nas/ chos kyi shugs kyis mchi ma blags te/ lus 'dar bzhin du bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la gtugs nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//
70b6(rgyud 'bum): bcom ldan 'das bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhis chos smra ba de la mchod par bgyi'o// chos nyan pa de dag la'ang bsrung bar bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das gang la la chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yi ger 'dri
70b7(rgyud 'bum): ba dang / yi ger 'drir stsol ba dang / gzungs 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par bgyid pa dang / chos smra ba de la gos dang rgyan dag gis mchod pa bgyid pa de la'ang bdag cag gis bsrung bar
71a1(rgyud 'bum): bgyi'o/ / de'i yul yang yongs su bsnyung bar bgyi'o// nor dang 'bru thams cad kyang sbal bar bgyi'o// bu gcig pa bzhin du yongs su bskyang bar bgyi'o// g.yul
71a2(rgyud 'bum): 'gyed pa thams cad du'ang mdun du mchi bar bgyi'o/ / rgyal srid thams cad du'ang ches bkur sti bgyid par 'gyur bar bgyi ste/ bdag cag ni de bzhin gshegs pa la bka' drin gzo bar bgyid
71a3(rgyud 'bum): kyibaka' drin mi gzo bar mi bgyid lags so/ / bcom ldan 'das gang la la chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos nas mchod par mi bgyid pa dang / chos smra ba de dag la'ang mchod par mi bgyid pa de la ni bdag
71a4(rgyud 'bum): cag gis sems mi bde bar bgyi'o/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ rgyal po chen po bzhi po de dag la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ rgyal po chen po dag legs so legs so// rgyal po chen po
71a5(rgyud 'bum): khyed legs kyis/ / rtag tu khyed kyis de ltar gyis shig/ de nas dri za'i bdag po chen po yul 'khor srung gis bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la gtugs nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol
71a6(rgyud 'bum): to/ / bcom ldan 'das slad ma'i dus slad ma'i tshe sems can mi dge ba spyod pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa la ma dad cing glo bar ma chud pa dag 'byung bar 'gyur te/ de dag ni chos kyi rnam grangs
71a7(rgyud 'bum): 'di lta bu 'dzin par mi bgyid/ klog par mi bgyid/ yi ger 'drir stso khaM bar mi bgyid/ sbyin pa sbyin par mi bgyid/ sbyin pa'i 'bras bu rnam par smin pa la yid mi ches shing / 'jig rten 'di/
71b1(rgyud 'bum): bde ba la lta bar bgyid de/ sems can de lta bu dag gi don du de bzhin gshegs pa dang 'dra ba'i mdo sde'i rgyal po chen po 'di bka' stsal to// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu
71b2(rgyud 'bum): chos gnyis kyis sems can dmyal bar ltung bar byed de/ gnyis gang zhe na/ 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / rigs kyi bu chos de gnyis kyis sems can dmyal bar ltung bar byed do//
71b3(rgyud 'bum): rigs kyi bu chos 'di bzhis ni bde 'gror 'gro bar byed de/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sems can thams cad la sems snyoms pa dang / bsam pa yongs su dag pa dang / bdog pa
71b4(rgyud 'bum): thams cad yongs su gtong ba dang / tshangs par spyod pa la gnas pa'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to// rgya chen sbyin pa 'di ni rdzu 'phrul che//
71b5(rgyud 'bum): ngan song ngan 'gro kun las rab grol byed// rmongs po'i sems can rtag tu 'dod la chags// chags pa sna tshogs brgya yis de dag myos// mdo sde 'di la dad par mi byed cing // sangs rgyas bstan
71b6(rgyud 'bum): la sbyin pa sbyin mi byed/ / sems can de 'dra ba dag ngan song sar// skyes nas tsher ba dag kyang myong bar 'gyur// sems can de dag la ni phan pa'i phyir// de ltar mdo sde mthu chen rab tu bstan//
71b7(rgyud 'bum): mdo sde 'di la rtag tu dad pa gang // de la gshed byed med cing sdig byed med// 'byung po grul bum lto 'phye chen po meng // rgyal po de la sdig pa byed pa med// legs 'dri nyan du 'jug dang mchod
72a1(rgyud 'bum): pa dang / / legs par 'dzin pa'i bsod nams gang yin pa// sangs rgyas ye shes kyis ni bsngags pa de// sems can kun gyis bskal mang brjod mi nus//
72a2(rgyud 'bum): gang dag rtag tu sangs rgyas byang chub rnams// brjod cing mchod pa byed pa de dag dang // la la gzhan 'gas mdo sde 'di nyid las// yi ge 'bru gcig tsam yang legs bris na// de la
72a3(rgyud 'bum): bsod nams snga ma de yis ni/ / de yi brgya stong char yang mi phod do// de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis
72a4(rgyud 'bum): 'di skad ces gsol to/ / bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la dad de/ me tog dang / bdug pa dang / spos dang // me tog 'phreng dang / byug pa
72a5(rgyud 'bum): dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan rnams kyis mngon par mchod pa dang / chos smra ba de dag dang / 'dri ba rnams dang / 'dzin pa rnams la mchod pa chen pos mchod pa gyid pa de dag ni/
72a6(rgyud 'bum): tshe 'di nyid la yon tan dang phan yon mang po thob par 'gyur te/ de'i lus la mig nad dang / rna ba'i nang dang / sna nad dang / lce nad dang / rims nad dang / dug dang / mtshon dang / mes mi tshugs
72a7(rgyud 'bum): lags so/ / de dag la pha mas yid bde ba dang / bu dang chung mas yid bde ba dang / khyim gyis yid bde ba 'byung bar 'gyur lags so// g.yul 'gyed pa thams cad du'ang rgyal bar 'gyur ro//
72b1(rgyud 'bum): 'gum pa'i tshe'ang de bzhin gshegs pa mi 'khrugs pas yang dag par dbugs 'byin par mdzad de/ kye mi khyod tshur shog/ 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du song zhig/ skyes bu chen po khyod ni dge ba'i rtsa ba
72b2(rgyud 'bum): 'bar ba dang ldan te/ gang du 'dod pa'i gnas rnams su skye bar 'gyur ro zhes gsung ngo // de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis 'di skad ces gsol to//
72b3(rgyud 'bum): bcom ldan 'das legs so legs so// de bzhin gshegs pas 'dzam bu'i gling du bzhag pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'phrin las bgyid pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das rig sngags chen mo 'di ni
72b4(rgyud 'bum): las thams cad rnam par dag par bgyid pa lags so/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu 'di ni sems can bsod nams chung ngu dag gi yul na spyod par mi 'gyur ro// sems
72b5(rgyud 'bum): can bsod nan chung ngu dag gis thos par mi 'gyur ro/ / lag tu 'ong bar mi 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas kyi mthus gang gi lag tu 'ongs sam/ de bzhin gshegs pas nyan du bcug na/ des thos pa'i
72b6(rgyud 'bum): mod kho na la bri bar bya/ / yi ger 'drir gzhug par bya// bklag par bya'o// rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa dang 'dra ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i ming tsam thos na'ang ngan 'gros 'jigs
72b7(rgyud 'bum): par mi 'gyur ro/ / la la zhig gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di las yig 'bru gcig tsam mam/ ming tsamanyan du bcug gam/ phyogs sam/ yul 'ga' zhig tu lung 'bog par byed na/
72b8(rgyud 'bum): rig sngags chen mo'o/
73a1(rgyud 'bum): de bzhin gshegs pa bdun po rnams kyis bsrungs so// byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis rjes su yi rang ngo // lha thams cad kyis rjes su bzung ngo // yongs
73a2(rgyud 'bum): su bskyangs so/ / chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi pha ma lta bu'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rjes 'di skad ces gsol to//
73a3(rgyud 'bum): bcom ldan 'das slad ma'i dus slad ma'i tshe/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par thams cad rdzogs par gang du spyod par 'gyur lags// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
73a4(rgyud 'bum): rigs kyi bu chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho'i gnas dang / sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams kyi gnas su thams cad rdzogs par gnas par 'gyur ro// lho phyogs su'ang spyod par
73a5(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur ro/ / 'dzam bu'i gling du ni cung zad tsam gnas par 'gyur te/ gnas kha cig kha cig tu spyod par 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' lag ni rdo rje la
73a6(rgyud 'bum): 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ / lag na rdo rje chos kyi rnam grangs 'di gzung bar bya ba dang / bklag par bya ba dang / mchod par bya ba dang / nyan du gzhug par bya ba'i phyir khyod la gtad do// de bzhin
73a7(rgyud 'bum): gshegs pa dang 'dra ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di nub par gyur ta re/ 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i bya ba byed pa yin no// de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rjes 'di skad ces
73b1(rgyud 'bum): gsol to/ / bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 'di gzung bar bgyi ba dang / bklag par bgyi ba dang / mchod par bgyi ba dang / nyan du gzhug par bgyi ba'i slad du bdag gis gzung lags so// /
73b2(rgyud 'bum): chos smra ba de dag la'ang mchod par bgyi/ rjed par bgyi'o// gang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di dang / chos smra ba de dag la mchod par bgyid pa de ni bdag la'ang mchod par bgyid pa lags te/ de bdag
73b3(rgyud 'bum): gis bsrung bar bgyi/ yongs su bskyang bar bgyi ste/ bdag ni de bzhin gshegs pa la bka' drin gzo bar bgyid do// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje la legs so/
73b4(rgyud 'bum): zhes bya ba byin nas/ lag na rdo rje legs so legs so// khyod kyis de ltar gyis shig/ de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis 'di skad ces
73b5(rgyud 'bum): gsol to/ / bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la phyag 'tshal lo// chos nyan pa de dag dang / yi ger 'dri ba rnams dang / 'dzin pa rnams dang / klog pa rnams dang / nyan du 'jug pa rnams
73b6(rgyud 'bum): la'ang mngon par mchod par bgyi'o/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te sems can bsod nams chung ngu dag gi yul du chos kyi rnam grangs 'di byung ngam/ gal te rgyal po chos dang mi ldan pa'i yul du chos kyi rnam
73b7(rgyud 'bum): grangs 'di byung ste spyod pa na/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la rgyal po mchod par mi bgyid/ dang par mi bgyid la/ chos smra ba de dag dang / yi ger 'dri ba rnams dang / 'dzin pa rnams dang / klog pa rnams dang /
74a1(rgyud 'bum): nyan du gzhug pa rnams dang / lung dpog pa rnams la'ang mchod par mi bgyid/ bla ma'i 'du shes skyed par mi bgyid na/ des na chos kyi rnam grangs 'dri nub par 'gyur lags
74a2(rgyud 'bum): so/ de'i yul du sdig pa'i chos mang po dang / yid mi bde ba mang po 'byung bar 'gyur te/ des na rgyal rigs rgyal po des bdag gi yul du chos nub par gyur to snyam du 'tshal bar bgyi ste/ des chos spyod par
74a3(rgyud 'bum): bgyi'o/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu logs so legs so// de ni de bzhin te/ rigs kyi bu dper na rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo dad pa can gang la la zhig gis
74a4(rgyud 'bum): de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed la lo brgya 'am/ lo stong gi bar du bla na med pa'i mchod pas mched pa byed la/ 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir rin po
74a5(rgyud 'bum): ches yongs su gang bar byas te/ nyan thos rnams dang rang sangs rgyas rnams la sbyin pa byin pa dang / bdag nyid yongs su gtong ba gang yin pa dang / chung ma dang / bu dang / bu mo yongs su
74a6(rgyud 'bum): gtong ba gang yin pa dang / gang gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di mchod pa 'am/ yi ger 'dri ba'am/ yi ger 'drir 'jug pa'am/ klog pa'am/ me tog dang / bdug pa dang / spos dang
74a7(rgyud 'bum): me tog 'phreng rnams kyis mchod de/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i phyir/ zho'i brgyad cha gcig tsam sbyin pa byin na// de ni de bas ches bsod nams pang du bskyed par 'gyur// dge pa'i rtsa bsngam sa
74b1(rgyud 'bum): de ni brgya'i char yang nye bar mi phod na/ gang bla ma'i 'du shes bskyed de/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan rnams kyis mchod pa byed cing / chos smra ba de dag la'ang
74b2(rgyud 'bum): gos sam/ rgyan nam/ gdugs sam/ bzhon pa 'am/ grong khyer ram/ sa gzhi ba lang gi rmig rjes tsam yang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i phyir sbyin pa byed la/ lus 'di ni snying po
74b3(rgyud 'bum): med pa'o snyam du shes shing rmi lam lta bu'o/ / sgyu ma lta bu dang / chu'i chu bur lta bu'o snyam du shes te/ lus 'di la ni snying po med do// chos thams cad ni mi rtag pa'o snyam du shes na
74b4(rgyud 'bum): de ni de bzhin gshegs pas lung bstan pa kho na yin no/ / de bzhin gshegs pas dbugs phyung ba kho na yin no// des ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mchod pa yin no// phyis kyang mthar
74b5(rgyud 'bum): gyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi bar du mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro/ / de nas de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang / lha'i dbang po rnams
74b6(rgyud 'bum): dang / klu'i dbang po rnams dang / gnod sbyin gyi dbang po rnams dang / lha ma yin gyi dbang po rnams dang / nam mkha' lding gi dbang po rnams dang / mi'i dbang po rnams kyis tshig
74b7(rgyud 'bum): mthun par/ bcom ldan 'das la legs so zhes bya ba gsol te/ bcom ldan 'das legs so legs so// 'di ni chos kyi 'khor lo lan gnyis bskor bar gyur to// bcom ldan
75a1(rgyud 'bum): @'das bdag cag kyang gcig tu mthun par bgyis te/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la mchod par bgyi'o// yul de'ang bskyang bar bgyi'o// chos smra ba de la'ang mchod
75a2(rgyud 'bum): par bgyi/ bsrung bar bgyi/ lung bstan par bgyi/ dbugs dbyung bar bgyi'o// gang la la chos smra ba dang / yi ger 'dri ba dang / 'dzin pa dang / klog pa de la bla ma'i 'du shes bskyed
75a3(rgyud 'bum): pa dang / pha'i 'du shes dang / bu'i 'du shes bskyed pa de la ni/ bdag cag gis pha'i 'du shes bskyed par bgyi'o// gal te chos kyi rnam grangs de ma rungs par bgyid na ni/ de'i yul
75a4(rgyud 'bum): thams cad du bu dang / mchis brang dang / pha mos yid mi bde bar 'gyur la/ de'i 'og tu sems can dmyal bar skye bar 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ byang chub
75a5(rgyud 'bum): sems dpa' de dag dang lha'i dbang po nas/ mi'i dbang po'i bar de dag la legs so legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ rigs kyi bu dag legs so legs so// grogs po dag khyed kyis de ltar
75a6(rgyud 'bum): gyis shig/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di nyan du gzhug pa dang mchod par bya ba'i phyir khyed la gtad do// de bzhin gshegs pa dang 'dra ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di myur du nub par gyur ta re/
75a7(rgyud 'bum): la zhig gis spangs te sems can dmyal bar lhung nga re/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni skye bo mang po la phan pa dang / skye bo mang po la bde bar 'gyur ba'o// khyod kyis 'gyod par gyur te/
75b1(rgyud 'bum): re/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bstan pa na sa chen po 'di g.yos te/ g.yos/ rab tu g.yos/ srog chags drug stong ni len pa med par zag pa rnams las sems rnam par grol lo// de nas/
75b2(rgyud 'bum): bcom ldan 'das la/ byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das gang lal chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yi ger 'dri ba dang /
75b3(rgyud 'bum): yi ger 'drir stsol ba dang / 'dzin pa dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par bgyid pa dang / gzhan dag la'ang rgyas par yang dag par ston pa dang / me tog dang / bdug pa dang / spos dang / me tog
75b4(rgyud 'bum): 'phreng dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / gos dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan rnams kyis mchod par bgyid na/ bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de
75b5(rgyud 'bum): bsod nams ji snyed cig skyed par 'gyur lags/ gang du ni skye bar 'gyur lags/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la
75b6(rgyud 'bum): legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ rigs kyi bu legs so legs so// khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa la 'di zhus pa ni legs so// rigs kyi bu de'i phyir legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung
75b7(rgyud 'bum): zhig dang / ngas khyod la bshad do// rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yi ger 'dri ba dang / yi ger 'drir 'jug pa dang / 'dzin pa dang / klog pa dang /
76a1(rgyud 'bum): kun chub par byed pa dang / gzhan dag la'ang rgyas par yang dag par ston pa dang / me tog dang / bdug pa dang / me tog 'phreng dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang /
76a2(rgyud 'bum): gos dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan rnams kyis mchod pa byed pa de ni/ 'di nas shi 'phos nas 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du skye bar 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu gang la las
76a3(rgyud 'bum): stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rin po ches yongs su gang bar byas te/ nyan thos rnams dang rang sangs rgyas rnams la sbyin pa byin pa bas ni/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'dzin
76a4(rgyud 'bum): pa dang / mchod pa dang / yi ger 'dri ba dang / yi ger 'drir 'jug pa dang / chos smra ba de dag la'ang me tog dang / bdug pa dang / spos dang / me tog 'phreng dang / byug pa la sogs
76a5(rgyud 'bum): pas mchod pa 'di rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams ches mang du 'phel bar 'gyur gyi/ rigs kyi bu snga ma gang yin pa de ni de snyed bsags pa ma yin no// rigs kyi bu
76a6(rgyud 'bum): 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang gis byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa spyad de/ bu dang / bu mo dang / chung ma yongs su gtong ba dang / lag pa dang / rkang pa dang / mig dang /
76a7(rgyud 'bum): mgo bo yongs su gtong ba bas ni/ gang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la yi ger 'dri ba 'am/ yi ger 'drir 'jug gam/ klog gam/ dad par byed pa 'di bsod nams ches mang du 'phel
76b1(rgyud 'bum): bar 'gyur gyi/ rigs kyi bu snga ma gang yin pa des ni de snyed bsags pa ma yin no// chos smra ba'i rigs kyi bu de ni de bzhin gshegs pa dang 'dra ba kho nar blta bar bya'o// de bzhin gshegs
76b2(rgyud 'bum): pa dang 'dra ba kho nar mchod pa mngon par 'du bya bar bya'o/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis 'di skad
76b3(rgyud 'bum): ces gsol to/ / bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis phyag bgyi ba'i 'os lags so// chos smra ba de la phyag bgyi ba dang /
76b4(rgyud 'bum): mchod par bgyi ba'i 'os lags so// bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni rdzu 'phrul che ba lags te/ de bas na rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo dad pa can gyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di
76b5(rgyud 'bum): la gus par bgyi ste mnyan par bgyi'o/ / gus par bgyi ste yid la bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das sa phyogs gang na chos kyi rnam grangs 'di spyod pa'i sa phyogs de ni/ de bzhin gshegs pas byin
76b6(rgyud 'bum): gyis brlabs pa lags so/ / sa phyogs de ni mchod rten du gyur par blta bar bgyi'o// sa phyogs de ni lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis phyag bgyi ba'i gnas
76b7(rgyud 'bum): lags so/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ rigs kyi bu sa phyogs de ni lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten
77a1(rgyud 'bum): gyis phyag bgyi ba'i gnas yin no/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis 'di skad
77a2(rgyud 'bum): ces gsol to/ / bcom ldan 'das gang la la chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la'ang mchod pa bgyid la/ 'di'i slad du mchod pa dang bkur sti la brtson pa'i sems kyis sbyin pa yungs 'bru tsam stsal na/
77a3(rgyud 'bum): de'i mtshams med pa lnga'i las rnams yongs su zad par 'gyur la/ bskal pa dgu khri'i bar du longs spyod che ba'i rigs rnams su skye bar 'gyur ro// bskal pa brgyad khri'i bar du 'khor los sgyur
77a4(rgyud 'bum): ba'i rgyal por 'gyur ro/ / sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa rnams su skye bar 'gyur ro// gshis ngan du 'gum par mi 'gyur ro// ngan song du skye bar mi 'gyur ro// bsam pa thams
77a5(rgyud 'bum): cad yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la 'di skad ces bka' stsal te/
77a6(rgyud 'bum): rigs kyi bu sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na bskal pa bgrang ba las 'das pa na/ de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi ye shes mtha' yas po chags pa med cing rdul dang bral ba'i rgyal po'i tog ces bya ba
77a7(rgyud 'bum): byung ste/ der ngas bram ze'i gzugs kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos so// thos nas kyang sems can rnams la bshad do// de ngas rnyed pa'i mong la chos bzod pa thob ste/ chos rnams la chos kyi
77b1(rgyud 'bum): mig rnam par dag go/ / sems can gang dag gis thos pa de dag thams cad kyang ngan song thams cad las yongs su grol te/ nams kyang ngan song du mi 'gro bar 'gyur la/ chos rnams la chos
77b2(rgyud 'bum): kyi mig rnam par dag ste/ sems can de dag thams cad mthar gyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so// mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar
77b3(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur ro/ / rigs kyi bu ngas kyang lo mang po/ lo brgya phrag mang po/ le stong phrag mang po/ lo 'bum phrag mang por sems can 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug gis dkris pa
77b4(rgyud 'bum): rnams kyi phyir/ nor dang / 'bru dang / 'gron bu dang / gser yongs su gtong ba byas nas/ mthar gyis lag pa dang / rkang pa dang / mig dang / mgo bo dang / sdug pa'i bu dang / chung
77b5(rgyud 'bum): ma dang / bu mo'i bar du yongs su gtong ba byas so// rkang dang rus pa yongs su gtong ba dang / khyim dang / grong dang / grong khyer dang / grong rdal dang / yul 'khor dang / rgyal po'i pho
77b6(rgyud 'bum): brang yongs su gtong ba byas so/ / lo 'bum phrag du mar tshangs par spyod pa spyad do// khyim pa dang 'dris par ma byas/ rgyal srid la dga' ba dang / nor la dga' ba dang / yul 'khor dang
77b7(rgyud 'bum): brang 'khor la dga' ba dang / bu dang bu mo la dga' ba dang / chung ma la dga' bar ma byas so// gcig tu nges par tshangs par spyod pa la gnas pa bsten to// gcig tu nges par sbyin pa byin
78a1(rgyud 'bum): nor gcig tu nges par sangs rgyas dang / chos dang / dge 'dun rnams la mchod pa dang bsnyen bkur byas so// gcig tu nges par yang chos smra ba rnams la me tog
78a2(rgyud 'bum): dang / bdug pa dang / spos dang / me tog 'phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / gos dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan rnams kyis bkur stir byas/ bla mar byas/ ri mor byas
78a3(rgyud 'bum): mchod par byas so/ / dge ba'i bshes gnyen mang po'ang ngas bsnyen bkur byas so// de'ang ngas 'khor ba la skyo ba'i lugs kyis lus rnams byin la/ mig rnams dang / rang gi sha rnams dang /
78a4(rgyud 'bum): rkang dang rus pa rnams dang / rang gi pags pa rnams kyang byin na/ phyi rol gyi dngos po gzhan dag lta ci smos te/ nga 'gyod par gyur pa'ang med do// de nas byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang / lha'i
78a5(rgyud 'bum): dbang po rnams dang / klu'i dbang po rnams dang / gnod sbyin gyi dbang po rnams dang / lha ma yin gyi dbang po rnams dang / mi'i dbang po rnams dang / spyod pa pa dang / kun tu rgyu dang / gcer bu pa
78a6(rgyud 'bum): rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i sngon gyi tshul 'di thos nas/ chos kyi shugs kyis mchi ma blags te/ de dag thams cad kyis bzod pa thob par gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal
78a7(rgyud 'bum): pa/ grogs po dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di zung zhig/ 'di ni sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i bya ba byed pa yin no// de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ byang chub sems dpa' 'phags
78b1(rgyud 'bum): baspyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis 'di skad ces gsol to/ / bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la dad pa dang / mchod par bgyid pa dang / 'dzin pa dang / klog pa dang / kun chub
78b2(rgyud 'bum): par bgyid pa'i sems can de dag ni dkon lags so/ / gang dag gi sug par mchis pa de dag ni sangs rgyas byung ba dang 'dra bar blta bar bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
78b3(rgyud 'bum): rigs kyi bu legs so legs so// rigs kyi bu de de bzhin te/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la mchod par byed pa dang / yi ger 'dri ba dang / yi ger 'drir
78b4(rgyud 'bum): 'jug pa dang / 'dzin pa dang / klog pa dang / chos smra ba de dag la'ang me tog dang / bdug pa dang / spos dang / me tog 'phreng dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / gos dang / gdugs dang
78b5(rgyud 'bum): rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan rnams kyis mchod pa byed pa de dag ni dkon te/ de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa dang 'dra ba kho nar blta bar bgyi'o// rigs kyi bu sems can gang dag chos kyi rnam
78b6(rgyud 'bum): grangs 'di la mchod par mi byed pa dang / 'dzin par mi byed pa dang / klog par mi byed pa dang / sbyin pa mi byed pa dag 'byung bar 'gyur te/ de dag ni bskal pa du ma dang / bskal pa brgya dang /
78b7(rgyud 'bum): bskal pa stong gi bar du 'khor ban la lo bar 'gyur te/ sdug bsngal mang po sdug bsngal brgya dag nyams su myong bar 'gyur ro// 'di lta ste/ dper na bud med sbrum ma zhig yod la/ bud med sbrum mdzen
79a1(rgyud 'bum): lton bu chags pa de'ang / khye'u 'am bu mo zhig tu gyur na/ bud med de'i bu de gang gi tshe zla ba gcig lon nam/ zla ba gnyis lon nam/ zla ba gsum len nam
79a2(rgyud 'bum): zla ba lnga lon nam/ zla ba tshang ba'i bar du gyur pa de tsam du bud med de'i lus non par gyur te/ tshogs kyang 'bye bar 'gyur/ lto 'ong chung bar 'gyur/ skad kyi bcom yang chung bar 'gyur te/ tshor ba de
79a3(rgyud 'bum): dag gis yongs su gzir ba'i lus kyis de tsam gyi sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba myong bzhin du lus 'dzin par byed de/ bu btsa' ba'i dus kyi bar du sems can dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal myong ngo // de 'di snyam
79a4(rgyud 'bum): du sems te/ gang gi tshe bdag gi bu btsa' bar gyur pa de'i tshe/ bdag bde bar btsas par gyur na/ de'i tshe tshangs par smad par bya'o snyam mo// de phyis yang 'dod pa'i 'dod chags kyis chags par gyur na//
79a5(rgyud 'bum): sdug bsngal de dag phyis mi dran te/ bde ba'i 'du shes skyed par byed do// de bzhin du phyi ma'i tshe phyi ma'i dus na/ sems can 'byung bar 'gyur ba de dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la dad par mi byed/
79a6(rgyud 'bum): mchod par mi byed/ 'dzin par mi byed/ klog par mi byed/ de dag sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten rnams su skye bar 'gyur ro// de dag
79a7(rgyud 'bum): kyang 'dod chags kyis myos nas tshor ba de dag bzod par 'gyur te/ bdag cag gis khyim dang bu smang yongs su bskyang bar bya'o// chung ma dang / bu dang / bu mo yongs su bskyang bar bya'o snyam
79b1(rgyud 'bum): mo/ / gang gi tshe'ang sems can dmyal bar skye ba de'i tshe ni 'gyod par 'gyur ro// gang gi tshe phyir thar par gyur pa de'i tshe ni/ 'dod chags kyis chags nas sems can dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal
79b2(rgyud 'bum): brjed par 'gyur te/ sbyin pa'ang sbyin par mi byed/ tshul khrims kyang srung bar mi byed do// 'di lta ste/ dper na mi chang gis ra ro zhing myos te/ tshabs cher ro zhing myos la/ gtu lum par
79b3(rgyud 'bum): gyur nas/ mi de sems kyis kyang khyim 'tshol mi nus/ lam yang mi 'tshal/ pha ma dang / chung ma dang / bu dang / bu mo'i 'du shes kyang med/ sangs rgyas dang / chos dang / dge 'dun
79b4(rgyud 'bum): yang mi dran te/ de chang gis myos pa de'i mthus dur khrod na 'dug na'ang 'jigs pa med la/ 'di snyam du sems te/ lha 'am/ klu 'am/ gnod sbyin nga skrag par byed nus pa su zhig long snyam
79b5(rgyud 'bum): mo/ / de bong ba dang / shing dang / rtswa dang / tsher ma'i mal gzhan dag la bde ba'i 'du shes bskyed pa las lus sor chud cing / ra ri ba de sangs na sa gang gi tshe dran pa rnyed par gyur pa de'i tshe 'gyod
79b6(rgyud 'bum): par byed de/ bdag ni srog la thug kyang bla/ bdag gis chang ni btung bar mi bya'o snyam mo// de bzhin du sems can 'dod chags kyis brgyags shing khyim na gnas pas rnam par 'khrul pa nor gyis
79b7(rgyud 'bum): sems myos pa rnams kyis ni/ sangs rgyas dang / chos dang / dge 'dun yang yongs su 'tshol bar mi byed/ sbyin pa'ang mi dran/ mtho ris su skye ba dang / rgyal por 'gyur ba dang
80a1(rgyud 'bum): sangs rgyas kyi zhing du skye ba'ang yongs su 'tshol bar mi byed de/ 'khor ba de nyid na 'khor zhing / sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i
80a2(rgyud 'bum): 'jig rten rnams su skyes pa'i sdug bsngal myong bar 'gyur la/ 'di snyam du 'dzin te/ bdag gi lus ni bde sde/ sdug bsngal ba med do snyam mo// gang gi tshe sems can dmyal ba dang
80a3(rgyud 'bum): dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten de dag nas thar te/ brgya la brgya lam na mi'i lus thob par gyur pa de'i tshe/ mngal na gnas pas lus yongs su gzir cing mun nag gis
80a4(rgyud 'bum): kyang yongs su skyo/ mngal du skye bar gyur pa'i lus bang kan dang / mkhris pa dang / ldan ljin dang / khrag dang / phyi sa sa brtags pas skyo bar gyur nas 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag cag
80a5(rgyud 'bum): lo brgya 'am/ bskal pa 'am/ bskal pa brgya 'am/ bskal pa stong ngam/ bskal pa 'bum gyi bar du 'khor ba na 'khor zhing / sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba mi bzang cing yid du mi 'ong ba'i
80a6(rgyud 'bum): sdug bsngal myong la/ gang du'ang bdag cag gis skyabs med pa 'di las gang dag gi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa yin zhig gu/ bdag cag gis kyang sngon sdig pa mang du byas so snyam ste/ de ltar
80a7(rgyud 'bum): mngal na gnas nas sems can dmyal ba dang 'dra bar 'gyod pa skyed par byed de/ gang gi tshe bdag cag mngal na gnas pa'i sems can dmyal ba 'di las thar bar gyur pa de'i tshe ni sangs rgyas dang /
80b1(rgyud 'bum): chos dang / dge 'dun la mi phyed pa'i dad pas sgrub pa dang btsal bar bya ste/ ci nas kyang bdag phyin chad mngal gyi sems can dmyal bar mi 'gyur bar bya'o snyam mo// de dag phyis mngal gyi gnas
80b2(rgyud 'bum): nas thar nas bag med par byed de/ de dag yang sems can dmyal ba rnams su sdug bsngal myong bar 'gyur ro// de lta bas nA nams kyang bag med par mi bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ tshe dang
80b3(rgyud 'bum): ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to/ / bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i ming ci lags/ 'di ji ltar gzung bar bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun
80b4(rgyud 'bum): dga' bo de'i phyir chos kyi rnam grangs 'di sems can thams cad kyi skyabs byed pa zhes bya bar zung zhig/ byang chub sems dpas zhus pa zhes bya bar yang zung zhig/ bkod pa'i rgyal po'i rnam par
80b5(rgyud 'bum): 'phrul pa'i rgyal po zhes bya bar yang zung zhig/ de bzhin gshegs pas mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa zhes bya bar yang zung zhig/ chos thams cad kyi yon tan bkod pa'i rgyal po zhes bya bar
80b6(rgyud 'bum): yang zung zhig/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang / nyan thos chen po de dag dang / brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong
80b7(rgyud 'bum): ba de dag thams cad dang / thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dag dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa lo/
81a1(rgyud 'bum): mngon par bstod do// 'phags pa chos thams cad kyi yon tan bkod pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so//
81a2(rgyud 'bum): rgya gar gyi mkhan po pradz+nyA barma dang / su ren+d+ra bo d+hi dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba ban d+he ye shes sde la sogs pas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa// / @rgya
81a3(rgyud 'bum): gar skad du/ Ar+ya a gra pra dI pa d+hA ra Ni bi d+ha rA dza/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa rigs sngags kyi rgyal po sgron ma mchog gi gzungs/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal
81a4(rgyud 'bum): lo/ / 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig ni/ bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na/ dge slong stong nyis brgya lnga bcu'i dge slong gi
81a5(rgyud 'bum): dge 'dun chen po dang / lha dang mi 'bum phrag du ma dang / byang chub sems dpa' 'bum phrag du ma dang thabs cig tu bzhugs te/ yongs su bskor cing mdun gyis bltas nas chos ston to// sangs
81a6(rgyud 'bum): rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba phrag stong 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams me tog mtha' yas zhes bya ba de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
81a7(rgyud 'bum): sgron ma mchog ces bya ba nga ltar bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gnas la chos kyang ston pa des/ byang chub sems dpa' 'od chen po dang / 'od dpag med ces bya ba byang chub sems dpa' gnyis 'jig rten gyi
81b1(rgyud 'bum): khams mi mjed 'dir btang ngo / / de nas byang chub sems dpa' de gnyis rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba ga la ba dang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa
81b2(rgyud 'bum): dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba
81b3(rgyud 'bum): byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ / phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas byang chub sems dpa' de gnyis kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi/
81b4(rgyud 'bum): zhing bye ba phrag 'bum 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams me tog mtha' yas zhes bgyi ba de na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sgron ma'i
81b5(rgyud 'bum): mchog ces bgyi ba da ltar bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston to/ / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sgron ma'i mchog des/
81b6(rgyud 'bum): bdag cag gnyis 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'dir btang ste/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sgron ma'i mchog des/ bcom ldan 'das
81b7(rgyud 'bum): la gnod pa chung ngam/ nyam nga ba nyung ngam/ bskyod pa yang ngam/ 'tsho 'am/ stobs dang / bde ba dang / kha na ma tho ba ma mchis pa la reg par gnas sam zhes bsnyun gsol lo// de skad
82a1(rgyud 'bum): ces kyang gsung ngo / / 'di na mi 'am/ mi ma lags pa 'am/ 'byung po 'am/ sha za 'am/ gnod sbyin nam/ srin po 'am/ grul bum mam/ grul bum gyi sde dpon nam/
82a2(rgyud 'bum): rgyal po 'am/ blon po chen po 'am/ chom rkun nam/ sbrul lam/ srin bu 'am/ srin bu lu ta 'am/ sbrang bu lcags phye 'am/ nye ba'i nyon mongs pa gang yang rung ba bdag la 'tshe bar bgyid pa
82a3(rgyud 'bum): 'ga' yang ma mchis sam zhes gsung ngo / / sems can rnams kyi don dang / sman pa dang / bde ba dang / mdangs dang ldan par bgyi ba dang / gzi brjid dang ldan par bgyi ba dang / grags pa
82a4(rgyud 'bum): dang ldan par bgyi ba dang / yon tan dang ldan par bgyi ba dang / stobs dang ldan par bgyi ba dang / mdog dang ldan par bgyi ba dang / bsrung ba dang / sba ba dang / bskyab pa'i slad du bcom ldan 'das
82a5(rgyud 'bum): / de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sgron ma'i mchog des gzungs kyi gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag kyang bskur te/ 'di lta ste/ dz+wa le dz+wa le/ dz+wa le ga te/ huk+ku/
82a6(rgyud 'bum): muk+ku/ sa ma te/ ma hA saM ma te/ ma hA dz+wa le/ dzA ba la me/ sa he sa he/ ma hA dzA le/ uk+ke muk+ke/ sha me/ saM ma he/ ma hA saM ma te/ ma hA sha me swA hA/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/
82a7(rgyud 'bum): tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo khyod kyis gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag zung zhig/ long zhig/ chongs shig/ lhogs shig/ kun chub par gyis shig/
82b1(rgyud 'bum): gzhan dag la'ang rgya cher rab tu ston cig/ kun dga' bo sangs rgyas 'byung ba rnyed par dka' 'o// gzungs kyi gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag rnyed par dka' 'o// kun dga' bo gzungs kyi
82b2(rgyud 'bum): gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag 'dzin pa'ang shin tu rnyed par dka' 'o/ / kun dga' bo rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la gzungs kyi gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag 'dzin pa dang / len pa
82b3(rgyud 'bum): dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / gzhan dag la'ang rgya cher rab tu ston pa de ni tshe rabs bdun du tshe rabs dran par 'gyur ro// tshe 'di nyid la'ang sngon gyi las
82b4(rgyud 'bum): ma gtogs par gzhan gyi gnod pa thams cad las yang dag par 'da' ba dang / 'gro ba thams cad dang rjes su mthun par 'gyur ro// kun dga' bo gzungs kyi gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag ni
82b5(rgyud 'bum): sangs rgyas bye ba phrag bdun cu rtsa bdun gyis gsungs te/ gang gzungs kyi gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag las 'da' bar byed la de ni de dag thams cad la 'khus pa yin no// de nas byang chub sems
82b6(rgyud 'bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po ma pham pa stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der logs su thal mo
82b7(rgyud 'bum): sbyar ba btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis kyang sems can rnams kyi don dang / sman pa dang / bde ba dang / mdangs dang ldan par bgyi ba
83a1(rgyud 'bum): dang / gzi brjid dang ldan par bgyi ba dang / grags pa dang ldan par bgyi ba dang / yon tan dang ldan par bgyi ba dang / stobs dang ldan par bgyid dang / mdog dang ldan pa
83a2(rgyud 'bum): bgyi ba dang / bsrung ba dang / swa ba dang / bskyab pa'i slad du gzungs kyi gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di rnams brjod par bgyi'o// 'di ltaste/ at+te bat+te/ nat+te/ kun// pu ka sI/
83a3(rgyud 'bum): kasaM/ ka se/ a na kaM sa/ nA ma ka sa/ a nu tra/ pra ru tu/ kha~Mdz+re/ mahA kha dze/ sang ba pe/ ta Da pe/ tu ra be/ tu ra be/ hi la mi li/ ti le swAH/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis
83a4(rgyud 'bum): tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo khyod kyis gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dgazung zhig/ long zhig/ chongs shig/ lhags shig/ kun chub par gyis shig
83a5(rgyud 'bum): gzhan dag la'ang rgya cher yang dag par rab tu ston cig/ kun dga' bo sangs rgyas 'byung ba rnyed par dka' 'o// sa rtse gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag rnyed par dka' 'o// kun dga' bo gzungs
83a6(rgyud 'bum): kyi gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag 'dzin pa'ang shin tu rnyed par dka' 'o/ / kun dga' bo rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la gzungs kyi gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag 'dzin pa dang
83a7(rgyud 'bum): len pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / gzhan dag la'ang rgya cher rab tu ston pa de ni che rabs bcu gnyis su tshe rabs dran par 'gyur ro// tshe nga nyid la'
83b1(rgyud 'bum): sngon gyi las ma gtogs par gzhan gyi gnod pa thams cad las yang dag par 'da' ba dang / 'gro ba thams cad rjes su mthun par 'gyur ro// kun dga' bo gzungs kyi gsang sngags kyi
83b2(rgyud 'bum): gzhi 'di dag ni sangs rgyas bye ba phrag brgyad cu rtsa gnyis kyis gsungs te/ gang gzungs kyi gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag las yang 'da' bar byed pa ni de dag thams cad la 'khus pa yin no//
83b3(rgyud 'bum): de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa stan las langs te/ gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der logs su thal
83b4(rgyud 'bum): mo sbyar ba btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis kyang sems can rnams kyi don dang / phan pa dang / bde ba dang / mdangs dang ldan
83b5(rgyud 'bum): par bgyi ba dang / gzi brjid dang ldan par bgyi ba dang / grags pa dang ldan par bgyi ba dang / yon tan dang ldan par bgyi ba dang / stobs dang ldan par bgyi ba dang / mdog dang ldan par
83b6(rgyud 'bum): bgyi ba dang / bsrung ba dang / sba ba dang / bskyab pa'i slad du gzungs kyi gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di rnams brjod par bgyi'o// 'di lta ste/ ag khe/ bag khe/ na dzi te/ nA gA sa re/ na hI li/
83b7(rgyud 'bum): dza hi li/ dza hi li be hi/ tsa DI la ba te swA hA/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo khyod kyis gzungs kyi gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di
84a1(rgyud 'bum): dag zung zhig/ long zhig/ chongs shig/ lhogs shig/ gzhan dag la'ang rgya cher rab tu ston cig/ kun dga' bo sangs rgyas 'byung ba rnyed par dka' 'o//
84a2(rgyud 'bum): gzungs kyi gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag rnyed par dka' 'o// kun dga' bo gzungs kyi gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag 'dzin pa'ang shin tu rnyed par dka' 'o// kun dga' bo rigs kyi bu 'am/
84a3(rgyud 'bum): rigs kyi bu mo gang la las gzungs kyi gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag 'dzin pa dang / len pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / gzhan dag la'ang rgya cher rab tu
84a4(rgyud 'bum): ston pa de ni cha rabs bcu gsum du tshe rabs dran par 'gyur ro/ / tshe 'di nyid la'ang sngon gyi las ma gtogs pa gzhan gyi gnod pa thams cad las yang dag par 'da' ba dang / 'gro ba thams
84a5(rgyud 'bum): cad dang rjes su mthun par 'gyur ro/ / kun dga' bo gzungs kyi gas sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag ni sangs rgyas bye ba phrag brgyad cu rtsa gnyis kyis gsungs te/ gang gzungs kyi gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di
84a6(rgyud 'bum): dag las 'da' bar byed pa ga thams cad la 'khus pa yin no/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag ngas kyang sems can rnams kyi
84a7(rgyud 'bum): don dang / phan pa dang / bde ba dang / mdangs dang ldan par bya ba dang / gzi brjid dang ldan par bya ba dang / grags pa dang ldan par bya ba dang / yon tan dang ldan par bya ba dang /

84b2(rgyud 'bum): baT+Ta/ naD+h+we/ ku nan+te/ Ta ke e Da ke/ ta ta be/ tu Da be/ ra Ta ke/ lo laM/ hu le/ hi lo/ mi le/ ti la/ shI le/ shI la/ an+te/ ba D+he/ na D+he/ ku na D+h+we/ a Da ba ti/
84b3(rgyud 'bum): ba Ne ba tI/ ka se ka se ka se/ pha se pha sa pha se/ ma hA pha se pha se swA hA/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsaya pa/ kun dga' bo khyod kyis gzungs

85a3(rgyud 'bum): kyi gzhi 'di dag shing skam po gsher bag med pa la bsrung ba bya ste/ yongs su bskyab pa dang / yongs su gzung ba dang / bcing ba dang / zhi ba dang / bde legs su 'gyur ba byas

85a6(rgyud 'bum): dang ldan par bya ba dang / gzi brjid dang ldan par bya ba dang / grags pa dang ldan par bya ba dang / yon tan dang ldan par bya ba dang / stobs dang ldan par bya ba dang / mdog dang ldan par bya/

85b1(rgyud 'bum): ta ra ma ti/ Tu Ta maTe/ Tu Ta ma Te/ Tu Ta ma Te/ Tu Da Tu re/ su re hi li mu le ti me swA hA/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo

85b6(rgyud 'bum): thams cad las 'da' ba dang / 'gro ba thams cad dang rjes su mthun par 'gyur ro// gang la la zhig la bsrung ba byas na de la'ang 'byung po thams cad kyis mi tshugs so// lha dang /
85b7(rgyud 'bum): klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang / mi ma yin pa thams cad kyis mi tshugs so//

86a5(rgyud 'bum): cad dam/ byang thams cad dam/ ro langs thams cad kyis kyang mi tshugs so// kun dga' bo gzungs kyi gsang sngags kyi gni 'di dag ni sangs rgyas bye ba phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgus gsung

86a7(rgyud 'bum): 'dug na'ang yid la bya'o/ / chom rkun gyi nang na 'dug na'ang yid la bya'o// srin po'i nang na 'dug na'ang yid la bya'o// gcan gzan khro bo'i nang na 'dug na'ang yid la bya'o// 'brog dgon
86b1(rgyud 'bum): pa'i nang na 'dug na'ang yid la bya'o/ / klungs dang bgrod dka' ba na 'dug na'ang yid la bya'o// me'i nang na 'dug na'ang yid la bya'o// chu'i nang na 'dug na'ang yid la bya'o// de yid la
86b2(rgyud 'bum): byas pa de rnams 'jigs pa de dag thams cad mi 'byung ngo / / des dug zos pa thams cad kyang kha zas nyid du 'gyur ro// kun dga' bo gzungs kyi gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag 'dzin pa ni
86b3(rgyud 'bum): 'byung po thams cad kyis mi tshugs so/ / yi dgas thams cad dang / srul po thams cad dang / gshed byed thams cad dang / bsgyur ba'i las thams cad dang / byad thams cad dang /
86b4(rgyud 'bum): mi dang mi ma yin pa thams cad kyis mi tshugs te/ kun dga' bo mdor na de la gzhan gyi gnod pa thams cad kyis mi tshugs so// kun dga' bo gsad pa'i rig pa ni chad pas bral bar 'gyur ro//
86b5(rgyud 'bum): chad pas gcad pa'i rigs pa ni brdegs pas/ brdegs pa'i rigs pa ni brgyad pas/ brgyad pa'i rigs pa ni bsdigs pas/ bsdigs pa'i rigs pa ni mig tshugs su bltas pas thar
86b6(rgyud 'bum): par 'gyur ro/ / kun dga' bo gzungs kyi gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag gis gang la bsrung ba byas pa 'am/ yongs su bskyab pa 'am/ yongs su bzung bas bcings pa'am/ zhi ba dang bde
86b7(rgyud 'bum): legs su 'gyur ba byas pa gzhan du 'gyur ba de ni gnas med de/ lha dang bcas/ bdud dang bcas pa/ tshangs pa dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten dang / dge sbyong dang bram zer bcas pa'i skye dgu
87a1(rgyud 'bum): dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin gyi nang na'ang ngas ma mthong ngo // de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gzungs kyi gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag ni gnod pa dang / nad 'gro ba dang /
87a2(rgyud 'bum): 'khrug pa thams cad las nges par 'byung bar byin gyis brlabs pa'i phyir ro// de nas chos kyi rnam grangs 'di rdzogs pa'i rjes la/ rgyal po chen po bzhis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces
87a3(rgyud 'bum): gsol to/ / bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis kyang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di rgya cher rgyas par bgyi ba dang / chos smra ba de dag rjes su yongs su gzung ba dang / dam pa'i chos ci nas yun ring du gnas pa dang //
87a4(rgyud 'bum): bdud thams cad tshar gcod pa'i slad du gzungs kyi gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di rnams rjes su stsal bar 'tshal na/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de la legs so zhes bgyi ba gnang bar mdzad du gsol/
87a5(rgyud 'bum): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ rgyal po chen po bzhi la thugs brtse ba'i phyir cang mi gsung bar gyur pas gnang ste/ rgyal po chen po bzhi po de dag gis kyang bcom ldan 'das kyis cang mi gsung bar
87a6(rgyud 'bum): gyur pas gnang bar rig nas ched du brjod pa ched du brjod do/ / de ni 'di lta ste/ da nan+d+he/ de nan+te/ ma hA nan+te/ dzaM b+hA ne/ staM b+ha ne/ TA Te Ta Ta ne/ ma hA Ta Ta ne/ kuT+Te/ kurtA ne/ ma hA kurbAn
87a7(rgyud 'bum): d+har+m+ma le/ tsarma le swA hA/ bcom ldan 'das 'di dag ni gzungs 'di'i 'khor gyi tshig lta bur ganga' ba lags te/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la gzungs kyi gsang sngags kyi gan
87b1(rgyud 'bum): 'di dag 'dzin pa dang / bzlas te bton nas 'chang ba de ni sngon gyi las ma gtogs par gzhan gyi gnod pa thams cad las 'da' ba dang / 'gro ba thams cad dang rjes su mthun par 'gyur ro//
87b2(rgyud 'bum): de la ni dam pa'i chos thams cad yongs su gzung ba la'ang bar chad 'byung bar mi 'gyur lags so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ rgyal po chen po bzhi po dag la grogs pa dag khyed bstan pa
87b3(rgyud 'bum): yun ring du gnas par bya ba'i phyir zhugs pa legs sa lags so zhes bya 'byin no/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldas kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo khyod kyis de ngag
87b4(rgyud 'bum): rdzu 'phrul che bar 'gyur ba dang / phan yon che ba dang / byin che bar 'gyur ba'i phyir gzungs kyi chos kyi rnam grangs 'ang zung zhig/ long zhig/ chongs shig/ lhogs shig/ kun chub
87b5(rgyud 'bum): par gyis shig/ gzhan dag la'ang rgya cher rab tu ston cig/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das rgyas par bgyi ba'i slad du bdag gis bzung lags so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis
87b6(rgyud 'bum): don de nyid rgyas par bstan pa'i phyir/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to// gzungs sngags kyi ni mdo sde 'di// sangs rgyas kun gyis gsungs pa ste// sems can rnams
87b7(rgyud 'bum): la phan pa'i phyir/ / de ni ngas kyang bshad pa yin// gang zhig gzung sngags mdo sde 'di// 'dzin tam yang na klog byed pa// tshe rabs nyi shu rtsa gcig tu// de ni tshe rabs dran par 'gyur//
88a1(rgyud 'bum): gzung sngags 'di rjod byed de la// mi min gang yang rung ba dang / gnod sbyin grul bum srin po dag/ nams kyang bar chad mi byed do// gzungs sngags 'di rjod de la ni/
88a2(rgyud 'bum): 'dod khams dbang phyug gang yin pa// sdig can bdud de nam du yang // bar chad byed par mi 'gyur ro// gzung sngags 'di 'dzin byed de yi// pha ma dang ni phu nu dang // sring mo
88a3(rgyud 'bum): mdza' shes gnyen dag kyang / / log par ltung bar mi 'gyur ro// de phyir gzung sngags mdo sde 'di// 'jigs med gang gis thos gyur nas// gzungs sngags 'di rjod byed pa des//
88a4(rgyud 'bum): nams kyang 'jigs par mi bya'o// gzungs sngags 'di 'dzin byed de yi// bskal pa bye ba stong rnams su// sgrib pa'i las ni gang byas pa// zhag bdun gyis ni byang bar 'gyur// byang
88a5(rgyud 'bum): chub sems dpa'i bsod nams gang / / bskal pa bye bar bsgrubs pa kun// gzung sngags 'di 'dzin byed pa des// zhag bdun gyis ni zil gyis non// phyogs bzhi'i 'jig rten skyong ba
88a6(rgyud 'bum): po'i rgyal po chen po bzhi po dag/ lus ngan dang ni yul 'khor srung // mig mi bzang dang 'phags skyes po// kha dog ldan zhing grags dang ldan// 'khor bcas blon bcas de dag kyang //
88a7(rgyud 'bum): gzung sngags 'di ni rjong byed pa// de la rtag tu srung bar byed// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang / nyan thos chen po de dag dang
88b1(rgyud 'bum): 'phags pa byams pa dang / 'jam dpal la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams dang / rgyal po chen po bzhi dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar
88b2(rgyud 'bum): bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// 'phags pa rig sngags kyi rgyal po sgron ma mchog gi gzungs rdzogs so//
88b3(rgyud 'bum): / @rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya ma hA d+hA ra NI/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa gzungs chen mo/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/
88b4(rgyud 'bum): 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi 'tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na/ dge slong stong nyis brgya lnga bcu'i dge slong gi dge
88b5(rgyud 'bum): 'dun chen po dang thabs cig tu bzhugs te/ de'i tshe/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo grong khyer gnas bcas su dbyar gnas nas dbyar zla ba gsum 'das pa dang chos gos byas te/ chos gos zin nas
88b6(rgyud 'bum): lhung bzed dang chos gos thogs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song nas phyin pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ phyogs gcig tu
88b7(rgyud 'bum): 'dug nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// kun dga' bo khyod kyis sems can thams cad kyi don dang / phan pa dang / bde ba dang / stobs
89a1(rgyud 'bum): dang / gzi brjid kyi phyir gzungs chen po'i gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag zung zhig/ chongs shig/ long zhig/ lhogs shig/ kun chub par gyis shig/ yid la
89a2(rgyud 'bum): zung zhig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kun dga' bo gzungs chen po'i gsang sngags kyi gzhi rnams ni rnyed par dka' zhing / de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams
89a3(rgyud 'bum): 'jig rten du 'byung ba'ang rnyed par dka' ba'i phyir te/ dper na u dum ba ra'i me tog lta bu yin gyis/ zung zhig/ chongs shig/ long zhig/ lhogs shig/ yid la zung zhig/ kun
89a4(rgyud 'bum): chub par gyis shig/ kun dga' bo dad pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la gzungs chen po'i gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di 'chang ngam/ 'dzin tam/ klog gam/ yid la 'dzin tam/
89a5(rgyud 'bum): kun chub par byed na/ de mtshon gyis 'chi ba'i dus byed par mi 'gyur/ dug gis ma yin/ mes ma yin/ chus ma yin/ rgyal po'i chad pas ma yin te/ dus ma yin par 'chi ba'i dus byed
89a6(rgyud 'bum): par mi 'gyur ro/ / de lha dang / lha ma yin dang / klu dang / rlung lha dang / nam mkha' lding dang / dri za dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang /
89a7(rgyud 'bum): yi dgas dang / sha za dang / grul bum dang / srul po dang / lus srul po dang / byung po dang / brjed byed dang / smyo byed dang / gnon po dang / grib gnon dang / gshed byed dang /
89b1(rgyud 'bum): gnod byed dang / byad kyis mi tshugs/ de la mi dang mi ma yin pa rnam kyis mi tshugs/ de la rig pa'i las dang / ngag gi las dang / yid kyi las kyis mi tshugs/ de la rims nyin gcig pa
89b2(rgyud 'bum): dang nyin gnyis pa dang / nyin gsum pa dang / nyin bzhi pa dang / rtag pa'i rims dang / 'byung po'i rims dang / yud tsam dang / rlung las gyur pa dang / mkhris pa las gyur pa
89b3(rgyud 'bum): dang / bang kan las gyur pa dang / 'dus pa las gyur pas mi tshugs par 'gyur ro// de la gzungs chen po'i gsang sngags kyi gzhi ni 'di rnams yin no// tad+ya thA/ dzA le/ ma hA dzA le/
89b4(rgyud 'bum): dz+wa la ne/ ma hA dzA la ne/ tA pa ni/ ma hA tA pa ne/ dzA la te/ uk+ke/ pu k+ke/ saM b+ha de/ ma hA saM b+ha de/ tsakre/ ma hA tsakre/ bdag dang sems can thams cad 'jigs pa thams cad dang /
89b5(rgyud 'bum): gnod pa dang / nang 'go ba thams cad las srungs shig srungs shig swA hA/ kun dga' bo gzungs chen po'i gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag ni yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bye ba phrag bdun
89b6(rgyud 'bum): cu rtsa bdun gyis gsungs te/ nga'ang da ltar 'chad cing rjes su yi rang ngo // kun dga' bo dang pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la gzungs chen po'i gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di
89b7(rgyud 'bum): ngag 'dzin tam/ 'chang ngam/ klog gam/ yid la byed dam/ kun chub par byed na/ de tshe rabs bdun gyi bar du tshe rabs dran par 'gyur ro// de byang chub kyi sems las mi ldog par 'gyur
90a1(rgyud 'bum): ro/ / de la gzungs chen po'i gnas gsang sngags kyi gzhi ni 'di rnams yin no// tad+ya thA/ an+te/ ban+te/ kA me/ k+Sha ma me/ d+hA na se/ bad ne/ ang ne/ a da na/
90a2(rgyud 'bum): hu le/ ma hA le/ ka re gaM b+hi raM/ dusmras te/ bdag dang sems can thams cad 'jigs pa thams cad dang / gnod pa dang / nad 'go ba thams cad las srungs shig srungs shig sA hA/
90a3(rgyud 'bum): kun dga' bo gzungs chen po'i gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag ni yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bye ba phrag brgyad cu rtsa brgyad kyis gsungs te/ nga'ang da lta na 'chad cing rjes su yi rang ngo // kun
90a4(rgyud 'bum): dga' bo dang pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la gzungs chen po'i gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di 'chang ngam/ 'dzin tam/ klog gam/ yid la byed dam/ kun chub par byed na/

90a6(rgyud 'bum): an+te/ ban+d+he/ ag+ne/ bar+the/ Shag+ne/ dzag+ma/ d+hA ke/ d+ha ra d+hAk+te/ Ta ke Ta ra ke/ a ka si/ sa ka si/ ma ka si/ i li mi li/ ti li mi li/ ro ra be/ ma hA ro ra be/ b+hA taM ga me b+hA tra
90a7(rgyud 'bum): pa ra ya Ne/ ti mi ma ga saM/ ma hA ti mis/ saM b+hA be/ ma hA saM b+hA be/ bdag dang sems can thams cad 'jigs pa thams cad dang / gnod pa thams cad dang / nang 'gro ba thams cad lasaM
90b1(rgyud 'bum): srungs shig srungs shig swA hA/ kun dga' bo gzungs chen po'i gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag ni yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bye ba phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgus gsungs te/ nga'ang nga ltan 'chang
90b2(rgyud 'bum): cing rjes su yi rang ngo / / kun dga' bo dad pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la gzungs chen po'i gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag 'chang ba dang / 'dzin pa dang / klog pa dang / yid la
90b3(rgyud 'bum): byed pa dang / kun chub par byed pa de tshe rabs nyi shu rtsa gcig gi bar du tshe rabs dran par 'gyur ro// de byang chub kyi sems las phyir ldog par mi 'gyur ro// de la gzungs chen po'i gsang
90b4(rgyud 'bum): sngags kyi gzhi ni 'di rnams yin no/ / tad+ya thA/ ru le/ ma hA ru le/ he he ri/ mad ta ri/ dzaM b+ha ni/ staM b+ha ni/ kun dga' bo dang pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la
90b5(rgyud 'bum): gzungs chen po'i gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag gis shing skam po bsrung ba 'am/ yongs su bskyab pa dang / yongs su gzung ba dang / yongs su bskyang ba dang / zhi ba dang / bde legs su
90b6(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur ba dang / chad pa spang ba dang / dug gzhil ba dang / dug gsad pa dang / mtshams gcad pa dang / nam mkha' bcing ba dang / sa bcing ba byas te/ de la srad bus bcings na de'i rtsa
90b7(rgyud 'bum): ba'ang skye bar 'gyur/ yal ga dang / lo ma dang / lcug ma dang / me tog dang / 'bras bu'ang skye bar 'gyur na/ rnam par shes pa dang bcas pa'i lus la lta smos kyang ci dgos te/ kun das
91a1(rgyud 'bum): bo sngon gyi las kyi rnam par sbyin pa ni ma gtogs so/ / kun dga' bo nyi zla 'di ltar rdzu 'phrul che ba/ 'di ltar mthu che ba/ 'di ltar dbang che bar grags pa 'di gnyis ni
91a2(rgyud 'bum): sa la ltung yang srid do/ / kun dga' bo ri'i rgyal po rib gnas nas g.yo'ang spring ngo // kun dga' bo rgya mtsho chen po 'di ltar zab pa/ 'di ltar rgya che la/ 'di ltar rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba
91a3(rgyud 'bum): bzhi po 'di dag ni bskams shing yongs su zad de mthar thug par 'gyur yang srid do/ / kun dga' bo sa chen po 'di ni rnam pa stong du 'gyes kyang srid/ chu ni gsher ba nyid 'dor yang srid/ me ni
91a4(rgyud 'bum): tsha ba 'dor yang srid/ rlung ni grang ba 'dor yang srid kyi/ gzungs chen po'i gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag ni sku mi srid do// kun dga' bo lha 'am/ klu 'am/ lha ma yin nam/ nam mkha
91a5(rgyud 'bum): lding ngam/ rlung lha 'am/ dri za 'am/ mi 'am ci'am/ lto 'phye chen po 'am/ gnod sbyin nam/ srin po 'am/ yi dgas sam/ sha za 'am/ grul bu ma mam/ srul po 'am/ lus
91a6(rgyud 'bum): srul po 'am/ 'byung po'am/ bram ze 'am/ srin po 'am/ grib gnon nam/ mi dang mi ma yin pa gang la la zhig gam/ gzhan su'ang rung ba zhig gis gzungs chen po'i gsang
91a7(rgyud 'bum): sngags 'di dag las 'gal bar byed na/ tad+ya thA/ ar+g+ha le/ tsam+bi le/ bal le/ mal le/ oM d+ha ni/ mo hA ni/ dza~M b+ha ni/ s+t+waM d+ha ni/ bdag dang sems can thams cad las
91b1(rgyud 'bum): srungs shig srungs shig/ rgyal po chen po yul 'khor srung yang lcags kyi 'khor lo 'bar ba/ rab tu 'bar ba/ kun tu rab tu mched cing 'bar ba/ me lce gcig tu gyur pas de'i mgo tshal pa
91b2(rgyud 'bum): bdun du 'gems so/ / rgyal po chen po 'phags skyes po dang / mig mi bzang dang / rnam thos kyi bu'ang lcags kyi 'khor lo 'bar ba/ rab tu 'bar ba/ kun tu rab tu mched cing 'bar
91b3(rgyud 'bum): bame lce gcig tu gyur pas de'i mgo tshal pa bdun du 'gems so/ / lha'i dbang po brgya byin yang rdo rje 'phen to// gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje'ang rdo rje 'bar ba/ rab tu 'bar ba/
91b4(rgyud 'bum): kun tu rab tu mched cing 'bar ba/ me lce gcig tu gyur pas de'i mgo tshal pa bdun du 'gems so// de rgyal po'i pho brang lcang lo can du gnas su mi dbang ste/ de'i mgo ardza ka'i dog pa bzhin
91b5(rgyud 'bum): du tshal pa bdun du 'gas so/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig
91b6(rgyud 'bum): rten yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bya la mngon par bstod do// 'phags pa gzungs chen po rdzogs so// // rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang / dA na shI la dang /
91b7(rgyud 'bum): zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba ban d+he ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te/ skad gsar bcad kyis kyang bcos nas gtan la phab pa'o// // rgya gar skad du/
92a1(rgyud 'bum): @Ar+ya sAl pa ak+Sha ra pradz+nyA ba ra mi tA nA ma ma hA ya na sU tA/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yi ge nyung ngu zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo
92a2(rgyud 'bum): sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ / 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na bya rgod phung po'i ri la/ dge slong khri
92a3(rgyud 'bum): nyis stong lnga brgya'i dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs te/ brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten
92a4(rgyud 'bum): skyong ba la sogs pa lha bye ba khrag khrig 'bum gyis yongs su bskor cing mdun gyis bltas te/ dpal gyi snying po'i seng ge'i khri la bzhugs so// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
92a5(rgyud 'bum): chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der logs su
92a6(rgyud 'bum): thal mo sbyar ba btud nas 'dzum dmul te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yi ge nyung ngu las bsod nams che ba gang thos pa tsam
92a7(rgyud 'bum): gyis sems can thams cad kyi las kyi sgrib pa thams cad byang bar 'gyur ba dang / byang chub la nges par gzhol bar 'gyur ba/ gang dag gsang sngags sgrub par brtson pa de dag bgegs ma mchis par gsang sngags
92b1(rgyud 'bum): sgrub par 'gyur ba bshad du gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ rigs kyi bu/
92b2(rgyud 'bum): khyod yun ring por sems can thams cad la phan pa'i phyir brtson pa legs so// de'i phyir rigs kyi bu legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung zhig dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yi ge nyung ngu las
92b3(rgyud 'bum): bsod nams che ba gang thos pa tsam gyis sems can thams cad kyi las kyi sgrib pa byang bar 'gyur ba dang / byang chub la nges par gzhol bar 'gyur pa dang / gang dag gsang sngags sgrub par brtson pa de dag
92b4(rgyud 'bum): bgegs med par sngags 'grub par 'gyur ba ngas khyod la bshad do/ / de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di
92b5(rgyud 'bum): skad ces gsol to/ / sems can thams cad la sman pa'i slad du bshad du gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe sems can thams cad dgrol ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par
92b6(rgyud 'bum): zhugs so/ / mnyam par bzhag pa des smin mtshams kyi mdzod spu'i phrag nas 'od zer 'bum phrag du ma byung ste/ 'od zer de dag gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad khyab par gyur to// sems
92b7(rgyud 'bum): can gang dag 'od zer nges reg pa sems can dmyal ba yan chad sems can de dag thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par gyur to/ / sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad rnam
93a1(rgyud 'bum): pa drug tu g.yos so/ / de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhabs kyi drung ngu lha'i tsin+dun gyi phye ma'i char yang phab bo// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe/ shes rab kyi pha
93a2(rgyud 'bum): rol tu phyin pa gsungs pa 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' mnyam pa'i sems dang / byams pa'i sems dang / byas pa gzo ba dang / sdig pa thams cad dang bral ba'i sems su bya'o//
93a3(rgyud 'bum): shes rab kyi parol tu phyin pa'i snying po 'di'ang gdon par bya'o// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa la phyag 'tshal lo// tad+ya u0f7f/
93a4(rgyud 'bum): oM mu ne mu ne ma hA mu na ye swA hA/ ngas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di rnyed pas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob bo// sangs rgyas thams cad kyang 'di las byung ngo //
93a5(rgyud 'bum): de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa chen po las khyod kyis 'di nyid thob pas/ de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mchog tu gyur to// khyod de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom
93a6(rgyud 'bum): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od zer kun nas 'phags pa gshegs pa'i dpal brtsegs rgyal po zhes bya bar 'gyur ro zhes sangs rgyas nyid du lung yang bstan to/ / gang dag khyod kyi ming
93a7(rgyud 'bum): nyan pa dang / 'dzin pa dang / klog pa dang / gzhan dag la'ang rgya cher ston pa dang / glegs bam du bris nas mchod pa byed pa de dag thams cad ma 'ongs pa'i dus na de bzhin gshegs par
93b1(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur ro/ / tad+ya thA/ o dza ya dza ya/ pad mA b+he/ a ba me sa ra sa ra Ne/ d+hi ri d+hi ri/ d+hi ri d+hi ri/ de ba tA/ a nu pA la ni/ bud d+ho ta tA ra ni/ pu ra ya pU ra ya b+ha ga ba ti/ sarba A shAM ma sa pa
93b2(rgyud 'bum): / pU ra ya sa pa ri bA ra s+ya sarba satwa nAny+dza/ sarba karma A ba ra NA ni mi sho d+ha ya bi sho d+ha ya bud+d+ha a d+hiSh+Tha ne na swA hA/ don dam par shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad bskyed pa/ byang chub
93b3(rgyud 'bum): sems dpa'i yum/ 'phral du sdig pa 'phrog pa/ byang chub sbyin par byed pa ste/ 'di lta ste/ bskal pa bye ba brgyar yang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis phan yon brjod par mi nus so// 'di
93b4(rgyud 'bum): bklags pas dkyil 'khor thams cad du dbang bskur bar 'gyur ro/ / gsang sngags thams cad kyang mngon du 'gyur ro// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan/
93b5(rgyud 'bum): ras gzigs dbang phyug gis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du 'di shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bgyi// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
93b6(rgyud 'bum): stsal pa/ thabs sla ba'i phyir te/ sems can gang dag spro ba chung ba de dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'dzin pa dang / klog pa dang / yi ger 'dri ba dang / yi ger 'drir 'jug pa de dag

94a1(rgyud 'bum): pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das kyis ji tsam du sems can thams cad la sman pa dang
94a2(rgyud 'bum): sems can bsod nams chung ngu rnams kyi don dang / sman pa dang / bde ba'i slad du chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bka' stsal pa/ bcom ldan 'das ngo mtshar to// bde bar gshegs pa

94b1(rgyud 'bum): zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs kyi ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so/ / yang de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug/ shes rab kyi pha
94b2(rgyud 'bum): rol tu phyin pa zab mo spyod pa nyid la rnam par lta zhing / phung po lnga po de dag la'ang rang bzhin gyis stong par rnam par lta'o// de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus/ byang chub
94b3(rgyud 'bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la 'di skad ces smras so/ / rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo spyod pa spyad

94b6(rgyud 'bum): lnga po de dag kyang rang bzhin gyis stong par yang dag par rjes su blta'o/ / gzugs stong pa'o// stong pa nyid gzugs so// gzugs las stong pa nyid gzhan ma yin no// stong pa nyid
94b7(rgyud 'bum): las kyang gzugs gzhan ma yin no/ / de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa rnams stong pa'o// shA ri'i bu de lta bas na chos thams cad stong pa

95a5(rgyud 'bum): ba'ang med do/ / shA ri'i bu de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa' rnams thob pa med pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo la rten cing gnas te/ sems la sgrib pa med pas skrag pa med de/
95a6(rgyud 'bum): phyin ci log las shin tu 'das nas mya ngan las 'das pa'i mthar phyin to// dus gsum du rnam par bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brten nas/ thar
95a7(rgyud 'bum): med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/ / de lta bas na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sngags/ rig pa chen po'i sngags/ bla na med pa'i sngags
95b1(rgyud 'bum): mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i sngags/ sdug bsngal thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed pa'i sngags/ mi brdzun pas na bden pa shes par bya ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sngags/ smras pa

97b1(rgyud 'bum): des/ sangs rgyas rnyed par dka' ba yang // ring por mi thogs thob par 'gyur// sgrib pa thams cad rab zhi zhing // khyab bdag nyon mongs kun sel ba// gang zhig nyon mongs zhi byed pa// gzungs
