98a6(rgyud 'bum): gi tshig/ dkyil 'khor dag na gnas rnams kyis// thos nas rgyan rnams sna tshogs pa// bcom ldan 'das la 'bul bar byed// rdo rje ril ba la sogs pa// lha bdag gsal ba thams cad
98a7(rgyud 'bum): dang / ri bo ta sa ri rab la// gnas pa'i rig sngags 'chang rnams dang // de bzhin dkyil 'khor chen po na// 'khod pa'i rig sngags 'chang rnams dang // ma la ya yi ri bol// gnas shing rgyan
98b1(rgyud 'bum): 'bar thogs rnams dang / / khyab 'jug lha chen la sogs pa// lha yi bdag po rnams dang ni// lag na rdo rje la sogs pa// byang chub sems dpa' stobs chen rnams// nor bu'i dpung rgyan/
98b2(rgyud 'bum): rnarma dang // rgyan rnams rab tu g.yo ba'i lus// rab tu bskyed de langs nas ni// sdig bral mnga' dag rgyal ba la// phyag 'tshal thal mo sbyar byas nas// kun gyis yi dbang phyug go// thub
98b3(rgyud 'bum): mchog dam pa de la ni/ / mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad dag gis bstod// mnyam nyid chos de de bzhin nyid// shin tu rtogs pa lham me ga/ dul ba bstan pa dri ma sel// dri ma med pa sgron bral ba//
98b4(rgyud 'bum): thub pa sangs rgyas shin tu zhi// 'jig rten mgon po skye dgu'i bdag/ de bzhin gshegs pa nyon mongs thul// de bzhin rgyal ba rdul bsal ba// ston pa ston mdzad brtan pa ste//
98b5(rgyud 'bum): sdig pa med pa rdul dang bral// 'jig rten mgon po snang mdzad pa// dag pa zhi ba zas gtsang sras// nyon mongs rab bcom phan 'dogs pa// ston pa po de dri ma sel// spyod tshul dri med
98b6(rgyud 'bum): tshul bzang ba/ / zab pa rnam par gnon pa brtan// btsan po thugs brtse rnam par rgyal// mgon po de bzhin mgon mdzad pa// zhi ba'i bdag nyid zhe sdang bral// bcings pa las
98b7(rgyud 'bum): grol nges par grol/ / 'jig rten kun mchog 'khra ba'i sa// bdag gir mi 'dzin dri ma med// nyon mongs sel ba dpal dang ldan// dpal mdzad de bzhin phan mdzad pa// mas
99a1(rgyud 'bum): pa med pa dpe med pa/ / khyab bdag nyon mongs las rnams spong // khengs pa med pa dman pa med// mnyam pa de bzhin mi mnyam mnyam// snang ba mnyes pa snang
99a2(rgyud 'bum): byed med/ / 'jig rten snang mdzad sdig med pa// sgrib pa thams cad spangs pa ste// 'jig rten kun la phan par brtson// dpa' bo zhi bzhi mdzad pa// nyon mongs dgra rnams zad par
99a3(rgyud 'bum): mdzad/ / mnga' bdag thabs mkhyen thabs che ba// sems can kun gyi 'khras lags// don yod rnyed dka' blo dang ldan// rdo rje dkyil 'khor thub par dka'// skyobs pa 'jigs sel
99a4(rgyud 'bum): tshangs pa ste/ / de bzhin sangs rgyas chos 'dzin pa// dpa' bo chen po 'jigs pa med// gzugs bzang mtshan rnams gsal ba ste// sum cu rtsa gnyis mtshan mnga' ba// chos kyi long
99a5(rgyud 'bum): spyod rgya mtsho lags/ / dpe byad bzang po bkod pa'i sa// spras pa'i bdag nyid ya mtshan ston// dka' ba med pa'i ston pa po// de bzhin nges pa bde sbyin pa// mthu chen yangs pa rgya che ba// bdud
99a6(rgyud 'bum): bzhi'i stobs rnams sel mdzad pa/ / brtson chen spro ba che ba ste// dgyes pa chen po stobs po che// mthu brnyes bstan pa chen po ste// gnas ldan dbang gis ngar ba lags// gsal ba gsung
99a7(rgyud 'bum): ldan dpe med pa/ / dge ba stong pa nyid kyis rgyal// rab tu zhi ba mun pa med// blo gros chen po chos 'dzin te// phun sum tshogs ldan sa chen brnyes// 'dod pa rnams ni 'dul mdzad pa// dpal
99b1(rgyud 'bum): mdzad dpal mnga' dpal dang ldan/ / dpal gyi longs spyod shin tu rgyus// bcom ldan legs bgo bgo bar mdzad// gsung ldan bkra shis rgyal ba'i gnas// mnyam nyid mnyam pa nyid mkhyen
99b2(rgyud 'bum): pa/ mnyam pa nyid kyi mtshan dpag med// rab tu dgyes la longs spyod gsal// gzhi bcas sel ba mnyam pa lags// blo dag blo ldan dri ma spangs// gnas chen brten pa ldan pa ste//
99b3(rgyud 'bum): rgyal ba longs spyod dri ma med// thub pa thugs rje'i rgyan mnga' ba// bskal pa bzang po 'jigs pa'i skyabs// de bzhin 'jigs med nyon mongs sel// dri med skyon bral longs spyod can//
99b4(rgyud 'bum): sna tshogs 'od ljon dkyil 'khor mdzes// sku bzang dge ba rig pa'i mchog/ thugs rje'i 'od ldan 'ong bzang ba// mi gnas longs spyod dam pa lags// chos kyi rgyu ste yon tan gnas//
99b5(rgyud 'bum): rje 'os mchog gnas longs spyod che// nam mkha'i mtshan te rnam dag blo// rin chen gzugs 'dra bkra shis pa// khyu mchog che spyan brdzi ma// rgyal ba skyon bsal shes rab can// shes
99b6(rgyud 'bum): rab thabs dang ldan pa ste/ / 'jig rten mi dge kun las 'das// dag par longs spyod brtan pa dang // sa dang stobs dang ye shes bzod// pha rol phyin pa kun la mnga'//
99b7(rgyud 'bum): ting 'dzin mnyam par longs spyod pa// rnam par bgol mngon sum pa// stong pas sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam// chos chen bde bar 'char ba lags// thams cad mkhyen
100a1(rgyud 'bum): pa yul las 'das/ / spyod yul sgrib pa mi mnga' ba// byang chub sems dpa'i dbang po rgyal// dam pa'i don de tshul che ba// shes bya'i yul rnams mtha' dag
100a2(rgyud 'bum): la/ sgrib pa med par 'char ba brnyes// rin chen mthun par skyes pa ste// de bzhin gshegs pa'i dge ba'i gnas// khyad par brnyes pa mnyam nyid brnyes// mi mnyam sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam//
100a3(rgyud 'bum): don chen shin tu mthar phyin pa// nyon mongs bral ba thub par dka'// dge sbyong sdig pa sbyong mdzad pa// gnod pa med par bde bar 'byin// blo rgya che ba thams cad mkhyen// thos pa'i mtshon
100a4(rgyud 'bum): cha ma lus gas na/ / dkon pa bde bar 'thob 'gyur ba// mnyam pa khyad par yul dang ldan// 'jig rten thams cad dar mdzad mgon// zhi gnas mtshon cha thub par dka'// bsam gyis
100a5(rgyud 'bum): mi khyab bsam yas yul/ / dpe med pa ste dper bya ba// 'od bzang rab dgyes dpal dang ldan// legs gsung blo yi stobs kyis 'byung // mkhas pa zhal bzang bde sbyin pa// rab dgyes
100a6(rgyud 'bum): 'das pa'i spyod yul can/ / gsung ba chen po ye shes che// gnas chen bkra shis chen po ste// mchod par gyur pa yul las 'das// bya ba'i mtshan nyid med pa po// sangs rgyas yul du
100a7(rgyud 'bum): skyes pa ste/ / shes bya'i spyod yul rgya che ba// kun mkhyen longs spyod 'bras bu can// 'jig rten dbang 'das spyod yul ba// kun mkhyen yul gyi snang ba ste// thabs mkhas phun sum tshogs
100b1(rgyud 'bum): ldan pa/ / rdzu 'phrul rol pa'i thabs dang ldan// chos kyi gar thabs ston pa po// rab ston yon tan bsgyur mdzad pa// spyod pa ma lus 'dud par mdzad// yongs su rdzogs pa rnam par dag
100b2(rgyud 'bum): sangs rgyas spyod yul rnam sangs rgyas/ / bgegs med ma legs byed pa btsem// bdud kyi dregs pa sel bar mdzad// g.yul ngor rnam par rgyal ba brnyes// dpa' bo chen po thub med stobs//
100b3(rgyud 'bum): theg pa chen po'i shing rta bcibs// blo chen brgal bar dka' ba yi// nyon mongs rgya mtsho'i pha rol gshegs// theg pa chen po'i tshul la gnas// theg pa mchog la longs spyod pa// nyan thos
100b4(rgyud 'bum): 'das pa'i spyod yul can/ / rang rgyal las kyang 'das pa ste// sangs rgyas pa yi 'bras bu gnas// gong nas gong du khyad par mkhyen// khyod ni nam mkha'i gnas na bzhugs// bde
100b5(rgyud 'bum): 'byungs dang zhing rnams kyi/ / mtsho chen dag la longs par spyod// sangs rgyas dbang po rgyas pa la// mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad kyis bstod nas// de la lha tshogs tshogs rnams kyis// phyag
100b6(rgyud 'bum): byas mgo smad phyogs gcig 'khod/ / de nas dkyil 'khor chen po na// gnas pa ma lus chem mer 'khod// thod du rdo rje'i thod 'ching zhing // langs nas cod pan rab tu g.yos// dkyil
100b7(rgyud 'bum): 'khor mthon po thams cad du/ / skang ber chen por yongs bkang nas// nor bu'i rgyan ni rnam g.yo zhing // ha ha drag po'i sgra grogs ste// kye ma sangs rgyas yon tan che// bskal pa grangs
101a1(rgyud 'bum): med gsum bsags pa/ / byang chub sems sogs mchog rnams kyis// mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad legs par brjod// kye ma rnyed dang bde 'byung ba// mtshan brgya
101a2(rgyud 'bum): rtsa brgyad thos nas kyang / / gang zhig klog cing rgyal la bstod// 'bras bu chen po 'grub par 'gyur// mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad sngags bcas pa// bcom ldan 'das drung brjod na ni// sgrib
101a3(rgyud 'bum): dang kun nas nyon mongs dang / / sdig pa thams cad dag pa 'thob// mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad mchog bton na// sgrib pa kun las nges grol zhing // nyon mongs mtha' dag rnam par spongs//
101a4(rgyud 'bum): shes rab che ba nyid du 'gyur// de ni longs spyod chen po dang // bde ba las kyang nyams mi 'gyur// de ni tshe rabs thams cad du// blo ldan tshe rabs dran par 'gyur// de nas rdo rje thod
101a5(rgyud 'bum): 'ching ba/ / yon tan mtha' yas sras de la// bcom ldan bdud las rgyal ba yis// mngon sum gzigs nas bka' stsal pa// rgyal ba'i sa 'di zhi ba ste// nga rgyal la sogs
101a6(rgyud 'bum): nyon mongs 'joms/ / 'jig rten bde ba kun las 'das// de bzhin gshegs bde mngon du phyogs// gzhan gyis mi tshugs gzungs dang ni// mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad nyan byed pa// de dag
101a7(rgyud 'bum): rnam dag bdag nyid de/ / sems can kun la bde 'dod pa// lan cig thos pa tsam gyis kyang // de dgas chen 'bras bur 'gyur// ring por mi thogs dga' 'gyur na// 'chang sogs lta la ci zhig smos//
101b1(rgyud 'bum): de phyir rtag tu rab bsgrims la// gtan du bde ba 'dod pa yis// yon tan rgya mtsho ldan pa'i gzungs// mnyan par bya zhing bcang bar bya// gang zhig nang par langs nas brjod// bdag nyid kyis
101b2(rgyud 'bum): kyang bton na ni/ / de yi don kun 'grub 'gyur la// gnod pa dang yang phrad mi 'gyur// 'di ni yon tan kun gyi snod// dge ba phun sum tshogs sbyin pa// kun mkhyen 'bras bu bla med mchog
101b3(rgyud 'bum): bde 'byung thob par byed pa yin/ / 'bras bu 'byor pa ci yang rung // thob par mi 'gyur dogs pa med// kun mkhyen go 'phang thob gyur nas// dpe med gnas su 'gro bar 'gyur// 'di ni dge
101b4(rgyud 'bum): zhing 'bras bur ldan/ / sangs rgyas sa yi 'bras bu sbyin// yid du 'ong zhing yon tan ldan// snying rje dri ma med sbyin pa// 'di ni mnyam pa nyid kyi mdo// 'jig rten kun gnas dga' ba ste//
101b5(rgyud 'bum): 'jig rten kun gyi bde 'byung ba// 'di dang 'dra ba gang yang med// ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa gzungs sngags dang bcas pa rdzogs so//
101b6(rgyud 'bum): de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa la phyag 'tshal lo// tad+ya thA/ oM mu ni mu ni ma hA mu ni ye swA hA/ lan cig bzlas
101b7(rgyud 'bum): brjod byas na bskal pa bye ba brgya phrag brgyad khri'i bar du sdig pa byas pa gang yin pa de dag thams cad 'byang bar 'gyur ro/ / 'phags pa shAkya thub pa'i snying po'i gzungs rdzogs so//
102a1(rgyud 'bum): @#dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'phags pa rnam par snang mdzad 'od kyi rgyal po la phyag
102a2(rgyud 'bum): 'tshal lo/ / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i snying po la phyag 'tshal lo// tad+ya thA/ ka la ka la/ ki li ki li/ bi ri bi ri/ hu ru hu ru/ bai ro tsa na ra shI sany+tso ri ta A ga
102a3(rgyud 'bum): Ar+ya A kA sha gar+b+ha ma hA kA ru Ni kA pA ra ya ha shA na/ d+ha ra ya bud+d+he bish+tsa ya na/ tsa ra tsa ra/ tsi ri tsa ri swA hA/ ba ton pas 'grub ste/ mtshon cha dang / me dang / chu dang / dug dang / dug sbyar ma dang /
102a4(rgyud 'bum): byang stems rnams kyis mi tshugs so// rgyal po dang chom rkun la sogs pa thams cad kyis glags mi rnyed do// gang du bris te bzhag pa der yams kyi nang dang / gnod pa dang / 'go ba'i nang thams cad
102a5(rgyud 'bum): mi 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ / dri ma med pa'i 'od ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin kyang 'thob par 'gyur ro// 'phags pa rnam par snang mdzad kyi snying po zhes bya ba'i gzung rdzogs so// /
102a6(rgyud 'bum): bcom ldan 'das snang ba mtha' yas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo// tad+ya thA/ a mi te/ a mi tong b+ha be/ a mi ta
102a7(rgyud 'bum): saM b+ha be/ a mi ta bi kAn+ta gA mi nI/ ga ga na kI ra ti ka re sarba kre sha kA yaM ka ri swA hA/ gzungs 'di'i yon tan ni bskal pa brgya stong du bsags pa'i las kyi sgrib pa'ang lan gsum bzlas pa byas na
102b1(rgyud 'bum): de rnams zad par rig par bya'o/ / nyi shu rtsa gcig tu bzlas pa byas na/ rtsa ba bzhi'i ltung ba'ang sdig pa yongs su byang bar 'gyur te/ sangs rgyas stong la dge ba'i rtsa ba bsgyur bar yang 'gyur ro// snang
102b2(rgyud 'bum): pa mtha' yas rjes su dran pa rdzogs so/ / // zla ba'i 'od de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo//
102b3(rgyud 'bum): tad+ya thA/ tsan+ne tsan+ne/ su tsan+de/ ma ti tsan+na/ tsan+na ka ra Na/ si ri si ri/ bud+d+ha a d+hir+b+hi ti/ ki li ki li/ d+har+m+ma a d+hiSh+Thi te/ kI li ki li/ saM g+ha a d+hiSh+Thi ti sA hA/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo
102b4(rgyud 'bum): gang gis rtag tu nang par langs te/ zla ba'i 'od de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan dran par byed pa de ni bskal pa bzhi khri'i tshe rabs dran par 'gyur te/ de ni ngan song du ltung bar mi 'gyur ro// zla ba'i
102b5(rgyud 'bum): 'od kyi mtshan rjes su dran pas yon tan de rnams thob par 'gyur ro/ / zla ba'i 'od kyi mtshan rjes su dran pa rdzogs so// // na maHsarba ta thA ga tu
102b6(rgyud 'bum): hri da ya/ a nu ga te/ oM ku ru gi ni swA hA/ 'di lan cig bzlas pas kyang bskal pa 'bum phrag brgya stong du bsags pa'i las kyi sgrib pa'ang zad par 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa spyi'i snying
102b7(rgyud 'bum): po rjes su dran pa rdzogs so/ / sangs rgyas rin chen gtsug tor can la phyag 'tshal lo// na mo rat+na shi khi naM/ ta thA ga tA ya/ ar+tha
103a1(rgyud 'bum): samya ka saM bud+d+hA ya/ tad+ya thA/ rat+na rat+ne rat+na shi khe ne swA hA/ 'chi ba'i tshi dran na ngan song kun las rnam par grol bar 'gyur/ shir pos nas kyang su cu rtsa gsum rnams kyi lhar
103a2(rgyud 'bum): skye'o/ / sangs rgyas rin chen gtsug tor can gyi mtshan rjes su dran pa rdzogs so// / rgya gar skad du/ pU dza me g+ha rA ra d+hA ra Ni/ bod skad
103a3(rgyud 'bum): dumachod pa'i sprin ces bya ba'i gzungs/ dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo// na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na mo b+ha ba te/ badz+ra sA ra pra marda ne/ ta thA ga tA ya/ arba te sa mya kaM saM bud+d+hA ya/
103a4(rgyud 'bum): tad+ya thA/ oM badz+re badz+re/ ma hA badz+re/ ma hA te dza badz+re/ ma hA did+yA swA hA/ ma hA bo d+hi tsit+ta badz+re/ ma hA bo d+ha miN+Do pa saM kra ma Na badz+re/ sarba karma a ba ra Na/ bi sho d+ha na badz+re swA hA/ gzungs sngags 'di'i tshe
103a5(rgyud 'bum): ga ni 'di yin te/ dran pa tsam gyi mod la phyogs bcu dag na bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma'i rdul phra rab snyed la mchod pa byas par 'gyur zhing / 'das la phyag byas par 'gyur ro// me
103a6(rgyud 'bum): tog dang / bdug pa dang / spos dang / me tog 'phreng dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / chos gos dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan thams cad dang / gdan dang / gding ba dang / na bza'
103a7(rgyud 'bum): dang / spyan gzigs dang / bshos gtsang la sogs pa dang / rgyan dang / lhab lhub thams cad kyis mchod par 'gyur ro// sdig pa thams cad dang bral bar 'gyur zhing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams
103b1(rgyud 'bum): cad dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ / sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad mthong bas yang dag par dbugs 'byin par 'gyur ro// lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang
103b2(rgyud 'bum): lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po thams cad dang / lag na rdo rje la sogs pa gsang ba pa'i bdag po dang bcas pa rnams dang / rgyal po chen po bzhi rnams
103b3(rgyud 'bum): phyi bzhin yang dag par 'brang zhing / srung ba dang / skyob pa dang / sbed par byed do// 'di nas shi 'phos nas 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du skye bar 'gyur te/ yon tan gyi khyad par 'di dag
103b4(rgyud 'bum): ni ma bsgrubs par lan cig dran pa tsam gyis thob par 'gyur ro/ / mchod pa'i sprin ces bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so// // dkon mchog gsum
103b5(rgyud 'bum): la phyag 'tshal lo/ / de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas pad+ma'i spyan la phyag 'tshal lo// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sgrib pa thams cad
103b6(rgyud 'bum): rnam par sel ba la phyag 'tshal lo/ / tad+ya dz+nyA/ oM ta ra ta ra/ tI ti ri/ tsa ru Sh+Ta ru/ kA la ka la/ kai li ki sI/ ku lu ku lu/ b+ha ra b+ha ra/ b+hi ri b+hI ri/ b+hu ru d+hu ru/ d+hA ya b+hU ya/
103b7(rgyud 'bum): ku ru sarba kar+m+ma A ba ra Na dza ni me sha pra b+ha ya swA hA/ dza la ne bi d+ha ni bai swA hA/ ku ru pany+tsa li swA hA/ sA ga ra saM bi ro swA hA/ sarba ta thA ga ta a d+hiSh+Thi te swA hA/ gzungs 'di'i cho ga 'di yin te/
104a1(rgyud 'bum): nang par langs nas lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas na zhag nyi shu rtsa gcig lon pa'i tshe/ las kyi sgrib pa thams cad zad par 'gyur ro// spyan lnga'ang rnam par dag
104a2(rgyud 'bum): par 'gyur ro/ / de la mig nang 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro// lus la nad 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro// yid kyi nyes pa 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro// spyan lnga'ang rnam par dag par 'gyur ro//
104a3(rgyud 'bum): de bzhin du yid rnam pa lnga'ang thob par 'gyur ro// tshe rabs thams cad du sangs rgyas 'byung ba dang phrad par 'gyur ro// byang chub kyi snying po la gnas kyi bar du sangs rgyas mthong ba dang / chos
104a4(rgyud 'bum): thos pa dang / dge 'dun la bsnyen bkur byed pa dang / sems can thams cad yongs su smin par byed pa dang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ro// lus mdzes par 'gyur ro// sems dang bar 'gyur ro//
104a5(rgyud 'bum): 'phags pa pad+ma'i spyan zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so// rgya gar skad du/ su rU pa na ma d+hA ra Ni/ bod skad du/ su ru ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs
104a6(rgyud 'bum): sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ / na maHsu rU pA ya/ ta thA ga tA ya/ ar+ha te/ sa myaka saM bud+d+ha ya/ tad+ya thAM/ oM su ru su ru/ pra su ru pra su ru/ ta ra ta ra/
104a7(rgyud 'bum): b+ha ra b+ha ra/ sa~M b+ha ra sa~M b+ha ra/ s+pha ra s+pha ra/ san+ta ra pa ya/ san+ta ra pa ya/ sarba pre ta nA ma swA hA/ gzungs 'dis chu dang bcas pa'i zan la lan bdun yongs su bzlas te/ lag pa g.yon pas
104b1(rgyud 'bum): se gol gyi sgra lan gsum du byas nas yi dgas thams cad la dben pa'i sa phyogs su sbyin par bya zhing / 'di skad kyang brjod par bya ste/ skabs tshol ba dang glags lta ba rnams dengs shig
104b2(rgyud 'bum): 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad na gnas pa'i yi dgas rnams la bza' ba 'di bdag gis sbyin par bgyi'o zhes pa'o/ / zas ma zos pa'i sngon rol nyid du sbyin par bya'o// de ltar na yi dgas thams
104b3(rgyud 'bum): cad la 'bras bre bo che re re'i bza' ba so sor byin par 'gyur ro/ / de ltar byas na skye ba nas skye bar yang nyams chung bar mi 'gyur ro// dbul por mi 'gyur ro// stobs che ba dang / mdzes pa dang /
104b4(rgyud 'bum): mthong na dga' ba dang / phyug cing longs spyod che bar 'gyur ro// tsha ring zhing nad med pa dang / myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur
104b5(rgyud 'bum): ro/ / shi phos nas kyang bde ba can gyi 'jig rten gyi khams su skye bar 'gyur ro// gzugs legs zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so// / rgyag
104b6(rgyud 'bum): skad du/ Ar+ya any+dza ma hA b+ha ya tA ra Ni nA ma d+hA ra Ni/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa 'jigs pa chen po brgyad las sgrol ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag
104b7(rgyud 'bum): 'tshal lo/ / de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan 'byung gnas la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa kun nas spos dri la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i rtsal dang
105a1(rgyud 'bum): @ldan pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ / de bzhin gshegs pa sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba mchog la phyag 'tshal lo//
105a2(rgyud 'bum): de bzhin gshegs pa zhi ba'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba'i bla ma la phyag 'tshal lo// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snying rje chen po dang ldan pa 'jigs
105a3(rgyud 'bum): pa med par byed pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ / tad+ya thA/ d+ha re d+ha re/ d+hA re d+hA re NI/ ra na ko te/ a b+ha yA kalpe kalpa ni/ ga Ne a nan+ta kalpe/ a mr-i ta kalpe/ hu tA sha re/ a nan+ta mu khe/ a nan+ta tsak+Sha
105a4(rgyud 'bum): sa mung+ga te/ oM b+ha swA hA/ rigs kyi bu gzungs kyi gsang sngags 'di dag ni sems can ngan song du 'gro ba rnams kyi don gyi phyir/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag gis
105a5(rgyud 'bum): gsungs pa dang / byin gyis brlabs pa dang / rjes su yi rang ba yin no// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' gang la la gzungs 'di 'dzin par byed pa de/ 'jigs pa brgyad po sems can dmyal/
105a6(rgyud 'bum): ba'i 'jigs pa mtha' yas pa dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas kyi 'jigs pa mtha' yas pa dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi 'jigs pa mtha' yas pa dang / yi dgas kyi 'jigs pa mtha' yas pa dang /
105a7(rgyud 'bum): bgrong dka' ba'i 'jigs pa mtha' yas pa dang / skye ba'i 'jigs pa mtha' yas pa dang / nad kyi 'jigs pa mtha' yas pa dang / 'chi ba'i 'jigs pa mtha' yas pa dag las yang dag par 'da' bar/
105b1(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur ro// phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis dgongs par 'gyur ro// sems rnam par g.yeng ba med par 'chi ba'i dus byed cing / sangs rgyas rnams kyi spyan sngar skye bar
105b2(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur/ zad mi shes pa'i lus thob par 'gyur/ sprul pa'i lus kyang thob par 'gyur ro// na maHsarba bing+ga/ sid d+hAn+tu me man+ta pA da swA hA/ 'phags pa 'jigs pa chen po brgyad las sgrol ba zhes bya ba g
105b3(rgyud 'bum): zungs rdzogs so/ / // rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya be sha ba ti nA ma d+hA ra Ni/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa khyad par can zhes bya ba'i gzungs/ sangs
105b4(rgyud 'bum): rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ / 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das sbrul gyi lo'i dgun zla ra ba tshes nyi shu la yul phug ron can na/ grong khyer
105b5(rgyud 'bum): sin tso zhes bya ba'i gtsug lag khang na bzhugs te/ de'i tshe dge slong tshe brjod ces bya ba don gcig gi phyir/ grong khyer gan so zhes bya bar song ste/ dge slong de mi yul gyi grong khyer nas dpag tshad
105b6(rgyud 'bum): brgya'i lam du phyin pa dang / dge slong des par der mi lus chen po khrun du 'dom sum cu yod pa/ bzhin 'dom bzhi pa zhig rgyang ring po nas mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang dge slong tshe brjod des mi de lta bu
105b7(rgyud 'bum): de la 'di snyam du bsams te/ kye ma mi 'di ni lus che ste/ 'di ni 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa yin du nges so snyam nas/ des pus mo gnyis ka'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ mi lus chen po ga
106a1(rgyud 'bum): la ba der logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ mi lus chen po de la 'di skad ces smras so// ci khyod 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa ste/ 'dir 'khod ngam/ 'jam
106a2(rgyud 'bum): dpal gyis smras pa/ dge slong de de bzhin no// dge slong des smras pa/ 'jam dpal khyod ci'i slad du 'di na gda'/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas smras pa/ dge slong 'dzam bu'i gling
106a3(rgyud 'bum): 'dir sems can rnams la nang rnam pa sna tshogs pa 'byung ste/ gnod sbyin dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / dri za rnams ri'i rgyal po ri rab kyi ngos gcig la gnas so// des nyi zla'i 'od
106a4(rgyud 'bum): kyang mi mngon/ nyi ma dang / zla ba dang / gza' dang / rgyu skar rnams kyang nam mkhar bar skabs na mi snang ngo // de'i tshe lha dang lha ma yin kyang g.yul 'gyed de/ g.yul bkye ba dang / lha rnams ni 'pham/
106a5(rgyud 'bum): lha ma yin rnams ni rgyal te/ de'i tshe 'byung po dang yi dgas rnams bud med kyi gzugs kyis sems can rnams la nang gtong ste/ 'di lta ste/ lkog ma'i lha gor dang / 'brum phran dang / me dpal dang /
106a6(rgyud 'bum): lto ba na ba dang / rims nyin gcig pa dang / nyin gnyis pa dang / nyin gsum pa dang / nyin bzhi pa dang / rlung las gyur pa dang / mkhris pa las gyur pa dang / bad kan las gyur pa dang / 'dus
106a7(rgyud 'bum): pa las gyur pa dang / klad pa na ba dang / phol mig dang / g.yan pa dang / tshad pa dang / mig nad la sogs pa nye bar sgrubs po// 'di lta ste/ char ches pa dang / than pa dang / dus ma yin pa'i
106b1(rgyud 'bum): char gyis lo tog phun sum tshogs pa'i 'ongs 'phrog/ sems can rnams kyi mdangs 'phrog/ tshe dang / stobs dang / mdog dang / gzugs 'phrog ste/ de'i tshe 'dzam bu'i gling na sems can
106b2(rgyud 'bum): thams cad nad sna tshogs kyis yongs su nyen to/ / gtum po seng ge dang / spyang ki dang / stag dang / sbrul la sogs pa'i gzugs kyis sems can rnams kyi mdangs 'phrog ste/ 'dzam bu'i gling gi
106b3(rgyud 'bum): sems can rnams la dus ma yin par chud za ba nye bar gnas pas/ sems can rnams nad las thar par bya'ang dka' ste/ 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir sems rgan pa dang / bar ma dang / gzhon pa dag las
106b4(rgyud 'bum): dkrigs phrag sum cu 'chi bar 'gyur ro/ / de'i phyir nga dge slong khyod kyi gam du yongs kyis/ khyod kyis 'dzam bu'i gling gi sems can thams cad la chos kyi rnam grangs 'di sgrogs shig/ de ci'i phyir
106b5(rgyud 'bum): zhe na/ 'dzam bu'i gling pa'i sems can thams cad ni 'di snyam du/ bdag cag ji ltar sdug bsngal gyis bcings pa thams cad las thar par 'gyur snyam du re ba'i phyir ro// de lta bas na dge slong khyod
106b6(rgyud 'bum): kyis sems can thams cad la mdo 'di sgrogs te/ sems can thams cad la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa'i phyir nan tan gyis shig/ dkon mchog gsum la rtag tu rgyun du dad par gyis shig/ lha rjod
106b7(rgyud 'bum): cig/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten rnams sam/ sku gzugs rnams la spos dang / me tog dang / bdug pa rnams kyis mchod par gyis shig/ khyad par can gyi gzungs kyang lhogs shig/
107a1(rgyud 'bum): @nyi ma bdun yan lag brgyad pa dang ldan pa'i gso sbyin la nye bar gnas par gyis shig/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa bro yangs zab mo 'brug ba sgrags rgyal po la phya
107a2(rgyud 'bum): 'tshal lo/ / tad+yaSh+Ta/ bi bu la ga rdzi te/ bi s+phu la sA re/ bi pu la yo nau she/ a na sa le/ a na la saM b+hA be/ a na la te/ sha ta ka ra/ b+he dza li ni swA hA/ dza ma b+ha ni/ stam+b+ha ne/ mo ha ne swA hA/
107a3(rgyud 'bum): bon ta ri ka yang swA hA/ ho me d+harme/ d+harmA tsa ti ye swA hA/ d+ha re b+hi d+ha re swA hA/ ka la biM ka ru ta ye swA hA/ shri te phan ne nirba pa n+ya swA hA/ d+hu ru d+hu ru/ bi du ru d+hi ye swA hA/ bi la ma pa tsun d+ha ye swA hA/ a ba
107a4(rgyud 'bum): lo ki ta bi lo ki tA ye swA hA/ a dz+nyA na bi d+ha ma n+ye swA hA/ pad+ma sA re/ pad+ma saM b+ha re/ king ka re/ hi taM ka ri ye swA hA/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di lta ste/
107a5(rgyud 'bum): tsan dra pra b+he/ tsan dra na gar+b+he/ tsa na dra tsur+Ne/ ki la sa pa tI/ sarba bud d+ha/ a deSh+Thi ta a nu mo de ti swA hA/ byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa 'jam dpal la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di lta ste/ tad+ya thA/
107a6(rgyud 'bum): dza ye dza ye/ dza ya la ba d+he/ dza ya ma hA ma he swA hA/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di lta ste/ tad+ya thA/ ga ga na ar+ye/ ga ga na sa mung
107a7(rgyud 'bum): gter ga gan bi krAn ta/ bi kAn te/ oM dzo ma dzI pad+me dzi swA hA/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di lta ste/ tad+ya thA/ ho b+hi tre/ ma hA b+ha dre/ a ti b+ha dze/ sa man+ta b+ha tra/
107b1(rgyud 'bum): bi ga ta rA dza me/ ma hA bi ga ta rA dza se/ sa ga ting ga te swA hA/ de bzhin gshegs pa sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di lta ste/ he ma he ma ha ma ha ma swA hA/ de bzhin gshegs pa
107b2(rgyud 'bum): 'od dpag med la phyag 'tshal lo/ / 'di lta ste/ a mi tod b+ha be/ a mi ta saM b+ha be/ a mi ta bi krAn+te/ a mi ta bi krAn+te ga re/ a mi ta ga ga ni kArti ka re sA hA/ de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan 'byung
107b3(rgyud 'bum): gnas la phyag 'tshal lo/ / 'di lta ste/ ga ga na a ka re/ ga ga na saM b+ha be/ ga ga ni kIrta ka re swA hA/ de bzhin gshegs pa kun nas spos mchog la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di lta ste/ sa ma sa me swA hA/
107b4(rgyud 'bum): de bzhin gshegs pa gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i rgyal mtshan rtsal gyis 'brug bsgrags gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di lta ste/ a sa ma a sa me swA hA/ de bzhin gshegs pa nga rgyal gnon la phyag
107b5(rgyud 'bum): 'tshal lo/ / 'di lta ste/ mA nA b+hi shud d+he/ pad+me shwa re/ pad+ma saM b+ha re/ king ka re/ hi tang ka re ye swA hA/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs
107b6(rgyud 'bum): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba la phyag 'tshal lo/ / 'di lta ste/ ma ti bi ga ra dza saM/ he ma ga ti/ karma ma hA ra dza dza/ bi sho d+ha ni swA hA/
107b7(rgyud 'bum): byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa byams pa la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di lta ste/ mai tri ma ni saM swA hA/ byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa nam mkha'i snying po la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di lta
108a1(rgyud 'bum): @#ste/ gar+b+he gaN+DI/ gar+b+ha bi sho d+ha ni swA hA/ byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa blo gros mi zad pa la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di lta ste/ ak+Sha ye nu/ ak+ShA ye phu
108a2(rgyud 'bum): ak+Sha ya kar+m+ma bi sho d+ha ni phu sA hA/ byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa dri ma med par grags pa la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di lta ste/ kIrti tA/ sar+b+ba dza naM/ a b+hi kIrti tA/ badz+ra sar+b+ba dzi naM/ badz+ra a
108a3(rgyud 'bum): ka re/ badz+ra be dA ka re swA hA/ byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di lta ste/ sarba A ba ra Na bi skam biN+ye swA hA/ d+hA tu bi ka ra N+ye swA hA/ me g+ha mi spoT
108a4(rgyud 'bum): mi swAhA/ a pA ra dzi ti kA yi swA hA/ ba la da N+yai swA hA/ da kar+Na dpa me swA hA/ kArma nid+b+ha bita kA ye swAhA/ e ka a ra ma ya swA hA/ yo gA tsa rA ye swA hA/ sar+b+ba bud+d+ha a b+hi Shi ka tA ye swAhA/
108a5(rgyud 'bum): bku ti ye swA hA/ sar+b+ba d+har+m+ma a b+hi Shi kA ta ye swA hA meka mr-i nI me swAr+tha sa shwag le swAH/ b+hu ta ye swA hU~M/ a sa~M b+hu ta ye swA hA/ sar+b+ba duHkho pra sha ma N+ye swA hA/ zla 'ong gzhon nur gyur pa la
108a6(rgyud 'bum): phyag 'tshal lo/ / 'di lta ste/ tsid pra b+he/ su pra b+he/ pra b+ha a ka re/ pra b+ho ka re/ pra b+ha ba ti/ d+harmA bi shud d+haM/ karma bi shu d+hir/ b+ha ba tu maM swA hA/ tshe brjod gang la la zhig rig sngags 'ja
108a7(rgyud 'bum): nyin zhag bdun du nyin lan bdun mtshan lan bdun du bya ba byas na/ de'i las kyi sgring pa ma lus pa rnam par dag par 'gyur ro// dge slong bdun la zas sbyin no// me las me spel bar bya'o//
108a8(rgyud 'bum): sarba bud+d+ha a b+hi Shi ta ye swA hA/
108b1(rgyud 'bum): mtshan mo mar me thogs te mchod rten la bsti stang byas la bskor ba bya'o// dam pa'i chos bri ba dang bklag pa la brtson par bya'o// gal te yams kyi nang cher byung na/ khyim nas khyim dang / grong
108b2(rgyud 'bum): nas grong dang / grong khyer nas grong khyer du/ khu ba dang / bdug pa dang / gtor ma dang / lha bshos kyis mchod pa bya'o// nang pa gang yin pa des kyang cho ga 'di bzhin du byas na/ de myur
108b3(rgyud 'bum): du nang las thar par 'gyur ro/ / de nas yang 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas/ dge slong tshe brjod la 'di skad ces smras so// dge slong rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig chos
108b4(rgyud 'bum): kyi rnam grangs 'di 'dzin tam/ klog gam/ yi ger 'dri 'am/ yi ger 'drir 'jug gam/ gzhan dag la'ang rgya cher yang dag par ston na/ de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las
108b5(rgyud 'bum): phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ro/ / yang 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas/ dge slong tshe brjod la 'di skad ces smras so// chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ci nas skye bo thams cad kyi rna lam du grags par 'gyur
108b6(rgyud 'bum): bar yul nas yul dang / grong khyer nas grong khyer dang / grong nas grong du bskur bar bya'o// yang 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas/ dge slong tshe brjod la 'di skad ces smras so// tshe brjod rigs
108b7(rgyud 'bum): kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la chos kyi rnam grangs 'di lan cig bklags na de bdag nyid thar par 'gyur ro// sas lan gnyis bklags na de bu dang chung ma dang lhan cig thar par 'gyur ro//
109a1(rgyud 'bum): @sus lan gsum bklags na de tsa lag gi tshogs kyi skye bo dang bcas te thar par 'gyur ro// sus lan bzhi bklags na de yul 'khor thams cad thar par 'gyur ro// sus
109a2(rgyud 'bum): lan lnga bklags na de nyen kor gyi rgyal po dang thar par 'gyur ro/ / yang 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas/ dge slong tshe brjod la 'di skad ces smras so// chos kyi rnam grangs 'di myur du yul gzhan
109a3(rgyud 'bum): ngag tu bskur bar bya ste/ der yang yon tan 'di dag 'byung bar 'gyur ro// tshe brjod gang gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos la mi 'dzin tam/ mi klog gam/ yi ger mi 'brir ma/ yi ger
109a4(rgyud 'bum): 'drir mi 'jug gam/ kun chub par mi byed dam/ gzhan dag la'ang rgya cher yang dag par rab tu mi ston nam/ yul gzhan du mi 'byin tam/ sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas te mi
109a5(rgyud 'bum): nyan tam/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su mi sngo na/ mtshams med pa lnga byed pa rnams kyi 'gro ba ci 'dra ba de 'dra bar mngon par 'grub ste/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems
109a6(rgyud 'bum): dpa' thams cad kyis spang ba'o/ / yang 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas/ dge slong tshe brjod la 'di skad ces smras so// tshe brjod su zhig 'di tshad mar byed pa de ni ngas thog ma nyid du ngang par bya ba
109a7(rgyud 'bum): yin no/ / ji ltar 'dzam bu'i gling gi sems can thams cad bde bar 'gyur bar bya ba'i phyir/ nga ri'i rgyal po ri rab la song ste/ lha dang dri za rnams la rjes su bstan pa dang mthun par bya ra bya ba'i
109b1(rgyud 'bum): ta bya'o/ / de skad ces smras nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa mi sdang bar gyur to// dge slong tshe brjod kyis kyang 'jam dpal gnon dur gyur pas smras pa la mngon par bstong de bzung nas
109b2(rgyud 'bum): song ngo / / 'phags pa khyad par can zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so// // rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya many+dzu shri mU la tan+ta/ bod skad du
109b3(rgyud 'bum): 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi rtsa ba'i rgyud/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das gnas
109b4(rgyud 'bum): gtsang ma'i steng gi nam mkha'i dkyil na byang chub sems dpa' 'dus pa'i 'khor gyi tshogs so so tha dad pa/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba/ so sor rab tu gnas pa dang
109b5(rgyud 'bum): thabs cig tu bzhugs te/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ gnas gtsang ma'i rigs kyi lha'i bu rnams la bka' stsal pa/ lha'i bu dag khyed cag nyon cig/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
109b6(rgyud 'bum): dpa' chen po 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i cho 'phrul gyi spyod pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba/ ting nge 'dzin gyi bye brag dang / rdzu 'phrul dang / rnam par thar pa'i dkyil
109b7(rgyud 'bum): 'khor byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par 'phrul pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi nye bar 'tsho ba/ tshe dang / nang med pa dang / dbang phyug dang / yid la bsams pa yongs su rdzogs
110a1(rgyud 'bum): par byed pa'i sngags kyi gzhi dag sems can rnams la phan pa'i phyir bshad par bya ste/ de shin tu legs par nyon la yid la zung zhig dang ngas bshad par bya'o// de nas
110a2(rgyud 'bum): gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu de dag gis thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das la legs so zhes gsol te/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa ting nge 'dzin gyi khyad par dang / sa
110a3(rgyud 'bum): chen po thob par bya ba dang / rdo rje'i gdan gnon pa dang / bdud gdul ba dang / chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi nges par 'byung ba dang / lha rnams dang
110a4(rgyud 'bum): mi rnams su skye bar bya ba dang / sdug bsngal dang / dbul ba dang / nang rnams zhi bar byed pa/ longs spyod kyis phyug pa 'dren par byed pa/ 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i sngags kyi spyod
110a5(rgyud 'bum): pas 'phongs par mi byed pa/ re ba thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsung 'bras bu med par byed pa ma yin pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis byams pa'i thugs
110a6(rgyud 'bum): dang phan pa'i thugs dang / bdag dang sems can thams cad la thugs brtse ba nye bar bzung nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bshad du gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas thams cad
110a7(rgyud 'bum): dang ldan pa'i 'khor dang / gtsang ma'i gnas la sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis gzigs nas dag pa'i yul la 'od rnam par spros te/ yul rnam par 'jig pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs
110b1(rgyud 'bum): so/ / bcom ldan 'das snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu mdzod spu nas me tog kun tu skyes pa zhes bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' yang dag par bskul ba zhes bya ba'i 'od phyung ste/ 'od bye ba khri phrag
110b2(rgyud 'bum): brgya stong du ma'i 'khor gyis bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams su song nas/ byang shar phyogs su brgya stong gi gang+gA'i klung gi 'jig rten
110b3(rgyud 'bum): khams 'das nas/ me tog dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams su rjes su zhug te/ gang na me tog kun tu skyes pa rgyal po'i dbang po zhes bya ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa bzhugs par ro// der yang
110b4(rgyud 'bum): 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa sngon gyi smon lam gyi dbang gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i spyod pa dang ldan pa rnams dang lhan cig gnas par gyur to/ / 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur
110b5(rgyud 'bum): pas 'od zer gyi snang ba de mthong nas bzhin cung zad 'dzum pa dang ldan par gyur nas/ byang chub sems pa'i tshogs de dag la smras pa/ rgyal ba'i sras dag 'od 'di ni nga la yang dag par bskul ba'i
110b6(rgyud 'bum): phyir 'ongs pa yin gyis/ khyed cag g.yeng ba med par gyis shig ces smras so// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa mig mi 'dzums shing kha bye
110b7(rgyud 'bum): bas 'od gang na ba de logs su mngon du bltas nas 'dug go/ / de nas bskul ba'i 'od des me tog dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams snang ba chen pos snang bar byas te/ me tog kun tu skyes
111a1(rgyud 'bum): pa rgyal po'i dbang po de bzhin gshegs pa la lan gsum bskor ba byas te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i spyi bor nub par gyur to//
111a2(rgyud 'bum): de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa stan las langs te/ bcom ldan 'das me tog kun tu yang dag par skyes pa rgyal po'i dbang po de bzhin gshegs pa la lan gsum bskor ba byas te/ spyi bos phyag
111a3(rgyud 'bum): 'tshal nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das me tog kun tu skyes pa rgyal po'i dbang po la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba de bzhin gshegs
111a4(rgyud 'bum): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis bdag la dgongs te/ bcom ldan 'das bdag ni bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa la blta ba dang / phyag bya ba dang / bsnyen bkur bya ba dang
111a5(rgyud 'bum): sngags thams cad kyi spyod pa dang / sgrub thabs dang / dkyil 'khor dang / cho ga dang / gsang ba dang / cho ga zhib mo dang / cho ga'i ngo bo dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs dang
111a6(rgyud 'bum): gsang ba dang / phyag rgya dang / dbang bskur ba bstan pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'di nas mchi bar 'tshal
111a7(rgyud 'bum): lo/ / 'di skad ces bcom ldan 'das me tog kun tu skyes pa rgyal po'i dbang po de bzhin gshegs pa la gsol pa dang / 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa ting nge 'dzin gang la snyoms par zhugs pa na phyogs
111b1(rgyud 'bum): bzhi mtha' yas mu med pa steng dang / 'og dang / zad ka thams cad dang ldan pa'i phyogs sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis yang dag par gang bar gyur to// 'jig rten gyi khams de dang /
111b2(rgyud 'bum): bcom ldan 'das dang bcas pas rgyal ba'i sras legs so legs so// 'di lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin gyi khyad par la snyoms par zhugs pa ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis kyang mi nus
111b3(rgyud 'bum): byang chub sems dpa' spyod pa la zhugs pa dang / sa bcu la gnas pa dag gis kyang snyoms par zhugs par mi nus so// de nas bcom ldan 'das me tog kun tu yang dag par skyes pa rgyal po'i
111b4(rgyud 'bum): dbang po de bzhin gagags pos la rgyas bcom ldan 'das de rnams dang lhan cig tu yang dag par 'gros te/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa 'di'i snying po mchog tu gsang ba don thams cad sgrub pa'i snying po
111b5(rgyud 'bum): gsungs pa ni yi ga gcig pa zhes bya ba mchog tu gsang ba/ sems can thams cad kyi las thams cad byed pa/ sngags kyi spyod pa khyang par can bzang po yang dag par sgrub par byed pa'o// dngas
111b6(rgyud 'bum): bcom ldan 'das me tog yang dag par skyes pa rgyal po'i dbang po de bzhin gshegs pa yud tsam zhig cang mi gsung bar gyur te/ thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'jig rten tham cad la sangs rgyas kyi spyan
111b7(rgyud 'bum): gyis gzigs te/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la yang dag par dgongs nas byams pa'i thugs kyis sngags gsungs so// na maHsarba bud+d+hA naM oM maM/ 'di ni 'jam dpal
112a1(rgyud 'bum): snying po mchog yin te las thams cad byed pa'o/ / de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa ting nge 'dzin de las langs nas/ dper na skyes bu stobs dang ldan pa lag pa bskums
112a2(rgyud 'bum): pa las brkyang ba dang / brkyang ba las bskum pa 'am/ se gol gtogs pa tsam mam/ mig 'byed 'dzum tsam la rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs kyis shugs blo ting nge 'dzin ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi khyad par rnam par
112a3(rgyud 'bum): 'phrul pa zhes bya ba la snyoms par zhugs te/ mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams su chas te song ba dang / steng gi nam mkha'i dkyil na nor bu rin po che rab tu gnas pa'i gnas gtsang ma'i rigs kyi lha rnams
112a4(rgyud 'bum): gnas su chas te/ gnas gtsang ma'i gnas de thams cad 'od chen po'i snang bas gsal bar byas te/ 'od kyi rin po ches rab tu brgyan cing gsal ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so//
112a5(rgyud 'bum): 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu rin po che rnam pa tha dad pa du ma'i khang pa brtsegs pa dang / rin po che'i gdugs dang / dpag tshad brgya stong phrag du ma rgya che ba'i lha'i gos dang /
112a6(rgyud 'bum): dngar mang po'i tshigs kyis nye bar mdzes par byas pa'i 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// 'jam dpal gnon nur gyur pa de'i dus la bab par shes nas song zhig
112a7(rgyud 'bum): 'on kyang nga'i bkas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa la gnod pa nyung ngam/ nyam nga ba chung ngam/ bskyong pa yang ngam/ bde ba la reg par gnas sam zhes zhu bar bya'o// de nas
112b1(rgyud 'bum): bcom ldan 'das me tog yang dag par skyes pa rgyal po'i dbang po de bzhin gshegs pas/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// gzhan yang gzhon nu gang+gA'i
112b2(rgyud 'bum): klung brgya stong gi bye ma snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis khyod kyi sngags kyi spyod pa dang / dkyil 'khor dang / cho ga zhib mo dang / gsang
112b3(rgyud 'bum): ba dang / dbang bskur ba dang / phyag rgya'i tshogs dang / cho ga dang / sbyin sreg dang / bzlas pa dang / brtul zhugs bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed pa/ sems can thams
112b4(rgyud 'bum): cad dga' bar byed pa/ 'od rin po che'i tshogs kyis rab 'byam 'das pa dang / da ltar byung ba dang / ma 'ongs pa shes pa/ rgyal po'i dbang phyug lung ston par byed pa/ sngags bzla ba/ yul gyi
112b5(rgyud 'bum): mthar 'gro bar byed pa/ mi snang bar byed pa dang / dus dang / dam tshig rang 'byams kyi tshogs thams cad dang / 'jig rten pa ma lus pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i sangs rgyas dang /
112b6(rgyud 'bum): byang chub sems dpa' dang / 'phags pa nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi nges par 'byung ba'i spyod pa mthar thug pa gsungs pa dang / gsung ba dang / gsung bar 'gyur ba yin te/ de ltar
112b7(rgyud 'bum): rjes su yi rang ba nyid de/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa de'i dus la bab par shes na song zhig/ shAkya thub pa'i spyan sngar mngon sum du chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos par gyur te khyod kyang ston par
113a1(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur ro/ / yang gsungs pa/ na maHsarba ta thA ga ta nAM/ a tsin ta a pra ti ha ta shA sa nA nA/ oM s+pha ra s+pha ra a pra ti ha ta shA sa na ku mA ra rA pa ha ri Na/ oM hUM hUM phaT phaT swA
113a2(rgyud 'bum): hA/ 'di ni 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i rtsa ba'i sngags so// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gsungs la gsung zhing gsung bar 'gyur
113a3(rgyud 'bum): la/ khyod kyang mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams su song nas dbye ba dang rnam par dbye ba rgya cher ston par 'gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa zhes bya bas kyang las thams cad byed pa 'di rjes su
113a4(rgyud 'bum): gnang bar 'gyur ro/ / 'dir snying po mchog tu gyur pa ni/ oM bA kye daM na maH/ 'dir nye ba'i snying po ni/ bA kye hUM/ de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa bcom ldan 'das me tog yang dag par skyes
113a5(rgyud 'bum): pa rgyal po'i dbang po de bzhin gshegs pas gnang nas/ bkod pa thams cad kyi rgyan byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa dang rgyu mthun pa byang chub kyi snying po thob pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par
113a6(rgyud 'bum): bzhugs so/ / bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir lha'i me tog rnam par bkod pa dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / 'phreng ba'i tshogs dang / rin po che'i dril bu'i dra bas
113a7(rgyud 'bum): 'brel ba/ snyan pa'i sgra sgrogs pa/ phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i sa thob par byed pa/ lha'i dri dang / byug pa dang / 'phreng ba dang / phye ma'i char dbab par mngon par sprul to// de nas
113b1(rgyud 'bum): gnas gtsang ma'i rigs kyi lha'i bu rnams kyis byang chub sems dpa'i ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i cho 'phrul gyi rnam par 'phrul pa mthong nas ba spu ldang zhing gnas g.yo ba mthong nas snying 'dar zhing dngangs te/ ci bdag cag gi 'byor pa nyams par ma gyur ta ma zhes phan tshun du rings par 'gro zhing skad mthon pos smra ba rtsom par byed de/
113b2(rgyud 'bum): 'di skad du bcom ldan 'das yongs su bskyab tu gsol/ shAkya thub pa
113b3(rgyud 'bum): yongs su bskyab tu gsol zhes gsol to/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ thams cad dang ldan pa'i gnas gtsang ma'i 'khor rnams la bka' stsal pa/ grogs po dag ma 'jigs ma 'jigs shig/
113b4(rgyud 'bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa 'di ni me tog yang dag par skyes pa'i rgyal po de bzhin gshegs pa de'i spyan snga nas nga la blta ba dang / phyag bya ba dang
113b5(rgyud 'bum): bsnyen bkur bya ba dang / don chen po'i spyod pa dang / sngags kyi tshig dang / rgya che zhing rmad du byung ba'i chos kyi tshig ston pa'i phyir 'ongs pa yin no// de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas/ bcom
113b6(rgyud 'bum): ldan 'das shAkya thub pa la lan gsum bskor ba byas te/ mig mi 'dzums par bcom ldan 'das la blta zhing zhabs gnyis la btud de/ tshig 'bru 'di dag gis bcom ldan 'das la bstod pa
113b7(rgyud 'bum): skyes bu bskyed pa khyod phyag 'tshal/ / rgyam tshang khyod la phyag patsham ga byed rnamam tsha 5// spyod pa thams cad don grub pa// skyes bu seng ge khyod phyag 'tshal// phung krol thams cad zlog byed pa/
114a1(rgyud 'bum): dpa' bo chen po khyod phyag 'tshal// ngan 'gro thams cad 'jig byed pa// skyes bu pang dkar khyod phyag 'tshal// kun nas bsod nams dri ldan pa// skyes bu pad+ma khyod
114a2(rgyud 'bum): phyag 'tshal/ / srid gsum 'angam ni rnam dag byed// rnam grol khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// sdug bsngal ma lus rnam grol byed// 'i gyur khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// thams cad ldan pa legs
114a3(rgyud 'bum): 'dul byed/ / thams cad grub pa khyod phyag 'tshal// sngags kyi spyod pa'i don sgrub byed// bkra shis khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// bkra shis kun gyi bkra shis pa// sangs rgyas kun la khyod phya
114a4(rgyud 'bum): 'tshal/ / chos kun rnam par rtogs mdzad pa// chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid spros pa med pa'i ngo bo la yang dag par rjes su zhugs shing ston par byed pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// /
114a5(rgyud 'bum): shes bya dang shes bya'i dngos po thams cad dang / 'dus byas dang dus ma byas dang / theg pa gsum gyi lam dang mya ngan las 'das pa'i lam la 'jog par byed pa dang gnas par byed pa thams cad mkhyen pa
114a6(rgyud 'bum): khyod la phyag 'tshal lo zhes/ tshig 'bru 'di dag brjod pa'i stong pa'i tshig gi bcom ldan 'das la mngon sum du bstod nas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'di nas gang+gA'i klung brgya phrag stong gi bye
114a7(rgyud 'bum): ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das nas/ byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams na me tog yang dag par skyes pa zhes bya ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing mchis ste/ de na me tog dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi
114b1(rgyud 'bum): khams na gang du bcom ldan 'das me tog yang dag par skyes pa dbang po'i rgyal po de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar
114b2(rgyud 'bum): gshegs pa 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa de chos ston te/ thog mar dge ba/ nga dung se sa ya me gdon 'chang gcig lnga bzang ba
114b3(rgyud 'bum): ma 'dres pa/ yongs su rdzogs pa/ yongs su dag pa/ yongs su dkar ba/ tshangs par spyod pa yang dag par spyod pa yang dag par ston to// de da ltar bzhugs te 'tshe zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston to//
114b4(rgyud 'bum): sngags kyi spyod pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod dang / lam gsum gyi spyod pa'i lam sgrub par byed pa/ skyob pa dang / gnas dang / skyabs dang / dpung gnyen dang / bde ba dang /
114b5(rgyud 'bum): shin tu mthar thug pa dang / shin tu yongs su mthar phyin par byed pa sems can rnams la ston to// bcom ldan 'das de nyid kyi rjes su gnang nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs drung 'dir mchis
114b6(rgyud 'bum): so/ / bcom ldan 'das me tog yang dag par skyes pa rgyal po'i dbang po de'ang bcom ldan 'das la gnod pa nyung ngam/ bskyod pa yang ngam/ bde ba la reg par gnas sam zhes 'dri'o// 'di
114b7(rgyud 'bum): skad kyang gsung ste/ gang du 'di lta bu'i snyigs ma lnga'i dus su sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa 'byung ba ni ngo mtshar to zhes so// de'ang lam gsum dang / byang grol dang / mir skye

115b1(rgyud 'bum): m ldan 'das shAkya thub pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa de bzhin gshegs pa dang rjes su mthun pa'i gtam rnam pa sna tshogs sngon du 'gro ba mdzad
115b2(rgyud 'bum): nas/ chos bstan pa dang / rjes su mthun pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa sgrub pa dang rjes su mthun pas tshangs pa'i dbyangs dang / ka la bing ka'i skad dang / 'brug sgra dang / rnga bo che'i

115b4(rgyud 'bum): thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs pa sgrub pa/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi don thob par byed pa/ sngags thams cad kyi tshig dang / gsang ba dang bcas pa dang / dbang bskur ba dang /

115b6(rgyud 'bum): ldan pa/ rgyud shes pa dang / shes bya dang / dus dang / mi snang ba dang / rgyal po'i zhing du gyur pa/ 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i shes par byed pa/ mdor na sems can thams cad
115b7(rgyud 'bum): kyi bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed pa/ rang gi yon tan dang mthun pa'i sngags kyi spyod pa rjes su 'jug pa/ sems can gzhan dga' bar byed pa/ mi snang bar 'gro ba/ nam mkha'
116a1(rgyud 'bum): la 'gro ba/ chu la mi nub par 'gro ba/ yid gzhungs par byed pa/ 'gugs par byed pa/ sa 'og tu 'jug pa/ mngon du spyod par byed pa/ 'dod pa thams cad thob par byed
116a2(rgyud 'bum): pa/ gnod sbyin dang / gnod sbyin mo thams cad dang / mngag gzhug pa dang / sha za dang / 'byung po thams cad 'gugs par byed pa/ byis pa dang / rgan po dang / gzhon nu gnas ji lta ba bzhin
116a3(rgyud 'bum): 'jog par byed pa/ mdor na las thams cad byed pa ste/ yid la re ba thams cad rdzogs par byed pa/ mngon spyod dang / rgyas pa dang / zhi ba'i las ngag rab tu byed pa/ ji lta ji ltar rab tu sbyar ba
116a4(rgyud 'bum): de lta de ltar byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod phal po che bskal pa chen po'i rin po che'i le'u rab 'byam 'dings kyang rjes su gan po ning sangs rgyas thams cad kyis kyang gsungs te/ sems can dag pa'i rang gi
116a5(rgyud 'bum): sngags spyod pa'i don gyis chos kyi mdzod skye bo mang po la phan pa dang / skye bo mang po la bde ba dang / lha dang mi rnams dang / sems can thams cad kyi don du bstan pa'i phyir ro// de nas
116a6(rgyud 'bum): ' jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs pa'i 'od kyi snang ba bkod pa'i rgyan yang dag par bskul ba zhes bya ba byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par
116a7(rgyud 'bum): zhugs ma thag tu/ dag pa'i sems can gyi 'od kyi snang bas gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du ma'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'og min gyi gnas kyi bar dang / mnar med pa'i dmyal ba chen
116b1(rgyud 'bum): po'i bar du khyab par byas te/ sems can gang su dag shin tu sdug bsngal ba de dag thams cad kyi sdug bsngal rab tu zhi bar gyur to// nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang / byang chub sems
116b2(rgyud 'bum): dpa' dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams yang dag par bskul nas/ 'od de'ang 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i spyi bo'i gtsug tu nub par gyur to// 'dir gang dag shar phyogs na rnam par
116b3(rgyud 'bum): gnas pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de 'od zer rlung gi dkyil 'khor gyi reg pa'i bya bas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das yang dag par bskul to/ / de bzhin gshegs pa 'od kyi zla ba dri snang ba'i dpal zhes bya ba dang /
116b4(rgyud 'bum): de bzhin gshegs pa sman gyi bla bai DUR+Ya'i 'od dang / de bzhin gshegs pa dpal kun tu snang ba zhes bya ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rgyal po yang dag par 'phags pa zhes bya ba dang / de bzhin gshegs
116b5(rgyud 'bum): pas la'i rgyal po zhes bya ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten gyi dbang po'i rgyal po zhes bya ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag tu med pa ye shes rnam par nges pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba dang / de bzhin
116b6(rgyud 'bum): gshegs pa snang ba mtha' yas dbang po'i rgyal po zhes bya ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa snang ba'i 'od kyi rgyal po zhes bya ba dang / de dag la sogs pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems
116b7(rgyud 'bum): dpa'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba mtha' yas mu med pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams dag nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'dus pa dag/
117a1(rgyud 'bum): la mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi gnas gtsang ma'i khang bzang na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa dang / 'jam dpal
117a2(rgyud 'bum): gzhon nur gyur pa lhan cig tu byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa ston pa dang / sngags kyi tshig gi don gyi le'u rab 'byams ston te/ de bzhin du lho dang / nub dang / byang gi phyogs dang / phyogs mtshams
117a3(rgyud 'bum): dang / steng dang / 'og dang / thad ka thams cad dang ldan pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing snang bar byas te/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du bdud kyi gnas thams cad spa bkong bar byas nas/ byang chub sems
117a4(rgyud 'bum): dpa'i tshogs thams cad kyis yongs su bskor cing nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pas mdun gyis bltas te/ gnas gtsang ma'i gnas su sangs rgyas kyi 'phrul pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i bdag nyid
117a5(rgyud 'bum): chen po blta bar 'dod pa dang / sngags kyi spyod pa bsgrub pa dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi khyad par dang / le'u'i tshogs dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa thogs pa med pa gsal bar 'dod pas chas pa
117a6(rgyud 'bum): ni/ 'di lta ste/ lag bzang dang / rin chen bzang po dang / brtul zhugs bzang po dang / spyan mdzes dang / bzang dga' dang / chos bzang dang / don thams cad grub pa dang / thams cad du
117a7(rgyud 'bum): 'phags pa dang / chos 'phags dang / rin chen 'phags dang / rin chen dpal dang / lhun po'i dpal dang / bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dpal dang / 'od byed dpal dang / 'od dpal dang /
117b1(rgyud 'bum): don thams cad kyi dpal dang / thams cad phyag na rin po che dang / phyag na gtsug gi rin po che dang / phyag na lhun po'i rgyal mtshan dang / rnam par snang mdzad snying po dang / rin chen snying po dang
117b2(rgyud 'bum): ye shes snying po dang / bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i don gyi snying po dang / chos 'phags kyi snying po dang / rgyal mtshan gyi tog dang / tog bzang dang / mtha' yas tog dang / dri ma med pa'i tog dang /
117b3(rgyud 'bum): mtha' dag gi tog dang / nam mkha'i tog dang / rin po che'i tog dang / 'brug skra dang / rnga bo che'i skad kyi rgyal po dang / mtha' yas par snang ba'i ye shes kyi rgyal po dang / mun pa mun nag
117b4(rgyud 'bum): thams cad 'joms pa'i rgyal po dang / gnod pa thams cad rnam par 'jig pa'i rgyal po dang / spyod pa thams cad kyi yul shes pa'i rgyal po dang / 'jig rten gyi dbang po'i rgyal po dang / mngon par
117b5(rgyud 'bum): rtogs pa'i dbang po'i rgyal po dang / rnam par 'joms par byed pa'i rgyal po dang / nges par g.yo bar byed pa'i rgyal po dang / nyi ma'i rgyal po dang / dngos po med pa yang dag par 'phags pa'i rgyal
117b6(rgyud 'bum): po dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid yang dag par 'phags pa'i rgyal po dang / mi mthun pa'i phyogs med pa'i rgyal po dang / rang bzhin gyi 'od dang / bsod nams 'od dang / 'jig rten 'od dang /
117b7(rgyud 'bum): dpag med 'od dang / mtha' yas 'od dang / spyan bzang 'ong dang / 'byung med 'od dang / don gyi 'od dang / mi tshugs pa dang / bzod par dka' ba dang / las med dang / 'og min dang /
118a1(rgyud 'bum): dri med dang / me dang / 'od dang / zo dang / rtogs pa dang / bde ba dang / bde ba'i mu khyud dang / mu khyud tog dang / 'dod pa'i lha dang / lha dang / lha yul na yod
118a2(rgyud 'bum): pa dang / lte ba dang / rgyas pa dang / 'jig rten zhi ba dang / nye bar 'dod pa dang / rnga bo che dang / grub pa dang / dkar po dang / grags bzang dang / bzod par dka' ba dang / rnyed par dka' ba dang
118a3(rgyud 'bum): gdul bar dka' ba dang / bsnyen par dka' ba dang / ring du song ba dang / ring ba'i don dang / ring ba la gnas pa dang / mtho ba dang / shin tu mtho ba dang / srin bu me khyer dang / kun tu snang ba dang /
118a4(rgyud 'bum): snang med dang / khyu mchog dang / kun nas 'od dang / shin tu yid 'ong dang / yid bzang dang / lha chen po dang / dri med bzang po dang / dri ma mthar byed dang / dul ba dang / zhi ba dang /
118a5(rgyud 'bum): zhi ldan dang / mtshan bzang dang / rgyal mtshan dkar po dang / tshad ldan dang / ci sgra dang / tha chung dang / sel byed dang / 'tsho ba dang / legs skyes dang / du ba'i tog dang / rgyal mtshan
118a6(rgyud 'bum): tog dang / dkar ba'i tog dang / tog bzang dang / nor lha'i tog dang / nor lha'i bu dang / mes po dang / pa dang / mthar byed dang / 'jig rten grags pa dang / kun nas grags pa dang / grags
118a7(rgyud 'bum): pa chen po dang / dpal ldan dang / pham byed dang / 'od byed dang / mngag gzhug pa dang / zhi byed dang / 'jig rten byed dang / lha byed dang / mtho ris byed dang / mar me mdzad dang / 'byung po
118b1(rgyud 'bum): mthar byed dang / don thams cad mdzad dang / grub mdzad dang / gsal mdzad dang / snang bar mdzad pa dang / rnga bo che'i sgra dang / skad kyi sgra dang / sgra snyan dang / mtha' yas pa'i sgra dang
118b2(rgyud 'bum): tog gi sgra dang / ngan spong gi bu dang / gser thub dang / 'khor ba 'jig dang / 'od srungs dang / gtsug tor can dang / thams cad skyob dang / rnam par gzigs dang / shAkya thub pa dang
118b3(rgyud 'bum): 'di dag dang gzhan yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mang po dag gis gnas gtsang ma'i gzhal med khang snang bar byas te/ pad+ma'i gdan dag la bzhugs par gyur to// byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs
