136a6(rgyud 'bum): par gyur par shes nas/ khro bo'i rgyal po gshin rje'i gshed la smras pa/ kye khro bo chen po sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi rjes su nges par 'byung bar byed pa 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor
136a7(rgyud 'bum): chen po 'dus pa 'di'i sems can thams cad la srungs shig srungs shig/ dbang du gyis shig/ ma rungs pa gdul bar gyis shig/ sems can zhi ba dag sad par gyis shig/ sems can
136b1(rgyud 'bum): thams cad dad par gyis shig/ ji srid du nga'i rang gi sngags kyi spyod pa rjes su sgrub pa byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod rgya che ba dag las sngags spyod pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga 'chang bar byed pa de srid kyi bar
136b2(rgyud 'bum): du 'di dag gi phyi rol tu song la srung ba gyis shig/ de skad ces smras pa dang / khro bo'i rgyal po chen pos bka' mnyan nas khro bo chen po'i gzugs kyis sems can thams cad rjes su bsrung ba dang /
136b3(rgyud 'bum): / rjes su bstan pa'i phyir 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad du khro bo'i rgyal po gshin rje gshed khro bo'i 'khor brgya stong phrag du ma phyogs bzhi kun dang / steng dang / 'og dang / thad ka dag tu shin tu mi bzang
136b4(rgyud 'bum): pa'i sgra rab tu 'don cing gnas par gyur to/ / de nas sems can de dag zhi ba dang / yid dang / sems bzang po dang ldan par gyur te/ bka' las mi 'da' bar byed par gyur to// 'di lta bu'i
136b5(rgyud 'bum): sgra'ang thos par gyur te/ gang dam tshig de las 'da' bar byed pa de dag ni ardza kA'i dog pa bzhin du mgo tshal pa brgyar 'gas par 'gyur te/ de ni byang chub sems dpa'i byin gyi rlabs kyang de yin no//
136b6(rgyud 'bum): de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas rang gi sngags kyi spyod pa'i don du chos kyi tshig smras pa/ chos gcig la yang dag par bsams na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sngags 'grub par
136b7(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur te/ gcig pu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ chos thams cad spros pa med pa'i rnam par rjes su mthong ba'o// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos gnyis la rab tu gnas na sngags
137a1(rgyud 'bum): 'grub par 'gyur te/ gnyis po gang zhe na/ byang chub kyi sems mi gtong ba nyid dang / sems can thams cad la sems mnyam pa'o// chos gsum dang ldan na sngags
137a2(rgyud 'bum): kyi spyod pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur te/ gsum po gang zhe na/ sems can thams cad yongs su mi gtong ba nyid dang / byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims kyi sdom pa srung ba dang / rang gi sngags
137a3(rgyud 'bum): yongs su mi gtong ba nyid do/ / chos bzhi dang yang dag par ldan na dang po sems bskyed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa'i sngags 'grub par 'gyur te/ bzhi po gang zhe na/ rang gi
137a4(rgyud 'bum): sngags yongs su mi gtong ba nyid dang / gzhan gyi sngags rjes su gcod pa med pa nyid dang / sems can thams cad la byams pas gnas pa nyid dang / snying rje chen pos yongs su bsgos pa'i
137a5(rgyud 'bum): sems pa nyid do/ / chos bzhi po 'di dag dang ldan na dang po sems bskyed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sngags 'grub par 'gyur ro// chos lnga dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod la 'jug/
137a6(rgyud 'bum): cing sngags kyi spyod pa grub pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur te/ lnga po gang zhe na/ rnam par dben pa'i phyogs yang dag par sten pa nyid dang / bas mtha' dgon pa sten par byed pa nyid dang / sems can
137a7(rgyud 'bum): gzhan la zhe sdang med pa nyid dang / 'jig rten pa'i sngags la mi lta ba nyid dang / tshul khrims dang / thos pa dang / spyod pa la gnas par byed pa nyid de/ chos lnga po 'di dag dang ldan na sngags spyod
137b1(rgyud 'bum): pa'i don 'grub cing yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ / chos drug dang ldan na sngags kyi spyod pa 'grub cing yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur te/ drug po gang zhe na/ dkon mchog gsum la dang ba rjes su mi
137b2(rgyud 'bum): gcod pa nyid dang / byang chub sems dpa' la dang ba rjes su mi gcod pa nyid dang / 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i sngags la kun tu dga' ba nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings spros pa med pa la lta/
137b3(rgyud 'bum): bab nyid dang / theg pa chen po'i mdo sde zab mo'i tshig gi don mi spong zhing skyo ba med pa'i sems nyid dang / sngags kyi spyod pa yongs su btsal ba dang / dge ba'i phyogs yongs su mi gtong ba nyid de
137b4(rgyud 'bum): chos drug po 'di dag dang ldan na rig pa'i spyod pa dang sngags 'grub cing yang dag par sgrub pa nyid du 'gyur ro/ / chos bdun dang ldan na rig pa sgrub pa'i dus kyi thabs thob par 'gyur zhing / sngags kyi
137b5(rgyud 'bum): spyod pa la rjes su spyod pa nyid du 'gyur te/ bdun po gang zhe na/ theg pa zab mo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid sgom pa dang / klog pa dang / ston pa dang / 'don du 'jug pa dang / 'dri ba dang /
137b6(rgyud 'bum): byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la mos pa nyid dang / dus dang / phyogs dang / nges par sdom pa dang / bzlas pa dang / sbyin sreg dang / mi smra ba dang / dka' thub la gzhol ba nyid dang / rtogs
137b7(rgyud 'bum): pa dang / blo dang / dran pa dang / shes rab dang / brtan pa la bsnyen pa nyid dang / byang chub kyi tshogs dang / theg pa chen po dang / zab pa'i chos kyi tshul la yang dag par rab tu zhugs pa nyid dang
138a1(rgyud 'bum): rang dga'i sngags dgug pa'i bya ba la mkhas pa nyid dang / snying rje chen po dang / byams pa chen po dang / btang snyoms chen po dang / dga' ba chen po nyid yongs su sgom pa
138a2(rgyud 'bum): nyid dang / spros pa med pa'i sems can gyi khams kyi chos kyi dbyings kyi de bzhin nyid la 'jug pa gnyis su med pa'i ngo bo'i thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes yongs su 'tshel ba nyid dang / sems can
138a3(rgyud 'bum): thams cad yongs su mi gtong ba nyid dang / theg pa dman pa la dga' ba med pa nyid de/ chos bdun po de dag gis ni rig pa dang sngags 'grub cing yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// chos brgyad dang ldan
138a4(rgyud 'bum): na rig pa dang sngags kyi spyod pa'i don 'grub cing lam du 'gro bar 'gyur te/ brgyad po gang zhe na/ mthong ba dang ma mthong ba'i 'bras bu dag la blta ba dang sems par 'dod pa nyid dang / byang chub sems
138a5(rgyud 'bum): dpa'i 'bras bu dang bcas pa'i rdzu 'phrul dang rnam par 'phrul pa nyid la the tsom med cing dang ba nyid dang / phyin ci ma log pa'i sngags gzung ba dang bla ma la gus pa nyid dang / sangs rgyas dang byang chub sem
138a6(rgyud 'bum): dpa' nyid kyi sngags dang / rgyud dang / spyod pa bstan pa mi slu ba bzung zhing bdog pa thams cad yongs su gtong ba nyid dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing gnas dang gnas ma yin pa rmi lam na mthong ba rab tu ston
138a7(rgyud 'bum): pa la mkhas pa nyid dang / ser sna dang / gnyid dang / rmugs pa mtha' dag dang bral bar byed cing rtag tu brtson 'grus rtsom la/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' la bdag nyid 'bul bar byed
138b1(rgyud 'bum): pa nyid dang / mdor bsdu na dge ba'i rtsa bas cho ga mi shes gi go cha chen po bgos pa dang / bgegs thams cad rab tu sel bar 'dod pa nyid dang / byang chub kyi snying po gnon pa dang / longs spyod
138b2(rgyud 'bum): chen po dang / dbang che bar grags par bdag nyid 'dod pa nyid dang / dbang che bar grags pa'i gang zag la bsnyen pa dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang mi 'bral bar bya ba dang / byang chub sems
138b3(rgyud 'bum): dpa' 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la nye bar gnas pa nyid de/ chos brgyad po 'di dag dang ldan na sngags spyod pa'i don 'grub pa'i yang dag pa'i lam du 'gyur ro// grogs po dag mdor na byang chub
138b4(rgyud 'bum): kyi sems dang mi 'bral ba dang / dkon mchog gsum la dad pa dang / mchog tu sdug bsngal zhing tshul khrims nyams pa la yang mi skyo ba'i yid kyis rtag tu mngon par brtson pa la nga'i sngags kyi le'u rab
138b5(rgyud 'bum): 'byams mtha' yas shing rmad du byung ba byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i rgyu mthun pa'i yid las byung ba 'grub par 'gyur te/ de las gzhan du shes par bya ba ma yin no// rnam par rtog pa med pa'i
138b6(rgyud 'bum): yid du byas nas nyams sad pa'i phyir yang bsgrub par bya ba ma yin no/ / de nas thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / 'phags pa
138b7(rgyud 'bum): nyan thos rnams kyis byin gyis brlabs pa dag gis 'di skad du tshig rjod par byed de/ kye rgyal ba'i sras legs so legs so// sngags spyod pa'i don rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i bya ba chos kyi tshul la rjes su
139a1(rgyud 'bum): 'jug pa dang mthun zhing / chos bstan pa legs par bstan pa ni sems can thams cad kyi don gyi phyir ro// des na 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas chos rnam pa su tsho
139a2(rgyud 'bum): bstan pa dang rjes su mthun zhing sngags kyi spyod pa dang rjes su mthun pa legs par bstan pa nyid do/ / rgyal po chen po gang la la zhig 'dus pa'i le'u 'di klog par 'gyur ba dang / 'dzin par 'gyur
139a3(rgyud 'bum): ba dang / yid la byed par 'gyur ba dang / g.yul gyi thog mar glang po che'i steng du gzhag pa dang / me tog dang / bdug pa dang / dri dang / 'phreng ba dang / byug pa rnam pa sna tshogs kyis mchod par
139a4(rgyud 'bum): byed na/ de la bdag cag byin gyis rlob par byed cing phyir rgol ba dang dgra bo dag kyang dbang du 'gyur la/ gzhan gyi dmag gi dpung yang gzhig par bgyi'o// glegs bam la bris pa byas te rang gi khyim
139a5(rgyud 'bum): du bzhag na/ de la rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo 'am/ rgyal po 'am/ rgyal po chen po 'am/ rgyal mo 'am/ rgyal mo chen mo'am/ dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge
139a6(rgyud 'bum): bsnyen ma dag la srung ba chen po dang / longs spyod chen po dang ldan pa dang / tshe ring ba nyid dang / nad med pa nyid dang / longs spyod rtag tu mngon par 'phel ba nyid kyang bgyi'o// de skad ces smras nas
139a7(rgyud 'bum): thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor cang mi smra bar gyur to/ / theg pa chen po sngags kyi spyod pa bstan pa'i cho ga zhib mo chen mo las/ byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i rnam par 'phrul
139b1(rgyud 'bum): pa'i le'u rab 'byams rtsa ba'i cho ga zhib mo las 'dus pa'i le'u ste dang po'o/ / / de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor la bltas
139b2(rgyud 'bum): nas sems can thams cad kyi dam tshig la rjes su 'jug cing kun tu lta ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so/ / 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu lte ba'i
139b3(rgyud 'bum): dkyil 'khor gyi phyogs nas 'od zer bye ba brgya stong du ma'i 'khor dang ldan pa'i 'od zer phyung ste/ sems can gyi khams thams cad kun tu snang bar byas nas slar log ste// gnas gtsang ma'i gzha
139b4(rgyud 'bum): med khang snang bar byas nas 'khod par gyur to/ / de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la smras pa/ sems can thams cad kyi dam tshig sa
139b5(rgyud 'bum): rjes su zhugs pa zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi le'u rab 'byams kyi spyod pa sgrub pa/ sems can thams cad kyi thun mong du gyur pa/ khyod kyi sngags kyi tshogs gang du sems can yang dag par zhugs na/
139b6(rgyud 'bum): 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa thams cad kyi sngags 'grub pa yang dag par thob par 'gyur bas sems dpa' chen po khyod smos ni smos shig/ de skad ces smras pa dang / gsang ba pa'i bdag pa
139b7(rgyud 'bum): gnod sbyin gyi bdag po la/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas mchog tu gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi rgyud smras so// rig pa thams cad yang dag par bskul ba zhes bya ba'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam par 'phrul
140a1(rgyud 'bum): pa ston par byed do/ / lag pa g.yas pa bteg nas sor mo'i rtse mos 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor la ston par byed de/ sor mo'i rtse mo de las rig pa'i rgyal po bye ba zhi phrag brgya
140a2(rgyud 'bum): stong du ma byung ste/ byung nas kyang gnas gtsang ma'i gnas kyi gzhal med khang thams cad snang ba chen pos gnas par gyur to// de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas khro bo'i rgyal po gshin rje
140a3(rgyud 'bum): gshed kyi snying po las thams cad byed pa dang / dpa' bo gcig pa dang / spyan drang ba dang / gshegs su gsol ba dang / zhi ba dang / rgyas pa dang / mngon spyod dang / mi snang ba dang / nam
140a4(rgyud 'bum): mkha' la 'gro ba dang / sa 'og tu 'jug pa dang / chu la mi nub par 'gro ba dang / dgug pa dang / rnam par dbye ba dang / dbang du byed pa dang / dri thams cad dang / 'phreng ba dang / mar me dag kyang
140a5(rgyud 'bum): rang gi rgyud kyi sngags kyis sbyin par byed de/ mdor na ji lta ji ltar sbyar ba de lta de ltar sgrub par byed pa ni yi ge gsum zhes bya ba stobs chen po don thams cad sgrub par byed pa khro bo'i rgyal po'i sngags smras
140a6(rgyud 'bum): pa de gang zhe na/ oM AHhUM/ 'di ni khro bo chen po de'i snying po ste/ las thams cad byed pa/ dkyil 'khor thams cad dang sngags thams cad kyi spyod pa la sems dpa' chen po 'jam pa'i
140a7(rgyud 'bum): dbyangs kyis smras te/ bgegs thams cad 'jig par byed pa'o// de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas lag pa g.yas pa bteg ste khro bo'i spyi bor gzhag pa byas so// 'di skad du'ang smras te
140b1(rgyud 'bum): sangs rgyas thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dgongs su gsol/ gang su dag phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams na rnam par gnas shing mtha' yas mu med pa'i
140b2(rgyud 'bum): rdzu 'phrul dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams dam tshig la lhag par gnas par gyis shig/ de skad smras nas khro bo'i rgyal po la lag pa bskor nas btang bar gyur to// khro bo'i rgyal po chen po btang
140b3(rgyud 'bum): pa thag tu thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams dag tu song nas skad cig tsam gyis gang dag sdang ba'i bsam pa dang ldan pa'i sems can rdzu 'phrul che ba dag tshar bcad cing der bkug par gyur nas/ chos kyi dkyil 'khor chen po gnas gtsang ma'i gzhal med khang der yang dag par bcug ste/
140b4(rgyud 'bum): gnas ji lta ba bzhin du gnas par byas nas sems can ma rungs pa dag la'ang kun nas 'bar ba'i 'phreng ba'i
140b5(rgyud 'bum): tshogs su byas shing spyi bo la yang dag par gnas par byas so/ / de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor de la'ang bltas nas// sems can khyed cag thams cad nyon cig
140b6(rgyud 'bum): gang yang dam tshig 'di las 'das par gyur na de la bro bo'i rgyal po 'dis chad pa gcod par 'gyur te/ gang gi phyir zhe na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi dam tshig ni 'da' bar bya ba ma yin te/ sngags kyi don
140b7(rgyud 'bum): gyi tshig gsang ba byang chub sems dpa' rdzu 'phrul chen po dang ldan pa rnams kyis mdor bstan pa brjod par bya yis/ de legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung zhig dang bshad par bya'o// oM AHhUM/
141a1(rgyud 'bum): @na maHsarba bud+d+hA nA/ oM ra ra sma ra a pra ti ha ta shA sa na/ ku mA ra rU pa d+hA ri Na hUM hUM phaT phaT swA hA/ grogs po dag 'di ni rtsa ba'i sngags yin te/ 'phags pa 'jam dpa' zhes
141a2(rgyud 'bum): bya ba yin no/ / phyag rgya ni gtsug pud lnga pa zhes grags te/ de la rab tu sbyar bar bya'o// rtsa ba'i sngags 'di ni las thams cad pa zhes bya'o// snying po'i sngags ni las thams cad byed cing shes pa yin
141a3(rgyud 'bum): te/ oM bAkye daM na maH'dir phyag rgyar 'gyur ba ni gtsug pungad gsum pa zhes bya ba yir te/ longs spyod thams cad mngon par 'phel bar byed pa'o// 'dir nye ba'i snying por 'gyur ba ni/ bAkye hUM/ 'dir
141a4(rgyud 'bum): phyag rgyar 'gyur ba ni gtsug pud gsum pa zhes grags pa yin te/ sems can thams cad 'gugs par byed pa yin no// 'dir snying po mchog tu gyur pa ni maM/ 'dir phyag rgyar 'gyur ba ni rma bya'i gdan
141a5(rgyud 'bum): zhes bya bar bstan pa yin te/ sems can thams cad dbang du byed pa'o// gzhan yang phyag rgya thams cad kyi snying po dpa' bo chen po zhes bya ba yi ge brgyad yod de/ dpal mchog tu byed pa
141a6(rgyud 'bum): ngag byed chen po/ srid pa gsum gyi chos nye bar gcod par byed pa/ ngan 'gro thams cad zlog par byed pa/ ni ba thams cad byed pa/ las thams cad byed pa/ mya ngan las 'das pa'i bde ba thob par byed
141a7(rgyud 'bum): pa/ sangs rgyas mngon sum du mthong ba bzhin du nye bar gnas pa/ byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa nyid bzhin du nye bar gnas pa/ sems can thams cad kyi don gyi phyir mtshas
141b1(rgyud 'bum): tu gsang ba'i ngo bos nye bar gnas pa re ba thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed pa/ gang du dran pa tsam gyis mtshams med pa lnga'ang yongs su sbyong bar byed na/ bzlas pa lta smos kyang ci dgos/ de'ang
141b2(rgyud 'bum): gang zhe na/ oM A bI ra hUM khe tsa ra/ grogs po dag 'di ni yi ge brgyad po dpa' bo cher po zhes bya ba gsang ba'i snying po'i bdag nyid yin te/ sangs rgyas nyid bzhin du rab tu nye bar gnas pa yin no//
141b3(rgyud 'bum): mdor na bya ba thams cad la yon tan gyi mtha' rgya chen po brjod par ni bskal pa bye ba khri phrag brgya stong du mar yang mi nus te/ 'dir phyag rgya'ang stobs po che zhes rnam par grags pa/ re ba thams cad yongs
141b4(rgyud 'bum): / su rdzogs pa'o// spyan drang ba'i sngags ni/ oM he he ku mA ra bi shwa rU pi Ni/ sarba bA la b+ha shi Ta pra bo d+ha na/ e h+ye hi bA ga bA na/ e h+ye hi ku mA ra/ krI Da nut+pa la d+hA ri na maN+Da la ma d+he tiSh+Tha tiSh+ThA sa ma ya ma
141b5(rgyud 'bum): nu sma ra/ a pra ti ha ta shA sa nA nA na hU~M/ mA bi laM ba ku ru phaT swA hA/ 'di ni bcom ldan 'das 'jam dpal gyi spyan drang ba'i sngags so// sangs rgyas thams cad dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad
141b6(rgyud 'bum): dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang / 'phags pa nyan thos dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang
141b7(rgyud 'bum): sha za dang / srin po dang / 'byung po thams kyi'ang yin no// tsan dan gyi chur byas te lan bdun bsngags nas phyogs bzhi dang / steng dang / 'og dang / thams cad du gtor na sangs rgyas dang /
142a1(rgyud 'bum): byang chub sems dpa' dang / 'jam dpal gdon nur gyur pa rang nyid 'khor dang bcas pa thams cad dang / 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa thams cad dang / sngags
142a2(rgyud 'bum): dang de bzhin du 'byung po'i tshogs dang / sems can thams cad 'gugs par 'gyur ro// na maHsarba bud+d+hA nA na/ a pra ti ha ta shA sa nA nA na/ oM d+hu d+hu ra d+hu ra d+hu ma bA si ni/ d+hu ma ra tsa shi hUM tiSh+ka/
142a3(rgyud 'bum): sa ma ya ma nu sma ra swA hA/ bdug pa'i sngags so// tsan dan dang / ga pur dang / gu ra kum gcig tu byas te/ bdug pas bdugs na de bzhin gshegs pa rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams
142a4(rgyud 'bum): tsAng dang / sems can thams cad bdug pas tshim zhing dgyes nas bzhugs par 'gyur ro// 'dir yang phyag rgyar 'gyur ba ni// pad+ma'i phreng ba zhes grags pa// thams cad 'gugs byed zhi ba
142a5(rgyud 'bum): yin/ spyan drang ba yi sngabs la yang // pad+ma'i 'phreng ba bzang po zhes// bya ba'i phyag rgya 'di nyid do// sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang / sems can thams cad byon pa
142a6(rgyud 'bum): la mchod yon dbul bar bya ste/ ga pur dang / tsan dan dang / gu ra kum chu dang sbar nas me tog su ma dang / mA li ka dang / dbyar gyi me tog dang / me tog pu na ka dang / me tog pa ku la dang / me tog
142a7(rgyud 'bum): siN+Di ta ga ru 'di dag gang yang rung ba'i me tog ga ma/ dus ji lta ba'i me tog dri zhim po bcug ste/ sngags 'dis mchod yon dbul bar bya'o// na maHsarba bud+hA nAM/ a pra ti ha ta shA sa nA nA na/
142b1(rgyud 'bum): tad+ya thA ha he ma hA kA ru Ni ka bi shwa rA pa d+hA ra Ni/ arbaM pra tIts+tsha pa ya/ sa ma ya ma nu sma ra tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha/ maN+Da la ma d+h+ye pra be she ya pra be sha ya/ sarba b+hU tA nu kaM pa ka gr-ih+Na hUM/ aM pa ra bi tsI ri Na sA hA/ 'dir yang
142b2(rgyud 'bum): phyag rgya ni gang ba zhes bya bar grags pa sems can thams cad dang rjes su mthun zhing brtan pa'o/ / 'dir yang 'dra'i sngags su 'gyur ba ni/ na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nAM/ na maHsa man+ta gan+d+ha a ba b+hA sa
142b3(rgyud 'bum): shri ye/ ta thA ga tA ya/ dad+ya/ gan d+he gan d+he ga~M d+hA de/ gan+d+he na mo ra te/ pra tIts+tsha pra tIts+tshi maM/ gaM d+h+waM sa ma ta nu tsa ri Ni swA hA/ 'dir phyag rgyar 'gyur pa ni lo ma zhes bya ba re ba thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o//
142b4(rgyud 'bum): 'dir me tog gi sngags su 'gyur pa ni/ na maHsa maMn+ta bud+d+hA nAM/ i pra ti ha ta shA sa nA nAM/ na ma saM ku su mi ta ra dza s+ya/ ta thA ga ta s+ya/ tad+ya thA/ ku su me ku su me ku sa ma d+h+ye/ ku su ma pA ra bA si ni
142b5(rgyud 'bum): ku su ma pa ti swA hA/ bdug pa'i sngags 'di nyid dang gong du bstan pa'i bdug pas bdugs par bya'o// sku ni rmad byang bsam mi khyab// sangs rgyas thams cad phyag 'tshal te// rdzogs sangs
142b6(rgyud 'bum): rgyas kyis gsungs pa yi/ / gtor ma'i sngags ni bshad par bya// na maHsarba bu d+hA nA/ a pra ti ha ta shA sa nA nAM/ tad+ya thA/ he he b+ha ga bA/ ma hA satwa sarbA ba lo ki ta i maM ba liM gr-ih+NA pa ya greh+NA pa ya hUM hUM
142b7(rgyud 'bum): sarba bi shwa ra ra Ta Ta phaT swA hA/ 'dis ni bshos dbul bar bya ste/ 'byung po thams cad kyi gtor ma yang bya'o// 'dir phyag rgyar 'gyur ba ni mdung zhes bya ba ma rungs pa thams cad zlog par byed pa'o//
143a1(rgyud 'bum): nA maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nAM/ a pra ti ha ta shA sa nA nAM/ sarba ta mon d+ha ka ra bidz+rI sa nA~M/ na maHsa man+ta dz+yo ti gar+b+har+Na b+hA sa shri ye/ ta thAg ta ya/ tad+ya thA/ he he b+ha ga nA
143a2(rgyud 'bum): dz+yo ti rash+mi sha ta sa ha sra pra ti maN+Di ta sha rA ri bi kurba bi kurba ma hA bo d+hi satwa sa man+ta dzA long d+yo ti ta murti khu rda/ khu rda/ a ba lo ka ya/ a ba lo ka ya maM/ laM sarba/ sat+kA nAny+tsa sA hA/ mar me'i sngags/
143a3(rgyud 'bum): te/ 'dis mar me dbul bar bya'o// kha bye ba zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya ni sems can kun gyis mthong ba'o// na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA na/ a pra ti ha ta shA sa nA nAM/ tad+ya thA/ dz+wA la dzA la/ dz+wa la ya dz+wa la ya
143a4(rgyud 'bum): hUM bi b+ho da ka ha ri kr-iSh+Na pad+ma la swA hA/ me'i bya ba byed pa'i sngags so// 'dir yang phyag rgyar 'gyur ba ni// sems can kun la 'od gsal byed// kha sbyar zhes byar 'jig rten grags// byang chub
143a5(rgyud 'bum): sems dpa' blo ldan gyis/ / thub pa mchog gis sngon bshad pa'o// de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas/ byang chub sems dpa' phyag na rdo rje la smras pa/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po sngags
143a6(rgyud 'bum): kyi mig 'di ni gsang ba dang bcas shing mchog tu gsang bar bya ba yin te/ khyod bu 'jig rten rnam grags pa'i// mi bzad pa ni gang yin pa// sngags rnams dag ni thams cad kyis// mkhas
143a7(rgyud 'bum): pa rnams kyis sgrub pa ste/ / spyi bo'i gdu bu zhes grags pa// rdo rje pad+ma'i rigs kyang yin// de ni rnam par gzhig pa'i phyir// rig pa 'di ni yang dag brjod// na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA na
143b1(rgyud 'bum): a pra ti ha ta shA sa nA nA~M/ oM ka ra ka ra/ ku ru ku ru/ ma ma kA b+hany+dza b+hany+dza/ sarba big+h+nA da ha dA sarba badz+ra bi nA ya kAM mur+d+ha ka Ta dzi bi tAn+ta ka ra ma hA bi kri ta rU pa d+hA ri Ni/ pa tsa paH sarba duSh+Ta/ ma hA ga na pa
143b2(rgyud 'bum): dza bi tAn+ta ka ra ban d+ha pan d+ha sarba gra hA na/ Sha Da mu kha Sha Da bu dza/ Sha Da tsa ra Na ru dra ma nA yai/ biSh+Nu ma nA ya/ brah+ma d+ya de ba ma nA ya mA bi la ma ba/ la hu la hu maN+Da la ma d+h+ye pra be sha ya/ si ma ya ma nu sma ra hUM
143b3(rgyud 'bum): hUM hUM hUM hUM hUM phaT phaT swA hA/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po 'di ni 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i mechog tu gsang ba'i sngags chen po gdong drug pa zhes bya ba yin te/ khro bo'i rgyal po bgegs thams cad
143b4(rgyud 'bum): 'jig par byed pa ste/ 'di brjod pa tsam gyis sa bcu'i dbang phyug la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' yang 'jig par byed pa yin na/ bgegs ma rungs pa lta smos kyang ci dgos/ 'di brjod pa
143b5(rgyud 'bum): tsam nyid kyis bsrung ba chen po byas par 'gyur ro/ / 'dir yang phyag rgyar 'gyur ba ni// nag po chen po zhes bya ba'i// bgegs rnams thams cad zhi byed pa'o// 'di nyid kyi khro bo'i rgyal po'i
143b6(rgyud 'bum): snying po ni/ oM hrIHSh+T+rIHbi kr-i tA na ra hUM sarba sha tru nA sha ya staM b+ha ya phaT phaT swA hA/ sngags 'di brjod pas dgra thams cad zug gzer chen po dang / nang chen po dang / nyin bzhi pa'i rims kyis thebs
143b7(rgyud 'bum): par 'gyur ro/ / rtag tu dgang ba med pa dang / byams pa med pa dang / snying rje'i sems thob par mi 'gyur te/ bzlas pa zin gyi bar du grol bar mi 'gyur zhing 'chi bar 'gyur ro// dkon mchog
144a1(rgyud 'bum): gsus la gnod pa byed pa dag la bya'i/ zhi ba'i sems yod pa gzhan dag la ni ma yin no// phyag rgya ni rtse gsum chen po zhes bya ba sbyar bar bya'o// 'dir nye ba'i snying por
144a2(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur ba ni/ oM tri kA la rU pa hUM khaM swA hA/ phyag rgya ni rtse gsum chen po zhes bya ba nyid sbyar bar bya'o// ma rungs pa thams cad la gang 'dod pa de byed por 'gyur ro// snying po'i mchog sangs
144a3(rgyud 'bum): rgyas thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs pa yi ge gcig pa zhes bya'o/ / hUM/ 'di ni las thams cad byed pa'o// phyag rgya'ang rtse gsum chen po zhes bya bar sbyar bar bya'o// phung krol thams
144a4(rgyud 'bum): cad zlog par byed pa/ 'byung po thams cad dbang du byed pa ste/ mdor na khro bo'i rgyal po 'di ni las thams cad la sbyar bar bya'o// dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su bzlas pa byas na grub pa'i dus su khyad
144a5(rgyud 'bum): du 'phags par 'gyur ro/ / 'dir gshegs su gsol ba'i sngags su 'gyur pa ni/ na maHsarba bud+d+hA nAM/ a pra ti ha ta shA sa nA nAM/ tad+ya thA/ dza ya dza ya su dza ya/ ma hA kA ru Ni ka bi shwa rA pi
144a6(rgyud 'bum): Ni gats+tsha sarba bu da d+hAsh+tsa bi sardza ya sa pa ri bA raM swa b+hA ba nAM tsa pra be sha ya sa ma ya ma nu sma ra sarban+na shA me/ sid d+h+yan+tu man+ta pA da ma no ra thaM tsa/ me pa ri pA ra yan+tu sA hA/ 'di ni gshegs su gsol ba'i sngags
144a7(rgyud 'bum): te/ las thams cad la sbyar bar bya'o// phyag rgya ni bzang po'i gdan zhes bya ba yin te/ 'dis gdan la'ang sbyor bar bya'o// yid kyis bzlas pa bdun byas te gshegs su gsol lo// 'jig rten
144b1(rgyud 'bum): dang 'jig rten las 'das pa thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor dang / sngags dang / sngags 'grub pa dag dang / dam tshig dang / bzlas pa dang / dus dang / nges par sdom pa dag la'ang sbyar bar bya'o// de
144b2(rgyud 'bum): nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas gnas gtsang ma'i gzhal med khang la'ang bltas te/ 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor chen po dang / rang gi rig pa'i tshogs kyi sngags kyi le'u raba'i byams smras so//
144b3(rgyud 'bum): na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nAM/ a pra ti ha ta gA tri NAM/ oM ri Ti Ni swA hA/ 'di ni 'jam dpal gyi rjes su 'brang ba s+thA can ma zhes bya ba'i rig pa las thams cad byed pa/ phyag rgya chen po gtsug pung lnga zhes
144b4(rgyud 'bum): / bya ba dug gi las thams cad la sbyar bar bya'o// na maHsarba bud+d+hA nAM/ a pra ti ha ta shA sa nA nAM/ oM ni ti/ 'di ni nye ba'i sgracan ma zhes bya ba'i rig pa yin te/ las thams cad byed pa'o//
144b5(rgyud 'bum): phyag rgya ni kha bye ba zhes bya ba gza' thams cad kyi las la sbyar bar bya'o// na mAHsa man+ta bud+d+he nAM/ a pra ti ha ta ga tI nAM lon+d+ri/ rig pa 'di ni pad+ma can zhes bya ste/ las thams cad byed cing dge ba 'o//
144b6(rgyud 'bum): / phyag rgya bzang po'i gdan zhes bya ba dang ldan pas gnod sbyin mo nges par dgug par bya'o// na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nA~M/ a tsi tAd b+hu ta rU pA NAM/ oM Sh+TaM b+h+rUM swA hA/ phyag rgya mdung ni bsngags pa yis/
144b7(rgyud 'bum): mkha' 'gro ma rnams 'joms par byed// sangs rgyas dag ni thams cad kyis// thams cad gzugs can rab sngags pa// rig pa thod can zhes bya ba// 'jam pa'i dbyangs kyis bshad pa yin//
145a1(rgyud 'bum): na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nAM/ a pra ti ha ta tsa rInA~M/ tad+ya thA/ oM ba ra de swA hA/ phyag rgya gtsug pung gsum nyid ni// dpal sbyin byed pas sbyar bar bya// gzugs mang 'chang ba
145a2(rgyud 'bum): / lha mo ni// myur du longs spyod grub byed pa'o// na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nAM/ a tsi tAd b+hu ta rU pI NAM/ oM b+hu ri swA hA/ phyag rgya mdung rtse yang dag sbyar// rims nad thams cad rnam 'jig yin//
145a3(rgyud 'bum): na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nAM/ a tsau t+yAd b+hu ta rU pI NAM/ oM tA re swA hA/ rig pa phug ron zhes bya ba// las rnams kun la rab tu bsngags// phyag rgya mdung dang ldan pa yis// bgegs ni 'joms par
145a4(rgyud 'bum): byed pa yin/ / ni maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nAM/ a tsi trad b+hu ta rU pI NAM/ tad+ya thA/ oM bi lo ki ni swA hA/ rig pa snang ldan zhes bya ba// 'jig rten thams cad dbang du byed// bde ba thams cad sbyin
145a5(rgyud 'bum): byed pa/ / gdong gi phyag rgya sbyar bar bya// na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nA~M/ a tsin de b+hu ta rU pI/ tad+ya thA/ oM bi shwe bi shwe saM b+hA be bi shwa rU pI Ni ka ha A be sha sa ma ya ma nu s+pha ra ru ru tiSh+Tha swA hA/ rig pa chen
145a6(rgyud 'bum): po stobs chen 'di/ / 'jig rten 'dren pas bstan pa skye/ mche bo'i phyag rgya ljin byas na// sems can thams cad 'bebs shing dag/ 'byung po kun la mchog sbyin pa// thams cad ces na
145a7(rgyud 'bum): yang dag bsgrags/ / namaHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nA~M/ a tsi tAd b+hu ta rA pI dz+dza/ mi shwe te shrI ba su swA hA/ rma bya'i gdan gyi phyag rgya yis// rnam dgong las ni thams cad byed// dkar mo chen po zhes bya
145b1(rgyud 'bum): ga/ rmang byung bsam mang gzugs can// / 'jig rten rnams kyi skam ldan byed// skyes pazung med dbang du 'gyur// namaHsa pan+taT+Tadz+nyAnA/ arba tu b+hut+ta rA Shidz+dza/ 6/ ma ma#
145b2(rgyud 'bum): / khu ri sarba sha truM staM b+ha ya dzaM b+ha ya mo ha ya ba sha mA na ya swA hA/ rig pa 'di ni rig chen po// rnal 'byor ma zhes rab tu bstan// phyag rgya gdong gsum sbyar byas na// ma rungs sems can 'dul bar
145b3(rgyud 'bum): byed/ na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nA~M/ oM pra ti ha ta sha ka ti pra tsi ri NAM/ tad+ya thA/ oM shrIH/ rig pa 'di ni dpal chen mo// 'jig rten mgon gyis bstan pa ste// phyag rgya kha sbyar sbyar byas nas// rgyal
145b4(rgyud 'bum): srid chen po sbyin byed pa'o/ / na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA naM/ sarba satwa b+ha ya pra dA yi nAM/ oM a dzi ti ku mA ra rU pi ni e h+ye hi A gats+tsha sa ma kAr+yaM ku ru swA hA/ rgyal byed ma zhes rnam grags pa// gzhon nu bdud
145b5(rgyud 'bum): / rtsi las byung ba// rdzogs pa'i phyag rgya ldan pa yi saM// dgra rnams thams cad zlog par byed// na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nAM/ a tsin+nad b+hu ta rU pA NAM/ tad+ba thA/ oM dza ye swA hA/ a dzi te swA hA/ a
145b6(rgyud 'bum): pa ra dzi ti swA hA/ sring mo bzhi zhes rnam grags pa// byang chub sems dpa'i rjes 'gro ba// sa rnams thams cad kun 'gro ning // kun la rjes su 'dzin byed pa'o// ming po gtum bu ru zhes
145b7(rgyud 'bum): grags/ / 'di dag gi ni rjes su 'brang // gru yi bzhon pa la zhon nas// rgya mtsho la ni gnas pa yin// khu tshur phyag rgya bcings pa yis// bsam pa thams cad yongs rdzogs byed// na maHsa
146a1(rgyud 'bum): man+ta bud+d+hA nAM/ lo kA prA d+hi pa tI nA/ tad+ya thA/ oM ku mA ra ma hA ku mA ra ki Ta ki Ta/ sha mu kha bo d+hi satwA nu dzA ta/ ma yu ra san/ shak+Sh+No d+hi te pA ne/ rak+taM ga rak+ta ga d+hA ru le ba na pra A ya
146a2(rgyud 'bum): kha kha kha hi khA hri hU~M nI t+ya/ rak+ta pa shwA tsitita murti sa ma ya ma nu s+pha ra/ b+h+ra ma b+h+ra ma/ d+hA ma ya d+hA ma ya/ la hu la hu mA bi laM ba sarba kir+ya Ni ma ku ru ku ru/ bi tsing tu rU pa d+hA ri Ni/ tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha hUM sarba bud+d+hA nu d+hA ta sA hA
146a3(rgyud 'bum): skyob pa byang chub sems dpa' ni/ / 'jam pa'i dbyangs kyis bshad pa na// sa rnams me lus rnam drug tu// kun nas yongs su rab tu g.yos// sems can kun gyi don phyir dang // ma rungs sems
146a4(rgyud 'bum): can bzlog pa'i phyir/ / mi bzang dbang phyug bu'i gzugs su// gdul ba'i don du 'dir skyes te// skem byed dang ni mig dmar gyi// phyag mtshan gyis ni mtshon pa ste// snying rjes thugs ni brlan pa
146a5(rgyud 'bum): yin/ 'jam pa'i ngag gis gsungs pa yin// sems dpa'i nang na bdag nyid che// byis pa rnams la phan byed gang // sems can spyod phyir brtson pa ni// 'gro ba kun la rnam par spyod/
146a6(rgyud 'bum): phyag rgya mdung dang ldan pa yis// bdag nyid chen pos sgyur na ni// tshangs pa sogs pa'ang 'gugs byed na// mi rnams la ni smos ci dgos// gzhon nu'i sems su mtha' dag ni// bsdus nas
146a7(rgyud 'bum): yongs su bshad par bya/ / smin drug bu dang 'jam dpal gyi// sngags su 'di ni yang dag bstan// sems can rjes su gzung ba'i phyir// byang chub sems dpar 'dir ston to// yid gsum
146b1(rgyud 'bum): zhes bya'i snying po ni/ / 'jil sngags su brjod pa yin// sems can kun sa phan pa'i phyir// longs spyad 'dren pa'i mchog yin// phyug rna mdung dang ldan pa yis// bkod nams
146b2(rgyud 'bum): byed pa yin/ / oM hUM dz+dza/ sngags 'di mdo ru bsdu byas na// mi rnams kyi ni don byed do// na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nA~M/ sa man+ta d+yo ti ta mud+hI nA~M/ oM bi kr-i ta gra ha hUM phaT swa dA/ 'di yang nye ba'i sing
146b3(rgyud 'bum): po ste/ rang bzhin phyag rgya mdung ldan pas// 'byung po thams cad 'gugs byed cing // de bzhin gza' dang ma mor bcas// phyag rgya kun gyi phyag rgyal// bkod na 'bras bur bcas par 'gyur//
146b4(rgyud 'bum): 'byung po rnams ni dngangs byed cing // ma rungs 'jug pa zlog par byed// 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa 'di'i gdong drug gi bu zhes bya ba'i 'jam dpal gzhon nu ni rjes su 'brang ba ste/ las
146b5(rgyud 'bum): thams cad byed pa ste/ bzlas pa tsam kho nas las thams cad byed par 'gyur ro// 'byung po thams cad dngangs par byed pa dang / skrag par byed pa dang / 'gugs par byed pa dang /
146b6(rgyud 'bum): dbang du byed pa dang / skems par byed pa dang / 'jig par byed pa dang / rig pa 'dzin pa ji ltar 'dod pa de thams cad sgru par byed pa'o// na maHsa man+ta prad+d+hA naM/ a pra ti ha ta shA sa nA nA
146b7(rgyud 'bum): tad+ya thA/ oM brah+ma brad+d+ha bar tsas shAn+tiM ku ru swA hA/ sngags 'di tshangs pa chen po ste// byang chub sems dpas bshad pa yin// 'byung pos ni gyur rab tu theg// skad cig nyid la bsil
147a1(rgyud 'bum): bar gyur/ / phyag rgya gtsug pud lnga sbyar na// myur du dge legs thob par 'gyur// mngon spyod dag ni thams cad la// srid srung gi ni rig byed 'dod// 'dzin
147a2(rgyud 'bum): mdor bsdus bstan pa ste/ / 'di yi cho ga bsdus pa yin// na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nAM/ a pra ti ha ta shA sa nAnA/ tad+ya thA/ oM ga ru Da bA hA na tsakra pA Ni/ tsa tur+N+Na dza hUM hUM sa ma ya ma nu s+pha ra
147a3(rgyud 'bum): bo d+hi satwa Adz+nyA pa ya ti swA hA/ 'jam pa'i dbyangs kyis bka' stsal pa// zhi ba'i don ni myur byed yin// 'byung po rnams ni rnam 'jig cing // khyab 'jug gzugs kyi lus can yin// phyag
147a4(rgyud 'bum): rgya gtsug pung gsum sbyar na/ / las rnams kun byed brtan pa yin// gang dag khyab 'jug rgyud las ni// bya ba rgya chen bstan pa dag/ thabs kyis gdul bya'i sem sa la// 'jam pa'i byang
147a5(rgyud 'bum): kyis bshad pa yin/ / na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nAM/ a pra ti ha ta shA sa nA nA/ tad+ya thA/ oM ma hA ma he shwa ra b+hU tA d+hi pa ti praSha b+ha d+h+wa dza pra laM ba dza DA mu ku Ta d+hA ra Ne/ si ta b+has+sa d+hu sa ri Ti mU rti hUM hUM phaT phaT/
147a6(rgyud 'bum): bo d+hi satwo dz+nyA pa ya ti swA hA/ sems can rnams la phan 'dod pas// sngags 'di bdag gis smras pa ste// phyag rgya mdung rtse gsum sbyar na// 'byung po thams cad rnam 'jig pa'o// bdag
147a7(rgyud 'bum): gis sngon ni gang bstan pa/ / 'di yi cho ga sngon byung ba// sems can sa steng gnas pa la// zhib pa zhes brjod pa ste// yon tan sna tshogs rgya che ba// zhi ba'i rgyud las nga yis bstan//
147b1(rgyud 'bum): namaHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nA~M/ a pra ti ha ta shA sa nA nA/ tad+ya thA/ oM shA kya nam hA shA kan/ pad+ma bi di ta pa kA sarba pA nA shI ga kha kha Sha hi khA hi sa ma ya ma nu s+pha ra hU~M tiSh+Tha bo d+hi satwa A dz+nyA pa ya ti sA hA/ sdug+sa
147b2(rgyud 'bum): 'di mthu ni chen po ste/ / nam mkha' lding zhes rnam par grags// gdul dka' 'dul byed rnams kyi mchog/ gdengs ka can gyi dug rnams 'joms// phyag rgya che dang sbyar byas na// phung krol
147b3(rgyud 'bum): shin tu mi bzang 'joms/ / gnas dang 'gro ba'i dug dag ni// gso bar byed par the tsom med// sems can gdul bya'i thabs su ni// byang chub sems dpa'i yang dag dka'// nam mkha'
147b4(rgyud 'bum): lding gzugs sa la spyod/ / 'dab chags dbang po 'od chen ldan// ji srid nam mkha' lding rgyud du// tshi ga rgya cher bstan de dag/ sems can rnams la phan pa'i phyir// thams cad nga
147b5(rgyud 'bum): yis bstan pa ste/ / byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' lding // gdul ba'i don du 'di bstan to// gdengs can dug ni gzhom bya'i phyir// 'ang ba chags tshul gyis rnam par rgyu// 'jig
147b6(rgyud 'bum): rten sngags ni ji srid pa/ / cho ga 'di ni bstan pa na// sems can gdul bya'i dor du ni// de lta de ltar rnam par rgyu// gang yang de bzhin gshegs sngags dang // rdo rje pad+ma'i rigs dag kyang //
147b7(rgyud 'bum): nga yis cho ga rab 'byams dang // mdo dag kyang ni bstan pa yin// ji ltar ma mo mang po ni// 'bad pas byis pa rnams srung ba// de bzhin byis pa'i blo can la// sngags kyi tshul gyi sang yis
148a1(rgyud 'bum): bshad/ / sngon ni stobs bcu ldan pas bstan// de ni nga yis bstan pa yin// sngags rgyud don ni ma lus pa// 'od chen gzhon nus bstan pa yin// rgyal ba mchog gis
148a2(rgyud 'bum): gang gsungs dang / / stobs bcu ldan pa'i sras gsungs dang // rmad byung bsam mi khyab tshul gyis// 'jam dbyangs kyis gsungs de dag go// de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas thams cad
148a3(rgyud 'bum): dang ldan pa'i gnas gtsang ma'i gzhal med khang dang/ 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor chen po la gzigs nas dam tshig thams cad yang dag par bskul ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so// gang du
148a4(rgyud 'bum): ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs pa na sems can mtha' dag gi sgrub pa'i spyod pa sems la rab tu zhugs par gyur to/ / 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu thams cad dang
148a5(rgyud 'bum): ldan pa'i gnas gtsang ma'i gzhal med khang nor bu chen po sna tshogs pa'i rgyan bkod pa'i dkyil 'khor du gyur te/ bsam gyis mi khyab cing rmad du byung ba'i byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par 'phrul pa rang
148a6(rgyud 'bum): sangs rgyas thams cad dang / 'phags pa nyan thos dang / byang chub sems dpa' spyod pa la zhugs pa dang / sa bcu'i dbang phyug la gnas pa dag gis kyang dkyil 'khor de bri ba 'am 'drir 'jug par mi
148a7(rgyud 'bum): nus na/ so so'i skye bor gyur pa'i sems can gyis lta smos kyang ci dgos// 'phags pa'i dkyil 'khor bzang po de grub pa'i gnas skabs la gnas pa/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas gzigs nas/
148b1(rgyud 'bum): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang / 'phags pa nyan thos thams cad dang / byang chub sems dpa' sa bcu la rab tu gnas pa rgyal tshab tu dbang bskur
148b2(rgyud 'bum): ba thams cad dang / spyod pa la zhugs pa thams cad dang / zag pa dang bcas pa dang zag pa med pa thams cad 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems
148b3(rgyud 'bum): dpa'i mdzad pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rgyu mthun pa dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi khyad par gyi thugs las byung ba'i dkyil 'khor la zhugs par bdag nyid kyis yang dag par shes par gyur to// sems can
148b4(rgyud 'bum): so so'i skye bo'i yid kyis kyang de dmigs par mi nus na/ bri ba'am 'drir 'jug pa lta smos kyang ci dgos/ de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas dkyil 'khor chen po bzang po de la rab tu zhugs
148b5(rgyud 'bum): pa'i sems can de dag la smras pa/ grogs po dag nyon cig/ 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis bzla bar bya ba ma yin na/ sems can gzhan 'phags
148b6(rgyud 'bum): pa dang 'phags pa ma yin pa rnams kyis lta smos kyang ci dgos/ de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po phyag na rdo rje la smras pa/ kye rgyal ba'i sras mi las 'das pa'i
148b7(rgyud 'bum): dkyil 'khor dam pa yid las byung ba ni bstan to/ / mi rnams kyi dkyil 'khor bstan par bya ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams yongs su mya ngan las 'das na'ang sems can rnams gang du yang
149a1(rgyud 'bum): dag par zhugs na'ang sems can rnams gang du yang dag par zhugs na/ 'jig rten dang 'dzin rten las 'das pa'i sngags thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro// de nas gsang
149a2(rgyud 'bum): ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la smras pa/ rgyal ba'i sras gang de dus la bab par shes na gsungs shig gsungs shig/ shAkya seng ge mgon po ni// yongs
149a3(rgyud 'bum): su mya ngan 'das 'og na/ / sems can rnams kyis sangs rgyas nyid// sa steng khyod kyi dkyil 'khor byed// mthong ba tsam gyis 'jig rten na// sngags ni rab tu 'grub par 'gyur/
149a4(rgyud 'bum): mi shes cho ga nyams pa 'am// dam tshig bdag por ma gyur na// bdag nyid chen po tshangs pa yang // sngags rnams 'grub par mi 'gyur ro// sngags la ngang pa med pas ni// 'bad pa du ma byas
149a5(rgyud 'bum): gyur kyang / / sngags rnams 'grub par mi 'gyur bas// ma rungs dam tshig mi bstan to// dam tshig sbyor ba nyams pa ni// rab 'byams brgya byin yin na yang // sngags rnams 'grub
149a6(rgyud 'bum): par mi 'gyur na/ / mi rnams smos kyang ci zhig dgos// dam tshig bstan bcos de nyid shes// las kyi spyod pa sgrub pa la// 'jig rten 'jig rten 'das pa yi// sngags rnams thams
149a7(rgyud 'bum): cad 'grub par 'gyur/ / 'jam dpal dbyangs kyi dkyil 'khor ni// las kun byed la rab zhugs na// bistan pa la ni gnon nu bzhin// sngags rnams 'grub par 'gyur ba yin/
149b1(rgyud 'bum): de nas gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes/ sems dpa' chen po de la gsol ba btab pa/ kye sems can chen po sems can chen po/ sems can gyi don gyi phyir mdor bsdus pa'i dkyil 'khor
149b2(rgyud 'bum): gsungs shig ces so/ / gsang ba pa'i bdag pos de skad ces smras pa/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas sems can gyi don gyi phyir dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga smras pa/ re zhig dang po cho 'phrul zla phyed dam/
149b3(rgyud 'bum): dpyid zla 'bring po 'am/ dpyid zla tha chung ngam/ zla ba yar ngo'am/ nyin zhag dge ba dang / gza' bzang po la bltas te/ rgyu skar bzang po dang ldan pa yar ngo'i tshes gcig dang / zla ba nya ba dang /
149b4(rgyud 'bum): dus gzhan la dbyar gyi dus spangs la/ snga dros byin gyis brlab par bya ste/ gang du grong khyer chen po la brten pa'am/ dkyil 'khor gyi slob dpon rang nyid 'dug par bya'o// rgya mtsho chen por
149b5(rgyud 'bum): 'jug pa'i gnas sam/ rgya mtsho'i ngogs dang nye ba grong khyer chen po'i byang shar gyi phyogs su ha cang yang mi ring ba/ ha cang yang mi nye bar dkyil 'khor gyi slob dpon song ste/ lo ma'i spyil bu byas
149b6(rgyud 'bum): pa la zhag bdun nam/ zla ba phyed kyi bar du gcig pu rab tu gnas par bya ste/ gang gnas de dag tu'ang gtsang ma'i sa phyogs rdo ba med pa/ gyo mo dang / thal ba dang / sol ba dang / phub ma dang /
149b7(rgyud 'bum): rus pa spangs pa/ shin tu gtsang ba/ shin tu yongs su sbyang ba'i sa phyogs su srog chags med pa'i tshul ba'i rnam lnga 'am/ tsan ngan dang / ga pur dang / gur kum gyi chus bsres pa khro bo gshin
150a1(rgyud 'bum): gshed kyi sngags stong rtsa brgyad bzlas te/ gtsug pud lnga'i phyag rgya chen po dang ldan pas sa phyogs der phyogs bzhi dang / steng dang / 'og dang / zad ka dang / phyogs
150a2(rgyud 'bum): mtshams thams cad du bsang gtor bya'o/ / de nas phyogs der kun nas gru bzhir khru bcu drug gam/ khru bcu gnyis sam/ khru brgyad pa byas te/ de la chen po ni khru bcu drug pa'o// 'bring
150a3(rgyud 'bum): ni khru bcu gnyis pa'o/ / chung ngu ni khru brgyad pa'o// dkyil 'khor 'di ni rnam pa gsum// thams cad gzigs pas gsungs pa yin// rgyal po 'dod pas chen po ste// 'bring ni longs
150a4(rgyud 'bum): spyod 'phel byed pa/ / chung ngu dam tshig yang dag srung // las rnams kun byed zhi ba yin// de dag las yid la gang 'dod pa'i dkyil 'khor bri ba ni de la sa phyogs der khru do tsam brkos la/ der rde
150a5(rgyud 'bum): ba dang / sol ba dang / thal ba dang / rus pa dang / sgra la sogs pa dang / srog chags kyi rigs rnam pa sna tshogs gal te mthong na sa'i phyogs gzhan du rko ba byas na/ gnod pa med pa dang 'tshe ba med
150a6(rgyud 'bum): par 'gyur ro/ / ri bo'i rtse mo dang / chu bo'i ngogs dang / rgya mtsho'i 'gram dang / chu bo chen po'i ngogs su bye ma'i phung po chen po rnams 'bad pas shin tu so sor brtags te/ shin tu gtsang ba dang /
150a7(rgyud 'bum): srosog chags med par byas la bri bar bya'o// sa phyogs de'ang srog chags med pa'i tshul ba'i rnam lnga bsres te/ chu bo'i klung gis gtsang ma ram/ grog mkhar gyi sa gang du srog chags med pa'i
150b1(rgyud 'bum): sa des dgang bar bya'o/ / bkang nas kyang legs par brdung te kun nas mnyam por byas la/ dkyil 'khor rnam pa gsum gang 'dod par bya'o// seng ldeng gi phur pa bzhi la khro bo'i rgyal ba'i
150b2(rgyud 'bum): sngags lan bdun bzla zhing phyogs bzhir gdab po/ / tshon sna lnga'i skud pa la khro bo'i snying po lan bdun bzlas pa byas te dkyil 'khor phyogs bzhi kun nas bskor bar bya'o// de bzhin du dbus kyi
150b3(rgyud 'bum): gnas su nang du'ang zur bzhir bya'o/ / dbus na gnas pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi slob dpon gyis rang gi rig pa'i rtsa ba'i sngags stong rtsa brgyad bzla bar bya'o// gtsug pud lnga'i phyag rgya chen po
150b4(rgyud 'bum): bcings nas rtsa ba'i sngags kyis grogs po dang bdag nyid bsrung bar byas la/ sngags zlo bzhin du dkyil 'khor gyi phyi rol tu byung ste/ dkyil 'khor de la g.yas su bskor ba byas nas kha shar phyogs su
150b5(rgyud 'bum): bltas te ku sha'i stan la 'dug par bya'o/ / sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad yid la byas te/ dkyil 'khor de'i gru bzhi kun tu ku shas bskor zhing dgram par bya'o// de nyid kyi phyi
150b6(rgyud 'bum): rol tu 'ang ba rnams zhag gcig gnas pas bsnyal zhing dbyung bar bya'o/ / de la dkyil 'khor gyi slob dpon gyis sngon du bya ba rnams byas nas rang gi rgyud kyi sngags la mkhas pa dang / sems can gyi don gyi thab
150b7(rgyud 'bum): kyi phyir theg pa chen po la mos pa dang / zhag gcig sbyang bar byas pa dang / grogs bzang po dang ldan pa dang / bstan bcos sna tshogs kyi las mthong bas tshon sna lnga'i phye ma zhib mo shin tu gsal zhing legs
151a1(rgyud 'bum): par sbyar ba byas la/ yi ge drug pa'i snying po mngon par bzlas pa'i phye ma dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su gzhag par bya'o// phyi rol tu'ang rgyal mtshan dang ba ngan bsgreng ba dang
151a2(rgyud 'bum): rta babs bzhis brgyan pa/ chu shing 'bras bu'i tshogs kyis g.yur za ba dang / rnga bo che dang / rdza rnga brdung ba dang / dung gi sgra dang / dga' ba dang / bkra shis pa'i sgra sgrog pa dag bya'o//
151a3(rgyud 'bum): zur bzhi nas chos mnyan pa bdag la bshad par bya'o// phyogs bzhir theg pa chen po'i mdo sde bklag par bya ba la 'di lta ste/ bcom ldan 'das yum shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa lho phyogs su bklag
151a4(rgyud 'bum): par bya'o/ / 'phags pa zla ba sgrol ma'i ting nge 'dzin nub phyogs su bklag par bya'o// 'phags pa sdong pos brgyan pa byang phyogs su bklag par bya'o// 'phags pa gser 'od dam pa'i mdo sde
151a5(rgyud 'bum): shar phyogs su bklag par bya'o/ / glegs bam dag med na mdo sde bzhi po shes pa'i gang zag chos 'chad pa po la chos mnyan pa'i phyir bskul bar bya'o// de nas dkyil 'khor gyi slob dpon langs nas
151a6(rgyud 'bum): tsan dan dang / ga pur dang / gur kum bsres pa'i me tog dri zhim pa dkar po la rtsa ba'i sngags bzlas te/ dkyil 'khor de thams cad du chal par dgram par bya'o// mngon par bkram pa byas
151a7(rgyud 'bum): nas phyi rol du blang ste/ zhag bdun gyi bar du 'dod pa'i khabs bsten pa'i rim mkhan gnyis sam gsum byang chub tu sems bskyed pa/ gso sbyong nye bar bsten pa mkhas pa dag btsug ste
151b1(rgyud 'bum): rtsa ba'i sngags kyis gtsung pung bcing ba byas la/ de nas gser dang / dngul dang / zangs dang / rin po che rnam pa sna tshogs las tshon sna lnga shin tu mdzes pa yid du 'ong ba'i phye ma zhib mo rab tu
151b2(rgyud 'bum): blangs te/ longs spyod chen po dang ldan pa dang / chos dang ldan pa'i rgyal po dga' drir gzhug pa byas na dkyil 'khor mthong ba tsam gyis nges par byang chub thob pa yin na/ sngags sgrub par byed pa
151b3(rgyud 'bum): lta smos kyang ci dgos/ shAkya'i skyes mchog 'das gyur nas// sems can bsod nams chung ba la// 'di 'dra'i longs spyod ga la yod// de bas cho ga 'di bstan bya// 'jam dbyangs 'od
151b4(rgyud 'bum): chen ldan pa yis/ / skye bo 'phongs par gzigs nas ni// nyung zhing dkyil bsdus dkyil 'khor ni// mdor bsdus nas ni bstan pa yin// 'bras sA lu dang thug po che'i phye ma shin tu
151b5(rgyud 'bum): zhib pa'i tshen sna lnga bzang po dkar ba dang / ser ba dang / dmar ba dang / nag po dang / ljang khu dag gis bsgyur te/ sngar bzhag pa'i tshon gyi phye ma slob dpon rang gis blangs nas gtsug pud lnga'i
151b6(rgyud 'bum): phyag rgya chen po bcings te/ rtsa ba'i sngags kyi bzlas pa byas nas phye ma de la phyag rgya cing ngo // sgrub pa'i grogs mchog gi slob dpon gyis dkyil 'khor gyi phyi rol shar lho mtshams kyi phyogs su cho ga
151b7(rgyud 'bum): mthong ba'i las kyi thab khung bya ste/ rgyar khru dol thabs su khru gang ba kun nas 'khor bar pad+ma'i zab 'dra ba/ phyi rol yang pad+ma'i zeb 'dra ba// shing ba la sha'i yam shing gis me sbar bar bya/
152a1(rgyud 'bum): bil ba'i yam shing mtho gang tsam rlon pa la 'o dang / sbrang rtsi dang / mar la btags pa la rtsa ba'i sngags 'bru drug pa 'am/ snying pos khu tshur gyi phyag rgya bcings te me lha spyan drang
152a2(rgyud 'bum): bar bya'o/ / spyan drang nas sngar bstan pa nyid kyi rtsa ba'i sngags yi ge gcig pa'i snying pos phyir yang rgya rtsa brgyad sbyin sreg bya'o// de nas dkyil 'khor gyi slob dpon gyis cod pan dang 'tshog chas byas
152a3(rgyud 'bum): nas/ bdag nyid dang ri mo mkhan yang rtse gcig par byas nas sbyin sreg byed du gzhug go// de nas dkyil 'khor gyi slob dpon sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams yid la bya ste/ sngar bstan
152a4(rgyud 'bum): pa'i bdug pas bdugs nas thal mo sbyar nas/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la rab tu btud nas/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la'ang phyag byas te/ tshon gyi phye ma blangs nas sku'i gzugs
152a5(rgyud 'bum): kyis bcad pa la ri mo mkhan gyis yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/ / cho ga 'di dag gis dang por sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa nyid rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa seng ge'i khri la bzhugs pa
152a6(rgyud 'bum): gnas gtsang ma'i gzhal med khang na chos ston cing bzhugs pa bri bar bya'o/ / dkyil 'khor gyi slob dpon ri mo 'dri ba la 'dir sgrub pa'i grogs mchog gis slob dpon bdag gis slob dpon bdag nyid bsrung
152a7(rgyud 'bum): ba'i phyir rtsa ba'i sngag kyis 'byung po thams cad pa'i gtor ma gtong bar bya ste/ phyi rol gyi phyogs bzhi dang / steng dang / 'og dag tu gtor bar bya'o// de nas khrus byas te thab khung du nye bar song nas gos
152b1(rgyud 'bum): gtsang ma bgos te/ gtsang sbra dang srung ba'i cho ga byas nas gur kum dang bsres pa'i mar gyi sbyin sreg stong rtsa brgyad bya'o// de nas ku sha'i khres la 'dug nas bzlas pa byas te de nyid du gnas par bya'o//
152b2(rgyud 'bum): nyungs dkar la khro bo'i rgyal po gshin rje gshed kyi sngags brgya rtsa brgyad kyis mngon par bsngags la kham phor kha sbyar gyi nang du gzhag par bya'o// bgegs kyi rnam pa 'jigs su rung ba'i gzugs can
152b3(rgyud 'bum): mi bzad pa'i sgra rnam pa du ma rlung dang / char dang / yul ngan gzhan dang / gzhan gang yang rung ba mthong na khros pas nyungs kar chad par bcangs te/ lan bdun sbyin sreg byas pa des ni bgegs rab
152b4(rgyud 'bum): tu 'joms par 'gyur ro/ / mi'i bgegs la ni lan lnga chang pa nas sbyin sreg byas na skyes bu de rengs par 'gyur ba'am/ nus pa med par 'gyur ba 'am/ 'chi bar 'gyur ba 'am/ skad cig de nyid
152b5(rgyud 'bum): la mi ma yin pas zin par 'gyur ba la nams kyang the tsom med de brgya byin yang 'chi bar byed na/ ma rungs pa'i sems dang ldan pa'i mi 'am/ bgegs tha mal pa lta smos kyang ci dgos/ khro bo gshin
152b6(rgyud 'bum): rje gshed kyis 'jigs pas bgegs rnams phan tshun du 'bros shing mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ / de nas sgrub pa'i grogs mchog gis de nyid du ku sha'i khres la gnas nas khro bo'i rgyal po gshin rje gshed kyi
152b7(rgyud 'bum): bzlas pa byed cing gnas par bya'o/ / de nas dkyil 'khor gyi slob dpon gyis bcom ldan 'das shakya thub pa'i sku gzugs kyi g.yas ngos su rang sangs rgyas gnyis kyis pad+ma'i gdan la bzhugs
153a1(rgyud 'bum): par bya'o/ / de gnyis kyi 'og tu nyan thos chen po gnyis chos nyan pa bya'o// de dag gi'ang g.yas su bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug rgyan thams/
153a2(rgyud 'bum): cad kyis brgyan pa/ ston ka'i 'dam bu'i mdog ltar dkar ba/ pad+ma'i gdan la bzhugs pa/ phyag g.yon pa na pad+ma bsnams pa/ phyag g.yas pa mchog sbyin pa/ de'i yang g.yas na bcom
153a3(rgyud 'bum): ldan 'das yum gos dkar mo/ phyag g.yon pa na pad+ma bsnams pa/ phyag g.yas pas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa la phyag 'tshal ba/ pad+ma'i gdan la bzhugs pa/ phyag na gser gyi cod pan
153a4(rgyud 'bum): 'chang ba/ dar lA dkar po'i na bza' mnapas pa/ dar lnga'i bla gos mnabs pa/ thal ba nag pos thig le gsum byas pa/ de bzhin du sgrol ma dang khro gnyer can yang rang rang gi gnas su spyod lam
153a5(rgyud 'bum): dag gis gnas par bya'o/ / de dag gi steng du ni bcom ldan 'das yum shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin ma dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan dang / gtsug tor gyi rgyal mo rnams bya'o// de bzhin du
153a6(rgyud 'bum): byang chub sems dpa' bcu drug bya ba la 'di lta ste/ kun tu bzang po dang / sa'i snying po dang / nam mkha' mdzod dang / sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba dang / ngan song rnam par sbyong ba dang /
153a7(rgyud 'bum): byams pa rnga yab lag na thogs shing sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la blta ba dang / dri ma med par 'gro ba dang / dri ma med pa'i tog dang / nor bzang dang / zla ba'i 'od dang / dri ma med par grags pa
153b1(rgyud 'bum): dang / nang thams cad gso bar byed pa dang / chos thams cad kyi dbang phyug gi rgyal po dang / 'jig rten 'gro ba dang / blo chen po dang / blo bzang po ste/ sems dpa' chen po 'di dag ni lus
153b2(rgyud 'bum): shin tu zhi ba dang / rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa bri bar bya'o// rig pa'i rgyal po'i gtso bo dang / rig pa'i rgyal mo dang / pad+ma'i rigs gzugs dang / phyag rgya lung ji lta ba bzhin du gnas ji lta
153b3(rgyud 'bum): ba ma lus pa dag tu bri bar bya'o/ / mtha'i gru bzhi'i gnas dag tu ni gnas rnams gzhag par bya'o// pad+ma'i me tog legs par byas pa dang / rig pa'i lha gang dran pa'ang de dag tu gzhag par bya'o//
153b4(rgyud 'bum): de bzhin du lho phyogs su bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa dang / rang sangs rgyas gnyis ni ri spos kyi ngang ldang ba la bzhugs pa bri bar bya'o// de bzhin du dkyil 'khor gyi shar du bdag nyid lta ba dang /
153b5(rgyud 'bum): thams cad la'ang 'jug pa'i sgo rnams bya'o// bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i g.yon phyogs su rang sangs rgyas gzhan gnyis te/ tsan dan dang / grub pa zhes bya ba gnyis bri bar bya'o//
153b6(rgyud 'bum): de gnyis kyi 'og tu nyan thos gnyis ni 'od srungs chen po dang / ka t+ya ya na bri bar bya'o// de dag gi'ang g.yon du 'phags pa phyag na rdo rje ut+pal ltar mdog sngobasangs gzugs shin tu mdzes
153b7(rgyud 'bum): pa rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ lag pa g.yas pa na rnga yab thogs pa/ g.yon pa khro bo'i lus kyis gnas pa/ rdo rje khu tshur ma/ rdo rje lcags kyu ma/ rdo rje lu gu r+b+had ma/
154a1(rgyud 'bum): dpung bzang ma/ rdo rjem cha byang ji lta ba bzhin du bgegs kyi gdan la gnas pa/ rig pa'i rgyal po thams cad dang / rig pa'i rgyal mo 'khor dang bcas pa bzlas pa dang /
154a2(rgyud 'bum): phyag rgya dang ldan pa ji ltar shes pa bzhin bri bar bya'o// de dag gi'ang g.yod zur bzhir sna tshogs rdo rje'i phyag rgya bri bar bya'o// bris nas kyang gnas gang du rig pa'i tshogs ma dran pa'i gnas
154a3(rgyud 'bum): de dag kyang 'dir bzhugs shig ces brjod par bya'o/ / de'i steng du pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang / bcom ldan 'das yum mA ma kI bri bar bya ste/ rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ gzugs
154a4(rgyud 'bum): shin tu mdzes par bya'o/ / de dag gi steng du gtsug tor gyi rgyal po brgyad kun nas 'bar ba'i 'phreng ba'i phyag rgya bcings nas/ rang rang dag gis 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po chen po'i gzugs su
154a5(rgyud 'bum): bri bar bya ste/ gser gyi mdog can dbang po shin tu dul la/ rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa la zur gyis lta ba dag la 'di lta ste/ gtsug tor 'khor los sgyur ba dang /
154a6(rgyud 'bum): gtsug tor mngon par 'phags pa dang / gtsug tor gdugs dkar po dang / rgyal ba'i gtsug tor dang / pad+ma'i gtsug tor dang / rnam par rgyal ba'i gtsug tor dang / gzi brjid phung po'i gtsug tor dang /
154a7(rgyud 'bum): gtsug tor mthon po ste/ brgyad po 'di dag ni gtsug tor gyi rgyal po rnams so// g.yon du bri ba ni rang sangs rgyas rnams so// 'jug pa'i phyogs kyi sgor ni byang chub sems dpa' gnyis bya
154b1(rgyud 'bum): ste/ g.yas phyogs su ni 'jig rten las 'das par 'gro ba zhes bya ba ral pa'i cod pan 'chang ba/ lus zhi ba/ lag pa g.yon pa mchog sbyin pas 'phreng ba 'dzin pa// lag pa g.yas pa spyi
154b2(rgyud 'bum): blugs 'dzin cing sgo la mngon du phyogs pa/ bzhin cung zad khro gnyer dang bcas pa bri bar bya'o// 'jug pa'i sgo'i g.yon phyogs su ni byang chub sems dpa' chen po ma rgyal ba las rgyal ba zhes bya ba
154b3(rgyud 'bum): bri bar bya ste/ lus rab tu zhi ba/ ral pa'i cod pan 'chang ba/ lag pa g.yon pa na dbyig pa dang spyi lugs 'dzin pa/ lag pa g.yas pa ni mchog sbyin pas 'phreng ba 'dzin pa/ bzhin cung zad khro gnyer
154b4(rgyud 'bum): dang ldan pa sgo la mngon par phyogs pa bri'o/ / seng ge'i khri'i 'og tu chos kyi 'khor lo kun tu 'bar bas khyab pa/ de'i 'og tu rin po che'i gzhal med khang de la gnas pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub
154b5(rgyud 'bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa gzhon nu'i gzugs can sku mdog dmar skya/ zhi ba'i gzugs dang mdzes pa'i gzugs can/ cung zad zhal 'dzum pa/ phyag
154b6(rgyud 'bum): g.yon pa na ut+pa la sngon po bsnams pa/ phyag g.yas pa na bil ba bsnams pa/ byis pa'i rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ gtsug pud lngas nye bar mdzes par gyur pa/ mu tig gi 'phreng bas mchod
154b7(rgyud 'bum): phyir thogs pa/ dar lA'i stod g.yogs mnabs pa/ dar gyi na bzas smad g.yogs mdzad pa/ 'od kun nas 'phro ba/ 'bar ba'i 'phreng bas kun nas khyab pa/ pad+ma'i gdan la nye bar bzhugs pa/
155a1(rgyud 'bum): khro bo'i rgyal po gshin rje gshed la gzigs pa/ dkyil 'khor du 'jug pa'i sgo la mngon du phyogs pa blta na sdug pa bri bar bya'o// de'i g.yas phyogs kyi ngos kyi pad+ma'i
155a2(rgyud 'bum): 'og tu khro bo'i rgyal po gshin rje gshed bri bar bya ste/ mi sdug pa chen po'i gzugs can/ kun nas 'bar ba'i 'phreng bas khyab pa/ bka' len cing 'dzin pa/ byang chub sems dpa' chen po'i
155a3(rgyud 'bum): phyogs su blta ba/ g.yon phyogs kyi pad+ma'i 'og tu gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu'i gzugs can byang chub sems dpa' lta bri bar bya ba la 'di lta ste/ shin tu dri med dang / shin tu dul ba dang /
155a4(rgyud 'bum): dag pa dang / mun sel dang / kun tu snang ba'o// de dag thams cad kyang gnas gtsang ma'i gzhal med khang na 'dug pa/ rin po che du ma 'bar ba'i rdo'i stang dang 'dra ba kun nas 'bar ba/ me tog sna tshogs
155a5(rgyud 'bum): kyi gcal bkram pa/ shin tu mdzes pa bri bar bya'o// phyi rol khor yug tu zur bzhi'i rnam par byas te/ rta babs bzhi dang ldan pa/ phyogs bzhi nas rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i tshen sna lngas gsal bas ri mo
155a6(rgyud 'bum): shin tu drang ba dang ldan pa nang gi dkyil 'khor bri bar bya'o/ / shar gyi bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i steng du ri mo'i dbus su me tog kun nas skyes pa'i rgyal po'i dbang pos pad+ma'i gdan la bzhugs
155a7(rgyud 'bum): pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs cung zad chung bar bya'o/ / 'od zer 'bar ba'i 'phreng bas khyab pa/ mchog sbyin gyi phyag rgya dang ldan pa/ skyil mo krung gis bzhugs pa/ de'i g.yas su gtsug tor
155b1(rgyud 'bum): 'khor los sgyur ba'i phyag rgya bri bar bya'o/ / g.yon du ni gzi brjid phung po'i phyag rgya bri bar bya'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan gyi steng du ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i phyag rgya bri bar bya'o//
155b2(rgyud 'bum): bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi steng dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i phyag rgya'i g.yas su bcom ldan 'das 'od dpag tu med pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs
155b3(rgyud 'bum): can bya ste/ phyag rgya mchog sbyin pa/ pad+ma'i gdan la bzhugs pa/ kun nas 'od 'bar ba'i 'phreng bas khyab pa/ de'i yang g.yas phyogs su ni lhung bzed dang chos gos kyi phyag rgya'o// de bzhi/
155b4(rgyud 'bum): du mthar gyis 'jug pa'i gnas la ni pad+ma'i phyag rgya'o// bcom ldan 'das me tog yang dag par skyes pa'i rgyal po'i dbang po de bzhin gshegs pa'i g.yon phyogs su gtsug tor gzi brjid phung
155b5(rgyud 'bum): po'i phyag rgya bri ste/ kun nas 'od 'bar ba'i 'phreng bas khyab pa/ de'i g.yon phyogs su de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen tog bya ste/ rin po che'i ri bo'i steng du chos ston cing bzhugs pa/ bai DUR+Ya sngon po
155b6(rgyud 'bum): dang margad dang / pad+ma ra ga rnam pa sna tshogs 'bar ba'i 'phreng ba'i kun nas 'od dang ldan pa bri bar bya'o// de'i yang g.yon phyogs su rgyal ba'i gtsug tor gyi phyag rgya kun nas 'bar ba'i 'phreng bas
155b7(rgyud 'bum): khyab pa bri'o/ / de'i yang g.yon phyogs su chos kyi 'khor lo'i phyag rgya kun nas 'bar ba dang ldan pa bri'o// de'i yang g.yon phyogs su 'khar gsil dang / spyi thugs dang / 'phreng ba dang / bzang
156a1(rgyud 'bum): po'i gdan gyi phyag rgya bri'o/ / mthar gyis sgo'i gnas su rdo rje rtse gsum pa gnyis ka la'ang kun nas 'bar ba bri'o// bcom ldan 'das 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i
156a2(rgyud 'bum): 'og tu phyag rgya chen po gtsug pud lnga zhes bya ba dang / ut+pa la'i phyag rgya kun nas 'bar ba 'di gnyis phan tshun 'brel bar bya'o// dkyil 'khor kun nas sgo bri bar bya'o// sgo dag ni rgyab kyis blta ba dang /
156a3(rgyud 'bum): 'jug pa ni mdun gyis blta bar bya'o// phyi rol gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad du 'gyur pa yang kha dog lnga'i tshe na shin tu gsal ba sna tshogs blta na sdug pa/ zur bzhis rnam par mdzes pa/ rta babs
156a4(rgyud 'bum): bzhi'i rnam pa phyogs bzhir khru gnyis tsam/ nang gi dkyil 'khor gyi phyi rol gyi shar phyogs su tshangs pa chen po bri bar bya ste/ gdong bzhi pa/ gos dkar po bgos pa la stong g.yogs gos dkar po
156a5(rgyud 'bum): dang / tshangs skud dkar po thogs pa/ kha dog gser 'dra ga ral pa'i cod pan 'dzin pa/ lag na dbyug pa dang spyi blugs 'dzin pa/ de'i g.yas phyogs su 'od gsal gyi lha'i bu bya ste/ mdog gser 'dra ba/
156a6(rgyud 'bum): bsam gtan khyad par can gyi gzugs can// dar lA'i gos bgos pa/ ngar lA'i stong g.yogs byas pa/ bzhini shin tu gsal ba/ ral pa'i cong pan 'dzin pa/ mchod phyir thogs dkar po can/ skyil mo kru
156a7(rgyud 'bum): gis 'jug pa/ lag pa g.yas pas mchog sbyin pa/ de'i g.yas phyogs su 'og min gyi lha'i bu bya ste/ rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ lus rab tu zhib/ bsam gtan gyi rnam pa'i cha byad can/ ngar lnga'i gos
156b1(rgyud 'bum): bsgos pa/ dar lnga'i gos kyi stod g.yogs byas pa/ skyil mo krung gis 'dug pa/ lag pa g.yas pas mchog sbyin pa/ mchod phyir thogs dkar pos byas pa/ de'i rim gyis dga' ldan dang / 'phrul dga'
156b2(rgyud 'bum): dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed dang / 'thab bral dang / brgya byin la sogs pa'i lha'i bu bri bar bya ste/ go rims ji lta ba dang / cha byad dang dbyibs ji lta ba bzhin du'o// brgya byin gyi 'og tu rgyal po chen po bzhi'i//
156b3(rgyud 'bum): ris la rtag tu myos dang / 'phreng thogs dang / lag na gzhong thogs dang / pi wang gnyis pa dang / sa bla'i lha'i bu dag go rims ji lta ba dang / cha byad ji lta ba bzhin du bri bar bya'o// de bzhin du lho phyogs
156b4(rgyud 'bum): su mi che ba dang / mi gdung ba dang / shin tu mthong ba dang / gya nom snang ba dang / dag chung dang / bsod nams skyes la sogs pa'i lha'i bu cha byad dang dbyibs ji ltar bzhin bri bar bya'o// nub phyogs
156b5(rgyud 'bum): / dang / byang phyogs su'ang de bzhin te/ de dag ni rim pa 'og ma gnyis la brten te bri bar bya'o// dkyil 'khor gnyis kyi phyi rol du dkyil 'khor gsum par 'gyur ba la mthar gyis phyogs bzhi'i rgyal po
156b6(rgyud 'bum): chen po bzhi ste/ byang phyogs nas 'jug pa'i g.yas ngos su gter nye bar gnas pa la gnod sbyin rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ gtsug pud cung zad 'dud pa/ gnod sbyin gyi gzugs can/ de'i g.yas
156b7(rgyud 'bum): su nor bu bzang dang / gang ba bzang po gnod sbyin gyi bdag po gnyis bri'o// de bzhin du mthar gyis gnod sbyin mo chen mo 'phrog ma'ang bri'o// de bzhin du mthar gyis nub phyogs su chu lha lag na zhags pa
157a1(rgyud 'bum): thogs pa dang / klu dga' bo dang / nye dga' bo dang / 'jog po dang / nor rgyas la sogs paklu'i rgyal po chen po brgyad po TI// de bzhin nyis la la/ 6pa'i
157a2(rgyud 'bum): gyis gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / dri za dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / drang srong dang / grub pa dang / yi dgas dang / sha za dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi dang / ma ma yin pa la
157a3(rgyud 'bum): sogs pa dang / sman dang / nor bu rin po che'i bye brag dang / ri dang / chu bo dang / gling dang / mthar gyis gtso bo thams cad bri bar bya'o// lho phyogs su ni gshin rje ma mo bdun gyi 'khor dang bcas pa
157a4(rgyud 'bum): bri bar bya'o/ / shar lho mtshams su me lha kun nas 'bar ba'i 'breng bas khyab pa/ dbyug pa dang / spyi blugs dang / 'phreng ba lag na thogs pa mi 'jigs pa sbyin pa'i phyag bri ba/ ral pa'i cod pan 'dzin
157a5(rgyud 'bum): pa/ gos dkar po bgos pa/ dar lA'i stod g.yogs byas pa/ mchod phyir thogs dkar po thogs pa/ mdog gser 'dra ba/ thal ba'i thig le gsum byas pa/ de bzhin du rgyan dang
157a6(rgyud 'bum): mtshon cha dang / kha dog dang / dbyibs dang / kha dog rnam pa sna tshogs pa rim pa gnyis pa la brten te bri bar bya'o// thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor du 'jug pa'i sgo'i phyi rol du dka' zlog gi bdag
157a7(rgyud 'bum): po khyu mchog la non pa/ lag na mdung rtse gsum thogs pa/ lha mo dka' zlog ma kha dog sna tshogs pa/ rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ smin drug gi bu rma bya'i gdan la 'dug pa/ mdung thogs
157b1(rgyud 'bum): thogs pa/ gnon nu'i gzugs can/ gdong drug pa/ lus dmar por snang ba/ gos ser po bgos pa/ gos ser po'i stod g.yogs can/ lag pa g.yon pa na dril bu dang ba dan dmar po thogs
157b2(rgyud 'bum): pa/ mthar gyis b+h+ring gi ri ti shin tu rid pa 'dra ba dang / tshogs kyi bdag po chen po dang / dga' byed dbang phyug dang / nag po chen po dang / ma mo bdun po rgyan dang / mtshon cha dang / kha dog dang /
157b3(rgyud 'bum): dbyibs ji lta ba bzhin bri bar bya'o// nor lha brgyad dang / drang srong bdun dang / khyab 'jug lag pa bzhin 'khor lo dang / dung dang / gdA dang / ral gri thogs pa/ gang na nam mkha'
157b4(rgyud 'bum): lding rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ gza' brgyad dang / rgyu skar nyi shu rtsa bdun dang / gang yang nye ba'i gza' brgyad sa steng gi dkyil 'khor na rab tu rgyu ba'ang bri bar bya'o// mthar gyis tshes
157b5(rgyud 'bum): grangs bco lnga dang / yar ngo dang mar ngo'i phyogs dang / khyim bcu gnyis dang / dus drug dang / zla ba bcu gnyis dang / lo tshigs dang / sring mo bzhi gru la zhon pa dang / ming po lnga gru la zhon cing chu la
157b6(rgyud 'bum): gnas pa ste/ mdor na phyag rgyar gzhag par bya ba'ang yin no// lha mo de dag mthar gyis rim pa gnyis pa la bsten te bya ba yin no// slob dpon bdag nyid phyi rol tu byung nas dkyil
157b7(rgyud 'bum): 'khor de la g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas te/ mdor na dkyil 'khor gsum yang dkyil 'khor gsum la rten cing bri bar bya ste/ dkyil 'khor gsum car yang gru bzhir rnam par gnas par bya ba
158a1(rgyud 'bum): yin no/ / mdor na 'di ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sems can rnams kyi mgon po ni nges par bri bar bya'o// pad+ma'i rigs 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug
158a2(rgyud 'bum): kyang nges par bri bar bya'o/ / rdo rje'i rigs 'phags pa phyag na rdo rje'ang nges par bri bar bya'o// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gtso bo 'phags pa kun tu bzang po'ang nges par bri bar bya'o//
158a3(rgyud 'bum): 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'ang nges par bri bar bya'o// lhag ma rnams kyi ji ltar rnam par gzhag pa bzhin phyag rgya bri bar bya'o// 'di ni nang gi dkyil 'khor ro// dkyil 'khor bar ma la'ang
158a4(rgyud 'bum): shar phyogs su ni mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa bri bar bya'o/ / sgo'i drung du ni smin drug gi burma bya'i stan yod pa/ lag na mdung thogs pa/ lus kyi kha dog dmar ba/ gos ser pos stong g.yogs
158a5(rgyud 'bum): dang gos byas pa/ lag pa g.yas pa na dril bu dang ba dan thogs pa/ gzhon nu'i gzugs can gyis dkyil 'khor la blta ba'o// shar phyogs su ni nam mkha' lding 'dab chags kyi gzugs can/
158a6(rgyud 'bum): drang srong gi nang nas mar kan nges par bri bar bya'o// lhag ma ni ji ltar gnas pa bzhin phyag rgyar bri bar bya'o// shar lhor ni gzhon nu ma bzhi dang / ming po gzhon nu dang bcas pa gru'i bzhon pa la gnas
158a7(rgyud 'bum): pa/ rgya mtsho chen po la rnam par rgyu ba dang / me'i lha'i rgyal po'ang nges par bri bar bya'o// de bzhin du lho phyogs su ni srin po'i bdag po las ni grong khyer lang ka'i bdag po b+hi b+hi sha na shing pi tsu marda

158b2(rgyud 'bum): bri bar bya'o/ / de bzhin du sha za'i rgyal po rnam par g.yeng byed ces bya ba nges par bri bar bya'o// lhag ma ni ji ltar gnas pa bzhin phyag rgyar bri bar bya'o// de bzhin du lho nub kyi mtshams su ni klu'i
158b3(rgyud 'bum): gtso bo dga' bo dang nye dga' bo nges par bri bar bya'o/ / gza'i gtso bo nyi ma bri bar bya'o// nub phyogs su ni drang srong thub pa'i mchog dang / gcer pu pa mu stegs kyi mchog gcer bu'i
158b4(rgyud 'bum): gzugs bri bar bya'o/ / lhag ma ni ji ltar gnas pa bzhin phyag rgyar bri bar bya'o// nub byang mtshams su ni gnod sbyin gyi rgyal po mchog sbyin dang / dri za'i rgyal po gtsug pud lnga pa dang /

158b6(rgyud 'bum): 'phreng bas nye bar mdzes par byas pa/ zur bzhi nas rta babs bzhi dang / rgyal po chen po bzhis brgyan pa/ ji ltar gnas pa la 'di lta ste/ phyag rgya 'gyur ba ni sgor 'jug pa la ut+pal sdong po

159a4(rgyud 'bum): pad+ma'i phyag rgyas mtshan pa'o/ / lho phyogs su ni dkyil 'khor zur gsum pa byas te/ kun nas 'bar ba'i lhung bzed kyis mtshan pa'o// nub phyogs su ni dkyil 'khor kun nas zlum po byas te/

159b3(rgyud 'bum): po nyid du slob ma gzung bar bya ba la/ dbang po ma tshang ba med pa dang / yan lag thams cad mdzes pa dang / bram ze dang // rgyal rigs dang / rje'u rigs dang / dmangs rigs dang /

160a2(rgyud 'bum): li shi'i drizhis pos dri zhim par byas pa rtag tu nye reg dang ldan pa dang / ku sha'i khres la 'dug pa dang / srung ba'i cho ga byas pa dang / tshangs par spyod pa dang / bden pa dang ldan pa dang /

160a7(rgyud 'bum): par du byis pa rnams la nges par sngags grub pas grub pa gnas pa yin te/ de dag sngar bzhag pa byas nas grogs po bag yod pa bzang po dang ldan pas dkyil 'khor gyi slob dpon gyis ga pur gyi
160b1(rgyud 'bum): bdug pas bdugs te/ rgyab kyi phyogs pa ma yin pas phyi rol du byung bar bya ste/ byung nas dus dang ji ltar mthun pa'i chu legs par gtsang sbra byas pa dang / srog chags med pa la rtsa ba'i sdug

160b6(rgyud 'bum): pa ni rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang 'phags pa nyan thos la'o/ / bzhi pa ni byang chub sems dpa' chen po thams cad la'o// lnga pa ni byang chub sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa 'jam
160b7(rgyud 'bum): dpal la'o/ / drug pa ni lha thams cad la'o// bdun pa dang brgyad pa ni dkyil 'khor gnyis pa'i sgo khang la gzhag par bya ste/ gcig ni 'byung po thams cad la'o// gcig ni sim
161a1(rgyud 'bum): can thams cad kyi thun mong du gyur par bsngos nas gzhag par bya'o/ / de bas na sngar bshad pa'i cho gas spyan drang bar bya'o// de bzhin du me tog dang / bdug pa dang /
161a2(rgyud 'bum): dri dang / mar me dang / lha bshos kyang sngar bstun pa nyid kyi las kyis dbul bar bya ste/ thams cad kyi thams cad du go rims bzhin du bya'o// mar me 'dzin pas mar gyi bar me gzung
161a3(rgyud 'bum): bar bya'o/ / 'phags pa dang 'phags pa ma yin pa thams cad la lha bshos zhes smos pa ni 'bras sA lu'i chan zho dang bcas pa dang / sbrang rtsi dang ldan pa'i 'o thug khyad par can gyis nye bar sbyar
161a4(rgyud 'bum): ba'i mar la bcos pa'i snum 'khur gyi 'breng bu la sogs pa dang / khan+da la sogs pa'i bza' ba thams cad ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la dbul bar bya'o// mar gyis gang ba dang / tsan dan gyi thang chu
161a5(rgyud 'bum): sbrang ci'i snying po dang 'o mar bcos pa'i bza' ba ni rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang / 'phags pa nyan thos dang / byang chub sems dpa' chen po dang / 'phags pa'i lha thams cad la dbul bar bya'o//
161a6(rgyud 'bum): de bzhin du gad u lo pi ka dang / khyad par du snum 'khrur gyi yo byad 'byung po thams cad dang / sems can thams cad la sngags dang ldan pa'i cho gas sbyin par bya'o// de bzhin du me tog dri zhim
161a7(rgyud 'bum): pa sna ma'o me tog dang / rgya spos dang / klu'i me tog dang / me tog pun nag la sogs pa sngar bstan pa sangs rgyas dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang / 'phags pa nyan thos dang / byang chub sem
161b1(rgyud 'bum): dpa' chen po dang / 'phags pa dang 'phags pa ma yin pa'i lha rnams la dbul bar bya'o// khyad par du de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs la ni snga ma'i me tog dang / pad+ma'i rigs la ni me tog pad+ma dang /
161b2(rgyud 'bum): de bzhin du rdo rje'i rigs la ni me tog ut+pa la dang / lha gzhan dag la ni gzhan gang yang rung bas dbul bar bya'o// ga pur gyi bdug pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs la'o// tsan dan ni pad+ma'i
161b3(rgyud 'bum): rigs la'o/ / de bzhin gu gul ni gsang ba pa'i bdag po phyag na rdo rje la shes par bya'o// lha gzhan thams cad ni bdug pa tha mal pas bya'o// mar gyi mar me 'phags pa rnams// thams
161b4(rgyud 'bum): cad la ni dbul bar bya/ / 'phags min lha ni thams cad la// dri zhim 'bru mar dbul bar bya// cho ga ji bzhin rim pa sa ni// bdug pa mthong ba'i rgyu yis so// de ltar gsungs pa de bzhin dri//
161b5(rgyud 'bum): sngags rnams kun la rtag tu bya// spyan ras gzigs la gang gsungs dang // gang gsungs phyag na rdo rje la// rang rang gi ni sngags dag gis// sngags spyod don du sgrub pa'o// cho ga gcig
161b6(rgyud 'bum): pu blta bya ste/ / rtag tu rjes su mthun par bya// de nas dkyil 'khor gyi slob dpon gyis sngar mthong ba'i cho gas spyan drang ba dang / mchod pa dang / bdug pa la sogs pa byas nas gtsor
161b7(rgyud 'bum): mthun pa'i bya ba byas te/ de'i 'og tu sgrub pa'i grogs mchog gis mkhas pa dang myur bas 'byung po thams cad pa'i gtor ma sha med pa/ kun nasarba pa ta ha dang / dung gi sgra dga' ba'i sgra sgrogs
162a1(rgyud 'bum): pa la sogs pa des bdug pa dang / spos dang / me tog dang / 'phreng bas brgyan pa'i phyogs bzhi mtshams brgyad/ steng dang / 'og dang / thad ka thams cad du dkyil

162a3(rgyud 'bum): po che'i sbyin sreg rtsa ba'i sngags yi ge drug pa dang snying pos stong rtsa brgyad bya'o/ / sbyin sreg byas nas dkyil 'khor la rjes su bcug cing sngar bzhag pa'i sems dpa' chen po la bsrung ba byas nas
162a4(rgyud 'bum): dkyil 'khor gyi slob dpon gyis slob ma nyid du khas blangs pa/ byang chub tu sems bskyed pa/ gso sbyong byas pa/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' la bdag nyid kyi lus phul ba/ dngos
162a5(rgyud 'bum): grub kyi phyir sems can thams cad kyi nye bar longs spyod pa dang / yongs su longs spyod pa thun mong du gyur pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba bla na med pa'i byang chub kyi snying po gnon par bya ba dang / thams cad
162a6(rgyud 'bum): mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi sangs rgyas thob par bya ba la dkyil 'khor bstan par bya'o/ / bstan pa tsam nyid kyis sdig pa'i rnyog pa thams cad las grol bar 'gyur te/ mtshams med pa lnga byed pa'i skye

162b1(rgyud 'bum): dang gur kum gyis bsgos pa'i ras kyis gdong g.yogs par bya'o/ / dang por byis pa lo gsum nas lo bcu drug pa'i bar zur pud lngas nye bar mdzes pa'am/ gtsug pud gcig gis nye bar mdzes
162b2(rgyud 'bum): pa 'am/ gtsug pud kyis nye bar mdzes pa sgra dang ldan pa/ rgyal po'i bu spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba'am/ rgyal rigs kyi bu 'am/ gzhan bdag nyid chen po rgyal po chen po 'dod pa dkyil
162b3(rgyud 'bum): 'khor du gzhug par bya'o/ / dkyil 'khor gnyis pa la phyin pa na gdong g.yogs par bya ste/ ut+pa la'i phyag rgya bcings nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i rtsa ba'i sngags lan

162b6(rgyud 'bum): chen po thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes yongs su rdzogs pa'i don du mngon par sgrub par byed pa/ longs spyod chen po dang / rgyal po chen po dang / grags pa chen po dang / gang zag rtse

163a7(rgyud 'bum): rgyal po thams cad dbang bskur ba bzhin du yo byad thams cad bsogs te/ slob dpon mkhan po mnyes na/ de nas bla re chen po bris te/ rgyal mtshan dang bangan mthon po bsgreng zhing / gangags
163b1(rgyud 'bum): dkar po dbu la 'dzin pa dang / rnga yab dkar pos g.yob pa dang / bkur sti chen pos dung dang rnga bo che'i dga' ba'i sgra sgrog cing rgyal ba'i sgra dang / bkra shis kyi tshigs su bcad pa dang / bde legs
163b2(rgyud 'bum): dang rab tu bsngags pa'i tshigs su bcad pa rgyal bas gsungs pas mngon par bstod pa dang / dkyil 'khor de la bskor ba bya ste/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' la phyag byas nas 'di skad du/

164a1(rgyud 'bum): rig pa'i rtsa ba'i sngags rgya rtsa brgyad snga ma nyid du bzlas par bya'o/ / de nas ku sha'i khres la 'dug pa la dbang bskur bar bya ste/ phyi rol gyi dkyil 'khor la gang sems can
164a2(rgyud 'bum): thams cad dang thun mong du gyur pa'i bum pa gang ba sgo dang nye bar sngar bzhag pa blangs te/ slob dpon gyis rtsa ba'i sngags brjod pas spyi bo nas dbang bskur bar bya'o// gzhan dag la ni ji ltar 'dod pa'i chus
164a3(rgyud 'bum): so/ / de nas kham phor kha sbyar te de la sbyin par bya ste/ mar me la klog tu gzhug par bya'o// gal te de nyid yin na ni rim gyis 'bad pas 'grub par 'gyur ro// yang na ci ste gzhan na ni sngags
164a4(rgyud 'bum): bzlas pa kho nas 'grub par 'gyur ro/ / yang na yi ge yan lag nyams pa'am lhag pa byin na ni dang po sgrub pa kho na la 'grub par the tshom med do// de ltar slob dpon gyis sngar bris pa'i sgrub pa gsum

164a6(rgyud 'bum): pa'i sngar gyi bum pa des dbang bskur bar bya'o/ / spyi bo la sngar gyi cho ga ji lta ba de nyid kyis byas na sdig pa'i rnyog pa thams cad las grol bar 'gyur te/ sangs rgyas bcoms ldan 'das thams cad kyis
