167a1(rgyud 'bum): ma mo thams cad kyis zin pa la ni bzhi mdo 'am/ shi ba'i khyim dang bu btsas pa'i khyim du nye bar bya'o// tshangs pa'i srin pos zin pa la ta la'i shing drung du'o// sbyar
167a2(rgyud 'bum): ba'i dug 'byin pa la ni yi ge gcig pa'i sngags kyis chu la lan gsum bsngags pa bya ste/ dkyil 'khor de nyid du blud pa byas na grol bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin du bud med dam/ skyes pa grags
167a3(rgyud 'bum): pa 'dod pa la ni bzhi mdo 'am bram ze gnas par bri bar bya'o/ / bu shi ba la ni shing 'bras bu can nam/ 'o ma can gyi shing du'o// 'bras sA lu smin pa'i sa dang zhing gi dbus su ni bu med pa la bri
167a4(rgyud 'bum): bar bya'o/ / nad rnam pa gsum bdag gir byas pa dang / gzhan gyis nyams pa la ni 'jug ngogs la sogs pa la'o// nang chen pos btab pa la ni dkyil 'khor chu bo'i ngogs dang 'gram du bya'o//
167a5(rgyud 'bum): nad thams cad kyis thams cad du btab pa la ni ri'i rtse mor bri bar bya'o// mkha' 'gro mas byas pa la'ang bram ze'i ldu mar 'am/ khang pa stong pa 'am/ gnas dben pa gzhol ba'i phyogs su bya'o//
167a6(rgyud 'bum): de bzhin du las thams cad la nam phyed dam/ dus thams cad du mngon par bri bar bya'o// yi ge gcig pa de nyid kyi sngags kyis me tog gi mchod yon phul te gshegs su gsol la/
167a7(rgyud 'bum): dkyil 'khor la chus gtor ba byas na nad thams cad srung ba chen po byas par 'gyur te/ nang thams cad las grol bar yang 'gyur ro// bu med pas ni bu rnyed cing / skal med rnams kyang
167b1(rgyud 'bum): skal ldan 'gyur/ / dbul po rnams kyis nor thob pa// dkyil 'khor mthong ba tsam gyis so// skyes pa'am yang na bud med kyang // thos nas the tsom med byas na// ci 'dod
167b2(rgyud 'bum): rnam pa sna tshogs ni/ / thob 'gyur rtag tu phun sum tshogs// byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod kyi cho ga rab 'byams las/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i rtsa ba las dkyil 'khor gsum
167b3(rgyud 'bum): pa'i cho ga rdzogs so/ / // de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas thams cad dang ldan pa'i gnas gtsang ma la gzigs nas/ gzhan yang 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor
167b4(rgyud 'bum): chen po der 'dum la'ang gzigs te/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i zhabs gnyis la btud nas zhal 'dzum pa dang ldan pas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan
167b5(rgyud 'bum): 'das sems can thams cad la phan pa'i phyir sngags kyi spyod pa'i cho ga'i sgrub pa'i rgyu mthun pa/ chos kyi char ji ltar 'dod pa'i 'bras bu sgrub pa'i cho ga rab 'byams las ras kyi ri mo'i cho ga bsod
167b6(rgyud 'bum): nams bla na med pa bskyed pa/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyis bon mngon par sgrub par byed pa/ mdor na bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed pa/ sngags thams cad kyi
167b7(rgyud 'bum): 'bras bu la rab tu sbyor zhing 'bras bu dang bcas par byed pa/ don med pa ma yin pa grub cing sgrub par byed pa/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi spyod pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa/ byang chub
168a1(rgyud 'bum): @#sems dpa' chen po'i go cha bgos pa/ bdud thams cad kyi stobs zil gyis mnan cing rgyab kyis phyogs par byed pa/ bdag dang sems can thams cad la thugs brtse
168a2(rgyud 'bum): ba'i phyir de legs par bshad du gsol/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas de skad ces gsol pa dang / de nas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad
168a3(rgyud 'bum): ces bka' stsal to/ / 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa khyod skye bo mang po la phan pa'i phyir zhugs pa dang / 'jig rten la snying brtse ba'i phyir gang khyod de bzhin gshegs pa la don 'di 'dri bar sems
168a4(rgyud 'bum): pa ni legs so legs so/ / de shin tu legs par nyon la yid la zung zhig dang ngas bshad par bya'o// khyod kyi ras kyi cho ga rab 'byams sngags thams cad sgrub par byed pa la rab tu 'jug pa
168a5(rgyud 'bum): mthar gyis ngas bshad par bya'o/ / sngon yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis bstan te da ltar yang ngas bshad par bya'o// dang por re zhig sa'i phyogs gtsang ba rdul med pa las ras bal yang
168a6(rgyud 'bum): dag par blangs la/ dam tshig la zhugs pa'i sems can rnams kyis ras bal de yang dag par blangs te/ yang sngags 'dis dkyil 'khor gyis brtsa brgyad du bsngags par bya'o// nam
168a7(rgyud 'bum): sarba bud+d+hA nAM/ bo d+hi satwa a pra ti ha ta ga ti ma ti pra tsa ri tsA/ na maHso sho d+han duHkha pra sha ma nen+t+ra rA dzA ya/ ta thA ga tA ya ar+tha te sa myaka saM bud+d+hA ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM sha~M d+ha ya saM sho d+ha ya/ sarba bin+d+ha
168b1(rgyud 'bum): an+ta ka ma hA kA ru Ni ka ku mA ra rU pa d+ha ri Ni bi kru rba bi kurba/ sa ma ya ma nu smA ra tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha hUM hUM phaT phaT swA hA/ de nas grong gi chos mi shes pa'i gnon nu ma bram ze'i rigs dang / rgyal rigs su skyes pa dang
168b2(rgyud 'bum): rje'u rigs su skyes pa dang / rigs ngan pa'i skye gnas yongs su spangs pa/ dbang po mi tshang ba med pa/ yan lag thams cad mdzes pa/ pha dang mas rjes su gnang ba/ gso sbyong byas pa/ byang chub
168b3(rgyud 'bum): tu sems bskyed pa/ snying rje dang ldan pa/ bzhin dkar ba/ kha dog rnam par spangs pa/ mdor na bud med kyi mtshan nyid rab tu zhi ba'i mtshan nyid kyis mtshan pa/ shin tu nyin zhag shis pa dang
168b4(rgyud 'bum): zla yar ngo dang / gza' bzang po bltas te/ du ba dang khug rna med cing sprin dang bral ba rlung med cing gtsang ba'i sa phyogs su sngar bstan pa'i gzhon nu ma khrus byas shing gos gtsang ma bgos te/
168b5(rgyud 'bum): gos kyis legs par bkab pa byas pa la sngags 'di phyag rgya chen po dang ldan pas bsrung bar byas te/ tsan dan dkar po dang / gur kum srog chags med pa'i chu dang sbyar bas ras bal de dang /
168b6(rgyud 'bum): mo de sngags de nyid kyis yang dag par sbyangs te gtor la/ tsan dan dkar po dang gur kum gyi chus steng dang / 'og dang / phyogs bzhir yang gtor bar bya'o// tson dan dkar po dang / gur kum
168b7(rgyud 'bum): dang / ga pur gcig tu byas pa'i bdug pas bdugs par bya ste/ rang nyid kyis sbyin pa 'am/ sgrub pa'i grogs mchog gi slob dpon gyis sbyin par bya'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dngas
169a1(rgyud 'bum): bcu'i dbang phyug la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams ras kyi dog pa 'di la lhag par gnas par mdzod cig ces lan gsum brjod par bya'o/ / de nas sangs
169a2(rgyud 'bum): rgyas bcom ldan 'das dang byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams dgongs su gsol zhes byas nas bdug pas bdugs pa de'i dus su rma bya dang / khrung khrung dang / ngang pa dang / bzhad dang /
169a3(rgyud 'bum): ngur pa rnam pa sna tshogs bya dge ba thang la gnas pa 'am/ chu la spyod pa rnams nam mkha' la 'gro bar 'gyur pa'am/ dge ba'i skad 'don na las 'di ni 'bras bu dang bcas pa yin no zhes sgrub pa
169a4(rgyud 'bum): pos shes par bya'o/ / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dang byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis bdag gi ras skud 'di la byin gyis brlabs te/ bdag gi skye ba dam pa ni legs par 'tsho ba
169a5(rgyud 'bum): yin te/ bdag gi sngags sgrub pa 'bras bu med par mi 'gyur ro// rnga pa Ta ha dang / rnga bo che dang / rdza rje dang / dung dang / pi lang dang / gling bu dang / 'khar rnga dang / rdza rnga chen po'i sgra thos pa 'am/
169a6(rgyud 'bum): bud med dam/ khye'u 'am/ bu mo 'am/ skyes pa rnams bcos ma 'am/ bcos pa ma yin pa de'i dus su glo bur du 'di skad ces rgyal ba dang / grub pa dang / sbyin pa dang / byin pa dang / khyer
169a7(rgyud 'bum): cig ces byas pa dang / dpal dang / 'bras bu dang / 'bras bu yod pa dang / cho ga dang / brgya byin dang / mang po dang / de dag la sogs pa'i sgra gzhan rab tu dge ba 'don pa 'am/ dril bu'i sgra dang
169b1(rgyud 'bum): dga' ba'i sgra thos na/ des na rig pa 'dzin pas shes par bya 'di sargyas bcom ldan 'das dang / byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnam kyis byi gyis rnas pa ni 'di yin te/ don yod pa'i grub pa mi mas
169b2(rgyud 'bum): zhing gzhan du ma yin no zhes so/ / ci ste de'i dus su ma rungs pa'i tshig 'don pa khyer cig/ zo zhig/ zung zhig/ nyams pa/ rnam par nyams pa/ kyi hu / ring ba/ shin
169b3(rgyud 'bum): tu ring ba/ med pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i sgra 'don pa 'am/ spre'u dang / ma he dang / ce spyang dang / bong bu dang / byil dang / ba lang dang / dud 'gro smad pa rkang gnyis sam/
169b4(rgyud 'bum): rkang bzhi pa'i sgra 'don par gyur na/ des ni sgrub pa pos bdag gi dngos grub ni med pa yin no zhes shes par bya ste/ skabs der brtul bar bya zhing / yang snga ma bzhin du'ang brtsam par bya'o//
169b5(rgyud 'bum): de bzhin du lan bdun gyi bar du byas ma/ bdun pa'i las kyi bya ba la ni mtshams med pa lnga byas pa'ang 'grub par 'gyur ro// de nas sgrub pa pos gzhon nu ma de bsrung bar byas la ku sha'i khres la
169b6(rgyud 'bum): gzhag par bya ste/ shar ram byang phyogs su phyogs par bzhag la/ bdag nyid bsrung ba dang / lha la dbul ba'i kha zas zas su sbyin no// sngar sbyang ba byas pa'i ku sha'i khres de nyid kyi tshe
169b7(rgyud 'bum): gas ras bal la'ang bya'o/ / dog pa de 'jam pa dang / legs par bsgrims pa dang / sngar bslabs pa'i bu mos yang dag par blangs te/ gcig dang / gsum dang / lnga dang / brgyad
170a1(rgyud 'bum): la sogs pa nas bcu drug gi bar ram/ kar sha'i grangs legs par bzangs pa dang ldan pas bya'o// de las rab ni bcu drug bya// de bzhin brgyud ni bar ma ste// phran
170a2(rgyud 'bum): tshogs las la sgrub pa ni/ / gcig dang lda ni tha ma'o// las rnams kun la sngags rig pas// ji ltar nus pa bzhin du bya// de nas brtsams te gang cung zad// sdig pa sngar ni byas pa dag/
170a3(rgyud 'bum): dog par sems kyis dmigs pa na// de yi mod la 'jig par 'gyur// dog pa 'di dag yang dag blangs// gtsang ma'i snod du gzhug par bya// de nas bzhag pa byas nas de// ga pur gyi ni
170a4(rgyud 'bum): bdug pas bdugs/ / srog chags yan lag min byung ba'am// gur kum tsan ngan la sogs dang // me tog ma li tsam pa ka/ dri nizhim sogs pas yongs su bsgo// srung ba'i cho ga byas nas
170a5(rgyud 'bum): nimigatsang ba'i phyogs su yang dag bzhag/ sngags rigs las kun shes pa yin// shin tu mnyam gzhag bzlas pa bya// de nas thag par song nas// ci 'dod pa yi rin sbyin no// rang dbang yan
170a6(rgyud 'bum): lag ma nyams dang / / dkar po'i chos la rtag tu dang // rgan rin nad kyis gdungs pa min// lung pa dbugs mi bde ba spangs// ma ning spang pa ma yin dang // 'phyo bo ma yin spa dkar spangs/
170a7(rgyud 'bum): kun gyis bkur ba'i mtshan nyid ldan// rab sngags blta na sdug pa dang // blo dang yang dag spyod pa dge/ 'jig rten pa yi tshul la rten// dngos grub 'dod pas de la ni// ras bzang
170b1(rgyud 'bum): btags pa'i ched du bskul/ / grogs po rigs bzang rab bsngags shing // blo ldan bzo ni mkhas pa dang // shin tu khyad par mchog gyur pa'i// ras 'thag bzang la bskul bar bya//
170b2(rgyud 'bum): rab ni rab tu bsgrub par bya// 'bring ni 'bring la bsgrub par bya// tha ma phran tshegs las la ni// dman pa nyid ni thams cad la// bzo bo ji ltar smra ba bzhin// der ni de ltar sbyin par
170b3(rgyud 'bum): bya/ / dang po'i tshig ni yang dag byung // bzo bo la ni sngags rig pas// de nas myur du rin byin pa// dpa' bo'i cho zhes de la brjod// don du gnyer med de la ni//
170b4(rgyud 'bum): rin du smra byed sgrub pa po// 'di ni myur du 'grub byed pa'i// ras ni bzang po bla na med// las kun byed cing mchod pa ste// lha dang mi yi bde ba sbyin// 'byung po kun gyi dpal 'gyur
170b5(rgyud 'bum): zhes/ yang dag rdzogs sangs rgyas kyis gsungs// de nas rig pa 'dzin pas tha ga pa la rgyu skar bzang po 'am/ cho 'phrul gyi zla ba phyed dang / nyin zhag dge ba 'am/ gza' dge ba bltas te gso
170b6(rgyud 'bum): sbyong gi tshe/ / yang na dus kyi mchog dpyid kyi dus kyi zla ba yar gyi ngo la shing a mra'i me tog skyes shing / shing gi mchog rnams kyi yal gdang me tog rgyas pa de'i dus 'tshams su snga dro'i nyi ma 'char ba la sngar
170b7(rgyud 'bum): bstan pa'i tha ga pa lha la dbul bar 'os pa'i kha zas bsten cing gos gtsang ma bgos la/ mgo la cod pan bcings nas khrus legs par byas te/ tsan dan dkar po dang gur kum gang yang rung bas
171a1(rgyud 'bum): lus byugs nas ga pur gyi dris kha la bsgos te/ yid dga' ba dang / bkres pa dang / skom pa med par byas te/ thags kyi lag cha thag pa la sogs pa'i yo byad thams cad

171a5(rgyud 'bum): te/ gtsug phud bcing ba byas na bsrung ba chen po byas par 'gyur ro// gal te ra sa ri sa ra ba yin na ni zur bzhir zheng du khru bzhi/ chur khru brgyad de tha ga pas de tsam la yongs su goms par bya'o//
171a6(rgyud 'bum): 'bring ni zheng du khru do/ chur khru lnga pa'o// tha ma ni nang du bde bar gshegs pa'i mtho gang / chur ni khru brgyad kyi phyed ngo // de la sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi mtho gang la ni yul dbus
171a7(rgyud 'bum): kyi skyes bu tshad dang ldan pa'i khru gcig ste/ 'di la bde bar gshegs pa'i mtho zhes bsgrags te/ tshad ni 'dis tshad du bstan pa yin no// ras ni rab kyis dngos grub mchog/ 'jig rten
171b1(rgyud 'bum): gang zag mchog gis gsungs/ / thub pa mya ngan 'das 'og tu// rgyal srid 'dod la bar ma yin// longs spyod chen 'dod skyes bu dang // lha mi lha min gdengs can ni// tha ma la ni grub

171b3(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur/ / ras gsum gyis kyang bstan pa ni// skal 'dod mi la 'grub pa yin// brgya byin bde sogs bdag po la'ang // cho ga nyams na 'grub mi 'gyur// cho ga yang dag ldan na ni// mi

172b1(rgyud 'bum): blangs te 'gro/ / bzo bo bde khegs byas nas ni// nor mang pos ni bgo bsha' bya// brtul zhugs bzang po legs spyod pa'i// sngags pa ji ltar 'dod song nas// me tog dri zhim gyis mchod de//
172b2(rgyud 'bum): gtsang ba'i phyogs su gzhag par bya// 'di nyid kyi ni sngags kyis su// srung ba'i cho ga rab tu bya// sngon ni ras bal gang de yis// lan mang du ni yong sbyangs pa// bdag nyid dang ni ras dag la//

172b4(rgyud 'bum): sngags ni thams cad kyi/ / sngags kyi ngo bo rnam par spyod// brtson 'grus che zhing gzi brjid che// sngags kyi don kun sgrub byed pa// cha byad rnam pa sna tshogs byed// skyob pa rnam pa sna
172b5(rgyud 'bum): tshogs rgyu/ / 'dzam gling gnas pa'i sems can rnams// rmongs pa spyod cing sems dpa' med// ma dang phyin ci log par byed// longs spyod shin tu ngarkam chags kyis// rdzas rnams
172b6(rgyud 'bum): ma lus pa dag dang / / sngags rnams kyis kyang 'grub mi byed// 'khor po'i mun pa'i brtson rar ni// de nyid kyis ni 'khor bar 'gyur// gang yang rtag tu yid dag cing // dang ldan bkra
172b7(rgyud 'bum): shis dag la dga'/ / sngags rnams kun la spro ba dang // rtag tu 'dzin dang 'chang ba dang // bdag nyid chen po dngos grub 'dod// spro ba che zhing gzi brjid che// rgyal bas gsungs pa'i
173a1(rgyud 'bum): sngags dag ni/ / 'bad pa med pa 'grub par 'gyur// dad pa med pa'i skye bo la// dkar po'i chos rnams mi skye ste// sa bon tsha sgor btab pa la// myu gu skye ba med
173a2(rgyud 'bum): pa bzhin/ / dad pa'i rtsa ba rtag tu chos// chos don gzigs pas gsungs pa ste// chos don spyod pa de dag la// sngags rnams rtag tu 'grub par gsungs// de nas sgrub pa pos bzo
173a3(rgyud 'bum): bo legs par bslabs pa'i ri mo mkhan nam/ bdag nyid 'dri ba la mkhas pas tshen ma 'dres shing kha dog gsal ba dang ldan pa'i tshen rtsi rnams blangs te/ sngar tha ga pa la byas pa'i cho ga ji lta
173a4(rgyud 'bum): ba de nyid kyi mtshan nyid dang ldan pas ri mo mkhan la snga ma bzhin sbyang bar bya ste/ sngar ji ltar tha ga pa la byas de nyid kyis ras la ri mo 'drir gzhug go// yang na bdag nyid kyi bri bar bya'o//
173a5(rgyud 'bum): ga pur dang / tsan dan dang / gung kun la sogs pa'i dris tshe rtsi la bsgo bar bya zhing bdug spos bsregs te/ de nyid kyi sngags kyis lan brgya rtsa brgyad 'khor dang bcas pa la'ang bzlas te/
173a6(rgyud 'bum): me tog nag ge sar dang / pun nA ga na dang / bku la dang / pa na tsa ka dang / dbyar gyi me tog dang / d+hA nu kA ri dang / mA la ti'i me tog la sogs pas ras de gcal bkram
173a7(rgyud 'bum): pa byas la/ shar du mngon par phyogs pas ku sha'i khres la 'dug ste/ blo legs par gnas pa dang / sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' la dmigs pa'i sems phra mo lag par blangs
173b1(rgyud 'bum): nas khrug pa med pa'i sems kyis ras de la bri bar bya'o/ / dang po ni bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa bri bar bya ste/ rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa/ skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu
173b2(rgyud 'bum): rtsa gnyis kyis mtshan pa/ sku dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus nye bar mdzes pa/ rin po che'i pang la bzhugs pa/ kun nas 'od 'bar ba/ sku 'od 'dom gang gis nye bar mdzes pa/ chos
173b3(rgyud 'bum): 'chang bzhin pa/ sku dang zhing rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa/ dbus na gnas pa'i pad+ma bai DUR+Ya'i sdong bu can/ 'og na ni klu'i rgyal po gnyis kyi gdan chen po'i pad+ma'i sdong bu la 'dzin
173b4(rgyud 'bum): cing de bzhin gshegs pa la lta ba/ lag pa g.yas pas phyag 'tshal ba/ mdog dkar po/ rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ mi dang 'dra ba/ phyed sbrul gyi gzugs can/ dga' bo
173b5(rgyud 'bum): dang nye dga' bri bar bya'o/ / kun nas pad+ma'i mtsho pad+ma'i 'dab ma dang / me tog cung zad kha bye ba dang / rnam par kha bye ba dang / chu las skyes pa'i srog chags rnams dang / bya dang nya la sogs pas
173b6(rgyud 'bum): khyab pa yangs shing mdzes par skyes pa bri bar bya'o/ / gang bcom ldan 'das kyi rtsa ba'i pad+ma'i sdong bu de las 'phros pa'i yal ga las pad+ma'i me tog du ma mthar gyis mtho bar bya'o// g.yon gyi
173b7(rgyud 'bum): phyogs su pad+ma'i me tog brgyad byas te/ pad+ma de dag la byang chub sems dpa' chen po brgyad kyi gzugs bzhugs pa bri bar bya'o// dang po la re zhig 'phags pa 'jam dpal cung zad kha dog
174a1(rgyud 'bum): pad+ma'i gi sar bzhin du ser s+ya 'am/ gur kum mam/ gser gyi mdog 'dra ba gzhon nu'i cha byang / byis pa dang khye'u'i gzugs can/ spu zur bung lnga dang ldan pa/
174a2(rgyud 'bum): gzhon nu'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa/ lag pa g.yon pa na ut+pa la sngon po bsnams pa/ lag pa g.yas pas de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag byed pa/ sku mdzes pa/ zhi ba'i cha byad kyis de bzhin
174a3(rgyud 'bum): gshegs pa la lta ba/ bzhin cung zad dgod pa/ 'od 'bar ba dang ldan pas dkyil 'khor kun tu khyab pa bri'o// pad+ma gnyis pa la 'phags pa zla ba'i 'od shin tu gzhon sha can de bzhin du bri bar
174a4(rgyud 'bum): bya'o/ / gsum pa la ni nor bzangs so// bzhi pa la ni sgrib pa rnam par sel ba'o// lnga pa la ni nam mkha' mdzad do// drug pa la ni sa'i snying po'o// bdun pa la ni sdig med do// brgyad pa
174a5(rgyud 'bum): la ni spyan bzang yin te/ de dag thams cad kyang gzhon nu khye'u'i cha byad can/ gzhon nu'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa bri bar bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyi g.yas phyogs su ni byang chub sems dpa' chen po
174a6(rgyud 'bum): brgyad byams pa ma gtogs pa rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ 'phags pa byams pa ni bcom ldan 'das dang nye bar bri bar bya ste/ tshangs par spyod pa'i cha byad 'dzin pa/ mgo ral pa'i cod pan
174a7(rgyud 'bum): bcings pa/ mdog gser 'dra ba/ ka sha dmar po gyon pa/ dar lnga dmar po'i stong g.yogs byas pa/ thal ba'i thig le gsum gyis mtshan pa/ gzugs mdzes pa dang ldan pa/ dbyig pa dang spyi
174b1(rgyud 'bum): thugs 'dzin pa/ kriSh+Na sa ra'i pags pa thal gong g.yon par bgos pa/ lag pa g.yon pas 'phreng ba 'dzin cing de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag byas pa/ der gtong ba'i lta ba sems kyi spyod pa/
174b2(rgyud 'bum): bsam gtan la dmigs pa'i rnam pa can no// pad+ma gnyis pa la 'phags pa kun tu bzang po mdog me tog dri lang ku ltar sngo bsangs/ lus rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ lag pa g.yon pa na
174b3(rgyud 'bum): nor bu rin po che thogs pa/ lag pa g.yas pa na bil ba thogs shing mchog sbyin pa/ gzugs mdzes pa dang ldan pa de bzhin du bri bar bya'o// gsum pa la ni 'phags pa spyan ras
174b4(rgyud 'bum): gzigs dbang phyug 'dam bu'i mdog 'dra ba/ rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ ral pa'i cod pan 'chang ba/ mchod phyir thogs dkar pos byas pa/ 'phags pa 'od dpag med gzugs
174b5(rgyud 'bum): mdzes shing yid du 'ong ba/ stobs bcu dang ldan pa/ ral pa'i mthar skyil mo krung gis bzhugs shing cod pan du byas pa/ lag pa g.yon na pad+ma bsnams pa/ lag pa g.yas pa mchog
174b6(rgyud 'bum): sbyin pa/ sems kyi spyod pa bsam gtan la dmigs pa'i rnam pa can/ lus kun nas 'od kyis gsal bar byas pa'o// bzhi pa la ni 'phags pa phyag na rdo rje lag pa g.yon na rdo rje
174b7(rgyud 'bum): 'dzin pa lag pa g.yas na bil ba thogs pas mchog sbyin pa/ mdog gser 'dra ba/ rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ gzugs mdzes pa/ zhi ba'i lta ba dang ldan pa/ dra ba dang dra ba
175a1(rgyud 'bum): phyed pas lus nye bar dkris pa/ mu tig gi 'phreng bas mchod phyir thogs byas pa/ cod pan rin po che 'bar bas rnam par 'phro ba/ gos g.yo ba dang ldan pa bgos
175a2(rgyud 'bum): pa/ dar la dkar po'i stod g.yogs byas pa'o// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang / kun tu bzang po'i na bza' stong g.yogs kyang de bzhin du bya'o// cha byad ni ji ltar
175a3(rgyud 'bum): bstan pa bzhin bya'o/ / de bzhin pad+ma lnga pa la ni 'phags pa blo gro so chen po/ drug pa la ni blo gros zhi ba/ bdun pa la ni rnam par snang mdzad snying po/ brgyad pa la ni ngan song spong ba ste/
175a4(rgyud 'bum): byang chub sems dpa' 'di dag bri bar bya ste/ bil ba'i 'bras bu dang glegs bam lag na thogs pa/ rgyan thams cad kyis shin tu mdzes pa/ dar las stong g.yogs byas pa/ rgyan thams
175a5(rgyud 'bum): cad kyis brgyan pa/ g.yo ba dang ldan pa'i gos bgos pa'o// de dag gi steng du'ang rang sangs rgyas brgyad bri bar bya ste/ dge slong gi cha byad 'dzin pa/ lus skyes bu chen po'i mtshan dang
175a6(rgyud 'bum): ldan pa/ chos gos dmar po gyon pa/ skyil mo krung gis nye bar gnas pa/ rin po che'i ut+pa la la 'dug pa/ cha byang zhi ba'i bdag nyid kun nas 'od 'phro ba'i 'phreng bas khyab pa
175a7(rgyud 'bum): me tog dri zhim pos gcal bkram pa la 'di lta ste/ me tog ma la ti dang / dbyar gyi me tog dang / d+hA nuSh+ka ri ka dang / pun nA ga dang / nA ga ge sar la sogs pa'i me tog gis ras ris kun nas
175b1(rgyud 'bum): gcal bkram par bri bar bya'o/ / bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i g.yon phyogs 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi steng du rin po che du mas nye bar spras pa/ shin tu yangs pa'i gzhal med khang gi dkyil
175b2(rgyud 'bum): 'khor brag gi tshogs kyis shin tu nye bar mdzes par byas pa/ rin po che'i ut+pa las shin tu bkab pa/ ri'i rnam pa lta bu bri bar bya'o// gnas der sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das brgyad bri bar
175b3(rgyud 'bum): bya ste/ 'di lta ste/ rin chen gtsug tor can rin po che'i bai DUR+Ya'i 'od rnam par 'phro ba/ kun nas 'ong 'dom gang ba/ rin po che pad+ma rA ga dang / in+d+ra nI la dang / margad
175b4(rgyud 'bum): la sogs pa dang / bai DUR+Ya dang / a sma ga ra b+ha la sogs pa nor bu rin po che chen po'i bye brag kun nas 'od 'phro ba dang ldan pa/ nyi ma 'char ka'i mdog 'dra ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku lhung bzed
175b5(rgyud 'bum): dang / chos gos dang / bla gos dang ldan pa/ skyil krung gis bzhugs shing chos 'chad pa/ na bza' ser po mnabs pa/ skyes bu chen po'i mtshan gyis sku la khyab pa/ dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus sku
175b6(rgyud 'bum): nye bar mdzes pa/ zhi ba'i gzigs pa dang ldan pa/ rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen gtsug tor can bri bar bya'o// gnyis pa de bzhin gshegs pa me tog yang dag

176a1(rgyud 'bum): lnga pa bsnyen par dka' ba dang / drug pa rgyal ba rnam par snang mdzad dang / bdun pa sman gyi bla bai DUR+Ya'i 'od kyi rgyal po dang / brgyad pa de bzhin gshegs pa sdug bsngal
176a2(rgyud 'bum): thams cad zhi bar byed pa'i spyan gyi rgyal po bri bar bya'o/ / 'di dag thams cad kyang gser gyi mdog can de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs su bya'o// de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi steng gi
176a3(rgyud 'bum): phyogs su g.yas g.yon nas sprin gyi gseb nas gnas gtsang ma'i lha'i bu gnyis lus mi snang bar me tog gi char 'bebs pa bri bar bya ste/ bar snang la gnas nas sangs rgyas dang / byang

176a7(rgyud 'bum): dkar po'i tog dang / mu khyud dang / mu khyud bzang po'o// 'di dag thams cad kyang shin tu mdzes pa/ zhi ba'i cha byad kyi bdag nyid can/ shin tu dul ba'i cha byad can no// nyan thos chen
176b1(rgyud 'bum): po bdag nyid sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa la lta ba'o/ / steng du gnas gtsang ma'i lha'i bu gzhan gnyis nye bar kun nas gos kyi bla re chu zheng yangs pa shin tu mdzes pa 'dzin cing
176b2(rgyud 'bum): sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / 'phags pa nyan thos rnams kyi steng du lha'i gos dang 'phreng ba 'dzin pa bri bar bya'o// bcom ldan

177a1(rgyud 'bum): gsus pa 'phyang ba/ skra gyen du brdzes pa/ mig sman nag po dang sprin nag po dang 'dra ba/ kha spu ser ba/ sen mo ring ba/ mig dmar ba/ mgul pa'i phyogs sbrul/
177a2(rgyud 'bum): gyis brgyan pa/ stag gi pags pa mnabs pa/ bgegs thams cad rnam par 'joms par byed pa/ rab tu mi bzad pa chen po khro bo'i rgyal po chen po kun nas 'bar ba'i khro bo'i rgyal po gshin rje
177a3(rgyud 'bum): gshed bri bar bya'o/ / ri de'i 'og tu rdo'i steng na 'dug pa/ lus sa la btud de spos kyi snod lag na thogs pa/ cha byad dang dbyibs ji ltar bzhin rtags 'dzin pa/ ji ltar rjes su mthun pa'i

177b2(rgyud 'bum): mi sbom/ ha cang yang mi rgan/ sems bsam gtan la zhugs pa/ bka' nyan cing 'dug pa/ phyag g.yas pas mchog sbyin pa/ lus cung zad btud pa/ skyil mo krung gis nye bar

178a1(rgyud 'bum): bsal ba'i phyir/ / sgrub pa pos kyang yang dag bkur// mi yi bdag po srung don dang // dpal sgrub phyir yang ri mor bri// khro bo'i rgyal po gang yin de// ri yi rtse mor

180a7(rgyud 'bum): de bzhin du gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu bri bar bya'o// lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin dang / 'thab bral dang / dga' ldan dang / 'phrul dga' dang / dag pa dang / dri ma med pa dang / 'jam pa
180b1(rgyud 'bum): dang / mi gdung ba dang / 'od gsal dang / tshangs pa mi mjed kyi bdag po dang / 'og min dang / de la sogs pa'i lha'i bu gzugs na spyod pa dang / 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha'i bu dag mthar
180b2(rgyud 'bum): gyis bri bar bya'o/ / 'phags pa 'jam dpal dang nye bar 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor legs par dgod par bya ste/ rang rang gi gzugs dang cha byad du bri bar bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyi seng
180b3(rgyud 'bum): ge'i khri'i 'og tu ni rgya mtsho chen po las mngon par byung ba'i kun nas rin po che'i ri bo ras kyi mtha' mar bri bar bya'o/ / ras ris kyi phyogs gcig gi mtha' la sgrub pa po che byad dang / dbyings
180b4(rgyud 'bum): ji lta ba'i rnam pa pu sa mo'i lha nga dang mgo btud pa/ spos snod lag na thogs pa bri bar bya'o// rin po che'i ri bo de'i steng 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi 'og tu khro bo'i rgyal po gshin rje gshed ji ltar
180b5(rgyud 'bum): bstan pa de ltar bri bar bya'o/ / bcom ldan 'das kyi g.yon phyogs seng ge'i khri'i 'og tu 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi zhabs drung dang nye ba der rin po che'i ri bo'i steng du lha mo sgrol
180b6(rgyud 'bum): ma sngar ji ltar bstan pa de bzhin du bri bar bya'o/ / ras ris de'i khor yug tu me tog gtor bar bri bar bya la/ gcal bkram par bya ba la/ me tog tsam pa ka dang / nI long pa la dang / pad+ma dang /
180b7(rgyud 'bum): dri mchog dang / ma la ti dang / bar shi ka dang / d+hA nuSh+ka ri ka dang / pun nA ga dang / nA ga ge sar la sogs pa'i me tog gis ra sa ris de la khor yug tu gtor bar bya'o// ras ris kyi steng gi mtha'i zur
181a1(rgyud 'bum): gnyis su lha'i bu gnyis me tog gi tshogs 'thor ba/ gzugs rnam par bkras/ bar snang la gnas pa/ char 'byin pa'i sprin gyi nang nas mgo tsam 'thon pa/ sdang ba'i/
181a2(rgyud 'bum): pa/ kha dog dkar po bri bar bya'o// ras ris 'bring du gsungs pa 'di// dpal don gnyer las yang dag byung // sa yi steng gi mi rnams la// grub pa 'bring ni 'di la rten// 'khor
181a3(rgyud 'bum): bar sngan chad 'khor ba na/ / sdig pa cung zad gang byas pa// 'dir ni ras ris mthong tsam gyis// de oM mod la rnam par 'jig/ 'gro ba lngar ni 'khor ba na// sems can rmongs
181a4(rgyud 'bum): pas mi shes te/ / 'jam pa'i dbyangs kyi ras ris ni// 'bring po mthong bar mi byed pa'o// mtshams med lnga po byed pa dang // sdig pa'i rnyog pa byed gyur pa// sngags rnams sna
181a5(rgyud 'bum): tshogs gsungs gyur pas/ / tshul khrims nyams pa'ang 'grub par 'gyur// myur du rtogs pa'ang 'grub pa ni// bzlas pas thob pa skyed pa yin// ras ris 'bring po mthong bas ni//
181a6(rgyud 'bum): nang pa dag kyang nang las thar// dbul po dag kyang nor thob byed// bud med rnams kyang bu thob 'gyur// de tshe mthong ba tsam gyis ni// bsod nams rgya chen thob par 'gyur// nges
181a7(rgyud 'bum): bar lha dang mi rnams kyi/ / bde ba mi yis sten par 'gyur// skye ba gzhan du nges par ni// sangs rgyas nyid ni nges thob 'gyur// klog dang 'dri ba nyid dang ni// de bzhin mchod dang
181b1(rgyud 'bum): phyag 'tshal dang / mthong dang reg pa tsam gyis ni// sdig pa'i rnyog pa kun las grol// ras ris 'di ni mthu che la// don du gnyer dang bskul bas ni// myur du skye ba don yod thob/
181b2(rgyud 'bum): rjes su yi rang de bzhin no// ra sa ris mthong ba'i skye bo yi// bsod nams thob pa don yod pa// bskal pa bye ba rnams su yang // brjod par yang ni mi nus so// byung
181b3(rgyud 'bum): chub sems dpa'i sde snod phal po che theg pa chen po rgya che ba'i mdo las/ 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi rtsa ba'i cho ga lnga pa ras ris rab 'byams las ras ris gnyis pa'i cho ga rab 'byams rdzogs
181b4(rgyud 'bum): de nas gzhan yang bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa gzhan yang khyod
181b5(rgyud 'bum): kyi ras ris gsum pa'i cho ga rab tu gsang ba zhes bya ba yod de/ / gang sems can rnams la 'bad pa med par 'grub par 'gyur ba sngar bstan pa'i bzo bo dang / cho ga dang / bde bar gshegs
181b6(rgyud 'bum): pa'i mtho gang tsam thad kar de bzhin du kun nas zur bzhi snga ma bzhin du ras la ri mo bya'o/ / sngar bstan pa'i tshon gyis dang por re zhig 'phags pa 'jam dpal seng ge'i khri la bzhugs pa
181b7(rgyud 'bum): snga ma bzhin du byis pa khye'u'i gzugs mdzes pa'i gzugs can/ 'od zer 'phro ba dang ldan pa chos 'chad pa bri bar bya'o// g.yon gyi phyogs su 'phags pa kun tu bzang po rin po che'i ri la gnas
182a1(rgyud 'bum): @pa/ rnga yab lag na thogs pa/ lag pa g.yon pa na nor bu rin po che thogs pa/ me tog pri yang ku ltar sngo bsangs snga ma bzhin du bri bar bya'o// 'phags pa
182a2(rgyud 'bum): 'jam dpal gyi g.yas phyogs su 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug snga ma bzhin rin po che'i ri la gnas pa/ rnga ya ba lag na thogs pa/ lag pa g.yon pa na pad+ma 'dzin pa/ lus kun
182a3(rgyud 'bum): nas 'od dang ldan pa bri bar bya'o/ / seng ge'i khri'i 'og tu rin po che'i ri ras kyi mtha'i bar du bri bar bya'o// ras kyi mtha' ma dang nye ba'i zur du 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi seng ge'i khri'i 'og
182a4(rgyud 'bum): g.yas phyogs su khro bo'i rgyal po gshin rje gshed snga ma bzhin du bri bar bya'o/ / de'i 'og tu sgrub pa po snga ma bzhin du bri bar bya ste/ spos snod lag na thogs pa thams cad kyang snga ma ji lta
182a5(rgyud 'bum): ba bzhin du bya'o/ / 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi steng du de bzhin gshegs pa me tog yang dag par skyes pa'i dbang po'i rgyal po bri bar bya ste/ rin po che'i ri'i bug sor bcu drug
182a6(rgyud 'bum): gi tshad tsam gyi nang na bzhugs pa/ ri'i stod kyi cha khang pa brtsegs pa 'dra ba bri bar bya'o// ras ris kyi khor yug tu ri'i rnam pas yongs su 'khor ba bri bar bya'o// steng gi ras kyi mtha' gnyis la
182a7(rgyud 'bum): gnas pa'i ri'i stod kyi cha la lding ba bzhin du me tog gi tsho gas 'thor ba'i gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu dag pa dang / rnam par dag pa zhes bya ba gnyis snga ma bzhin du bri bar bya zhing / ras la me tog
182b1(rgyud 'bum): rnam pa sna tshogs kyi gcal bkram pa'ang bri bar bya'o/ / rnam gsum ras ris mtshan nyid ni// thams cad 'dir ni bstan pa las// 'di ni tha ma zhes bya ste// phran tshegs las rnams
182b2(rgyud 'bum): dag la shis/ / bskal pa bye bar mi bzang las// ras ris mthong ba tsam gyis grol// ras ris mthong ba tsam gyis ni// skad cig de la grol bar 'gyur// sangs rgyas bye ba stong
182b3(rgyud 'bum): phrag ni/ / mthong ba tsam gyis grol 'gyur te// ras ris mthong ba tsam gyis kyang // de yi mod la grol bar 'gyur// sangs rgyas bya ba stong phrag la// blo dang ldan pas bsnyen bkur bas//
182b4(rgyud 'bum): ras ris tha ma mthong ba ni// bcu drug char yang mi phod do// sangs rgyas skyob pa kun la ni// mchod byas bsod nams gang yin pa// mkhas pas bsod nams gang thob de// ras ris
182b5(rgyud 'bum): tha ma mthong ba'i yin/ / dge ba bdag gi las rnams la// longs spyod phyir yang 'dir spyad do// sngags rnams gang dag ci yod pa// tshangs dbang drang srong gis bshad dang // nam
182b6(rgyud 'bum): mkha' lding gis gang bshad dang / / chu lha nyi ma lus ngan dang // nor sbyin sogs dang srin po dang // lha min dbang po lto 'phye dang // zla ba rlung dang gshin rje sogs// khyab 'jug
182b7(rgyud 'bum): lha chen sogs bshad pa/ / sngags rnams 'dir ni bkug pa dag/ ras ris mdun du dngos grub 'gyur// 'dir ni zhi ba bya ba ste// de bzhin du ni rgyas pa bya// 'dir ni mngon spyod
183a1(rgyud 'bum): spang bya ste/ / thub pa mchog gis spang ba yin// byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod phal po che theg pa chen po'i mdo sde shin tu rgyas pa las/ 'jam dpal gyi rtsa ba'i cho ga zhi
183a2(rgyud 'bum): mo le'u drug pa'i cho ga rab 'byams la sa ras ris chung ngu gsum pa'i cho ga rdzogs so/ / / de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa stan las langs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi
183a3(rgyud 'bum): zhabs la phyag 'tshal nas/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa la lan gsum bskor ba byas te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom
183a4(rgyud 'bum): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa ni legs so legs so/ / rig pa thams cad kyi brtul zhugs spyad pa'i don dang / phan pa dang / bde ba dang / 'jig
183a5(rgyud 'bum): rten la snying brtse ba'i phyir dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi thabs la mkhas pa ston pa/ phung po lhag ma dang bcas pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i grong khyer du 'gro bar byed pa/ byang chub sems dpa'
183a6(rgyud 'bum): rnams kyi rgyud nges par byang chub sgrub par byed pa/ sngags kyi spyod pa thams cad kyi don sgrub par byed pa/ bdag gi gsang sngags 'di skye bo thams cad la rgyas par byed par 'gyur ro// ma 'ongs pa'i
183a7(rgyud 'bum): dus na 'jig rten gyi bla ma 'das pa na de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyi ma'i rigs nub pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad spangs pa dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang /
183b1(rgyud 'bum): 'phags pa nyan thos dang / sangs rgyas rnams kyis mun par gyur pa dang / snod kyi 'jig rten rnam par 'jig pa dang / 'phags pa'i lam dang / rig pa thams cad dang / sngags dang /
183b2(rgyud 'bum): sman dang / nor bu rin po che med pa dang / skye bo dam pa rnams kyis 'jig rten na yongs su ma zin pa dang / sems can gyi khams thams cad 'byung bar 'gyur te/ le lo can dang /
183b3(rgyud 'bum): dran pa nyams pa dang / ma dad pa dang / mi bsrun pa dang / mi dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su zin pa dang / g.yo sgyu dang ldan pa dang / slu ba spyod pa de dag chos kyi rnam grangs
183b4(rgyud 'bum): 'di thos nas skrag par 'gyur te/ le lo la mngon par 'dod cing dad par mi 'gyur la/ 'dod pa 'chol zhing yid ches par mi 'gyur ro// log pa'i lta ba skye zhing bsod nams ma yin
183b5(rgyud 'bum): par 'phel bar 'gyur ro/ / mtshams med par gzhol zhing shin tu mi bzad pa'i yang shin tu mi bzad pa thob pa sdug bsngal ba de dag gi don dang / dbang med pa la dbang du bya ba'i don dang /
183b6(rgyud 'bum): dbang du gyur pa la mi 'jigs pa sbyin pa'i phyir dang / thabs mkhas pas bsdu ba'i sbyor ba sngags kyi ras kyi ri mo'i cho ga gang de'i dus la bab par mkhyen na bcom ldan 'das kyis bshad du gsol
183b7(rgyud 'bum): de nas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa de bzhin gshegs pa la don 'di 'dri bar sems
184a1(rgyud 'bum): pa legs so legs so/ / 'jam dpal khyod kyi mchog tu gsang ba rig pa'i brtul zhugs spyod pa'i le'u ras ris kyi cho ga rab 'byams yod de/ snying po mchog rnams kyi
184a2(rgyud 'bum): don mchog tu gsang ba dam pa don chen po sngags thams cad kyi cho gar gyur pa drug pa 'di dag yi ge drug gi snying po'i mcho go the tsom med pa de'i tshe 'grub par 'gyur te/ sems can de dag gdul ba'i
184a3(rgyud 'bum): phyir dang / thabs la mkhas pa la yang dag par rab tu zhug pa'i phyir dang / nges par yang dag pa'i byang chub thob pa'i phyir sangs rgyas bye ba phrag bdun cu rtsa drug gis sngar gsungs shing da ltar yang
184a4(rgyud 'bum): ngas bshad de/ ma 'ongs pa'i skye bo'i tshogs la phan pa'i phyir legs par nyon la yid la zung zhig dang ngas bshad par bya'o// de gang zhe na/ de nas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas sngags
184a5(rgyud 'bum): gsungs pa/ oM bAkyen+na dza ya/ oM bA kye she sha swa/ oM bkye baM dza ya/ oM bAkye niny+dzA ya/ oM bA kye ya na maHoM bAkye raM na maH/ de ltar 'di dag 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa khyod kyi
184a6(rgyud 'bum): sngags drug dang / yi ge drug pa mthu chen po dang stobs mnyam pa/ snying po dam pa mchog tu grub pa/ sangs rgyas bzhin du 'byung ba/ sems can thams cad kyi don gyi phyir sangs rgyas thams
184a7(rgyud 'bum): cad kyis rab tu gsungs pa/ dam tshig nyams pa dang / dam tshig g.yos pa rnams kyi las thams cad byed pa/ byang chub kyi lam rjes su ston pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs la sngags kyi
184b1(rgyud 'bum): mchog tu gyur pa/ mchog dang / 'bring dang / tha ma gsum la rab tu sbyor ba/ legs par sbyangs pa'i las kyi 'bras bu'i rnam par smin pa sbyin pa/ bstan pa nub pa'i dus su'ang dngos grub 'thob
184b2(rgyud 'bum): par 'gyur ro/ / las kyi tshul dang bcas pa la yang dag par gzhol ba la skad cig gis don sgrub par 'gyur ba de dag myur du shin tu myur bar de'i tshe dang / de'i dus su 'grub par 'gyur ro//
184b3(rgyud 'bum): nyams sad pa'i phyir yang snying po dam pa 'di dag bsgrub par bya ste/ mdor na ji lta ji ltar rab tu sbyar ba de lta de ltar 'grub par 'gyur ro// de nas ras ris kyi cho ga 'di bya ba yin te/ de'i tshe de'i
184b4(rgyud 'bum): dus na 'jigs pa chen po dang / snyigs ma la sems can bsod nams chung ba 'byung bar 'gyur te/ grags pa chung ba dang / tshe thung ba dang / longs spyod chung ba dang / longs spyod chung
184b5(rgyud 'bum): bas shin tu rgya che ba'i ras ris kyi cho ga'i sgrub pa la sogs pa rtsom par mi nus te/ de dag gi phyir shin tu mdor bstan par bya'o// dang por re zhig dpa' bo'i tshong gi dog pa srang gcig gam
184b6(rgyud 'bum): srang phyed kyis nyos la/ chur khru gang / zheng du khru phyed tsam gyi ras kha tshar dang bcas pa tha ga pa 'thag tu gzhug go// yang na skra med pa'i ras kyi dum bu gsar pa gzhan steng dang 'og tu ji ltar
184b7(rgyud 'bum): 'dod pa khru gnyis dang / bzhi dang / drug dang / lnga dang / bcu dang / brgyad pa'i ras blangs te ji ltar 'dod pa'i ri mo mkhan gyis bri bar bya'o// tshon ma 'dres pa dang / tsan dan dang /

185a2(rgyud 'bum): gsar pa'i nang du bkrus la zhag gsum gyi bar du legs par bkab ste bzhag nas gtsang ba'i phyogs su bsrung ba byas shing / bdag nyid kyang gtsang bar byas te zla ba yar
185a3(rgyud 'bum): ngo'i tshes bco lnga la ras snod kyi mdun du shar du mngon par phyogs te/ ku sha'i khres la 'dug nas sngags kyi tshig lan brgya rtsa brgyad brjod par bya ba la 'di lta ste/ oM he he bA ga bA na ba hu rU pa d+ha ra/ di bya
185a4(rgyud 'bum): tsak+Shu khe/ a ba lo ka ya/ a ba lo ka ya/ a ba lo ka ya/ mAM sa ma ya ma nu sma ra ku mA ra rU pa d+hA ri Ne/ ma hA bo d+hi satwa kin tsi rA ya si hU sA te swa te swA hA/ sngags 'dis bzlas pa byas la de nyid du nyal
185a5(rgyud 'bum): bar bya'o/ / gnyid log pa'i rmi lam du 'grub pa 'am mi 'grub pa ston par 'gyur ro// de nas langs nas rmi lam du grub pa'i mtshan ma mthong na ring por mi thogs par ras ris bri bar bya'o//
185a6(rgyud 'bum): gal te grub pa'i mtshan ma rmi lam du ma mthong na ras de snod de las phyung la/ nyi ma la bskams nas yang snod gsar pa gzhan du bcug la shin tu dben par legs par bsrung ba byas la gzhag go/
185a7(rgyud 'bum): de nas yang snying po'i mchog de dag las gang yang rung ba'i sngags blangs la gang 'dod pa'i yi ge drug pa'ang yi ge 'bum bzla bar bya'o// de nas ras mi dge ba'ang 'grub par 'gyur ro// dang por
185b1(rgyud 'bum): re zhig ras de blangs la cho 'phrul gyi zla ba phyed dam/ yar ngo'i nyin zhag la rgyu skar bzang po dang ldan pa'i tshes grangs bzang po la/ 'phags pa 'jam dpal byis pa khye'u'i gzugs can mgo zur
185b2(rgyud 'bum): pu lnga dang ldan pa/ byis pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa/ mdog gser 'dra ba/ na bza' sngon po g.yo bzhin pa mnabs pa/ na bza' dar lnga sngon pos stong g.yogs byas pa/ chos 'chang pa/
185b3(rgyud 'bum): seng ge'i khri la skyil mo krung phyed pas bzhugs la/ zhabs g.yas pas rin po che'i zhabs rten la bzhag pa/ g.yon pa seng ge'i gdan la bzhugs pa/ rgyan thams cad dang ldan pa/

185b5(rgyud 'bum): pa g.yon pa na nor bu rin po che thogs pa/ yan lag thams cad mdzes pa/ rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ na bza' sngon po g.yo ba mnabs pa/ mu tig gi 'phreng bas mchod phyir
185b6(rgyud 'bum): thogs pa/ pad+ma dkar po'i gdan la 'dug pa bri bar bya'o// 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi g.yon phyogs su 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug ston ka'i mnga' rgyu'i mdog lta dkar ba
185b7(rgyud 'bum): na bza' sngon po g.yo ba mnabs pa/ yan lag thams cad mdzes pa/ rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ mu tig gi'i phreng bas mchod phyir thogs byas pa/ lag pa g.yon pa na pad+ma dkar po
186a1(rgyud 'bum): @'dzin pa/ lag pa g.yas pa na rnga yab gser gyi yu ba can dkar po thogs pa/ zhi ba'i cha byang can/ 'phags pa 'jam dpal la lta ba/ de bzhin du 'phags pa kun
186a2(rgyud 'bum): tubazang po pad+ma dkar po la gnas pa gnyis ka'ang de ltar bri bar bya'o/ / de nas sdong bu gcig las skyes pa'i pad+ma gsum la dbus kyi rtsa ba'i pad+ma'i ge sar la ni 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi seng ge'i
186a3(rgyud 'bum): khri dang / rin po che'i zhabs rten no// gnyis pa'i pad+ma la 'phags pa kun tu bzang po'o// gsum pa'i pad+ma la ni spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug go// pad+ma'i sdong bu mdzes pa rin
186a4(rgyud 'bum): po che margad 'dra ba/ pad+ma'i me tog du mkham bye ba dang / phyed tsam bye ba dang / kha bye ba dang ldan pa/ mtsho chen po ma dros pa las skyes pa/ klu'i rgyal po dga' ngo dang nye dga'
186a5(rgyud 'bum): gnyis pad+ma'i sdong bu la 'dzin pa/ klu'i rgyal po de dag gi kha dog dkar ba/ ga deng ka bdun gyis nye bar brgyan pa/ lus rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ lus kyi stod mi la sbrul gyi
186a6(rgyud 'bum): gdengs kas mtshan pa/ 'phags pa 'jam dpal la lta ba/ lus phyeng chu'i nang du nub pa/ nor bu rin po che dang gos kyis nye bar mdzes pa bri bar bya'o// mtsho chen po kun gyi 'og tu
186a7(rgyud 'bum): sgrub pa po ras ris kyi g.yas phyogs kyi mtha'i zur du 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi zhal gyi dkyil 'khor la lta ba/ spos snod lag na thogs pa/ mgo dang pus mo'i lhang 'dud pa/ cha byad
186b1(rgyud 'bum): dang kha dog snga ma ji la ba bzhin bri bar bya'o/ / 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi steng ras kyi zur gnyis su lha'i bu me tog gi 'phreng ba 'dzin pa nam mkha' la lding ba/ sprin gyi nang nas byung ba
186b2(rgyud 'bum): me tog gi tshogs chen po 'thor ba shin tu mdzes pa bri bar bya'o/ / ras ris kyi khor yug tu me tog nA ga ge sar la sogs pas rab tu gtor bar bya'o// ji ltar 'dod pa'i gzugs de bzhin du bri bar
186b3(rgyud 'bum): bya'o/ / 'phags pa 'jam dpal chos 'chad pa dang / 'phag pa kun tu bzang po dang / 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs lag na rnga yab g.yob pa bri bar bya'o// yang na sgrub pa po ji
186b4(rgyud 'bum): ltar 'dod pa bzhin du ras ris kyi gzugs nges par bri bar bya ste/ ji ltar 'dod pa'i cha byad dam/ ji ltar 'dod pa'i dbyibs sam/ sgrub pa po ji ltar 'dod pa de lta de ltar bri bar bya'o//
186b5(rgyud 'bum): dbus su 'phags pa 'jam dpal/ g.yas g.yon du 'phags pa 'jig rten dbang phyug dang / kun tu bzang po ji ltar 'dod par nges par bri bar bya'o// yang na ji snyed pa'i ras kyi dum bu maH
186b6(rgyud 'bum): gang ngam/ khru gang la bdag nyid dam/ gzhan gyis sam/ ri mo mkhan gso sbyong byas pa'am/ gso sbyong ma byas pa 'am/ dad pa 'am/ ma dad pa 'am/ gtsang ba 'am/ mi gtsang ba 'am/
186b7(rgyud 'bum): tshul khrims dang ldan pa 'am/ tshul khrims 'chal pa'i ri mo mkhan gyis kyang bri bar bya'o// bdag nyid ngam sgrub pa pos nges par sngon du bsnyen pa byas pa dang / ngang ba dang byang chub tu sems bskyed pa
187a1(rgyud 'bum): ni nges par bya'o/ / de ltar byas na sngags 'grub par 'gyur gyi gzhan du sdig pa'i las can gyis ni mi 'gyur te/ de ltar dad pa dang / de ltar gyur pas bsgrub
187a2(rgyud 'bum): par bya'o/ / sngags kyi rgyal po dang / sngags kyi lha dag 'dir dad pa dang ldan pas 'grub par 'gyur gyi gzhan dag gis ni ma yin no// gang phyir dang pa theg pa mchog
187a3(rgyud 'bum): gang gis rnam par 'dren pa mchog/ ngad pa med pa'i mi la ni// dkar po'i chos rnams mi skye ste// sa bon tshig par gyur pa las// myu gu sngon po ji bzhin no// dang dang ldan pa'i mingag
187a4(rgyud 'bum): la/ sangs rgyas las ni 'grub 'gyur te// sngags rnams thams cad khyad par du// dad pa med la mi 'grub bo// gang yang 'jig rten lha dag dang // de bzhin 'jig rten 'das pa dag/
187a5(rgyud 'bum): dang ldan kun la 'grub 'gyur te// sdig pa dag dang bral phyir ro// byang chub der song yid kyis ni// de dag myur du nges 'grub ste// gzhan la 'grub par mi 'gyur zhing // bstan pa 'di la
187a6(rgyud 'bum): rnam par bzlog/ ras ni chung dang chen po dang // 'bring du nye bar bsgrags pa yin// las rnams kun la sgrub pa ni// de ni rab tu bstan par bya// byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod phal po
187a7(rgyud 'bum): theg pa chen po shin tu rgyas pa'i mdo las/ 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi rtsa ba'i cho ga bdun pa'i le'u rab 'byams las ras ris kyi cho ga bzhi pa'i le'u rab 'byams rdzogs so//
187b1(rgyud 'bum): / de nas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal gzhon nu gang khyod kyis bstan pa'i sems can de dag gi phyir yang
187b2(rgyud 'bum): le'u'i cho ga rab 'byams 'di thabs sra bas 'grub par 'gyur ba ngas kyang bstan te/ de dag gi don gyi phyir yon tan rgya che ba'i bye brag gi dbye ba las rnam par 'byed pa sems can thams cad kyi don gyi phyir
187b3(rgyud 'bum): yang dag par bshad par bya yis/ / de legs par shin tu rab tu nyon cig dang bshad par bya'o// de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//
187b4(rgyud 'bum): bdag gi tshig gi nus pa gsal bar mdzad cing sngags kyi spyod pa'i yon tan grub par mdzad pa ni legs so legs so zhes gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de'i dus la bab par mkhyen na bdag la thugs
187b5(rgyud 'bum): brtse ba'i slad du de bshad du gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor la gzigs te 'dzum pa mdzad do// de nas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i zhal gyi sgo
187b6(rgyud 'bum): nas 'od zer sngon po dang / ser po dang / ljang khru dang / shel gyi kha dog lta bu byung ste/ 'od zer de byung ma thag tu thams cad dang ldan pa'i dkyil 'khor snang bar byas nas/ stong gsum gyi
187b7(rgyud 'bum): stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi bdud thams cad zil gyis mnan nas rgyu skar gyi 'ong dang / ri bo'i tshogs thams cad kyi 'od dang / gang 'di zla ba dang nyi ma rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba de dag gi 'od kyang
188a1(rgyud 'bum): zil gyis mnan te mi gsal zhing 'od med par 'gyur ba dang / rnam par mdzes par mi 'gyur zhing gsal bar mi 'gyur ro// nor bu thams cad dang / sngags dang / sman dang /
188a2(rgyud 'bum): rin po che'i 'od thams cad 'od med par byas nas slar log ste/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i zhal gyi sgor nub par gyur to// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rje 'khor gyi
188a3(rgyud 'bum): dkyil 'khor de nyid du 'dus shing 'khod par gyur pa de stan las langs nas/ rings pa'i tshul gyis bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la btud de/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol
188a4(rgyud 'bum): to/ / bcom ldan 'das ni rgyu ma mchis rkyen ma mchis par 'dzum pa'i dzad na/ bcom ldan 'das 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i rgyu gang lags/ rkyen gang lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang /
188a5(rgyud 'bum): bcom ldan 'das kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' phyag na rdo rje la bka' stsal pa/ phyag na rdo rje de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ ji skad smras pa de bzhin no// bcom ldan 'das ni rgyu med
188a6(rgyud 'bum): pa dang / rkyen med par 'dzum pa mi mdzad de/ rgyu yod/ rkyen yod do// gang zhig mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di 'jam dpal gyi rtsa ba'i cho ga rig pa'i spyod pa rjes su sgrub pa/ las
188a7(rgyud 'bum): bsgrub pa'i thabs la yang dag par gzhol ba/ chos kyi sprin la rten pa la yang dag par 'jug cing rjes su 'brang bar byed pa dang / 'dzin par 'gyur ba dang / klog par 'gyur ba dang
188b1(rgyud 'bum): ngang bar 'gyur ba dang / glegs bam la dri ba byas nas mchod par 'gyur ba dang / tsan dan gyi phye ma dang / byug pa dang / bdug pa dang / 'phreng ba dang / bdugs dang / rgyal
188b2(rgyud 'bum): mtshan dang / ba dan rnam pa sna tshogs pa'am/ tshig gi bye brag gis sam/ sil snyan rnam pa sna tshogs dang / phag rdob pa dag gam/ tha na rjes su yi rang ba dang ldan pa'i sems
188b3(rgyud 'bum): rgyud la thob pa 'am/ ba spu ldang bar byed pa 'am/ rig pa'i mthu thos nas dga' ba skyes pa'am/ rjes su yi rang bar 'gyur pa 'am/ spyod pa thob par 'gyur ba de dag ni ngas bla na med pa
188b4(rgyud 'bum): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das su 'gyur bar lung bstan te/ des na rgyal ba de ltar 'dzum pa mdzad kyi/ gzhan du ni ma yin no// 'dir dang por re zhig
188b5(rgyud 'bum): cho ga'i rgyal po 'di la dam tshig gi mthong ba sngon du bya ba rnams byas pa dang / dbang bskur ba thob pa rtsa ba'i sngags sam/ snying po 'am/ nye ba'i snying po 'am/ sngags gang yang rung ba bzung
188b6(rgyud 'bum): nas yi ge gcig pa'am/ gang 'dod pa dgon pa chen por song ste/ 'bum phrag gsum bzla bar bya'o// 'bras bu dang chus 'tsho ba 'am/ rtsa ba dang lo ma'i bza' ba byas na sngon du
188b7(rgyud 'bum): bya ba byas par 'gyur ro/ / de nas ri'i rtse mor 'dzegs nas ras ris chen po'i tshang nub phyogs su mngon du lta ba bzhag pa byas la/ bdag nyid shar du bltas te ku sha'i khres la 'dug nas/
189a1(rgyud 'bum): @pad+ma dkar po la tsan ldan dang gur kum gyis btags te/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa dang / sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang / rang
189a2(rgyud 'bum): sangs rgyas dang / nyan thos dag la 'bum phrag gcig ri mo'i ras ris kyi 'og tu dbul bar bya'o// ga pur gyi bdug pa'ang ci 'byor pas bdugs go// lha'i bu dang klu rnams la ji snyed pa'i me tog
189a3(rgyud 'bum): gis mchod par bya'o/ / de nas mtshan phyed kyi dus su cho 'phrul gyi zla ba phyed kyi zla ba nya ba la/ ras ris kyi mdun du pad+ma'i rnam pa lta bu'i me thab byas pa la tsan dan dkar po'i shing gis me sbar nas/
189a4(rgyud 'bum): gur ku ma dang ga pur bsres pas sreg blugs ci 'byor pas stong rtsa brgyad sbyin sreg bya'o// de nas bsrung ba bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa las 'od zer byung ste/ ras
189a5(rgyud 'bum): kyi ri mo'i khor yug nas gcig tu 'bar bar 'gyur te/ sgrub pa pos gu ra ku ma dang tsan dan gyis btags pa'i tsan ngan dkar po'i me tog gis mchod yon dbul lo// de nas sgrub pa
189a6(rgyud 'bum): pos rings pa'i tshul gyis ras ris la lan gsum bskor ba byas te/ sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang / 'phags
189a7(rgyud 'bum): pa nyan thos rnams la phyag byas mas/ sgrub pa pos bris pa'i ras ris kyi mtha' ma'i phyogs nas 'jigs pa med pa sa ras ris gzung bar bya'o// de nas bzung ba tsam gyis 'phur te/
189b1(rgyud 'bum): se gol gtogs pa tsam gyis tshangs pa'i 'jig rten du phyin par 'gyur te/ me tog can gyi 'jig rten gyi khams su rab tu gnas par 'gyur te/ gang du bcom ldan 'das me tog yang dag par
189b2(rgyud 'bum): skyes pa'i rgyal po'i dbang po de bzhin gshegs pa de bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston to/ / 'phags pa 'jam dpal yang mngon du mthong ngo // chos kyang thos so//
189b3(rgyud 'bum): byang chub sems dpar du ma ngag kyang mthong zhing / de dag la bsnyen bkur yang byed de// bskal pa chen po stong du rga ba dang 'chi ba med cing gnas par 'gyur ro// ras ris kyang de na
189b4(rgyud 'bum): gnas par 'gyur ro/ / sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis byin gyis brlab par 'gyur ro// de dag gis byin gyis brlabs par yang dag par shes so//
189b5(rgyud 'bum): sangs rgyas kyi zhing stong yang 'da' bar byed do// lus stong yang ston par byed do// rdzu 'phrul gyi mthu du ma'ang 'byin par byed do// 'phags pa 'jam dpal yang dge ba'i bshes
189b6(rgyud 'bum): gnyen du 'gyur ro/ / nges par byang chub la gzhol bar 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod pal po che theg pa chen po rgya che ba'i mdo las 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi rtsa ba'i
189b7(rgyud 'bum): cho ga zhib mo rab 'byams sgrub pa'i thabs mchog gi las kyi le'u brgyang pa las dang po rdzogs so/ / / de nas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas/ thams cad dang ldan pas
190a1(rgyud 'bum): 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor gyi lha 'dus pa rnams la bka' stsal pa/ grogs po dag khyed cag nyon cig/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i spyod pa'i kyi 'khor sngags sgrub
190a2(rgyud 'bum): pa'i thabs kyi las byed pa/ sgru pa po bsrung ba'i phyir mchog tu gsang ba dam pa/ snying po dam pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gsungs pa/ rig pa'i rgyal po chen
190a3(rgyud 'bum): po bzlas pa gang gis sngags thams cad bzlas par gyur te/ kye lha'i tshogs dag 'di ni 'da' bar bya ba ma yin te/ rig pa'i rgyal po 'di ni 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'ang rig
190a4(rgyud 'bum): pa'i rgyal po 'dis 'gugs shing dbang du byed la 'byor pa med par byed na/ byang chub sems dpa' gzhan lta smos kyang ci dgos/ 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i sngags
190a5(rgyud 'bum): thams cad dang / bgegs thams cad kyang 'jig par byed de/ 'di ni stobs che ba dang / mthu che ba dang / dpa' bo gcig pa dang / sngags thams cad kyi cho ga gcig tu
190a6(rgyud 'bum): bstan pa dang / yi ge gcig pa rnams kyi nang na gcig par bstan pa dang / yi ge gcig gis don thams cad sgrub par byed pa/ bya ba thams cad byed pa/ sngags thams cad gcod par byed
190a7(rgyud 'bum): pa ma rungs pa'i las rnams kyi sdig pa thams cad rab tu 'jig par byed pa/ sngags thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed pa/ dge bar byed pa/ 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las
190b1(rgyud 'bum): 'das pa'i sngags kyi gong nas gong du 'dug pa thogs pa med pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po/ bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed pa gang zhen/ oM d+hI
190b2(rgyud 'bum): grogs po dag 'di nyid mchog tu gsang ba dam pa las thams cad byed pa yi ge gcig pa zhes bya ba rig pa'i rgyal po 'da' bar bya ba ma yin pa/ sems can thams cad kyis thub par dka' ba
190b3(rgyud 'bum): 'byung po thams cad kyi bkra shis pa/ sangs rgyas thams cad sgrub par byed pa/ sngags thams cad kyi mnga' ba dag/ 'jig rten thams cad kyi dbang phyug/ rnam par sdang
190b4(rgyud 'bum): ba rnams la byams pa'i bdag nyid dang / skye bo thams cad la snying brtse bar byed pa/ bgegs thams cad 'jig par byed pa ste/ mdor na ji lta ji ltar rab tu sbyar ba de lta de ltar las
190b5(rgyud 'bum): byed de/ bsgrubs pa med kyang las 'grub par 'gyur ro// sngags 'di bzlas la reg pas de dbang du 'gyur ro// gos la bsngags nas gon na skal ba bzang por 'gyur ro// so shing
190b6(rgyud 'bum): la bsngags na son da nye bar zhi bar 'gyur ro/ / ka ra wI ra dkar po'i so shing la lan bdun bdun bsngags te zos na don du ma gnyer bar yang kha zas 'byung bar 'gyur ro// mig gi nad
190b7(rgyud 'bum): la rgya mchu btags te lan bdun mngon par bsngags la mig bkang na mig gi nang sel to/ / rna ba'i nang la 'brug sgrog pa las skyes pa'i rtsa tsha tri ka zhes bya ba glang po che'i rgyab tu reg par
191a1(rgyud 'bum): byas la/ rang gi lo ma'i nang du gtums nas me chung ba la bsregs te shin tu 'jam par byas la/ r+g+ha mtshwa'i phye ma chu dro rngam tsam dang sbrus te lan bdun bsngags pas rna ba
191a2(rgyud 'bum): bkang ba dang / skad cig de nyid larna ba nye bar zhi bar 'gyur ro// bud med bu 'byung ba'i dus su mngal nas mthon ten zhing nyam thag pa la ni shing Arba rU sha ka'i rtsa ba srog chags med
191a3(rgyud 'bum): pa'i chu la btags te lte ba'i phyogs su bskus na nye bar zhi bar 'gyur ro/ / mtshon nang du lus pa'i skyes bu la ni mar rnying pa la lan brgya rtsa brgyad mngon par bsngags te btung ba 'am
191a4(rgyud 'bum): blugs na phyogs de nas de'i skad cig la zug rngu med par 'gyur ro/ / ma nu ba dang / gsung ba dang / 'khru nga'i nang la ni lan tshwa nag po 'am/ rgya mtshwa 'am/ tshwa gnan gang yang
191a5(rgyud 'bum): rung ba la lan bdun bsngags te zos na nad de las grol bar 'gyur te/ de nyid kyi nyin par bde legs su 'gyur ro// ldan pa'i nad kyi tshang par 'khru ba 'am/ 'khru ba la ni mdu lung ba'i rtsa
191a6(rgyud 'bum): ba btags te/ lan gcig gam gnyis bzlas pa byas nas srog chags med pa'i chu dang 'thungs na gnod pa med par de las grol bar 'gyur ro// bud med mo sham bu mi skye ba skye bar 'dod na
191a7(rgyud 'bum): a shwa gan nga'i rtsa ba mar bzang po dang lhan cig bskol la/ ba'i 'o ma dang lhan cig bskol te/ ba'i 'o ma dang bsres la lan nyi shu rtsa lngar bzlas la/ zla mtshan gyi dus su brung la khrus byas pa'i 'og
191b1(rgyud 'bum): tu khyim bdag gzhan gyi chung ma spangs shing / 'dod pas log par g.yem pa spangs pas rang gi chung ma la mngon par song na rang gi khyo dang 'dra ba'i bu skye bar 'gyur ro// lo gsum mam lo lnga'i bar du
191b2(rgyud 'bum): btsa' ba'i dus su khrag 'byung ba 'am/ lo du ma'i bar du bu ma chags pa 'am/ gzhan gyi sngags rgyud dang / sman dang / gzhan gyi phyag rgyas bcing ba dang / gzhan gyis ma rungs par

191b5(rgyud 'bum): dang / mdza' bo dang / mi mdza' bas sbyor ba byas pa la lan nyi shu rtsa bdun bsngags te/ mar rnying ba la rma bya'i sgo zla ba 'dra ba dang bsres te btags la/ de nas shin tu zhib par byas
191b6(rgyud 'bum): la sha kha ra dang lhan cig sbyar te a ru ra tsam bza' bar bya'o/ / zhag bdun gyi bar du kha ra dang ldan pa'i 'o ma bskol ba btung bar bya ste/ yang dang yang du sngags kyang bzla bar bya'o// mgo
191b7(rgyud 'bum): bo'i nad la ni khA'i gshog pa la lan bdun bsngags te byabs na bde legs su 'gyur ro/ / bud med la spyad drags pa la sogs pa'i nang ni shing a lam bu sil rtsa ba'i 'o ma dang lhan cig
192a1(rgyud 'bum): btags nas/ sman ni la ka'i rtsa ba dang ldan pa la brgya rtsa brgyad bsngags te 'o ma dang bsres la btung bar bya'o// de bzhin du rims nyin gcig pa dang
192a2(rgyud 'bum): nyin gnyis pa dang / nyin gsum pa dang / nyin bzhi pa dang / ther zug pa'i rims dang / rtag pa'i rims dang / rims mi bzang ba la sogs pa la 'o thug mar dang ldan
192a3(rgyud 'bum): pa la brgya rtsa brgyad mngon par bsngags te blud pa byas na bde bar gnas par 'gyur ro/ / de bzhin du mkha' 'gro ma'i gdon gyis zin pa dag la ni bdag nyid kyi gdong la lan brgya rtsa brgyad
192a4(rgyud 'bum): mngon par bsngags te nad pa la bltas na bde bar gnas par 'gyur ro/ / de bzhin du ma mo dang / byis pa dang / lus srul po dang / ro langs dang / gzhon nu'i gdon la
192a5(rgyud 'bum): sogs pa mi ma yin pa'i mi bzad pa'i gdon thams cad kyis zin pa la ni bdag nyid kyi lag pa la lan brgya rtsa brgyad mngon par bsngags pa byas nas/ gdon gyis zin pa'i mgo la reg
192a6(rgyud 'bum): par byas na bde bar gnas par 'gyur ro/ / lan cig bzlas pas bdag nyid srung bar 'gyur ro// lan gnyis bzlas pas grogs po srung bar 'gyur ro// lan gsum bzlas
192a7(rgyud 'bum): pas ni khyim srung bar 'gyur ro/ / lan bzhi bzlas pas ni grong srung bar 'gyur ro// lan lnga bzlas pas ni grong gi spyod yul gyi 'gro ba srung bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin du lan stong gi bar du bzlas
192b1(rgyud 'bum): na dmag gi tshogs bsrung ba byas par yang 'gyur ro/ / de dag dang gzhan yang ma bsgrubs par las thams cad byed par 'gyur ro// ci ste sgrub par 'dod na ni las phran tshegs rnams bya ba ma yin te/
192b2(rgyud 'bum): gcig pu dben pa'i gnas su song nas rgya mtshor 'bab pa'i chu bo 'byung ba'i gnas dang / rgya mtsho'i ngogs dang / chu bo gang+gA'i ngogs dang / gzhan gang yang rung ba'i chu bo chen po'i ngogs
192b3(rgyud 'bum): la brten mas gtsang ma'i gnas su lo ma'i spyil po byas te/ khrus lan gsum bya zhing gos lan gsum brjes la thub par gnas shing / slong mo'i kha zas bza' ba 'am/ tshong rngad
192b4(rgyud 'bum): dam khyor gang tsam mam 'o ma'am 'bras bu za zhing bzlas pa sum 'bum byas te/ grub pa'i mtshan ma mthong na de nas sgrub pa brtsam par bya'o// phyogs de nyid du ras
192b5(rgyud 'bum): ris chen po bzhag la/ ras ris la mchod pa chen po byas te/ mar me'i snod gser ram/ dngul lam/ zangs sam/ so'i rang bzhin la shing du ru ka'i 'bru mar gyis
192b6(rgyud 'bum): bkang ba 'am/ dri zhim po'i 'bru mar gyis bkang ba 'am/ ba'i mar gyis yongs su gang ba'i mar me ras kyi dum bu gsar pa'i snying po byas te/ ras ris kyi mdun du 'bum phrag
192b7(rgyud 'bum): gcig gi mar me dbul bar bya'o/ / kho ra khor yug tu mar me'i 'phreng ba phul ma thag tu ra sa ri sa las 'od 'byung ste/ 'od byung ma thag tu ra sa ris kyi khor yug tu 'od 'bar ba'i
193a1(rgyud 'bum): 'phreng bas kun nas khyab par 'gyur ro/ / steng gi nam mkha' bar snang las rnga tho che'i sgra sgrog cing / legs so zhes bya ba'i sgra'ang thos te/ de nas rig pa 'dzin
193a2(rgyud 'bum): pas rings pa'i tshul gyis sgrub pa po ras ris kyi mtha' la sngar bris pa'i ras ris kyi mtha' nas mchod yon gsol/ lan gsum bskor ba byas te/ sangs rgyas thams cad la phyag
193a3(rgyud 'bum): 'tshal nas gzung bar bya'o/ / de na'ide bzung ba tsam gyis mar me thams cad 'dzin pa'i sems can rnams gcig gis lhag pa'i gzhal med khang 'bum dang lhan cig 'phur bar 'gyur ro//
193a4(rgyud 'bum): lha'i sil snyan dang yang dag par ldan pa dang / glu snyan pa'i sgra la sogs pa dang ldan pa dang / gar dang ldan pas rig pa 'dzin mkhor yug tu khyab pa dag gi sa mar me thogs pa dang ldan
193a5(rgyud 'bum): cig sgrub pa po rig pa 'dzin pa'i 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por dbang bskur bar byed do/ / rga ba dang 'chi ba med pas rol par 'gyur zhing bskal pa chen por gnas shing nyi ma dang 'dra ba dang /
193a6(rgyud 'bum): lha'i yan lag lta bur mdzes pa dang / gos rnam pa sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa dang / 'khor de dag dang yang 'di lhan cig tu spyod par 'gyur ro// rig pa 'dzin pa thams cad kyang 'di'i bran
193a7(rgyud 'bum): bzhin du nye bar gnas par 'gyur te/ rig pa 'dzin pa'i 'khor los sgyur bar 'gyur ro// ring du 'tsho ba dang grub pa thams cad kyis mi tshugs par 'gyur ro// rig pa 'dzin pa rnams
193b1(rgyud 'bum): kyi bu mo rnams la mchog tu yid du 'ong bar 'gyur ro/ / rdzas thams cad la dbang du 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo la bzhugs par 'gyur
193b2(rgyud 'bum): ro/ / skad cig gis tshangs pa'i 'jig rten du 'gro zhing brgya byin la'ang bgrang ba med na/ rig pa 'dzin pa gzhan lta ci smos/ 'di ni mthar yang sangs rgyas nyid du 'gyur zhing / 'phags pa 'jam
193b3(rgyud 'bum): dpal yang 'di'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen du 'gyur ro/ / gzhan yang las kyi sgrub pa po yod de/ de nas shin tu brtson pas gcig pu dben pa skye bo med la 'dres pa med cing 'dres pa dang bral bas dgon
193b4(rgyud 'bum): pa chen por zhugs te/ gnas gang du pad+ma chen po yod pa'i mtsho dang ldan pa'i ri'i rtse mo gcig tu brten nas/ ri'i rtse mo 'di'i steng du 'dzegs te/ rig pa'i rgyal po yi ge gcig pa 'jam dpal
193b5(rgyud 'bum): gyi cho ga las bshad pa'am/ de bzhin gshegs pa'am/ gzhan byang chub sems dpas bshad pa 'am/ gang yang rung ba'i sngags gang 'dod pa de dag bzung ste/ pad+ma'i rtsa ba'am 'o ma'i kha
193b6(rgyud 'bum): zas kyis 'tsho zhing rig pa 'bum phrag sum cu rtsa drug bzla sa la/ bzlas pa'i mthar cho ga de nyid kyis sngar bstan pa'i ras ris kyi ri mo chen po rab tu bzhag ste/ me tog pad+ma la tsan dan dkar
193b7(rgyud 'bum): po dang gur kum gyis brtags la seng ldeng gi shing gi me 'bar te/ sngar yongs su btags pa'i me tog gis stong phrag drug cu rtsa drug gi sbyin sreg bya'o// de nas sbyin sreg gi mthar
194a1(rgyud 'bum): @bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i ras ris las 'od zer 'byung ngo / / de nas sgrub pa po snang bar byas te spyi bor zhugs par 'gyur la/ des reg ma thag tu sgrub pa pos
194a2(rgyud 'bum): mngon par shes pa lnga thob par 'gyur ro/ / byang chub sems dpa'i sa thob par 'gyur/ lha'i lus kyis ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du 'gro bar 'gyur/ bskal pa sum cu rtsa drug
194a3(rgyud 'bum): gi bar du 'tshe bar 'gyur/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing sum cu rtsa drug gnon par 'gyur/ de dag gi mthu yang dag par rjes su mthong bar 'gyur/ sangs rgyas sum cu rtsa drug gi gsung
194a4(rgyud 'bum): rab 'dzin par 'gyur/ de la mchod cing bsnyen bkur ba la mngon par dga' bar 'gyur/ mthar yang byang chub la gzhol bar 'gyur/ 'phagapa 'jam dpal gyis byang chub kyi mthar
194a5(rgyud 'bum): thug pa mya ngan las 'das kyi bar du dge ba'i bshes gnyen du yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur ro/ / byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod phal po che theg pa chen po shin tu rgyas pa'i mdo sde las
194a6(rgyud 'bum): 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi rtsa ba'i cho ga dgu pa'i le'u rab 'byams las gnyis pa sgrub pa'i thabs dam pa'i las kyi le'u rab 'byams rdzogs so/ / / de nas bcom
194a7(rgyud 'bum): ldan 'das shAkya thub pas sgrub pa'i las dam pa gzhan yang gsungs te/ cho ga'i rgyal po 'di las gang yang rung ba'i sngags bzung nas gang+gA'i klung chen por zhugs te/ dkyil du gru'i bzhon pa la 'dug
194b1(rgyud 'bum): ste/ 'o ma dang sbyar ba'i 'bras chan pa ning ji ltar 'dod pa'i nyi ma la bzla chu 'bum bya'o// de nas bzlas pa'i tha ma la klu thams cad mthong ste/ de nas sgrub pa brtsam par bya'o// grur
194b2(rgyud 'bum): stang de nyid kyi nang du me thab pad+ma'i rnam pa 'dra ba byas nas/ me tog nA ga ge sar dag gis ras ris la mchod pa chen po byas te/ ras ris chen po nub tu bstan pas bzhag la/ bdag nyid
194b3(rgyud 'bum): shar du bltas nas ku sha'i khres la 'dug ste/ me tog nA ga ge sar re re la'ang lan bdun bdun bsngags pa byas nas shing seng ldeng gi me spar ba la sbyin sreg bya ste/ tsan dan dkar po dang
194b4(rgyud 'bum): gur kum dang bsres pa'i me tog nA ga gi sar gyis lan stong phrag sum cu rtsa drug gi bar du bya ste/ gzhan gyis ni ma yin no// klu rnams mthong ba'ang don yod pa yin te/ grub pa'i rdzas
194b5(rgyud 'bum): rnams la rab tu chags pas blang bar mi bya ste/ grub pa'i rdzas rnams chags pas len par mi byed na/ des na sbyin sreg rdzogs pa dang gru'i bzhon pa dang bcas pa phur bar 'gyur te/
194b6(rgyud 'bum): rig pa 'dzin pa'i 'khor los sgyur bar 'gyur la/ klu'i rgyal po'i dbang po thams cad kyang rjes su 'brang zhing bran bzhin du gnas par 'gyur ro// bar gyi bskal pa sum cur 'tshe bar 'gyur
194b7(rgyud 'bum): ro/ / 'di rang dbang du'ang spyod par 'gyur ro// 'gro ba la thogs pa med par 'gyur ro// 'phags pa 'jam dpal mngon sum du mthong bar 'gyur ro// spyi bo la phyag gis reg
195a1(rgyud 'bum): par mdzad de/ reg pa tsam gyis mngon par shes pa lnga thob par 'gyur ro// nges par sangs rgyas nyid kyang thob par 'gyur ro// las kyi mchog gzhan yang
195a2(rgyud 'bum): bstan pa ni bal ba'i shing gcig gi rang bzhin las gru'i bzhon pa shin tu brtan pa dang legs par byas te/ de la zhon nas gang+gA'i klung chen por zhugs te/ bil ba'i shing las rlung g.yor byas
195a3(rgyud 'bum): te/ de nyid kyis gru de rlung g.yor 'dzin pa mkhas pa gsal ba des phyag par bya'o// gang+gA'i klung chen po mi dor bar yongs su thad ka 'am chur phyag par bya'o// de nas gzhan gang yang rung
195a4(rgyud 'bum): ba'i sngags rtsa ba'i sngags sam/ 'bru drug pa 'am/ 'bru gsum pa 'am/ 'bru brgyad pa'am/ 'bru gcig pa 'am/ khro bo 'am/ pho nya 'am/ 'khor gyi sngags bzung nas/
195a5(rgyud 'bum): dang po ra sa ris chen po de nyid nub tu bltas pas bzhag la/ sgrub pa po shar du blta bar bya'o// de nas ji ltar 'dod pa'i 'o ma dang nas chan khyor gang ngam/ 'bras bu'i kha zas sam/ chu dang
195a6(rgyud 'bum): rtsa ba dang / 'bras bu'i kha zas kyis 'tsho la/ mi smra ba'i dka' thub dang / dus gsum du khrus bya zhing gos lan gsum brjes nas dge ba'i las bzang po yang dag par spyod pa dang
195a7(rgyud 'bum): blo dge ba bzang po dang ldan pa'o/ / dang por re zhig ras ris kyi mdun du sngar ji ltar bstan pa'i sngar bshad pa'i cho gas rig pa 'bum phrag drug cu bzla'o// bzlas pa zin pa na gru de rgya mtsho
195b1(rgyud 'bum): chen por 'gro bar 'gyur ro/ / sgrub pa'i yo byad yang dag par blangs te/ star gyi gnas su gzhag par bya'o// de nas gru'i bzhon pa rgya mtsho chen por 'gro ba na 'jigs par mi bya ste/ bzlog
195b2(rgyud 'bum): par yang mi bya'o/ / sgrub pa po ma gtogs pas bzlog par nus pa'ang ma yin no// de nas dpag tshad stong du gnas pa'i rgya mtsho chen por yang yud tsam gyis 'jug par 'gyur na/ lam thung ngu la
195b3(rgyud 'bum): smos kyang ci dgos/ rgya mtsho chen po der phyin pa na sgrub pa pos las brtsam par bya'o// de nas seng ldeng gi shing gis me spar la/ sngar byas pa'i me thab bam/ rdza mkhan gyis byas pa'i
195b4(rgyud 'bum): sa'i snod la me tog nag ge sar tsan dan dkar po dang / ga bur gyis bsres pa'i sreg zugs kyis shin tu nyung ba 'am/ rab tu mang ba'ang rlung / 'bum phrag drug cu sbyin sreg bya'o// sbyin
195b5(rgyud 'bum): sreg byed pa na'ang lang ka'i grong khyer na gnas pa'i srin po'i gzugs dang cha byad mang po 'dzin pa ha ha zhes bya ba'i sgra sgrogs pa dang / klu'i grong khyer gded ka dang ldan pa ni gnas pa'i rgyal po
195b6(rgyud 'bum): rnams langs par gyur te/ cha byad rnam pa sna tshogs 'dzin pa/ rab tu drag pa dang / rab tu zhi ba'i klu de rnams dang / srin po de rnams 'di skad du khyed bzhengs shig bzhengs shig/ bdag
195b7(rgyud 'bum): cag gi bdag po mdzad du gsol zhes brjod do/ / de bzhin du lha ma yin dang / gnod sbyin dang / lha dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / grub pa dang / mi ma yin pa thams cad kyang rab tu
196a1(rgyud 'bum): chags par byed na ldang bar mi bya/ de nas rig pa 'dzin pas sngags zlo zhing lag pa g.yon pa'i mdzub mos sdigs mdzub byas na de nas phan tshun du 'gro ba dang
196a2(rgyud 'bum): 'byer ba dang / 'bros par byed do// de nas sbyin sreg zin pa na gru de sgrub pa po des blangs na/ skad cig gis 'og min du 'gro bar 'gyur ro// 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan du'ang 'gro ba dang
196a3(rgyud 'bum): 'ong bar 'gyur ro/ / byang chub sems dpa'i sems dang mthu mnyam par 'gyur/ mngon par shes pa lnga dang / rdzu 'phrul chen po dang / mthu chen po dang ldan par 'gyur ro// 'dis

196b1(rgyud 'bum): der gru'i bzhon pa'i gnas byas la/ der yang gru'i bzhon pa la zhon pa'i skyes bu brgya nyi shu rnamasar me lag mthogs pa/ gos dkar po bgos pa/ bsrung ba byas pa/ cho ga snga mas yang
196b2(rgyud 'bum): dag par bzhag pa'i ras ris mdun du gzhag par byan/ / de ma ras ris la mchod pa chen po byas nas nA ga ge sar gyi phye ma tsan dan dkar po dang / gur kum dang / ga pur gyis bsres pa'i
196b3(rgyud 'bum): sreg blugs kyis seng ldeng gi me la stong phrag sum cu rtsa drug sbyin sreg bya'o/ / de nas sbyin sreg zin pa na skad cig gis tshangs pa'i 'jig rten du 'gro ba dang 'ong bar 'gyur ro// ji ltar 'dod pa
196b4(rgyud 'bum): bzhin rnam par rgyu bar byed do/ / 'phags pa 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa mngon sum du mthong bar 'gyur te/ mthong ba tsam gyis sa thob par yang 'gyur ro// mngon par shes pa lnga thob

197a1(rgyud 'bum): khab can/ / ri yi rgyal po 'bigs byed la// las kyi mchog ni bsgrub par bya// ma la ya ris ha dang // spros kyi ngang ldang ar bu dang // ri yi rgyal ba
197a2(rgyud 'bum): sum brtsegs la/ / las kyi mchog ni bsgrub par bya// de bzhin rgya mtsho chen po dang // ri ni shing ldan me tog yod// 'di dag gi ni phyogs dag tu// sngags grub par ni rgyal bas

197a6(rgyud 'bum): dang ni/ / de bzhin legs mdze sa ya mu na// sin du na ra ma da nang dang // zla ba'i cha ni gtsang ngogs dang // de bzhin ka ba'i sar spang // chu bo chen po si ta rnams// 'di dag
197a7(rgyud 'bum): grub pa'i zhing du ni/ / stobs bcu ldan sras rnams kyis bshad// stobs bcu ldan pas bshad pa'i zhing // byang phyogs yod pa'i ri dag dang // kha che dang ni rgya yul dang // bal po
197b1(rgyud 'bum): bzhin mang yul dang / / rgya yul che dang li yul dag/ de dag ma lus grub pa'i zhing // byang phyogs la ni gnas dang // nus dang grol spyod pa dang // ri dang chu bo dag la yang /
197b2(rgyud 'bum): bsod nams yul du bstan pa yin// sems can snying rje ldan gang gnas// de dag la ni dngos 'grub 'gyur// dpal gyi ri bo'i ri chen ni// lho phyogs na ni yang dag gnas// dpal
197b3(rgyud 'bum): ldan 'bras phung mchod rten ni/ / rgyal ba'i ring bsrel gnas pa'i sa// thams cad don gyi gnas dag la// der ni sngags rnams myur du 'grub// mchod rten chen po rdo rje'i gdan//

198a1(rgyud 'bum): pa bya/ de dang gzhan yang yul dag dang // grong dang ljongs dang ri bor dang // gnas dang grong mchog gtso bo ni// bsod nams gnas la rab brten nas// der ni srong
198a2(rgyud 'bum): mos rjes 'tsho zhing / / bzlas dang sbyin sreg dga' ba dang // gnas khang bla gab med pa dang // rtag tu khyim ni stong pa la// sngags rnams las ni thams cad la// thog ma nyid du bya

198b1(rgyud 'bum): ni bstan pa yis/ / cung zad dus ni bsten pa'o// dam tshig tshogs pa'i rgyud ldan na// de las gzhan du'ang 'gro bya ste// der ni dam tshig thob 'asnyen pa/ cung zad du sa de bzhin du ma

198b7(rgyud 'bum): mchog gi las kyi thabs sgrub pa lag nas 'di dag ma rnyed na gang yang rung ba'i gnas de dag tu gtsang sbra byas te/ sngon du bsnyen pa byas la dad cing mos pas sgrub pa'i thabs kyi lam ngam pa brtsam par bya

199a2(rgyud 'bum): rtswa u shir dang / tsan ngan dkar po dang / gur kum dang / ga pur la sogs pa bsreb bya ste/ rma bya'i gzugs byas la ras ris de'i mdun du gzhag go// ku sha'i rtse mo ma nyams pas
199a3(rgyud 'bum): phyogs gtsang mar skyes pa 'khor lo'i gzugs su bya ste/ ras ris kyi mdun du lag pa g.yas pas bzung zhing lag pa g.yon pas rma bya gzung la yar ngo'i zla ba nya ba'i mtshan mo ras ris
199a4(rgyud 'bum): la mchod pa chen po byas te/ ga pur dang tsan dan gyi dung pa bsregs la nam langs kyi bar du bzlas pa byas na/ de nas nyi ma shar ba'i dus su lha'i rang bzhin gyi rma bya ni rma bya chen po'i rgyal mor 'gyur

199b1(rgyud 'bum): bar gyi bskal pa drug cur 'tsho bar 'gyur ro// ji ltar 'dod par 'gro zhing spyod par 'gyur ro// 'gro ba la thogs pa med pa dang / lha'i phun sum tshogs pa dang ldan par 'gyur ro//

199b4(rgyud 'bum): pa sna tshogs kyi khyad par sa'i rang bzhin nam/ rkang gnyis dang / rkang bzhi dang / bya dang / bzhon pa'i bye brag seng ge dang / stag dang / dom la sogs pa 'am/ grog mkhar gyi
