199b6(rgyud 'bum): brag thams cad dang / rab tu byung ba'i yo byad kyi bye brag 'phreng ba dang / lham dang / shing lham dang / lhung bzed dang / chos gos dang / 'khar gsil dang / khab dang / gri la sogs
199b7(rgyud 'bum): ba lcags khyad par can gyi rang bzhin nam/ gzhan yang gang cung zad sems can gyi yo byad snod la sogs pa lpags bzang po'i rang bzhin nam/ grog mkhar gyi sa 'am/ chu bo'i ngogs
200a1(rgyud 'bum): kyis las byas pa de dag thams cad ba'i rnam lngas bkrus pa 'am/ chus gtor ba tsam byas la/ snga ma bzhin du yongs su dag par byed pa'i sngags sam/ yi ge gcig
200a2(rgyud 'bum): pa'i sngags sam/ gzhan gang yang rung ba'i sngags cho ga'i rgyal po sgrub pa'i thabs kyi sngags ma gtogs pas lan brgya rtsa brgyad mngon par bsngags pa byas te/ ji ltar 'dod par bdag
200a3(rgyud 'bum): nyid bsrung ba byas pa dang / grogs po'ang yongs su bskyab pa byas pa dang / shin tu gsang ba'i sngags dang rgyud shes pa/ sngar bstan pa'i gnas dag tu ra sa ris nub tu bltas pas
200a4(rgyud 'bum): bzhag la bdag nyid snga ma bzhin du byas te/ ras ris la mchod pa chen po byas nas/ ras ris chen po la ga pur gyis bdugs te/ sngar bstan pa'i mtshon dang / yo byad dang
200a5(rgyud 'bum): sems can gyi khyad par sngar bstan pa'i bcos mar byas pa la/ yar ngo'i zla ba nya ba'i mtshan mo gong ma'i rdzas gang yang rung ba de dag blangs te/ mtshan mo nyi ma shar ba'i dus kyi bar du bzla
200a6(rgyud 'bum): bar bya'o/ / bar 'dir 'ong chen po'i 'phreng ba ras ris la yang dag par mthong la/ gal te bzhon pa'i khyad par sgrub pa pos gzung bar 'gyur na ni/ de la zhon nas ji ltar 'dod par 'gro
200a7(rgyud 'bum): ngar 'gyur ro/ / gal te rgyan gyi khyad par ram/ mtshon gyi khyad par de blangs pas de bcangs na/ rig pa 'dzin pa'i 'khor lo 'dzin par 'gyur te/ ji ltar 'dod par 'gro
200b1(rgyud 'bum): zhing lha'i gzugs dang ldan pa dang / nyi ma shar ba dang 'dra bar 'gyur ba dang / 'od kyi phreng ba chen po dang ldan pa dang / lus shin tu gsal bar 'gyur ba dang / rig pa 'dzin pa thams
200b2(rgyud 'bum): cad kyi mnga' bdag tu 'gyur ro/ / ring du 'tsho zhing bskal pa chen por gnas pa dang / rig pa 'dzin pa bye ba khri phrag brgya stong gi 'khor du ma dang ldan pa dang / lha'i nor bu rin po che'i gzhal
200b3(rgyud 'bum): med khang la spyod pa dang / bzhon pa gang sngar yongs su brtags pa sa'i rang bzhin grub na de nyid 'dir mthu chen po dang ldan par 'gyur te/ bzhin pa de nyid 'di'i grogs por 'gyur ba dang /
200b4(rgyud 'bum): gzhan gyi sngags 'gugs par byed pa/ grub pa rnams kyi ston pa'i gnas su gyur pa/ bdag gi sngags kyi grub pa la yang dag par sbyor bar byed pa/ byams pa'i bdag nyid dang
200b5(rgyud 'bum): phan par 'dod pas rab tu 'brel ba gang 'di nyid kyi mtshon dang / rgyan dang / rin po che'i khyad par dang / stan dang / gnas mal dang / sems can la sogs pa nyid 'di
200b6(rgyud 'bum): la srung ba chen po nyid dang / sba ba dang / sbed pa la rtag tu 'brang bar 'gyur ro// mthu chen po dang / brtson 'grus chen po dang / lus chen po dang ldan par 'gyur ro//
200b7(rgyud 'bum): 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa mngon sum du mthong bar 'gyur zhing / legs so zhes bya ba'ang sbyin par mdzad la/ spyi bo la reg par mdzad cing / byang chub kyi snying po ma thob kyi bar du
201a1(rgyud 'bum): dge ba'i bshes gnyen sgrub par mdzad do/ / stobs bcu nyid kyang nges par thob par mdzad cing / sems can thams cad zil gyis gnon cing mchod par yang 'gyur
201a2(rgyud 'bum): ro/ / 'byung po thams cad kyis mi tshugs par 'gyur ro// yang dag pa'i rgyud kyi mtha' gcod pa med par 'gyur ba dang / sa thob par 'gyur ba dang / stobs bcu dang byang chub
201a3(rgyud 'bum): sems dpa'i sa nges par thob par 'gyur te/ mdor na las dam pa thams cad gnas dam pa dag tu gnas nas ras ris dam pa dag gi mdun du mchod pa dam pa la mngon par dga' bas las
201a4(rgyud 'bum): dam pa gzhan dag kho na bya'o/ / rig pa 'dzin pa nyid du nam mkha' la 'gro ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i rjes su zhugs pa dang / mngon par shes pa lnga nyid dang / sa dang /
201a5(rgyud 'bum): sngags thob pa nyid dang / lus 'di nyid kyis 'jig rten gyi khams dag tu 'gro ba nyid dang / stobs bcu'i rgyud yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir dang / 'phags pa 'jam
201a6(rgyud 'bum): dpal mngon sum du mthong ba nyid kyi phyir dang / 'bras bu yod par mthong ba'i chos ston pa mnyan pa'i phyir dang / sangs rgyas kyi gdung rgyun mi gcad pa'i phyir dang / thams cad
201a7(rgyud 'bum): mkhyen pa'i ye shes mthar gyis rjes su thob pa nyid kyi phyir dang / chos kyi sprin las byung ba'i sngags bzang po la 'jug pa nyid kyi phyir dang / nyon mongs pa bskam pa dang / bdud rtsi'i char
201b1(rgyud 'bum): gyis nyon mongs pa zhi bar bya ba'i phyir dang / 'jig rten rjes su gzung ba la rab tu 'jug par rjes su sgrub pa nyid kyi phyir dang / de bzhin du chos kyi tshul gzung ba'i phyir dang / de bzhin gshegs
201b2(rgyud 'bum): pa'i gsung don yod par bya ba'i phyir dang / sngags kyi thabs kyi sgrub pa'i cho ga rab tu gsang ba nyid kyi phyir dang / sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang / rang
201b3(rgyud 'bum): sangs rgyas dang / 'phags pa nyan thos kyi bdag nyid chen po 'byung ba'i phyir dang / cho ga'i rgyal po rab 'byams sngags kyi mthu dang rab tu rnam par ldan pa 'di ras ris chen po'i mdun du
201b4(rgyud 'bum): nye bar gnas la bsgrub par bya ste/ 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i sngags kyi cho ga dang / sngags rgyud thams cad kyi cho ga'i lam gyi ste/ mdor na 'dir cho ga gzhan
201b5(rgyud 'bum): gsungs pa'i las kyis kyang cho ga'i rgyal po 'di bsgrub par bya ste/ myur du de dag gi sngags rnams 'grub par 'gyur te/ gang ngas bstan pa de dag nges par 'grub par 'gyur ro//
201b6(rgyud 'bum): byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod phal po che theg pa chen po shin tu rgyas pa'i mdo las/ 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi rtsa ba'i cho ga bcu pa ras ris chen po'i cho ga'i le'u rab 'byams rdzogs
201b7(rgyud 'bum): / de nas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas yang gnas gtsang ma'i gzhal med khang la gzigs nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la bka' stsal pa
202a1(rgyud 'bum): 'jam dpal khyod kyi ras ris bar ma'i cho ga gzhan sgrub pa'i thabs kyi cho ga yod de/ mdor bsdus nas bshad kyis de legs par rab tu nyon la yid la
202a2(rgyud 'bum): zung zhig dang ngas bshad do/ / de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten la thugs brtse ba dang /
202a3(rgyud 'bum): ston pa sems can thams cad la phan par dgyes pa dang / bdag cag la thugs partse ba'i phyir dang / ma 'ongs pa'i skye bo rnams la gzigs nas de'i dus la bab pa mkhyen na
202a4(rgyud 'bum): bshad du gsol/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// 'jam dpal nyon cig/ dang por re zhig tshul
202a5(rgyud 'bum): khrims dang / brtul zhugs dang / gtsang sbra'i spyod pa dang / nges par sdom pa dang / bzlas pa dang / sbyin sreg dang / bsam gtan dang / cho ga gang du legs
202a6(rgyud 'bum): par rab tu gnas pa la sngags thams cad kyi spyod pa sgrub pa'i las 'bras bu dang bcas shing don yod par 'gyur te/ sngags thams cad kyi sbyor ba 'grub par 'gyur ro// ngas
202a7(rgyud 'bum): bshad pa de gang zhe na/ gzhon nu nyon cig/ dang por re zhig rig pa dang / brtul zhugs dang / tshul khrims kyi yi ma dang po nyid du blang bar byas la/ dang por
202b1(rgyud 'bum): zhig dkyil 'khor gyi slob dpon gyis bstan pa'i dam tshig khyod kyi cho ga'i rgyal por bstan cing sngar bshad pa la rjes su 'jug par bya'o/ / blo gsal ba/ yid gsungs pa dang ldan pa slob
202b2(rgyud 'bum): dpon du dbang bskur ba/ khyod kyis bstan pa'i cho ga shes pa/ dge ba/ gsal ba'i chos dang ldan pa/ bden par smra ba/ spro ba chen po dang ldan pa/ byas pa gzo ba
202b3(rgyud 'bum): yid gzhungs pa dang ldan pa/ 'dris brtan pa/ ha cang mi rgan/ ha cang mi gzhon pa/ rnyed pa dang bkur stil chags pa med pa/ tshangs par spyod pa/ snying rje dang ldan
202b4(rgyud 'bum): rnyed pa tsam mam/ longs spyod kyi rgyu tsam mam/ rjes su chags pa'i rgyur yang brdzun mi smran/ cung zad tsam mam/ chags pa 'am/ rmongs pa tsam gyi rnam pa la smos
202b5(rgyud 'bum): kyang ci dgos/ dam bcas pa brtan pa dang / sems can thams cad la sems mnyam pa dang / snying rje dang ldan pa dang / tshul khrims dang ldan pa dang / sngon du spyad pa byas
202b6(rgyud 'bum): pa dang / khyod kyi gsang ba'i sngags rjes su zlos pa dang // snga ma nyid du rig pa goms par byas pa dang / khyod kyi dkyil 'khor la mthar gyis yang dag par zhugs pa dang / 'jig rten
202b7(rgyud 'bum): shes pa dang / chog shes pa dang / yang dag par rjes su 'dzin par byed pa dang / 'bras bu dang ldan zhing mkhas pa dang / legs pa la rab tu zhugs pa dang / gzugs mdzes
203a1(rgyud 'bum): pa dang / 'dod pa med pa dang / chags pa med pa dang / dpa' ba dang / brtson 'grus brtan pa dang / nad med pa ste/ nang gang gis las mi nus pa'i ngang
203a2(rgyud 'bum): tshul can gyi nang med pa dang / rigs mthon por skye ba'o// yon tan de dag dang ldan na ni dkyil 'khor gyi slob dpon du 'gyur la sgrub pa po'ang de dang mnyam pa ste/ yan lag lhag pa 'am
203a3(rgyud 'bum): ma tshang ba cung zad kyang med pa'o/ / de lta bu'i dkyil 'khor gyi slob dpon la mchod pa byas shing don du gnyer bar byas te/ slob dpon dang lhan cig byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
203a4(rgyud 'bum): po 'phags pa 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i dam tshig la rjes su 'jug par 'tshal na/ slob dpon gyis bdag la thugs brtse ba'i slad du phan pa'i thugs dang / brtse ba'i thugs kyis
203a5(rgyud 'bum): de bshad du gsol/ de nas dkyil 'khor gyi slob dpon des sngar bstan pa'i cho gas slob ma la snga ma ji lta ba bzhin du brtags nas rab tu gzhug par bya ste/ sngar ji ltar dbang bskur ba
203a6(rgyud 'bum): bzhin du phyis kyang sbyin par bya'o/ / go rims ji lta ba bzhin du dam tshig bstan te/ gsang ba'i phyag rgya dang / rgyud dang / sngags dang / las kyang dus ring po nyid nas nges par
203a7(rgyud 'bum): brtags te/ bsam pa shes nas bstan par bya ste/ sngags la sogs pa'i las sa kyang thams cad du gzhan du ma yin no zhes cho ga 'di ltar bstan pa yin no// de nas slob ma sa
203b1(rgyud 'bum): dkyil 'khor gyi slob dpon la ci nus pas gang gis slob dpon dgyes pa bdag dang longs spyod rab tu dbul bar bya'o/ / de nas dkyil 'khor gyi slob dpon des bu'i 'du shes nye bar gzhag par
203b2(rgyud 'bum): bya ste/ bu bzhin du bsgrub par bya zhing / ma bzhin du'ang longs spyod kyis nye bar bsdu bar bya'o// de nas sgrub pa po des sngags gang yang rung ba bzung ste/ gcig pu dben par song
203b3(rgyud 'bum): nas sngar bstan pa gong ma bzhin du rgya cher sbyar te/ de dag nyid kyis sngags dag gis ni spyan drang ba dang / gshegs su gsol ba dang / mar me dang / dri dang / bdug pa dang /
203b4(rgyud 'bum): gtor ma dang / lha bshos dkyil 'khor la gsungs pa nyid kyi cho gas rgya cher byas te/ spyan drangs nas gdan dang mchod yon phul la/ dus 'tshams gsum du khrus lan gsum bya zhing
203b5(rgyud 'bum): gos gsum brje zhing nyin re bzhin du bzlas pa bya'o/ / de la dus gsum du zhes bya ba ni mtshan mo'i mtha' nas brtsams pa yin te/ zung tsam nas nyi ma 'char ba'i bar 'dir dang po'i dus su
203b6(rgyud 'bum): brjod do/ / nyi ma'i gung ni nyi ma gnyis ka'i gung tsam gyi tshad du nam mkha' la gnas pa'i nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la ni nyi mgung gi dus zhes brjod do// nyi ma nub pa'i dus su lhag mazung tsam
203b7(rgyud 'bum): lus pa'i dus gsum pa zhes brjod do/ / tshul khrims brtul zhugs yang dag ldan// slob dpon mkhas pa chen po dang // mthon po'i rigs su skyes pa dang // rnam pa kun tu brtson
204a1(rgyud 'bum): 'grus brtan/ / sngags rgyud dag la mngon brtson dang // bya ba kun la blo gros dge/ zhib cing mkhas la chog shes dang / chos kyi dbyings ni rtag tu 'dzin// smra
204a2(rgyud 'bum): bache zhing gzi brjid che/ / 'jig rten chos la ltos pa med// thub mchog chos la dad pa dang // 'jig rten na ni yongs su bsngags// dben pa shes shing bzlas pa byed// sngon du
204a3(rgyud 'bum): bsnyen pas rjes bsnyen byed/ / 'jam pa'i dbyangs kyi sngags shes shing // mthong bas nges 'dzin de mchog byed// sangs rgyas gsungs pa'i sngags rnams la// 'jig rten
204a4(rgyud 'bum): pa yi sbyor ba shes/ / srung byed mthu ni brtan pa dang // rtag tu gtsang sbra'i spyod la dga'// sangs rgyas bstan pa'i lam la ni// thams cad du ni 'jug par byed// rab bsngags
204a5(rgyud 'bum): rgyal bas bstod pa yi/ / sngags zlos pa la brtson par byed// las 'bras dag la rtag yid ches// 'jig rten pha rol de bzhin no// sdig pa kun la 'jigs byed pa// shin tu
204a6(rgyud 'bum): phra ba'ang de bzhin no/ / gtsang zhing grims dang le lo med// yid gzhungs blta na sdug pa dang // stobs bcu ldan pas sngags bshad dang // de bzhin rgyal ba'i sras dang ni//
204a7(rgyud 'bum): gang dag 'jig rten sngags dag dang // rdo rje pad+ma'i rigs dag gis// de la rtag tu brtson byed dang // gzhung dang bstan bcos don klog pa// nad med pa dang stobs ldan dang // rgas dang
204b1(rgyud 'bum): gzhon pa rnam par spangs/ / sngags grub de bzhin shes nyen can// kun nas myur du byed pa dang // las mtha' mi ring nga rgyal chung // zur tsam gyis go khyad par can// tshangs
204b2(rgyud 'bum): par spyod cing shes rab che/ / gcig pu 'dre bar mi byed dang // 'jam dpal gyis gsungs rgyud dag la// dbang bskur thob cing dpa' ba dang // bzlas pa'i mthar byas ldan pa dang //
204b3(rgyud 'bum): de bzhin rig pa goms byas dang // sems dpa' che zhing 'jig rten shes// 'gro ba'i de nyid rjes sems dang // legs pa'i lam nyid rab sbyar byed// sbyin byed 'byung po phan
204b4(rgyud 'bum): la dga'/ / khyad par can de slob dpon la// rtag tu don du gnyer bar bya// dkyil 'khor des ni bris pa la// sngags rnams 'grub pa stor bar 'gyur// de nyid kyi ni dbang
204b5(rgyud 'bum): bskur na/ / 'bras bu chen po ster bar 'gyur// grub pa 'dod pa'i slob mas kyang // thub mchog de ni rtag tu mchod// de yi bka' ni mi bgom par// slob mas 'bad nas bya ba
204b6(rgyud 'bum): yin/ ji ltar 'byor pa yod pa bzhin// longs spyod de la sbyin par bya// nyung ba'ang yang na mang ba'ang rung // gang gis dga' ba thob 'gyur ba// lus dang srog gi don phyir ni// nor
204b7(rgyud 'bum): ni ji ltar sbyin pa bzhin/ / slob ma chos rig de bzhin du// slob dpon phyir ni nor sbyin na// tshe dang nang med de bzhin du// grags pa thob par 'gyur ba yin// slob mas bla ma
205a1(rgyud 'bum): de mchod na/ / dag pa'i 'gro ba thob par 'gyur// lam ni sna tshogs nyer bstan pas// de la sngags ni 'grub par 'gyur// de la bsten dang bsnyen bkur
205a2(rgyud 'bum): byas/ / ri mo byas dang mchod pas ni// sangs rgyas rnams dang de bzhin du// rgyal ba'i sras rnams mnyes par 'gyur// bla ma rtag tu bsnyen bkur ba// lha rnams thams
205a3(rgyud 'bum): cad dga' bar 'gyur/ / bla ma sngags rnams mthong ba yis// de ltar thams cad bstan pa yin// sgrub pa po ni dang por yang // dam tshig la ni 'jug par bya// dma' ba'ang de
205a4(rgyud 'bum): dang mnyam pa'ang rung / / gal te khyad par gyur na yang // rmongs pa'am lhag pa yin yang rung // rtog tu bla ma brnyas mi bya// ji ltar de nyid rjes mthong la// sngags grub
205a5(rgyud 'bum): pa la bya ba yin/ / sngar bstan pa yi slob ma yis// de la phrag dog bya ba min// lus can brtse ba 'phel byed pa'i// mig ni gang la yod gyur pa// de ni spong ma nyid bya ste//
205a6(rgyud 'bum): slob dpon rgyur yang bya ba yin// gang du phan tshun rgyun la ni// brtse ba'i 'phreng ba yod pa dang // brtse ba'i rgyud ni 'dzin pa la// de la sngags ni sbyin par bya// slob dpon la
205a7(rgyud 'bum): ni slob ma'am/ / bla mas slob ma mthong ba'ang rung // rtag tu spro bar 'gyur ba la// gnyis ka la ni grub pa gnas// de dag la ni rtag tu yang // sngags spyod lam ni bstan
205b1(rgyud 'bum): par bya/ / gnyis kas pa dang bur shes la// sngags ni 'bras bcas gnas pa yin// slob ma bla mas rtag tu ni// brtan dang dga' ba de bzhin thob// bu ni chos dang rjes mthun
205b2(rgyud 'bum): la/ / 'bad pas rtag tu bsrung bar bya// de dag la ni sangs rgyas chos// rtag tu rgyun mi 'chang bar 'gyur// gal te de med mgon bral la// sngags rnams ji skad gsungs
205b3(rgyud 'bum): pa sbyin/ / sems can dbul po rnams la ni// khyad par du yang sngags byin no// sems can kun la'ang sbyin pa bas// sngags kyi spyod pa khyad par 'phags// mchog dang
205b4(rgyud 'bum): bar ma tha ma ni/ / dus rnams kun tu bya ba ste// rtag tu sems can kun la ni// rjes su gzung ba'i phyir bya'o// 'gro ba'ang skye gnas rnams brtags nas// 'dod pa dag la
205b5(rgyud 'bum): sbyin par bya/ / de ni ji ltar 'dod pa'i sngags// slob mas de la blang bar bya// de nyid kyis bstan lam yin te// gzhan du de lta ma yin no// 'jig rten pha rol pha la ni// grub pa
205b6(rgyud 'bum): de las bslang bar bya/ / pha bzhin mgo bos phyag byas nas// de nas ji ltar 'dod bzhin 'gro// de nas gcig pu 'gro byas nas// mnyam par bzhag ste bzlas pa bya// slong mo
205b7(rgyud 'bum): spong bas rjes 'tsho zhing / / thub pa dus gsum zlos par byed// sngar ni ji ltar bstan pa bzhin// lam du rab tu 'jug par byed// de la rjes 'jug bsten pa dang // 'dug pa dang
206a1(rgyud 'bum): ni gnas pa'o/ / dben pa chen po ri rtse dang // de bzhin chu bo'i ngogs gtsang dang // ba lang gnas dang mtsho chen dang // dben pa skye bo rnams spangs dang // lha khang
206a2(rgyud 'bum): stong dang shing dang ni/ / mtshan gcig ri ni mthon po dang // rgya mtsho che ngogs dga' ba dang // gling rnams chen po dag dang ni// rnam pa sna tshog sngar bstan pa'i// yul ni yid du 'ong ba dang //
206a3(rgyud 'bum): 'di dag las ni phyogs gzhan du// mnyam bzhag sngags ni bzla bar bya// grogs po mtshan nyid ldan pa ni// sngags don lugs dang tshad mar ldan// zur gyi rnam pa de nyid shes
206a4(rgyud 'bum): bdag dang de yang 'dra ba'o/ / dpa' zhing g.yul las rnam rgyal dang // snying stobs che zhing bzod dang ldan// rgyal bas gsungs pa'i bstan pa dang // sngags kyi spyod pa la dang
206a5(rgyud 'bum): cing / / sngags pa'i mtshan nyid dang ldan la// bzod dang ldan pa'i grogs po la// de la 'bad pa med par ni// sngags kyi las rnams 'grub par 'gyur// tho rangs mal nas
206a6(rgyud 'bum): langs nas ni/ / mtsho chen las byang chu bo las// byung chu srog chags skyon med pa'i// bzang pos khrus ni rab tu bya// sa dang lci ba phye ma yis// sngags shes pas ni lus dril bya//
206a7(rgyud 'bum): sngags kyis de bzhin dag byas pa'i// dri med gtsang sbras byas pa'i chus// sngags ldan bdag nyid khrus bya zhing // ha cang ring bar 'dug mi bya// de rnams langs nas chu ngogs
206b1(rgyud 'bum): 'dug/ sa bdag gis kyang lag gnyis bkru// bdun dang bdun dang yang bdun ni// nyi shu rtsa gcig bar du'o// de bzhin du yang nye reg bya// so shing dag kyang yang dag spyad/
206b2(rgyud 'bum): so shing rnam par bor nas ni// de nas skyob la phyag kyang bya// 'jig rten mgon la phyag 'tshal nas// mchod pa yid du 'ong bar bya// rnam pa sna tshogs mchod pa stong dang // yang
206b3(rgyud 'bum): dag bstod pa yang yang bya/ / dri zhim me tog de bzhin du// ston la zlos pas mchod yon dbul// sangs rgyas rnams dang de slob la// spyi bos rab btung phyag 'tshal lo// 'jig
206b4(rgyud 'bum): rten mgon po de dag gi/ mdun du sdig pa bshags par bya// ras ris bar ma'i mdun du ni// bdag nyid dag kyang dbul bar bya// ku sha'i khres ni byas pa der// legs par
206b5(rgyud 'bum): mnyam bzhag 'dug nas ni/ / des ni 'phreng ba thogs nas su// 'bad pas bzlas pa bya ba yin// ji ltar rnyed pa'i sngags kyis bya// de tshe sngags gzhan bzlas mi bya// ha cang ngan
206b6(rgyud 'bum): pa spang bya ste/ / ha cang bzang po'ang de bzhin no// bar ma bar ma'i las dag la// sdom chen sngags ni rtag tu bzla// ha cang skad mthon 'bad pas spang // tshig ni dma' ba'ang
206b7(rgyud 'bum): ma yin no/ / bar ma dbus kyi yul dag tu// rjes mthun rgyal bas bsngags pa'o// ha cang skad mthon dma'ang min// bar mas rtag tu bzlas pa bya// sangs rgyas snga ma kun
207a1(rgyud 'bum): gyis ni/ / tshig ni legs ldan yin zhes gsungs// rtag tu gzhan gyi rna lam dang // gzhan gyi drung du mi bzla'o// dben pa'i phyogs su'ang bdag rig pas
207a2(rgyud 'bum): sngags kyang bar ma bzla bar bya/ / de ltar sngags bzlas rab sbyar na// sngags ni gang yang myur du 'grug/ bar ma'i sngags ni 'grub 'dod na// yang dang yang du bzlas pa bya/
207a3(rgyud 'bum): de bas bzlas pa rnam bral dang // sngags kyi de nyid don legs thos// dben zhing gdung ba med par ni// zlos pas sngags ni bzla bar bya// mtshan mo yi ni bzhi cha dang //
207a4(rgyud 'bum): dadephyed de bzhin phyed nyid dang // skya rengs dmar po zung tsam la// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor 'char ba la// dang po bar ma nyid du ni// thub pa mchog gis gsungs pa yin//
207a5(rgyud 'bum): zung tsam khru ni bzhi pa ste// bar mar yongs su bsgrags pa yin// de nas nyi ma phyed shar na// sngags bzlas de tshe spang bar bya// sngags bzlas de tshe btang ba na/
207a6(rgyud 'bum): sdom brtson mchod yon slar gshegs gsol// de tshe btang ba'i lhag dus la// thub pa'i bstan la dge ba bya// dam chos bklag la sogs pa ni// shes
207a7(rgyud 'bum): rab pha rol phyin la sogs/ / glegs bams bcu zhes bya ba// mchong dang bklag pa rtag tu bya// de nas dus la bar gyur na// rang sngags sngags kyi mgor po dang /
207b1(rgyud 'bum): rtsub pa mchog la phyag 'tshal nas// de nas 'tshab don du'agro// dus dang spyod dang de bzhin ldan/ dus su sus spyong dbang po zlam// chos sa d+d+ha ba la brtson pa dang /
207b2(rgyud 'bum): sangs rgyas bstan la rab tu dang // mi sgra grong gi nang du 'dug/ rtag tu gtsang spro spyong la dga'// chos ldan sems can khyim du ni// srong dus rtag zlog byed cing
207b3(rgyud 'bum): 'dug/ srog chags med chos grub pa yi// zas ni gtsang bar grags pa dang / yang dag lta ba'i khyim ngag dang // sangs rgyas bstan la ngang pa yi// de 'dra'i khyim
207b4(rgyud 'bum): la rtag tu ni/ / spong ba'i don du spong mo blang // ji ltar dpa' bos go bgos te// nyam nga'i yul du 'jug pa na// rtag tu dgra ni 'joms byed de// dgra yis 'joms kyang mi
207b5(rgyud 'bum): nus pa/ / de bzhin sngags pa rtag grong du// slong mo'i 'tsho bas 'jug pa na// gzugs sgra la sogs bzang po ni// de ltar mthong bas chags gyur na// 'dod chags
207b6(rgyud 'bum): zhi ba'i don gyi phyir/ / dge ba mi gtsang bsgom par bya// lang mtsho'i rnam pas brgyan pa yi// bud med gzugs ni mthong ba na// mi gtsang dri ngan bsgom bya zhing // shin tu spang ba rnag dang
207b7(rgyud 'bum): gcin/ / srin bus zos dang dur khrod gnas// lus ni mi rtag sdug bsngal yin// byis pa sngags la rmongs pa yis// 'gro ba lnga po dag tu 'khor// las kyi skud pas bcings nas ni//
208a1(rgyud 'bum): yun ring dus su mya ngan byed// mi shes sgrib pas rmongs pa na// dmus long sdug bsngal rgyu yang yin// gang du blon phyin ci lon// skye bo chags pas 'phongs
208a2(rgyud 'bum): par gyur/ / rnam pa sna tshogs las gar gyi// rnam pa du mar chags byed pas// yun ring res kyis gnas nas ni// 'gro dang 'ong bar spyod par byed// gar byed bzhin
208a3(rgyud 'bum): du spyod pa yis/ / bran bzhin du ni gtong bar byed// mi gtsang dga' ba'i sems can gang // yun ring lam du 'phongs par 'gyur// 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho'i chu 'byung ba// zo
208a4(rgyud 'bum): chun gyi ni rnam pa bzhin/ / 'gro ba de dag mi bzad ba'i// sdug bsngal chu yis khyab pa yin// sangs rgyas kyis ni bud med dag/ ma 'dres sdug bsngal rtsa bar gsungs//
208a5(rgyud 'bum): nyan thos byang chub sems dpa' dang // rang rgyal thub pas de bzhin gsungs// 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho mi 'khrugs pa// rgya mtsho 'di ni bskam par dga'// bud med sems kyis
208a6(rgyud 'bum): bslus pas ni/ / gang du sems can bying gyur nas// dmyal bdud 'gro'i 'jig rten dang // yi dgas 'jig rten lha ma yin// de bzhin mi 'jig rten dang // lha yi 'gro ba'i 'gro bar 'gro// /
208a7(rgyud 'bum): bud med chags pas bslus pas na// kun nas yongs su 'khor 'gyur zhing // 'jam chen nang du 'bying 'gyur la// 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho brtson ra yin// bud med chag pa'i blun po'i mi//
208b1(rgyud 'bum): rul ba'i ro la wa bzhin no// gang du mi ni chags byed pa// shin tu mi bzang sdug bsngal bzod// dkar po'i chos ni ngas nyams byed// sangs rgyas bstan la zhugs pas ni//
208b2(rgyud 'bum): sdug bsngal 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho nyid// thams cad yongs su zlog byed cing // sngags zlos dga' zhig brtson pa dang // grags pa che zhing chags dang bral// gzi brjid ldan zhing kun
208b3(rgyud 'bum): dang mdza'/ / de dag la ni sdug bsngal med// yang dag sdom dang tshangs bden shes// bla ma lha la mchod byed dang // ma dang pha la gus pa rnams// de dag la ni sdug bsngal med//
208b4(rgyud 'bum): dam pa'i don la brten na ni// mi rtag sdug bsngal stong pa dang // de bzhin dbyigadug zug rngu bzhin// zlos pa bud med lus bsam bya// blo ngan phung po'i lcags kyur zin// 'khor ba
208b5(rgyud 'bum): las ni 'byung mi nus/ / rtag tu bud med chags gyur pa// de la grub pa yod ma yin/ zlos pa 'di la tshul khrims nyas// de la grub pa mchog med cing // grub pa 'bring yang yod med/
208b6(rgyud 'bum): / grub pa tha ma'ang yod ma yin// tshul khrims 'tshal la thub dbang gis// sngags grub par ni ma gsungs te// mya ngan 'das grong 'gro ba yi// yul dang phyogs kyang ma yin no//
208b7(rgyud 'bum): byis pa ngan pa 'di la ni// sngags grub pa ni ga la yod// skye bo tshul khrim 'chal 'di la// de la bde 'gro gal yod// mtho ris su yang mi 'gyur zhing // bde ba mchog tu mi 'gyur na//
209a1(rgyud 'bum): rgyal bas gsungs pa'i sngags rnams ni// 'grub par 'gyur ba smos ci dgos// ta la'i shing gi mgo bo ni// gang tshe gcad par gyur pa na'ang // sngon po nyid
209a2(rgyud 'bum): kyi skal med na/ / myu gu nam zhig 'byung bar 'gyur// de bzhin sngags grub rmongs pa dang // tshul khrims nyams shing sdig las byed// rtag tu bud med chags pa la// 'di
209a3(rgyud 'bum): ni rab tu bstan pa yin/ / mi dge'i bshes gnyen bstan pa la// sngags kyi rgyal po ga la 'grub// de bas dul dang rtag zlas byed// bud med skyon ni rnam spyod la// de la chags pa
209a4(rgyud 'bum): rnam spangs pa/ / de la grub par brjod pa yin// byis pa bud med la brgyal ba// gzhan la grub pa bstan pa min// blo ldan g.yeng ba med la dga'// gtsang zhing ma chags shes/
209a5(rgyud 'bum): nyen can// rigs mtho brtan dang dpa' ba dang // brtser ldan mthong na dga' ba dang // tshes dang chos min rnam dpyong shes// de la grub pa rnyed mi dka'// de ltar sngags shes zhugs
209a6(rgyud 'bum): pa ni/ grong du slong phyir rab tu 'jug/ sngar ni btags pa'i gnas dag tu// ji ltar 'dod bzhin song nas ni// blo ldan dag pas bslang ba'i snod// gtsang ba'i phyogs su yang dag gzhag/
209a7(rgyud 'bum): phyi rol song nas rkang gnyis bkru// de nas yang ni yan lag ste// de tshe srog chags med pa'i chus// lag pa g.yas pas byin pa g.yas// lag pa g.yon pas byin pa g.yon//
209b1(rgyud 'bum): yang na gnyis ka dus gcig bkru// sa ni lag g.yon yang bzhag nas// sngar ni yang dag bzhag pa yi// bdug pa gtsang ba'i sa dag gis// lag pa gnyis ni rab tu bkru/
209b2(rgyud 'bum): de nas sngags kyis dag byas pa'i// dri med gtsang sbra dag snod la// ba ni ser skyas bor ba yi// lci ba gsar pa blang bar bya// srog chags med pa'i chu sbyar bas// ston pa la ni dkyil
209b3(rgyud 'bum): 'khor bya/ / dang po thub pa mchog la ni// khor yug khru gang tsam du bya// gnyis ka rang sngags mgon po la// gsum pa rang rigs lha la'o// sngags pa bzlas pa gang byed pa//
209b4(rgyud 'bum): rtag tu'ang de nyid bya ba yin// yang ni sems can thams cad kyi// longs spyod phyir ni bstan pa yin// g.yas su 'jig rten mgon po yi// dkyil 'khor 'di ni rtag tu bya//
209b5(rgyud 'bum): dkon mchog gsum gyi dkyil 'khor ni// gru bzhi dag tu bya ba yin// gnyis pa rang sangs rgyas rnams la// gsum pa stobs bcu ldan pa'i sras// dkyil 'khor bdun po de dag ni/
209b6(rgyud 'bum): kun nas gru bzhir bya ba yin// khru gang ngam ni khru phyed du// nyin re zhing ni bya ba yin// sdig pa 'jig byed bzlas pa ni// dben pa'i phyogs su nyin re bya// sngags pa de nas langs
209b7(rgyud 'bum): nas ni/ / 'bad pas lag gnyis rab tu bkru// gtsang ba'i chu yis nye reg bya// dag cing srog chags spangs pa yi// dri med gtsang sbras 'bad nas ni// gtsang ba'i snod ni de tshe
210a1(rgyud 'bum): blang / / mtsho chen dang ni 'bab chu 'am// chu mig chu bo la gnas dang // gtsang ba'i phyogs nas byung ba yi// sems can dag pa lag blangs la// gnyis
210a2(rgyud 'bum): sem gsum du rtag tu yang / / sngags pas nye reg bya ba yin// de nas chu reg gdong dang ni// de bzhin du ni rna khung dag/ mig dang sna dang lag gnyis dang // spyi bo lte ba'i phyogs
210a3(rgyud 'bum): reg bya/ / dge ba spyod pas lan lnga'am bdun// cho ga ji bzhin thams cad bya// gtsang sbra'i spyod pa legs ldan pas// zlos pa gtsang bar gyur pa yis// slong snod yang dag
210a4(rgyud 'bum): blangs nas ni/ / chu yi gzhir ni 'gro bar bya// gang du chu yi rgyun 'bab gnas// de bzhin du ni chu mig dang // chu bo rab tu 'bab pa la// rtag tu zas ni bkru bar bya// gtsug lag
210a5(rgyud 'bum): khang ngam gnas khang du/ / de nas langs nas 'gro bar bya// gang du sngon ni brten pa dang // gang du gnas pa der 'gro bya// de nas zlos pas lhung bzed de// song nas phyogs ni der gzhag
210a6(rgyud 'bum): bya/ / de nas nye reg myur byas nas// de bzhin yang ni lhung bzed blang // lhung bzed sa 'am lo ma'am// dngul dang gser gyi snod dang ni// zangs ma shing shun dag kyang rung // ston pa
210a7(rgyud 'bum): la ni dbul bar bya/ / ston pa la ni bshos phul nas// rang sngags sngags kyi rgyal po'ang brjod// 'gro na zhig sdug bsngal gyur 'ong na// ci nus par ni sbyin par bya// rnam pa
210b1(rgyud 'bum): kun tu kha zas ni/ / ha cang mang ba sbyin mi bya// sngags rig lus gdung mi bya ste// rnam pa kun tu ci rig bya// lto ba'i tshad tsam gzhag bya ste// lhag ma'i zas ni rtag tu sbyin/
210b2(rgyud 'bum): bkres dang skom pas nyen gyur na// sngags kyi don la rten mi nus// kha zas mang dang nyung zos na// sngags rnams mnyes par mi nus so// de nyid phyir ni thub dbang gis//
210b3(rgyud 'bum): sems can zas kyis gnas pa'o zhes// lus can rnams la gsungs pa ste// gang gis mi rnams 'tsho ba dang // lha dang lha min dri za dang // klu dang gnod sbyin mi 'am ci// srin/
210b4(rgyud 'bum): po yi dgas sha za dang // 'byung po skar ma gza' rnams dag/ gang zhig kha zas mi zab// de ni gang yang yod ma yin// rags pa'i zas ni gang yin pa// kham gyi zas su rnam
210b5(rgyud 'bum): par bsgrags/ / sems can phra ba'i zas can yang // de bzhin gshegs pa nyid kyis gsungs// bsam gtan zas can rnams la ni// gzugs kyi khams na spyod pa'o//
210b6(rgyud 'bum): gzugs med khams kyi lha dag ni// ting 'dzin 'bras bu la spyod pa'o// srid pa bar ma'i sems can rnams// dri yi zas su rab tu bsgrags// de bzhin 'dod khams sems can dag
210b7(rgyud 'bum): sna tshogs zas la spyod pa yin/ / de nyid phyir na thub dbang gis// las kyi rgyu yis gsungs pa ni// sems can zas kyis gnas pa zhes// thams cad la ni rab tu bsgrags// zlos la rtag
211a1(rgyud 'bum): tu brtson pas ni/ / zas kyi tshod rig bya ba yin// gang phyir sngags bsten nus pa ni// kha zas la ni rab tu gnas// spyod pa yongs su dag pa dang // dge zhing tshangs par
211a2(rgyud 'bum): spyod pa dang / / kha zas tshed ni rig pa la// de la grub pa rnyed mi dka'// ji ltar shing rta'i shing rta pas// mig ni yongs su bskus pa ni// yun ring dus su brtan phyir dang // khal ni 'jig
211a3(rgyud 'bum): par bya phyir ro/ / de bzhin sngags pa sngags shes pas// kha zas gnas phyir 'dzin byed dang // lus kyang tshim par bya ba'i phyir// zlos pas rtag tu gso bar bya// sngags rnams
211a4(rgyud 'bum): sgrub pa'i phyir dang ni/ / byang chub tshogs ni bya ba'i phyir// de bzhin du ni sngags bzla ba// mi yi 'jig rten bsrung bya'o// de nyid phyir na thub mchog ni// 'od srungs zhes bya
211a5(rgyud 'bum): sngon byung ba/ / de tshe de dus sa steng 'dir// 'od chen ldan pa des gsungs pa// 'byung po rnams la legs don du// sngags 'di rab tu gsungs pa ni// 'jig rten ma lus
211a6(rgyud 'bum): sdug bsngal dang / / dman dang dbul dang skyo ba dang // 'bad rtsol dag la nyon mongs pa// de dag don phyir gsungs pa ni// 'byung po rnams la legs don dang // de bzhin
211a7(rgyud 'bum): gnas par 'dod pa yang / / 'byung po rnams la zas don du// sngags mchog 'di ni gsungs pa yin// nyan thos dag ni thams cad dang // byang chub la gnas thams cad nyon
211b1(rgyud 'bum): bdag gis sngags 'di rab brjod kyis/ / nang rnams 'jig byed zung zhig dang // gang yang bkres nad kyis nyen dang // gang yang sems can sgom pa rnams// kun gyi sdug bsngal nyer
211b2(rgyud 'bum): zhi'i phyir/ / 'byor pa 'dod rnams rab nyon cig/ 'od srungs 'od ni chen po pa// thug pa mchog gis de skad gsungs// nyan thos rnams ni yid dga' nas// khyab bdag la ni gsol ba
211b3(rgyud 'bum): 'debs/ / chos mkhyen sngags ni bshad du gsol// chos kyi rgyal po thub pa che// sems can brtse ba'i mchog gyur pa// dus ni rab tu nye bar gnas// de skad gsol nas thub mchog gis//
211b4(rgyud 'bum): ka la bing ka'i sgra skad dang // rnga bo che yi sgra skad dang // tshangs dbyangs stobs ni chen po dang // tshangs shes rgyal ba sngon 'dren pas// 'byung po'i tshogs ni gang su dag/ 'dir lhags
211b5(rgyud 'bum): gyur pa kun nyon cig/ rkang med dang ni rkang mangs dang // rkang gnyis dang ni rkang bzhi pa// mngon sems can kun gyi phyir// bde 'byung sngags ni bshad par bya// 'das dang ma 'ongs pa
211b6(rgyud 'bum): ltar gyi/ / sems can gang dag 'dir lhags pa// 'byor pa 'dod rnams da nyon cig/ mdor na bdag gis rab bshad bya// na maHsarba bud+d+hA nA~M/ a pra ti ha ta shA sa nA nAM/ tad+ya thA/ oM ga
211b7(rgyud 'bum): neg gan gan+de A na ya sarba la hu la hu sa ma ya ma nu sma ra/ A ka rA Ni/ mA bi laM ba mA bi laM ba ya the pi ste me saM pA da ya swA hA/ bcom ldan 'das 'od srungs kyis de skang gsungs nas cang mi gsung bar
212a1(rgyud 'bum): gyur to/ / yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'od srungs kyis bar der rig pa'i sngags kyi tshig rgya cher gsungs pa na// nam mkha' de thams cad
212a2(rgyud 'bum): chen po la 'os pa'i zas kyi sprin gyis yongs su khebs par gyur to/ / stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi nam mkha'i dkyil kun tu zas kyi sprin gyis khyab par snang
212a3(rgyud 'bum): bar gyur to/ / sems can gyi bsam pa ji ltar mngon par 'dod pa'i bza' ba dang / ji ltar 'dod pa'i zas de dag la char bzhin du bab par gyur to// ji ltar 'dod pa'i zas dang bza'
212a4(rgyud 'bum): ba'i bya ba ni bkres pa'i sdug bsngal zhi ba'i don dang / skom pa rnams kyis btung bar bya ba ni yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i chu'i rgyun yid la 'dod pa bzhin du der bab par gyur to// de'i
212a5(rgyud 'bum): tshe de'i dus kyi skad cig de nyid la bkres pa'i nang thams cad rab tu zhi ba dang / skom pa thams cad dang bral bar gyur to// thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de'ang ngo mtshar dang rab tu dga'
212a6(rgyud 'bum): ba thob par gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// rjes su yi rang nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te de nyid du mi
212a7(rgyud 'bum): snang bar gyur to/ / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'od srungs kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i gnas su rnam par bzhugs so// bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pangs kyang de'i
212b1(rgyud 'bum): tshe de ltar bshad cing rjes su yi rang bar byas so/ / sngags kyi rgyal po'i mchog 'di la sems can thams cad kyi don du bkres pa dang skom pa sel ba'i phyir dang / sngags thams cad zlos pa
212b2(rgyud 'bum): ngag la'ang khyad par du sel bar 'gyur ro/ / dang po re zhig zlos pas sngags 'di bsgrub par bya ste/ gal te bsod snyoms la 'gro bar spro ba med na ri'i rtse mo la 'dzegs te 'bum phrag
212b3(rgyud 'bum): bdun bzla bar bya zhing / zas dkar gsum mam 'o ma'i zas za zhing ri'i rtse mo de nyid du 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi ras ris bar ma gong ma bzhin bzhag ste/ mchod pa chen po byas nas shin tu rgya
212b4(rgyud 'bum): che ba'i gtor ma phul te/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srungs 'di nyid kyis gsungs pa'i sngags kyi seng ldeng gi yam shing gi me rab tu sbar te/ shing u dum ba ra'i yam shing
212b5(rgyud 'bum): la mar dang sbrang rtsis btags pa'i shing rlon mtho gang tsam mam/ bil ba'i 'bras bu'i yam shing stong rtsa brgyad kyis sbyin sreg bya'o// de nas nam phyed kyi dus 'tshams su sprin nag po
212b6(rgyud 'bum): chen po dang rlung gi dkyil 'khor byung na 'jigs par mi bya/ / langs te gzhan du 'gro bar mi bya zhing / 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi yi ge brgyad kyi snying pos bdag nyid bsrung ba dang /
212b7(rgyud 'bum): dkyil 'khor bcing ba dang / grogs bsrung ba'ang byas na snga ma lta bu'i sprin nag po chen po dang rlung nag po de'ang mi snang bar gyur te/ bud med kyang rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ 'od kyi dkyil 'khor
213a1(rgyud 'bum): gyis phyogs thams cad snang bar khyab ste/ sgrub pa po'i mdun du 'dug nas smra ba ni/ kye sems can chen po longs shig/ khyod kyis grub pa yin no zhes so// de nas
213a2(rgyud 'bum): sgrub pa pos sna ma'i me tog gis bsres pa'i dri zhim po'i chus mchod yon sbyin no/ / de nas de nyid du mi snang bar gyur to// gang de'i nyi ma nas bdag nyid dang / grogs po nyi shu lnga 'am/
213a3(rgyud 'bum): yang ci 'dod pa'i grogs po dag la ci 'dod pa'i bzas dang / ji ltar 'dod pa'i yo byad rnams yang dag par ster bar byed do// de nas sgrub pa pos ras ris la gshegs su gsol ba'i mchod
213a4(rgyud 'bum): yon dbul te/ lan gsum bskor ba byas nas ras ris blangs te/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' la phyag byas nas/ sngar bstan pa'i sgrub pa'i thabs ji lta bu'i gnas dgon pa chen po
213a5(rgyud 'bum): 'am/ ri'i rtse mo'am/ mi med pa'i gnas su 'gro bar bya'o// der lo ma'i spyil po byas te/ bdag nyid dang grogs po gnyis kar bcas te rab tu gnas par bya'o// der gnas pa dang / gnas
213a6(rgyud 'bum): de dag la nam mkha' la 'gro ba la sogs pa'i las byas te/ de nas sgrub pa po sa snga ma bzhin du ku sha'i khres la 'dug nas ras ris bar ma snga ma bzhin du bzhag ste/ seng ldeng gi yam shing gi me
213a7(rgyud 'bum): rab tu spar la/ dus gsum du me tog pad+ma dkar po zho dang / sbrang rtsi dang / mar gyis btags pa stong rtsa brgyad nyi ma nyi shu rtsa gcig gi bar du sbyin sreg bya'o// de nas mtshan phyed kyi
213b1(rgyud 'bum): dus su sbyin sreg gi mthar 'phags pa 'jam dpal mngon sum du mthong bar 'gyur ro/ / 'dod pa'i mchog stsol bar yang 'gyur ro// nam mkha' la 'gro ba dang / mi snang ba dang /
213b2(rgyud 'bum): byang chub sems dpa'i sa dang / rang sangs rgyas nyid dam/ nyan thos nyid dam/ tshe ring ba nyid dam/ rgyal srid chen po dang longs spyod chen po nyid dam/ rgyal po dga' ba nyid dam/
213b3(rgyud 'bum): 'phags pa 'jam dpal dang lhan cig rjes su spyod par 'gyur te/ mdor na gang 'dod pa de thams cad stsol bar 'gyur ro// gang don du gnyer ba de'ang rjes su stsol bar 'gyur ro//
213b4(rgyud 'bum): grub pa'i rdzas thams cad kyang 'grub par 'gyur ro// sems can chen po rnams kyang 'gugs par byed par 'gyur ro// mdor na ji lta ji ltar brjod pa de thams cad byed par 'gyur ro//
213b5(rgyud 'bum): sngon gyi las kyi nyes pa'ang yang dag par spong bar byed do zhes bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas gsungs so// gzhan yang las kyi thabs par ma sgrub pa'ang yod de/ dang po re zhig de ltar de
213b6(rgyud 'bum): khyad par du gyur pa'i gnas sam/ gtsang ba'i sa phyogs sam/ chu bo 'am/ chu gling gi ngogs su snga ma bzhin du thams cad bya ste/ ras ris nub tu bstan te bzhag la/ bdag kyang shar
213b7(rgyud 'bum): du mngon du phyogs par byas nas ku sha'i khres la 'dug ste/ snga ma bzhin du rgya cher sbyar bar byas nas dus gsum du yi ge drug pa bzlas par bya ste/ bzlas pa rdzogs pa dang / dong ka'i me tog
214a1(rgyud 'bum): la tsan dan dkar po 'am gur kum gyis bsgos pas snga ma bzhin du sbyin sreg stong phrag brgya bya'o/ / de bzhin du me sbar nas sbyin sreg gi mjug tu ras ris rab tu
214a2(rgyud 'bum): 'gul ba byung na ni blon po nyid thob par 'gyur ro/ / ras ris las 'od kyi snang ba byung na ni 'od las rgyal srid thob par 'gyur ro// ras ris kyi 'od 'bar ba'i 'phreng bas kun khyab na ni
214a3(rgyud 'bum): rgyal po chen po bzhi'i rgyal srid thob par 'gyur ro/ / ras ris las me stag byung na ni sum cu rtsa gsum gyi dbang phyug brgya byin nyid thob par 'gyur ro// ras ris las chos 'chad pa'i
214a4(rgyud 'bum): sgra byung na ni byang chub sems dpa'i sa gsum gyi dbang phyug nyid thob par 'gyur ro/ / ras ris kyi phyag gis mgo la byugs par mdzad na ni mngon par shes pa lnga dang / sa bdun pa thob pa dang /
214a5(rgyud 'bum): stobs bcu la gnas pa mthar gyis thob pa yin no// de nas sgrub pa po la bcom ldan 'das 'od srungs kyis gsungs pa'i sngags bsgrubs te/ bkres pa dang skom pa rab tu bsal ba'i don
214a6(rgyud 'bum): rjes su thob pa de nyid kyi 'tshog chas sngags spyod pa'i don sgrub pa'i thabs kyi chos la yang dag par rjes su bsgrub par bya'o/ / gzhan du ni 'di 'grub par mi 'gyur ro// de ltar mthar gyis
214a7(rgyud 'bum): sngags kyi spyod pa la rjes su 'jug cing / mdor na nges par 'bad pa la ni rdzas dang / sman dang / yo byad kyi khyad par dang / nor bu rin po che sngar ji skad bshad pa rnams 'grub par 'gyur ro// sngags
214b1(rgyud 'bum): rig sngags ni zlos pa dang / / sems ni cho ga la mkhas dang // sngags pa de tshe de yul du// de tshe gtsang ba'i kha zas bza'// zos nas yid ni dga' ba dang // rtag tu dbang po rgyas pa dang //
214b2(rgyud 'bum): lhung bzed lhag ma blangs nas ni// chu bo gtsang ba dag tu 'gro// dben par yongs su bor nas ni// sdom can gyis sbyin dud 'gro la// dud 'gro la ni byin nas kyang // 'bad pas
214b3(rgyud 'bum): snod ni bkru bar bya/ / de nas 'bad pa byas nas ni// sa yi snod kyang bsreg par bya// lhag ma lhung bzed bya ba ni// snum med zas ni med pa dang // dri nyid yongs su spang bya zhes//
214b4(rgyud 'bum): lhag ma lhung bzed thub pas gsungs// gang du slong ba'i lhung bzed la// der ni kha zas mi spyod do// shing thog dngos rnams thams cad dang // bca' ba rnams kyang der mi spyad//
214b5(rgyud 'bum): pad+ma'i lo mar bza' mi bya// ut+pal snod la bza' ba min// me tog dri mchog la min te// sngags pas de la bza' mi bya// gang yang lo ma ku mu dang // p+lag sha u dum ba ra las
214b6(rgyud 'bum): byung / / baT shing gi lo ma'ang min// tsher ma'i shing dang ri khrod byung // a mra'i lo ma dag la'ang min// de bzhin pha ta la las byung // sa la shri sha'i lo ma dang // byang chub shing las
214b7(rgyud 'bum): yang dag byung / / gang du bcom ldan sangs rgyas ni// shAkya seng ge bzhugs pa yi// shing de 'bad pas spang bya ste// so shing du'ang bca' mi bya// klu shing gi ni ge sar dang // lo ma
215a1(rgyud 'bum): ngag kyang mi btung zhing / / gang du'ang nam yang bza' mi bya// mkhas pas de kun rnam par spongs// thub pa'i lo ma'i spyil po las// rmongs pas nam yang
215a2(rgyud 'bum): bsgom mi bya/ / sngags pa dam tshig nyams gyur pas// lo ma de dag la mi bza'// lo ma gzhan la bza' bya ste// sngags pas der ni bza' bar bya// sa dang zangs mar bstan pa
215a3(rgyud 'bum): dang / de bzhin dngul dang gser las byung // shel dang rdo yi rang bzhin las// rtag tu bza' ba blang bar bya// lo ma'i rgyab tu mi bza' ste// lag pa'i mthil du'ang de
215a4(rgyud 'bum): bzhin no/ / stobs bcu ldan dang de yi sras// gang yang rang rgyal bse ru dang // nyan thos gang zag dag la ni// phul ba'i lo ma gang yin pa// de dag zlos pas spang bya ste//
215a5(rgyud 'bum): rkang pas kyang ni mi bgom mo// zas snod rnam pa sna tshogs dang // de bzhin btung dang bza' ba rnams// thams cad de ltar phul bas na// sngags pas 'bad pas blang mi bya// rgyal//
215a6(rgyud 'bum): dang rgyal ba'i mchog rnams dang // de bzhin nyan thos gang zag dang // dkon mchog gsum la phul ba yang // zlos pas de dag rtag tu spang // cung zad tsam yang lus can la// sngags
215a7(rgyud 'bum): rnams de la mi 'grub ste/ / bkra shis thams cad 'dod pa dang // legs pa bzang po smos ci dgos// rgyas pa dang ni zhi ba dang // bsam pa thams cad rdzogs byed pa// bshos ni tha
215b1(rgyud 'bum): bar byed de la/ / de tshe 'grub par mi 'gyur ro// gtsang zhing shes rab tshul khrims ldan// snying rje snying rje'i las can dang // gtsang sbra'i spyod la dga' ba nyid// sngags rnams kun tu
215b2(rgyud 'bum): 'grub par 'gyur/ / sems can gzhan la sbyin pa'i zas// zlos pas de ni bza' mi bya// gzhan gyis rab tu ma bstabs pa'o// zas gzhan bza' bar mi bya'o// cung zad tsam
215b3(rgyud 'bum): gyi kha zas kyang / / rang la byin pa blang bar bya// sngags shes de ltar 'jug gang yin// de las grub pa dpag na gnas// zlos pa 'di yi cho ga yis// sdom can bza' ba blang bar
215b4(rgyud 'bum): bya/ / thub pa rnams kyis bsngags pa yi// sngags rnams ma lus bsgrub par bya// mdor na cho ga mthong bas ni// bza' ba kun bya las rnams la// de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba//
215b5(rgyud 'bum): sngags kyis ma lus dbang du byed// de nas zlos pa nye reg byas// de tshe sngags ni bzlas par bya// sngags pas de tshe lan bdun du// lus sbyangs phyir ni bzlas nas su// 'byung
215b6(rgyud 'bum): po'i tshogs dang lha rnams dag/ de don rgya cher rab nyon cig/ lus kun nye reg byas nas ni// thub pa'i sngags 'di brjod par bya// na maHsar+b+ba bud+d+hA nAM/ a pra ti ha ta shA sa nA nA/
215b7(rgyud 'bum): tad+ya thA/ oM sar+b+ba kil+li Sha nA sha ni/ nA sha ya nA sha ya/ sar+b+ba duSh+Ta pra yu k+taM/ sa ma ya ma nusma ra hUM dza swA hA/ sngags 'di blangs pa'i zas ji ltar yongs su spyod pa'i kha zas la lan gsum
216a1(rgyud 'bum): bsngags te yongs su spyad par bya'o/ / zos nas kyang snga ma bzhin du nye reg bya ste/ spyi bo la sogs pa lus thams cad du nye reg byas nas de nas ngal bso bar bya ste/
216a2(rgyud 'bum): ngal sos nas yud tsam gyi phyed ngam/ thun gcig ste/ de nas ras ris dang sangs rgyas thams cad la phyag 'tshol nas/ dam pa'i chos kyi glegs bam bklag par bya'o// 'phags pa
216a3(rgyud 'bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / 'phags pa zla ba'i sgron ma'i ting nge 'dzin dang / 'phags pa sa bcu pa dang / 'phags pa gser 'od dam pa dang / 'phags pa rma bya chen
216a4(rgyud 'bum): mo dang / 'phags pa rin po che tog gi gzungs dang / 'di dag las gang yang rung ba bklag par bya'o// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor zung tsam gyi tshad kyi dus na/ de nas yongs su grub
216a5(rgyud 'bum): pa ni ji ltar nus pa de bzhin du bklag par byas nas glegs bam brtul ba 'am/ gos gtsang ma bgos te/ dam pa'i chos la phyag byas nas/ de nas khrus kyi don du chu'i ngogs sam
216a6(rgyud 'bum): mtsho chen por song ste 'jug par bya'o/ / phyin nas srog chags med pa'i sa blangs te/ lan bdun bzlas te de chu la gdab bo// de'ang gang zhe na/ na maHsar+b+ba bud+d+hA nAM/ a pra ti ha ta
216a7(rgyud 'bum): shA sa nA nAM/ tad+ya thA/ oM sar+b+ba duSh+TAn stam+b+ha ya hUM/ na di ba rA bA ra Ni/ ku mA ra kr-i DA ru pi Ne ban d+ha ban d+ha/ sa ma ya ma nusma ra phaT phaT swA hA/ 'dis bsrung ba byas na saM phyogs rnams
216b1(rgyud 'bum): bcing ba dang / grogs rnams dang / dkyil 'khor dang / thab khung bcing ba dang / ma rungs pa dang / rab tu ma rungs pa thams cad 'gugs par byed pa dang / skud pa dkar
216b2(rgyud 'bum): po la lan bdun bzlas te/ rked pa'i phyogs su bcings nas thams cad du 'gro bar 'gyur ro// bzlas pa'i dus thams cad dang / khrus kyi dus thams cad du'ang bgegs ma
216b3(rgyud 'bum): rungs pa rnam par 'jig pa dang / rab tu zhi bar bya ba'i phyir sngags 'di bum phrag gcig bzlas na des ni las thams cad byed par 'gyur ro// gtsug pud lnga'i phyag rgya chen po dang
216b4(rgyud 'bum): ldan pa dgod par bya'o/ / las thams cad la thams cad byed par 'gyur te gzhan du ma yin no// de nas sgrub pa pos sa dang lci ba'i phye ma la sogs pa blangs te ci bde bar khrus byas te/
216b5(rgyud 'bum): srog chags med pa'i chus kyang bkrus te/ las thams cad la'ang srog chags med pa'i chus bya'o// de nas sa dang lci ba 'am/ gzhan yang dri zhim po chen po dang ldan pa'i yo byad kyi khyad
216b6(rgyud 'bum): par gyis byugs te de'i 'og tu khrus bya'o/ / chu'i nang du bshang gcirang ngor bar mi bya'o// chu gtor zhing dong bar yang mi bya'o// chu la rtse bar yang mi bya'o// snying rjes bdag dang sems
216b7(rgyud 'bum): can thams cad la so sor brtag par bya'o/ / bdag med pa dang / stong pa dang / sdug bsngal gyis khyab pa/ tshor bas mngon par gnod pa/ sdug bsngal gyi tshogs thob pa bzhin du
217a1(rgyud 'bum): 'gro ba dang 'ong ba'i sbyor bas sdug bsngal ba de bzhin du sems can sgrub pa dang bral ba sngags rig pas 'di lta bur 'jig pa dang / rnam par g.yeng ba dang / rnam par 'jig
217a2(rgyud 'bum): pa la sogs pa'i sdug bsngal gyi tshogs kyis nye bar khyab pa/ khor ba'i rgya mtsho brgal dka' ba la gnas pa'i bdag nyid du mthong zhing gnas med pa dang / skyob pa med pa dang / skyabs med
217a3(rgyud 'bum): pa dang / shin tu dman pa'i yid can du bdag nyid brtags la sgom pa pos mi gang tsam gyi chu 'am/ lte ba tsam gyi chu la gnas te/ chu de gnyis kyi dbus su sems rtse gcig tu nye bar gnas
217a4(rgyud 'bum): par bya'o/ / dang po re zhig pad+ma chen po'i rtsa lag la me tog pad+ma chen po dang ldan pa/ pad+ma chen po'i 'dab mas nye bar mdzes pa/ blta na sdug pa/ sdong bu rin po che bai DAR+Ya'i rang
217a5(rgyud 'bum): bzhin las byung ba/ pad+ma'i ge sar rin po che margad las grub pa/ 'dab ma stong shel las byas pa/ shin tu rnam par kha bye ba/ de'i rjes su skyes pa'i shel dang pad+ma rA ga'i me tog gis
217a6(rgyud 'bum): mdzes par byas pa/ de'i steng du seng ge'i khri rin po che'i rang bzhin las grub pa rin po che du mas nye bar mdzes pa/ ras bcos bu zung gis rab tu bkab pa/ de'i steng du bzhugs
217a7(rgyud 'bum): pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsgom par bya ste/ chos 'chad cing bzhugs pa/ gser gyi mdog ltar snang ba/ kun nas 'od 'bar ba'i 'phreng ba can/ 'od 'dom gang gi dkyil
217b1(rgyud 'bum): 'khor gyi sa brgyan pa/ sku'i tshad chen po nam mkha' la thug pa dang 'dra ba/ skyil mo krung gis bzhugs pa/ g.yas su'ang 'phags pa 'jam dpal rgyan thams cad kyis nye bar mdzes par
217b2(rgyud 'bum): byas pa/ pad+ma'i gdan la bzhugs pa/ rnga yab thogs pa/ bcom ldan 'das bzhugs pa'i zur na gnas pa/ sku'i kha dog dmar skya'am gur kum bdur ba lta bu'o// g.yon
217b3(rgyud 'bum): du'ang 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug kha dog ston ka'i mnga' rgyu'i dra ba/ phyag na rnga yab thogs pa/ de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' brgyad la 'phags pa byams pa dang /
217b4(rgyud 'bum): kun tu bzang po dang / sa'i snying po dang / nam mkha' mdzod dang / sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba dang / ngan song sbyong ba dang / 'phags pa phyag na rdo rje dang / khams
217b5(rgyud 'bum): bzang can te/ byang chub sems dpa' bcu po de dag gi g.yas logs su rang sangs rgyas brgyad bsgom par bya ste/ tsan dan dang / spos kyi ngang ldang dang / tog dang / legs tog dang /
217b6(rgyud 'bum): tog dkar dang / 'dod pa dang / nye ba'i 'dod pa dang / mu khyud de 'di brgyad do// de nyid du nyan thos chen po brgyad gnas pa la 'di lta ste/ 'phags pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po dang
217b7(rgyud 'bum): shA ri'i bu dang / ba lang bdag dang / b+ha ra dA dza bsod snyoms lan dang / pi lin da'i bu dang / 'phags pa sgra gcan 'dzin dang / 'od srungs chen po dang / 'phags pa kun dga' bo'o//
218a1(rgyud 'bum): nyan thos chen po de dag dang nye bar dge slong gi dge 'dun mtha' yas pa bsgom par bya'o// rang sangs rgyas dang nye ba na rang sangs rgyas bsam gyis mi khyab pa bsgom
218a2(rgyud 'bum): par bya'o/ / byang chub sems dpa' chen po brgyad kyi gnas su rang byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun bsam gyis mi khyab pa bsgom par bya'o// de bzhin du nam mkha'i dkyil thams
218a3(rgyud 'bum): cad du 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor chen po dang ldan pa bsgom par bya ste/ bdag kyang lte ba tsam gyi chu la gnas bzhin du lha dang mi'i me tog rnam pa sna tshogs pa la/ me tog man+da ra ba dang / man+da
218a4(rgyud 'bum): ra ba chen po dang / pad+ma dang / pad+ma chen po dang / d+ha nu ska ri dang / bar shi ka dang / ut+pa la sngon po dang / me tog rnam pa sna tshogs la tshad chen po dang / tshan chen por gyur pa'i ri
218a5(rgyud 'bum): rab tsam gyi me tog gi snyim pas bcom ldan 'das la yang dag par mchod de/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams la lha dang mi'i phye ma dang /
218a6(rgyud 'bum): gos dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dag dang / mar me rab tu mang po bye ba khri phrag brgya stong yid du 'ong bas yang dag par mchod par byed la/ de bzhin du
218a7(rgyud 'bum): lha dang mi'i gtor ma dang / bdug spos dang / bshos la sogs pa bsnyen bkur thams cad dang / yo byad rnams nye bar dbul bar bya'o// bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i mdzod spu
218b1(rgyud 'bum): nas kyang 'od zer byung ste/ bdag nyid dang phyogs thams cad kyang snang bas khyab par sgom mo// zlos pa pos bsam gtan la zhugs ma thag tu tshangs pa'i bsod nams dang mnyam pa'i
218b2(rgyud 'bum): 'bras bu thob par 'gyur/ nges par byang chub la rang gzhol bar 'gyur ro// de la sogs pa'i bsam gtan ni// 'jig rten gang zag mchog gis gsungs// 'byung po kun pa
218b3(rgyud 'bum): legs pa dang / sngags pa rnams la phan pa'i don// bsam gtan de tshe dang po'i gtsos// sngags pa rnams la phan don du// gsungs pa sems can rnams la ni// de
218b4(rgyud 'bum): nas thub mchog bdun pa yis/ / dkyil 'khor rnam pa de nyid ni// gang yin dang po thub pas gsungs// gnyis pa yi ni dkyil 'khor dang // gsum par yang ni de la sa gzhan//

218b6(rgyud 'bum): ras ris bar ma sgom/ / mdor na rnam gsum sgom pa ni// sdig pa'i rnyog pa ma lus 'jig/ mkhas pas sgom pa'i rnam pa ni// de las gzhan du mi bsten te// sngags rnams de

219a1(rgyud 'bum): yon gsol nas ci bde bar/ / chu bzhi de las byung nas ni// ci bde bar ni 'gro bar bya// gnas kyang sngar ni bstan pa yi// cho ga legs dben mthong ba yi//
219a2(rgyud 'bum): sngags pas sngags ni de tshe bzla// ji bzhin las ni sngar bstan pa'o// rang gi lha ni spyan drangs pa// der ni sngags kyis gshegs su gsol// de nas rang nyid bsrung bya zhing //
219a3(rgyud 'bum): de bzhin grogs po dag kyang srung // dge ba'i las kyi de nyid shes// cho ga'i las la dga' zhing 'dod// bstod pa'i rnam pa mang pos mchod// gang zag mchog la bstod nas ni//

219a5(rgyud 'bum): ni gnas de nas/ / de nas kyang ni langs nas su// gnas ni thag ring song nas ni// phyi rol rlung ni rnam spangs par// snabs dang mchil ma rnam par dor// bshing dang gci ba'ang
219a6(rgyud 'bum): de bzhin te/ / nyin par byang du kha bltas te// mtshan mo lhor ni blta bar bya// der ni don rnams mi bsam ste// sngags zlos nam yang bya ba min// der ni sngags kyang mi bzla zhing //
