219b1(rgyud 'bum): nye reg bya/ / 'bad pas rkang gnyis bkru bya ste// sa ni khyor ba bdun blangs nas// lan bdun sa de nyid kyis so// bshang ba la ni sum cus bya// mchil mdor dang de bzhin du//
219b2(rgyud 'bum): snrubs dor ba la re re'o// de nas nye reg bya ba yin// sgra med de bzhin song nas ni// lam la sogs pa spangs pa'o// de nas gzhan yang ci 'dod par// lho phyogs mtha'
219b3(rgyud 'bum): ni phyi rol tu/ / g.yang sa zhing dang sa rko dang // de bzhin phye mas khyab pa la// chu bo spangs shing ngogs kyang spangs// mi gtsang ba yang spang bar bya// rab tu bkab dang dben
219b4(rgyud 'bum): yid ches/ / bas mtha' skye bo rnams spangs pa// sngags pas de 'dra'i sa dag tu// mi gtsang ba ni dor bar bya// sngags zlos dus ni shes pa yis// ji ltar 'dod pa'i/
219b5(rgyud 'bum): shugs dag min// de nas gtsang mtha'i phyogs song nas// bshang gci'i bya ba byas nas ni// de nas gnas su ci bder gnas// gsal ba'am dben pa'am g.yogs
219b6(rgyud 'bum): pa 'am/ / skye bo med pa'i sa phyogs su// mi sgra lus reg spangs nas ni// rtag tu bshang gci bya ba yin// bshang dang gci ba med byas nas// sdom can gtsang sbra rtag tu bya// reg
219b7(rgyud 'bum): na 'jam dang 'dod pa yi/ / srog chags rnam par spangs pa yi// sa gsum yongs su blangs nas su// gcig gis bshang ba'i phyogs su bya// sa yi cha gnyis dag gis kyang // lag
220a1(rgyud 'bum): pa gnyis ni bkru bar bya/ / sngags pas sa dag rtag tu ni// sngar bstan pa dag blang bar bya// 'bad pas rkang g.yon bkru bya ste// de nas g.yas pa bkru bar bya//
220a2(rgyud 'bum): phan tshun nyid du gzhibs nas ni// zlos pas rkang pa bkru bar bya// sngags zlos pas ni gtsang sbra dag/ sngar ni rgya chen bstan pa yin// dri nga med pa'i gtsang sbra yang // thub pas
220a3(rgyud 'bum): sngar ni bstan pa yin/ / sngags zlos pa yi gtsang sbra ni// 'dir ni mdor bsdus bstan pa yin// dri ma bral ba'i gtsang sbra yi// gtsang sbra nyid ni rtag tu bya// rgyud rnams kun
220a4(rgyud 'bum): la snang ba zhes/ / thub pa'i dbang pos gsungs pa yin// de nas zlos pas nye reg bya// sdom can gyis grub las kyang bya// sngags bstan pa yi cho ga yis// ying ni nang gi dag/
220a5(rgyud 'bum): pa yin// rgyud rnams kun la bsngags pa yis// gtsang sbra lnga yi cho ga gsungs// lus kyi ngag dang ngag dag dang // yid kyi dag pa yin par bstan// bzhi pa bden pa'i dag pa
220a6(rgyud 'bum): ste/ chu yi dag pa lnga par bshad// bden pa'i chos can khro ba thul// de nyid shes shing bstan bcos mthong // phra ba'i de nyid don la mkhas// sngags shes las la grags pa dang //
220a7(rgyud 'bum): phyi dang nang la mkhas pa dag/ de la dngos grub rnyed mi dka'// bden pa'i chos ni rnam spangs pa'i// brdzun gyi tshig ni sgra mi bya// de nyid thams cad rnam spangs pa'i// ma rungs
220b1(rgyud 'bum): rab tu ma rungs dang / / rnam par dngangs dang 'khrug bcas dang // rtsub dang gnad rnams smra ba dang // bden pa'i chos ni rnam nyams pa// sems can gzhan la gnod byed pa// phra/
220b2(rgyud 'bum): ma nyon mongs can sems dang // chos kun rnam par spangs pa dang // rtag tu 'tshe ba'i bdag nyid dang // khrims 'chal chos min spyod pa dang // zlos pa'i sngags pas rtag tu
220b3(rgyud 'bum): spangs/ / grong gi chos dang de bzhin no// khro ba log par byung ba yi// 'jig rten pha rol 'jigs rnams la// sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' dang // blo ldan rnams kyis yongs
220b4(rgyud 'bum): su smad/ / rtag tu rang rgyal bse ru dang // nyan thos kyis kyang rtag tu smad// brdzun pa de bzhin 'jig rten na// sa steng grub pa 'dod rnams la'o// brdzun pa nye bar smra ba dag/
220b5(rgyud 'bum): shin tu mi bzad dmyal bar 'gro// de bzhin dud 'gro yi dgas dang // gshin rje'i 'jig rten rtag tu 'gro// brdzun ni nye bar smra ba yis// der ni rtag tu gnas pa yin// blo ngan
220b6(rgyud 'bum): mi bzad ltung ba yin/ / thig nag rab tu tsha ba dang // yang sos ral gri'i lo ma dang // de bzhin shal ma li nags su// brdzun smra ba yi gang zag ni// bskal pa mang por der
220b7(rgyud 'bum): gnas so/ / log par smra bar gyur pa dang // rmongs pas log par brjed pa yin// 'byung po rnams la slu byed la// de la sngags 'grub ga la yod// des na rmongs pa'i las de yis//
221a1(rgyud 'bum): sngags ni 'grub par ma mthong nas// 'di skad kyi ni tshig smra ba// sngags la grub pa med do zhes// de skad kyi ni tshig smras pa// gang gis sangs rgyas bstan
221a2(rgyud 'bum): pa 'di/ / sa steng 'dir ni spangs pa yin// bskal pa bye ba mang por yang // de la grub pa ga la yod// des na mi bzang dmyal bar 'tshed// mnar med 'jigs pa chen po dang //
221a3(rgyud 'bum): yang sos dang ni thig nag dang // rab tu tsha ba'i dmyal bar ni// dam pa'i chos la brnyas pa yis// der ni bskal pa chen por gnas// gang yang dmyal ba mi bzad par//
221a4(rgyud 'bum): byis pa'i skye bo 'tshed byed pa// dam pa'i chos la brnyas byed dang // zhe sdang mun pas bsgribs pa'o// mi shes byis pa'i ngo bo'am// rmongs pa log pa'i nga rgyal gyis// rig
221a5(rgyud 'bum): pa'i rgyal po brnyas byed pa/ / mi bzang dmyal bar 'gyur ba yin// de bas sdig pa mi bya zhing // log par smra ba'ang smad pa dang // dam pa'i chos kyang mi brnyas shing // lta ba
221a6(rgyud 'bum): log pa'ang smad par bya/ / de bas rtag tu dang gyur nas// sngags kyi cho ga rtag tu bsten// chos shes bden par smra ba dang // sems can rnams la phan par dga'// sngags dang
221a7(rgyud 'bum): sngags shes bsten gyur pa/ / nges par de la grub pa yin// mchog dang bar ma tha ma las// rnam pa sna tshogs las byed de// las ni byabs byed pa ste// bya ba mi byed rtag tu
221b1(rgyud 'bum): ni khya ba las ni ldan pa las/ / rtag tu de las grub par 'gyur// bya phyir las rnams thams cad phyir// las phyir rtag tu bya ba yin// bya ba'i don du bya ba min// bya ba las la
221b2(rgyud 'bum): sbyar ba yin/ / don bcas nyid kyi bya ba la// bya ba nyid kyis rtag tu bya// bya ba la sa dang 'bras bu nyid// bya ba las 'bras rtag tu bya// 'bras med pa las 'bras 'byung zhing //
221b3(rgyud 'bum): 'bras bu nyid kyang rtag 'bras 'gyur// 'bras med 'bras bur bcas pa yang // thams cad 'bras bu kho nar 'gyur// yang dag ldan pas sngags grub ste// yang dag ldan pas
221b4(rgyud 'bum): sngags grub pa'o/ / ldan pas rnam par bral ba ni// mi ldan ldan pa grub pa min// bsgrub bya sgrub pa med pa ni// de la grub pa mi'i grub bo// grub pa'i rdzas ni thams cad kyang /
221b5(rgyud 'bum): grub pa'i rgyu dang 'gal ba yin// sngags pa ma grub sgrub byed pa// sngags ni sgrub par byed pa yin// byed pa rab 'dod las yin te// las la 'dod pa bya bar 'dod// las
221b6(rgyud 'bum): min las ni thams cad la/ / las kyi rgyur ni mi bya'o// sngags dang rgyud kyi don ldan pa'o// 'bras bcas las ni brtsam par bya// brtsam pa'i las ni brtsam par bya// las med
221b7(rgyud 'bum): nyid la brtsam mi bya/ / ma brtsams bya ba'i sngags rnams ni// lus can kun la 'grub mi 'gyur// sems can kun la thugs brtse bas// thub pa mchog gis sngon gsungs pa//
222a1(rgyud 'bum): sngags ni rgyu yi sgo dganas// rgyal ba'i sras la dam tshig bshad// sgrub pa sngags ni kun shes shing // sngags kyi rgyal po mchog 'di ni// sngags kyi tshul
222a2(rgyud 'bum): du bstan pa yin/ / yang dag rdzogs lam rgyud yin pas// gang du rigs pa rtags yod la// sngags rnam tha yang 'grub par 'gyur// dus ni ring por mi thogs par/
222a3(rgyud 'bum): mkhas pa'i grub pa thob pa yin// 'byung po rnams la ni don du// rdzogs sangs rgyas kyis rab tu bstan// lam yang sngags kyi tshul gyis ni// mya ngan 'das grong 'gro ba yin// /
222a4(rgyud 'bum): de bzhin rtag tu byang chub lam// las don thams cad rdzogs par byed// de yi mthar thug dpung gnyen ni// dang po'i gnas ni sangs rgyas nyid// de bzhin 'bad med grub pa ni// /
222a5(rgyud 'bum): 'di las 'bras bcas thob pa yin// sna tshogs las dang las shes yin// sngags bzlas dag ni byed par 'gyur// tshul khrims bsam gtan rnam thar rnams// mdor bsdus
222a6(rgyud 'bum): 'di yis thob pa ste/ / don kun sgrub byed grub pa ste// rgyal ba mchog gis gsungs pa yin// nor rnams rgyas par thob 'gyur te// dam pa'i 'gro bar gnas pa dang // de bzhin
222a7(rgyud 'bum): rtag tu gnod sbyin spyan/ / lha mi rgyal srid byed par 'gyur// mi lha lha min 'jig rten gyi// de bzhin bdag po thob gyur te// bdag po ma lus de dag gis// sngags pas thams
222b1(rgyud 'bum): cad thob pa dang / / 'bras bcas bya ba byed par 'gyur// gtsang sbra'i spyod dang ldan pa dang // tshul khrims bsam gtan rtag tu dga'// rgyud rnams kun las gsungs pa yi//
222b2(rgyud 'bum): sngags pas rtag tu bzlas pa bya// sngag pa 'byor pa 'dod pa yis// las rnams sna tshogs bya ba ste// de bzhin mchog dang bar ma dang // tha ma nyid kyang bya ba yin// thams
222b3(rgyud 'bum): longs spyod 'phel ba'i gnas/ / 'bring gis gong ma'i lus thob cing // mchog gis rab tu 'gro ba ste// zlos par rtag tu thob par 'gyur// sngags pas zlos mtha' ngal bso
222b4(rgyud 'bum): zhing / / dzaM srid dus su bsdad par bya// zlos pa dus la bab pa na// der ni bsgrub par bya ba yin// de lha mod kyi de la sngags pas las rnams sgrub pa na der rtag tu bzlas na/ skyes bu
222b5(rgyud 'bum): rnams kyi sdig pa zad par byed cing las rnam pa sna tshogs skye ba brgyud pa dag tu gang du gang byas pa de dag la grub pa gnas par nam zhig 'gyur zhe na/ skyes bus ji srid tshogs pa rnying pa
222b6(rgyud 'bum): na sngags pa'i ngo bos sngags bzlas pa na sdig pa zad pa'i don dang / / las bsrabs pas sngags 'grub par 'gyur te/ de bzhin du mchog dang / bar ma dang / za ma dang /
222b7(rgyud 'bum): 'jig rten gyis mchod pa dang / bzlas pas sdig pa mtha' dag zang bar byed cing lus can thams cad kyi skye ba brgyud padag tu gang bras pa'i sdig pa de thams cad 'jig par
223a1(rgyud 'bum): byed de/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi sngags bab+hAs na lus rgyan rnam pa sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa yid dga' zhing yon tan thams cad kyis grags par 'gyur ba
223a2(rgyud 'bum): dang / gnod sbyin gyi tshogs kyi rgyal po nyid dang / rtag tu don thams cad thob pa dang ldan pa yin no// byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod phal po che theg pa chen po shin tu rgyas pa'i mdo
223a3(rgyud 'bum): las/ 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi rtsa ba'i cho ga rab 'byams las sgrub pa'i thabs kyi las kyi gnas bzhi pa las bzlas pa dang / nges par sdom pa dang / sbyin sreg dang /
223a4(rgyud 'bum): bsam gtan dang / gtsang sbra'i spyod pa dang / las thams cad kyi cho ga sgrub pa'i le'u rab 'byams bcu gcig pa rdzogs so// // de nas bcom ldan 'das
223a5(rgyud 'bum): thub pas thams cad dang ldan pa'i gnas gtsang ma'i gzhal med khang la gzigs nas/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal nyon cig/ khyod
223a6(rgyud 'bum): kyi rig pa'i sngags rjes su spyod pa/ sems can thams cad kyi don la rjes su brtson pa/ sems can rnams gang zlos par byed pa dang / gang gis zlos par byed pa dang
223a7(rgyud 'bum): de'i 'phreng ba'i cho ga de thams cad rgyud thams cad kyi spyi sngags thams cad kyi sgrub pa'i thabs legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung zhig/ de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / 'jam
223b1(rgyud 'bum): dpal gnon nur gyur pas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das legs so legs so// bdag la thugs brtse ba'i don dang / sngags
223b2(rgyud 'bum): thams cad kyi spyod pa dang / dam tshig la zhugs pa rnams kyi sems can rnams kyi slad du de bshad du gsol/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis
223b3(rgyud 'bum): 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ / 'jam dpal nyon cig/ rnam par dbye ba rgya cher bshad par bya ste/ sngags thams cad kyi spyod pa la mngon
223b4(rgyud 'bum): par brtson pa na sems can thams cad kyi don sgrub par byed de/ dang po re zhig sngags su 'gyur ba de gang zhe na/ na maHsarba bud+d+hA nA~M/ a tsin t+yad b+hu ta rU pI NAM/ tad+ya thA/ oM
223b5(rgyud 'bum): ku ru ku ru/ sarba dz+nyAn sA d+ha ya/ sarba duSh+TAM bi mo ha ni ga ga nA ba lam+me bi sho d+ha ya swA hA/ sngags 'dis 'phreng ba thams cad la las byi'o// sbyang ba dang / dgug pa dang / blang ba
223b6(rgyud 'bum): dang / brgyu ba la sogs pa'i las bya'o// dang po 'phreng ba'i shing la ni// sngags kyis lan grangs nyi shu bdun// mngon par bsngags pa byas nas ni// sdom brtson rtag tu bsrung
223b7(rgyud 'bum): ba bya/ / mtshan gcig der ni nyal byas na// rmi lam nang du des mthong ba// mi ma yin gzugs grub pa ni// mi sdug mche ba gtsigs pa'o// sngags pa la ni des smras pa// nor
224a1(rgyud 'bum): ni ci 'dod khyer cig ces/ / sgrub byed nang par langs nas ni// shing de las ni 'gro bar byed// sngags pas shing de bor nas ni// gzhan dag tu ni 'gro byed
224a2(rgyud 'bum): na/ mi sdug gzugs ni 'jigs byed pa// rmi lam du yang mthong mi 'gyur// dang po ru drA kA yin te/ in drA kA ni gnyis pa yin// tham po de ci yin la// gzhan yang
224a3(rgyud 'bum): 'bras bu yod pa'o/ / shing la legs par 'dzegs mkhas pa'i// grogs dang lhan cig 'dzegs par bya// grogs po med par gyur na ni// rang nyid de la 'dzegs par bya//
224a4(rgyud 'bum): steng gi yal ga'i 'bras gnas su// sdom brtson brtul zhugs can 'dzegs te// rtag tu de la bag yod pas// steng gi yal ga la byung nas// yal ga'i steng gi 'bras blangs
224a5(rgyud 'bum): te/ steng gi las la sbyar bar bya// steng gi grub pa mchog tu ni// gang zag mchog gis gsungs pa yin// bar ma bar ma'i grub pa ste// grub pa tha ma 'ang tha ma yin// rtag tu srog
224a6(rgyud 'bum): chags ma zos pa'i/ / 'bras bu yang dag blang bar bya// nub kyi yal ga las thob pa// rdzas kyi rgyur ni grub pa yin// byang gi gnod sbyin la sogs dang // lha rnams rtag tu 'gugs
224a7(rgyud 'bum): par byed/ / skad cig 'gugs par byed bstan pa'i// 'byung ba thams cad ni phyir dang // lha dang lha min dri za dang // mi 'am ci dang srin po rnams// dbang du bya ba'i las byed de//
224b1(rgyud 'bum): 'byung po kun yang rgyas par byed// dong yon las ni byed pa ste// las rnams sna tshogs ma lus byed// shar phyogs la la ga las skyes shing // yang dag 'byung ba'i 'bras bu ni//
224b2(rgyud 'bum): de tshe 'bad med byas gyur nas// tshe ni ring ba'i rgyu yang yin// rtag tu sngags grub 'bras bu ni// rnam pa sna tshogs byed pa yin// gang zhig lhor ni 'gro ba yin// yal ga
224b3(rgyud 'bum): lo mar rab ldan pa'i/ / sngags pas de ni 'bad de spang // sems can rnams kyi srog 'phrog byed// lhor sten pa yi yal ga dang // 'bras bu gang dag skyes pa ni// blangs na
224b4(rgyud 'bum): gdung byed dgra rnams kyis/ / srog ni 'jig par byed pa yin// zlos pas 'bad de spang bar bya// bsod nams ma yin mang po'i rgyu// yal ga 'og tu 'phyang gnas la// 'bras bu
224b5(rgyud 'bum): gang zhig rab bsgrags pa/ / lha min bu mo gnas pa yi// sa yi 'og tu 'gro bar 'gyur// de yi 'bras bu'i 'phreng ba ni// blangs nas 'og tu 'gro bstan pa// sa yi 'og tu gnas
224b6(rgyud 'bum): par ni/ / des na de ni 'gro bar byed// der bzhugs lnga yi bde ba ni// zlos pas thob par 'gyur ba yin// lha min bu mo chags bzhin du// bsgral par de ni gnas par byed//
224b7(rgyud 'bum): me tog 'phreng ba kun blangs nas// de nas zlos pa slar log bya// grogs dang lhan cig bsrung byas nas// de nas ji ltar bde bar 'gro// gnas nas thag ring song nas ni// de bzhin gtsang
225a1(rgyud 'bum): phyogs cho ga bzhin/ / de nas sngags pa rtag tu 'dug/ 'phreng ba yongs su sbyang bar bya// brtson pa'i 'phreng ba'i 'bras blangs/ kun nas yongs su dag byas nas/
225a2(rgyud 'bum): sngags pa bzang pos 'phreng ba dbug/ gsum bdun brgyad dang gcig gam ni// nyi shu dang ni rtse gcig tu// sngags kyi de nyid shes pas bkru// snga ma'i sngags kyis rtag tu yang //
225a3(rgyud 'bum): bdun nam brgyad du bzlas pa bya// de nas de dag dag par 'dod// de nas dag par yang dag 'dod// pad+ma'i rtsa lag dag las ni// bu mos bkal ba'i skud pa dag/ gsum dang lnga
225a4(rgyud 'bum): lnga pa byas pa yi/ / sdom can gyis ni 'phreng skud bya// sngags kyi de nyid shes pas brgyu// 'bru ni phra zhing shin tu zlum// rtag tu srog chags bu ga med// legs 'jam smad pa'ang/
225a5(rgyud 'bum): med pa yin// mdzes dang kha dog mdzes pa dang // de bzhin gas med bu ga med// ru drA kA dang bi de tse// in drA kA yi 'bras bu nyid// rtag tu lung tang mdzes pa dang //
225a6(rgyud 'bum): gzhan yang 'bras bu 'dod pa dag/ 'bad pa yis ni 'phreng ba dag/ sngags pas brtson byas de tshe brgyu// gser ram yang na dngul dag gam// nor bu shel las byas pa dang //
225a7(rgyud 'bum): dung dang mu sa ra dag dang // mu tiH/ las kyang bya ba yin// bru ru rnam pa sna tshogs kyi// 'phreng ba dag kyang bya ba yin// gzhan yang rin chen bzang po yis// 'phreng ba legs par
225b1(rgyud 'bum): rab tu bya/ / sa ni rab zlum ril bu dag/ mnyam par bzhag nas skud pas brgyu// gzhan yang ril bu cung zad grang // 'bras bu 'byung khungs dag las bya// ku sha'i rtse mo
225b2(rgyud 'bum): mdud pas kyang / / sngags pas 'bad de bya ba yin// brgya rtsa brgyad ngam nyi shu 'am// lnga bcu nyid ni bar ma yin// sngags pa mnyam par bzhag nas ni// tshad 'dis 'phreng ba
225b3(rgyud 'bum): brgyu ba yin/ / rtsa brgyad stong du bya ba ni// 'phreng ba'i mchog tu bya ba yin// 'phreng ba'i rnam pa 'di bzhi yang // sngags pas rtag tu brgyu ba yin// de ltar brgyu ba byas nas
225b4(rgyud 'bum): mi/ rim pa gsum mam gnyis su bya// lcags zang rang bzhin gdu bur bya// de bzhin gser dngul dag dang ni// de bzhin zangs ma'i gdu bu yis// 'phreng ba kun yang bcing
225b5(rgyud 'bum): bar bya/ / de nas yang mig kun mthar ni// kun la'ang de bzhin gdags par bya// 'bad pas dam du bcings bya ste// ji ltar dam por 'gyur bar ro// yongs su gsal bar
225b6(rgyud 'bum): byas nas ni/ / dkyil 'khor lta bur mthong ba yin// de ltar sbrul gyi gdengs ka ltar// yongs su 'khor bas brgyan pa yin// mu tig 'phreng ba 'dra ba yis// mgul pa brgyan pa
225b7(rgyud 'bum): lta bur bya/ / chu bo dag ni dri med pa'i// chu gtsang dag gis khrus bya zhing / ji ltar go rims khrus byas nas// chu gzhi las ni ldangs nas su// 'bad pas de bzhin nye reg bya/
226a1(rgyud 'bum): 'phreng ba rjes su blangs nas ni// ba yi rnam lngas rab tu bkru// de bzhin sa yi phye ma dang // chu gtsang dag gis rab bkrus te// dri zhim dag gis rjes byugs cing //
226a2(rgyud 'bum): rab tu bsngags pa'i kha dog kyang // tsan dan dkar dang gur kum mo// de nas de bzhin gnyis ka 'gro// 'bad pa yis ni rab tu bkru// de bzhin khrus byas song nas ni// gang na ras
226a3(rgyud 'bum): ris bar ma de/ / rgyal ba gtso bo thub mchog ni// shAkya seng ge mi yi mchog/ de bzhin rtag tu ston pa'i gzugs// sa steng rgyal ba'i ring bsrel can// de yi mdun du 'phreng ba ni//
226a4(rgyud 'bum): de dang nye bar gzhag par bya// de dang nye bar bzhag nas ni// de yi mdun du nyer gnas nas// stong phrag gcig dang brgyad dang ni// brgya dang rtsa brgyad bzlas nas kyang // nyin zhag/
226a5(rgyud 'bum): gcig ni smyung byas te// bdun pa thub la 'phreng ba dbul// lnga pa de bzhin bzlas byas nas// tshad kyang de dang mnyam par bya// de nas 'phreng ba la bzlas nas// de yi mtshan mo
226a6(rgyud 'bum): nyal bar bya/ / ku sha bting ba'i sa la ni// sngags shes der ni nyal bar bya// gal te des ni rmi lam na// dge ba'i rmi lam mthong na ni// 'bras bcas rmi lam ston pa ste//
226a7(rgyud 'bum): de la grub par bstan pa yin// sangs rgyas nyan thos bse ru ni// gal te de yis rmi lam mthong // sngags pa de yi bya ba ni// 'bras bcas nges par 'grub par 'gyur//
226b1(rgyud 'bum): gzhon nu'i gzugs can byis pa ni// rnam pa sna tshogs mdzes mthong ba// gal te rmi lam des mthong dang // 'phreng ba stsol ba'ang de bzhin te// don yod de ni 'grub 'gyur te/
226b2(rgyud 'bum): sngags kyi don rnams grub byed pa'o// byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod theg pa chen po shin tu rgyas pa'i mdo las/ 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi rtsa ba'i cho ga las ras ris bar ma'i cho ga
226b3(rgyud 'bum): rab 'byams las 'phreng ba'i cho ga rab 'byams bcu gnyis pa rdzogs so/ / // de nas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas gzhan yang thams cad dang ldan pa'i gnas
226b4(rgyud 'bum): gtsang ma'i gzhal med khang la gzigs nas/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal khyod kyi sngags mtha' dag rnam par dgod pa'i khyad par gyi cho ga dang /
226b5(rgyud 'bum): sbyin sreg gi las la rab tu sbyor ba'i rig pa sgrub pa yod de/ me la nye bar spyod pa'i khyad par gyi cho ga'i phyir/ gang gis rig pa thams cad kyi spyod pa la mngon par brtson pa'i sems
226b6(rgyud 'bum): can rab tu 'jug cing gnas par 'gyur ro/ / de gang zhe na/ gsang ba'i rig sngags kyi gzhi ni/ 'di lta ste/ oM ut+tiSh+Tha ha ri ping+ga la lo hi tak+Sha/ de hi da dA pa la hUM phaT sarba
226b7(rgyud 'bum): big+h+nAM bi nInA sha ma swA hA/ 'jam dpal 'di ni me'i snying po'i mchog las thams cad byed pa/ 'dod pa thams cad ster bar byed pa yin te/ dang po re zhig sgrub pa pos me'i snying po
227a1(rgyud 'bum): 'di la lan cig bzlas pas sreg blugs gsum gyis me la sbyin sreg byas na me spyad drangs par 'gyur ro/ / de ltar rab tu sbyar na nib dang / rgyas pa dang / drag po'i
227a2(rgyud 'bum): las dag la yam shing rnam pa gsum du 'gyur te/ mya dran med shing ni don du// rlon pa nyid ni rab tu bsngags// mtho gang ngam ni khru gang tsam// sor gsum srid du bya ba yin//
227a3(rgyud 'bum): snum pa'i rnam par rab tu bsngags// cho ga 'di ni bya ba yin// bu gu med cing nang stong min// de bzhin ne tso'i 'dab ma dang // ldang dang dkar ba'i kha dog gam// kha dog nag
227a4(rgyud 'bum): bo spang bar bya/ / srin bu rnams kyis zos pa'ang spang // bu ga yod pa'ang rnam par bzlog/ gzhan yang kha dog rab bsngags min// tha ma nyid kyang rnam par spangs// ha cang
227a5(rgyud 'bum): skam min rlon pa'ang min/ / tshig min las ni brtsam par bya// rul ba dang ni yo ba'ang min// shin tu ring ba'ang spang bar bya// de nas me thab bya ba ni// kun nas gru bzhi bya ba ste//
227a6(rgyud 'bum): 'og nyid du yang brko ba ni// 'bad pas khru ni bzhi yi tshad// khru gsum dang ni khru gnyis dang // de bzhin khru cig chang du bya// rtag tu srog chags spangs pa dang // bye mas
227a7(rgyud 'bum): legs par sbyar ba gang / / de nas par 'dra'i lan kan ni// kun nas dkyil 'khor 'dra ba'o// yang na 'bad pas zur bzhi yang // de bzhin lan kan dbyibs su bya//
227b1(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje'i rnam pa rangadra ba yi// rtse mo gnyis su'ang rtse gsum bya// ma thab kyi ni thad ka la// khru gnyis thang kar bya ba yin// gtsang dang de bzhin gsal ba'i gnas// chu klung de bzhin chu dbus
227b2(rgyud 'bum): dang / shing gcig gi ni phyogs dag dang // dur khrod dang ni khang stong du// sbyin sreg legs par yang dag brtsam// de bzhin ri bo'i rtsa dag tu'o// rtag tu lha khang stong pa dang //
227b3(rgyud 'bum): dgon pa chen po'ang de bzhin no// gang yang sgrub pa'i phyogs dag tu// gang zag mchog gis rab gsungs pa// sbyin sreg gnas ni thams cad la// gnas de dag ni tha na cad gsung //
227b4(rgyud 'bum): ku sha'i khres ni khru gang tsam// de la 'dug par byas nas ni// sngags shes der ni sbyin sreg las// khyad par du yang bya ba yin// gnas de dag la 'dug na ni// myur du 'grub
227b5(rgyud 'bum): par the tsom med/ / shar dang byang du bltas pas kyang // zhi ba dang ni rgyas par bya// lhor bltas na ni drag po'i las// sngags pas de ni spang bar bya// shar du bltas pas zhi ba 'grub//
227b6(rgyud 'bum): byang du bltas pas rgyas pa'o// 'di yis sngags pa dus rtag tu// sngags kyi ngo yang dag brtsams// bil ba p+lag sha n+ya gro d+has// rgyas pa'i las ni yongs su bya// mngon
227b7(rgyud 'bum): spyod shing las bya ba ni/ / dkar dang tsha dang skyur dang rno// de dag thams cad spang bya ste// thub pa rnams kyis rtag tu bkag/ zhi dang rgyas pa'i las la ni// shing rlon dag ni rab tu
228a1(rgyud 'bum): bsngags/ / drag po'i las la shing skam ste// thub pa rnams kyis rtag tu spangs// yam shing de dag med na ni// tha mal shing dag kun tu brtag/ gnyis
228a2(rgyud 'bum): ka'i rtse mor bya ba ni/ / ku shas kun tu yang dag dkri// sngo dang snum pa 'dra ba dang // rma bya'i mgrin pa 'dra ba dang // de 'dra'i ku shas rtag tu ni// ni ba dang ni rgyas nga bya// margad
228a3(rgyud 'bum): rnam pa 'dra ba dang / / rtswa skam gyis ni rtag tu yang // sdig pa'i las rnams bya ba yin// 'dir ni thub pa mchog gis bkag/ dri med chu ni yongs dag pa// srog chags dag gis
228a4(rgyud 'bum): rtag spangs pa/ / des ni kun nas gtor byas nas// g.yas phyogs su ni bskor byas te// sdom brtson gyis ni me spar bya// cho ga ji bzhin nye reg bya// gtsang ba'i rtswa yi rtsa bas ni//
228a5(rgyud 'bum): me sgron tshad dang ldan byas nas// de nas chang par bcangs na ni// 'bad pas me ni spar bar bya// kha yi rlung gis mi bya ste// rtag tu gos kyi mthas kyang min// sham thabs bla
228a6(rgyud 'bum): gos rnam par spangs/ / gos gzhan dag ni bkag ma yin// shin tu drag pas de mi bya// gnod par dga' bas ma yin na// rlung yab gtsang dang de bzhin gos// khoms
228a7(rgyud 'bum): kyang ni rlung yab bya/ / rlung gis khyad du mi gsod pa// me ni rab tu sang byas nas// sngags shes pas ni me sbar te// sbyin sreg don du legs mnyam gzhag/ lag pa de
228b1(rgyud 'bum): ni g.yon pa yis/ / lan gsum bar du chus gtor nas// der ni ba yi mar gyis ni// sreg blugs gsum ni des sbyin bya// de nas kyang ni phyag bya ste// sangs rgyas kun
228b2(rgyud 'bum): dang skyob pa dang / / rang sngags sngags kyi mgon po la// de nas ci 'dod phyag bya'o// de tshe mi yi snying po yis// sngags kyi sa lan bdun rtag bzlas pa'i// dri zhim me
228b3(rgyud 'bum): tog dag gis ni/ / sdom brtson me ni spyan drang bya// sngags shes rtag tu spyan drangs nas// mkhas pas gnas ni sbyin par bya// gdan dang gnas ni sbyin byed na'ang // de ni
228b4(rgyud 'bum): sngags yin gzhan pas min/ / zho dang mor gyis sbags pa dang // sbrang rtsi'i brtags pa'i yam shing gis// rgyas po'i las ni bya ba'i phyir// sngags kyis kun tu sbyin sreg bya//
228b5(rgyud 'bum): mar dang sbrang rtsir ldan pa'am// yang na zho dang ldan pa yi// yam shing rdzas dang ldan pa yi// gnyis ka la gnas de tshe bya// stong ngam yang na 'bum mam ni// yang na brgya
228b6(rgyud 'bum): rtsa brgyad du brtag/ de tshe sngags pas sngags bzung nas// lan re bzlas shing me la dor// 'bar ba'i me yi 'phreng ba 'am// de bzhin me lce gcig gyur la// zhi ba'i
228b7(rgyud 'bum): las kyi sbyin sreg bya/ / ngung pa med la rgyas pa'ang bya// dud bcas drag po'i las la bya// de ni rgyal bas smad cing spangs// gal te me ni mdog ldan na// sbyin sreg las
229a1(rgyud 'bum): ni rab tu sbyar/ / zhi la kha dog dkar po ni// rgyal ba mchog gis rtag tung sngags// gal te me dkar sbyin sreg byas// der ni sngags rnams 'grub par 'gyur/
229a2(rgyud 'bum): de bzhin rtag tu mdog dmar la// rgyas par grub par 'dod pa yin// nag dang du ba'i kha dog dang // ser skya la ni sdig ldan pas// kha dog rnam gsum bstan pas ni// rnam
229a3(rgyud 'bum): gsum grub pa 'di dag yin/ / mdog gzhan sprin gyi kha dog gam// rnam pa sna tshogs mdog ldan pa// sa steng 'di la sngags rnams ni// grub pa yod pa ma yin no// de 'dra'i
229a4(rgyud 'bum): kha dog 'dra ba'am/ / rnam pa sna tshogs mdog ldan pa'i// me ni 'bar ba de mthong na// las kyi sbyor ba'ang brtsam par bya// gal te sngags ni grub 'dod na// phyi rol me ni spar
229a5(rgyud 'bum): bar bya/ / cho ga mthong ba'i las kyis ni// phyir yang sbyin sreg rab tu bya// me yi sngags ni zlos pa yi so// gshegs gsol spyan drung nyid kyang bya// dkyil 'khor 'dir ni tshe
229a6(rgyud 'bum): ga sbyin/ / sngar ni rab tu brtags pa yis// de nyid kyis ni sbyin sreg bya// gshegs gsol spyan drang la sogs pa'ang // de nyid kyi ni las dag gis// las rnams thams cad
229a7(rgyud 'bum): nyid kyang bya/ / me yi las dang de bzhin gzugs// ras ris mdun du brtsam byas na// der ni sngags rnams 'grub 'gyur zhes// sngon gyi bde gshegs rnams kyis gsungs// rgyal
229b1(rgyud 'bum): bas bsngags pa'i las rnams dag/ der ni rnam pa kun tu byas// sdig pa dag ni khyad par du// gang yang rgyal bas smad pa dang // 'jig rten 'gro bas snang ba dag/ gzhan gyis
229b2(rgyud 'bum): smad parang bya ba min/ / 'khor los sgyur bzang nyid dang ni// byang chub sems dpa'i sa thob dang // de bzhin mngon shes lnga thob dang // de nas lha nyid thob pa'o// ras ris la rtag
229b3(rgyud 'bum): brtson zhing shes/ / sbyin sreg las la 'jigs meng dang // sa 'og gi ni bdag po'am// yang na bar snang spyod par 'gyur// sa bdag lha dang gnod sbyin nyid// rtag tu gnod
229b4(rgyud 'bum): sbyin mo 'gugs byed/ / rgyal srid bdag po nyid dang ni// yul nyid dang ni grong dag dang // rig pa 'dzin dang lha min nyid// sems can thams cad dbang du byed// bdag nyid
229b5(rgyud 'bum): tshe dang sems can che/ / 'byung po rnams ni 'gugs par byed// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' che// sa bcu la ni yang dag gnas// sbyin sreg las kyis 'gugs byed na//
229b6(rgyud 'bum): sa steng mi rnams smos ci dgos// sde dpon dag dang de bzhin du// khyad par 'jig rten dbang phyug 'gyur// dbang 'gyur cig car 'byung po kun// de bzhin mi yi dbang po nyid//
229b7(rgyud 'bum): sems can kun la dbang don dang // yang na rgyal po dbang du 'gyur// de bzhin rtag tu las kun la// sbyin sreg gis ni kun tu bya// thams cad kun la brtson bdag nyid/
230a1(rgyud 'bum): las kun las nI bsten byas na// de ni nges par 'grub 'gyur te// las dge'i don ni dam pa yin// bar ma nyid kyang 'grub par 'gyur// tha ma'i las kyang
230a2(rgyud 'bum): de bzhin no/ / rdzas rnams dag ni de bzhin du// grub dang ldan pa'ang rnam pa gsum// 'bras dang bcas par grub snang ste// sbyin sreg las la rab tu bstan// phyag rgya gtsug
230a3(rgyud 'bum): bud lnga bcings nas/ / sngags kyang sgra can mas byas nas// las rnams kun ni bya ba dang // sngags pas bdag nyid bsrung bar bya// sbyin sregA las la rab 'jug pas//
230a4(rgyud 'bum): de nas sngags 'di brjod par bya// bdun nam brgyad du bzlas pa yis// las 'di la ni rtag tu bya// na maHsarba bud+d+ha bo d+hi satwA nA~M/ a pra ti ha ta ga tI ga tA nAM/ tad+ya thA/ oM dz+wa la tiSh+Tha
230a5(rgyud 'bum): hUM ru ru bi shwa saM b+hA ba saM b+ha be swA hA/ sngags kyi sbyor ba 'di yis ni// yang dang yang du shing la bzla// gnyis sam bdun du bzlas pi yis// sngags rigs des ni sbyin sreg bya/
230a6(rgyud 'bum): me tog bdug pa dri yang rung // ma lus thams cad dag dang ni// chu la sngags rnams bzlas pa la// 'di nyid kyis ni sbyin par bya// las rnams kun gyi rgyu yi phyir// de nas cho ga brtsam
230a7(rgyud 'bum): par bya/ / las rnams dag ni thams cad la// snga ma'i sbyor ba nyid kyis bya// snga ma'i gtsug phung lnga bcings te// phyag rgya chen por grags ldan ma// snga ma'i gtsug pung lnga bcing bya/
230b1(rgyud 'bum): sgra can ma nyid rab bzlas pas// des na bsrung ba byas par 'gyur// grub pa'i rgyu la 'jigs med pas// las rnams thams cad brtsam par bya// gal te la nye bzang po 'am//
230b2(rgyud 'bum): rtag tu dge ba'i sgra thos na// de la sngags ni don yod de// ji ltar 'dod bzhin mchog stsol 'gyur// dang po'i las la rab sbyor dang // sngags kyi rgyu la rab 'jug na// thams
230b3(rgyud 'bum): cad 'bras bu bcas pa dang / / de la grub par brjod pa yin// rgyal sgra rnga nyid paT ha// rnga bo che yi sgra dag ni// brtson byas grub pa ma lus 'gyur// sbyin sreg las la yang
230b4(rgyud 'bum): dag bsten/ / gzhan yang la nye bzang po dang // 'dab chags dge ba'i sgra dag dang // rnam pa sna tshogs nges pa'i sgra// rgyal ba rnams kyis bsngags pa dang // bkra shis/
230b5(rgyud 'bum): bzang po rab bsdigs dang // rnam pa sna tshogs yid 'ong sgra// gdugs dang rgyal mtshan ba dan dang // bud med rgyan gyis brgyan pa dang // de bzhin mchod yon bum pa gang // /
230b6(rgyud 'bum): mthong na grub pa'i rgyu rnams yin// rnam pa du ma'i kha dog gam// 'jig rten gyis mchong rab bsngags pa// de dag mthong na grub 'gyur ba// sngags rnams du ma'i spyod yul
230b7(rgyud 'bum): yin/ / byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod phal po che theg pa chen po shin tu rgyas pa'i mdo las// 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi rtsa ba'i cho ga bcu gsum pa ste sbyin sreg gi cho ga rab 'byams
231a1(rgyud 'bum): rdzogs so/ / // de nas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas gzhan yang gnas gtsang ma'i gzhal med khang la gzigs te/ 'jam dpal
231a2(rgyud 'bum): gzhon nur gyur pa la bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal khyod kyi gsang ba'i rig pa yod de/ sngags thams cad kyi sgrub pa po'i thabs de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis yang dag par rjes
231a3(rgyud 'bum): su gnang ba/ chos kyi mdzod las byung ba/ chos kyi sprin gyi rjes su zhugs pa/ nam mkha'i ngo bo nyid 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i sngags thams cad kyi mnga' bdag
231a4(rgyud 'bum): shin tu gtso bor gyur pa/ gzhon nu ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa ni sems can thams cad kyi mchog tu brjod de/ shin tu gtso bor gyur cing dam pa yin la/ lha dang mi rnams kyi skyes
231a5(rgyud 'bum): bu khyu mchog sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das yin no/ / gzhon nu de bzhin du rig pa'i rgyal po 'di ni sngags thams cad kyi mchog tu bstan cing shin tu gtso bo yin te/ de bzhin gshegs pa
231a6(rgyud 'bum): gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das brjod du med pa dag gis sngon gsungs so/ / de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen tog gi snying po mchog tu gsang ba/ kun nas bkra
231a7(rgyud 'bum): shis par 'dod pa/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyis yang dag par bstod pa/ rab tu bsngags pa/ sems can thams cad yang dag par dbugs 'byin pa/ sdig pa thams cad rab
231b1(rgyud 'bum): tu 'jig par byed pa/ 'dod pa thams cad sbyin par byed pa/ re ba yongs su rdzogs par byed pa de'ang gang zhe na/ bar 'dir bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas smin mtshams kyi mdzod spu
231b2(rgyud 'bum): nas sangs rgyas thams cad yang dag par bskul ba zhes bya ba'i 'od zer phyung bar gyur to/ / gang 'di phyogs bcu steng 'og thams cad dang ldan pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing snang bas khyab
231b3(rgyud 'bum): par mdzad de/ sems can thams cad kyi yid tshim par mdzad nas slar log ste/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i dbu'i gtsug tor du nub par gyur to// bcom ldan 'das
231b4(rgyud 'bum): kyi gtsug tor nas kun nas 'bar ba'i 'od dang ldan pa'i lus can blta bar mi nus pa/ sems can thams cad kyis mi thub pa/ 'od chen po yang dag par 'phags pa//
231b5(rgyud 'bum): 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyis lus brgyan pa/ rnam pa sna tshogs kyi gzugs dang ldan pa/ 'khor los sgyur ba chen po'i gzugs can rig pa'i rgyal po yi ge gcig pa zhes bya ba
231b6(rgyud 'bum): byung bar gyur to/ / byung nas nam mkha'i dkyil thams cad snang bar byas te/ rig pa'i rgyal po thams cad kyis yongs su bskor ba/ rig pa du ma bye ba khri phrag brgya stong
231b7(rgyud 'bum): 'byin par byed pa/ yi ge gcig pa'i sgra 'don cing 'od zer chen po 'bar ba rab tu 'byin pa/ steng gi phyogs nas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa la mngon du blta ba dang / thams cad dang ldan
232a1(rgyud 'bum): pa'i gnas gtsang ma'i gzhal med khang gi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor chen po'ang snang bar byas nas bar snang la gnas par gyur to/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas/
232a2(rgyud 'bum): yi ge gcig pa'i rig pa'i 'khor los sgyur ba de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po/ de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen tog ces bya ba'i snying po mchog tu gsang ba/ de bzhin gshegs
232a3(rgyud 'bum): pa thams cad las bcom ldan 'das rin chen tog gi sa yang dag par thob pa/ sa la'i dbang po'i rgyal po dang / 'od dpag med dang / bsnyen par dka' ba dang / spyan bzang dang /
232a4(rgyud 'bum): tog bzang dang / me tog dbang po dang / gnyid mthar phyin dang / 'jig rten thub pa dang / gser thub la sogs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis gsungs shing rjes su yi rang ba
232a5(rgyud 'bum): dang / 'das pa'i yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyis kyang gsungs shing rjes su yi rang ba de'ang gang zhe na/ tad+ya thA/ oM b+h+rUM/ 'jam dpal 'di ni snying po dam pa/
232a6(rgyud 'bum): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchog/ sngags thams cad kyi rig pa'i 'khor los sgyur ba yi ge gcig pa zhes bya ba dag byed chen po 'di yang dag par bsgrubs na sngags thams cad
232a7(rgyud 'bum): 'grub par 'gyur te/ gzhon nu gang yang khyod kyi cho ga'i rgyal po'i mchog la sngags thams cad dang rjes su mthun pa/ mchog tu gsang ba'i mchog yang dag par rjes su gnang ba
232b1(rgyud 'bum): las kyi sgrib pa thams cad yang dag par sbyong bar byed pa/ dang po re zhig sgrub pa pos nges par 'bum phrag gsum bzlas brjod bya'o// de nas las rnams sngags dang bcas pa 'dir
232b2(rgyud 'bum): gzhon nu khyod kyis cho ga'i rgyal po la 'jig rten dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i sngags dang rgyud rnams bsgrub par bya'o// 'dis bsrung ba byas na 'byung po thams cad kyis tshug
232b3(rgyud 'bum): par mi 'gyur ro/ / 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i bgegs thams cad kyis zil gyis non par mi 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas de gsungs ma thag tu stong gsum
232b4(rgyud 'bum): gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di thams cad rnam pa drug tu g.yos par gyur te/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du'ang snang bas khyab cing / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das cad kyang
232b5(rgyud 'bum): 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor der 'dus par gyur te/ gnas gtsang ma'i gzhal med khang du 'khod par gyur to// sa bcu thob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang / bla na med pa yang
232b6(rgyud 'bum): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang / rdzu 'phrul chen po dang ldan pa'i sems can thams cad dang / rig
232b7(rgyud 'bum): pa'i rgyal po rnams 'od zer gyis yang dag par bskul nas lhags par gyur to/ / 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas mu med pa dag na rnam par gnas pa'i sems can mang po dbang du gyur
233a1(rgyud 'bum): to/ / dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro dang / yi dgas kyi ngan 'gro la gnas pa rnams 'od zer chen po'i snang bas reg cing snang bar byas pas sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba'i rgyud
233a2(rgyud 'bum): la gnas pa yid shin tu bde bas tsham zhing skyo ba med par gyur te/ nges par theg pa gsum la gnas par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor de la
233a3(rgyud 'bum): gzigs nas/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal nyon cig/ rig pa'i rgyal po 'di rdzu 'phrul che ba/ dpa' bo gcig pu las thams cad
233a4(rgyud 'bum): byed pa/ rig pa thams cad kyi rgyal po 'khor los sgyur ba/ sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa yongs su rdzogs par mdzad pa/ cho ga zhib mo thams cad yongs su rgyas
233a5(rgyud 'bum): pa/ khyod kyi sngags dang / rgyud dang / cho ga ri ba 'byams la yang dag par zhugs pa/ sngags thams cad sgrub par byed pa/ thun mong du gyur pa/ grags pa che ba dang /
233a6(rgyud 'bum): spro ba che ba dang / sems can sgrub pa po'i khyad par gyi thabs dang shes rab la mkhas pa/ byang chub kyi lam thams cad yongs su sbyong bar byed pa/ mya ngan las 'das pa la rab tu
233a7(rgyud 'bum): 'jug par byed pa/ bdud zil gyis gnon par byed pa/ byang chub kyi snying po la gnas par byed pa/ dge ba'i tshogs yang dag par 'byung bar byed pa'o// 'di nyid
233b1(rgyud 'bum): mdor bsdu na cho ga zhib mo rgyas pa ra sa ris kyi cho ga'i dkyil 'khor sgrub pa'i thabs sngon gyi sngags kyi spyod pa rjes su spyod pa gang la rab tu gnas na/ sems can gyi rig pa'i rgyal po 'khor
233b2(rgyud 'bum): los sgyur ba chen po sgrub par gyur te/ smad du byung ba chen po sngags thams cad kyi dbang phyug dam pa/ 'od byed pa thams cad kyi bsam pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa/ rnam par 'dren pa/
233b3(rgyud 'bum): 'gro ba thams cad la phan par byed pa/ sangs rgyas bzhin du mngon sum du nye bar bzhugs pa/ rang byung du gyur pa/ mchog dang / bar ma dang / tha ma'i las thams cad byed pa//
233b4(rgyud 'bum): shin tu bde ba dam pa/ shis pa dang zhi bar byed pa/ sdig pa thams cad rab tu 'jig par byed pa'o// lha rnams kyi yang lha nyid de// thub pa rnams kyi thub pa mchog/ sangs rgyas
233b5(rgyud 'bum): nyi ma'i gnyen gyur pa/ / dag pa 'jig rten rnam par grags// chos kun rang gi ngo bo mkhyen// yang dag mthar gyur rnyog pa med// de yi cho ga mchog bshad bya// 'byor pa 'dod/
233b6(rgyud 'bum): pas mnyan par gyis// re zhig dang po ras bzang po skyon rnams dang ma 'dres pa gsar pa phra ba'i khyad par dang ldan pa kha tshar dang bcas pa nyid la bri bar bya'o// chur ni khru do'i tshed yin la//
233b7(rgyud 'bum): zheng du khru gang tshad du bya// de 'dra'i bzang po kho na la// dri med blta na sdug pa dang // bcos bu dkar po de bzhin du// phra dang legs bkrus ras bal spangs// phyag dar dri ma med
234a1(rgyud 'bum): pa yi/ / du gu la yi ras nyid la// rgyu ni shing kun nyid dang ni// dgal rgyud ni rnam spangs pa// chu ngan las ni bkrus min dang // skye bos zhal mthong phul ba'ang
234a2(rgyud 'bum): min/ / ma gos pa dang de bzhin du// gzhan yang cung zad dam pas bsngags// de 'dra'i ras ni bzang po la// gzhal med khang ni bri bar bya// 'od kyi dkyil 'khor 'phreng ba
234a3(rgyud 'bum): can/ / ston pa'i gzugs ni yang dag bri// de bzhin gser gyi mdog can ni// 'od zer 'phreng ldan bri bar bya// gcig pu phug na bzhugs pa ni// ri bo la gnas grags pa che//
234a4(rgyud 'bum): dar la'i bla re bre ba ni// rin chen 'phreng ba 'chang ba'o// steng du lha ni gnyis ka yang // 'dzin pa dag ni yang dag bri// ri rnams kyi ni steng dag tu// rin chen 'phreng ba rab tu bya//
234a5(rgyud 'bum): bla re khor yug mu tig gi/ dra ba dra phyed dag gis brgyan// ri rgyal steng du 'bad pa yis// 'di dag thams cad bri bar bya// ri bo dag gi rtsa ba yang // rgya mtsho chen por nub par bya//
234a6(rgyud 'bum): ras ris mthar yang me tog ni// kun nas 'khor ba yang dag bri// nA ga ge sar pu na ka/ ba ku la dang zhu ti ka/ sna ma'i me tog pri yang ku// de bzhin ku ra ba ka dang // ut+pa la
234a7(rgyud 'bum): dang dri mchog dang / / de las gzhan yang pad+ma dkar// me tog rigs ni sna tshogs dang // de bzhin gzhan yang drir ldan pa'i// me tog dag ni 'di dag nyid// gang yang rung brtag
234b1(rgyud 'bum): blangs nas/ / ston pa la ni mchod don du// yid du 'ong ba'i mchod yon dbul// sngar bstan chogs ras ris ni// mchog dang de bzhin gzhan dag kyang // dog pa thag pa dag dang //
234b2(rgyud 'bum): ri mo mkhan yang de bzhin 'dod// cho 'phrul gyi ni zla phyed kyi// nyi ma dge bdag la ni// dus ni de ltar gyur pa la// bzlas pa nyid kyang bya ba yin// 'di la sems can thams cad
234b3(rgyud 'bum): kyis/ sngar bstan bzhin du yang dag spyad// tshon gsal rnam pa sna tshogs kyis// ston pa'i gzugs ni bri bar bya// rnam pa du mar ldan pa yi// dong ka'i me tog mdog
234b4(rgyud 'bum): 'dra dang / / tsam pa ka yi mdog 'dra dang // gser gyi mdog dang 'dra bar bri// de lta'i rnam pa ldan pa yi// rin chen rigs skyes thub pa bri// chags pa chen po rin chen
234b5(rgyud 'bum): tog gtso bo thub mchog dam pa ni/ / chos rnams thams cad yongs thob pa'i// sangs rgyas dkon mchog de bri bya// rin chen ri bor gnas pa dang // rin chen phug gis
234b6(rgyud 'bum): nyer mdzes shing / / skyil krung gis ni bzhugs pa dang // chos ni rjes su 'chad cing stsol// cung zad 'dzum zhing brtan pa dang // thugs ni bsam gtan la dmigs dang //
234b7(rgyud 'bum): phyi rol phug ni yang dag bri// 'og dang de bzhin khor yug tu'o// ras mtha'i zur du sgrub pa pos// pus mo'i lhang yang dag btsugs// bdug spos lag na thogs bzhin du/
235a1(rgyud 'bum): lus ni cung zad 'dud pa dang // bla gos gcig tu byas nas ni// cha byad ji lta bzhin du yang // bcom ldan 'das kyi g.yas phyogs kyi// 'og gi rgya mtsho
235a2(rgyud 'bum): che steng du/ / sngags pas dge ba'i don gyi phyir// sdom brtson rtag tu bri bar bya// las kyi cho ga 'di dag ni// 'jig rten gyis bsngags bstan pa yin// dkyil 'khor de yi
235a3(rgyud 'bum): dag kyang / / de ni rab tu brjod par bya// de tshe sngags pa rig pa'i sngags// de tshe sngags ni rig pa des// sngags la rtag tu bsnyen byas dang // bzlas pa phun sum tshogs mngon shes//
235a4(rgyud 'bum): 'jam dbyangs cho ga 'di la ni// de tshe sngags pa dbang bskur ba// dkyil 'khor rnam pa la mkhas shing // rtag tu gtsang sbra byed pa dang // sngags rnams kun la dbang bskur dang /
235a5(rgyud 'bum): dkyil 'khor 'di la 'jigs pa med// rig pa'i sngag dang sngags bcas dang // bdag nyid bsrung dang phan 'dogs dang // grogs dang de bzhin bsrung shes dang // yongs su legs
235a6(rgyud 'bum): brtags 'od chen ldan/ / slob dpon legs par yang dag rtsom// rtsom zhing sbyangs yon sten pa dang // shes rab che zhing legs 'jam dang // dpal ldan snying rjer rtag tu ldan// grogs
235a7(rgyud 'bum): po dag ni thams cad kyang / / mtshan nyid de bzhin kun tu bstan// gcig gnyis gsum dang de bzhin du// gzhan yang de bzhin brgyad kyi bar// slob ma legs par byang ba bya// mang po
235b1(rgyud 'bum): dag ni spang bar bya/ / sngar bstan cho ga ji lta bar// dkyil 'khor 'di la'ang yang dag spyad// stobs bcu ldan pas dang po ni// dkyil 'khor gang dag rab bstan pa// 'jam pa'i dbyangs
235b2(rgyud 'bum): las gzhan min dang / / rgyu gzhan dag gis bri mi bya// dkyil 'khor 'od chen ldan pa yi// tshad ni rab tu bstan par bya// khru ba ni 'am khru ni gnyis pa dang // de bzhin gzhan
235b3(rgyud 'bum): yang khru brgyad par/ / gtsang ba'i phyogs sam chu klung ngam// khyad par du ni ri bo'i rtser// tshon sna lnga yi phye ma dang // sngar bstan pa yi las kyis so// gru bzhi sgo ni
235b4(rgyud 'bum): bzhi pa dang / / rta babs bzhi yis brgyan pa dang // zur bzhi mnyam zhing bzang ba dang // lha yi rnam pa 'dra ba'i mdog/ tshon rtsi gsal ba sna tshogs dang // mdzes
235b5(rgyud 'bum): pa'i kha dog legs mdzes dang / / dri zhi mo bzang dang gzugs bzang dang // grogs bzang dag gis yang dag brtsam// thub pa'i brtul zhugs yang dag spyad// yan lag brgyad
235b6(rgyud 'bum): bapa'i brtul zhugs sten/ / nyon mongs med sems zas tshod rig/ chos ldan rtag tu zlos par byed// sdig med las dang yongs srungs byed// de bzhin zhi dang rgyas pa shes//
235b7(rgyud 'bum): de nas dkyil 'khor dbus bzhugs na// bstan bcos las gsungs bzhin du bri// rin chen lha tshegs kyis brgyan pa'i// ri mo dang por bri bar bya// der zhugs gzi brjid chen
236a1(rgyud 'bum): po mI/ de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen tog/ skyil krung gis ni legs bzhugs pa// chos kyi 'khor lo rjes bskor ba'o// ras ris lan ji lta bar// bstan
236a2(rgyud 'bum): bcos la sngags thams cad bri/ / ri mo'i 'phreng ni gsum dag dang // phyag rgyas rab tu brgyan pa dang // gser mdog rim pas khor yug tu// yongs su bri bar bya ba yin/
236a3(rgyud 'bum): gsal dang yongs su rdzogs pa dang // drang po de yi rnam pa'o// 'khor los sgyur ba'i bdag po che// de yi dbus su bya ba yin// nyi ma 'char ka 'dra ba dang // gur kum rnam
236a4(rgyud 'bum): pa 'dra mdog can/ / 'khor lo chen po'i rjes 'brang ba// 'bad par gnas pas kun tu bri// rgyal po chen po mnyam 'dra ba// gzhal med khang bcas rgyan gyis brgyan// sems
236a5(rgyud 'bum): dpa' chen po'i cod pan can/ / rgyan rnams kun gyis rab tu brgyan// dar lnga mdzes pa'i slad g.yogs can// sna tshogs dar lngas stod g.yogs shing // 'phreng ldan zhi ba'i
236a6(rgyud 'bum): kha dog 'ang / / gos dang 'phreng bas brgyan pa dang // me tog 'phreng ba bkul// lag pa g.yas pa sdom par byed // bzhin ni cung zad 'dzum pa'i lha// mthu chen 'od dang
236a7(rgyud 'bum): ldan pa'o/ / gzugs bzang gzugs ni mdzes pa dang // byis pa rgan po rnam par spangs// lag pa g.yon na 'khor lo ste// 'bar ba'i 'od kyi 'phreng ba can// de ni yod
236b1(rgyud 'bum): su bskor ba dang / / skyil krung phyed kyis gnas pa bri// gzugs bzang gzugs la brten nas ni// lha yi gzugs 'dra bri bar bya// ri bo 'od chen ldan pa'i steng // ri chen
236b2(rgyud 'bum): du ma'i steng du gnas/ / sngags rnams kun la che ba dang // rtag tu mchog sbyin la 'jug byed// 'bar ba'i me dang 'dra ba dang // 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyis mdzes pa// rlung
236b3(rgyud 'bum): gis sbar ba'i me bzhin du/ / kun nas me ni 'bar ba'o// de bzhin sngags kyi sbyor ba yis// khyab bdag me yis 'bar bar byed// stobs chen de dang 'dra ba yi//
236b4(rgyud 'bum): sngags kun rab tu sgrub byed pa// gang gis bdag nyid chen po mthong // sdig pa kun las yongs su grol// mtshams med lnga po byed pa dang // tshul 'chal blo ni chung ba
236b5(rgyud 'bum): dang / / sdig pa kun la 'dzud byed pa// khyab bdag mthong ba tsam gyis grol// lha yi lha ni 'khor lo'i bdag/ dkyil 'khor mthong ba tsam gyis ni// gzhan yang sdig tu yong
236b6(rgyud 'bum): bstan pa/ / de yi mong la grol bar 'gyur// sngags pas rtag tu khyab bdag gis// de nas shar sgo yang dag sbyar// rta babs kun nas yongs bsgreng ste// ba dan dag gis
236b7(rgyud 'bum): nyer mdzes bya/ / mtha' dag gzugs ni mdzes pa yi// dkyil 'khor yongs su gsal byas nas// bshos dang bdug pa dri dang ni// rtag tu 'phreng ba bzang po yis//
237a1(rgyud 'bum): cho ga snga mkho na ltar// de dag thams cad gus par bya// dbus kyi bum pa gang ba ni// 'khor lo can gyi mdun du dgod// de bum rnam par rgyal zhes bya/
237a2(rgyud 'bum): sngags shes pas ni de mi gdeg/ cho ga mthong ba'i las kyi ni// ma thab snga ma bzhin du bya// sbyin sreg cho ga yang dag btsam// cho ga sngags ni gzhan pas min// sbyin
237a3(rgyud 'bum): sreg kyang ni brgya rtsa brgyad/ / seng ldeng bud shing me la ni// pa la sha dang bil ba'i shing // bil ba u dum arka dang // 'bad pas las rnams kun la ni// a ba margas
237a4(rgyud 'bum): sbyin sreg bya/ / til la mar gyis btags pa 'am// zho la sbrang rtsi bsres pa yis// las rnams kun la sbyin sreg ni// stong rtsa brgyad ni rtag tu bya// dus gsum dus ni kun
237a5(rgyud 'bum): bstan pa/ / khrus dang gos ni brje ba dang // dkar gsum rgyu dkar bzang po ni// mkhas pa rnams kyis bstan pa yin// las rnams sngar ni bstan pa yin// bzlas dang
237a6(rgyud 'bum): sbyin sreg de bzhin gzhan/ / sngags dang yang dag ldan pas som// 'khor los sgyur ba'i rigs kyis bya// las rnams dag ni kun la yang // yi ge gcig pa'i sngags kyis bya//
237a7(rgyud 'bum): de ni mthu chen don ldan te// dpa' bo gcig pu rtag pa mchog/ de la rtag tu zlos byed pa// sngags rnams kun gyi cho ga spyod// 'jig rten pa yi 'jig rten 'dod// cho ga thams cad
237b1(rgyud 'bum): 'grub par 'gyur/ / 'jig rten 'das pa'i brtson 'grus che// rig pa'i rgyal po dka' thub che// sngags kun 'grub par 'gyur ba ni// cho ga 'di las gzhan pas min// thub
237b2(rgyud 'bum): pa rnams kyis sngags gsungs dang / / de bzhin stobs bcu ldan sbas dang // 'jig rten skyong ba brgya byin sogs// khyab 'jug dbang ldan tshangs pa dang // zla ba nyi ma de bzhin
237b3(rgyud 'bum): gzhan/ / gnod sbyin dbang po srin po dang // lto 'phye che dang mi 'am ci// de bzhin sa steng drang srong mchog/ nam mkha' lding dang rlung lha dang // sems can ming ldan
237b4(rgyud 'bum): 'jig rten gzhan/ / gang gis bshad pa'i sngags rnams ni// 'dir yang grub par 'gyur pa yin// sngags rnams kun la 'gugs byed dang // las rnams kun la ston byed
237b5(rgyud 'bum): dang / / 'byung po kun gyi sngags rgyud ni// rgyas dang bcas pa dbang du byed// yi ge gcig pa'i sngags 'di ni// sngags pa kun gyi rab byed pa// bzlas pa tsam gyis
237b6(rgyud 'bum): don ldan te/ / lha rnams kun ni 'gugs byed la// cho ga rnams ni dbang du byed// yi ge gcig chen bdag po yin// dam pa rnams kyis rab bsngags pa'i// rnam
237b7(rgyud 'bum): / pa sna tshogs byed pa yin// 'jig rten 'jig rten 'das pa'i sngags// yang dag sbyar na sgrub par byed// ma lus mthong na mdzes pa yi// ras ris gsal ba byas na ni//
238a1(rgyud 'bum): gtsang ba'i phyogs dang 'bab chu'i ngogs// ri bo'i rtser yang gzhag par bya// snga ma'i las kyi sbyor ba yis// nub kyi phyogs su rtag tu bstan// cho ga mthong
238a2(rgyud 'bum): ba'i las kyis ni/ / sgrub pa po ni shar du blta// dur ba'i khres la 'dug nas ni// 'du 'dzi med par bzlas par bya// sgra ni drag min ngal bas min// gzhan la ngan sems
238a3(rgyud 'bum): med gyur na/ / sangs rgyas ma lus kun gyi yang // 'di la myur du 'grub pa yin// rtag tu 'jig rten byams sems dang // sdug bsngal can la snying brtser ldan// mgon
238a4(rgyud 'bum): med sems ni dman pa dang / / 'phongs pas nyam thag stobs chung dang // mi bzang 'khor bar ltung ba la// snying rje'i sems ldan 'grub par 'gyur// 'bad pas ra sa ris
238a5(rgyud 'bum): mdun dag tu/ / mchod pa chen po rtag tu gzhag/ dngos su 'byor dang yid kyis sprul// bzang po sems las byung ba dang // rgyal dbang gzugs kyi ri mo ni// bsam pa
238a6(rgyud 'bum): 'am yang na bya ba yin/ / de nyid kyi ni cho ga yis// de nyid du ni ma thab bya// me ni shin tu 'bar ba la// sgrub pas sreg blugs sbyin sreg bya// tsan dan dkar dang ga pur dang //
238a7(rgyud 'bum): gur kum gyis bsres mang po ni// brgya ni rtsa brgyad sreg blugs kyis// sngags rig me 'bar sbyin sreg bya// seng ldeng p+lag sha n+ya gro d+ha// ba la sha ni gang yin pa// de dag las
238b1(rgyud 'bum): byung shing dag gis/ / me chen rab tu spar bar bya// shing de dag ni med gyur na// shing gzhan yongs su gzung bar bya// pi tsu marnga tsha dang sbyar// po son tsa las byung ba'i shing //
238b2(rgyud 'bum): tsher ma can sogs spang bya ste// sdig pa'i las la rab tu bsgrags// yi ge gcig pa'i sngags nyid kyis// zhi dang rgyas pa byas gyur na// de ni myur du 'grub par 'gyur//
238b3(rgyud 'bum): sdig pa'i las ni spyad mi bya// sngags mchog kun kyang 'di la ni// las rnams cho ga rgya chen kun// rnam rtog med pas rab sbyar na// rtag tu 'grub par 'gyur ba
238b4(rgyud 'bum): yin/ / de tshe sngags ni 'grub 'gyur zhing // mchog sbyin nyid du'ang 'gyur ba yin// ya ma shing p+lag sha u dum ba ra// yang na p+lag sha n+ya gro d+ha// mar gyis btags
238b5(rgyud 'bum): dang sbrang rtsir ldan/ / zho dang ldan pas mnyam bzhag nas// sa steng rgyal thabs 'dod pa yi// sngags pas dus kun sbyin sreg bya// lha yi rgyal po 'dod pas ni// gur kum
238b6(rgyud 'bum): tsan dan sbyin sreg bya/ / rig pa 'dzin pa'i lha dag gi/ bdag po nyid ni 'dod gyur na// pad+ma'i sbyin sreg 'bum phrag ni// sum cu rtsa drug ge sar bcas// sbyin sreg
238b7(rgyud 'bum): mthar ni mchod yon yang / / bstan bcos las 'byung bzhin du dbul// rgyal bas bsngags pa'i ras ris mchog/ der ni kun nas yongs su 'bar// de la reg pa tsam gyis ni//
239a1(rgyud 'bum): tshangs pa'i 'jig rten dag dang ni// 'og min gyi ni bar dag nas// yang na sa 'og rim par 'gro// bar skabs 'dir ni grub rnams kyi// de ni rgyal por
239a2(rgyud 'bum): rtag tu 'gyur/ / stobs chen brtan zhing pha rol gnon// 'byung po rnams ni 'byer bar byed// rtag tu rig 'dzin rgyal por 'gyur// las rnams yongs su sbyong bar byed// de na
239a3(rgyud 'bum): dus ring 'tshe 'gyur te/ / bskal pa tsam du'ang gnas pa yin// gang tshe lus ni shi 'phos nas// nges par byang chub gzhol bar 'gyur// gzhan yang las ni 'di dag kyang /
239a4(rgyud 'bum): mdo dang rgyas pa bstan par bya// pad+ma dkar po yongs blangs nas// tsan dan dkar dang ldan pa yi// sbyin sreg 'bum phrag brgya byas na// des ni rin chen tog mthong 'gyur//
239a5(rgyud 'bum): rgyal ba dam pa de mthong na// de tshe mngon shes lnga 'thob 'gyur// bskal pa chen por ring 'tsho zhing // sangs rgyas rjes su 'gro bar 'gyur// mtha' yas phyogs na bzhugs pa
239a6(rgyud 'bum): yi/ / sangs rgyas de nas mthong bar 'gyur// de dag la ni rtag mchod cing // de dag nyid dang lhan cig gnas// rin chen ldan zhes 'jig rten khams// gcig ni bcom
239a7(rgyud 'bum): ldan de bzhugs pa/ / thub gtso mchog ni dam pa ste// de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen tog/ de la de ni rtag gnas te// sngags kyis dag par the tsom med// gzhan yang
239b1(rgyud 'bum): las ni 'dod pa dag/ gang zag mchog gis gsungs pa ni// nA ga ge sar ga pur dang // tsan dan gur kum cha mnyam pa// sngags pas de tshe gcig byas nas// sbyin
239b2(rgyud 'bum): sreg 'bum phrag bdun cu brgyad/ / de tshe lha ni sbyin sreg mtha'// 'khor lo can de 'dir byon nas// rtag tu dges nas mchog stsol te// sgrub byed spyi bor byugs par
239b3(rgyud 'bum): mdzad/ / de tshe theg pa tsam gyis ni// sngags pa sa bdun bdag por 'gyur// rgyal sras thugs las skyes pa yi// byang chub sems dpar de brjod do// nges pa'i
239b4(rgyud 'bum): byang chub sems dpa' yang / / de ni lung bstan 'gyur ba yin// de nas brtsams nas cung zad gang // shes dang shes bya rgyal ba'i sras// shes 'gyur sngags rnams ma
239b5(rgyud 'bum): lus ni/ / rtogs pa'i bdag nyid cher rgyas yin// de la reg pa tsam gyis ni// mngon shes lnga ldan sngags rgyal 'gyur// rtag tu bdag dang gzhan bdag nyid// rnam pa
239b6(rgyud 'bum): sna tshogs byed par 'gyur/ / rnam pa kun mchog ldan pa yin// mchod pa'i las la rtag tu dga'// skad cig de nyid kho na la// byang chub las la brtson par 'gyur//
239b7(rgyud 'bum): deri tshe skad cig tsam gyis ni// 'jig rten sangs rgyas zhing de 'gro// 'jig rten khams ni stong dag tu// thams cad du yang 'gro bar 'gyur// sangs rgyas byang chub sems
240a1(rgyud 'bum): dpa' ni/ / de tshe sbyong bcas mthong bar 'gyur// de las chos ni thos pa dang // mchod pa'i las la brtson par 'gyur// rgyal ba 'khor los sgyur gsungs
240a2(rgyud 'bum): pa'i/ / 'dir ni las rnams gzhan yod de// mar me yon du dbul ba ni// mar bcas snying po gtsang ba ni// gser dang dngul gyi snod dag dang // zangs ma sa dag nyid yin/
240a3(rgyud 'bum): na'ang // der ni mar me rab spar te// skyes bu grangs ni 'bum dag gi/ grangs kyi tshad tsam nges bzhag ste// brgya phrag stong las lhag pa min// bud med spangs pa'i skyes pa
240a4(rgyud 'bum): yis/ khor khor yug mar me 'dzin// mchod pa'i las kyi don du ni// ston pa'i ras ris sku la dbul// sngags rnams re re'ang 'don bzhin du// thams cad
240a5(rgyud 'bum): mnyam par rab zhugs nas/ / ston pa la ni 'bul byed na// de yi mong la grub par ston// kun nas sgra ni sgrog byed cing // rnga bo che yi sgra yang sgrog/ gang phyir lha tshogs
240a6(rgyud 'bum): du ma ni/ / legs so zhes pa'i sgrar ba 'dong // sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' yang // de tshe nam mkha' la bzhugs nas// shes rab can khyod legs so legs//
240a7(rgyud 'bum): legs byas las ni yongs su byas// 'khor ba'i rgya mtshor nub pa dang // sdug bsngal yang ni mthong mi 'gyur// bde dang zhi ba mya ngan 'das// 'jigs med sangs rgyas
240b1(rgyud 'bum): nyid kyang thob/ / lam ni dge dang dri ma med// yan lag brgyad la legs par spyod// yi ge gcig pa mnyes byas nas// sngags kyi ngo bo'i mgon po mnyes// gzhan
240b2(rgyud 'bum): yang las ni 'di nyid ni/ / dam pa'i 'gro ba la gnas nas// mthu chen por ni rnam shes pa'i// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis gsungs// nim pa'i rang bzhin
240b3(rgyud 'bum): shing blangs nas/ / rtse gsum rdo rje gnyis mthar bya// dbus kyi phyogs su bya ba ni// rdo rje rigs te mi bskyod pa// de nas sngags kyis dag byas nas// de ni ras ris
240b4(rgyud 'bum): mngon du gzhag/ de nas sngags pas lag reg nas// sngags ni mnyam par bzhag nas bzla// rtsa brgyad 'bum phrag bcu drug ni// yongs su rdzogs nas grub par 'dod//
240b5(rgyud 'bum): de nas rdo rje gcig 'bar te// kun nas de ni rab tu 'bar// de nas rdo rje de blangs nas// 'di ltar de ni steng 'gro'o// de nas tshangs pa'i 'jig rten nam// gzhan yang lha
240b6(rgyud 'bum): gnas gang 'dod 'gro/ / de nas nam mkhar 'gro gyur te// grub pa kun gyi sngon du 'dren// grub pa'i rig 'dzin la sogs kyi// bdag po nyid kyang byed par 'gyur// lha yi/
240b7(rgyud 'bum): 'dus pa mang po yi// 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por 'gyur// bdag nyid kyi ni spyod pa yang // rnam pa sna tshogs byed par 'gyur// bar gyi bskal pa bcu yi bar// yun ring gnas
241a1(rgyud 'bum): te bar chad med/ / bde ba la brten rtag tu mchod// rtag tu skyes bu dam par ldan// byang chub sems kyis yang dag spyod// skye ba'i sdug bsngal rnam par spangs// /
241a2(rgyud 'bum): grub pa'i dbang phyug 'gyur ba ste// sdig pa thams cad rnam par spangs// de la shi 'phos mir skye zhing // bde ba mang la rab tu gzhol// 'gro ba ma lus skyo byas nas// byang chub
241a3(rgyud 'bum): yang dag gzhol bar 'gyur/ / rnam pa sna tshogs las mtha' yas// mang po 'jig rten de mchod pa// sngags kyi rgyal po 'dir brjod pa// cho ga rgya chen cho gar bcas// sa bdag
241a4(rgyud 'bum): brgya byin nyid dang ni/ / 'khor los sgyur nyid yang dang yang // rig 'dzin rnams dang de bzhin du// lha nyid dang ni bdag po'ang byed// rnam pa du ma'i ngo bo'am// las ni gang dag 'di
241a5(rgyud 'bum): gsungs pa/ / thams cad grub pa thob 'gyur te// sngags pa legs par sbyor byed na'o// mtshan mo skyil mo krung bcas te// sdom can don yod bzlas byas na// tho rangs grub pa thob
241a6(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur te/ / zlos pa mngon shes lnga thob 'gyur// dur khrod ro la 'dug nas ni// sdom can 'gul med zlos pa ni// yi ge gcig pu don chen te// tho rangs grub par 'dod pa yin//
241a7(rgyud 'bum): rig pa'i rgyal po rdzu 'phrul che// gal te dur khrod gnas nas bzlas// zla ba drug gis grub thob ste// ji ltar 'dod pa'i 'bras bu byed// gang yang rung ba'i gnas dag tu// rdzu 'phrul chen
241b1(rgyud 'bum): po zlos byed na/ / der gnas grub pa thob 'gyur te// sngags pa legs par sbyor byed la'o// gdugs dkar de bzhin ral gri dang // nor bu'i lham dang gdub kor dang // mu tig 'phreng ba dpung
241b2(rgyud 'bum): rgyan dang / / gdu bu dang ni sor gdu ba dang // 'og pag dang ni de bzhin gos// so shing dang ni spyi blugs dang // mchod phyir thogs dang zhwa dang ni// khrab dang go cha nyid dang ni// g.yang gzhi dang
241b3(rgyud 'bum): ni rol pa dang / / 'phreng ba dang ni mtshal lham dang // 'jig rten gnyis na 'dod pa yi// rgyan gyi sa gtso bo thams cad de// lha dang mi dang de bzhin du// gzhan yang rgyan 'gyur 'di la brgyan// de
241b4(rgyud 'bum): dag thams cad thob 'gyur te/ / ras ris bdun du zlos byed la'o// rdzas rnams kun dang 'byung khungs dang // rgyan dang nor bu rnams dang ni// mtshon cha thams cad du ma ni// ras ris mdun du
241b5(rgyud 'bum): bzhag nas ni/ / dag byas cig car bzlas bya ba// 'bum phrag brgyad kyis g.yo ba dang // thams cad bcas te 'bar ba dang // zlos pa rog pas gyen du 'gro// rnam pa sna tshogs gzugs
241b6(rgyud 'bum): ldan pa/ / sems can rang bzhin yin yang rung // rgyan dang mtsho cha yin yang rung // ngo bo nyid dam sa rang bzhin// rang tshul spyod dam bcos ma dang // 'dab chags sna tshogs tshogs kyang
241b7(rgyud 'bum): rung / / gang dag 'byung po kun la grags// bcos ma'am bcos ma yin pa 'am// 'du shes can nam 'du shes med// sngags pa mchod pas 'grub par 'gyur// rnam pa sna tshogs rdzas
242a1(rgyud 'bum): bzhag dang / / rna ba sna tshogs khams las byas// rang byas byed du bcug pa dang // 'gro ba'i skyes gnas dag na bsngags// sngar bstan cho ga bzhin du ni// ras ris
242a2(rgyud 'bum): mdun du rnam par gzhag/ rdzas ni drug gam bdun dag gis// sngags pas reg nas bzla bar bya// bzlas mthar de dag rab 'bar te// grub pa rgyas pa thob par 'gyur// de ni de la reg tsam
242a3(rgyud 'bum): gyis/ / phyogs bzhi dag tu 'gro bar 'gyur// 'dir ni lha yul thob nas ni// ring du 'tsho zhing bde bar 'gyur// rdzu 'phrul chen po rig rgyal la// ji lta ji ltar rab sbyor ba// de lta de ltar dga' 'gyur/
242a4(rgyud 'bum): zhing // rtag tu mchog kyang ster bar 'gyur// gzhan yang las la rab sbyor ba// las rnams dus ni yun ring ba// rig pa'i rgyal po rdzu 'phrul che// de nyid kyis ni myur 'grub 'gyur// gtsang zhing
242a5(rgyud 'bum): sems ni gtsang ba dang / / gtsang ba'i las rtag tu dga'// gtsang ba'i phyogs dang sngags shes pa// gtsang ba'i grub pa thob par 'gyur// las gang byed pa de 'bras thob// mchog gis mchog
242a6(rgyud 'bum): tu 'gyur ba dang / / 'bring gi las kyis 'bring du 'gyur// tha mas kyang ni tha mar ro// ma bsgrubs las kyis grub par yang // cung zad tsam gyis 'bras 'byin te// bu mo'am nor ni mang po
242a7(rgyud 'bum): dag/ yang dag spyod pas byed par 'gyur// rtag tu bzlas pa tsam gyis ni// longs spyod che zhing stobs kyang che// rgyal po dga' zhing blon po nyid// rtag tu bzlas pa byed par 'gyur// sngags
242b1(rgyud 'bum): kyi rgyal po lan cig bzlas/ / de yi sdig pa rab tu 'jig/ gnyis su bzlas pa'am bdun bzlas pas// bdag nyid srung ba chen por 'gyur// lan brgyad de ni bzlas pa yin// grogs po thas
242b2(rgyud 'bum): cad srungs par byed/ / gos la lan gnyis mngon bsngags ni// sngags pa dag ni rtag tu yang // nad rnams kun las shin tu grol// gos ni gnyis ka la bsngags nas// gos dag la
242b3(rgyud 'bum): ni reg byas na/ / lus can nad ni med par 'gyur// gdong dang mig gnyis dag la ni// 'bad pas mngon par rab bsngags na// khros pa rnams kyi khro ba ni// sngags pas bltas pa tsam gyis
242b4(rgyud 'bum): 'jig/ gang yang 'byung tshogs ma rungs pa// 'tshe byed sdig pa'i las can la// sngags rgyal sum cu rab bzlas te// de dag gdong la blta ba'am// rang lag nyid la yang dang yang /
242b5(rgyud 'bum): mngon par bsngags pa byas nas ni// de dag thal mo brdebs na ni// / lus can kun ni grol bar 'gyur// byis pa la ni rtag bya ba// khrus dang bza' dang btung ba
242b6(rgyud 'bum): la/ / sngags mchod drug cu bzlas nas ni// lha yi dam pa mchog byas na// sha za ma mo dag gi gdon// ma rungs kun las grol bar 'gyur// sngags kyi 'jigs pas 'jigs byed cing //
242b7(rgyud 'bum): rtag tu byis pa gtong bar byed// de ltar rnam pa du ma'i las// sa steng myur du rtag 'jig na// mi rnams la ni de bzhin byed// gang dag 'byung po sdig sbrul ni// rnam pa sna tshogs gnas 'gro ba/
243a1(rgyud 'bum): dug bcas dug ni med pa nyid// sngags kyi mthu yis 'jig par byed// gang dag sdug bsngal sna tshogs dang // gang dag tshor ba thams cad ni// sngags kyi rgyal po bzlas pa
243a2(rgyud 'bum): yis/ / myur du zhi bar rab tu 'gro// rnam pa sna tshogs gdon sdug bsngal// mang po 'chi ba 'go ba'i nad// sngags kyi rgyal po drug brgya bzlas// myur ba nyid du sel bar 'gyur// sbyin
243a3(rgyud 'bum): sreg las ni bya ba la/ / zho dang mar gyis thams cad bsres// ut+pal sngon po'i dri bzang ni// rtsa brgyad stong gis rgyas pa bya// zhi zhing 'byung po rnams song nas// 'gro ba rnams ni bde gnas
243a4(rgyud 'bum): thob/ / de ltar rnam pa du ma ni// mang po'i las ni yang dag 'byung // sngags pa legs par rab sbyor na// myur du thams cad byed par 'gyur// bzlas pa tsam gyis byed pa ni// dgra rnams
243a5(rgyud 'bum): kyi ni khro ba sel/ / sngags 'di don dang ldan gyur pa// cho ga mang po rgya che ba// de dag cho ga mthong ba yis// de dag 'dir ni grub pa yin// 'dir ni sngags rnams zlos byed pa// phran tshegs
243a6(rgyud 'bum): las kyang don yod 'gyur/ / thams cad las kyang bzlas pa yis// myur du don rnas rtag tu byed// 'byung po rnams ni dbang byed 'dod// dus gsum du ni bzlas pa yin// rtag tu sna
243a7(rgyud 'bum): ma'i me tog gis/ / spyi ga las kyang bya ba yi// tsan dan dkar dang ga bur dang // gur kum gyis kyang bya ba yin// bzlas nas sngags pa mchog sbyin zhing // rtag tu 'bras bcas byed
243b1(rgyud 'bum): par 'gyur/ / rtag tu zlos pas sbyin sreg bya// yid la 'dod pa'i don sgrub byed// ga pur la sogs ldan pa yis// rtag tu sbyin sreg rab tu brtag/ ji ltar 'dod par yongs brtags pa'i/
243b2(rgyud 'bum): rnam pa sna tshogs cho ga sgrub// tha ma las ni tha ma dang // chen po las ni chen po 'byung // par ma bar ma'i las dag las// rtag tu grub par bstan pa yin// de bas las rnams kun la ni//
243b3(rgyud 'bum): khyab par du ni sbyin sreg bya// byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod phal po che theg pa chen po shin tu rgyas pa'i mdo las/ 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi rtsa ba'i cho ga las le'u bcu bzhi pa 'khol los sgyur
243b4(rgyud 'bum): ba'i ras ris kyi cho ga dkyil 'khor sgrub pa'i thabs rab 'byam rdzogs so/ / / de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rje 'khor gyi nang der 'dus shing 'khor
243b5(rgyud 'bum): par gyur te/ 'dug pa de stan las langs nas lan gsum bskor ba byas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan
243b6(rgyud 'bum): 'das legs so legs so/ / legs par rab tu bstan pa dang // mchog tu legs par gsungs pa'i rig pa thams cad kyi sngags kyi sbyor ba chos chen po'i sprin las nges par byung ba//
243b7(rgyud 'bum): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po/ rig pa chen po'i rgyal po 'khor los sgyur ba/ cho ga chen po rgya che ba/ don thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed pa/ 'bras bu dang bcas pa sgrub
244a1(rgyud 'bum): par byed pa/ byang chub kyi lam bla na med pa bya ba'i bye brag yang dag par sdom pa dang / bzlas pa dang / sbyin sreg dang / rig pa dang / spyod pa'i rjes su 'brang ba rnams kyi
244a2(rgyud 'bum): lam/ 'bras bu bstan pa'i las kyi rkyen/ bskyed pa'i rgyu dang mtshan ma/ rmad du byung ba'i stobs bcu/ gnod par byed pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba/ byang chub kyi snying po gdon par byed cing nges par bya
244a3(rgyud 'bum): rol tu 'gro bar byed pa de bcom ldan 'das de ni legs so/ / sngags sgrub par byed pa dang rjes su mthun pa'i rmi lam na mthong bar byed pa'i mtshan ma de ston pas bshad du gsol/ gang gis rig pa
244a4(rgyud 'bum): thams cad sgrub pa'i rjes su spyod pa'i sems can grub pa'i mtshan ma'i las rtsom par byed par 'gyur ba dang / 'bras bu dang bcas pa'i rig pa thams cad kyi mtshan mar 'gyur ba'o// de skad ces
244a5(rgyud 'bum): gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas/ byang chub sems dpa' phyag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// gnod sbyin gyi bdag po khyod skye bo mang po la phan pa dang / skye bo mang
244a6(rgyud 'bum): la bde ba dang / 'jig rten la snying brtse ba dang / skye bo'i tshogs chen po'i don dang / phan pa dang / bde ba dang / rig pa thams cad sgrub par byed pa'i sems can rnams kyi don gyi phyir legs
244a7(rgyud 'bum): so legs so/ / de legs par rab tu nyon la zung zhig dang / ngas khyod la bshad do// dang po re zhig las thams cad kyi sngar 'du 'dzi med pa'i gnas su song ste/ ri bo'i rtse 'am/ chu bo'i
244b1(rgyud 'bum): 'gram mam/ phug gi nang ngam/ gtsang ba'i phyogs su lo ma'i spyil po byas la/ de nyid kyi cho ga snga ma bzhin du ras ris gzhag cing mchod pa chen po byas la/ las thams cad la'ang
244b2(rgyud 'bum): yang ngo'i zla ba phyed dam/ cho 'phrul chen po'i zla ba phyed la nges par nyin zhag bzang po'i mtshan mo'i thun dang po la tsan dan dkar po dang / gur kum dang / ga pur gcig tu byas la/ tsan dan gyi
244b3(rgyud 'bum): shing gis me rab tu spar zhing / ras ris kyi mdun du khru bzhi'i tshad tsam gyi me thab la du ba dang sol ba med pa'i me la sreg blugs stong rtsa brgyad kyis sbyin sreg bya'o// de nas yang sbyin sreg gi
244b4(rgyud 'bum): mthar pad+ma'i me tog tsan dan dkar po'i chus bsang gtor byas pa'i stong rtsa brgyad sbyin sreg bya'o/ / sbyin sreg gi mthar yang bzang po'i gdan dang / gdong bkab la rang gi lha la rang gi sngags
244b5(rgyud 'bum): kyis spyan drang bar bya zhing sngags 'dis sbyin sreg bya'o/ / na maHsarba bud+d+hA nAM/ a pra ti ha ta sha sa nA nAM/ tad+ya thA/ oM ku mA ra rU pi Ni daR+sha ya daR+sha ya/ At+ma no/ b+hu mi pud b+hu ba swa ba nAM me ni bai da ya wa
244b6(rgyud 'bum): b+hU ta hU~M hUM hUM baT phaT swahA/ sngags 'das bsrung ba byas shing sbyin sreg gi las thams cad la las bya'o// de nas ku sha'i rtse mo gnyis ka phyi rol du bstan te bting la ku sha'i khres kyi sngas byas
244b7(rgyud 'bum): mgo shar phyogs su bstan la ras ris kyi mdun nas ha cang yang mi ring ha cang yang mi nye bar ltal par bya'o/ / thun dang po la mi nyal ba'i sbyor bas rjes su brtson par byas nas/ sangs
245a1(rgyud 'bum): rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams la phyag byas nas sdig pa rnams so sor bshags te/ sangs rgyas thams cad la bdag nyid phul la/ de nas ji ltar bde bar gnyid
245a2(rgyud 'bum): kyi dbang du 'gro bar bya'o/ / dang po'i thun gyi rmi lam gang // bad kan las byung shes par bya// gnyis par gang byung mkhris pa ste// 'jig rten la yod smad pa yin// gsum pa rlung byung shes par bya// /
245a3(rgyud 'bum): bzhi pa bden par 'byung ba yin// bad kan rmi lam dang po ni// 'di 'dra rtag tu mthong ba yin// nor bu shel gyi khang pa ni// kun nas mu tig 'phreng ba can// am pa'i shing tshogs rab mang
245a4(rgyud 'bum): po/ / bdag nyid chu nang 'bying bar mthong // kun nas 'bab chus khyab pa dang // rgya mtsho chen pos khyab pa dang // gang du bdag gi lus gnas pa// de nyid du ni mthong bar byed// gang du phyogs
245a5(rgyud 'bum): der rdzing dag gis/ / kun nas yongs su khyab pa dang // gru dang chu ni 'thung ba dang // gtung ba'i khang pa khang pa dang // kun nas yongs su 'khor ba ni// chu chen gyis ni khyer bar mthong // kha ba
245a6(rgyud 'bum): can na byis pa dang / / chu bo chen por shel gnas pa// shing dang ri yi rgyal po dang // shel gyis yongs su bcings pa dang // mu tig dra bas legs g.yogs dang // mu tig phung po mthong
245a7(rgyud 'bum): ba dang / / char chen 'bab pa chu yi tshogs// mthong na bad kan las gyur yin// gdugs ni dkar po dag dang ni// chan rnams kun kyang dkar ba dang // ba glang dag ni dkar po'i gzugs/
245b1(rgyud 'bum): bad kan rmi lam dag tu brjod// rnga ma dkar ram skyes bu 'am// yang na gos dag mthong ba 'am// lan tshwa la sogs reg pa ni// kun tu gsal te mthong ba ni// ras bal bco ma'i gos dag
245b2(rgyud 'bum): gam/ / ra gan dngul dang a ka ru// reg dang za bar byed pa nyid// bad kan rmi lam dag tu 'dod// mon sran ze'u za ba dang // til btags bu ram 'bras chad dang // mon sran rnam
245b3(rgyud 'bum): mang za ba ni/ / bad kan rmi lam dag tu 'dod// sAsti ga dang u lo gi/ kri sa ra dang 'o thug dang // de dag za byed rmi lam ni// bad kan rmi lam bya ba yin// 'breng bu sa bcud bza' ba
245b4(rgyud 'bum): sogs/ / rnam pa sna tshogs snum 'khur ni// reg dang za bar byed pa nyid// bad kan 'phel ba'i rmi lam yin// skum 'khur rnam pa du ma ni// bza' dang spyad par rjes 'dod dang // zos
245b5(rgyud 'bum): dang reg par byed de dag/ bad kan rmi lam shes par bya// gnas dang gnas mal theg pa dang // bzhon pa sems can las byung ba// reg dang 'dzeg par byed pa nyid// dang po'i thur
245b6(rgyud 'bum): la mthong ba nyid/ / gal te rmi lam snang gyur na// thams cad bad kan can du brjod// rnam pa de lta'i rmi lam dang // chu la 'byung dang spyod pa dang // rnam pa sna tshogs bza' la spyod/
245b7(rgyud 'bum): mthong na bad kan can du brjod// de dag rmi lam dag tu mthong // bad kan can gyi spyod pa yin// rmi lam ma lus du ma ni// 'jig rten mgon pos gsungs pa yin// gnyis pa'i thun la
246a1(rgyud 'bum): lus can gyi/ / rmi lam mkhris pa can gyi yin// 'bar ba'i me yi gzugs mthong dang // sna tshogs rin chen mthong ba dang // mes 'tshig skar mda' ltung ba dang // ri
246a2(rgyud 'bum): dang phyogs ni rab 'bar ba/ / skye bo gang gis rab mthong ba// de ni mkhris par gyur pa yi// rin chen pad+ma rA ga dang // gzhan yang rin chen gang yin pa// gang du rmi lam mthong na ni// lus
246a3(rgyud 'bum): can mkhris pa las gyur yin/ / me dang tsha bsten pa dang // reg dang za bar byed pa dang // rnam pa sna tshogs kha dog ser// rmi lam mkhris pas brgyal ba yin// rtag tu tsha ba'i nyi ma dang //
246a4(rgyud 'bum): nyi ma rtag tu 'ong bar ni// gang gis rmi lam mthong gyur na// lus can mkhris pa las gyur yin// nam mkha' gser gyi mdog gyur dang // sa yi steng ni kha dog ser// rmi lam na ni gang gis
246a5(rgyud 'bum): mthong / / mkhris pa las gyur na ba yin// me ni kun nas 'bar ba yis// nam mkha' ngos ni rab gsal bar// rmi lam dus su mthong ba ni// mkhris pas gnod pa'i lus can yin// sa
246a6(rgyud 'bum): dang de bzhin ri bo dang / / zag ni mthon po'ang gser gyi mdog/ shing chen de bzhin theg pa ni// rtag tu thams cad gser rang bzhin// rtag tu rmi lam gnas mthong na// mkhris pa
246a7(rgyud 'bum): las gyur rmi lam yin/ / theg pa rgyan dang bzhon pa dang // snod rnams gser gyi rang bzhin dang // stan rnams dang ni gnas mal rnams// sa le sbram gyi rang bzhin la// reg dang 'gro
246b1(rgyud 'bum): bar byed pa nyid/ / rmi lam mthong na mkhris gyur yin// 'phreng ba ser po thogs pa dang // ser po'i gos kyis nyer mdzes dang // ser po'i 'od dang ngi yis byugs// ser po'i mchod phyir
246b2(rgyud 'bum): thogs pa dang / / bdag nyid ser po'i rnam pa dang // gang gis rmi lam la mthong ba// gnyis pa'i thun du mthong na ni// mkhris pas las gyur shes par bya// de bzhin rnam pa sna tshogs pa/
246b3(rgyud 'bum): gang gzhan rmi lam dag tu brjod// sna pa sna tshogs ser por snang // rmi lam mkhris las yang dag byung // mkhris pas lus can rab gnon pa// gnyis pa'i thun la bstan pa yin// rnam pa
246b4(rgyud 'bum): du ma'i gzugs can ni/ / ser por snang ba yang dag 'byung // 'jig rten gtso bos gsungs pa ni// rmi lam mkhris las yang dag byung // gang yang rlung byung rmi lam ni// gsum pa'i
246b5(rgyud 'bum): thun du bstan pa yin/ / khor yug tu ni 'od 'phro ba// phyogs rnams kun tu rab tu snang // nam mkha' la ni 'gro ba dang // nam mkha'i dkyil du thad drung 'gro// bar snang nam mkha'i dkyil du ni//
246b6(rgyud 'bum): kun nas 'khor ba rtag tu 'gro// rlung byung rmi lam zhes bstan pa// 'di lta bu la bya ba yin// brgal dang mchod dang de bzhin du// shing rnams la ni mngon par 'dzeg/ bstan bcos ma lus
246b7(rgyud 'bum): 'don pa dang / / khyad par du ni sngags rnams dang // bshad dang rjod par byed pa yang // phal cher yang ni rlung las gyur// shing rnams tsher ma can 'dzeg dang // kha ba dag kyang za ba dang /
247a1(rgyud 'bum): bza' ba ma lus tshad dang sbyar// zos pa chung las gyur pa yin// gtsor yang rlung ni yang dag 'byung // shing thog rlung ni rab skyed pa// de dag za bar rmi lam mthong /
247a2(rgyud 'bum): rlung las byung ba yang dag bstan// dngos rnams rlung ni skyed pa yin// bza' dang bca' ba khyad par ldan// de bzhin skye bo sems 'khrugs dang // reg par byed dang smra bar byed// 'byung
247a3(rgyud 'bum): po rnams ni gar byed dang / / bdag nyid dang ni gar byed pa// gang gis rmi lam mthong na ni// de 'dra rlung nad can du shes// rnam pa sna tshogs spyod pa dang // rnam pa sna tshogs 'khrug
247a4(rgyud 'bum): dang smra/ / rnam pa sna tshogs mi bzad gzugs// rmi lam rlung nad can gyis mthong // de la sogs pa'i rmi lam ni// 'jig rten mchog gis gsungs pa yin// rnam gsum sbyor
247a5(rgyud 'bum): ba rab ldan pa/ / 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug yin// chags can bad kan can zhes bya// zhe sdang las byung mkhris pa can// rmongs pa rlung las gyur pa yin// 'dres pa'am rnam
247a6(rgyud 'bum): par 'dres pa'o/ / grong gi chos ni mthong ba las// rmi lam chags pas sa bon 'byung // der ni bud med la chags pa// bad kan las byung rmi lam yin// rtsod bcas ngang tshul zhe sdang
247a7(rgyud 'bum): can/ / mkhris pa las byung rmi lam yin// ma rig las byung rmongs pa rnams// dran pa nyams par mthong ba yin// rnam 'dren rnam par 'dres pa ni// rmi lam na ni rtag tu mthong //
247b1(rgyud 'bum): de bas rnam pa thams cad kyis// rmi lam zhes bya yod pa spangs// bya ba dus kyi rim pa nyid// de nyid gzigs pas bstan pa yin// sems can bad kan can gsungs pa// mdog ldan
247b2(rgyud 'bum): snyan par smra ba dang / / tshe ring yid ni gzhungs pa dang // kha dog snum zhing 'jigs pa med// bong chod ring zhing dkar ba dang // bud med la phrad rtag tu dga'// chos ldan rtag tu dpa' ba
247b3(rgyud 'bum): dang / / btung ba mngal rtag tu dga'// rgyal rigs su ni bstan pa yin// ser sna ldan zhing mtshon pa med// de bzhin sa yi bdag po dang // dmag dpon don du gnas pa ste// long
