248a1(rgyud 'bum): dog nag dang stobs chung dang / / drag pa drag pa'i las dang ni// rtag tu yon por byed pa yin// dpa' dang bab col rtag tu byed// stobs dang blo dang ldan pa dang //
248a2(rgyud 'bum): mang du smra zhing grogs po mang // bstan bcos ting 'dzin mang po rtogs// chos ldan las kyi mtha' brtan zhing // zhe sdang slong brjod par byed// yid ldan dgra ni mang ba dang // zhe sdang
248a3(rgyud 'bum): mtshon pa skye bar 'gyur/ / nor mang dpa' bo la sdang dang // 'jig rten shes shing mthong na dga'// nges grol chags pa med pa dang // brtan zhing sdug bsngal rtag tu bzod// nga rgyal
248a4(rgyud 'bum): phrag dog ma rungs pa/ / bud med rnams la dga' bar byed// spro che brtan dang blon po dang // longs spyod chen por skye bar 'gyur// shes bzhin las kyis nyer spyod pa'i// sems can
248a5(rgyud 'bum): zil gyis mnan nas spyod/ / sngags ni srog la gnod byed pa// de ni de la myur 'grub 'gyur// mi bzad thub pas spangs pa'i don// myur du sgrub par byed pa yin// sems can gnod
248a6(rgyud 'bum): phyir byed pa'i las/ / lus can de la grub par 'gyur// cho ga sbyar ba'i chos rnams gang // sngags pas thams cad rab sbyar nas// spyod pa des ni 'grub 'gyur te// gzhan las
248a7(rgyud 'bum): sems can de las min/ / sngags pa zhe sdang can dag la// sems can gzhan la gnod pa dang // de bzhin gzhan gyi sngags gcod pa// sems can khro ba la grub 'gyur// gzhan gyi
248b1(rgyud 'bum): rdzas ni 'phrog 'dod dang / / gzhan gyi srog ni gcod pa la// khro ba'i sngags kyis grub 'gyur te// sngags gzhan dag la sbyar mi bya// zhe sdang rigs kyi sems can 'di// bdag po nyid kyang byed par
248b2(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur/ / mdog nag pa 'am sngo bsangs sam// dkar ba'am yang na 'dres pa yin// mi ni khro ldan gser gyi mdog/ rnam pa spangs pa skye bar 'gyur// mi ni rtsub mdog du pa'i mdog
248b3(rgyud 'bum): ser skya'i mdog tu'ang skye ba yin/ / dpa' dang de bzhin drag pa dang // chags ldan sdig pa'i khyim las skyes// gza' ni mig dmar zhing bdag gnas// bad kan can la phur bu'i bdag
248b4(rgyud 'bum): skye 'gyur nyung ngu za ba dang / / tsha dang skyur ba'i ro sten cing // de yi tshe ni ring 'gyur zhing // dran dang ldan pa skye bar 'gyur// spyod pa dang ni rjes spyod pa// rlung nad can gyi bshad par bya//
248b5(rgyud 'bum): mdog mi sdug dang rtsub mdog dang // bong tshad med cing shin tu rjud// blo nyams shes rab med pa dang // mi brtan gnas pa med pa dang // lus ni 'gul dang 'khor ba dang // skrag cing
248b6(rgyud 'bum): bshang gtso mang du 'byung / / mang du za zhing rtag par za// de dag gang phyir nad mang 'gyur// 'jig rten rigs dang mi mthun zhing // dgra ni mang po skye bar 'gyur// de ni sa steng
248b7(rgyud 'bum): 'di dag tu/ / tshul 'chal sdug bsngal skye 'gyur te// mi snang ba yi sngags dag ni// de la 'grub par bstan pa yin// gang zhig rlung nad 'khrug byed pa'i// zas la de ni dga' bar
249a1(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur/ / zlos pa las ni grub 'dod pas// de ni yongs su bsten mi bya// sems can rlung nad 'khrug pa la// gti mug nye bar zhi ba dang // rmongs pa'i rigs can
249a2(rgyud 'bum): la gsungs pa/ / rmongs pa'i sngags ni rab sgrub pa// rtag tu de dag rmongs pa la// rmongs pa dag ni grub par 'dod// rgyu skar khyim ni chu skyes dang // gza' ni bdag po spen par blta//
249a3(rgyud 'bum): rlung nad skyes pa'i sems can ni// dge ba'i las la mi spyod de// 'byung po dbang dang 'gugs par byed// de bzhin rmongs dang rengs pa'o// rlung nad can gyi sems can la// gti mug
249a4(rgyud 'bum): can de sdig par byed/ / rmi lam bden par mthong ba ni// mtshan nyid 'di dag gsung pa ni// sems can rnams kyi don sgrub pa// thub pa rnams kyis sngon gsungs pa'o// lug glang dang ni
249a5(rgyud 'bum): sbyor ba dang / / sbal pa seng ge nyid dang ni// srang dang bu mo sdig pa dang // de bzhin gzhu dang chu srin dang // bum pa nya dang glang po dang // lha dang spre'u lha ma yin// grub dang dri za gnod sbyin
249a6(rgyud 'bum): sogs/ / mi rnams gang gis rab bsgrags pa// sems can rnams kyi khyim mang po// gang zag mchog gis gsungs pa yin// rnam pa mang po sna tshogs don// rnam pa sna tshogs las
249a7(rgyud 'bum): bstan pa/ / de dag las ni thams cad la// yon tan rgya chen smin par 'gyur// las las gol ba med par ni// lus can yon tan mi smin te// yon tan kho na las ldan pas// skye bar
249b1(rgyud 'bum): yang ni byed pa yin/ / yon tan chos don ldan pa ni// sngags la 'grub par skye bar 'gyur// zlos pa sems can yon tan shes// yon tan yon tan min las 'ching // yon tan med la bya min gang // de yi las ni bya ba min/
249b2(rgyud 'bum): gang phyir bya ba las byed de// bya ba yon tan med pa yin// bya ba las dang yon tan nyid// yang dag ldan pa sgrub par 'gyur// cho ga sngon 'gro bya ba'i las// stobs bcu ldan pas sngon bstan to//
249b3(rgyud 'bum): rdzas dang sems can spyod pa gzhan// bya ba las dang yon tan yin// rnam pa sna tshogs rmi lam tshul// las las 'byung bar snang ba yin// de bas rmi lam mtshan ma yis// rgya chen las la
249b4(rgyud 'bum): rab sbyar bya/ / rnam pa sna tshogs rnam pa dang // yid 'ong blta na sdug pa dang // bgegs kyi gzugs dang gzugs med pa// rmi lam rgyur ni snang ba yin// mthu che spro ba che ba ni// mi ni
249b5(rgyud 'bum): grub pa 'dod pa yin/ / mchog dang tha ma 'bring dag ni// de dag la ni grub par brtag/ drag cing las rnams ma rungs ni// rmi lam rtag tu 'phral du min// bzang po bstan pa las dag ni//
249b6(rgyud 'bum): yun ring dus su grub phyir ro// 'jig rten 'jig rten 'das rnams kyi// yon tan skyed par yang dag 'byung // rmi lam rnam pa sna tshogs snang // zlos pas sngags rnams 'grub par 'gyur//
249b7(rgyud 'bum): mi 'grub don du sngags rnams ni// gnyid dang snyoms pa rab tu brtag/ bgegs 'joms byed pa'i sngags rnams ni// de yi dus su rab tu brtag/ de tshe sngags ni rigs tshul
250a1(rgyud 'bum): gyis/ / zlos pas de tshe rab tu sbyar// khro bo chen po phyag drug dang // zhal drug nyid du brtag par bya// sngags chen yi ge bzhi pa ni// gzhon nu'i gzugs la gnas
250a2(rgyud 'bum): pa yin/ / drag po'i gzugs ni gzugs chen po// phag gi rnam par yang dgra 'byung // bgegs kun rnam par gzhig bya'i phyir// dus mtshan de ni lha yi rgyal// stag gi pags
250a3(rgyud 'bum): pa'i sham thabs can/ / sbrul gyi gdengs ka rnam par 'phyang // lag na ral gri sems dpa' che// gzi brjid chen po shin rje'i gzugs// bgegs rnams kun la gtse bar byed//
250a4(rgyud 'bum): log 'dren rnams kyi srog 'phrog byed// 'byung po kun ni rab nyon cig/ mi bzad sngags ni bshad par bya// cho 'phrul chen po bgegs rnams kun// ma rungs sems can 'jig par
250a5(rgyud 'bum): / byed// sngags rnams kuR+sha ni sgrub byed pa// lha yi tshogs rnams nga la nyon// na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nAM/ a pra tI ha ta sha sa nA nAM/ tad+ya thA/ he he ma hA kro d+ha Sha Na mu khaSh+Ta tsa ra na/ sarba big+h+na big+h+na ta
250a6(rgyud 'bum): kaM hUM hUM kiny+tsi ra ya si bi nA ya ka dzI bi tAn+ta ka ra du swa ba ni me nA sha ya/ la hu la hu sa ma ya ma nu sma ra phaT phaT swA hA/ khro bo'i rgyal po chen pos 'di gsungs ma thag tu bgegs dang log 'dren thams
250a7(rgyud 'bum): cad 'jigs shing nyam thag nas snying gas te yid shin tu skrag nas/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa dang // 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal bar byed cing dam tshig la gnas
250b1(rgyud 'bum): par gyur to/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas thams cad dang ldan pa'i gnas gtsang ma'i gzhal med khang la gzigs nas/ 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor chen po de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal
250b2(rgyud 'bum): to/ / / kye kye lha'i tshogs chen po dag khro bo'i rgyal po 'di ni 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa thams cad kyi sngags rnams 'don par byed pa na// gang zhig ma rungs pa'i sems can gyi
250b3(rgyud 'bum): gzugs can gyis rnam par 'tshe bar byed pa de la khro bo'i rgyal po 'dis ni rigs brgyud thams cad 'dul bar byed cing srog kyang 'dzin par mi byed de/ yongs su gdung bar byed cing yongs su
250b4(rgyud 'bum): skem par byed pa'i rnam par gzhag par bya ba 'jog par byed cing zlos pa dag la'ang srung ba dang / sba ba dang / sbed pa la gnas pa la 'jog par byed cing rjes su 'phel bar byed pa dang / gang
250b5(rgyud 'bum): zhig dam tshig 'di las 'da' bar byed pa dang / khro bo'i rgyal pos sgrub pa po bsrung bar byas pa la rnam par mtho 'tsham par byed ma mgo bo ardza ka'i mdog pa bzhin du rnam pa bdun du 'gas par
250b6(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur ro/ / thub pa mchog gis legs gsungs nas// 'jam pa'i dbyangs la de tshe gsungs// gzhon nu khyod kyi sngags rnams la// ma lus dor ni rgya chen don// sngags rgyud don dang
250b7(rgyud 'bum): ldan pa dang / / sgrub pa rnams la khyad par du// bgegs rnams ma lus 'joms pa yi// rgyud la khro rgyal bstan pa yin// 'jig rten mgon gyis sngon 'di ni// de bzhin du ni sang
251a1(rgyud 'bum): dag sbyar/ / ma lus bgegs rnams 'jig bya'i phyir// dgra rnams kyis ni khro ba sel// zlos pas rtag tu 'di dag ni// mtshan mo rtag tu gdon byas la// sems can
251a2(rgyud 'bum): rnams ni srung don dang / / rmi lam ngan pa sel bar byed// sngags rnams ma lus sgrub pa la// 'jig rten mchog gis gsungs pa yin// de nas gzhan yang rab bshad pa// skyes bu'i mtshan
251a3(rgyud 'bum): nyid bzang po yin/ / gang la sngags rnams grub 'gyur bar// mchog dang tha ma bar ma'o// gzi brjid ldan dang shes ldan dang // gser mdog gsus pa che ba dang // dkyus ring mig
251a4(rgyud 'bum): dang sdum pa dang / / chags chung khro ba rnam par spangs// mig rtsa dmar zhing snyan par smra// de la grub pa mchog 'gyur la// pags pa srab cing sngo bsangs mdog/ ha cang ring min yan lag phra//
251a5(rgyud 'bum): spro ba che zhing gzi brjid che// chog shes kun nas dge ba byed// skye gnas bzang po dag pa dang // 'dod pa chung zhing cung zad dge/ las rnams kun la snang ba ni// de la nges par 'grub
251a6(rgyud 'bum): pa mchog/ yan lag thams cad ma tshang med// dur ba sngo bsangs gzi brjid che// nyon mongs med sems shes pa can// rtag tu gtsang zhing tshangs par spyod// phra ba'i gos la rtag
251a7(rgyud 'bum): tu dga'/ / chos kyi ngang tshul 'jig rten shes// grogs mang rtag tu btong ba dang // zas chod rig dag rtag gtsang ldan// bshes gnyen tshul khrims spong ba dang // gtsang ba'i spyod
251b1(rgyud 'bum): la rtag tu dga'/ / bden par smra zhing snying rje can// de la grub pa mchog tu 'gyur// yon tan rgya che yan lag tshang // rigs ldan rtag tu chos dang ldan// pha dang ma la gus pa dang // bram ze
251b2(rgyud 'bum): la ni mchod pa byed/ / shin tu snying rje ldan zhing brten// de la'ang grub pa mchog tu 'gyur// sngo bsangs dkar dang snum pa dang // rtag tu gtsang zhing nyung ngu smra// bsod pa'i kha zas la
251b3(rgyud 'bum): dga' zhing / / gtsang ba'i spyod pas mngon par 'gro// mang 'dod sems can 'jig rten shes// de la'ang grub pa mchog tu 'gyur// ha cang ring min thung ba'ang min// su ni mig
251b4(rgyud 'bum): sman bzhin du gnag/ mig dang mig 'bras rab tu snum// gtsang zhing rtag tu khrus la dga'// dkon mchog gsum la shin tu dang // de yi grub pa mchog tu 'gyur// mchog gi las ni
251b5(rgyud 'bum): rab ston cing / / sems can rnams kyi bsam pa shes// bzod ldan snyan par smra ba dang // rgyal ba'i sras la rab tu dga'// de tshe 'jig rten 'das pa grub// de la 'bras bcas
251b6(rgyud 'bum): grub par 'gyur/ / sems dpa' che zhing brtson 'grus che// gzi brjid che zhing brtul zhugs che// longs spyod che zhing sngags rnams shes// sngags rnams kun la de nyid rig/ rigs
251b7(rgyud 'bum): kyi mchog ni rgyal rigs sam/ / bram ze shes dang ldan pa dang // bud med la brten de la chags// de bzhin gser gyi mdog dang ldan// bong chod che zhing dkar ba dang // sna ni mtho zhing lag
252a1(rgyud 'bum): pa che/ / dpa' zhing lag pa ring ba dang // rgyal po che la mngon par 'dod// rgyal ba'i sras la dad pa dang // bud med min ldan lha la mchod// dkon mchog gsum
252a2(rgyud 'bum): la gus pa dang / / byang chub sems kyis brgyan pa yin// lhag par snying rje brtan pa dang // cung zad khro zhing cung zad rmongs// longs spyod che zhing gtong ba che// gzi brjid che
252a3(rgyud 'bum): zhing thul bar dka'/ / bud med rnams ni dga' dang dpa'// de yi grub pa mchog yin no// shin tu btung dang dga' dang dpa'// rtag tu bud med la chags dang // gser gyi mdog
252a4(rgyud 'bum): dang byin pa phra/ / rked pa che zhing gtsang ba dang // brtse dang snying rje ldan mkhas pa// yon tan mang 'dod 'jig rten shes// rtag tu sngags rnams zlos la gus// rgyal ba la ri srog kyang
252a5(rgyud 'bum): gtong / / de bzhin nyan thos sras rnams dang // bse ru la yang rtag tu gtong // stobs ldan 'jig rten gtso bo dang // rigs ni gnyis pa bzang po yin// yan lag thams cad
252a6(rgyud 'bum): ma tshang med/ / ma rungs rtag tu bab col byed// gtong ldan tshul ldan dgra las rgyal// chos dang chos min rnam dpyod byed// ha cang sbom min rjud pa'ang min// ha cang ring
252a7(rgyud 'bum): min thung ba'ang min/ / bar ma'i mi ni mchog yin te// de yi grub pa mchog tu 'gyur// sen mo zangs mdog logs snum dang // lag mthil dmar dang gtsang ba dang // rkang
252b1(rgyud 'bum): pa'i mtha' dmar snum pa dang / / 'khor lo swa sti ka sa brgyan dang // rgyal mtshan rta babs nya dang ni// ba dan pad+ma tho ba dang // mi gang rkang pa lag pa la// mtshan ni 'di dag yod
252b2(rgyud 'bum): gyur pa/ / de 'dra'i skyes bu dam pa la// grub pa mchog tu brtag par bya// mche ba dkar zhing bzang ba dang // mtho ba'i ri bo dang 'dra dang // sna bzang mtho zhing mig dkyus
252b3(rgyud 'bum): ring / / smin ma stug cing ko sko bzang // ba yi rdzi ma 'jig rten mtshan// nag pa'i lta ba'i mig 'bras mtshan// dpral ba'i dbyes gang rgya che zhing // mgo bo gdugs 'dra'i
252b4(rgyud 'bum): rnam pa bzang / / mgo bo gtsug tor 'dra ba dang // rna ba bzang ba dam pa yin// rtag tu seng ge'i 'gram 'dra dang // ma mchu bim pa smin 'dra'i mdog/ gang gi lce ni rab snang ba//
252b5(rgyud 'bum): pad+ma 'da' ma dmar 'dra'i mdog/ mgrin pa bum pa 'dra ba dang // thal gong rgyas shing yang dag 'phags// mchan khung thong ka bzang ba mchog/ de bzhin brla ni rgya che dang //
252b6(rgyud 'bum): lte ba'i phyogs kyang chung ba dang // rked pa rgya che bzang ba dang // lte ba zab cing g.yas su 'khyil// kun nas dkar med pa spu dang // lag ring lag ni che ba dang // rked pa seng
252b7(rgyud 'bum): ge 'dra ba'i mtshan/ / gang gi brla ni zlum pa dang // gru mo nyams meng zlum pa dang // byin pa e n+ya ya lta bur// zlum pa'i nang na zlum par grags// rkang pa sha dang ldan pa dang /
253a1(rgyud 'bum): sor mo rnams kyis ring ba yin// dmar zhing ser dmar snum pa dang // sha rgyas pas ni snum pa yin// nang stong ma yin mthil mnyam gnas// dge zhing mthong na dga'
253a2(rgyud 'bum): ba dang / / 'jam zhing kha dog dag pa dang // rab bsngags 'jig rten bkra shis dang // de dag gi ni steng dag tu// rtswa yi dra ba mngon pa med// bshang ba 'byung ba'i lam dag tu// ri mo zab
253a3(rgyud 'bum): cing g.yas su 'khyil/ / mchig pa rab bsngags shin tu chung // rtag tu zlum zhing dge ba yin// ma 'brel dum bu ma yin dang // gcig min nyid du bstan pa yin// gang tshe skyes dbang
253a4(rgyud 'bum): gtsang ba dang / / rtse mo dmar la yang dag gnas// skye bo nyal khar kha zas ni// ri ni rtsa ba byed pa za// bshang ba kha dog sngo ba 'am// gal te dmar por rab snang zhing // mang po ma yin snam
253a5(rgyud 'bum): pa dang / / dge ba'i mtshan gyis rab mtshan pa// de lta'i sems can gang yin pa// grub pa mchog tu 'dod pa yin// lan gsum bshang zhing sngags drug drar// gtsang sbra'i spyod dka'
253a6(rgyud 'bum): yongs su gtsang / / gang zhig thun ni tha mar nyal// tho rangs ldang ba'i skye bo rnams// de yi grub pa rtag tu mchog/ las kun byed par snang ba yi// 'bras bu rnam pa sna tshogs dang //
253a7(rgyud 'bum): phun rogs rnam pa mang po la// mi rnams rjes su 'dod pa yang // mtshan nyid kyis ni sngon mtshan pa// rgyu skar dag la'ang skyes pa ni// rgyal dang nam gru bre dpo dang // mchu dang lha
253b1(rgyud 'bum): mtshams dag dang ni/ / nag pa snar ma smin drug dang // nus pa'i gza' rnams kyis mtshan pa// de dag la ni skyes mthong dang // nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor 'char ka ni// tho rangs dus su

253b3(rgyud 'bum): ba gza' lhag phur bu yin/ / skye bo rnams kyis mthong na ni// 'bras bu grub phyir nus pa yin// mi ni gang zhig dge las kyis// 'di la skyes par gyur pa yi// sngags don ma lus/

255a1(rgyud 'bum): gza'/ / 'khor lo bzhin du rtag tu 'khor// 'jig rten dge dang mi dge byed// de nyid 'jig rten gnas pa yin// des na de dag gang cung zad// sdig pa'i bla
255a2(rgyud 'bum): yang skye bar 'gyur/ / sems can dge dang mi dge 'bras// mang po yang ni skye bar 'gyur// gza' rnams las la spyod pa zhes// des na 'di ni mthong zhes gsungs// myur ldan
255a3(rgyud 'bum): myur bcas 'ong 'gyur zhing / / myur bar 'ong bas myur ldan yin// mig gis mthong dang ma mthong ba'i// se gol gtog pa'i myur 'gros yin// 'di tsam gyi ni tshad dag tu// blo mchog/

255a5(rgyud 'bum): ma yin pa/ / 'gro min pa yang bshad par bya// 'jig rten la nye bzang ba dang // char dang char min yang dang yang // yul 'khor 'jig dang mu ge dang // le legs nyi ma gsal mthong dge
255a6(rgyud 'bum): dus dang de bzhin dbang po'i gzhu/ / skye bo rnams la rtag zhi byed// mjug rings sa 'gul nam gru dang // skar mda' dang ni lho bur dang // rgyu skar gza' dang skar rnams kyi// spong
255a7(rgyud 'bum): pa dge dang mi dge ba/ / 'byung po rnams kyi spyod pa ni// dge dang mi dge'i spyod pa yin// sha za dang ni ma mo dang // drag po ma rungs nyer 'joms byed// sha za rnams kyi spyod pa ni//
255b1(rgyud 'bum): bzhin ma rungs sems can brjod// gang du lha la rab dad dang // rin chen chos dang blo mchog dang // dge ba'i las dang rtag tu ldan// byams sems brtse bar ldan pa dang // legs par spyong
255b2(rgyud 'bum): pa'i don ldan blo/ / gzhan gyi sdug bsngal dag la sems// sngags dang rig pa rnams kyis drangs// sman gyi don du kha zas spyod// gang du mtshan nyid la brten pas// spyod pa rgya cher bsten
255b3(rgyud 'bum): pa yin/ / gzhan gyi lus la gnas nas ni// mi lus brten nas gnas pa yin// lha ni mchod pa zhes bshad de// lha min nga rgyal can gyi rgyus// gnas der gnas pa'ang rnam pa gnyis//
255b4(rgyud 'bum): rim bzhin lha dang lha ma yin// de yang der ni rnam gnyis te// grags pa dang ni thun mong yin// de yang der ni rnam gnyis 'gro// dge dang mi dge 'gro ba lnga// der gnas rnam gsum
255b5(rgyud 'bum): 'gro ba ste/ / nyi shu sum cu grangs med pa'o// lha dbang dang ni 'og min par// go rims ji bzhin sa med pa'o// 'jig rten khams ni mtha' med pa// dge dang mi dge'i 'jig rten
255b6(rgyud 'bum): yin/ / 'khor spyod sems can ji snyed dang // 'phags pa nyan thos ji snyed dang // sangs rgyas rang sangs rgyas rnams dang // de yi thugs las skyes sras dang // byang chub
255b7(rgyud 'bum): sems dpa' sems chen po/ / sa bcu la ni rab gnas dang // rtag tu sems can thams cad kyi// sems can skye gnas yang dag rten// byis pa'i skye bo thams cad kyi// 'gro
256a1(rgyud 'bum): ba'i skye gnas rten pa dang / / rtag tu 'phags rnams thams cad kyi// mtshan nyid dang ni spyod pa dang // tshig dang brda dang de nyid kyang // rgya cher rab tu bshad par bya/
256a2(rgyud 'bum): sngags dang rgyud ni rig bcas pas// 'byung po kun ni dgug par bya// dbab dang dgug pa'i sngags shes pas// gzhan gyi lus la yang dag rten// dge dang mi dge'i las shes shing /
256a3(rgyud 'bum): bag yod rigs ni bzang ba dang // mi thun spyod pa'i sems can dang // tshar gcad rjes gzung spyod pa dang // 'jig rten sa steng 'gugs byed pa// mi ni sngags zlos byed pa dag/ de dag
256a4(rgyud 'bum): grub pa'i mtshan ma ni/ / de nyid thams cad bshad par bya// mi rnams kyi ni mdor bsdus na// de dag gi ni lus bzung nas// rtag tu shin tu chos don dang // thar pa'i don du rnam par brtag/
256a5(rgyud 'bum): ma rungs rnams ni tshar gcad dang // rnam dag rnams ni mchod pa ste// tshar gcad rjes gzung nyid la ni// sngags dang rgyud ni rab tu brtag/ rlung dang bad kan mkhris can ni// rnam gsum dag
256a6(rgyud 'bum): la spyod pa'ang gsum/ / de dag zhi bar rab brtag la// rnam gsum nyid du rim par 'dod// mi rnams kyi ni gsol ba la// sngags dang rgyud kyis rtag tu bya// 'byung ba chen por rnam brtags
256a7(rgyud 'bum): pa/ / 'byung dang 'byung min la sogs shes// 'byung ba min dang 'byung ba dang // lhag par 'byung ba de la brjod// skye bo gang tshe lhag 'byung zin// de tshe bde ba med par 'gyur// 'byung
256b1(rgyud 'bum): dang 'byung min rnam pa ni/ / rnam pa gnyis su rab tu brtag/ rtag tu sems can 'byung ba che// sems can ma yin rab tu brtag/ mkhris pa bad kan de bzhin rlung // gang gzhan rnam pa sna
256b2(rgyud 'bum): tshogs byas/ / 'byung ba chen po bzhi dang ni// lnga pa dag ni nam mkha' brjod// chu dang me dang ldan pa dang // sa dang rlung du yang dag ldan// blo dang ldan pas rtag tu yang // sems can min
256b3(rgyud 'bum): pa'i grangs su bstan/ / 'jig rten mchog gi bdag po dang // 'od chen ldan pas gsungs pa yin// sems can ma yin grangs su bstan// sems can grangs 'gro mi ma yin// blo mchog
256b4(rgyud 'bum): smra ba dam pa yis/ / mi rnams sems can nyid du gsungs// mi ma yin dang mi dag kyang // rtag tu sems can grangs nyid do// sems can rnams la dge don du// thams cad mkhyen pa'i
256b5(rgyud 'bum): gsung yang yin/ / 'das dang ma byon sangs rgyas dang // de bzhin da ltar byung rnams kyis// dag pa'i las kyi las 'byung phyir// las 'di dag ni yongs su gsungs// sangs rgyas rnams
256b6(rgyud 'bum): kyis gsung dag pa/ / las ni don med mi byed de// de yi rgyu mtshan rigs dang spyi// grub pa nyid du rab snang ste// thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes dang // bde zhing ni la rtag tu gtsang //
256b7(rgyud 'bum): mthar thug bdag dang bdag med dang // don dam thar par 'dod pa bsten// de nyid chos ni btsal bya'i phyir// rgyu 'di yongs su bshad pa yin// rgyud dang sngags dang sman bzang po// bka'
257a1(rgyud 'bum): ni yang dag gsungs pa yin/ / byung dang 'byung 'gyur da ltar gyi// bstan bcos thams cad legs bsngags dang // 'jig rten mchog dang chos bdag med// rtag
257a2(rgyud 'bum): tu zhi dang shes pa'i gnas/ / 'di ni thams cad mkhyen pa'i gsung // de yi go 'phang mchog gnas pa// thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes 'byung // ma 'dres rab tu brtags pa yin//
257a3(rgyud 'bum): sangs rgyas rnams kyi mthu dang ni// byang chub sems dpa' blo ldan dang // sngags rnams kun gyi cho ga la// grub pa kun gyi bstan pa yin// des na 'di nyid thub dbang gis// cho ga'i rgyal/
257a4(rgyud 'bum): por gsungs pa yin// lus can rnams ni sngags tshul gyi// 'di nyid kyi ni lam gyis 'gro// zhi ba nad med phun sum tshogs// mya ngan 'das grong phyin par 'gyur// mya ngan med dang
257a5(rgyud 'bum): rdul med dang / / rtag tu byang chub gzhol zhing shes// gang 'di bstan pa dag la ni// sngags kun 'don par byed pa na// kun mkhyen shes dang shes bya yin// las kyi rgyud ni 'brel bapa
257a6(rgyud 'bum): dang / / sngags zlos pa yi ched du ni// rgyu rnams mtha' dag sa steng gsungs// sngags rgyud ma lus don dag ni// byang chub rnam gsum gzhol ba ste// sangs rgyas rnams kyi ye shes
257a7(rgyud 'bum): dag/ cho ga 'dir ni rab tu bstan// sems can rnams la'ang phan pa'i phyir// 'jig rten kun la rab tu bskor// gzhan la cho ga rab snang ba// cho ga'i rgyal po 'di la'ang yod// thub
257b1(rgyud 'bum): mchog thub pa'i sras dag gis/ / gzhan du cho ga gang bstan pa// sngags rnams thams cad 'di la yod// des na cho ga rgya chen yin// de nyid phyir na thub dbang gis// lus can kun la
257b2(rgyud 'bum): gsungs pa yin/ / gang du cho ga'i rgyal po 'dis// dbang 'gyur min dang bkug min pa// sa steng 'jig rten gsum 'di na// rig pa'i sngags rgyal de yod min// thub pa'i zla bar rab nub
257b3(rgyud 'bum): cing / / sa yi dkyil 'khor ston pa na// cho ga 'jig rten 'di gnas pa// bstan pa'i don ni byed par 'gyur// 'jam pa'i dbyangs ni rtag tu dge/ 'byung po kun la gzhon nu ni// de tshe
257b4(rgyud 'bum): sangs rgyas mdzad pa ni/ / 'jig rten bstan la byed par 'gyur// cho ga'i rgyal po'i mthu la ni// yun ring dus su 'dod pa rnams// lan cig thos kyang grol 'gyur te// rtag tu de la
257b5(rgyud 'bum): grub par 'gyur/ / sangs rgyas kun gyi gsung dag ni// rtag tu dge ba don yod 'gyur// sngags rnams kun la bsngags pa ni// bzlas dang sbyin sreg rtag 'dod pa'o// dus gsum dag/
257b6(rgyud 'bum): tu shes bya la// mkhyen pa gang du rab 'jug pa// de bzhin 'di la 'jug byed pa// cho ga'i rgyal po dam pa yin// sangs rgyas rnams kyis bstan pa ni// sngags su rab gnas
257b7(rgyud 'bum): de 'dir gsungs/ / sngags de rnam par mi rtog par// cho ga de 'dir gsungs pa yin// don dang don min sems can gyi// dge dang mi dge byed par 'gyur// de tshe 'gro ba'o/
258a1(rgyud 'bum): bzhin du// 'jig rten kun gyi dge mi dge/ de nyid cho ga 'dir spros pa// de bzhin gshegs pa spros pa med// 'jig rten 'das pa rdzogs sangs rgyas// 'jig rten
258a2(rgyud 'bum): phyir ni 'di gsungs so/ / las rnams kun las shin tu lhag/ 'jig rten las las rab tu 'das// chos rnams rnam pa sna tshogs byed// 'jig rten kun gyis rab tu bsngags//
258a3(rgyud 'bum): sngags rgyal las la brtson par byed// de bzhin sems can tshogs la phan// gzhon nu 'jam pa'i dbyangs de ni// sangs rgyas mdzod pa byed par 'gyur// de don yon tan nges grub
258a4(rgyud 'bum): dang / / 'jig rten khams kyi dge mi dge/ bag med ma bskul ma yin te// bskul nas ngas ni chos bshad do// sems can ma lus phan nyid phyir// sangs rgyas kyis ni bshad pa yin// /
258a5(rgyud 'bum): 'das pa'i sangs rgyas kun gyis kyang // bshad cing ngas kyang bshad pa yin// sangs rgyas gdung ni mi gcod phyir// bdag gis kyang ni bshad pa yin// sngags pa'i las rnams kun
258a6(rgyud 'bum): la ni/ kun mkhyen ye shes 'byung don du'o// kun mkhyen ye shes rab 'jug la// las rnams gcig tu bsngags pa yin// 'jig rten sngon las bdag yin te// de ni de ltar
258a7(rgyud 'bum): yongs su spyod/ / de bas las rnams rab tu bya// tshe 'dir dka' ba legs sprad cing // las ldan tshe ni 'di la yang // 'bad pa med par sngags rnams 'grub// las ni 'di la'ang
258b1(rgyud 'bum): snang gyur na/ / skye ba 'di la'ang 'grub par 'gyur// de bas sangs rgyas thams cad kyis// las ni gcig pu rab tu bsngags// las de cho gar ldan pa ni// de ni 'di la myur du 'grub/
258b2(rgyud 'bum): sems can byis pa cho ga nyams// rab tu rmongs pa 'khor bar 'gyur// de bas rnam pa kun gyis ni// las ni gcig pu rab bsngags yin// cho ga las ni yang dag ldan// sgrub pa pos
258b3(rgyud 'bum): ni bsgrub par bya/ / de bzhin cho ga nyams pa'i las// shin tu yun ring dag gis 'grub// bsam gtan med par thar pa med// thar pa med par bsam gtan med// de bas/
258b4(rgyud 'bum): bsam gtan thar pa ni// yang dag ldan pa byang chub brjod// 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi rtsa ba'i cho ga byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod phal po che theg pa chen po shin tu rgyas pa'i mdo las
258b5(rgyud 'bum): las thams cad kyi bya ba'i don gyi le'u rab 'byam bco lnga pa rdzogs so/ / / de nas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas gzhan yang gnas gtsang ma'i gzhal med khang la gzigs
258b6(rgyud 'bum): nas/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la bka' stsal pa/ blo dang ldan pa gnod sbyin gyi bdag po lag na rdo rjes ngal dris nas/ 'jam dpal khyod kyi don thams cad bya ba'i las kyi le'u rab 'byan
258b7(rgyud 'bum): 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor gyi nang du rgya cher sngar bstan pa yin no/ / sngags kun don dang ldan pa yi// rmi lam dag dang mi dge yin// des na zhar la 'di kun ni// sngags kyi bzlas pa bstan pa
259a1(rgyud 'bum): yin/ / gnod sbyin bdag po yid dga' nas// thal sbyar spyi bor byas nas ni// ston la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas// de tshe tshig ni 'di skad zhus// 'jig rten rjes su
259a2(rgyud 'bum): gzung don du/ / blo mchog rnams kyis gsungs pa dang // bdag la'ang rjes su thugs brtse dang // sems can rnams ni bde don du// zlos pa'i sngags ni thams cad la// rmi lam dge dang mi dge/
259a3(rgyud 'bum): dang // sems can mchog dang tha ma yi// spyod pa'i yon tan rgya cher bstan// bzang po'i 'gro ba'i skye gnas dang // rgyu dang shes pa'i rnam pa spyod// 'das dang ma 'ongs shes pa dang //
259a4(rgyud 'bum): dge dang mi dge da ltar gyis// thams cad kun 'gro'o shes pa dang // kun mkhyen ye shes spyod pa dang // snang med dmigs pa med pa dang // spros med rab tu spros pa yin// rnam pa kun
259a5(rgyud 'bum): mchog ldan pa dang / / shis pa ni ba bstan pa yin// sangs rgyas kun gyi mthu rnams ni// blo mchog gis ni bstan pa yin// khyad par du ni zlos pa la// sngags rnams don dang ldan par
259a6(rgyud 'bum): bshad/ / las dang las 'bras sems can gyi// bya ba dus dang de bzhin du// de bzhin snod dang gnas dang ni// cha byad rmi lam zhar la gsungs// gnod sbyin bdag pos thub mchog
259a7(rgyud 'bum): ni/ / de bzhin gshegs pa bdun pa la// gang zhig bskal bzang sangs rgyas pa// shAkya'i skyes mchog bdun pa ni// shAkya'i seng ge dgra las rgyal// 'di ni bdun par rab tu brtags//
259b1(rgyud 'bum): dus kyi bamar rdzogs sangs rgyas// 'jig rten mgon po 'od byed pa// brtson 'grus tshe ning shes rab che// thub pa mthun chen po thob// lag na rdo rje gnod sbyin bdag/ byang chub sems
259b2(rgyud 'bum): dpas phyag byas te/ / rang gi gnas su 'dug gyur nas// b+h+yo ldan de ras cang mi snga// de nas 'jam dpal shes rab che// de tshe thub pas dris pa ni// rdzogs spangs rgyas la daskul
259b3(rgyud 'bum): ni/ / thub mchog dam pa tha mal// legs so bcom ldan rdzogs sangs rgyas// las dang shes pa rgya cher bcas// bcas pa'i gza' ni gtso tha ste// dge dang mi dge legs tshul
259b4(rgyud 'bum): bshad/ / las dang shes pa rgyur bcas pa'i// sems can mang po'i spyod pa gsungs// mchog dang tha ma'i spyod pa dang // dge ba'i don dang ldan pa dang // zlos pa grub pa'i mtshan
259b5(rgyud 'bum): ma dang / / bsgrub bya sgrub min rnam par brtags// 'byor pa 'dod dang de bzhin du// 'jig rten dbang phyug longs spyod 'dod// rgyal po khyad par can 'dod dang // rig pa 'dzin pa
259b6(rgyud 'bum): grub 'dod dang / / thams cad kun 'gro ye shes kyis// mdor bsdus nus ni bshad du gsol// rgyal ba'i sras kyis gsol btab nas// thub pa mchog gis gsungs pa ni// blo
259b7(rgyud 'bum): ldan ka la bing ka'i skad/ / lha yi rnga sgra'i skad dang ni// brtson 'grus chen po tshangs pa'i sgra// 'brug sgra yi ni sgra skad kyis// thub pa bdun pa'i tshigs bcad nas// sangs rgyas gsung
260a1(rgyud 'bum): ni dag pas gsungs/ / gnon du 'di ni dngos don khyab gyur cing // ma byung 'jig rten phan pa sgrub byed la// bzo ba kun la phan pa bde phyir ston// thar pa shes
260a2(rgyud 'bum): shing dag pa'i gnas su 'dug/ bden dang brtse dang bzod pa phan sems dang // gang zhig rtag tu byams dang sbyin la dga'// de dag rtag tu grub pa thob par byed// kye ma gzhan la'ang
260a3(rgyud 'bum): grub pa yod ma yin/ / rtag tu sngags mchog la ni dga' dad dam// bstan dang 'khor lo 'dzin dang 'jam mchog dang // de ni bdud 'dul chos kyi 'khor lo bskor// 'khor lo 'dzin
260a4(rgyud 'bum): par 'dir ni rigs pa yin/ / gang gi gsung ni bzang po yid 'ong zhing // rtag tu byis pa'i skye ba rnam spangs yin// yid 'ong bzang po rnar ni snyan pa dang // dga' skyed snyan pa dang
260a5(rgyud 'bum): nirjes su mthun/ / sems ni tshim byed bde ba rab tu sbyin// 'jam zhes bya bar sangs rgyas yang drug gsungs// de dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i khyad par gyis// gang gi mthu
260a6(rgyud 'bum): ni mkhyen par mi spyod de/ / de dag gi sras de bzhin sar zhugs pa// 'jig rten 'das pa de bzhin bcu yi grangs// khyod kyang lha yi dbang phyug 'jig rten khyad par gyis// thub
260a7(rgyud 'bum): bzang shes par nus pa ma yin no/ / gzugs dang gzugs med de bzhin sa gnas dang // 'dod ldan lha dang mi ni yid las skyes// rnal 'byor grub pa thob dang 'jig rten
260b1(rgyud 'bum): na/ / khyad par can kun de bzhin mi yi gtso// de yi che ba gang gis shes gyur pa// sems can gang de yod pa ma yin te// khyod kyi che ba 'di ni yongs shes pa// 'jam zhes bya bar rab shes
260b2(rgyud 'bum): sangs rgyas yin/ / 'jam dpal zhes byar yongs su btags pa ni// khyod kyi ming ni sngon gyi rgyal bas mdzad// khyod kyi ming du 'di ltar btags byas pa// 'das dang ma byon da ltar
260b3(rgyud 'bum): sangs rgyas kyis/ / gzhan du ma yengs rtse gcig yid dag pas// khyod kyi ming ni 'khor gyi nang du thos// des ni 'di la shis dang zhi ba thob// sring mthar byang chub mchog ni khyad par thob/
260b4(rgyud 'bum): sngags rnams ma lus grub par 'gyur ba dang // 'gro ba'i skye gnas mchog ni rab thob cing // rtag tu chos mchog la ni yang dag gnas// bgegs rnams rnam par spangs shing grub pa thob//
260b5(rgyud 'bum): 'dod pa'i sngags rnams ma lus 'grub par byed// byang chub shing dbang drung du myur bar 'gro// song nas byang chub mchog ni thob par byed// song nas sems can phan phyir der 'dug
260b6(rgyud 'bum): ste/ / sangs rgyas byang chub 'khor lo rab tu bskor// de ltar rgyal ba'i gtso bos yon tan gsungs// 'jam dpal zhes ni khyod kyi ming drad pa// yon tan bso ba mi khyab ces
260b7(rgyud 'bum): rgyal bas gsungs/ / rgyal ba'i gtso bo sngar gshegs thams cad kyis// rtag tu khyod kyi mthu ri bstan pa yin// gzhon nu dag pa khyod kyis sngags rtogs pa// bskal pa grangs
261a1(rgyud 'bum): med rtag tu'ang ston mi nus/ / 'jam dpal khyod kyi sngags kyi spyod pa ni// sangs rgyas ma lus dag gis rab tu bshad// gzhor nu 'di ni thams cad kun tu 'gro// nga yi
261a2(rgyud 'bum): bstan la khyod ni mi mchog bstan/ / dag pa'i gnas la gnas pa'i skye bo rnams// 'dir ni ma lus mtha' dag zhi bar 'gyur// khyod kyi sngags ni nam yang 'da' ma gyur// 'phags pa 'jam
261a3(rgyud 'bum): dpal gyi rtsa ba'i cho ga byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod phal po che theg pa chen po shin tu rgyas pa'i mdo las/ / tshigs su bcad pa'i le'u rab 'byams bcu drug pa rdzogs so//
261a4(rgyud 'bum): de nas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rnam par 'phrul pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so// bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa snyoms par zhugs ma
261a5(rgyud 'bum): thag tu smin mtshams kyi mdzod spu nas 'od zer sngon po dang / ser po dang / dkar po dang / le brgan dang / shel gyi kha dog lta bu byung ste/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di thams cad kyang snang bar byas
261a6(rgyud 'bum): shing / 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan dag kyang snang bar mdzad nas/ gza' dang rgyu skar thams cad kyang yud tsam gyis zil gyis mnan te bkug par gyur to// bkug nas kyang rang rang gi gnas la
261a7(rgyud 'bum): yang dag par sbyar nas/ 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor der sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis bkug nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi mdzod spu de nyid du mi snang bar gyur to// gza' dang /
261b1(rgyud 'bum): skar dang / skar ma thams cad kyi 'od med par byas nas nyam thag pa dang 'jigs pas/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa la skyabs su 'gro zhing thal mo sbyar nas 'dug par gyur te/ de ltar rab tu
261b2(rgyud 'bum): 'dar zhing yang dang yang sa'i steng du 'gyel bar gyur to/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas gza' dang / rgyu skar dang / skar ma thams cad la mkhas pa rnams dang / byis pa'i skye bo'i
261b3(rgyud 'bum): blo dang ldan pa'i sems can rjes su gzung ba'i phyir bka' stsal pa ni/ lha'i tshogs mi dang bcas pa'i grogs po dag khyed cag nyon cig/ 'jig rten sna tshogs ni las nyid la sems can rnams
261b4(rgyud 'bum): rnam par rten par byed de/ gang yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi rdo rje'i sku'ang mngon par grub la/ gang yang lha dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten yang 'khor zhing 'khor ba'i 'brog dgon pa
261b5(rgyud 'bum): chen por rab tu zhugs la/ 'jig rten rnam pa sna tshogs kyi lus mngon par grub ste/ thams cad kyang las dge ba dang mi dge ba dang 'brel pa las skyes la/ de la byed pa'i byed pa po 'am/
261b6(rgyud 'bum): dbang phyug gam/ gtso bo 'am/ skyes bu 'am/ grangs can gyis rab tu 'byin par byed pa ni gang yang med do// las las skyes pa ni ma gtogs te/ de'ang las kyi rkyen gyis skyed pa rgyu la
261b7(rgyud 'bum): ltos pa yin te/ de'ang rgyu dang rkyen la ltos pa'o// de bzhin du rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i rkyen phan tshun du byung ba nye bar 'brel ba yin te/ lhag ma 'byung po rnams mngon par 'grub pa ni
262a1(rgyud 'bum): 'byung ba chen po las skyes pa yin te/ 'byung ba chen po de'ang ma 'ongs pa'i phung po gzhan dag tu 'gro bar skye bar 'gyur zhing / skyes nas kyang 'gro ba dang yul gzhan rgya che ba'i
262a2(rgyud 'bum): rnam par dbye ba dag tu skye bar 'gyur te/ dus gzhan na lugs las bzlog ste 'gag pa dang ye shes kyi mes bskul te/ las kyis bsags pa'i bag chags mtha' dag mngon par bsregs nas
262a3(rgyud 'bum): theg pa rnam gsum mnyam zhing spros pa med par yang dag par sgrub par 'gyur ro/ / theg pa chen po na dus ring por nye bar chags pa'i las bdag gir byed pa dang / dus par ma ni rang rgyal
262a4(rgyud 'bum): bse ru lta bu rang byung gi shes rab rab tu 'byung ba dang / ci gzhan gyi sgra'i rjes su 'jug pa nyan thos ni dus thung ngus mngon par 'tshang rgya ba'o// chos gzhan la blo nyid 'jug par 'gyur ba ni ma yin/
262a5(rgyud 'bum): te/ byis pa rnams kyi rnam par rmongs pa nyid dang / ci ste'ang 'jig rten sna tshogs gnas pa 'di ni las las skyes pa yin te/ phyogs dang cha byad zhig na nad med pa'i go 'phang mya ngan med pa rdul
262a6(rgyud 'bum): med pa las kyis 'jig rten grub pa la ltos pa yin te/ dri ma med pa'i lam rnam par grol ba/ yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa/ shin tu bsil ba'i las nyid kyis byed de/ las
262a7(rgyud 'bum): gzhan la ltos pa ma yin zhing / las dang las ma yin pa las rnam par grol te/ spros pa med pa las nye bar gnas pa yin no// theg pa rnam gsum rab 'jug las//
262b1(rgyud 'bum): zhi ba gzhan yang yod min te// sngags kyang rnam pa gsum du 'gyur// rnam gsum las su yang dag bsgrags// de las rnam zlog rnam gsum las// rnam pa gsum du rab tu snang //
262b2(rgyud 'bum): rigs kyang rnam gsum gsungs pa ni// sngags rnams kun gyi ba ni yang yin// rigs gsum rnam pa brgyad du yang // rgyud dag la ni rab tu snang // rnam pa gcig tu'ang rigs snang ste//
262b3(rgyud 'bum): sngags rnams kun gyi gnas kyang yin// sangs rgyas rnams kyi dag pa'i thugs// rigs ni zhi ba mya ngan 'das// yan lag so so de nyid las// sngags rnams kun tu rab tu bstan// 'jig
262b4(rgyud 'bum): rten skar mkhan yan lag ni/ / grub pa'i rgyur ni rab tu brtags// de nyid yan lag las yin te// rkyen gyi yan lag dag la 'jug/ ji ltar sA lu'i 'bru rnams ni// myu gur rnam par shes
262b5(rgyud 'bum): par byed/ / de bzhin grub pa'i rdzas rnams ni// mtshan nyid kyis ni rnam par shes// ji ltar kha dog dkar po ni// tha snyad kyis ni rnam par brtag/ de bzhin skar ma ldan pas ni// tha snyad
262b6(rgyud 'bum): don du rab tu brtag/ tha macad du ni thams cad ldar// las ni gcig pu rab tu bsngags// las rnams med par mtshon pa med// gang na'ang lus ni yod ma yin// rgyu mtshan dang ni spyod
262b7(rgyud 'bum): pa dang / / skye dang ni rigs deng gnas// rtag tu la nye sna tshogs pa// las de las ni nye bar dmigs// las ni gang du'ang lus can min// nang na gnas shing mtshon pa med// kun
263a1(rgyud 'bum): nas skye bo rgas pa na/ / rnam par 'gyur las nye bar dmigs// de bzhin lus la brten nas ni// las ni lus can dag la snang // 'bras bu dge dang mi dge'i
263a2(rgyud 'bum): rtags/ / skye bar yang ni rab brjod dang // rnam pa sna tshog stsal nye bzang // las rnams sna tshogs dag las byung // dus tshod de bzhin 'gro ba dang // rnam pa sna tshogs srog chags
263a3(rgyud 'bum): sgra/ / grub dang ma grub mtshan ma ni// rkyen gyi don la ltos pa yin// rgyu mtshan spyod dang mtshan ma ni// rkyen la mngon par rab tu brtag/ de bas rnam kun 'bad nas ni// rkyen
263a4(rgyud 'bum): rag las bya ba yin/ / zlos pa'i sngags rnams rtag tu ni// grub pa rgyu la ltos pa yin// 'di dag rkyen gyi yan lag ni// las ni bdag gir byed pas mtshon// mi mtshon sngags
263a5(rgyud 'bum): rnams thams cad ni/ / bgegs las shin tu mi bzad 'gyur// de bas 'di dag thams cad kyi// yan lag tu ni thub pas gsungs// sa dbang rgyal po thams cad mkhyen// byang/
263a6(rgyud 'bum): chub snying por ting 'dzin thob// sngags ni yongs su gsungs pa na// bgegs rnams ma lus rab tu 'jig/ rmi lam ngan dang mtshan ma ngan// bzod par dka' ba'ang rnam par
263a7(rgyud 'bum): 'joms/ / kun mkhyen bdag nyid chen po yi// de thugs byang chub la zhug pa// ma rungs bdud kyi sems kyis ni// bgegs chen 'jig par ga la 'gyur// de nas 'jig pa
263b1(rgyud 'bum): chen po ni/ / des ni rgyu mtshan med par snang // rnam pa sna tshogs 'jigs pa rnams// de la rgyu mtshan med par byung // des ni bsod nams stobs bskyed pa// yur rings dus su yongs
263b2(rgyud 'bum): su bsags/ / do yi sngags kyi stobs kyis ni// de tshe bdud ni bcom par 'gyur// rdzu 'phrul ldan zhing brtson 'grus che// de ni 'od chen ldan par 'gyur// de yi sngags kyi mthu
263b3(rgyud 'bum): yis ni/ / byang chub dam pa thob par 'gyur// rmi lam ngan pa nyer 'jig pa// sngags de 'dir ni bshad par bya// gang dag sa la spyod pa yi// 'byung po'i tshogs kun rab nyon
263b4(rgyud 'bum): cig/ rmi lam ngan pa bzod dka' dang // ma rungs sems can zlog byed pa// rgyal ba sa la'i dbang po yis// sngon ni sngags rgyal yongs gsungs pa// lha yi tshogs dang gza'
263b5(rgyud 'bum): rnams dang / / rgyu skar skar mkhan rnams nyon cig/ gza' dang rgyu skar skar ma rnams// ma rungs tshar gcad don dang ni// 'byung po rnams ni thams cad kyang // zhi ba'i sems ni rab
263b6(rgyud 'bum): bskyed phyir/ / gang dag sa la spyod pa dag/ rkang med rkang mangs dag dang ni// rkang gnyis dang ni rkang bzhi dang // mdor na sems can thams cad ni// 'gro ba dang ni gnas pa yi//
263b7(rgyud 'bum): 'byung po'i tshogs rnams kun nyon cig/ na maHsarba bud+d+hA nAM/ a pra ti ha ta shA sa nA naM/ oM kha kha khA hi dA hi tsu hUM dz+wa la dz+wa la/ pra dz+wa la pra dz+wa la/ tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha ShI phaT phaT swAH/ gtsug tor
264a1(rgyud 'bum): 'bar ba zhes bsgrags pa'i/ / sngags 'di sngags rnams kun gyi mchog/ gang zhig las rnams stong phrag ni// dgu bcu rtsa ba ni dag dang ni// bkra shis thams cad
264a2(rgyud 'bum): 'dod pa yi/ / rnam pa sna tshogs las rnams byed// rmi lam ngan dang mtshan ma ngan// lan cig bzlas pas sel bar byed// las rnams gzhan yang byed pa ni// sngags rnams kun gyi
264a3(rgyud 'bum): bdag po yin/ / 'byung po kun la dbang byed pa// bla ma mnga' bdag sangs rgyas 'di// sngags 'di dran pa tsam gyis ni// sngags rnams ma lus rab tu sel// rdzogs sangs rgyas pa
264a4(rgyud 'bum): lha yi lha/ / thub mchog gis ni de gsungs nas// yud tsam mi gsung bzhugs nas ni// cung zad dus ni gzhes par mdzad// de tshe gnas gtsang gnas pa yi// lha tshogs dag kyang
264a5(rgyud 'bum): 'dug par gyur/ / lha rnams gtso bo thams cad ni// rgyu skar gza' dang skar ma rnams// gtsug tor sngags kyi byin rlabs kyis// 'jigs shing dam tshig la gnas phyir// gtsug
264a6(rgyud 'bum): tor zhes bya mthu bo che/ / mthu mnyam mthu ni chen po ste// brgya phrag lnga 'am bzhi 'am ni// de bzhin bdun nam brgyad dang dgu// gnyis dang drug dang lnga dang bdun// gtsug tor dbang
264a7(rgyud 'bum): por rab tu bsgrags/ / de ltar grangs dang grangs med ni// gtsug tor rgyal po dge ba yin// de dag dang ni sngags 'di mtshungs// sngon gyi rgyal ba rnams kyis bshad// 'phags pa 'jam
264b1(rgyud 'bum): dpal gyi rtsa ba'i cho ga byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod phal po che theg pa chen po shin tu rgyas pa'i mdo las/ las bdag gir byas pa'i rkyen gyi le'u rab 'byam las bcu bdun pa rdzogs so// /
264b2(rgyud 'bum): / de nas bcob ldan 'das shAkya thub pas/ rgyu skar dang / gza' dang / skar ma dang / skar mkhan thams cad 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du gtogs pa dang / phyogs thams
264b3(rgyud 'bum): cad du rnam par gnas pa'i rdzu 'phrul chen po dang ldan pa'i mchog rnams la bka' stsal pa/ grogs po dag khyed cag nyon cig/ gza' dang rgyu skar thams cad kyi mthu'i tshig khyed cag thams
264b4(rgyud 'bum): cad bdag la ston cig/ khyed kyis sngags bya ba'i don thams cad kyang sgrubs shig/ khyed kyis dam tshig la'ang gnas par gyis shig/ sngags kyi rgyal po 'jam pa'i dbyangs kyis
264b5(rgyud 'bum): bstan pa 'di grub na/ de nas gzhan cho ga'i rgyal po grub pa la'ang khyed cag yid dad par gyis shig ces so// de nas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas gza' rnams kyi spyod pa sems can
264b6(rgyud 'bum): thams cad kyi don du gsungs te zlos pas thams cad la phan pa'i phyir dang / sngags kyi don yang rab tu bsgrub pa'i phyir thams cad kyang thams cad mkhyen pas gsungs so// tha skar
264b7(rgyud 'bum): dang ni bra nye dang / / smin drug dang po'i rgyu skar te// rgyu skar gsum po 'di dag la// mig dmar gza' ni bdag po yin// lug ni khyim du bstan pa ste// 'di la grub pa yod ma yin//
265a1(rgyud 'bum): grub mchog bar ma tha ma nyid// grub pa yin par 'dod pa yin// las rnams kun tu'ang mi 'gro zhing // ma rungs gza' ni rnam par zlog/ snar ma mgo dang de
265a2(rgyud 'bum): bzhin du/ / lag tu rgyu skar brjod pa yin// rgyu skar nab so rgyal dang ni// skrag tu'ang rab tu brjod pa yin// mchu dang de bzhin gre dang dbo// de bzhin me bzhi nag pa dang // sa ri
265a3(rgyud 'bum): sa ga lha mtshams dang / / smon dang de bzhin sbubs dang ni// chu ni stong smad dge ba ste// zlos pa la phan rab tu bsngags// rgyu skar gro bzhin mon gru ni// drag po'i las la rab tu bsngags//
265a4(rgyud 'bum): por gre khrums ni stod smad gnyis// rgyu skar sgrub pa'i rgyu yir ro// nam gru la skyes dpal dang ldan// 'thab la dga' zhing 'jigs pa med// rgyu skar lhag ma gtso bo ri// dus kyi tha
265a5(rgyud 'bum): mar 'byung ba min/ / ji bzhin legs par spyod pa dang // grub dang bsod nams rab tu bsgrags// nye rgyal dang ri tha chung dang // 'dod pa dag ni nyid yin no// yang dag bden dang
265a6(rgyud 'bum): 'jig rten dang / / snang bar yang ni brjod pa yin// longs spyod sbyin dang dge sbyin dang // ma 'gags pa dang 'gags pa nyid// grags sbyin gzi brjid rgyal po dang // de bzhin rgyal po
265a7(rgyud 'bum): 'jig rten dang / / rgyu skar mang po gsungs pa ste// stong phrag drug cu rtsa bzhi'o// dus kyi tha ma 'di la ni// 'di dag gi ni nus pa yod// cho ga rgyal 'di bde don du// de tsam shes par gsungs
265b1(rgyud 'bum): pa yin/ / rang nyid 'od ldan sems can ni// de yi dus su rdzogs ldan yin// thams cad nam mkha' la 'gro zhing // na dang 'chi ba rnam par spangs// de yi dus su rgyu skar med// nyi ma tha ba
265b2(rgyud 'bum): skar ma med/ / lha dang lha min 'jig rten med// dang po'i dus ni dus mchog yin// ming med rigs kyang yod ma yin// tshes dang skye ba'i skar ma med// srung ba med cing sngags kyang med//
265b3(rgyud 'bum): dge dang mi dge'i las kyang med// 'di dag rang dgar spyod pa ste// bza' dang bza' bar bya ba'ang med// 'di dag nad med dag pa ste// rtag tu sems can rnam mang ngo // de nas dus
265b4(rgyud 'bum): ni 'bri ba na/ / 'jig rten gnod min rab tu 'jug/ sngon gyi las kyis drangs nas ni// de nas sa yi steng du 'gro// sa steng lha gnas gzhal med khang // lha dang lha min yang dag 'byung //
265b5(rgyud 'bum): bar ma'i dus su phyin gyur na// mi yi lus la yang dag brten// bza' dang btung la brkam chags pas// 'od de dag ni rab tu nyams// lus ni sra ba nyid gyur cing // dge dang mi
265b6(rgyud 'bum): dge rnam par spyod/ / de nas nyin zhag zla ba dang // gza' yi 'od ni 'byung bar 'gyur// de nas bzung nas gang cung zad// skar ma'i dpyad shes pa nyid dang // sems can rjes su
265b7(rgyud 'bum): gzung bar brjod/ / ngas ni de dag bstan pa yin// sngon ni drang srong cha byed gyur// tho ldan tshangs pa'i cha byad dang // dbang phyug chen po'i lus rten cing // yang na khyab 'jug cha byad kyis/
266a1(rgyud 'bum): nam mkha' lding gi lus spang dang // gnod sbyin srin po dri za dang // sha za dag gi lus nyid gyur// skye dang skye bar bdag nyid skyes// byang chub sems dpa' mkhas pa
266a2(rgyud 'bum): ni/ / de dang der ni skye ba la// byang chub sems dpa'i spyod don phyir// rtag tu skye ba'i dbang gis so// bdag nyid de tshe dus dag tu// sngon gyi byang chub sems dpar gyur// mi shes mun pas
266a3(rgyud 'bum): bsgribs pa yi/ / bdag ni de tshe byis par gyur// 'jig rter ji snyed yod pa yi// khyab 'jug gis byas bze spyad dang // lugs kyi bstan bcos sngon gyi rabs// de bzhin rig byed brda sprod
266a4(rgyud 'bum): pa/ / sdeng sbyor skar ma'i dpyad nyid dang // rtsis dang sgyu rtsal 'dod pa dang // log shes de bzhin shes pa dang // de bzhin log par spyod nyid dang // 'jig rten bsdun bcos thams cad
266a5(rgyud 'bum): ni/ / yun ring bdag gis sngon bstan to// zhi ba thub bdag ji lta bar// ye shes bdag gis thob ma yin// byang chub rgyu ni grol der dang // de bzhin du ri thar pa'i phyir// 'khor
266a6(rgyud 'bum): ba'i btson rar rab bcings pas/ / las rnams las kyang bdag ma grol// zhi ba rnam rgyal sangs rgyas nyid// ma nyams go 'phang mya ngan 'das// yun ring don du mngon 'dod
266a7(rgyud 'bum): cing / / legs par yongs su btsal bas thob// de ltar bdag gis rig ldan pas// tshegs chung bya bas thob pa yin// rgyal bas sngon ni bstan pas na// rang byung ye
266b1(rgyud 'bum): shes thob pa yin/ / de 'dra'i gnas ni rab mthong ba// phyi rol lam gyis thob ma yin// byang chub rgyu ni rnyed dka' bas// 'khor ba'i dgon par 'khyams pa yin// bdag
266b2(rgyud 'bum): gi rang byung 'di 'dra ba/ / ye shes bdag gis thob pa min// rigs pa bzang po'i las dga' bas// de ni mya ngan 'das pa thob// bdag gis bstan bcos 'di dag ni// bsdus pa
266b3(rgyud 'bum): 'ba' zhig byas pa yin/ / las las grol ba med par ni// grub pa'i rgyu ni rnyed ma yin// 'khor ba'i yun ring zhags pa 'dis// las kyi 'ching bas nges par bcings// de yi 'gro
266b4(rgyud 'bum): 'di bdag nyid che/ / dgra dang mi dge'ang smin par 'gyur// rgyu skar gza' dang skar ma'i dpyad// mtshon par byed pa kho nar zad// chos dang mi ldan mi rnams dang // gzhan la rtags ni
266b5(rgyud 'bum): snang mi 'gyur/ / de nyid kyis na gza' gsungs pa// dge dang mi dge'i rjes gzung phyir// 'jig rten skyong ba bzhi dag dang // khams ni bzhi po dag dang ni// nu dang sa dang rlung dang me//
266b6(rgyud 'bum): nam mkhar yongs su bstan pa yin// 'byung ba yang dag bsdu ba'i phyir// 'di dag 'byung ba chen po yin// sems can yang dag bsdu ba'i phyir// bag med las kyis byas pa yin//
266b7(rgyud 'bum): de dag dus ni nges pa yis// sngags rnams grub par 'gyur ba yin// de yi skye ba 'bad pa yis// dge dang mi dge bsrungs par bya// rang bzhin gyis ni 'jig rten gtso// lha yi
267a1(rgyud 'bum): dbang phyug brgya byin sogs/ / de yang de tshe de dus su// dus kyi mthar ni yongs su brtags// dus kyi tha ma dag la ni// sngags rnams grub pa nges pa yin// de
267a2(rgyud 'bum): nyid kyis na thub dbang gis/ / gnor nu yongs su brtags pa ni// shes rab chen po 'jam pa'i dbyangs// byis pa gzhon nu'i gzugs dang ldan// 'jig rten 'dir ni kur tu rgyu// sems
267a3(rgyud 'bum): car rjes su gzung bar bzod/ / de yi dus su grub pa ni// 'jam pa'i dbyangs ni rab tu mthong // rgyu skar skar ma'i dpyad shes pa// de yi tshe na 'byung bar 'gyur// nyi shu rtsa bdun rgyu skar

267a5(rgyud 'bum): cad so sor gyur pa ni/ / 'jam dpal gyis ni so sor mdzad// skye ba dang ni spyod pa nyid// khyims rnams kun la rab tu gnas// skye bo rdengs pas khyab gyur la// dge dang mi dge'i

267b1(rgyud 'bum): khyu mchog khyim skyes na/ / khyu mchog nyid la yongs su 'chi// mgo nyid la ni 'jig rten shes// chos ldan mthong na dga' bar 'gyur// smin drug char skyes rtag tu ni// sa bdag rgyal

268a1(rgyud 'bum): skye ba rnam par 'dres gyur pa'i// sems can rnam pa sna tshogs skye// 'dres pa'i 'gro ba phun sum tshogs// 'dres pa'i longs spyod ldan pa yin// de nyid kyis na

268b1(rgyud 'bum): dga'/ / sbyor ba'i khyim la rab brten nas// de ni spen pa dag la skye// nyin dang mtshan du yang dang yang // der gnas sper pa rgyu bar byed// de las skyes pa nyi ma phyed// sems ni
268b2(rgyud 'bum): stobs dang ldan par 'gyur/ / de yi dus la gang skyes pa// de yi mtshan nyid brjod par bya// nor ni 'grub par 'gyur ba dang // dbang phyug gis ni legs mtshan po'o// rgyu skar de
268b3(rgyud 'bum): bzhin rgyal dang ni/ / skag la yang ni gang skyes pa// 'di ni sbal ba'i khyim yin te// dge dang ldan zhing rdzu 'phrul che// mdog ni ser po dang ldan zhing // de ri skye ba mchog tu bstam//
268b4(rgyud 'bum): rtag tu de bzhin mtshan phyed du// 'di ni skye bar bstan pa yin// de yi dus kyi tshad la ni// gal te sems can skye bar 'dod// cho ga mthong ba'i rgyu yis na// 'di ni don rnams

268b6(rgyud 'bum): dga' ba dang / / de ni dpal ldan 'jigs med skye// mchu dang de bzhin gre dang nI// de bzhin dbo yi cha dag ni// snang byed kyi ni zhing du 'gyur// seng ge'i khyim du bya ba yin// de la
268b7(rgyud 'bum): skyes pa dpa' bo che/ / sha yi kha zas de la dga'// ri yi rdzong la brten ras ni// rgyal thabs dbang phyug byed par 'gyur// gal te der skyes thob 'gyur na// ning la gnas shing
269a1(rgyud 'bum): nges sdom brten/ / de bzhin nyi ma 'char ba na// skyes pa 'di la brjod pa yin// rgyu skar dpo yi che dang ni// de bzhin me bzhi nag pa nyid// rgyu skar de la skyes gnas
269a2(rgyud 'bum): pa/ / mi ni yongs su dpa' bar 'gyur// sdom min gzhan gyi bud med 'gro// de ni dmag dpon byed par 'gyur// gal te skye ba thob 'gyur na// nges par rgyal thabs byed par 'gyur// gang
269a3(rgyud 'bum): du skar ma de dag gnas/ / 'di ni bu mo'i khyim du 'gyur// 'di yi bdag po gza' lhag ste// kha cig tu ni gzhan yang yin// 'di dag skar ma mchog la ni// gza' ni mi bzad srung bar
269a4(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur/ / zla ba'ang yang ni bza' ba ste// yang na zla ba'i bu bdag yin// nyin phyed rdzogs na skye ba ni// 'di yi skye ba snang ba yin// nag pa'i cha dang sa rI dang // sa ga'i phyed kyis lhag pa
269a5(rgyud 'bum): la/ / srang gi khyim ste bzang po'i don// zla ba la spyod sems can gyi// 'di ni mi bzad zhing yin te// skal med ma yin nor gyi gnas// mtshan mo yi ni thun gyur gnas// mtshan mo'i
269a6(rgyud 'bum): thun gyi tha ma'o/ / mi ni 'dri la skyes gyur pa// rtag tu btung ba dag la dang // spyi mtshar ma yin ngo tsha med// mang pos bkur cing mchod pa dang // la lar rgyal srid longs spyod dang //
269a7(rgyud 'bum): nor chen thob par 'gyur ba yin// nges med skye ba yongs snang zhing // byis par mas ni spangs pa yin// gal te skye ba thob gyur na// bu mang bde ba skye bar 'gyur// rgyu skar lho mtshams la
269b1(rgyud 'bum): skyes pa/ / bzo yi las ni sgrub pa dang // byams pa'i bdag nyid grogs po mang // rtag tu dpa' zhing rdul phod che// 'jig rten smon la skyes pa ni// mi ni rab gtum brtan pa yin// sdug
269b2(rgyud 'bum): bsngal mang po bzod pa dang / / mi ni ma rungs skye bar 'gyur// khyim ni sdig par bshad par bya// rtag tu rno zhing bab col byed// 'di dag nyid la rtag skyes pa// skye bar yang dag brjod pa
269b3(rgyud 'bum): yin/ / de bzhin nyin phyed nyi ma la// gal te mi ni skyes gyur na// drag cing g.yul las rnam rgyal ba'i// rgyal por de ni nges par 'gyur// byis pa gzhon nu gzugs yod pa'i// de yi skad
269b4(rgyud 'bum): cig gzas mthong 'gyur/ / sa yi lha mo'i bur 'gyur ba// gang yin de ni mig dmar gsungs// de nyid phyir na sa la spyod// rang bu nyid kyis gsod par byed// de las gzhan pa bzlog pas
269b5(rgyud 'bum): ni/ / dge dang mi dge skye ba nyid// tshe ring gzi brjid ldan pa dang // shes ldan nyid du'ang skye bar 'gyur// lha mtshams la ni rab skyes pa// shes rab che zhing grogs la byams// mig
269b6(rgyud 'bum): dmar gyi ni zhing 'di yin/ / yang na rtag tu gza' 'dres yin// rgyu skar sbubs la skyes pa dang // de bzhin du ni chu stod dang // chu smad kyi ni cha dag la// gzhu yi khyim du rab tu bstar//
269b7(rgyud 'bum): de yi skye ba'i skye ba ni// phur bu'i zhing der bstan pa yin// nyim phyi dror gyur pa dang // rdza ba nam spang gyur pa la// de yi skye ba zhes bstan pa// gang zhig skyes pa skye ba'i rgyu// snrubs la
270a1(rgyud 'bum): skyes pa rang rigs 'jig/ tha mar bdang por 'gyur ba yin// skyes gnas par mar longs spyod ni// thob par de ni the tsom med// gzhon pa yongs su 'das
270a2(rgyud 'bum): pan/ / snang byed dkyil 'khor ji lta bar// rgas par gyur na rgyal por 'gyur// longs spyod che zhing nor cher 'gyur// dma' ba'i phyogs su lus 'gyur gyi// gzhan gyi phyogs sum
270a3(rgyud 'bum): yin no/ / de las gzhan du bzlog par ni// rnam pa sna tshogs skye bo snang // chu smad kyi ni cha dag dang // gro bzhin nyid du bstan pa dang // mon gru rgyu skar mchog nyid ni// khyim 'di
270a4(rgyud 'bum): chu srin kho na yin/ / 'di ni spen pa'i zhing yin te// yang na gza' gzhan gyis mtshan pa'o// rtag tu 'di la skyes gnas pa// de yang sa steng 'di la snang // dang po'i mtha' dang bar
270a5(rgyud 'bum): ma'i mtha'/ / mtshan mo'i rwa ni 'das pa la// de dag las skyes longs spyod cher// kun nas snang bar 'gyur ba yin// mtho dam dma' ba'i rigs gnas shing // de dag sa yi
270a6(rgyud 'bum): bdag por 'gyur/ / rab gtum kha dog nag po 'am// sngo bsangs mdog tu de dag 'gyur// mig mtha' dmar zhing 'jam pa dang // rtag tu dpa' zhing rtul yang phod// de
270a7(rgyud 'bum): bzhin nu yis khyab pa yi/ / phyogs su rgyal po byed par 'gyur// tshe ring bu ni med pa dang // sdug bsngal mang po bzod par 'gyur// de las gzhan pa zlog pa la// skye bo rnam par
270b1(rgyud 'bum): zlog par snang / / mor gru'i phyeng dang mon gre dang // de bzhin khrums sdod phyed dag ni// de yi khyim du 'gyur ba ni// bum pa zhes ni brjod pa yin// 'di la gza' yi gtso bo ri// zhing du/
270b2(rgyud 'bum): rtag tu brten pa yin// de bzhin 'dres pa'ang zla ba dang // rdo ldan pa wa sangs nyid yin// 'di dag skye bar 'gyur ba ni// mtshan mo'am nam ni langs par snang // rtag tu skye 'di
270b3(rgyud 'bum): bzang po ste/ / 'jig rten spyod pa dag pa yin// mi ni ma rungs las byed cing // blo dang ldan par brjod pa yin// longs spyod sna tshogs phun sum tshogs// sa skyeng rjes su spyod
270b4(rgyud 'bum): par 'gyur/ / de las gzhan du zlog na ni// dbul zhing nad rnams snod du 'gyur// rgyu skar khrums sprad nyid dang ni// nam gru zhes ni brjod pa dang // khrums stod kyi ni bzhi cha la/
270b5(rgyud 'bum): khyim ni nya ru rab tu brtags// skye ba de dag rtag gnas pa// kun tu ji ltar snang zhe na// mtshan mo'i thun gyi bar ma dang // nyin par nyi ma shar bar dang // nyi ma thun phyed 'das pa
270b6(rgyud 'bum): dang / / nyin phyed cung zad 'das pa dang // lhag ma khru gang tsam 'das par// 'di yi dus su'ang skyes pa ni// dag pa dang ni rab dag nyid// pa wa sangs kyis rab tu mchod//
270b7(rgyud 'bum): pa wa sangs kyi zhing zhes pa// lha yi rigs zhes tshangs par spyod// ser dang dkar ba'i mdog dag gi/ gza' yis kyang ni rab tu bsten// des shing rtag tu dge ba dang /
271a1(rgyud 'bum): chos ldan mchog tu bzang ba yin// mi ni de la skyes gyur pa// yan lag kun kyang shin tu mdzes// brtson 'grus che zhing rgyal po 'dod// gnyen dang shes
271a2(rgyud 'bum): ni brtan pa dang / / tshe ring longs spyod che ba dang // dma' ba'i yul la yang dag rten// shar gyi phyogs la brten nas ni// de dag rtag tu skye bar 'gyur// de dag mya ngan phyogs
271a3(rgyud 'bum): su ni/ / rtag tu skye bar mi 'gyur te// nya ni thang la yongs spyod par// nam yang snang ba ma yin no// drang srong rnams kyi chu gnas dang // chu bo dag tu 'phel bar 'gyur//
271a4(rgyud 'bum): de la skye ba rab bstan pa// khyim nyid du ni rab tu bstan// mi ni de dag la skyes pa// dma' ba'i yul du rnam par 'phel// rtag tu shar gyi phyogs gnas pa'i// sa bdag
271a5(rgyud 'bum): skal ba chen por 'gyur/ / phur bu dang ni spen pa dag/ gza' mchog gis ni mngon par bltas// shar gyi phyogs kyi bdag po byed// de dag la skyes the tsom med// khyim ni
271a6(rgyud 'bum): rnam pa mang po dang / / rgyu skar du ma gsungs pa yang // rnam pa sna tshogs gza' mchog kyang // sngon gyi dus yin da ltar min// mi rnams de las skye ba yang // de bzhin tshes
271a7(rgyud 'bum): grangs bco lnga dang / / nyin zhag sum cu dag nyid de// des na zla bar rab tu bstan// zla phyed nyin mtshan bco lnga ste// zla phyed gnyis la zla bar brjod// des na zla ba bcu
271b1(rgyud 'bum): gnyis la/ / lo gcig tu ni rab tu bsgrags// 'di tsam dus kyi tshod la ni// dus kyi tha mar yongs su brtags// rtsod pa'i dus su phyin pa na// 'di yi grangs su rab tu
271b2(rgyud 'bum): bstan/ / mi rnams tshe ni de bzhin du// lo brgya dag tu bsgrags pa yin// de dag lo tshogs phyin pa na// dus ni drug tu rab tu brjed// dang po bar dang tha par ri// de dag gsum
271b3(rgyud 'bum): du rab tu bstan/ / lha mtshams la ni sa 'gul na// mi rnams 'dir ni tshe ring 'gyur// de dag pi yi 'jig rten 'dir// skye zhing 'phel bar 'gyur ba yir// mi ma yin pa 'jig
271b4(rgyud 'bum): rten 'dir/ / phan tshun du ni 'byed par 'gyur// de dag rnam skrag 'jigs pa dang // phan tshun du ni rnam par rgyu// lha dang lha min gtso bo ni// gang tshe 'thab par rab 'jug pa//
271b5(rgyud 'bum): de tshe mi yi 'jig rten 'dir// nad ni 'byung bar byed pa yin// mjug rings las dang skar mda' dang // gnam lcags dang ni rdo rje dang // dud pa phyogs ni mtha' dag tu//
271b6(rgyud 'bum): du ba mjug rings rab tu snang // zla ba nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la// mun nag gis ni khebs par gnas// nyi zla rdzu 'phrul chen po dag/ bug pa yod par snang ba dang // de ltar
271b7(rgyud 'bum): rnam pa sna tshogs pa/ / rnam mang yang ni snang 'gyur na// mu ge tshe ni nyams pa dang // de bzhin yul 'khor 'jig pa dang // mi yi bdag po 'chi ba dang // sdom brtson 'jigs
272a1(rgyud 'bum): 'jigs pa chen po 'byung / / 'jig rten dag ni thams cad la// der ni 'jigs su rung ba 'byung // mchu dang tha skar dag dang ni// nab so la ni sa 'gul na// de
272a2(rgyud 'bum): tshe dbus kyi yul dag tu/ / rkun ma bab col byed par gnod// lho yi phyogs la gnas pa yi// rgyal po chen po rnam par 'jig/ bra nye smin drug nyid dang ni// gang tshe snar ma dang ni mgo
272a3(rgyud 'bum): 'gul na 'jig rten 'jigs pa che/ / de la dgos pa rab tu 'byung // nub phyogs na ni gnas pa yi// de tshe rgyal po 'chi bar 'gyur// gang yang mtha' 'khob gnas pa yi// kla klo rku bas
272a4(rgyud 'bum): 'tsho byed dang / / de bzhin 'bigs byed steng gnas dang // nang du mi yi dbang phyug gnas// de yang de yi dus dag tu// nad kyis brgyal zhing gnod par 'gyur// de dag la ni dgra rnams
272a5(rgyud 'bum): 'byung / / gcig la gcig ni yul 'phrog 'gyur// rgyu skar lag dang rgyal dang no// skag dang de bzhin the dang dbo// 'di dag la ni sa 'gul nA// mi bdag kun ni ma mthun nas//
272a6(rgyud 'bum): phan tshun gnod pa byed 'gyur ba// gsad dang 'ching dang gnod pa dang // mu ge dag kyang rab tu 'byung // me bzhi nag pa sa ri dang // de bzhin lha mtshams snron nyid la// snod kyi
272a7(rgyud 'bum): 'jig rten sar gyur pa/ / 'di la gang tshe 'gul 'gyur na// kha ba can gnas rba klo dang // rkun ma kun nas gnas pa dang // bal yul gyi ni bdag po dang // kha sha'i lung bar
272b1(rgyud 'bum): gnas pa yi/ / der ni mi bdag ma lus pa// phar tshun du ni mi mthun nas// thams cad g.yul la spyod 'gyur bar// 'dir ni the tsom med pa yir// rgyu skar gang yin sbubs
272b2(rgyud 'bum): dang ni/ / chu ni stod smad gnyis ka la// sa yi steng du 'gul bar ni// 'di dag la ni rab mthong na// shar gyi phyogs kyi mi rnams dang // bon dra o dra ka ra ru// bang ka la bdag
272b3(rgyud 'bum): rgyal po na/ / 'chi bar 'di la the tsom med// go TA'i bdag po dpal dang ldan// yul 'khor gzhan gyis yongs bskor ram// 'phral la na bar gyur pa dang // la lar yang na
272b4(rgyud 'bum): 'chi bar 'gyur/ / 'jig rten rgya mtsho'i ngogs gnas dang // gang+gA'i 'gram du yang dag gnas// chu yis thams cad khyer ba'am// nad rnams pang pos kur non byed// gre
272b5(rgyud 'bum): bzhin dang ne mon gru dang / / mon gre dang ni chu stod dang // de bzhin du ni chu smad dang // gal te nam gru las skyes pa// rab tu 'gul ba nyin phyed la// snod kyi 'jig rten yang
272b6(rgyud 'bum): dag 'gul/ / sa rnams thams cad rab 'gul ba// ri bo dang ni gnas su bcas// rtag tu nam mkha' la snang ba// 'phar zhing 'og tu 'byung byed na// byang phyogs kyi ni
272b7(rgyud 'bum): yul dag dang / / nub phyogs la ni yang dag gnas// lho yi phyogs ni thams cad dang // phyogs rnams kun la gnas byed pa'i// mi mchogs ni mang spyod pa// phan tshun
273a1(rgyud 'bum): du ni gnod pa byed/ / sems can rnams ni snod chen ldan// mu ges yul 'khor 'bye bar 'gyur// tho rangs sa ni 'gul gyur na// lus can shis dang zhi bar 'gyur//
273a2(rgyud 'bum): de las cung zad phyi du sa na// drag po'i 'gul ba rab tu skye// de nas cung zad phyir 'gul na// yul ni ma ga d+hA ra gnod dang // aM ga'i yul du gnod 'gyur te// ma ga d+ha rgyal de bzhin
273a3(rgyud 'bum): no/ / de nas cung zad nyin phyed dam// phyi dro'i dus su gyur pa na// gal te sa ni 'gul bar gyur// sa steng ma lus nyid dag gi/ rab tu byung ba thams cad la// rtag tu nad ri
273a4(rgyud 'bum): 'byung ba thob/ / rims dang yi ge 'chus dang gzer// de bzhin nad ni 'brum bu yis// zhag bdun btab par gyur nas ni// de nas de dag sos par 'gyur// de nas nyi ma yang 'das
273a5(rgyud 'bum): nas/ / sa ni gal te 'gul gyur na// rigs bzhi dag gi mchog gyur pa// bram ze rtswa ni so ma 'thung // nyon mongs rgyal po'i blon po ni// 'chi bar 'gyur bar the tsom med// mdun na
273a6(rgyud 'bum): 'don ni chos dang ldan/ / blon po'am zham 'bring byed pa na// gzhan yang sdom can gtso bo ni// sngags rgyud don la mkhas pa dang // bram ze dang ni rgyal rig dang // de bzhin dmangs
273a7(rgyud 'bum): rigs rje'u rigs dang / / brtan pa mkhas pa dag dang ni// bstan bcos de nyid don lugs ldan// gsod dang rab tu nyams pa'am// dran ldan thos dang de nyid shes// sngon byung/
273b1(rgyud 'bum): ba ni sems pa dag/ myur du nad kyis 'jigs 'gyur te// gnam lcags rdo rjes shing la bzhin// de nas nyi ma nub pa na// de nas yang ni song ba na// phyi dro dus kyi mtha' la ni// gal
273b2(rgyud 'bum): te sa ni rab tu 'gul/ / de bzhin sems can 'dres pa dang // dud 'gro dag gi 'gro ba dang // mi yi 'jig rten gtso bo dag/ de tshe 'gul dang rnam par 'jig/ mtshan mo'i thun ni dang po
273b3(rgyud 'bum): la/ / gal te sa ni 'gul gyur na// sems can 'dres pa sna tshogs dang // dud 'gro'i skye gnas rnams su ni// mi ni 'jig rten gtso rnams su// char chen rab tu 'byung bar 'gyur//
273b4(rgyud 'bum): cung zad thun de bri gyur la// sa ni 'gul bar gyur pa yin// de tshe rtags de snang gyur na// rlung dang chur pa'i 'jigs chen 'byung // de nas thun de zad pa'i mthar// 'gul snang las
273b5(rgyud 'bum): ni mi bzad pa/ / nub phyogs mi yi bdag po yi// pha rol dmag tshogs 'byung bar shes// thun ni gnyis pa dang po la// gal te sa ni 'gul 'byung gyur// gzhan gyi dmag
273b6(rgyud 'bum): tshogs nad dang 'chi/ / khong pa'i nad ni mi bzad 'byung // mkhris pa bad kan las gyur nad// skye bo rnams la 'byung bar 'gyur// 'byung po rnams ni skyo 'gyur zhing // de tshe phyogs
273b7(rgyud 'bum): dang phyogs su 'gro/ / de nas gnyis pa'i thun dkyil du// sa ni rab tu 'gul byung na// rlung chen 'byung bar shes bya ste// shing dang lha khang 'gyel bar 'gyur// yang thog ra ba ri rnams
274a1(rgyud 'bum): kyi/ / rtse mo 'jig par the tsom med// gnas dang 'dug gnas bzang po dang // khang pa dang ni rta babs dang // dud 'gro rnams kyi 'dug gnas kyang // sa
274a2(rgyud 'bum): myur du lhung bar 'gyur/ / de nas mtshan phyed dus dag tu// gal te sa ni 'gul ba byung // de tshe shar phyogs yul gyi bdag/ mi mchog gtso bo 'chi ba 'am// de'u 'chi bar 'gyur ba 'am//
274a3(rgyud 'bum): mu ge 'byung bar rab tu ston// bar ma'o thun ni bri gyur nas// tha mar nye la 'gul ba byung // sa rnams dag ni ma lus la// zhi zhing nad med nges par ston// de nas mtshan phyed
274a4(rgyud 'bum): mthar gyur la/ / gal te sa ni 'gul bar snang // gsher che yul gyi dbus dag tu// mi yi bdag po nad kyis gnod// phan tshun mi mthun gyur nas ni// sdug bsngal mi bzad 'chi
274a5(rgyud 'bum): bar 'gyur/ / thun ni gsum par phyin nas 'gul// byis pa rnams la bde ba 'byung // sbrang bu sha sbrang phye leb dang // rkun po rnams ni 'jig par 'jug/ the rerangs 'gul bar gyur
274a6(rgyud 'bum): na ni/ / tshe ring nad med lo legs byed// grong khyer gyi ni khor yug dag/ me yis 'tshig par shes par bya// nyi ma 'char ba'i dus dag tu// sa ni rab tu 'gul ba 'byung // dbus
274a7(rgyud 'bum): kyi yul ni thams cad du/ / rkun mas rnam par 'tshe bar 'gyur// de tshe zhag ni bdun dag las// rgyal po 'chi bar snang ba yin// gang du stobs ni rab che ba// sa ni 'gul bar gyur pa
274b1(rgyud 'bum): yin/ / de tshe gnas ni de dag tu// dge dang mi dge'i sbyor ba snang // skar mda' gnam grums 'gul ni// skar mda' dkar po 'bar 'gyur na// des ni sngar bstan sel bar byed//
274b2(rgyud 'bum): de bzhin dkar mdog rtag tu ni// dge zhing rab tu bsngags pa yin// mi bzad chen po kha dog dmar// me yis 'tshig par nye ba ston// dud kha'i mdog nag nag po na//
274b3(rgyud 'bum): rgyal po 'chi bar ston pa yin// ser ba'am yang na ser skya 'am// 'dres pa'i mdo ga ni snang gyur na// de tshe 'dres pa'i las 'gyur ba// skar mda' lhung bas rnam par spyon//
274b4(rgyud 'bum): gnam grum nyid du bstan pa ni// gar 'byung de ni ston pa ste// gal te dbus na de tshe dbus// yul nyid du ni rab tu bstan// sgra brnyan snyan pa byung na ni// bde zhing nad med
274b5(rgyud 'bum): ston par byed/ / ma rungs mi bzad 'jig rten du// rnga sgra yis ni dge ba sbyin// 'jigs dang 'jigs rung shin tu smra// der ni mu ge ston pa yin// de la sogs par
274b6(rgyud 'bum): sbyor ba ni/ / rtag tu gza' rnams 'dod pa yin// rgyu skar 'di dag mthong ba la// grub pa'i las ni de tshe bya// tha skar snar ma nyid dang ni// rgyal dang khrums ni stong smad
274b7(rgyud 'bum): gnyis/ / nam gru dang ni lha mtshams dag/ bzlas pa'i dus su rab tu bsngags// 'di dag la ni sngags rnams 'grub// grub pa'i don yang ster bar byed// skar ma dag
275a1(rgyud 'bum): ni 'di dag la/ / dkyil 'khor nyid kyang bri bar bya// gza' yi res kyi gtso ba ni// ser dang dkar bar snang ba yin// tshes ni 'di dag la dge ste// rtag tu tha
275a2(rgyud 'bum): ba nya ba yin/ / yul gzhan dag tu 'gro byed dang // dkyil 'khor dag kyang bri bar bya// dang po gsum pa lnga pa dang // bcu pa dang ni bdun pa dang // bcu gsum pa la ci bde bar//
275a3(rgyud 'bum): mi yi bdag po 'gro bar brtag/ skye bo kun la dge ba sbyin// chas shing 'gro bar rab tu bsngags// dkyil 'khor gyi ni sngags rgyud dag/ sngags rnams thams cad mi 'dri'o// 'di
275a4(rgyud 'bum): dag la ni sngags mi 'grub/ / bgegs kyi rgyur ni bstan pa yin// 'gro dang sbyin sreg grub pa la// tshes grangs gza' ni dam par ldan// phur bu pa sangs zla ba dang // gza' lhag
275a5(rgyud 'bum): mchog ni las kun la/ / gza' mchog 'di dag rtag tu ni// bzhi po che dang ldan pa ni// sa steng 'jig rten kun tu ni// 'gro ba'i las ni grub par byed// ma rungs 'chi ltas bral ba
275a6(rgyud 'bum): yi/ / nyi ma la ni brtag par bya// yud tsam bcu gnyis kho na ni// de yi dus su rab tu sbyar// dkar dang byams ldan nyid dang ni// mig dmar du yang rab tu bstar// drag po dbang
275a7(rgyud 'bum): chen dag pa dang / / byi bzhin nyid dang legs mdzes dang // 'khor dang 'khor bar byed pa nyid// dge ba sbyin zhes bstan pa yin// zla ba mchog ni sbyin pa nyid// 'di dag bcu gnyis
275b1(rgyud 'bum): mtshan nyid yin/ / yud tsam dag tu bstan pa ni// nyin zhag sum cu nyid la'o// bcu pa char ni 'bab 'gyur te// bcu bzhi pa ni yul 'khor 'jig/ brgyad pa bcu gnyis pa nyid dang //
275b2(rgyud 'bum): bzhi pa nyid ni spang bar bya// myur la sogs pa'i grangs dang ldan// mar ngo la ni mtshan mo yin// lhag ma bgegs ni byed pa yang // log 'dren yin te bzhi pa'o// 'di dag grangs
275b3(rgyud 'bum): ni ldan pa la/ / dus 'di dag tu rab tu bstan// mig ni 'byed dang 'dzum pa dang // se gol myur ba'i 'gros dag ni// 'di dag dus kyi tshad dag ni// rgya cher yang ni bstan par bya//
275b4(rgyud 'bum): se gol brgya yi tshogs dag la// rtsa rgyun gcig tu bstan pa yin// rtsa rgyun bzhi la chu tshod bstan// chu tshod bzhi la thun zhes bya// thun bzhi la ni nyin par te// mtshan mo dag kyang de
275b5(rgyud 'bum): bzhin bstan/ / de ltar brgyad dang ldan pa la// nyin mtshan du ni rab tu brtag/ mig gi 'byed 'dzums bcu la ni// skad cig tsam du rab tu brtags// skad cig bcu zhes bshad/
275b6(rgyud 'bum): pa ni// yud tsam du ni yongs su brtags// yud tsam bzhi la thun gcig ces// sngags rig pas ni yongs su brtags// 'di tsam dus kyi tshad la ni// gsum gyi grangs su//
275b7(rgyud 'bum): yongasu brtag/ sbyin sreg dus dang bzlas pa yi// grub pa'i dus dang sbyar bar bya// nyal ba'i dus dang mi nyal dang // rtag tu nyin zhag phrugs btung la// nyin dang mtshan ni nyim zhes
276a1(rgyud 'bum): desar ming ni 'jug pa yid/ / nyim bco lnga rjid la ni// zlab byed du rab tu bstun// tha myed gnyis la thab nas// ces shes 'jigs pa med par bsta
276a2(rgyud 'bum): de bzhir zla ba zla drug gis/ / sgra gcan gyis kyang 'dzin pa yin// de ras zla ba bcu gnyis la// lo lo sbar ni rab tu bsgrags// de nas lo ni bcu gnyis la// lo chen zhes ni de la bya/
276a3(rgyud 'bum): gza' dang rgyu skar phyin ci log/ lha min dbang po thams cad kyang // de nas lo ni bcu gnyis la// 'dir ni dge dang mi dge byed// gang tshe yang ngor lha min dbang // sgra gcan rab tu snang
276a4(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur zhing / / zla ba nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor ni// ma lus rab tu zin gyur na// mtshon gyi tshogs ni chen po yang // sa yi steng du sdang bar 'gyur// de la sogs pa chen po ni// dus dang
276a5(rgyud 'bum): dus su rab sbyor 'gyur/ / rnam pa du ma mang po yi// bgegs ni mi bzad snang bar 'gyur// dus kyi tha mar phyin pa na// 'jig rter sdod ni chos mir la// rgyu skar sbubs la gnas pa
276a6(rgyud 'bum): la/ / zla ba ma lus 'dzin 'gyur zhing // mtshan mo ma lus 'dzin pa nyid// zla ba 'dzin pa nub bzhin dang // gal te nyi ma nyin par ni// nub bzhin du ni 'dzin gyur dang // nyi ma
276a7(rgyud 'bum): dang ni zla ba nyid/ / mtshan phyed dag tu bzung gyur nas// lha min dbang po'i grob ma yis// gal te 'jigs shing nub gyur na// shar phyogs gnas pa'i rgyal po ni// sdang bas gsor par
276b1(rgyud 'bum): the tsom med/ / rang nyid 'chi ba'i 'jigs pas sam// gzhan gyis de ni gsod par 'gyur// rba kro yi ni bdagra po nyid// shAr phyogs su ni gsod par byed// o TA'i yul gyi mi rnams dang /
276b2(rgyud 'bum): de tshe rdo rje zhes bdag kyang // gal te tha skar snar ma dang // de bzhin du ni bra nye dang // smin drug dag la nyi zla ni// gang tshe 'dzin par snang gyur na// rnam pa sna tshogs bad kar dang //
276b3(rgyud 'bum): mkhris pa dang ni rlung gyur dang // de bzhin 'dres par gyur pa ni// gzhan yang lus cad kun la 'byung // byis pa dag ni thams cad la// rnam pa du ma'i nad rnams 'byung // gal te
276b4(rgyud 'bum): rgyu skar mchu dang ni/ / gre dang de bzhin bo nyid dang // me bzhi nag pa sa ri dang // sa ga dag gi rgyu skar ni// de la nyi zla shar ba na// 'dzin par the tsom med 'gyur zhing // nyi zla gzhi ni
276b5(rgyud 'bum): shar phyogs su/ / sgra gcan gyis ni zin gyur na// shar phyogs mi yi bdag po dang // lA Da yul gyi bdag po dang // ang ga maM ga d+ha rgyal po// mig gi nad kyis 'debs pa'am//
276b6(rgyud 'bum): bu rnams 'chi bar 'gyur ba'am// de rnams 'chi bas nyer 'jigs 'gyur// dgra rnams sdang ba'i sems ldan rnams// tshogs kyang de tshe 'byung bar 'gyur// mgo dang lag dang
276b7(rgyud 'bum): nab so dang / / de bzhin rgyal dang skad nyid dang // nyi ma zla ba 'di dag la// sgra gcan gyis zin snang gyur na// ma ga d+ha rgyal gnod 'gyur zhing // de bzhin yul mi dag la'ang gnod//
277a1(rgyud 'bum): blon po nad 'jigs shes rab bya// 'ching dang nyon mongs grong khyer 'gyur// lha mtshams dang ni snron dag la// sgra gcan gyis zir kun la snang /
277a2(rgyud 'bum): tshend rnams kun tu 'gro// yul mi kun la'ang nad rnams 'byung // gsad dang 'ching dang nyon mongs dang // gnod pa rnam pa du ma byung // 'ching dang gnan gyi dmag tshogs ni//
277a3(rgyud 'bum): skye bo'i gtso la de dag skye// chu stod dang ni gro bzhin dang // de bzhin chu sdad kho na la// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas dang // zla ba la ni dmar bar snang // gza' ni 'dzin
277a4(rgyud 'bum): par snang gyur pa/ / rtag tu mu ge 'byung bar 'gyur// gro bzhin mon gre'i rgyu skar dang // de bzhin du ni khrums stod dang // gang tshe mon gre dag la ni// gal te nyi zla gzas
277a5(rgyud 'bum): zin te/ / gza' ri byung bar shes gyur ra// kha dog nag pa la brten nas// mya ngan chen po nyon mongs dang // mu ge kun tu 'byung bar ni// yul mi kun la 'byung ba dang //
277a6(rgyud 'bum): rgyal po rkun ma'i 'jigs chen 'byung // nam gru rgyu skar nyid dang ni// gang tshe khrums smad dag la ni// zla ba nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor du// shar nas sgra gcan 'dzin pa na// nub
277a7(rgyud 'bum): phyogs nas ni nyi ma 'dzin/ / ma ga d+ha ni mi yi bdag/ sems can rgyal po'i thabs nyams par// zla phyed gcig gis snang bar 'gyur// rtag tu sgra gcar 'gro ba yin//
277b1(rgyud 'bum): mtshar ma 'di dag bstan pa yin// zla ba nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi// phyogs ni gang nas zin gyur pa// de dang de yi phyogs dag tu// dge dang mi dge 'byung bar 'gyur// gang
277b2(rgyud 'bum): nyid sa steng 'gul ba ni/ / 'jig rten mtshan mas bstan pa dag/ dge dang mi dge de dang der// de bzhin gzas zin shes par bya// khug rna ser ba mjug rings ni// nyi ma
277b3(rgyud 'bum): lnga yi bar du yod/ / de 'og 'jig rten sems las 'byung // ngogs la spyod cing gnas pa yin// yul mi thams cad 'jig 'gyur zhing // nad kyi gzhi ni 'byung ba yin//
277b4(rgyud 'bum): byang phyogs gang+gA'i 'gram gyi ni// rgyal po dag kyang 'jig par 'gyur// de bzhin kha ba can gyi dbus// bgrod dka' khrang khrod la gnas dang // sa yi bdag po la gnas
277b5(rgyud 'bum): dang / / kho re yug na rtse rje dang // byang phyogs gang+gA'i 'gram dag na// de tshe 'gram spyod bdag po dag/ mya ngan gdung ba du ma yis// skye bo'i bdag po de 'ching 'gyur//
277b6(rgyud 'bum): rgyu skar gang las 'gul ba// de la khug rna yang dag bstan// phyogs rnams ma lus khug rna ni// mi bzad 'od ni spangs pa dang // nyin nag lnga yi bar du yang // rtag tu
277b7(rgyud 'bum): nyin zhag mang por ni/ / phan tshun chos ni mi mthong dang // mi yi spyod yul mthong ba yin// mi rnams dag ni phan tshun du// der ni mthong bar 'gyur ma yid// der ni 'jig
278a1(rgyud 'bum): chen 'byung bar shes/ / rgyal po yul 'khor bcas te 'jig/ skar mda' khor yug dag tu ni// gang dag las kyis byung gyur pa// phyogs kyi mthar ni rab
278a2(rgyud 'bum): snang ba/ / gnyis dang gsum ni mi bzad yin// mtshan mo dbang po'i gzhu nyid dang // bya rog gral te 'dab ma dkar// dkar ba'am yang na kha dog nag/ yang na dkar dang nag par
278a3(rgyud 'bum): mthong / / phyin log 'dab chags kha dog dang // phyin ci log gi dus sgra dang // phyin ci log gi bya rnams yod// gang du de ni 'jigs chen 'byung // rkang gnyis rkang pa bzhi nyid dang //
278a4(rgyud 'bum): rkang med dang ni rkang mangs dang // 'dab chags dud 'gro srog chags rnams// phyin ci log 'gyur 'jigs chen 'byung // khyi ni gyen du gdong bltas te// yang dang yang du zugs 'gyur ba// /
278a5(rgyud 'bum): nyon par ram ni mtshan mo ru// gang du der ni 'jigs chen 'byung // de ltar rnam pa du ma dang // rnam mang gang du rab brtags pa// der ni char mi 'bab par 'gyur// rgyal po'i
278a6(rgyud 'bum): tshogs kyang rnam par 'jig/ ji ltar skye ba'i skar ma ni// dge dang mi dge'i srog chags yin// de bzhin mtshan ma gang skyes pa// dge dang mi dge byed pa yin// sngon gyi rgyu ni ma yin
278a7(rgyud 'bum): pa/ / rgyu mtshan cung zad mi mthong ste// rgyu med rab tu 'jug byed pa'i// bgegs 'byung ba ni yod ma yin// 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi rtsa ba'i cho ga byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod
278b1(rgyud 'bum): phal po che theg pa chen po shin tu rgyas pa'i mdo las/ skar ma'i dpyad kyi rgyu mtshan shes pa'i le'u rab 'byams las bco brgyad pa rdzogs so// / de nas bcom ldan 'das
278b2(rgyud 'bum): shAkya thub pas/ gzhan yang gza' dang / rgyu skar dang / skar ma dang / skar mkhan gyi tshogs rnams la bka' stsal pa/ kye kye gza' dang rgyu skar gyi tshogs rnams khyed cag thams
278b3(rgyud 'bum): cad nyon cig/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i cho ga'i rgyal po 'di las 'da' bar ma byed cig/ sngags dang / rgyud dang / dbang bskur ba dang / dkyil 'khor dang / ro
278b4(rgyud 'bum): ga rnams dang / bzlas pa dang / nges par sdom pa dang / rig pa grub pa la 'jug pa dang / rig pa 'dzin pa rnams kyi cho ga dang / rgyu skar gyi spyod pa dang / rtsis mngon par
278b5(rgyud 'bum): shes pa rnams kyi cho ga'i rgyal po de la khyed cag rnams kyis der bgegs ma byed cig/ bstan pa la rab tu zhugs pa rnams la lha'i tshogs thams cad kyis kyang de la srung ba gyis shig
278b6(rgyud 'bum): sems can ma rungs pa thams cad kyang dgag par gyis shig/ bstan par gyis shig/ thams cad kyi thams cad du gsod par ma byed cig/ stobs bcu dang ldan pa rnams kyi
278b7(rgyud 'bum): bstan pa la rnam par gzhag par gyis shig/ de nas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas sems can thams cad kyim rungs pa thams cad bzlog pa'i phyir/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
279a1(rgyud 'bum): kyi gtsug tor mngon par 'phags pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so/ / bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu phyogs bcu'i
279a2(rgyud 'bum): 'jig rten gyi khams na rnam par bzhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa gnas gtsang ma'i gzhal med khang na bzhugs pa la rnam par blta ba'i phyir nye bar lhags par
279a3(rgyud 'bum): gyur to/ / bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i sangs rgyas nye bar lhags pa rang rang gi byin gyi rlabs kyis bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa la bos te/ gsungs shig gsungs shig dpa' bo che// 'jig rten
279a4(rgyud 'bum): rnams la'ang phan pa'i phyir/ / sngags rgyud cho ga ji lta bar// sngags rnams kun la rab 'jug phyir// rig pa'i rgyal po rdzu 'phrul che// sangs rgyas kun gyis gsungs pa yi// gtso mchog

279a6(rgyud 'bum): po kun ni zlog par byed/ / gza' dang rgyu skar ma mo rnams// ma rungs sems ldan 'gog par byed// 'jig rten bgegs rnams ji snyed dang // de bzhin gzhan yang gdug sems
