279b1(rgyud 'bum): bo che/ / kun la dbang phyug dam pa ni// gang gi dus ni 'di yin pa// de bzhin gshegs pa khyod kyis gsungs// de skad gsungs nas sangs rgyas rnams// mi gsung bar ni bzhugs
279b2(rgyud 'bum): par gyur/ / de nas sangs rgyas 'dus pa de rnams kyis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du sems can thams cad snod kyi 'jig rten rnams gcig tu 'bar bar gyur la//
279b3(rgyud 'bum): sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis sems can gcig la'ang gnod par ma gyur te/ snang ba chen po yang dag par snang bar gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas thams cad dang
279b4(rgyud 'bum): ldan pa'i gnas gtsang ma'i gzhal med khang la gzigs te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag dang / de na gnas pa'i lha'i bu rnams dang / nyan thos dang / rang
279b5(rgyud 'bum): sangs rgyas thams cad dang / / bcom ldan 'das dang / 'khor chen po 'dus pa la bka' stsal pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs
279b6(rgyud 'bum): rgyas thams cad dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams dgongs su gsol/ yi ge gcig pa 'di ri rig pa'i 'khor los sgyur ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gtsug tor
279b7(rgyud 'bum): gong nas gong du gnas pa/ bstan pa thogs pa med pa/ dpag tu med pa'i stobs dang pha rol gnon pa/ bcom ldan 'das gtsug tor gyi rgyal po 'khor los sgyur ba'i cho ga'ang
280a1(rgyud 'bum): ngas bshad par bya'o/ / bstan pa nub pa'i dus su rtsod pa'i dus 'di la bcom ldan 'das gtsug tor 'khor los sgyur ba de bstan pa 'di la srung ba gcig pur 'gyur
280a2(rgyud 'bum): zhing dus thams cad du grub par yang 'gro ste/ sangs rgyas tha mAcad kyi bstan pa nub pa'i dus chod la 'di nyid sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das yin te bstan pa'i dor byed par 'gyur ro//

280a4(rgyud 'bum): 'dis ni thams cad mkhyen/ / sangs rgyas sngags gzugs rnam par gnas// ston pa thugs rje che dang ldan// sems can kun la rnam par spyod// sngags rnams bdag
280a5(rgyud 'bum): po dpal dang ldan/ / gtsug tor las byung bstan pa yin// snying rje'i dbang la brten nas ni// 'di ni yi ge gcig tu gnas// chos kyi dbyings la brten nas ni// 'di ni/
280a6(rgyud 'bum): sna tshogs gzugs la gnas// ji ltar sangs rgyas sku rnams ni// skye bo rnams la sku gdung gyur// 'jig rten gyis mchod zang zing bcas// zang zing med pa'ang khyad par du//
280a7(rgyud 'bum): dam chos sku gdung dag tu bstan// 'jig rten zang zing med pa'i rgyu// su ni zang zing bcas par gsungs// thub pa'i zla ba zag pa med// zang zing bcas dang zang zing
280b1(rgyud 'bum): med/ / 'jig rten rgyur ni gsungs pa yin// chos kyi dbyings la brten nas ni// thugs rje'i dbang gis sems can la// 'jig rten mgon po 'od byed pa// sngags kyi
280b2(rgyud 'bum): tshul gyis bzhugs pa yin/ / sna tshogs gzugs can thams cad mkhyen// sa steng 'di la snang ba yin// sems can rnams kyi sngags sgrub pa// sangs rgyas rnams kyis
280b3(rgyud 'bum): gsungs pa yin/ / sngags 'di yongs su mdor bsdu na// rang gi cho gas 'di bzlas na// sngags rnams ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin// rtag tu 'bras bcas byed par 'gyur//
280b4(rgyud 'bum): 'di yi cho ga mdor bsdus nas// dus su yang ni bshad par bya// dus mthar thub mchog 'jig rten du// de bzhin gshegs pa nub pa ra// de yi dus su cho ga 'grub//
280b5(rgyud 'bum): sngags 'grub par ni gsungs pa yin// de nas bcom ldan 'das 'khor los sgyur ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i gtsug tor gzhan gyi las kyi sbyor ba rnam par 'jig par byed pa/
280b6(rgyud 'bum): ma rgyal ba las rgyal ba/ sngags thams cad kyi bdag po/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi don du gnyer ba/ gtsug tor 'khor los sgyur ba'i cho ga yi ge gcig pa sngar rgya cher
280b7(rgyud 'bum): bstan nas/ yang mdor na re zhig dang por bzlas pas gang du gnas pa las dpag tshad lnga'i nang nas ma rungs pa'i gdon thams cad 'byer bar 'gyur ro// grub pa thams cad
281a1(rgyud 'bum): kyang nus pa med par 'gyur zhing lha thams cad kyi nus pa thams cad dang bral bar 'gyur ro/ / sgrub pa po'i 'dod pa ma gtogs par lha thams cad kyang gnas
281a2(rgyud 'bum): par mi 'gyur ro/ / 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i sgrub pa po gzhan rnams kyi grub pa 'phrog par byed cing / gzhan gyi sbyor bas gsang sngags bcad pa dang

281b1(rgyud 'bum): sngar gsungs pa'i las thams cad la 'o ma'i khrus byas nas sbyin sreg byas na zhi bar 'gyuraro// mar gyi sbyin sreg gis ni thams cad zhi bar 'gyur zhing nyams brtan pa byas par yang

281b3(rgyud 'bum): nyid kyis bcing ba byas te bsgrub par bya'o/ / cho ga gang sgrub par 'dod pas kyang de nyid 'dis bsgrub par bya'o// sngags sgrub pa dang 'di nyid kyi sngags kyis spyan drang bar bya ba dang /

281b6(rgyud 'bum): teno dang / sbrang rtsi dang / mar gyis til la btags te brgya rtsa brgyad sbyin sreg dus gsum du zhag bdun byas pa de 'di dbang du 'gyur zhing / gang brjod pa de'i las byed par
281b7(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur ba 'am lan thob par 'gyur ro/ / lha dbang du bya bar 'dod na thang shing gi yam shing gis brgya rtsa brgyad sbyin sreg byas na zhag bdun gyis dbang du 'gyur ro// klu dbang du bya
282a1(rgyud 'bum): bar 'dod na mngar gsum gyis sbyin sreg bya'o/ / dri za dang dri za mo thams cad dbang du bya bar 'dod shing n+da ya med pa dang / bri yang ku'i sem shing ngam/
282a2(rgyud 'bum): me tog gis sbyin sreg byas na dbang du 'gyur ro// gnod sbyin mo dang klu mo'i ge don rnams la ni ske tshes bya'o// rgyal po rnams la ni yungs kar gyis bya'o// zab ze rnams la ni me
282a3(rgyud 'bum): tog gis sbyin sreg bya'o/ / rje'u rigs la ni zho dang / 'o ma dang / mar gyis bya'o// dmangs rigs la ni phub ma'i rdul gyis bya'o// bud med la ni lan tshwa'i sbyor sreg bya'o//
282a4(rgyud 'bum): gdol pa la ni mon sran gre'u dang dza bu li ka'i sbyin sreg bya'o// bu mo gnon nu ma la ni 'bra sa yos kyis sbyin sreg bya'o// sems can thams cad la ni mar dang til gyis sbyin sreg byas
282a5(rgyud 'bum): na dbang du byed do/ / thams cad du'ang du sa gsum du zhag bdun du bya'o zhes gsungs nas rgyal ba'i mchog can cang mi gsung bar gyur to// thub mchog bdun pas sngags 'di ni//
282a6(rgyud 'bum): de tshe lho yi tshegs la gsungs// 'jig rten chos shes grol ba dang // de tshe de ni tshigs bral blos// de tshe thub pa mchog gis ni// sangs rgyas sras po thu bo lha// byang chub
282a7(rgyud 'bum): sems dpa' rdzu 'phrul che/ / 'jam dpal la ni de tshe gsungs// lha yi lha ni blo ldan pa// mgon po 'khor lo'i bdag po yi// cho ga 'di ni rgya che bas// gang gi bskal par
282b1(rgyud 'bum): tshad du yang / / rgyal bas kyang ni bshad mi nus// mi rnams la ni phan pa'i phyir// cho ga yi ni phyogs gcig tsam// mdor bsdus nas ni bshad pa yin// de tshe de skad gsungs
282b2(rgyud 'bum): nas ni/ / dpal ldar 'jam dbyangs rdzu 'phrul che// gtsang ma'i gnas kyi steng bzhugs pa'i// sangs rgyas de la skul bar byed// gsungs shig gsungs shig dpa' bo che//
282b3(rgyud 'bum): rkang gnyis dam pa rdzogs sangs rgyas// dus mthar 'jigs pa'i dus su ni// mi rnams bde ba skyed pa'i phyir// mthu chen sngags kyi rgyal po ste// gzi brjid chen po 'di
282b4(rgyud 'bum): yi na/ / ras ris ji ltar grub par 'gyur// myur du ras ris 'grub pa gsungs// 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi rtsa ba'i cho ga byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod phal po che theg pa
282b5(rgyud 'bum): chen po shin tu rgyas pa'i mdo las/ yi ge gcig pa 'khor los sgyur ba 'byung ba'i le'u rab 'byams las bcu dgu pa rdzogs so// // de nas bcom ldan 'das
282b6(rgyud 'bum): shAkya thub pas gnas gtsang ma'i gnal med khang la gzigs nas/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la bka' sprul pa/ 'jam dpal nyon cig/ mdor na yi ge gcig pa
282b7(rgyud 'bum): 'khor los sgyur ba rdzu 'phrul chen po'i ras ris kyi cho gar 'gyur ba rgya che ba ni sngar bstan to/ / da ni dus kyi tha ma'i dus su sems can rnams brtson 'grus chung bar 'gyur zhing shes
283a1(rgyud 'bum): rab chung ba dang / yid gzungs pa dman pa'i phyir ras ris kyi tshad rgya che ba'i sbyor ba sgrub pa nyams par 'gyur bas// sems can rnams la phar par 'dod pas
283a2(rgyud 'bum): zlos pa pos ji ltar dngos grub mchog thob par 'gyur ba de ltar ngas mdor bshad par bya ste/ sgrub pa mchog byed par 'dod pas ras ma nyams pa/ kha tshar ma bcad pa/ sla dang bral ba dag
283a3(rgyud 'bum): la tshon ma 'dres pa dag gis bcom ldan 'das 'drir gzhug par bya ste/ chos kyi rgyal po chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor ba/ 'jig rten thams cad kyi bdag po skyes bu dam pa rkang gnyis
283a4(rgyud 'bum): rnams kyi mchog/ de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen tog ces bya ba rgyal ba'i mchog chos 'chad pa kur nas 'bar ba'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor dang ldan pa'o// 'og tu ni tshangs pa dang 'phags
283a5(rgyud 'bum): pa phyag na rdo rje/ steng du ni 'phreng ba 'dzin pa'i lha'i bu gnyis/ 'og tu sgrub pa po de'i mdun du dus gsum du a ka ru sreg cing 'bum phrag bcu bzlas pa bya'o// de nas las su bya ba
283a6(rgyud 'bum): ni dang po'i 'khor lo'i sgrub pa byed par 'dod na/ lcags bzang po'i rang bzhin las rtsibs bcu gnyis pa'o 'khor lo byas te/ cho 'phrul gyi zla phyed la bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar
283a7(rgyud 'bum): dus gsum du a ka ru'i dud pas bdug cing 'bum phrag bcu bzlas pa bya'o/ / tha mar zla ba nya ba la mchod pa rgya chen po byas nas lag pas bzung ste/ ji srid rab tu 'bar bi'o bar du
283b1(rgyud 'bum): bzlas pa bya'o/ / de bzung na rig pa 'dzin pa'i 'khor los sgyur bar 'gyur ro// gang gis mthong ba de dang lhan cig nam mkha' la 'gro bar 'gyur ro// de nas gdugs sgrub par
283b2(rgyud 'bum): 'dod na gdugs kha dog sna tshogs pa gsar pa byas la/ gser gyi 'khor los mtshan pa/ ka shi ka'i gos 'phyang ba de nyid kyi cho gas mgo la gdugs bzung ba byas te/ bzlas
283b3(rgyud 'bum): pa byas na rig pa rang nyid nye bar zhugs par 'gyur ro/ / 'di nyid kyis bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar dus gsum du a ka ru'i dud pas bdugs te 'bum phrag bcu bzlas pa byas

283b7(rgyud 'bum): dpa' thams cad kyis rjes su bsngags pa 'grub par 'gyur ro/ / 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan dag gi 'khor los sgyur ba stong gi g.yog 'khor dang ldan par 'gyur ro// de nas
284a1(rgyud 'bum): cug tsa 'tshar las rtswar bsgrub par 'ad na gas h+ma/ dngas dang / ng+yas ma dang / nung bu'i rang bzhin gyi dbyig pa khrug tsam byas
284a2(rgyud 'bum): ji srid rab tu 'bar ba'i bar du bzlas pa byas nas de zangs na nam mkha' la 'gro ni/ thams cad la chos ston par 'gyur ro// bskal pa chen por 'tshe bar 'gyur ro// ci ste bum
284a3(rgyud 'bum): babazang po sgrub par 'dod na gser gyi bum pa bzang po byas la 'bru thams cad dang / rin po che dang / sman gyis yongs su bkang la ras dkar pos bcings te/ de la sngags
284a4(rgyud 'bum): 'dis bsgrub par bya ste/ cho 'phrul gyi zla phyed gcig la brtsams na gnyis pa la 'grub par 'gyur ro// de la lag pa rab tu bcug na ci 'dod pa de thob cing mi zad par yang 'gyur
284a5(rgyud 'bum): ro/ / ci ste nor bu rin po che sgrub par 'dod na gser gyi dbyig pa 'am/ nor bu bzang po dang / shel gyi nor bu byas te gos 'phyang bar byas la/ cho ga 'di nyid kyis bsgrub
284a6(rgyud 'bum): na gang bsams pa de thams cad 'grub par 'gyur te/ lha dang mi'i nang du 'di thogs pa med cing stobs dang pha rol gnon par 'gyur ro// ci ste bcom ldan 'das la bzlas pa bya/
284a7(rgyud 'bum): ba byas na rang gi lus kyis nam mkha' la 'gro bar 'gyur ro// de ltar lha'i lus thob cing bskal pa chen por 'tsho bar 'gyur ro// gzhan gang yang gtsug tor gyi rgyal po gdugs dkar po
284b1(rgyud 'bum): la sogs pa de'ang 'dis bcom ldan 'das la 'bum phrag bcu bzlas pa byas na las rnams byed par 'gyur ro/ / de ltar thogs pa med pa de bzhir gshegs pa'i gtsug tor gzhan gyi rtog
284b2(rgyud 'bum): pa'i cho gas ji lta ji ltar rab tu sbyar ba de lta de ltar ring po mi thogs par 'grub par 'gyur ro/ / bcom ldan 'das gtsug tor 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po la 'bum phrag bcu bzlas pa byas
284b3(rgyud 'bum): na thams cad la 'grub pa 'gyur pa dang rig pa dang sngags thams cad kyi bdag po 'khor los sgyur bar 'gyur ro/ / ci ste rdo rje sgrub par 'dod na tsan dan dmar po la rdo rje rtse gcig pa 'am/
284b4(rgyud 'bum): yang na lcags bzang po la byas te/ ba'i rnam lngas bkrus la yar gyi ngo'i tshe bco lnga la ras ris kyi mdun du mchod pa chen po bya zhing mar gyi mar me brgyad sbar la dri'i chus rdo rje bkrus te/
284b5(rgyud 'bum): sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la bdag nyid phul nas gtsug tor gyi rgyal po'i 'khor ram/ gzi brjid phung po 'am/ gtsug tor gdugs dkar po'i sngags
284b6(rgyud 'bum): 'dis bsrung ba byas la/ dkyil 'khor gyi nang du grogs la'ang bsrung ba byas nas rdo rje lag pa g.yas pas blangs te/ thun dang po 'das shing thun gnyis pa la nye bar 'dug ste/

285a1(rgyud 'bum): pa'i rgyal po thams cad kyang 'ong bar 'gyur ro/ / de dag rig pa 'dzin pa'i bstod pa byed cing khyim du 'gro bar 'gyur ro// rig pa 'dzin pa'i 'khor los sgyur bar

285a6(rgyud 'bum): phyogs med cing rig pa 'dzin pa thams cad kyis mi tshugs pa dang / bar gyi bskul par 'tshe bar 'gyur ro// ci ste ldong ros sgrub par 'dod na dpa' bo'i tshong gis nyos te rgyal dang ldan pa'i

285b1(rgyud 'bum): tu zhugs te/ mchod pa rgya chen po byas nas mar gyi mar me stong rab tu sbar nas nag gsum sbyang ba byas la/ sems can thams cad la byams pa bskyed ras bdag nyid phul te/ ldong

286b1(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur ro/ / ci ste ro langs sgrub par 'dod na/ yan lag rma med pa'i skyes bu'i ro blangs te seng ldeng gi phur pa zhig btab la/ brang gi steng du rin po che'i phye mas gtor cing mchod na/

296b3(rgyud 'bum): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de la phyag 'tshal lo/ / de bzhin du de ras 'od dpag med dang rin chen tog la phyag bya'o// de nas sangs rgyas
296b4(rgyud 'bum): thams cad la phyag byas nas ci 'dod pa'i sngags bzlas pa byas ra myur du grub pa stsol bar 'gyur te/ gang gi phyir zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa gsum gyi mtshan yongs su
296b5(rgyud 'bum): bsgrags pa dang phyag 'tshal bas ni bsod nams chen po 'phel ba'i phyir dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la'ang phyag 'tshal bas ni nges par byang chub la gzhol ba dang / dag
296b6(rgyud 'bum): ba'i tshogs 'di yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa'i grangs su 'gre zhing de'i sngags kyang myur du 'grub pa stsol bar 'gyur ro// tshe dang ye shes dpag tu med
296b7(rgyud 'bum): pa rnam par nges pa'i dang po'i rgyal po de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis yi ge gcig pa'i sngags 'di gsungs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa
297a1(rgyud 'bum): thams cad kyi snying po dang / sngags dang / rgyud thams kyi mngon par 'dod pa/ sngags thams cad kyi don sgrub par byed pa/ 'jam pa'i
297a2(rgyud 'bum): dbyangs khyod kyi cho ga'i rgyal po mchog tu gtsang ba dang / gtsang ba dam pa dang / 'jig rten rnams la phan pa'i phyir rab tu sbyar bar bya'o// slob ma ma yin pa dang /
297a3(rgyud 'bum): chos dang mi ldan pa dang / de bzhin du ston pa dang bstan pa la ma dad pa dang / gzhan gyis pham pa dang / ma rungs pa dang / nga rgyal can dang / ston pa dang bstan pa la
297a4(rgyud 'bum): nyes pa 'tshol ba la ni nem yang rab tu sbyar bar mi bya'o/ / rgyal ba'i sras la rab tu mi dang ba dang / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas rnams la'ang mchod pa dang / rjes su gzug
297a5(rgyud 'bum): ba mi bzod pa de la ni nges sbyin par mi bya'o/ / de la ni sngags grub pa mi snang ste/ dad cing zhi ba'i sems ldan dang / sangs rgyas bstan la rab tu dang // byang chub sems
297a6(rgyud 'bum): la rtag tu ni/ / mchod dang rjes gzung de gtsor byed// de la sngags 'di 'grub 'gyur zhes// cho ga 'dir ni yang dag bstan// sngags cheran yi ge gcig pa ni// 'jad
297a7(rgyud 'bum): pa'i dbyangs kyis nges par sbyar/ / 'jig rten mgon 'dis sngags 'di ni// re ba skyed byed stsol ba yin// sangs rgyas kun gyi snying po yi// sngags rnams ma
297b1(rgyud 'bum): lus 'byung ba'i gnas/ / bdun cu rtsa drug bye ba ni// rang byung nyid kyis sngon gsungs pa// lus can sdig pas rmongs rnams la// sngags rnams dge ba'i don du yum
297b2(rgyud 'bum): de bzhin gshegs rnams kun gyi sngags/ / ston pa'i gzugs su yang dag gnas// de dag la 'di snying por gyur// rig pa'i rgyal po rdzu 'phrul che// yi ge gcig
297b3(rgyud 'bum): par rtag par gnas/ / ther zug tu yang 'dir rab 'jug/ 'dir ni chos kyi mthar gnas te// 'gro la phan phyir sangs rgyas yin// chos kyi tshul la yang dag gnas
297b4(rgyud 'bum): 'di ni yi ge gcig pa yin/ / sngags ni don rnams ma lus sgrub// rgyal po ma rungs zlog byed yin// las ni sna tshogs byed pa yin// las kun ma lus sgrub pa'o//
297b5(rgyud 'bum): las ni rtsa brgyad snying po rnams// nges par yang ni byed par 'gyur// cho ga mthong ba'i las kyis ni// phun sum tshogs pa sna tshogs ster// 'jam dpal gyi ni snying po
297b6(rgyud 'bum): ni/ yi ge ma dang yang dag ldan// yi ge u dang rtag 'gro zhes// 'jig rten na ni rtag 'jug 'gyur// tshe dang ye shes dpag med rgyal// dbang pos nges pa'i don
297b7(rgyud 'bum): du gsungs/ / 'jam pa'i dbyings la sangs rgyas kyis// dbang gi don du 'di ba sbyin// des na dus mtha'i 'jig rten 'dir// ston pa mya ngan 'das par/
298a1(rgyud 'bum): cho ga mthong ba'i rgyu yis ni// myur du grub par 'gro bar 'gyur// tshe ni dpag med ces bya bas// rnam par brtags par gyur pa yin// der ni bcom
298a2(rgyud 'bum): ldan sangs rgyas te/ / chos kyi 'khor lo skor byed pa// dpag med bskal par gnas pa na// tshe la dbang bar byin gyis brlabs// de nyid phyir na de mtshar gyur// dpag med
298a3(rgyud 'bum): tshe dang ye shes nges/ / 'jig rten kun gyi rgyal po'i dbang // rdzu 'phrul che 'di de bzhin gshegs// des ni sngags mchog gtso 'di byin// sangs rgyas sras po tho dang ldan//
298a4(rgyud 'bum): sras kyi gtso bo dam pa ni// rdzu 'phrul che zhing stobs kyang che// de nas sras po de nyid kyis// 'di ni kun tu bzang la sbyor// de nas sangs rgyas sras rnams la// de ni de bzhin
298a5(rgyud 'bum): gshegs dag gis/ / sngags rnams kyi ni mchog gyur pa// chos kyi rgyal pos gsungs pa ni// 'byung po rnams la phan don du// sngags rnams ma lus gsungs pa yin//
298a6(rgyud 'bum): tshe dang ye shes dpag tu med par rnam par nges pa'i dbang po'i rgyal po de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo// sA la'i dbang po'i rgyal po
298a7(rgyud 'bum): tshe dpag tu med pa dang / 'od dpag tu med pa dang / rin chen tog la sogs pa sangs rgyas thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// re rnams la phyag 'tshal nas lan gsum sngags bzlas
298b1(rgyud 'bum): par bya'o/ / yi ge gcig pa de gang zhe na/ chu grogs po dag 'di ni tshe dang ye shes dpag tu med pa rnam par gdon mi za ba'i dbang po'i rgyal po de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag
298b2(rgyud 'bum): par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis bkod pa dpag tu med pa dang ldan pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams su bzhugs te gsungs pa ni sems can thams cad kyi don dang / phan pa dang / bde ba dang /
298b3(rgyud 'bum): 'jig rten la snying brtse ba'i phyir dang / skye bo'i tshogs chen po'i don dang / ma 'ongs pa'i skye bo dag la gzigs nas bstan pa nub pa'i dus chod du mkhyen nas/ dus kyi tha ma la dkon
298b4(rgyud 'bum): mchog gsum la gnod pa byed pa'i ma rungs pa'i rgyal po bzlog pa'i phyir dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs kyi sras kyi gtso bo mthu chen po thob pa'i byang chub sem dpa' sems
298b5(rgyud 'bum): dadapa' chen po la sbyin pa'i phyir dang / sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis kun tu bzang po la byin no// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang po des kyang 'jam dpal
298b6(rgyud 'bum): gnon nur gyur pa la byin no/ / 'jam dpal gnon nur gyur pa des kyang sems can thams cad rjes su gzung ba'i phyir/ snying rje chen po'i dbang gis snying gi gnas su rang gi lus
298b7(rgyud 'bum): la bzhag go/ / ma 'ongs pa'i dus la bltos nas dus kyi tha ma bstan pa nub pa'i dus tshod la de bzhin gshegs pa'i tha ma bdag gis kyang bstan te rtsod pa'i dus dang / bstan pa
299a1(rgyud 'bum): 'jig pa'i dus su nga'i bstan pa yang dag par srung ba'i don byed par 'gyur ro/ / 'di'i cho ga gzhan yang mdor bsdus nas brjod par bya ba ni 'jam pa'i dbyangs
299a2(rgyud 'bum): gzhon nu nyon cig/ bdag nyid chen po'i cho ga rgya che ba 'di'i cho ga'i rgyal po'i dbang po brjod par bya ste/ dang por re zhig ri'i rtse mor 'dzegs te 'bum phrag sum cu bzlas pa byas na sngar
299a3(rgyud 'bum): bsnyen pa byas par 'gyur ro/ / 'o mas 'tsho zhing mi smra ba'i brtul zhugs dang / sngags gzhan la mi bstan pa dang / gzhan la mi sems pa dang / skyabs gsum yongs su
299a4(rgyud 'bum): blang ba dang / byang chub tu sems bskyed pa dang / khrims lnga'i sdom pa yang dag par blangs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i sdom pa yang dag par blangs pas bzlas pa byas la
299a5(rgyud 'bum): de las rnams bya ba ste/ dang por re zhig ras la ri mo bya ba ni ri mo mkhan gso sbyong byas la tshon ma 'dres pa dag gis bri'o// gtsang ma'o ras kyi dum bu gang yang rung ba 'am/ dar la
299a6(rgyud 'bum): tsan dan dang / ga pu ra dang / gu ra kum gyi chu sa gtor la/ gtsang ba'i sa phyogs su gtsang ba'i ri mo byed pa dkar gsum za zhing gos dkar po gyon pas/ zla ba nya ba'i bco lnga la nyi ma
299a7(rgyud 'bum): 'char ba'i dus su rnam par dag pa'i rgyu skar la nyi ma phyed pa'i bar du bri bar bya ste/ de nas bri ba spang bar bya'o// de bzhin du nyin re zhing yang yongs su rdzogs kyi bar du bya'o// dang por
299b1(rgyud 'bum): re zhig ras la tshe dpag tu med pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams bri bar bya'o/ / ras khru gang tsam mam/ bde bar gshegs pa'i mtho gang gi tshad dam/ ras khru bzhi pa la khor khor yug tu tshe
299b2(rgyud 'bum): dpag tu med pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams bri'o/ / pad+ma rA ga dang / in+d+ra nI le dang / shel dang / rin po che margad kyis ras ris kyi 'og gi phyogs su mdzes par bya'o// de dag gi steng
299b3(rgyud 'bum): gi phyogs su rin po che'i gzhal med khang mdzes pa'i rnam pa dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan mdzes pa'i rnam par bsgreng ba dang / de'i dbus su tshe dpag tu med pa rnam par gdor mi za ba'i
299b4(rgyud 'bum): dbang po'i rgyal po de bzhin gshegs pa chos 'chad pa/ seng ge'i khri la bzhugs pa/ kun nas 'od kyi 'phreng ba rab tu 'bar ba/ kha dog cung zad dmar zhing dkar ba/ g.yon
299b5(rgyud 'bum): phyogs su mthing shing gi rdo la bzhugs pa/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mthu chen thob phyag g.yas na rnga yab thogs shing de bzhin gshegs pa la bstod pa'i lta ba dang / lag
299b6(rgyud 'bum): pa g.yoran na gyur rtsi chen po'i shing thog thogs pa/ me tog pri yang kuwAr sngo bsangs/ gzhon nu'i rgyan gyis lus brgyan pa/ kun nas khor yug tu 'od 'phro ba/ g.yas ngos su
299b7(rgyud 'bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang po rin po che'i ri la bzhugs pa/ lag pa g.yas pa na rnga yab thogs shing g.yob pa/ lag pa g.yon pa na rin po che thogs pa
300a1(rgyud 'bum): rgyun thams cad kyis brgyad pa/ rin po che'i cod pan gyis brgyan pa/ me tog pri yang ku ltar cung zad dkar ba/ ras sngon po g.yog pa dang ldan pas g.yogs pa
300a2(rgyud 'bum): mu tig gi 'phreng ba dang rin po ches mchod phyir thogs byas pa/ khor yug rab tu 'bar bas 'brel ba/ de'i g.yas ngos su 'phags pa 'jam dpal rin po che'i ri la gnas pa
300a3(rgyud 'bum): gzhon nur gyur pa zur bud lngas mgo legs par mdzes par byas la/ byis pa gzhon nu'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa/ gser gyi mdog dang 'dra ba/ dar sngon po g.yo ba can mnabs
300a4(rgyud 'bum): pa mu tig gi 'phreng ba dang rin po che 'dzin cing 'dres pa'i mchod phyir thogs byas pa/ de bzhin gshegs par song ba'i lta ba/ cung zad bzhin 'dzum pa dang ldan
300a5(rgyud 'bum): pa/ zhi ba'i rnam pa/ gzugs mdzes pa dang thal mo sbyor ba/ rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa bri bar bya'o// de'i 'og tu rtags dang / cha byad
300a6(rgyud 'bum): dang / dbyibs 'dzin pa'i sgrub pa po me tog gi 'phreng ba 'dzin cing / pus mo'i lha nga sa la btsugs nas yang dag par 'dug pa dang / mgo mngon par btud pa
300a7(rgyud 'bum): ras ris kyi zur gyi mtha' ma'i phyogs su bri bar bya'o/ / bcom ldan 'das kyi steng du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bzhi bri bar bya'o// g.yas phyogs su de bzhin
300b1(rgyud 'bum): gshegs pa gnyis bri bar bya ba la sA la'i dbang po'i rgyal po dang / rin chen tog khor yug tu kun nas 'bar ba'i 'od dang ldan pa/ g.yon phyogs su gser thub dang / 'od srungs rnam pa
300b2(rgyud 'bum): thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa/ me tog thams cad kyi gcal bkram pa/ pad+ma'i gdan gnyis la bzhugs pa/ ha cang mi ring ba na chos 'chad cing skyil mo krung gis bzhugs pa/ zhi ba'i
300b3(rgyud 'bum): rnam pa dang ldan pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyi steng nas me tog gi char rab tu 'bab pa/ sprin gyi nang nas ro stod byung ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i skun ma mkha' la lding ba spyan mdzes zhes bya ba
300b4(rgyud 'bum): mngon par bri bar bya ba ni rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa/ / kun nas 'bar ba'i 'od kyi 'phreng ba dang ldan pa/ phyag g.yas pas mchog sbyin pa/ phyag g.yon pas chos gos kyi mtha' mal 'dzin pa
300b5(rgyud 'bum): ' di ni tshe dang ye shes dpag tu med pa rnam par gdon mi za ba'i rgyal po'i dbang po de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi ras ris kyi cho ga bcom ldan 'das 'di
300b6(rgyud 'bum): nyid yi ge gcig pa'i sngags kyi mchog 'di yin te/ / 'di ni gtsug tor gyi rgyal po gtsug tor 'khor los sgyur ba dang rab tu 'gran pa/ brtson 'grus mtshungs pa/ stobs mtshungs pa 'di'i yon tan
300b7(rgyud 'bum): rgya che ba'i mthu ni bsam gyis mi khya ba ste/ rdzu 'phrul che zhing stobs che ba/ mdor na de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gtsug tor gyi rgyal po 'khor los sgyur ba yin no// yi ge gcig pa la cho ga rgya cher
301a1(rgyud 'bum): bstan pa gang yin pa de thams cad kyang byed do/ / ma srubs kyang bzlas pa tsam gyis kyang las rnams byed na/ bsgrubs pas lta smos kyang ci dgos/ ji ltar
301a2(rgyud 'bum): 'dod pa'i 'bras bu phun sum tshogs pa dang 'dod pa'ang thob par 'gyur ro/ / yid kyis gang mngon par 'dod pa der ras ris mthong ba tsam gyis 'grub par 'gyur ro// nges par
301a3(rgyud 'bum): byang chub la gzhol bar 'gyur ro/ / de nyid bcom ldan 'das tshe dang ye shes dpag tu med pa rnam par gdon mi za ba'i rgyal po'i dbang pos byin gyis brlabs pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi
301a4(rgyud 'bum): snying po zhes brjod do/ / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gtsug tor gyi rgyal po zhes brjod do// 'khor los sgyur ba zhes brjod do// 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po chen po zhes
301a5(rgyud 'bum): brjod do/ / 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i snying po zhes brjod do// yi ge gcig pa zhes brjod do// mdor na 'di'i mthu ni bsam gyis mi khyab ste/ gang gi phyir sangs rgyas
301a6(rgyud 'bum): rnams kyis byin gyis brlabs pa ni bsam gyis mi khyab bo/ / sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa ni bsams kyis mi khyab bo// sgrub pa med pa dang / sngon du spyod pa ma byas pa
301a7(rgyud 'bum): dang / khyim gyi rtsom pa thams cad la rab tu gnas pa dang / bza' ba thams cad sha dang / chang dang / grong gis chos la bar tu zhugs pa dag la'ang 'grub sde/ dad pa med
301b1(rgyud 'bum): pa dang byang chub tu sems bskyed pa med pa ni ma gtogs te/ 'di dag la ni grub pa med do// dkon mchog gsum la gnod pa byed pa dang / de la zhugs pa la gnod pa byed pa dang /
301b2(rgyud 'bum): 'di dag la'ang las phra mo'ang grub pa med na/ grub pa 'bring dang rab la ni lta smos kyang ci dgos/ 'dod pa thams cad dang / bza' ba dang / bca' ba dang / spyod pa gtsor
301b3(rgyud 'bum): byed pa'i sgrub pa po la ni las stong rtsa brgyad kyi las phran tshegs la rab tu sbyar bas 'grub par 'gyur ro/ / de dag kyang gang zhe na/ dang por re zhig lan gcig bzlas pas bdag
301b4(rgyud 'bum): bsrung ngo / / lan gnyis bzlas pas gzhan bsrung bar 'gyur ro// lan gsum bzlas pas bsrung ba dam par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa bcu la rab
301b5(rgyud 'bum): tu gnas pas kyang yang dag par bskyod par mi nus na/ de las gzhan pa'i sems can gyis lta smos kyang ci dgos/ tshon sna lnga'i skud pa la lan bzhi bzlas nas rked par bcings nas
301b6(rgyud 'bum): bon bsdams par 'gyur ba yin te/ rmi lam na'ang 'di la sa bon 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro// rang 'dod pa ni ma gtogs te/ de nyin par ram mtshan mo gcig la gal te 'dod
301b7(rgyud 'bum): pa ma ni me re re zhing bya'o/ / ci ste mi 'dod mthal ba la lan bdun bsngags pa byas nas lte ba'i phyogs su bkrus mnag bdun phrag gsum dus ben bsdam pa byas par 'gyur ro// lan
302a1(rgyud 'bum): lnga brdzas te sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsgoms na gang la reg pa de dbang du 'gyur ro/ / zla ba gzas zin cing rdzu ba'i dkyil 'khor thams cad 'dzin pa na shing
302a2(rgyud 'bum): ana'i me rab tu sbar la/ ras ris med kyang shar du mngon par bsdus te mar gyis sreg blugs stong phrag bcus sbyin sreg bya'o// rgyal po'i pho brang dang nye ba/ chu bos bar ma bcad pa/
302a3(rgyud 'bum): lha'i gnas su ma byas pa/ phyogs gang du rgyal po gnas pa de dang nye bar sbyin sreg rab tu sbyar na tho rangs rgyal po dbang du 'gyur ro// gang smras pa de thams cad byed par 'gyur ro//
302a4(rgyud 'bum): gal te dbang du ma gyur na de'i tshe de'i sems phyin ci log tu 'gyur ba'am/ sems g.yeng ba thob par gyur na phyir yang bzlog par bya ste/ 'o ma'i sreg blugs stong rtsa brgyad kyis sbyin
302a5(rgyud 'bum): sreg byas na/ gang de'i dus de nas brtsams nas rang bzhin du gnas par 'gyur ro// las de dag ni dad pa dang ldan pa dang / dkon mchog gsum la dad pa dang / byang chub
302a6(rgyud 'bum): tu sems bskyed pa rnams la ni mi bya ste/ gal te byed na shin tu bsod nams ma yin pa'i phung po chen po 'byung bar 'gyur ro// gzhan dag la gnod pa byed pa ma rungs pa'i sems
302a7(rgyud 'bum): dang / drag pa'i sems dang ldan pa rnams la ni bya ba yin no// nyin re zhing yang mthong ba sbyin par byas na sems zhi bar 'gyur ro// gal te zhi bar ma gyur na phung krol chen po dang ldan
302b1(rgyud 'bum): par 'gyur ro/ / srog gi lhag ma tsam lus par 'gyur ro// gnan yang las su 'gyur ba ni rla ba grubs zin gyi dus su shing pa la shA'i yam shing gis me rab tu sbar te mar gyis
302b2(rgyud 'bum): thugs stong rtsa brgyad byas na tho rangs yul gying dag po'i rgyal po spyan drang bar 'gyur ro/ / de dang lhan cig thos byas na bsam pa bden panye bar ston par 'gyur te/ de la bstan dag byas
302b3(rgyud 'bum): na zla ba drug gi nang du bsod nams stong yod pa'i grong ster bar 'gyur ro/ / gal te zla gcig mtshan phyed du sbyin sreg byas na zla ba gsum gyis ster bar 'gyur ro// gal te thun thams cad kyi
302b4(rgyud 'bum): mtshan mo sbyin sreg byas na zla gcig gis thob par 'gyur ro/ / gal te zla gcig mtshan mo re re la sbyin sreg byas na yul thob par 'gyur ro// yang na yul dang 'dra ba'i grong ngam
302b5(rgyud 'bum): yang na gzhan cung zad nor yod pa la'ang dgra yod par mi 'gyur te/ gas te dgra yod na'ang las rnams byas te zla ba gzus zir pa nA shing a pa mnas me rab tu sbyar la/ shing ba la
302b6(rgyud 'bum): sha'i lam shing la zho dang / sbrang rtsi dang / mar gyis btags pas bram ze'i sgal sbyin sreg stong rtsa brgyad bya'o// de'i tha mar shing pi tsu marda'i lo ma la ske ro'i 'bru mar gyis btags
302b7(rgyud 'bum): ba'i sreg thugs kyis sbyin sreg stong rtsa brgyad byas mtho rangs bram ze'i dgra zhi bar 'gyur ro/ / gal te rgyal po sdang bar gyur na las gzhan yang yod de/ zla ba gzas zin pa la shing rje
303a1(rgyud 'bum): snyed pas me rab tu sbar la mar gyi sreg thugs kyis sbyin sreg stong rtsa brgyad byas la/ sbyin sreg gi tha ma phyogs gang na rgyal po yod pa de'i phyogs su thal ba de gtor
303a2(rgyud 'bum): na de dbang du 'gyur ro/ / dus gang la longs spyod gang 'dod pa rgya che ba de dag gis grogs kyang byed par 'gyur ro// grong nyung ba 'am mang po rab tu ster bar 'gyur te/ nges par zla ba
303a3(rgyud 'bum): drug gis don yod par 'grub par yang 'gyur ro/ / de nas rigs bzhi las gang yang rung ba brtags/ gtso bo dang ldan pa 'am/ lha gzhan nam/ 'jig rten pa la dad pa dag
303a4(rgyud 'bum): sems 'khrug par gyur na/ phyogs gang na gnas pa der thal ba de gtor na yul gzhan du 'gro bar 'gyur ba 'am/ skyo bar 'gyur ba 'am/ mtshan mo dpal bar 'gyur ba 'am/
303a5(rgyud 'bum): nye du la gnod par 'gyur ro// de phyir gso ba ni 'o ma'i sreg blugs stong rtsa brgyad kyis sbyin sreg byas na sos par 'gyur ro// yang na gza' bzhi po nyid kyi cho gas sangs rgyas dang byang
303a6(rgyud 'bum): chub sems dpa'i sku gzugs dang / ras ris sam/ dam pa'i chos kyi glegs bam mam/ sku gdung dang bcas pa'i mchod rten la gos gtsang ma mgos shing nyin zhag gcig
303a7(rgyud 'bum): smyung ba byas te/ srog chags med pa'i chu las bya zhing / me tog dkar po dri zhim po dang / gur kum dang ldan pa dang / ga pur gyi dung bas bdugs par bya'o// gang du
303b1(rgyud 'bum): las la sbyar ba ni bram ze'i dgra la ni shing pal shes bya'o/ / rgyal rigs kyi dgra la ni shing a shwad zas bya'o// rje'u rigs kyi dgra la ni shing seng ldeng gis bya'o// dmangs rigs kyi
303b2(rgyud 'bum): dgral ni de las gzhan pa'i shing gis me rab tu sbar la de nyid kyi las bya'o/ / bram ze'i rogs la ni shing pa la sha'i yam shing dang / rgyal rigs la ni a shwad tha'i yam shing dang /
303b3(rgyud 'bum): rje'u rigs la ni seng ldeng gi yam shing dang / dmangs rigs la ni a pa marga'i yem shing ngam/ de las gzhan ji snyed pas mar gyis sbyin sreg bya'o// de bzhin du las gzhan yang
303b4(rgyud 'bum): bya ba ni rgyal po chen po la ni shing a pa ra tsi ta'i rtsa ba'i yam shing dang / mar gyi sreg thugs stong rtsa brgyad kyis sbyin sreg bya'o// tha mar yang de nyid kyi thal bas gtor bar bya'o// gang
303b5(rgyud 'bum): gi phyogs nas sdang ba'i sems dang ldan pa 'ong ba de'i phyogs su gtsug tor 'khor los sgyur ba yi ge gcig pa'i phyag rgya bcings nas gtor ro/ / yang na ut+pa la'i phyag rgya bcings na
303b6(rgyud 'bum): de 'jigs nas ldog pa 'am/ dmag gi tshogs nyams par 'gyur ba 'am/ gzhan yang gang cung zad rnam par lhung ba chen por 'gyur ba 'am/ 'go ba'i rang chen po'am// sems
303b7(rgyud 'bum): sdug bsngal bar gnas pa 'am/ gang gis 'di'i ngag ldog par 'gyur ba 'am/ 'di dag dang gzhan yang ji ltar 'dod pa'i las rnams byed par 'gyur ro// gos la mngon par
304a1(rgyud 'bum): bsngags te bgos na skal ba bzang por 'gyur ro/ / mig sman la mngon par bsngags te mig la bslus na skye bo thams cad dga' bar 'gyur ro// mig dang
304a2(rgyud 'bum): gdong la lan bdun bsngags pa byas la khros pa'i gdong la bltas na zhi ba dang dbang du 'gyur ro/ / me tog gam/ 'bras bu 'am/ gzhan gang cung zad dri zhib pal lan bdun mngon par
304a3(rgyud 'bum): bsngags pa byas la rgyal po la byin na de bsnams pa tsam gyis dbang du 'gyur ro/ / gzhan sems can gang la la mthong ba tsam gyis de dbang du 'gyur ro// yan lag thams cad na ba la
304a4(rgyud 'bum): brgya rtsa brgyad mngon par bzlas pa byas la chu dron mos khrus byas na bde legs su gnas par 'gyur te/ las 'di rnams ni bya ba yin no// sems can sdug bsngal ba thams cad
304a5(rgyud 'bum): dang / mgon med par gyur pa dang / bkren pa dang / bstan pa 'di'o brtul zhugs can dang / dkon mchog gsum la dad pa la ni 'di lta bu'i las mi bya'o// bud med la'ang
304a6(rgyud 'bum): las mi bya'o/ / de bzhin du byis pa dang / rgan po dang / dad pa dang / dbul po dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / sems can phra mo dang / skye gnas ngan par skyes pa 'di
304a7(rgyud 'bum): dag la'ang mi bya ste/ las 'di dag ni sems can chen po dag la rab tu sbyar bar bya'o// dpa' zhing brkam chags bab col med// phyogs chen nor ni che ba dang // mngon pa'i nga
304b1(rgyud 'bum): rgyal rab gtam pa/ / las ni 'di 'du bya ba yin// bskrun lan sngang thob dang // gan gyi nar ni 'jog byed dang // sngags rnams kun dang ldan rnams dang // rnam 'byer ldan lam/
304b2(rgyud 'bum): dang dang // spyis brtsam gdug pa'i sems ldan dang // 'jig rten gyis smad rgyal po ste// 'di dgu la ni las sbyar bya// chos dang ldan pa rnam par sbyangs// las rnams gzhan
304b3(rgyud 'bum): yang 'di skad brjod/ / tho yos de ni yongs su ldang // de nyid khros pas thal ba ni// bzlas pas phyogs su gtor byas na// de rnams dgra ni rab khros dang // rgyal po dag kyang
304b4(rgyud 'bum): rnam 'jig 'gyur/ / nges par skye bo de dag kyang // yun rings nad kyis thebs par 'gyur// de dag phyogs su 'chi ba mang // 'go ba'i nad kyang rab tu snang // shir tu nyon
304b5(rgyud 'bum): mongs cher gyur kyang / / las rnams 'di dag bya min te// der ni skye bo'i bdag po kun// zhag bdun gsum gyis nyams par 'gyur// las rnams brtsams nas sngor du ni//
304b6(rgyud 'bum): bdun phrag gnyis la yang dag brtul// bdun pa dang pos sems rnams g.yeng // zhag bdun gnyis pas nad kyis 'debs// bdun pa gsum gyis 'chi bar 'gyur// de
304b7(rgyud 'bum): bas de ni yongs su spang / / dang po 'di dag rnam par 'byer// gnyis par phyogs su rnam par 'khyam// zhag bdun gsum pa rnam par 'jig/ de bas las 'di bye ba min//
305a1(rgyud 'bum): sems can gdul bya'i don nyid la// 'jig rten 'dren pas bstan pa yin// sangs rgyas thugs ni dag pa yis// gdug pa'i las 'di gsung mi 'gyur//
305a2(rgyud 'bum): srog la gnod par byed pa'i las// sangs rgyas kun gyis smad pa yin// grub pa mchog ni rab 'dod pa'i// zlos pas de dag bya ba min// dmyal ba dag tu skye ba'i las// 'di
305a3(rgyud 'bum): dag nyid la rab tu snang / / dkar nag 'bras bur 'byung byed pa// 'di dag kho na bstan pa yin// las rnams sna tshogs bdag nyid che// rkang gnyis mchog gos ji bzhin gzigs//
305a4(rgyud 'bum): rtag tu dkar las dkar bar byung // nag las nag pa rab tu sbyin// 'dres las 'dres pa'i las rnams ni// 'dres pa dag tu rnam par smin// de bzhin las 'di sna tshogs su//
305a5(rgyud 'bum): de nyid sangs rgyas gzigs pa yin// thugs rje can gyis gsungs pa'o// de las zlog pa spang bya ba// nag dang 'dres pa'i las nyid do// dge byed dkar po bstan par bya//
305a6(rgyud 'bum): dge ba'i las kyi 'bras bu 'byung // srog gcod pas ni zlog pa dag/ yang dang yang du dmyal bar 'gro// de bzhin de las log pa'i chos// 'tshe med las ni dam pa yin//
305a7(rgyud 'bum): dge ba'i blos ni sngags rnams dang // de bzhin mthe ros thar grub pa// legs byas las kyis thob pa yin// 'gal ba'i las kyis 'gal bar gsungs// ji ltar chos dang
305b1(rgyud 'bum): chos mir gsungs/ / thams cad mkhyen nyid spyod pa yin// zlos pa grub pa 'dod pa yin// dge ba'i las ni brtsam par bya// zlos pa dge la gnas pa la// de yis sngags ni
305b2(rgyud 'bum): 'grub par 'gyur/ / dkar po'i las la gzhol byed la// de yi thar pa mi ldog 'gyur// sngags kyis dge ba 'grub 'gyur zhes// de bzhin gshegs pas rab tu gsungs//
305b3(rgyud 'bum): las rnams sna tshogs gsungs pa ni// sgrub pa rnams la bsdus don yin// ci 'dod las ni stong phrag brgyad// phra mo'i las ni byed pa na// sgrub pa po ni mi 'grub ste// sgrub pa
305b4(rgyud 'bum): mchog ni mo'i thob bo/ / 'bad pas brjes dang sbyin sreg bya// grub pa 'bring ni grub par 'gyur// cho ga mthong ba'i las kyis ni// thA ma myur du 'grub par 'gyur// mchog
305b5(rgyud 'bum): dang tha ma par ma yi/ / las ni rnam pa gsum du bstan// dka' thub can ni zlos mchog go// de bzhin grub pa mchog thob 'gyur// de bzhin bzlas pa bar ma yis// bar ma'i
305b6(rgyud 'bum): las grub thob pa yin/ / de bzhin zlos pa tha mas ni// tha ma'i las la yang dag brten// grub pa phra mo thob par yang // gnan gyi grub pa thob ma yin// dus dang tshod dang bzlas pa
305b7(rgyud 'bum): dang / / sbyin sreg mthong bas de bzhin grub/ mchog gis mchog ni grub pa dang // bar mas bar ma'i grub pa dang // tha mas tha ma'i las dag la// phran tshegs grub pa thob pa yin/
306a1(rgyud 'bum): 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi rtswa ba'i chog byang chub sems pa'i rje sdong phal po tsho theg pa chen po shin tu rgyas pa'i mdolas// yi ge gcig pa ma pa'i rgyung 'phags
306a2(rgyud 'bum): 'jam dpal gyi snying po'i cho ga rab 'byams las le'u nyi shu rtsa gcig pa rdzogs so/ / / de nas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas gzhan yang gnas gtsang ma'i gzhal med
306a3(rgyud 'bum): khang la gzigs nas/ 'jam dpal gzhor nur gyur pa la bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal gzhan yang khyod kyi ras ris kyi cho ga sgrub pa'i thabs la las thams cad dor sgrub pa nyon cig/
306a4(rgyud 'bum): 'di nyid kyis yi ge gcig pa'i snying po'i sngags sam/ yi ge drug po ma'i mtha' can khyod kyis sngar bstan pa'i yi ge drug pa'i snying po 'am/ dang po na oM yod pa'i yi ge gcig pa'i
306a5(rgyud 'bum): ras ris dang po 'di nyid kyi cho gar 'gyur ba ni phyi ma'i dus phyi ma'i tshe de bzhin gshegs pa nga yongs su mya ngan las 'das te/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing stongs shing rtsod pa'i dus tha mar phyin pa na/
306a6(rgyud 'bum): 'jig rten skyob pa med pa dang / skyabs med pa dang / gnas med pa dang / dpung gnyen med pa na cho ga'i rgyal po 'di nyid skyob par 'gyur ba dang / skyabs su gyur pa dang /
306a7(rgyud 'bum): gnas su gyur pa dang / dpung gnyen du gyur par 'gyur ro// dang po re zhig snga ma bzhin du ras ma nyams pa/ bla shad dang bral ba/ zhag bdun nam zhag bdun gsum gyi bar du thag
306b1(rgyud 'bum): pas btags pa kha tshar dang bcas pa/ gur kum dang tsan dan gyi chus bsang gtor byas te/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa pad+ma'i gdan la bzhugs shing chos 'chad pa dang /
306b2(rgyud 'bum): 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la gzigs pa bri bar bya'o// g.yas phyogs su nor bzang dang / 'phags pa blo gros mi zad pa dang / 'jam dpal yang bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal
306b3(rgyud 'bum): bar byed pa/ gzhon nu'i gzugs can lus rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa bri bar bya'o// g.yon phyogs su kun tu bzang po dang / 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang /
306b4(rgyud 'bum): bzang spyod dang / legs skyes kyang bri bar bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyi sku las shin tu chung bar 'drir gzhug par bya'o// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang / nor bzang
306b5(rgyud 'bum): ni lag na rnga yab thogs par bya'o/ / 'og tu ni sa'i lha mo rin po che'i ze ma tog lag na thogs pa ro stod sa las byung ba 'drir gzhug par bya'o// steng du ni rig pa 'dzin pa gzhon nu gnyis 'phreng
306b6(rgyud 'bum): ba 'dzin pa sprin gyi nang nas char gtong ba rig pa dang bcas pa bri bar bya'o/ / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyang lag na me tog thogs pa bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal la rnam par lta ba dang /
306b7(rgyud 'bum): chan dang ldan pa dang ba'i lte ba dang / ro stong bcom ldan 'das kyi nabs la bdud pa dang bcas pa 'drir gzhug par bya'o// de lta bu'i ras ris su gdung dang ldan pa'i mchod rten gyi drung du chub
307a1(rgyud 'bum): tu bstan te banag la/ 'jab dpal 'di'i lo gi gcig pa bzlas pa 'bum bya'o// shing bzhin du mi smra ba'i dka' thub dang / dus gsub du khrus byed pa dang / gos
307a2(rgyud 'bum): lan gsum brje ba dang / rtag tu gso sbyong byed pa dang / tshod rngang dang / nas chan khyor gang tsam dang / 'o ma dang / srong mo'i zas kyis 'tsho ba'o// zas kyang cha rnam pa bzhir byas
307a3(rgyud 'bum): te/ cha gcig ri dkon mchog gsum la'o// gnyis pa ri 'jam dpal la'o// gsum pa ni sems can thams cad la'o// bzhi pa ni bdag nyid nye bar spyad par bya'o// mi thub
307a4(rgyud 'bum): pa'i lus kyis bcom ldan 'das yid la byas te/ sems can thams cad la dmigs pa'i yod dang / bdag nyid kyi don ci'ang mi byed cing / gzhan sems car thams cad kyi don 'dir
307a5(rgyud 'bum): bya'o zhes bsgoms nas bzlas pa bya'o/ / khrus dang / dri dang / me tog dang / spos dang / bshos dang / mar me dag kyang dbul bar bya'o// khrus ni ras ris kyi grib ma

307a7(rgyud 'bum): dang / de'i 'og tu byams pa dang / de'i 'og tu spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang / 'phags pa kun tu bzang po dang / nam mkha'i snying po dang / 'phags pa blo gros mi zad
307b1(rgyud 'bum): pa dang / zla'od gzhon nu dang / sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba dang / 'phags pa rdo rje 'dzin dang / 'phags ma sgrol ma dang / 'phags pa rma bya chen mo dang / 'phags pa

307b3(rgyud 'bum): phyis ras ris la mchod pa byas te/ de nas phyi rol gyi phyogs 'ga' zhig tu sbrul dang / rnga mo dang / bong bu dang / glang po che dang / log 'dren gyi gzugs grog mkhar gyi sa las

307b6(rgyud 'bum): nyid du gnas nas sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa bsgom par byas te yid kyis bzlas pa bya'o/ / dben pa'i gnas gzhan du ku sha stan du gding bar bya'o// ha cang btung ba mang ba dang /
307b7(rgyud 'bum): ha cang bza' ba mang ba dang / ha cang dro ba mang ba dang / ha cang lta ba dang / ha cang nyal ba spang bar bya'o// dus gsum du sangs rgyas rjes su dran par bya'o// sa bon bsdam
308a1(rgyud 'bum): pa yang bya'o/ / rmi lam bzang po rnams gzhan la rab tu bstan par mi bya ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar brjod par bya'o// de bzhin du mthar gyis ha cang
308a2(rgyud 'bum): mi myur bar yi ge gcig pa'i bzlas pa 'bum bya'o/ / tha mar yang bcom ldan 'das ma shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bklag par bya'o// bzlas pa'i dus su bcom ldan 'das sam/
308a3(rgyud 'bum): yang na 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i zhal du blta sa la tshig dang yi ge ma 'khrugs pas bzlas brjod bya zhing / bgrang 'phreng la phyag byas te dbul bar bya'o// cho ga 'dis sngon du bsnyen

308a6(rgyud 'bum): 'bras bu 'dzin pa bya'o/ / de gtsang ba'i phyogs gcig tu nub phyogs su stan la banag par byas la/ de'i mdun du me thab byas te las thams cad la phur bzhi pa mtho do tsam gyi tshad du

308b1(rgyud 'bum): 'bras thug po che'i chan dang / 'o ma dang / zho dang / sbrang rtsi thams cad blangs te/ zangs ma'i snod du bzhag par byas la stong rtsa brgyad yongs su bzlas shing thugs gzar gyis sbyin

308b3(rgyud 'bum): gats+tsha ha ri ping+ga la dIp+ta dzi hA lo hi tAk+Sha/ de hi da dA pa ya swA hA/ sngags 'dis sreg blugs gsum dbul lo// de nas bcom ldan 'das 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa spun drang bar bya ste/

308b5(rgyud 'bum): dri zhim po'i me tog dang chus dbul bar byas te/ de nas sbyin sreg bya'o// sreg thugs lo lan bdun bzlas te lan cig gtor ro// de bzhin du nyi ma bdun gyi bar du mar dang 'bras thug
308b6(rgyud 'bum): bopo che'i chan gyis tshim par bya'o/ / skabs 'dir nges par 'jam dpal gzhon nu'i gzugs mthong bar 'gyur ro// tsan daran gyi lam shing sor gnyis tsam gyi tshad kyis stong rtsa brgyad byas
308b7(rgyud 'bum): na rgyal po dbang du 'gyur ro/ / me tog pad+ma la zho dang / sbrang rtsi dang / mar gyis btags nas spyir sreg stong rtsa brgyad byas na nor rnyed par 'gyur ro// shing shrI sha'i yam shing gis me rab
309a1(rgyud 'bum): tu sbar la til gyis sbyin sreg byas na nor gyi bdag por 'gyur ro/ / rtag tu chus chu la sbyin sreg byas te nang par langs na skye bo thams cad dga' bar 'gyur ro//
309a2(rgyud 'bum): shing arga'i yam shing dang / zho dang / sbrang rtsi dang / mar gyis btags la sbyin sreg 'bum byas na grong bsod snyoms stong dang ldan pa thob bo// shing ba hu pu tri ka zhes bya bas sbyin
309a3(rgyud 'bum): sreg byas na bu mo gang 'dod pa de rnyed do/ / shing a pa margas sbyir sreg byas na nad rnams rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro// 'o ma can gyi shing gi sa me rab tu sbar la til gyis sbyin sreg byas na gang
309a4(rgyud 'bum): sems par byed pa de thob bo/ / yul 'dod pas pad+ma'i sbyin sreg 'bum byas na yul rnyed par 'gyur ro// nang gi sbyin sreg 'bum byas na zas mi zad pa thob par 'gyur ro// gu gul
309a5(rgyud 'bum): dang me tog pri yang ku ma ra dang lhan cig sbyin sreg bya'o/ / shing arka dang sna ma'i me tog gis chu la sbyir ba byas na zhag bdun gyis grong thob par 'gyur ro// snga ma'i me tog gis chu la me tog
309a6(rgyud 'bum): re re blangs te sbyin pa byas pa dang / lhag ma dkyil 'khor la bzhag na gang la sdom du bcug pa de bsnams pa tsam gyis dbang du 'gyur ro// gur kum dang / gla rtsi dang / li shi'i me tog
309a7(rgyud 'bum): khar bcug ste bzlas pa byas na gang dang lhan cig gtam byed pa de dbang du 'gyur ro/ / na le sham la stong rtsa brgyad mngon par bsngags pa byas te/ khar bcug na khros pa'ang chog gis
309b1(rgyud 'bum): dga' bar 'gyur ro/ / gtsug pud la 'di nyid kyi sngags kyis bcings na mi snang bar 'gyur ro// yid la rjes su dran na dgras mthong na'ang khro ba med par 'gyur ro// rtag tu bzlas pa
309b2(rgyud 'bum): byas na skye bo thams cad dga' bar 'gyur ro/ / tho rangs chen po byas langs nas gtsang ba'i sa phyogs su sna ma'i me tog dang ldan par chu la sbyin pa byas na tshig btsun par 'gyur ba'i blon
309b3(rgyud 'bum): por 'gyur ro/ / 'jigs pa yang dag par byung bar gyur na yid la byas pas 'jigs par med par 'gyur ro// pha rol khros par gyur pa la'ang byams pa bsgoms nas rjes su dran zhing
309b4(rgyud 'bum): gdong la rnam par bltas nas khro ba med par 'gyur ro/ / dri zhim po'i me tog gis sbyin sreg byas na gang gi ched du byas pa de dbang du 'gyur ro// tho rangs lan bdun tshul bsngags te
309b5(rgyud 'bum): 'thungs na nges par myong bar 'gyur ba'i las kyang zad par 'gyur ro/ / lan bdun bsngags pa'i chus gdong rab tu bkrus na skye bo thams cad dga' bar 'gyur ro// me tog la lam
309b6(rgyud 'bum): bdun bsngags pas gzhan la byin na de dbang du 'gyur ro/ / 'bras thug po ches sbyin sreg 'bum phrag gcig byas na slob dpon nyid du 'gyur ro// til gyi sbyin sreg gis ni yul gyi
309b7(rgyud 'bum): bdag por 'gyur ro/ / pad+ma'i sbyin sreg stong byas nad nar stong thob par 'gyur ro// gu gul dang / sra rtsi pog dang / gan da ra sa dang / ga pur rnams dpa'i bo'i 'o tshong gis nyos ras gcig tu
310a1(rgyud 'bum): byas la sbyin sreg byas te/ tshes lnga lnga zhing zla ba drug yongs su tshang bar byas na stong 'gyur thob par 'gyur ro// dri thams cad pa'i gzugs brnyan byas te mtshon rnon po
310a2(rgyud 'bum): so gcig pas skyes pa'i yin na rkang pa g.yas pa/ bud med kyi ni rkang pa g.yor pa gcad cing sbyin sreg byas na gang 'dod pa de dbang du 'gyur ro// zhag bdun la dus gsum du dar tu ra ra ga'i
310a3(rgyud 'bum): me tog gis sbyin sreg byas na ba rnams thob par 'gyur ro/ / arka'i me tog gis byas na 'bru rnams thob par 'gyur ro// shri sha'i me tog gis byas na rta rnams thob par 'gyur ro//
310a4(rgyud 'bum): shing mya ngan med kyis byas na gser thob par 'gyur ro// nad 'joms par byed pa'i me tog gis byas na gos rnams thob par 'gyur ro// gang dang gang 'dod pa de thams cad ni snga ma'i me
310a5(rgyud 'bum): tog gis sbyin sreg byas na byed par 'gyur te/ me tog ci 'dra ba'i kha dog gis chu la nyom shar ba'i dus su sbyin sreg byas na de dang kha dog 'dra ba'i gos thob par 'gyur ro// mig sman la
310a6(rgyud 'bum): lan bdun bzlas pa byas te slong mo la 'gro na slong mo mi zad pa thob bo/ / rmi lam ngan pa mthong nas la ngas te bdag nyid kyis bzlas pa byas nas yang nyal na rmi lam bzang po mthong bar
310a7(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur ro/ / de nas rgyal po dbang du byed par 'dod ma de'i rkang pa'i rdul rnams blangs te/ nyungs kar dang til dang bsres nas zhag bdun la dus gsum du sbyin sreg byas na dbang du
310b1(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur ro/ / rgyal mo dbang du byed par 'dod na lcam pa'i lo ma dang / shud ti'i dang / sma na bA ra ha rnams gcig tu byas te zhag bdun la dus gsum du sbyin sreg byas na dbang du 'gyur ro//
310b2(rgyud 'bum): blon po dbang du byed par 'dod na go bye dang / til dang / shu dag rnams kyis gzugs brnyar byas te zhag bdun la dus gsum du sbyin sreg byas na dbang du 'gyur ro// mdun na 'don dbang du byed par
310b3(rgyud 'bum): 'dod na spos pra ma tsa ri dang shu ti gcig tu byas te zhag bdun la dus gsum du sbyin sreg byas na dbang du 'gyur ro/ / bram ze rnams dbang du byed par 'dod na ri 'o thug mar dang lhan cig pas
310b4(rgyud 'bum): zhag bdun la dus gsum du sbyin sreg byas na dbang du 'gyur ro/ / de nas rgyal rigs dbang du byed par 'dod na 'bras sA lu'i chen mar dang ldan pas zhag bdun la dus gsum du spyir sreg
310b5(rgyud 'bum): bya'o/ / rje'u rigs dbang du byed par 'dod na ras chan khyor gang bu ram dang ldan pas zhag bdun la dus gsum du sbyin sreg byas na dbang du 'gyur ro// til gyi tshogs mas sbyin sreg byas
310b6(rgyud 'bum): na dmangs rigs dbang du 'gyur ro/ / thams cad gcig tu byas te sbyin sreg byas nas bzhi mdo'am/ khang stong ngam/ shing gcig pa dag tu gtor ma btang na nad pa de de las rnam
310b7(rgyud 'bum): par grol bar 'gyur ro/ / gdong la bltas te bzlas pa byas na nang dang bral bar 'gyur ro// brgya rtsa bzlas nas gtsug pung bcings na nang thams cad las yongs su grol lo//
311a1(rgyud 'bum): nad thams cad la ni skud pa la mdud pa bya zhing gtsug pud bcing ba byas te bzlas pa byas na rang thams cad las grol bar 'gyur ro// nad kyis btab pa la ni
311a2(rgyud 'bum): bzlas pa tsam gyis yongs su thar par 'gyur ro/ / mgul pa'i nad la ni grog mkhar gyi sa la bzlas pa byas te lde gus byug pa byas na nad las grol bar 'gyur ro// mig gi nang la ni
311a3(rgyud 'bum): zar ma'i me tog gis sbyin sreg byas na nye bar zhi bar 'gyur ro/ / ras ris kyi cho ga'i las gzhan yang sngar bstan pa'i cho gas ras ma nyams pa skra med pa la 'phags pa 'jam dpal gzhon
311a4(rgyud 'bum): nur gyur pa 'drir gzhug par bya ste/ rgyan thams cad kyis brgyar pa/ kha dog dmar ba/ gnon nu'i gzugs can pad+ma'i gdan la bzhugs pa/ g.yas ngos su 'phags pa spyan ras
311a5(rgyud 'bum): gzigs dbang phyug/ g.yon ngos su kun tu bzang po 'phags pa 'jam dpal las cung zad chung ba// ras ris de bzhag la bzlas pa bye ba byas na rgyal por 'gyur ro// tsan dan gyi
311a6(rgyud 'bum): yam shing la gur kum gyis btags pas sbyin sreg 'bum byas na rgyal por 'gyur ro/ / sna ma'i me tog mar gyis btags pas sbyin sreg bye ba byas na rgyal por 'gyur ro// gang gi tshang
311a7(rgyud 'bum): dang ldan pa'i pad+ma'i tshogs kyis sbyin sreg byas pa de'i tshad kyi di nA ra'i tshogs rnyed par 'gyur ro/ / ji srid du bzlas pa de tsam gyi tshang dang ldan pa'i do nA ra ma blangs pa des ni rog pa 'dzin
311b1(rgyud 'bum): pa'i 'khor los sgyur bar 'gyur ro/ / go bya'i skyon sreg 'bum byas na di nA ra stong sbyin par byed do// nad 'joms par byed pa'i 'bras bus sbyin sreg 'bum byas na nor bdag chen por 'gyur ro//
311b2(rgyud 'bum): gu gul gyi yam shing stong rtsa brgyad kyis sbyin sreg byas na nor dang 'bru rnams thob par 'gyur ro// rtag tu til gyis sbyin sreg byas na 'bru rgyun mi 'chad par rnyed par 'gyur ro// ba lang gi lci ba
311b3(rgyud 'bum): las byung ba'i 'bras thug po che zho dang bcas pas sbyar sreg 'bu ba byas nab stong thob par 'gyur ro/ / bo de tse'i 'bras bu dang sho ma'i 'bras bu gcig tu byas te sbyin sreg byas na gang 'dod pa'i bu mo de rnyed pa
311b4(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur ro/ / sho ma'i lo mas sbyin sreg byas na 'dod pa thams cad thob par 'gyur ro// zar ma'i me tog la 'o mas btags pas sbyin sreg bya ba ni bram ze dbang du bya ba la'o// shing ka ra wi
311b5(rgyud 'bum): ra'i me tog la shing 'o ma can 'o ma med pas sbyin sreg bya ba ni rgyal rigs dbang du bya ba la'o/ / dong ka'i me tog gis sbyin sreg bya ba ni rgyal po dbang du bya ba la'o// da du ra'i me tog gis sbyin
311b6(rgyud 'bum): sreg bya ba ni dmangs rigs dbang du bya ba la'o/ / shing arka'i me tog la zho dang / sbrang rtsi dang / mar gyis btags pas sbyin sreg 'bum byas na nad thams cad las yongs su grol bar
311b7(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur ro/ / 'di nyid kyi tsho gas me tog dri zhim pa la lan 'bum bzlas te zhabs kyi drung du bzhag na rtag tu bde bar 'gyur ro// shing a shwad tha'i yam shing gis me rab tu sngar la
312a1(rgyud 'bum): ma'i me tog gis sbyin sreg byas na rgyu skar gyi gnod pa nye bar zhi bar 'gyur ro/ / gi'u wang la sngags mngor par bris te spyi bo la bcings nas g.yul du 'jug ra
312a2(rgyud 'bum): mtshon gyis reg par mi 'gyur ro/ / bcom ldan 'das 'jam dpal gzhon nu'i ras ris glang po che'i 'tshogs ma la bzhag ste dpung gi tshogs kyi mngon du btang na mthong ba tsam gyis
312a3(rgyud 'bum): gzhan gyi dpung 'jig par 'gyur ro/ / gzhon nu'i gzugs can gser gyi rma bya'i gdan la bzhugs pa byas te/ rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mor btags nas g.yul du zhugs na mthong ba nyid kyis
312a4(rgyud 'bum): gzhan gyi dpung 'jig par 'gyur ro/ / sna ma'i me tog sa lan 'bum bzlas te zhabs drung du bzhag la/ de nyid du ku sha bting ba'i stan byas na rmi lam du 'di la ji ltar 'dod pa stor par
312a5(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur ro/ / mar me stong la de bzhin du mar me re re la'ang pad+ma'i skud pa'i snying po byas te/ shing dar gyis dkri ba byas la me rab tu sbar nas phul na nges par 'jam dpal gzhor rur gyur pa
312a6(rgyud 'bum): ji lta ba mthong bar 'gyur ro/ / ras ris kyi cho ga gnyis pa rdzogs so// / gser ram dngul las gzhon nu'i gzugs bya ste/ phyag g.yas pa mchog sbyin pa dang
312a7(rgyud 'bum): g.yon pa bcom ldan 'das ma shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i glegs bam 'dzin pa 'di lta bu sku gdung gi za ma tog mdun du bzhag la yi ge gcig pa'i bzlas pa 'bum bya'o/ / mchod
312b1(rgyud 'bum): pa rnams ni nyon par bya'o/ / zhabs g.yon pa'i mdun du bu mo la kha zas sbyin par bya'o// klu dang / rol mo dang / glegs bam bklag par yang bya'o// bzlas pa yongs su rdzogs pa dang me
312b2(rgyud 'bum): tog gsum gyis mchod yon gsol te slar gshegs su gsol lo/ / cho ga snga ma bzhin du spyan drang ba dang gshegs su gsol bar bya'o// pad+ma'i phyag rgya bcings nas ri bzlas pa
312b3(rgyud 'bum): bya'o/ / rgyal mtshan gyi phyag rgyas ni sbyar drang bar bya'o// bkra shis ldan gyi phyag rgyas ni bzhugs su gsol lo// gang ba'i phyag rgyas ni mchod yon no// rtags gcig pa'i phyag rgyas ni
312b4(rgyud 'bum): me tog dbul lo/ / yid la re ba'i phyag rgyas ni mar me'o// g.yo ba'i phyag rgyas ni spos so// rma bya'i gdan gyi phyag rgyas ni dri'o// srog shing gyi phyag rgyas ni bshos so// cho ga 'di nyid
312b5(rgyud 'bum): kyis mtshan mo dang nyi ma re re zhing ji srid bzlas pa rdzogs kyi bar du bya'o/ / phyi nas ni las rnams bya'o// sna ma'i me tog gis rgya mtshor 'gro ba'i chu bo la 'bum gyis gtor ra yul thob
312b6(rgyud 'bum): par 'gyur ro/ / mtshan mo sna ma'i me tog gi tshogs bcom ldan 'das kyi mdun du byas nus nyal na/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpas yongs su bskor ba chos 'chang pa mthong
312b7(rgyud 'bum): bar 'gyur ro/ / gang gi don du byed pa de nyid kyi las bya'o// gso sbyong byas shing yar ngo'i tshes nas brtsams te/ ga pur sbrang rtsi dang bsres pa'i spos kyis spyir sreg byas na rgyal thabs tho
313a1(rgyud 'bum): par 'gyur ro/ / bzlas pa bye ba byas na 'jam dpal rang nyid mthong bar 'gyur ro// chos 'chad par yang mdzad de/ de dang lhan cig smra ba dang mngon sum du snang bar yang
313a2(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur ro/ / phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ro// ras ris kyi cho ga gsum pa rdzogs so// // tsan dan dmar po las byas pa'i gzhon nu'i gzugs
313a3(rgyud 'bum): can phyogs gcig tu gnod sbyin dga' bar byed pa/ phyogs gnyis pa na ni 'phrog ma shing mya ngan med kyi rtsa na 'dug pa de 'dra ba bzhag la/ lan tshwa dang / yungs kar dang / ske tshe dang
313a4(rgyud 'bum): bsres pa'i tsan dan dmar po'i gzugs brnyan byas nas bcad cing sbyin sreg byas na gang gi ming bzung ba de dbang du 'gyur ro/ / shing u dum ba ra'i 'bras bus gang gi mi bzung ning sbyin
313a5(rgyud 'bum): sreg byas na de dbang du 'gyur ro/ / rgya shug gis 'bras bus sbyin sreg byas na gang gi ming bzung ba de dbang du 'gyur ro// khwa dang 'dra ba'i shing u dum ba ras sbyin sreg byas na gang gi
313a6(rgyud 'bum): ming bzung ba de dbang du 'gyur ro/ / shing srid ka ta gas sbyin sreg bya ba ni bram ze dbang du bya ba la'o// pad+ma'i rtsa bas ni rgyal rigs dbang du bya ba la'o// ut+pa la'i rtsa bas sbyin sreg
313a7(rgyud 'bum): bya ba ni dmangs rigs dbang du bya ba la'o/ / lan tshwa dang sha kha ras sbyin sreg stong rtsa brgyad nyi ma bdun la dus gsum du byas na gang gi ming gis sbyin sreg byas pa de dbang du 'gyur ro// nim
313b1(rgyud 'bum): pa'i lo ma la yungs mar gyis btabs pa'i sreg thugs kyi sbyin sreg stong rtsa brgyad zhag bdun la dus gsum du byas na gang gi ming gis byas pa de dbang du 'gyur ro/ / thams cad kyis sbyin
313b2(rgyud 'bum): sreg byas na thams cad dbang du 'gyur ro/ / sman 'bri ha ti'i me tog gis sbyin sreg 'bum byas na gser rnyed par 'gyur ro// shing ka lan dzA ri ka'i me tog gis sbyin sreg stong rtsa brgyad byas na
313b3(rgyud 'bum): grong chen po thob par 'gyur ro/ / pa ta la'i me tog gis sbyin sreg byas na 'bru mi zad pa thob par 'gyur ro// bil ba'i me tog gis sbyin sreg byas na gser rnyed par 'gyur ro// shu dag la
313b4(rgyud 'bum): zho dang / sbrang rtsi dang / mar gyis btags te sbyin sreg byas na rgol ba thams cad la lan 'debs nus par 'gyur ro// sman brah+ma'i khu bcud mar dang ldan pa zangs ma'i snod du bzhag la
313b5(rgyud 'bum): bzlas pa khri rdzogs pa'i bar du bzlas nas de nas 'thungs na rgol ba thams cad las rnam par rgyal bar 'gyur ro/ / shin tu zhe sdang ba la ni stong rtsa brgyad dong ba la mngon par bsngags te khros
313b6(rgyud 'bum): pa'i mdun du bor na khro ba med par 'gyur ro/ / ras ris kyi cho ga bzhi pa rdzogs so// // ras ma nyams pa skra med pa la ri mo mkhan gso sbyong byas pa tshon ma 'dres pa
313b7(rgyud 'bum): ngag gis 'phags pa 'jam dpal pad+ma'i gdan la bzhugs shing chos 'chang ba 'drir gzhug par bya'o/ / g.yon phyogs su 'phags pa 'od dpag chen mo/ g.yas phyogs su 'phags
314a1(rgyud 'bum): bshes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gzugs can ma rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ gos dkar po bgos pa bri bar bya'o// de'i 'og tu pad+ma'i mtsho me tog rnam pa sna
314a2(rgyud 'bum): tshogs kyis khyab pa na klu'i rgyal po gnyis ro stong chu'i nang nas byung ba pad+ma'i sdong bu la lag pas 'dzin pa'o/ / 'phags pa gzhan gyis mi thub ma phyogs gcig tu bri bar bya ste/ log 'drer
314a3(rgyud 'bum): gyi bgegs 'jig par byed pa/ me 'bar ba mngon par 'byin pa/ spyan khro gnyer can du byas pa/ phyogs gzhan du ri khrod ma lo ma gyon pa zhags pa dang dgra sta lag na thogs pa/ kha dog
314a4(rgyud 'bum): nag pa/ mig dmar ba/ rma bya'i rgyab tu zhon pa/ sgrub pa po la srung bar byed pa bri bar bya'o// sgrub pa po'ang pad+ma'i 'phreng ba lag na thogs shing / bcom ldan 'das 'jam dpal gyi
314a5(rgyud 'bum): zhal la rnam par blta ba bya'o/ / steng du ni rnga yab dang // me tog gi 'phreng ba dang / rwa 'dzin pa'i lha'i bu rnams bri bar bya'o// ras ris de nub tu bstan te bzhag la sku gdung dang bcas
314a6(rgyud 'bum): pa'i mchod rten gyi bdun du bzlas pa bye ba bya'o/ / bzlas pa'i mtha' mar me'i mchod pa chen po bya zhing / bcom ldan 'das ma shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bklags la bzlas pa stong phrag bcu
314a7(rgyud 'bum): 'jam dpal gzhon nu'i zhal la blta zhing bzlas pa bya'o/ / de nas ras ris 'gul bar gyur na rgyal srid thob par 'gyur ro// lha'i mig thob cing rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro// 'khor
314b1(rgyud 'bum): los sgyur ba chen por 'gyur ro/ / bzlas shing bzlas na byang chub sems dpa'i sa dang po thob par 'gyur ro// 'di'i chos ston pa'ang thos par 'gyur ro// ras ris de nyid kyi mdun du ba ser
314b2(rgyud 'bum): mobe'u yod pa'i mar khu blangs la zangs ma'i snod du banag nas ji srong du dro bar 'gyur ba dang / du ba 'thul bar 'gyur ba dang / rab tu 'bar bar 'gyur ba de srid du bzlas pa byas na/ dro bar
314b3(rgyud 'bum): gyur pa na 'thungs na ni mchog tu yid gzhungs pa dang thos pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro/ / du ba 'thul ba na 'thungs na ni mi snang bar 'gyur ro// rab tu 'bar ba na 'thungs na ni nam mkha' la 'gro bar
314b4(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur ro/ / kham phor so ma btang ba la sbyar la shu dag snga ma'i me tog gis dkris pa bzhag la/ ji srid myu gu byung ba de'i bar du bzlas brjod byas te de zos na thos pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro//
314b5(rgyud 'bum): bzlas brjod gzhan bya ba byas na 'jam dpal mngon sum du mthong zhing chos ston pa'ang thos la/ de la dad par yang 'gyur ro// gser gyi pad+ma 'dab ma brgyar byas te/ pus mo g.yas
314b6(rgyud 'bum): pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ ji srid 'bar gyi bar tu bzlas pa byas na de blangs pa tsam gyis rig pa 'dzin pa'i 'khor los sgyur bar 'gyur ro// gzhan gyis mi thub par 'gyur ro//
314b7(rgyud 'bum): ldong ros sam/ ba bla 'am/ lig bu mig gam/ bil ba'i lo ma chu la bcug ste/ ji srid yul khu la zhes bya ba'i sgra byed pa de srid du bzlas na de blangs pa tsam gyis sa la spyod pa'i
315a1(rgyud 'bum): srin po dang / sha za rnams kyi bdag po dang / mi snang bar 'gyur ro// mtshan nyid dang ldan pa rma me cing ma 'dres pa'i ral gri blangs la/ ji srid thul gyi gdengs ka
315a2(rgyud 'bum): bzhin du byas te 'dug pa de srid du bzlas pa byas la/ de nas de thangs na rig pa 'dzin pa'i 'khor los sgyur bar 'gyur ro// bskal par tshe gnas pa dang / gzhan gyis mi thub par 'gyur
315a3(rgyud 'bum): ro/ / ldong ros lcags gsum gyis dkri ba byas te khar bcug la/ ji srid tsu lu tsu lu la'i sgra 'byung ba de srid du bzlas pa byas na thub pa med par 'gyur ro// dam thams cad 'joms par byed par
315a4(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur ro/ / rigs thams cad dbang du byed de/ 'dod pa dbang du byed pa ni ma gtogs so// shing sha mi las skyes pa'i shing a shwa tha'i snying po blangs la/ lcags gsum gyis dkri ba
315a5(rgyud 'bum): byas nas khar rab tu bcug na ji srid tsu lu tsu lu la'i sgra 'byung ba de srid du bzlas pa byas na mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ / lo stong du 'tsho bar 'gyur ro// dngul gyi 'khor lo byas te lha ma yin gyi khung
315a6(rgyud 'bum): bu'i sgor bzhag la/ ji srid du 'khor los lha ma yin gyi 'khrul 'khor bcad nas rab tu 'jug pa de'i bar du bzlas pa byas na/ de'i mod la lha ma yin gyi na chung rnams byung nas de dang lhar cig
315a7(rgyud 'bum): rab tu zhugs nas bskal par gnas par 'gyur ro/ / lcags las byas pa'i mdung rtse gsum byas te/ khung bu de dag gi sgor bzlas pa byang na der 'khrul 'khor thams cad 'jig par
315b1(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur zhing / ji srid sgrub pa'i grogs mchog dang lhan cig 'dod pa de snyed dang lhan cig rab tu 'jug ci bskal par gnas par 'gyur ro// byams pa'ang bzhugs shing mthong bar yang 'gyur ro//
315b2(rgyud 'bum): ras ris kyi cho ga lnga pa'o// / shing arka dkar po las mthe bong tsam gyi bcom ldan 'das 'jam dpal byas la/ shing arka'i me tog 'bum phul mthon po chen po thob par
315b3(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur ro/ / shing ka ra wA ra dkar po'i rtsa ba las mthe bong tsam byas te/ 'di nyid kyi me tog bye ba gcig phul na bka' la gtogs par 'gyur ro// shing ka ra hA Ta las mtho gang gi tshad tsam
315b4(rgyud 'bum): du byas la/ de'i me tog 'bum phul na dmag dpon thob par 'gyur ro// tsan dan dkar po las mtho phyed tsam gyi bcom ldan 'das 'jam dpal byas la/ sna ma'i me tog 'bum phul na mdun
315b5(rgyud 'bum): na 'don thob par 'gyur ro/ / shing a shwad tha las sor gcig tsam gyi tshad du byas la/ rnyog pa med pa'i chus bum pa bkang ba phul na skye bo mang pos bkur bar 'gyur ro// dri thams cad
315b6(rgyud 'bum): la byas pa'i me tog thams cad phul na gang 'dod pa de thob par 'gyur ro/ / rtag tu yul ma ga d+ha'i yam shing ma nyams pas spyir sreg byas na blon po skye bo mang pos bkur bar 'gyur
315b7(rgyud 'bum): ro/ / rtag tu bzlas pa byas na mtshams med pa lnga'ang byang bar 'gyur ro// shi ba'i dus su'ang 'jam dpal gyi zhal mthong bar 'gyur ro// 'di la chos ston par yang mdzad do// langs
316a1(rgyud 'bum): shing langs shing brgya rtsa brgyad badz+ras ra sems can thams cad kyis mi thub par 'gyur ro/ / mig la yongs su bzlas na bdag po mthong zhing bka' rir stsol bar 'gyur ro//
316a2(rgyud 'bum): gang gi ched du las byas pa nyid nag bdun gyis de dbang du 'gyur ro// grong gzhan du gnas pa la ni zhag nyi shu rtsa gcig gis so// yul gzhan la gnas pa la ri za ba gnyis kyis so//
316a3(rgyud 'bum): gzhon nu'i bdag po'i tsho gas yin gyi/ sngags gzhan gyi cho gas ma yin na las ma lus par byed par 'gyur ro// 'dod pa dang mngon spyod dbang du byed pa ni ma gtogs so// cho ga drug pa 'di
316a4(rgyud 'bum): bstan pa/ / dus kyi mtha' la sems cad rnams// bsod nams chung la phar don du// thub pas sngon ni bstan pa yin// shAkya seng ge skyob pa yi// bstan pa nub par gyur pa na//
316a5(rgyud 'bum): dus ni mi bzad 'jigs pa na// de tshe grub par 'gyur ba yin// cho ga'i rgyal po bde byed pa// bdun pa 'dir ni bshad par bya// de tshe dus ni mo bzang la// cho ga 'di ni nga yis
316a6(rgyud 'bum): bshad/ / sems can bsod nams chung ba la// lam ni 'di dag rab tu bstan// byang chub tshogs kyi rgyu don du// theg gsum lam la rab tu gzhol// de yi dus su sems can
316a7(rgyud 'bum): la/ / thabs la mkhas pa bstan pa yin// sred pa rmongs pa'i sems can dang // 'dod chags zhe sdang dag gis dkrugs// sred pa mthar ni gtugs bya'i phyir// de dag la
316b1(rgyud 'bum): bstan lam 'di yin/ / sred pa'i 'ching bas bcings pa la// dge ba'am dge ba'i las kyi rgyur// sgrub dang srub dang de bzhin rdzas// sngags dang rgyud ni nga yis bstan// sgrub
316b2(rgyud 'bum): pa zlos pa rnams la 'dir/ / cho ga'i rgyal po bdag nyid che// sems can rnams ni gdul don du// 'jig rten 'dren pa rnams kyis gsungs// shAkya seng ge mi yi mchog
316b3(rgyud 'bum): thub pa mchog gis de gsungs nas/ / de tshe dus kyi tha ma la// grub pa don yod bstan pa dang // sngags dang rgyud kyi stobs dang ni// brtson 'grus rgya chen ldan bstan nas//
316b4(rgyud 'bum): de tshe gnas gtsang lha tshogs la// rgyal ba mchog gis gsungs pa ni// cho ga'i rgyal po rgya che ba// 'jig rten kun la phan pa'i phyir// 'jam pa'i dbyangs kyis bstan pa la//
316b5(rgyud 'bum): grogs po de ni nga yis bstan// 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi rtsa ba'i cho ga byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod phal po che theg pa chen po shin tu rgyas pa'i mdo las/ cho ga'i bya ba 'jam
316b6(rgyud 'bum): dpal gyi cho ga rab 'byams las le'u nyi shu rtsa gnyis pa rdzogs so/ / / de nas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas gzhan yang gnas gtsang ma'i gzhal med 'ang la
316b7(rgyud 'bum): gzigs nas/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal khyod kyi las kyi cho ga'i le'u las ras ris kyi cho ga bdun pa yod de/ gang gis dus kyi mtha'
317a1(rgyud 'bum): de la sgrub par 'gyur na/ de la don yod par 'grub par 'gyur te/ 'bras bu dang bcas pa/ bde ba 'byung ba/ bde bar rnam par smin pa/ mthong ba'i
317a2(rgyud 'bum): chos la myong bar 'gyur ba/ ngan song thams cad las zlog par byed pa/ nges par byang chub la gzhol bar byed pa grub par 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas
317a3(rgyud 'bum): 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i snying po gsungs pa ni yi gadrug pa 'gro ba rigs drug las grol bar byed pa'i bdag nyid bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ mi mnyam pa/ zla med pa/ rdzu 'phrul che ba/
317a4(rgyud 'bum): srid pa'i rgya mtsho thams cad dang sdug bsngal gsum gyi sdug bsngal las grol bar byed pa/ 'byung po thams cad kyis bzod par dka' ba/ 'jig rten thams cad kyis ma gos pa/
317a5(rgyud 'bum): 'byung po thams cad kyis mi thub pa/ srid pa'i lam thams cad rnam par sbyong bar byed pa/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams thob par byed pa/ ma rungs pa thams cad zlog par byed pa/
317a6(rgyud 'bum): sangs rgyas thams cad kyis rjes su yi rang bar mdzad pa/ phun sum tshogs pa thams cad byed pa/ 'jam dpal gyis bstan pa la sngags thams cad kyi mchog de gang zhe na/ oM wa kyi nga
317a7(rgyud 'bum): namaH/ 'di'i cho gar 'gyur ba ni tshod rngad dam/ nas chan khyor gang ngam/ slong mo'i zas kyis 'tsho la/ dus gsum du khrus byed cing gos lan gsum brje bas yi ge 'bum byas na sngar
317b1(rgyud 'bum): bsnyen pa byas par 'gyur ro/ / kha tshar gyi rtse mom bcad pa'i res la ri mo mkhan gso sbyong byas pas tshon ma 'dres pa dag gis 'phags pa 'jam dpal pad+ma'i gdan la chos 'chang cing bzhugs
317b2(rgyud 'bum): pa/ rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ gnon nu'i gzugs su 'dug pa tha gos phrag par gzar ba 'drir gzhug par bya'o// g.yon du 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug phyag
317b3(rgyud 'bum): na pad+ma bsnams pa/ g.yas su ni 'phags pa kun tu bzang po/ steng du ni rig pa 'dzin pa gnyis 'phreng ba thogs shing sprin gyi nang nas byung ba bri bar bya'o// 'og tu ni sgrub pa po
317b4(rgyud 'bum): lag na spos thogs pa'o/ / khor yug tu ni ri'i rtse mo'i 'og tu ni pad+ma'i mtsho 'drar gzhug par bya'o// sku gdung dang bcas pa'i mchod rten dang ras ris nub tu bstan te rab tu bzhag la/
317b5(rgyud 'bum): mchod pa rgya chen po byas nas mar gyi mar me'ang rab tu sbar zhing / sna ma'i me tog re re la'ang mngon par bzlas nas me tog stong rtsa brgyad 'jam dpal gyi zhal la gtor to// de nas zab pa
317b6(rgyud 'bum): chen po'i yi ge hUM gi sgra thos pa 'am/ ras ris rab tu 'gul bar 'gyur ro// yi ge hUM gi sgras ni sa kun la dbang ba'i rgyal por 'gyur ro// ras ris 'gul bas ni rgol ba thams
317b7(rgyud 'bum): cad la lan 'debs nus pa dang / 'jig rten pa thams cad kyi bstan bcos shes par 'gyur ro// ci ste ma grub kyang las thams cad la nus pa dang ldan par 'gyur ro// 'di na
318a1(rgyud 'bum): cho ga dang po'o/ / a ka ru'i yam shing sor phyed dang gnyis kyi tshad la du ru ka'i thang chus sil ha ra sa btags pas seng ldeng gi mngag ma du ba med pa la mtshan thog
318a2(rgyud 'bum): thag tu sbyin sreg byas na/ skya rengs 'char ba tsam na 'phags pa 'jam dpal mthong bar 'gyur zhing / des ci 'dod pa'i mchog stsal bar 'gyur te/ 'dod pa dbang du bya ba ni ma
318a3(rgyud 'bum): gtogs so/ / de nyid kyis ras ris kyi mdun du tsan dan gyi spos kyi rgyun chad pa med par mtshan thog thag tu bdugs te bzlas pa byas na/ de'i 'og tu 'phags pa 'jam dpal mngon sum
318a4(rgyud 'bum): du gshegs te zab mo'i chos ston pa de la mos par 'gyur ro/ / mos nas kyang na thams cad las rnam par grol bar 'gyur/ dbang thob par 'gyur/ byang chub sems dpa'i sa
318a5(rgyud 'bum): rjes su thob par 'gyur ro/ / tsan dan dmar po las byas pa'i pad+ma rtsa lag dang bcas pa sor drug tsam tsan dan dmar po'i lde gus bskus nas lan stong bsngags shing / dgang gzar
318a6(rgyud 'bum): gyis lan stong blugs pa byas la/ zla ba nya la ras ris kyi mdun du pad+ma'i snod bzhag la/ lag pas bzung nas ji srid kyi bar du 'bar ba de srid du bzlas pa byas na/ de bzung bas
318a7(rgyud 'bum): lo bcu drug gi na tshong dang / mdog gser btso ma 'dra ba dang / nyi ma pas lhag pa'i gzi brjid dang ldan pa dang / lha gzhon nu lta bur 'gyur ba dang / rig pa 'dzin pa thams cad kyis
318b1(rgyud 'bum): phyag byas pa dang / bskal pa chen por 'tshe bar 'gyur ro// lus zhig nas mngon par dga' bar skye bar 'gyur ro// zla ba gzas zin pa la shung dag dkar po blangs la/ ba'i rnam lngas
318b2(rgyud 'bum): bkrus te shing a shwang tha'i lo mas bkab pa byas la/ ji srid dong dang / du ba 'thul ba dang / 'bar ba de srid kyi bar du bzlas pa byas na/ dro ba 'byung bas ni skye bo thams cad dbang du 'gyur
318b3(rgyud 'bum): ba dang / rgol ba thams cad las rgyal bar 'gyur ro// du ba 'thul bas ni mi snang ba dang / stong phrag sum cur 'tsho bar 'gyur ro// 'bar bas ni nam mkha' la 'gro ba dang / bskal
318b4(rgyud 'bum): pa chen por 'tshe bar 'gyur ro/ / ba ser skya'i be'u dang bcas pa'i mar khu blangs la/ zangs ma'i snod du shing a shwang tha'i lo ma bdun gyis bkab ste bzhag la/ ji srid grub pa rnam gsum
318b5(rgyud 'bum): thob pa de srid du bzlas pa byas la/ de 'thungs na thos pa 'dzin pa dang / mi snang bar 'gyur ba dang / nam mkha' la 'gro bar 'gyur ro// sman pu ka ra mu la'i sa bon zla ba gzas zin pa la
318b6(rgyud 'bum): khar bcug nas ji srid du tsu lu tsu lu zhes bya ba'i sgra 'byung ba de srid du bzlas pa byas la/ sman de phyung nas lcags gsum gyis yongs su dkri ba byas la/ yang khar rab tu bcug na mi snang
318b7(rgyud 'bum): bar 'gyur ro/ / sman de skyugs na ni snang bar 'gyur ro// li shi dri zhim po khar bcug la bzlas pa 'bum byas na gang dang smra ba de dbang du 'gyur ro// 'o ma dang nas chan khyor gang ba ning
319a1(rgyud 'bum): brngas pa 'bum phrag bcu gnyis byas na rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro/ / srong mo'i zas kyis 'chol shing bzhin du mi smra ba'i dka' thub byed cing bzlas pa 'bum byed ma/
319a2(rgyud 'bum): mi snang bar 'gyur ro// bzlas pa bye ba byas na ji ltar srid pa tha ma pa'i byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa 'jam dpal chos ston pa de bzhin du 'gyur ro// rtag tu bzlas pa byas ma dor thams
319a3(rgyud 'bum): cad grub par 'gyur ro/ / gang gis gzugs brnyan dri thams cad pas byas la bcang cing sbyin sreg byas na zhag 'dun gyis dbang du 'gyur ro// gu gul gyi ril bu rgya shug gi tshig gu'i tshang
319a4(rgyud 'bum): tsam mar gyis btags pas brgya phrag stong gi sbyin sreg byas na rgyal po dbang du 'gyur ro/ / til la no dang mar gyis btags pas sbyin sreg 'bum phrag stong byas na thams cad kyi dam pa'i
319a5(rgyud 'bum): khyim gyi bdag po chen por 'gyur ro/ / ba'i lcibs la ma lhung bas dkyil 'khor byas la/ de la me tog gis gcal du bkram ste bzlas pa brgya rtsa brgyad byas la/ de ras dam pa'i chos
319a6(rgyud 'bum): kyi glegs bam bklag par byas na zla ba gcig gis mchog tu yid gzhungs par 'gyur ro/ / gi'u waM la brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas te dpral bar thig le byas na skye bo thams cad dga' bar 'gyur
319a7(rgyud 'bum): ro/ / gtsug pud la lan bdun bzlas pa byas na sems can thams cad kyis gnod pa med par 'gyur ro// me tog ki ri ma las sbyin sreg 'bum byas na nang thams cad las grol bar
319b1(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur ro/ / nyin re zhing bzlas pa bdur du byas na nges par myong bar 'gyur ba'i las rnams zad par 'gyur ro// bzlas pa brgya rtsa brgyad byas na 'chi ba'i dus kyi tshe 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi
319b2(rgyud 'bum): zhal thams cad mthong bar 'gyur ro/ / le'u bdun pa'i res ris kyi cho ga'o// 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi rtsa ba'i cho ga byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod phal po che theg pa chen po shin tu rgyas pa'i
319b3(rgyud 'bum): mdo las/ 'jam dpal gyi ras ris kyi cho ga las kyi cho ga'i le'u rab 'byams las nyi shu rtsa gsum pa rdzogs so// / de nas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas
319b4(rgyud 'bum): gzhan yang gnas gtsang ma'i gzhal med khang la gzigs nas/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal khyod kyi sngags dang / rgyud dang / rig pa'i rgyal po dang /
319b5(rgyud 'bum): 'khor los sgyur ba la sogs pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gtsug tor la sogs pa dang / sngags thams cad kyi grub pa'i gnas yod de/ de'ang mdor na byang phyogs su de bzhin
319b6(rgyud 'bum): gshegs pa thams cad kyi rig pa'i rgyal po 'grub par 'gyur te/ rgya dang rgya ni che nyid la// 'jam pa'i dbyangs ni rab 'grub 'gyur// gang yang de yi sngags rnams ni// der ni rab tu 'grub
319b7(rgyud 'bum): bar 'gyur/ / gtsug tor rgyal po thams cad dang // de dag tu ni grub par snang // kA bi she dang bag kha la// mo Di ya mi bor yug yul// mche dang ni sin tu'i yul// khab can gyi mtshams
320a1(rgyud 'bum): kun dang / / byang phyogs su ni gnas bsten la// dge ba'i sngags ni 'grub par 'gyur// gang yang sangs rgyas sngon gsungs dang // da ltar yang ni gsungs pa dang /
320a2(rgyud 'bum): ma 'ongs sangs rgyas rnams kyis kyang // zhi ba'i rgyur ni gsungs pa ste// kha ba can ri'i nang byung ba// der ni thams cad 'grub par 'gyur// skye bo skal ldan bzang po ni// zhi ba'i las ni
320a3(rgyud 'bum): rtsom par byed/ / de bzhin sngags ni yul dbus su// pad+ma'i rigs ni 'grub par 'gyur// mdzod dang nor bu'i rigs dag kyang // der ni 'grub par rab tu snang // gnod sbyin lngas rtsen dag
320a4(rgyud 'bum): dang ni/ / 'phrog ma'i gnod sbyin skye gnas dang // gang dag dri za'i sngags rnams ni// de dag tu ni grub par gsungs// de nas rtag tu ku sha'i grong // ma ga d+ha ni khor yug dang // ngogs dga'
320a5(rgyud 'bum): / chu bor snar ma dang // pad+ma'i yul ni thams cad du// de bzhin nor bu'i rigs gsungs pa'i// 'dzam b+ha la ni grub par 'gyur// rgya mtsho dang ni gling ngogs dang // chu yi gzi no thams cad dang // dga'
320a6(rgyud 'bum): ba'i grong khyer siM ha lar/ / sngags kyi lha ni 'grub par 'gyur// sgrol ma khro gnyer can dag dang // dpal chen ma dang grags chen ma// gdugs dkar rnams kyi sngags rnams dang // zla ba'i grong khyer
320a7(rgyud 'bum): rgya mtsho dang / / shar gyi yul ni khor yug/ der gnas pa la 'grub par 'gyur// 'bigs byed ri nang gnas pa dang // yul ni mchog dbang khor yug tu// sprin drug bu bzhin 'jam dpal ni// khor
320b1(rgyud 'bum): gug tu grub pa yin/ / ri rtse tshang tshong nang dang ni// ri sul dang ni nags bcas la// log 'dren bgegs ni byed pa yi// bzlas pa dag ni 'grub par 'gyur// glang po'i cha byad yang dag ldan//
320b2(rgyud 'bum): mche ba gtsigs pa gzi brjid che// de bzhin rta gzugs du ma dang // du ma'i rnam par grags pa yin// lha ni dbang dang ldan pa'i bu// rnam pa sna tshogs bgegs byed pa// nges bstan
320b3(rgyud 'bum): sngags dang ldan pa yi/ / grub pa'i zhing du rab tu snang // ma mo mi bzang rnam sna tshogs// gza' nyid shin tu mi bzad dang // yi dgas skye gnas bstan pa yi// mi yi zas byed bden bral
320b4(rgyud 'bum): dang / / yi dgas rgyal por bstan pa dang // de dge zhing du grub par gsungs// de la sogs pa'i 'byung po kun// grub pa'i zhing du gsungs pa yin// rdo rje khro bo brtson 'grus che//
320b5(rgyud 'bum): de dag phyogs su grub pa yin// lha min sngags kyi gtso bo dang // gang gzhan de bzhin 'jig rten pa'i// sngags rgyud lho phyogs dag tu ni// rten pa dag la 'grub par 'gyur// rtag tu yi
320b6(rgyud 'bum): dgas rgyal po dang / / gshin rjes kyang ni bstan pa dang // zhi ba khyab 'jug gis bstan pa'i// sngags gzhan dag kyang 'grub par 'gyur// gdug cing gdug pa'i las dag ni// lha yi
320b7(rgyud 'bum): gnas su bstan pa yin/ / sngags rnams gdug pa'i las rnams ni// lag na rdo rjes bstan pa dag/ lho yi phyogs la brten na ni// sdig pa'i las ni 'grub par 'gyur// de dag
321a1(rgyud 'bum): gi ni phyogs dag tu/ / myur du yang dag 'grub par snang // nyi mas bshad pa'i sngags rnams ni// nyi ma'i sngags zhes rab tu bsgrags// nub phyogs na ni
321a2(rgyud 'bum): gang yod pa/ / sngags dang rgyud ni rab tu 'grub// gnod sbyin dbang po rdzu 'phrul che// der ni rang sngags 'grub par 'gyur// byis pa rnams ni rmongs pa yi// 'byung po kur la nor
321a3(rgyud 'bum): sbyir zhing / / cho ga mthong ba'i rgyu yis ni// skye bo rnams la nor sbyin byed// longs spyod ldan zhing mdzod 'phel ba// nub kyi phyogs su 'grub par 'gyur// gnod sbyin zhes bya'i mang
321a4(rgyud 'bum): gis ni/ / sa yi steng du rnam par grags// gnod sbyin lag na rdo rje rang // byang chub sems dpa' rdzu 'phrul che// sngags pa mchog ni dam pa ste// rang nyid sa bcu'i bdag po yin//
321a5(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje pad+ma'i rigs dag gi/ de dag sngags ni grub pa yin// de bzhin rigs brgyad sngags dag ni// phyogs brgyad drug tu gnas pa yin// rgyal ba'i rigs kyi sngags dag ni// byang gi
321a6(rgyud 'bum): phyogs su 'grub pa yin/ / pad+ma'i rigs las byung ba'i sngags// de bzhin shar gyi phyogs su 'grub// lho yi phyogs su gnas pa la// rdo rje'i rigs ni 'grub par 'gyur// nub
321a7(rgyud 'bum): phyogs su ni mdzod 'grub gsungs/ / phyogs mtshams dag tu rin chen rigs// de bzhin nub byang mtshams su ni// de dag 'grub rab rab tu brtags// lho nub kyi ni mtshams
