356b6(rgyud 'bum): phan tshun legs mnan pa/ / de ni kha sbyar rgya ru 'gyur// mya ngan 'khrug pa rnam par 'jig/ gang dag mtshon cha las byung rnams// phyag rgya 'di dag gsungs pa yin// me tog
356b7(rgyud 'bum): gdan dang bzhon pa dang / / gzhan yang gdon ni 'jigs byed pa// thams cad las kun byed ldan pa// skyob pa'i sngags kun thams cad yin// chos grangs dang ni rgyu skar dang /
357a1(rgyud 'bum): smyung ba dag kyang mi bya ste// phyag rgya sngags su rab ldan pa// las rnams myur du grub par byed// zlos pa dka' thub ldan pa dang // sngags rjes pa la
357a2(rgyud 'bum): mkhas pa dang / / phyag rgya sngags su rab ldan na// bsgrub bya min pa'ang cung zad med// lag pa gnyis po bya ba min// phan tshun thal mo yang dag sbyar// mthe'u chung srin
357a3(rgyud 'bum): lag mthe bong gi/ tshigs ni ba ra ma sbyar bya ba// gung mo sbyar ba'i tshigs gsub par// mdzub mo bkug ste sbyar bar bya// rigs gsum gyi ni spyil yang // mchod yon gyi ni
357a4(rgyud 'bum): phyag rgyar bstan/ / sor mo zung ni gsum po drag/ de bzhin phan tshun yang dag sbyar// mdzub mo'i rtsa gnyis yang dag spang // mthe bong gnyis kyi 'gram du bskum// thal mo 'dra bar
357a5(rgyud 'bum): yang dag ldan/ / me tog phyag rgyar bstan pa yin// lag pa'i thal mo bkan byas nas// mthe'u chung sbyar byas rgyab tu ni// srin lag yang dag sbyar bar bya// de yi rgyab tu gung mo sbyar
357a6(rgyud 'bum): mdzub mo gnyis ri sbyar bar bya/ / sa la thal sbyar bya ba yin// mthe bong gnyis ni 'gram bzhag pa// chos kyi phyag rgyar bstan pa yin// thal mo gzhan gyi sbyor ba yis// mdzub
357a7(rgyud 'bum): gnyis cung zad bkug pa ni/ / gtor ma'i spyi yi phyag rgya ru// 'jig rten skyob pas de gsungs so// ji ltar cho ga bzhin du ni// nang du me tog gzhug byas na// gtor ma kun gyi las
357b1(rgyud 'bum): la ni/ / gsang sngags kun la byin par 'gyur// g.yas pa mi 'jigs sbyin pa'i lag/ g.yod pa'ang de bzhin bya ba yid// mkhrig mar sbyor ba'i bya ba yis// g.yas g.yon dag ni
357b2(rgyud 'bum): bsnol bar bya/ / 'di ni sngags rnams mA lus pa'i// dri yi phyag rgyar brjod pa yin// lag g.yas khu tshur bcings nas ni// mthe bong dang ni gung mo gnyis// de nas rab tu sbyar
357b3(rgyud 'bum): bar bya/ / mar me'i phyag rgyar brjod pa yin// srin lag dang ni mthe be nyid// bgrang 'phreng dag tu yang dag gnas// rtag tu mthe'u chung rnam par brkyang // de 'og gung
357b4(rgyud 'bum): mo'ang brkyang bar bya/ / mdzub mo bskums te bzhag pa la// bgrang 'phrang gi ni phyag rgyar brjod// de nas thal sbar nang du ni// sngags rig pas ni 'phrang ba gzhug/ ci 'dod
357b5(rgyud 'bum): sngags ni bzlas byas na/ / myur du grub pa'i mchog rab sbyar// cho ga 'di ni rtag mthong na// sngags rnams kun ni spyod par byed// me la lag pa g.yas pa ri// mi 'jigs sbyin
357b6(rgyud 'bum): ba'i phyag rgyar bya/ / me la sngon du bltas bzhag nas// mdzub mo rtag tu dgug par bya// mthe bong lag pa'i dbus su ni// bkug nas yang dag rab tu dgod// me ni yongs su spyan
357b7(rgyud 'bum): drang ba'i/ / phyag rgyar 'di ni bstan pa yin// mdzub mo yi ni rtse mo dang // mthe bong gcig tu sbyar bya bar// me dang las rnams kun la ni// gshegs su gsol bar rab tu snang //
358a1(rgyud 'bum): sngags rnams kun la mkhas pa yis// sbyir sreg las la bya ba yin// phyag rgya 'di dag ldan pa yis// sngags ni me la legs par sbyar// phyag 'tshal
358a2(rgyud 'bum): thal mo byas pa las/ / sor mo kun nas nang du gzhug/ de nyid rnam par bzlog byas nas// mthe bong gnyis kyang gshibs par bya// mdzub mo phyi rol yang dag bkug
358a3(rgyud 'bum): gung mo dag la yang dag brten/ / phyag rgya 'di ni mchog tu gsungs// mchod pa'i las la sbyar bar bya// sngags rnams kun la phyag 'tshal dang // sngags kyi mgon po rgyal sras
358a4(rgyud 'bum): sbyar/ sngags rnams kun la sbyang ba dang // gdan dag la yang rab tu sbyar// me tog med par gyur na yang // phyag rgya bcings la mchod par bya// cho ga 'di yis mchod na
358a5(rgyud 'bum): ro/ / sngags rnams don kun grub par byed// mchod yon phyag rgya byas pas ni// mchod pa bzang po byas par 'gyur// gnyis pa sems kyi mchod pa ste// me tog ci 'dra
358a6(rgyud 'bum): yod pas so/ / rdzogs sangs rkang gnyis dam pa yis/ mchod pa'i cho ga 'di gsungs so// me tog med par gyur na yang // mchod pa rnam pa gnyis su brjod// sngags
358a7(rgyud 'bum): rnams rab tu grub bya'i phyir/ / las rnams kun la sbyar bar bya// sngags kun byed pa'i phyag rgya ri// sangs rgyas kun gyis gsungs pa'ang yid// gnas dang mal dang
358b1(rgyud 'bum): bzhon pa dang / / khrus dang btung dang bza' ba dang // mar me smos dang sngags khrus dang // dkyil 'khor dag ni byed pa la// sngags rnams kun gyi dam tshig dang // sngags pa
358b2(rgyud 'bum): rnams kyi byin rlabs byed/ / 'jig rten mgon gyis gsungs pa yin// phyag rgya 'di ni las kun byed// phyag rgya rnams kyis nges byung ba// yongs rdzogs rgyar ni gsungs pa yin//
358b3(rgyud 'bum): de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba// phyag rgya dag ni brgyad po ste// lag gnyis de bzhin sbyar nas ri// gnyis ka kun nas mnyam byas la// de dag nyid las mdzub mo dang // gung mo
358b4(rgyud 'bum): gnyis ni sbyar bar bya/ / mthe bong gnyis kyi ser po ni// gsum pa'i tshigs char sbyar bar bya// cung zad nang du bkug nas ni// rab tu sbyar ba dag tu bya// bdag nyid chen po 'khor
358b5(rgyud 'bum): lo can/ / sngags kyi bdag po'i phyag rgya yin// 'di nyid las ni mdzub mo dgug/ gung mo dag ni mnyam par sbyar// srin lag gnyis kyi sen mo ni// sbyar ba'i rnam par dgod par
358b6(rgyud 'bum): bya/ / 'di ni gtsug tor phyag rgyar ni// rgyal ba'i dbang pos gsungs pa yin// lag gnyis de bzhin bkod nas ni// gung mo'i sor mo bcing byas pa// mthe'u chung sor
358b7(rgyud 'bum): dang yang dag ldan/ / gdugs dkar po las rgya 'di byung // gung mo mnyam par byas nas ni// sen mo gnyis ni yang dag sbyar// gdub kor zlum po 'dra ba ni// phyag rgya
359a1(rgyud 'bum): chen po de la brjod/ / de nyid las ni mdzub mo yi// tshogs ni ska ba kha lta bur bya// de nas gung mo sbyar te dgod// lag pa'i 'og gi kha sbyar nas//
359a2(rgyud 'bum): las gsum pa'i tshogs dag tu// mthe bo'i sen mos mnan par bya// 'jam pa'i dbyangs ni blo ldan gyi// 'di ni phyag rgya mchog tu gsungs// lag gnyis de bzhin bkod nas ni// cho ga
359a3(rgyud 'bum): mthong la yang dag gnas/ / sor mo de nyid kun gyis ni// kun nas gang ba'i mdzod ltar gnas// lag pa gnyis ni rnam bskyed nas// lag sor brgyad ni rab tu brkyang // skyes bu brgyad
359a4(rgyud 'bum): po de nyid shes/ / zung bzhi dag tu gyur pa ni// rdzogs sangs rkang gnyis dam pa yis// de nyid dge 'dun zhes kyang gsungs// de nyid 'phags pa'i dge 'dun rgyar// srid pa'i
359a5(rgyud 'bum): gnas 'dir gsungs pa yin/ / phyag rgya 'di ni rab mchog ste// phyag rgya ma lus rab tu sgrub// lag gnyis de bzhin kha sbyar te// thal mo sbyar ba'i rnam par gnas// mdzub mo gcig
359a6(rgyud 'bum): ni rab brkyang ba/ / lag pa g.yas pa yang dag brkyang // de 'di 'byung po zhi byed par// de nyid gzigs pa rnams kyis bstan// phyag rgya 'di ni mchog ces bya// las rnams kun
359a7(rgyud 'bum): gyi don sgrub byed/ / lag gnyis de bzhin sbyar nas ni// sor rtse rim bzhin mtshan ma yi// bsdus nas kha sbyar dag tu bya// mthe bong gnyis ni bsgrengs nas bskum// de 'di pad+ma'i
359b1(rgyud 'bum): 'phreng ba zhes/ / dang po'i sangs rgyas dag gis gsungs// lag pa dag ni de gnyis kyi// sor mo kun nas bkan la brkyang // sor mo gsum gnyis bslangs nas ni// me tog
359b2(rgyud 'bum): kha bye'i rnam par bya/ / gnyis pa'i tshogs la bzhag pa ni// mthe bong dang ni mdzub mo gnyis// de 'dir srid pa gsum gnas kyi// phyag rgyar rdzogs sangs rgyas kyis gsungs//
359b3(rgyud 'bum): phyag rgya 'di ni phyag rgya che// las kun byed pa'i phyag rgya brgyad// mthu panyam brtson 'grus chen por ni// rdzogs sangs rgyas kyis yang dag gsungs// muSh+Ti gtams phrag bye ba
359b4(rgyud 'bum): stong phrag brgyad cu yang dag 'byung / / thub mchog grangs med 'das pa yis// phyag rgya 'di dag rab tu gsungs// phyag rgya cho ga yang dag 'byung // rtsa brgyad brgya ni rab tu
359b5(rgyud 'bum): gsungs/ / 'di dag kun gyi sngags kun dang // las rnams dag kyang grub pa yin// sangs rgyas rdzu 'phrul che kun gyis// phyag rgya 'di ni bzhed cing gsungs// cho ga 'di dag sbyar
359b6(rgyud 'bum): ba yis/ / dor rnams myur du sgrub par byed// shAkya seng ga mi yi mchog/ thub pa mchog gis de gsungs nas// byang chub sems dpa' rdzu 'phrul che// 'jam pa'i dbyangs la
359b7(rgyud 'bum): de bzhin gsungs/ / 'jam dpal gyi ni cho ga 'di// phyagab rgya dag ni yang dag byung // sa steng bstan pa srung don du// phyag rgya 'di ni rab tu gtad// dus mtha' nye bar 'ong 'gyur
360a1(rgyud 'bum): zhing / / dus mthar mya ngan 'das pa na// nga yi bstar pa srung don du// dA lis 'di dag thams cad bshad// sngags rnams dag ni rgya cher bcas// phyag
360a2(rgyud 'bum): rgya rnams kyi mtshan nyid bshad/ / 'jig rten kun la gsang ba dang // shin tu gsang ba'ang brjod pa yin// mdo 'dir tshe ga lhag pa ste// yon tan rgya chen gsal bar byas//
360a3(rgyud 'bum): sngags rnams du ma'i tshig dang ni// yon tar brjod pa yang dag 'byung // phyag rgya rnam pa mang por ldan// rig pa'i rgyud ri rab tu bstar// mthu dang yon tan grub mtha' dang // zlos
360a4(rgyud 'bum): pa'i rgyu ni yang dag 'byung / / 'gro ba'i skye gnas sems can gyi// dge ba'i 'bras bu 'byung ba'ang gsungs// gzhon nu khyod kyi sngags rnams kyi// grub pa'i gtan tshigs rab tu
360a5(rgyud 'bum): sbyar/ / de skad gsungs nas 'jam dpal ni// gzhor nu nam mkhar gnas pa yis// 'jig rten mgon po 'od byed pa// rdzogs sangs rgyas la mgos phyag 'tshal// dbugs
360a6(rgyud 'bum): raring phyung nas snying rjes brlar/ / mchi ma de nas phyis nas kyang // sangs rgyas zhabs drung gnas nas kyang // de la myur du zhus pa ni// bcom ldan 'jig rten 'das pa na//
360a7(rgyud 'bum): sngags kyi mdzod 'dis steng du// bdag nyid chen po'i sems can la// nga tsha ji ltar 'byung bar 'gyur// de skad gsungs nas sangs rgyas kyis// de tshe 'jam pa'i dbyangs la
360b1(rgyud 'bum): gsungs/ / gzhon nu khyod kyis yongs zhus pa// bu khyod 'jam dpal rab tu nyon// da ni 'jig rten mya ngan 'das// sa stengs stongs par gyur pa dang // chos kyi
360b2(rgyud 'bum): mdzod kyang 'jig pa dang / / nyan thos rnams kyang 'das pa na// rkang gnyis dam pa ston pa yi// gzugs brnyan mchod rten dag kyang bya// spos dang dri dang byug pa
360b3(rgyud 'bum): yis/ / mchod dang bsnyen bkur bya ba dang // rnam pa sna tshogs gos mchog dang // gzhan yang nor bu'i gdub kor rgyan// rnam pa sna tshogs bza' dang bcas// yang
360b4(rgyud 'bum): dag sbyar ba dbul bar bya/ / rnam pa sna tshogs phun sum tshogs// ci 'dod kha zas byas pa la// de bzhin sngags ni bzlas byas dbul// sems can dag pa'i skye
360b5(rgyud 'bum): gnas 'gyur/ / dam pa'i 'gro ba'i skye gnas su// grong mchog dag tu skye bar 'gyur// mthar ni byang chub gzhol 'gyur zhing // phyi nas zhi bar de dag 'gro// de skad
360b6(rgyud 'bum): gsungs nas 'jam dpal ri/ / sangs rgyas kyis ni gsungs la dga'// byang chub sems dpa' rdzu 'phrul che// blo ldan de nas cad mi smra// chos kyi 'khor lo skor byed
360b7(rgyud 'bum): pa'i/ / sangs rgyas 'dus par sangs rgyas kyi// gsang ba'i gnas kyi steng gnas nas// 'di dag sangs rgyas snga mas gsungs// de tshe chos kyi 'khor lo skor// yun
361a1(rgyud 'bum): rings dus su 'das pa yin/ / 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi rtsa ba'i cho ga byang chub sems dpa'i sde sdod phal po che theg pa chen po shin tu rgyas pa'i mdo las/ phyag rgya'i
361a2(rgyud 'bum): tshecho ga'i le'u rab 'byams las nyi shu rtsa dgu pa rdzogs so/ / / de nas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas gzhan yang gnas gtsang ma'i gzhal med khang la gzigs nas
361a3(rgyud 'bum): 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal mchog tu rab tu gsang ba khyod kyi phyag rgya dang ldan pa'i phyag rgya'i mtshan nyid 'khor dang bcas pa yod de/ las thams
361a4(rgyud 'bum): cad la nye bar sbyor ba/ / phun sum tshogs pa thams cad sbyin par byed pa/ 'bras bu dang bcas pa// sngags thams cad kyi rjes su 'gro ba/ las thams cad sgrub pa// mdor
361a5(rgyud 'bum): nAn 'jam dpal nyon cig/ dang po re zhig thal mo rab tu brkyang la mdzub mo dang mthe'u chung gnyis rtse sprad de tshigs bar ma btud nas so sor rjes su bcug pa yin te/ de la 'di
361a6(rgyud 'bum): ni 'jam dpal khyod kyi rtsa ba'i phyag rgya zhes bya ba las thams cad byed par 'gyur ba'o/ / lag pa gnyis de bzhin du byas la srin lag gnyis sbyar la/ de bzhin du gung mo dang
361a7(rgyud 'bum): mdzub mo'ang bya zhing / mthe'u chung gnyis kyi ri mo gong ma la mthe bo'i rtse mo bzhag pa ste/ 'jam dpal 'di ni khyod kyi gdong gi phyag rgya zhes bya ba ste gnyis pa'o// phan
361b1(rgyud 'bum): tshun du sor mo bsnol ba khu tshur du byas la gung mo'i sor mo gnyis rnam par bkrol ba rtse mo sbyar te/ de'i 'gram pa gnyis su mdzub mo gnyis dkri zhing mthar gzhag par bya'o// de la 'di ni
361b2(rgyud 'bum): 'jam dpal khyod kyi mche ba'i phyag rgya zhes bya ba gzhan yin ro/ / mche ba'i phyag rgya'i 'gram du mthe bong gnyis bzhag pa'i phyag rgya 'di ni mngon sum du 'jam dpal gzhon nu khyod nyid yin
361b3(rgyud 'bum): no/ / gnas de dang lag pa'i kha sbyar der nye bar bzhugs shing dam tshig gis byin gyis rlob par byed do// lag pa'i sor mo phan tshun du khu tshur byas la mdzub mo gnyis bkrol te
361b4(rgyud 'bum): mthe bong gnyis gung mo'i nang du chud par byas pa 'di ni 'jam dpal khyed kyi gtsug pud kyi phyag rgya zhes bya ste gzhan yin no/ / thal mi'i tshogs rnams brkyang ba byas la sbyin lag dang
361b5(rgyud 'bum): mdzub mo gnyis kyi rtse mo gung mo'i nang du rtse sprad de bzhag pa 'di ni 'jam dpal mngon sum khyod nyid kyi rtsa ba'i sngags su bstan pa yin no/ / 'di nyid kyi phyag rgya la mdzub mo gnyis brkyang
361b6(rgyud 'bum): bar byas pa ste/ de la 'di ni 'jam dpal khyod kyi phyag rgyar 'gyur ro// mthe'u chung dang srin lag gnyis bsnol ba byas nas lag pa kha sbyar gyi nang du bzhag la// gung mo'i
361b7(rgyud 'bum): phyi rol du mdzub mo rtse mo yongs su bkug la mthe bong gnyis kyi rtse mi yang dag par bcar ro/ / gzhan 'di'ang 'jam dpal khyod kyi zhal gyi phyag rgya yin no// las thams cad pa'ang
362a1(rgyud 'bum): yin te/ 'di nyid kyi rim gyis sor mo re re bkrol ba mthe bong dang bcas pa byas na ma rungs pa'i gdon thams cad rab tu 'byer bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin du
362a2(rgyud 'bum): rna ba dang / mgrin pa dang / lag ngar dang / snying dang / lag pa dang / lkog ma dang / rked pa dang / lte ba dang / baR+Ya dang / byin pa dang / rkang pa dang / mig dang /
362a3(rgyud 'bum): kha dang / lce rnams te/ de ltar sor mo bcu rnams mthar gyis brkyang na rim bzhin du phyag rgya'i mtshan nyid du 'gyur te/ mthar gyis kyang las byed do// zhal gyi phyag rgyas ni kha
362a4(rgyud 'bum): 'ching bar byed do/ / mche ba'i phyag rgyas ni gdon ma rungs pa las grol lo// lce'i phyag rgyas ni tshig ngan pa zlog par byed do// snying gi phyag rgyas ni mi'i bdag po'i khro ba sel bar
362a5(rgyud 'bum): byed pa'am/ sems can gzhan lha dang / lha ma yin dang / mi dang / mi ma yin pa dang / 'gro ba rnam pa sna tshogs la brtan pa'i khros pa rnams kyi khro ba 'jig par 'gyur te/
362a6(rgyud 'bum): de bzhin du mthar gyis thams cad du las thams cad byed par 'gyur ro// de ltar rim pa 'dis phyag rgya grangs med par 'gyur te/ las grangs med pa dag kyang byed par 'gyur ro//
362a7(rgyud 'bum): 'jam dpal khyod kyis rnam pa thams cad du phyag rgya thams cad kho na las thams cad byed par 'gyur ro// dpa' bo chen po de bzhin gshegs pa grangs las 'das pa dag gis phyag rgya
362b1(rgyud 'bum): 'di dag bcings so/ / phyag rgya chen po dpa' bo chen po sa cher po la gnas pas kyang bcings so// gang du gtams pa phrag bye ba sum cu rtsa gsum mam/ brgyad cu 'am/ dgu/
362b2(rgyud 'bum): bcu rtsa lnga 'am/ khri phrag drug cu'i grangs la sogs pa 'jig rten las 'das pa'i yang 'das pas phyag rgya bcings so// 'jig rten bya ba gang gzhan ni// kun kyang phyag rgya rnams
362b3(rgyud 'bum): su 'dus/ / 'di dag gang yang rung ba yin// phyag rgyas don kun sgrub pa'o// dkyil 'khor sgrub pa'i dus dag tu// lag pa gnyis kyis bcing bar bya// sngon du bsnyen pa la
362b4(rgyud 'bum): brtson pas/ / sbyin sreg bzlas pa dag la'ang bya// 'dug pa'am 'greng ba dag gis kyang // zlos pas ci 'dod bar du bzla// bsrung ba chen po'i tsho gas kyang // myur du grub
362b5(rgyud 'bum): pa thob par 'gyur/ / dus kun phyag rgya kun gyis ni// las rnams kun ni bya ba yin// 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi rtsa ba'i cho ga byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod phal po tsha thag pa
362b6(rgyud 'bum): chen po shin tu rgyas pa'i mdo las/ / phyag rgya'i cho ga'i le'u rab 'byams gnyis pa las sum cu pa rdzogs so// // de nas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas gzhang
362b7(rgyud 'bum): yang gnas gtsang ma'i gzhal med khang la gzigs nas/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal khyod kyi rtsa ba'i cho ga la phyag rgya mchog tu shin tu
363a1(rgyud 'bum): gsang ba gzhan yang yod de/ phyag rgya dang rgyud thams cad kyi cho ga/ sngags thams cad kyi mngon par 'dod pa/ sngags thams cad dang lhan cig yang dag par
363a2(rgyud 'bum): sbyar na las thams cad rab tu sgrub par byed pa/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi lam rnam par sbyong bar byed pa/ sems can thams cad kyi lam du 'jug pa yin no// mdzub
363a3(rgyud 'bum): mo gnyis kyi rtse mo dang gung mo gnyis kyi rtse mo dag yongs su sbyar ba ni gtsug tor 'phags pa zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya yin te/ 'dir sngag sa ni/ oM dz+wa la dzA dr-I stod ga toSh+NI ShA dU ra dU ra hUM haM/
363a4(rgyud 'bum): srin lag de nyid bkug pa dang / gung mo sbyar ba de nyid kyi ser mo'i rtse mo'i sen mo gshibs la rna cha gdub kor zlum po ltar bya ba ni gtsug tor gdugs dkar po'i phyag rgya yin te/ 'dir yang
363a5(rgyud 'bum): sngags su 'gyur ba ni/ oM mA mu mA mA hUM ni/ mdzub mo de nyid phan tshun mnyam par sbyar la gung mo gnyis sbyar ba ni gzi brjid phung po'i phyag rgya'o// 'dir sngags ni/ oM ta thA ga
363a6(rgyud 'bum): toSh+NI ShA a ba lo ka ti/ mUrti te dze rA shi hUM dz+wa la dz+wa la/ d+ha ka d+ha ka/ da ra bi dA ra/ tshin+na tshin+d+ra hUM hUM phaT phaT swA hA/ mdzub mo de nyid yang dag par sbyar ba dkyil 'khor lta bur bya
363a7(rgyud 'bum): ba ni rgyal ba'i gtsug tor gyi phyag rgya'o/ / 'dir sngags su 'gyur ba ni oM dza la dza maSh+TI wa~M dz+wa la~M dz+wa la/ bin d+ha banaH/ dab ngam/ hUM nA d+hU hoHna hUM/ rgyal ba'i gtsug
363b1(rgyud 'bum): tor gyi sngags so/ / mdzub mo de gnyis kyi rtse bo btud pa byas pa gung mo sbyar ba la mdzub mo'i sen mo gung mo'i tshigs gsum pa'i cher sbyar ba ni 'khor lo sgyur ba'i phyag rgya'o// oM
363b2(rgyud 'bum): na mo a pra ti ha tA ta thA ga toSh+NI Sha ya/ a nA ba lo ke te mUr+t+ta na tsakra brti hUM dzA la dzA la/ d+ha ka d+ha ka/ d+hu ra d+hu na/ bi d+hu na trA sa ya mA ra yod sA d+hA ya/ ho na ha na/ AM AM a/
363b3(rgyud 'bum): ka ka/ dro khi nI dro khaM ni kuN+Da li ni/ a pa rA dzi tA tra pa ri Ni hUM phaT/ 'khor los sgyur ba'i sngags so// mdzub mo de nyid kyi rtse mo mdud pa byas la gung mo sbyar ba byas pa la
363b4(rgyud 'bum): mdzub mo sen mo'i 'og gi gsum pa'i cha la sbyar ba ni sngags kyi bdag po 'khol los sgyur ba'i phyag rgya'o/ / mdzub mo de nyid kyi rtse mo yang dag par bkug pa gung mor sbyor ba'i 'og tu
363b5(rgyud 'bum): yang dag par bcar ba ni sngags kyi bdag po'i phyag rgya'o/ / mdzub mo de nyid kyi rtse mo yang dag par bkug la gung mor sbyar ba'i sen mo dang tshigs nang du yang dag par sbyar ba ni 'khor los
363b6(rgyud 'bum): sgyur ba chen po'i phyag rgya'o/ / mdzub mo de nyid kyi rtse mo gnyis yang dag par bkug la gung mo sbyar zhing 'og tu yang dag par sbyar te gdub kor ltar byas pa ni 'khor los sgyur ba chen po'i phyag
363b7(rgyud 'bum): rgya'o/ / mdzub mo de nyid kyi rtse mo yang dag par bkug la gung mo tshigs gsum pa'i nang du yang dag par sbyar ba ni sngags kyi bdag po 'khor los sgyur ba chen po'i phyag rgya ste/ srid
364a1(rgyud 'bum): pa'i las thams cad rnam par 'jig par byed pa/ sems can thams cad kyi nye bar 'tshe ba/ tshe dang / nad med pa dang / dbang phyug dang / bsam
364a2(rgyud 'bum): pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed pa/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed pa/ sems can thams cad yongs su dga' bar byed pa/ sems
364a3(rgyud 'bum): can thams cad kyi yid la mngon par 'dod pa 'bras bu dang bcas par byed pa/ las thams cad byed pa/ sngags thams cad rab tu sgrub par byed pa/ phyag rgya dang sngags thams
364a4(rgyud 'bum): cad dang ldan pa yin te/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa khyod de nyon cig/ dang po re zhig gtsug tor gyi mtshan nyid du gyur pa ni lag pa gnyis mnyam por bkan zhing brkyang bar bya'o//
364a5(rgyud 'bum): mthe bong drang srin lag gnyis lag pa'i dkyil du sen mos gzu zhing mthe bo'i rtse mos sbyar bar bya'o// mthe'u chung gnyis kyi rtse mo gtugs cing sbyar bar bya'o// de bzhin du gung mo
364a6(rgyud 'bum): gnyis kyi ser mo dang rtse mo gnyis sbar bar bya zhing / mdzub mo dang mdzub mo'ang sbar bar bya'o// kun tu snang ba'i gtsug tor gyi mtshan nyid chen po zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya yin te
364a7(rgyud 'bum): 'dir sngags ni/ a mu haM/ mdzub mo de nyid yang dag par bkug ste/ sen mo dang sen mo'i rtse mo dkyil 'khor ltar sbyar ba ni lta ba ngan pa'i zug rngu'i phyin ci log sel ba zhes bya
364b1(rgyud 'bum): ba chos kyi 'khor lo chen po'i phyag rgya'o/ / 'dir sngags su 'gyur ba ni/ oM badz+ra sha ni hUM phaT/ 'di ni skyil krung gi phyag rgya ste/ sngags dang yang dag par ldan na las thams cad byed pa/
364b2(rgyud 'bum): ji ltar ston ka'i sprin bzhin du bgegs thams cad 'jig par byed pa/ grang yang bdud bzhis byas pa dang / gang yang lha dang lha ma yir rnams kyi bgegs rnams ni skyil krung gi phyag
364b3(rgyud 'bum): rgya dam pa mthong ba tsam gyis 'jig par 'gyur ro/ / 'og ma gnyis kyang rtse mo mnyam par gshibs na khu tshur gyi phyag rgyar 'gyur ro// sngags kyang 'di dag gang yang rung ba dang /
364b4(rgyud 'bum): phyag rgya lag pa gnyis kyis bcings te sgrub pa'i dus sam/ sngon du bsnyen pa'i dus su 'dug pa 'am/ langs te lan cig gam/ ji srid 'dod kyi bar du bzlas pa bya'o// de
364b5(rgyud 'bum): ltar byas na bgegs dang log 'dren thams cad kyis glags rnyed par mi 'gyur zhing grub pa'ang mngon du 'gyur ro/ / mdzub mo de nyid kyi rtse mo gnyis sbyar la kun nas zlum por bya zhing /
364b6(rgyud 'bum): gung mo gnyis sbyar te gung mo'i tshigs gsum pa'i 'og tu sbyar ba ri gzhan gyis ma thub pa gtsug tor 'khor los sgyur ba'i snying po'i phyag rgya'o// 'dir snying po ni/ oM a pa rA dzi ta d+hi ka/
364b7(rgyud 'bum): gtsug tor gyi rtsa ba'i phyag rgya de nyid la gzhan gang yang rung ba dang lhar cig pa'i spyod pas bkod nas las thams cad byed par 'gyur ro// de las mthe bo'i rtse mo bteg la srin lag gi rtse mor gtug nas yang dang
365a1(rgyud 'bum): yAng bteg pa ni bod pa'i phyag rgya'o/ / 'dir sngags ni/ na mo b+ha gra ba te a pra ti ha toSh+NI ShA ya/ e h+ye hi b+ha gA dAn d+harmA rA dzA pra tIts+tshe da/ ar+g+haM/ gan+d+haM/
365a2(rgyud 'bum): puSh+paM/ d+hU paM/ ba l-i/ 'dri baM/ mAM tsA bI rAk+Sha/ ba la ba rA kra ma la swAhA/ me tog dkar pos sbyin drang bar bya'o// rang gi gzugs kyis mchod yon dang zhabs
365a3(rgyud 'bum): bsil dbul bar bya'o/ / gdan dang bzhugs su gsol ba'ang bya'o// de la 'di nyid kyi phyag rgya dang sngags kyis phyogs dang / phyogs mtshams dang / steng 'og bcing
365a4(rgyud 'bum): bar bya'o/ / de nyid kyi srin lag dang mthe bo'i rtse mo gtugs cing smad pa byas la/ tshigs bar ma la mthe bos gtugs cing yang dang yang bteg par byas nas mchod yon phul nas rang gi
365a5(rgyud 'bum): lha gshegs su gsol bar 'gyur ro/ / phyag rgya g.yon phyogs su bskor nas phyogs bcings pa las grol bar 'gyur ro// 'dir sngags ni/ na mo a pra ti ha toSh+NI Sh+Ta ya/ gats+tsha gats+tsha b+ha
365a6(rgyud 'bum): ga bA d+har+m+ma rA dza pra tIts+tsha da ar+g+haM/ gan+d+ha puSh+TaM/ d+hU pa maM tsa a b+ha rAk+Sha/ a pra ti hata ba la pa ra kra ma ya/ phyag rgya dang sngags gshegs su gsol ba ni mchod yon gyis so//
365a7(rgyud 'bum): mdzub mo de nyid gung mo'i tshigs gsum pa'i 'og tu bzhag ste/ gung mo yang dag par sbyar la mthe bong che gnyis dang mthe'u chung gnyis phan tshun mnan cing khu tshur du bya'o// 'dir
365b1(rgyud 'bum): sngags ni/ na mo b+ha ga ba ti a pra tri ha toSh+NI ShA ya/ oM dra ban+d+ha hUM phaT/ a pra ti ha toSh+NI ShA ya bi ka ri Ni/ d+hu na d+hu na d+hu/ rnam par 'jig par byed pa bcom ldan 'das rig pa'i
365b2(rgyud 'bum): rgyal po'i gtsug tor gyis sngags bgegs dang log 'dren thams cad kyis zin pa dag dang / dbang bskur ba dang / bdag bsrung ba dang / phyogs bcing ba dang / dkyil 'khor
365b3(rgyud 'bum): bcing ba la sogs te las thams cad la rab tu sbyar ro/ / mdzub mo de gnyis kyi rtse mo bkug cing yang dang yang brkyang ba ni me lha spyan drang ba'o// de nas sbyin sreg gi las bya ste/ 'di nyid kyis
365b4(rgyud 'bum): slar gshegs su gsol ba ni bzlog pa'o/ / mdzub mo gnyis kyang 'brar ba'i 'phreng bar bsam mo// gtsug tor gyi phyag rgya 'di ni las thams cad la thogs pa med pa'o// 'dir sngags
365b5(rgyud 'bum): ni/ na mo b+ha ga ba ti/ a pra ti ha toSh+NI ShA ya/ e h+ye hi ti tse mA li ni ag+na ye swA hA/ mdzub mo de nyid kyi rtse mo gnyis cung zad bkug par bya zhing / gung mo sbyar la gung mo'i tshigs
365b6(rgyud 'bum): gsum pa'i nang du sbyar bar bya'o/ / gtsug tor gyi stobs shin tu drag pa'i phyag rgya yin no// 'dir sngags ni/ na me b+ha ga ba ti/ a pra ti ha toSh+NI ShA ya/ i maM/ gan+d+ha
365b7(rgyud 'bum): d+hU paM/ puSh+pa ba l-i dI tsa pra tits+tsha ha ra sar+b+ba bud+d+ha aSh+NI ta/ d+har+m+ma rA dza a pra ti ha ta ya swA hA/ dri la sogs pa'i sngags so// srin lag gnyis bzlog ste tshigs gsum pa la mtha
366a1(rgyud 'bum): bong gnyis yang dag par sbyar zhing / mdzub mo gnyis kyang sbyar ba ni gzi brjid gtsug tor gyi phyag rgya ste/ log 'dren thams cad kyis 'joms par mi nus so//
366a2(rgyud 'bum): phyag rgya 'dis ni bsrung ba dang / bzlas pa'i dus dang / bsgrub pa'i dus dang / dkyil 'khor dang / las thams cad la'ang bya ba yin no// 'di sngags ni/ na mo b+ha ga pa ti//
366a3(rgyud 'bum): a pra ti ha toSh+NI Sha ya/ sarba big+h+nAn bi d+h+waM sA na ka rA ya kro d+ha swA hA/ srin lag gnyis kyi rtsa bar mthe bong gnyis gtugs te/ de bzhin du gdub kor ltar bya zhing mdzub mo gnyis
366a4(rgyud 'bum): kyi nang stong pa'i rnam par bya'o/ / 'di ni thams cad du thogs pa med cing gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i gtsug tor gyi phyag rgya yin no// 'dir sngags ni/ na mo b+ha ga ba te/ a pra
366a5(rgyud 'bum): tiha teSh+NI ShA ya/ sarba tA a pa rA dzi tA ya/ sha mA ya sha ma ya/ shAn+te dan+te/ d+har+m+ma rA dza bi shwa te ma hA bi d+ye sar+b+bAr+d+ha si d+ha na sAhA/ mar gyi skyon sreg la sogs pas zhi ba dang rgyas
366a6(rgyud 'bum): pa la sogs pa'i las bya'o/ / srin lag gnyis kyis bya dub kor ltar bya zhing mdzub mo'o rtse mo gnyis bkug pa ni thogs pa med pa'i bde byed kyi gtsug tor gyi phyag rgya'o// 'dir
366a7(rgyud 'bum): sngags ni/ na mo b+ha ga ba te a pra ti ha toSh+NI ShA ya/ oM shaM ka re swAhA/ las thams cad srung bar byed pa'o// mthe bong gnyis kyi rtse mos srin lag gnyis kyi gsum pa'i tshigs
366b1(rgyud 'bum): mnan la/ de bzhin du mdzub mo gnyis kyi rtse mo'ang rdo rje'i rtse dang 'dra bar bya'o// 'di ni dam tshig thogs pa med pa'i spyi gtsug gi phyag rgya ste/ dam tshig thams cad kyi thun mong ngo //
366b2(rgyud 'bum): 'dir sngags ni/ na mo b+ha ga ba ti/ a pra ti ha toSh+NI ShA ya/ oM shaM ka re sa ma yaM swA hA/ mthe bong gnyis kyi rtse mos srin lag gnyis kyi bar ma'i tshigs la bcar la/ gung
366b3(rgyud 'bum): mo gnyis kyi rtse mo dgug par bya zhing gung mo gnyis kyi rtse mo dang tshig bar ma sbyar ba ni dam chog thogs pa med pa gtsug tor gyi phyag rgya yir te/ lha dang lha ma yin la sbyar na dam tshig la
366b4(rgyud 'bum): 'jog par byed do/ / 'dir sngags ni/ na mo b+ha ga ba te a pra ti ha toSh+NI ShA ya/ oM shaM ka re ma hA sa ma yaM swA hA/ 'dis dkyil 'khor bcing ba byas nas bzla sa na 'khor los
366b5(rgyud 'bum): sbyar ba'ang dam tshig la gnas par 'gyur zhing / / 'khor los sgyur ba gzhan yang ril gyis gnod par 'gyur ro// gnas de nyid du bzlas pa byas na rig pa'i mthu stobs kyis 'jig rte
366b6(rgyud 'bum): dang 'jig rten las 'das pa thams cad kyi sngags rnams kyis phar tshun gnod par byed par nus pa ma yin no/ / bzlas pa ni gnas gcig tu rnam pa thams cad du bya'o//
366b7(rgyud 'bum): la sogs pa gtsug tor gyi rgyal po grangs med pa yod de/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs la rgya cher bya'o// 'jam dpal cho ga'i rgyal po 'di la ni sngags tshad med pa
367a1(rgyud 'bum): yod de/ phyag d+hA'ang rnam pa sna tshogs nying ngo // ngas 'di mdod bsdus nas bshad pa yin no// ngas gal te rgya cher ba shad na mi mi dang mi ma yin pa
367a2(rgyud 'bum): thams cad kyi sku bskal pa stong gi tshad du'ang 'dzin pa 'am 'chang bar nus pa ma yin no/ / 'jam dpal de lta bas na mdor bsdus nas bshad par bya yis/ mdor na yid la nye bar
367a3(rgyud 'bum): gzung bar gyis shig/ dang po thub pa'i phyag rgya mchog/ 'dir ni rab tu gsungs pa yin// b+hU yi lA ni de nas kyang // 'khor los sgyur ba'i phyag rgya dang // byang chub
367a4(rgyud 'bum): sems dpa' blo ldan ni/ / spyan ras gzigs ni zla ba dang // de ras phyug na rdo rje'i rgya// gnod sbyin dbang po'i bstan pa yin// de nas gan yang phyag rgyar// dpa' med
367a5(rgyud 'bum): chen po'i gzi brjid ldan/ / phonya ponya mo tshogs kun// bran pho bran mo de bzhir gzhan// de bzhin gnod sbyin gnod sbyin mo// klu dang klu mo de bzhin gzhan// mngag
367a6(rgyud 'bum): gzhug mngag gzhug mo dag dang / / rdzu 'phrul chen po shra za mo// de bzhin gzhar yang srin mo dang // lha dang lha min bu mo dang // grub dang rig pa 'dzin rnabs dang // mi
367a7(rgyud 'bum): rnams ma lus pa ngag dang / / skye bo thams cad dag gis ni// so so so sor phyag rgya bstan// sngag kyang rnam pa sna tshog dang // las dang ting 'dzin sna tshogs dang // glang po nor bu'i rigs dag dang // de
367b1(rgyud 'bum): dag so so'i phyag rgya dang / / dgra bcom dang ni rang rgyal dang // legs byung phyag rgya de nyid dang // sna bcu la ri rab gnas pa'i// byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi// phyag rgya
367b2(rgyud 'bum): snying po sngags dag gi/ gcig pa nyid du yongs su bsgrags// lha dang gnod sbyin rigs dang ni// drang srong dri zas mchod pa dang // phyag rgya dri zas bstan pa yi// bdun
367b3(rgyud 'bum): pa'i rigs kyis gsungs pa dang / / de bzhin brgyad pa'i phyag rgya ri// gnod sbyir rigs su yongs su bstan// gzhan yang bde gshegs bka' dag gi/ rgyud rnams
367b4(rgyud 'bum): dag ni so so dang / / 'jig rten pa yaM yang 'dir gzung // phyag rgya ldan pa'i sngags dag ni// las rnams la ni gsal bar 'gyur// phyag rgya 'ching la sogs mkhas
367b5(rgyud 'bum): na/ / log 'dren dag gis gnod mi 'gyur// de nas phyag rgya chen po la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid bshad par bya ste/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi snying po'i phyag rgya'i mtshan
367b6(rgyud 'bum): nyid du 'gyur ba ni lag pa gnyis kyi sor mo phan tshun bsdams la mthe bong gnyis bstan par bya'o/ / 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi thugs kyi phyag rgya'o// 'di nyid la
367b7(rgyud 'bum): mthe bong g.yas pa gcig bstan pa ri pad+ma 'dzin pa'i phyag rgyar 'gyur ro/ / lag pa g.yas g.yon snga ma bzhin du khu tshur bcangs te gung mo'i sor mo gnyis rab tu phyung zhing brkyang bar
368a1(rgyud 'bum): byas la gcig tu byas shing rdo rje'i rtse mo 'dra ba 'drin rdo rje 'dzin gyi phyag rgya'o/ / de las gcig bkug pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' spos kyi glang po'i phyag
368a2(rgyud 'bum): rgya'o/ / yang de nyid brkyang nas gung mo gnyis gdub kor ltar byas pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' glang po'i spos kyi phyag rgya'o// lag pa gnyis po thams cad bsdus te khu tshur
368a3(rgyud 'bum): du byas pa 'di ni rin po che'i rigs kyi phyag rgya'o/ / nor bu la spyod pa thams cad dang dzam+b+ha la chu dbang la sogs pa'i sngags dang phyag rgya 'di nyid sbyar bar bya'o// mdzub mo gnyis kyi
368a4(rgyud 'bum): / tshigs gnyis bkug nas sen mo gnyis phan tshun sprad pa 'di ni gnod sbyin gyi ris lngas rtsen la sogs pa'i gnod sbyin rdzu 'phrul chen po'i phyag rgya'o// lag pa gnyis snga ma bzhin du khu
368a5(rgyud 'bum): tshur bcing ba byas la mthe bo'i sen mo gnyis phan tshun sprad cing stang du bzhag la/ gung mo gnyis ka'i rtse mo rdo rje'i rtse mo dang 'dra bar byas pa 'di ni lha thams cad de/ lha'i rigs
368a6(rgyud 'bum): 'og mir la sogs pa'i phyag rgya yin no/ / lag pa gnyis de bzhin du bsdams la khu tshur bcangs nas mthe bong gnyis bstan pa 'di ni rang sangs rgyas rnams dang 'phags pa nyan thos
368a7(rgyud 'bum): kyi phyag rgya'o/ / khu tshur bcang bar byas pa 'di dag ni 'phags pa'i gang zag brgyad kyi phyag rgya'o// rgyal ba'i sras thams cad kyi phyag rgya ni gcig tu brjod par bya ste/ thal mo
368b1(rgyud 'bum): brkyang ba sbyar nas cung zad rtse mo bskum par byas pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpar grags pa'i phyag rgyar bstan pa yin no/ / nor bu rin po che dang / 'khar gsil dang / snam sbyar dang /
368b2(rgyud 'bum): lhung bzed dang / chos gos dang / mche ba dang / mi 'jigs pa'i lag pa ste/ bdun po de dag ni thub pa'i phyag rgya'o// spyan dang / byams pa dang / 'od kyi dra ba dang /
368b3(rgyud 'bum): chos ston pa dang / mdzod spu'i nor bu dang / gnas pa dang / phyag rgya bdun po 'di dag kyang rgyal ba'i sku nyid las skyes pa'o// bdun gnyis kyi tshigs gnyis pa 'di dag
368b4(rgyud 'bum): dang / / phyag rgya lnga ngas bshad pa dang / thub pa'i snying po dang ldan pa nyi shu ni dang po'i rang byung gis kyang bstan pa yin te/ 'khor los sgyur ba nyi shu'i 'khor gyi phyag rgya'ang
368b5(rgyud 'bum): bstan to/ / phyag rgya dang sngags byung ba 'di grangs kyi mthar yang byas pa yin no// thal mo sbyar ba byas nas gdub kor ltar byas pa ni nor bu rin po che'i phyag rgya'o// skyil mo
368b6(rgyud 'bum): krung gi g.yas g.yor brla'i wa'i phyogs su khu tshur rgyal mtshan du 'dzin pa ni 'khar gsil gyi phyag rgyar 'gyur ro/ / lag pa thal mo sbyar la phan tshun du mngor par phyogs pa ni snam
368b7(rgyud 'bum): sbyar gyi phyag rgyar 'gyur ro/ / lag pa thal mo sbyar ba las bzang pa ltar byas pa ni lhung bzed kyi phyag rgya'o// chos gos ni lag po g.yon pas so// thugs kyi phyag rgya
369a1(rgyud 'bum): bzhin du g.yon pa'i mthe bong gteg pa ni mche ba'i phyag rgya'o/ / lug pa g.yas pas mi 'jigs pa spyir ba dang / g.yon pas chos gos la 'dzin pa ni mi
369a2(rgyud 'bum): 'jigs pa'i lag pa'o/ / thal mo sbyar ba las gung mo gnyis rdo rje'i rtse mo ltar byas la de'i rgyab tu mdzub mo gnyis cung zad bkug cing bzhag la mthe bong gnyis nang du bcug pa 'di
369a3(rgyud 'bum): ni sangs rgyas spyan gyi phyag rgyar 'gyur ro/ / 'di nyid kyi gung mo'i tshogs bcug la mdzub mo gnyis gcig tu byas pa 'di ni sangs rgyas byams pa'i phyag rgya'o// thal mo
369a4(rgyud 'bum): sbyar ba yangs par byas la mdzub mo dang srin lag gnyis bkug la rdo rje rtse gsum du byas pa 'di ni mA ma kI'i phyag rgyar 'gyur ro/ / thal mo sbyar bar byas nas mdzub mo gnyis gung
369a5(rgyud 'bum): mo gnyis kyi tshigs gsum pa la bkug nas bzhag la mthe bong gnyis so sor bkyed nas thal mo'i rnam par bya ba 'di ni longs spyod ldan pa zhes bya'i phyag rgya yin no/ / lag pa
369a6(rgyud 'bum): gnyis thal mo sbyar nas mdzub mo gnyis dang gung mo gnyis sbyar ba ni rnam par rgyal ba'i phyag rgya'o/ / g.yas pa'i sor mo gsum rdo rje'i rtse mo ltar byas la rked pa'i phyogs su
369a7(rgyud 'bum): brten pa 'di ni gnas pa'i phyag rgya'o/ / de ltar bdag nyid kyi mgo bor rig pa'i rgyal po'i phyag rgya dang phyag rgya chen po brgyad bcings la/ las thams cad bya zhing dam tshig gzung
369b1(rgyud 'bum): ba 'am dkyil 'khor bya ba dag la'ang me tog gtor bar bya'o/ / yang na sngar bstun pa'i cho ga ji lta ba bzhin du byas na ci 'dod pa'i las thams cad byed par 'gyur ro// sngags dang /
369b2(rgyud 'bum): phyag rgya dang / rig pa brjod pas ni dam tshig thams cad du 'gyur ro// legs par phyag rgya bcings na ni phyag rgya'i mthu 'byung bar 'gyur gyi/ gang phyag rgya bab col du byas
369b3(rgyud 'bum): pa dang / gnas ma yin par bcas pa des ni 'di'i dam tshig nyams par 'gyur ro// gang rdo rje'i phyag rgya de nyid ni mdung rtse'i phyag rgya yin mod kyi/ rtse gsum dang rdo rje ni khyod
369b4(rgyud 'bum): par yod de/ gang gyen du bstan pa de ni rdo rje 'dzin gyi phyag rgyar 'gyur la/ 'og tu bltas pa ni dbang phyug chen po'i phyag rgya yin no// bar du bzhag pa ni sbyin gnas su 'os
369b5(rgyud 'bum): pa'i slob dpon dang bla ma la ni phyag rgya dbus su gzung bar bya'o/ / mi thams cad la ni sor mo gcig gdeg par bya'o// mi ma yin pa thams cad dang / rkang gnyis dang / rkang bzhi dang / rkang
369b6(rgyud 'bum): mangs dang / srid pa gsum la gnas pa'i sems can rnams kyi phyag rgyar 'gyur ba ni sor mo gnyis bsgreng ba'o// gnod sbyin dang gnod sbyin mo thams cad kyi phyag rgyar 'gyur
369b7(rgyud 'bum): ba ni gsum bsgreng ba'o/ / rig pa 'dzin pa dang rig pa 'dzin ma thams cad kyi phyag rgyar 'gyur ba ni sor mo bzhi bsgreng ba'o// lha dang lha ma yin thams cad kyi bu mo'i phyag
370a1(rgyud 'bum): rgyar 'gyur ba ni lag pa'i mthil mnyam par gzhag pa'o/ / thal mo sbyar ba legs par byas te bzhag pa ni gzugs na spyod pa'i lha thams cad kyi phyag rgya'o//
370a2(rgyud 'bum): thal mo de nyid legs par byas pa las khu tshur bcing bar byas pa ni 'dod pa'i khams kyi dbang phyug la sogs pa 'dod pa'i khams na gnas pa thams cad kyi yir ro// dmyal ba dang /
370a3(rgyud 'bum): dud 'gro dang / yi dgas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi sems can thams cad kyi phyag rgyar 'gyur pa ni de nyid las sor po gcig yang dag par bsgreng ba'o// sha za dang sha za mo
370a4(rgyud 'bum): la sogs pa thams cad kyi phyag rgyar 'gyur ba ni sor mo gnyis bsgreng ba'o/ / srin po dang srin mo rnams kyi ni gsum bsgreng ba'o// sha rjed za ba thams cad dang / gdon dang / ma mo
370a5(rgyud 'bum): dang grul bum la sogs pa dang / sha za rnams dang / mkha' 'gro ma thams cad dang / sdig pa'i sems dang ldan pa thams cad la ni sor mo bzhi bsgreng ba'o// sdig pa thams
370a6(rgyud 'bum): cad kyi phyag rgyar 'gyur ba ni sor mo thams cad bsdus pa'o/ / lag sor bsdus pa'i phyag rgya ni dgug pa'o// lag sor brkyang ba ni slar gtang ba'i phyag rgya'o// las thams cad ni rang
370a7(rgyud 'bum): gi sems kyis bya'o/ / ci 'dod pa'i phyag rgya 'di dag la rang rang gi sngags sbyar bar bya'o// gzhan gyi phyag rgya gzhan gyi las ni mi bya'o// gang gi sngags gang la yod pa de dang de'i phyag rgya
370b1(rgyud 'bum): sbyar bar bya'o/ / phyag rgya 'di dag ni ring thung mnyam pa med pa yin te/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs pa/ sems can thams cad kyis phyag rgya mthong nas khro bar byed mi
370b2(rgyud 'bum): nus so/ / phyag rgya las 'da' bar byed pa ni rnam par nyams pa thob par 'gyur ro// phyag rgya nyams pa las ni dam tshig nyams pa dang / rig pa thams cad las rnam par 'das par 'gyur ro//
370b3(rgyud 'bum): mthar yang ngu 'bod kyi 'gro ba thob par 'gyur ro// dmyal ba chen po mnar med par yang shin tu brtan par skye ba thob par 'gyur ba ni phyag rgya la bgegs byed pas so// gang yang phyag rgya dang
370b4(rgyud 'bum): dam tshig la gnas pa de dag ni yun ring po mi nyung bar bde bar 'gyur te/ lha'i gnas chen po'i 'gro bar skye bar 'gyur ro// mthar yang nges par byang chub la gzhol bar 'gyur ro// mdor na dang
370b5(rgyud 'bum): po'i sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rdzu 'phrul chen po dag gis phyag rgya rnam pa mang po rab tu gsungs so/ / sems can thams cad kyis kyang 'di'i mtha' rtogs par ram/ gzung bar
370b6(rgyud 'bum): ram/ grangs rtsi bar byed par mi nus so// mdor na rgyal ba'i rigs kyi rig pa'i rgyal po 'khor los sgyur ba'i yi ge gcig pa de'i phyag rgyar 'gyur ba ni lag pa g.yas g.yon snga ma bzhin du khu
370b7(rgyud 'bum): tshur du byas la/ gung mo gnyis phyir phyung la brkyang ste gcig tu rtse sprad la/ gnyis ka'i yang rtse mo'i tshogs bkug la mdzub mo gnyis kyi tshigs gnyis bkug cing sen mo gnyis phan tshun
371a1(rgyud 'bum): rtse smad de mthe bong gnyis kyi sen po'i steng du bzhug pa 'di ni 'khor los sgyur ba'i phyag rgya ste/ las thabs cad byed pa/ phyag rgya thams cad kyi rab mchog
371a2(rgyud 'bum): 'jig rten gyi skyob pa rnams kyis gsungs pa/ 'khor los sgyur ba'i yi ge gcig pa dang yang dag par ldan na las thams cad byed par 'gyur ro// 'dis bsgrubs na de bzhin gshegs pa
371a3(rgyud 'bum): thams cad kyi rigs dang / 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa thams cad kyi sngags grub par 'gyur ro// 'dis bzlas pa byas na sngags thams cad bzlas par 'gyur ro// sgrub pa
371a4(rgyud 'bum): pos nges par sngon du cho ga'i rgyal po 'dir gsungs pa'i sngags kyi mchog brgyad stong bzlas par bya'o/ / de ltar byas na rig pa 'di thams cad mngon du 'gyur zhing myur du grub pa rab tu ster bar
371a5(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur ro/ / myur du mchog kyang ster bar 'gyur ro// nges par byang chub la gzhol bar 'gyur ro// pad+ma 'dzin pa'i phyag rgya dang spyan ras gzigs kyi snying po yi ge gcig pa dang ldan par byas
371a6(rgyud 'bum): na las thams cad byed par 'gyur ro/ / yang na gos dkar mo'i rig pa phyag rgya dang ldar bar byas na'ang de bzhin du las thams cad byed par 'gyur ro// rdo rje 'chang gi phyag rgya dang de nyid kyi snying po
371a7(rgyud 'bum): yi ge gcig pa dang ldan par byas na'ang de bzhin du las thams cad byed par 'gyur ro/ / yang na mA ma kI'i rig pa chen mo dang ldan par byas na'ang las thams cad byed par 'gyur ro// de bzhin du
371b1(rgyud 'bum): glang po'i rigs kyi yi ge gcig pa byang chub sems dpa' glang po'i spos kyi snying po dang / de bzhin du de nyid kyi phyag rgya dang / rin po che'i rigs dang / gnod sbyin gyi rigs dang / lha dang /
371b2(rgyud 'bum): 'phags pa dang / 'di dag la'ang 'dir snying po yi ge gcig pa nyid la phyag rgya dang sngags thams cad dang ldan par byas na las thams cad bya ba yin no// ji ltar rigs par rig pa dang sngags
371b3(rgyud 'bum): kyi stobs bskyed pa mtha' dag bya'o/ / de bzhin du drang srong rngams la ni dmod pa 'debs pa'i lag pa'i phyag rgya'o// de bzhin du dri za dang / lha dang / lha ma yin dang bcas pa rnams la ni lag pa
371b4(rgyud 'bum): g.yon pa'i mthe bong nang du bcug pa byas pa'o/ / gru la bstan pa'i khu tshur du gnas pa'i rgya ni gzhon nu ma bzhi'i phyag rgya dang de nyid kyi sngags kyis so// de bzhin du smin drug gi bu la ni mdung gi phyag
371b5(rgyud 'bum): rgyas so/ / de bzhin du gshin rje dang / chu lha dang / lus ngan dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / sha za dang / lto 'phye chen po la sogs pa sems can srid pa gsum la yang
371b6(rgyud 'bum): dag par gnas pa thams cad dang / 'gro ba thams cad du gtogs pa dang / khams thams cad na gnas pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi don dang / pa mo dang / sha rjen za ba

378b3(rgyud 'bum): mo'i gnas su 'dug ste zhes bya ba ni gnas gtsang ba'i phyogs su zug rngu med pa'i gnas la ba'i lci be sa la ma lhung bas byugs la/ me tog dkar po dri zhim po dag gis btsal bkram pa
378b4(rgyud 'bum): der 'dug la sngags bzlas shing phyag rgya bcing bar bya'o/ / gzhan du ni ma yin no// gzhan dag tu ni phyag rgya dang lhan gcig bzlas pa gcig kyang mi bya'o// gtsang ba zhes gang
378b5(rgyud 'bum): gsungs pa ni nyi ma nub pa na/ srog chags med pa'i chu gtsang bas khrus byas te gos gsar pa bgos la gtsug tor gyi sngags kyis bsrung ba byas la/ grong gi chos rnam par spangs
378b6(rgyud 'bum): shing gtsang zhing gtsang sbrul dga' ni dag ba/ ska rags dkar pos bcings pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa bsgoms la thun gcig 'das pa dang der nyal bar bya'o// bram ze'i bu mo
378b7(rgyud 'bum): gtsang bas bkal ba'i skud pa blangs la sngags 'dis brgya rtsa brgyad mngon par bsngags pa bya'o/ / oM a ha ra ha ra ban+d+ha ne shu kra d+hA ra NA~M sid+d+h+yar+the sAhA/ mA ma kI'i phyag rgya dang bzlas pargyan
379a1(rgyud 'bum): de nas skud pa rked pa la lan gsum dkris nas bcing ba byas na sa bon bcing ba byas par 'gyur te/ 'dod pa'i dbang phyug gis kyang rmi lam du yid la gnod pa skyel
379a2(rgyud 'bum): bar mi nus na/ rmi lam du log 'dren rnam pa sna tshogs kyis lta smos kyang ci dgos/ de bzhin du cho ga 'dis 'dod chags dang ldan pas kyang mi nus na/ 'dod chags dang bral bas lta
379a3(rgyud 'bum): smos kyang ci dgos/ 'dod pa'i dbang phyug dga' ldan gyi bu mo gzugs rnam pa sna tshogs 'chang ba'i 'dod chags can gyis kyang yid la gnod pa skyed par mi nus na/ de las gzhan pa'i
379a4(rgyud 'bum): mi dang mi ma yin pa'i bud med kyis kyang smos ci dgos/ de lta bu'i cho gas nang par langs la so shing bcas shing gdong rab tu bkrus la/ cho ga snga ma bzhin du srog chags med cing dri ma
379a5(rgyud 'bum): med pa'i chus khrus byas te/ shar phyogs su bltas la phyag rgya bcing zhing sngags bzla ba byas na tshe ring bar 'gyur zhing las thams cad la nus pa dang / nad chen po las grol te skye bo
379a6(rgyud 'bum): thams cad dga' bar 'gyur ro/ / dgra rnams kyang bshes gnyen nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// mthong ba tsam gyis gdon thams cad dang / sha rjen za ba dang / sdig pa can la sogs
379a7(rgyud 'bum): pa rab tu 'byer bar 'gyur ro/ / dgra rnams rengs par 'gyur ro// mthong ba tsam gyis gtsang ba 'ab mi gtsang ba'i cho gas las thams cad byed par 'gyur ro// de bzhin du cho ga'i
379b1(rgyud 'bum): rgyal po 'di'i phyag rgya dang sngags kyi tshogs kyi 'khor 'di'ang grangs med pa yin te/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das grangs med pas gsungs pa dang / gsung ba yin te/ shAkya
379b2(rgyud 'bum): thub pa ngas kyang da ltar de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis kyang 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor gyi nang du gsungs te/ 'jam dpal gzhon nu khyod la'ang
379b3(rgyud 'bum): bstan pa yongs su srung ba'i phyir dang / chos kyi dbyings yun ring du yang dag par bsrung ba'i phyir 'di khyod la yongs su gtad do// nga yongs su mya ngan las 'das te chos kyi de nyid
379b4(rgyud 'bum): la brten cing yang dag pa'i mtha'i tha mar gyur te zhi bar gyur pa na/ sems can snying rje chen po dang bral ba'i sems dang ldan pa la phan pa'i phyir gsungs shing / dus kyi mtha'
379b5(rgyud 'bum): 'jigs pa chen po'i dus la bab pa na/ dkon mchog gsum la gnod pa byed pa'i sems can rnams kyang bzlog pa'i don dang / gdul ba'i don gyi phyir cho ga'i rgyal po 'di ngas
379b6(rgyud 'bum): gsungs la/ rgya cher rnam par dbye bar byas na sems can thams cad kyi don gyi phyir yin no// 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi rtsa ba'i cho ga byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod phal po che
379b7(rgyud 'bum): theg pa chen po shin tu rgyas pa'i mdo las/ sngags dang / phyag rgya dang / nges par sdom pa dang / las dang / cho ga'i le'u rab 'byams las sum cu rtsa gcig pa
380a1(rgyud 'bum): rdzogs so/ / / de nas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas gzhan yang thams cad dang ldan pa'i gnas gtsang ma'i gzhal med khang la
380a2(rgyud 'bum): gzigs nas/ 'jam dpal gzhon du gyur pa la bka' sprul pa/ 'jam dpal mdor na nyon cig/ phyag rgya'i mtshan nyid dang / sngags rnams kyi rgya che ba dang / dkyil
380a3(rgyud 'bum): 'khor gyi cho ga'i mdor bsdus pa dang / dam tshig la rjes su 'jug cing phyag rgya'i gnas dang / sngags thams cad dang / rgyud de dag thams cad la gsang ba dang bcas pa'i dkyil
380a4(rgyud 'bum): 'khor ni/ rdzu 'phrul che kun sangs rgyas kyis// 'di kun sngar ri gsungs pa yin// sngags shes bdag nyid chen po dang // yon tan kun kyang bstan pa yin// dang po'i
380a5(rgyud 'bum): sangs rgyas dag gis sngar/ / sems can rnams la phan pa'i phyir// sngags kyi 'khor lo dag dang ni// chos kyi 'khor lo bla med bskor// yang dag mtha' la brten nas ni//
380a6(rgyud 'bum): zhi ba'i 'khor lo'i rjes su song // 'jig rter sangs rgyas rdzu 'phrul che// sangs rgyas de kur zhi bar gshegs// dang po'i de bzhin gshegs rnams kyis// 'di kun sngon ni
380a7(rgyud 'bum): bstan pa yin/ / ngas kyang phyi ma'i dus dag tu// 'jam po'i blo ldan khyod la bstan// sangs rgyas 'od can de yi bka'// de tshe 'di ni thos nas kyang // 'jam pa'i
380b1(rgyud 'bum): dbyangs ni gzhon nu yang / / thal mo sbyar byas spyan sngar 'dug/ rkang gnyis rdzogs sangs rgyas pa la// smra ba'i mchog gis yongs su zhus// 'jig rten rnams la phan pa'i
380b2(rgyud 'bum): phyir/ / shes rab chen pos chos gsungs shig/ mdor bsdus rgya ni mi che bar// yon tan bdag nyid che 'bras 'byung // 'jam dpal gyis ni de skad gsol// de nas
380b3(rgyud 'bum): cang mi smra bar gnas/ / de nas dpal ldan tshangs pa'i dbyangs// ka la bIng ka'i sgra skad kyis// dkyil 'khor dgod pa'i phyag rgya ni// de dag kun ni ston pa yin// gnas gtsang
380b4(rgyud 'bum): steng du gnas pa'i dus/ / de tshe sngags dang rgyud dag ni// shAkya seng ge mi mchog ri// rdzogs sangs rgyas kyis yang dag gsungs// phyag rgya'i cho ga 'byung ba dang / phyag/
380b5(rgyud 'bum): rgyargyu rgyud dang ldan pa yi// yon tan bdag nyid rgya che ba// 'jam dpal gzhor nu khyod 'on cig/ sems can sems can ma yin pa'ang // dang po rtags mtshan bzhin du bya//
380b6(rgyud 'bum): rnam pa spyad dang spyod pa dang // zur gyis thams cad smras pa dang // lag gnyis rkang gnyis spyi bo dang // lag gcig sor mo'i sbyor ba dag/ sngon gyi sangs rgyas de dag
380b7(rgyud 'bum): gis/ / de kun phyag rgya zhes su gsungs// bya bum gdugs dang de bzhin du// pad+ma rgyal mtshan ba dan dang // nya dang rdo rje dung dang ni// de bzhin bum pa 'khor lo dang /
381a1(rgyud 'bum): 'jig rten sna tshogs mtshon cha ni// ji srid yongs su bstan pa dang // ut+pal 'dra ba'i phyag rgya dang // de kun phyag rgya dkyil 'khor dgod// de dag go
381a2(rgyud 'bum): rims gnas pa dang / / cho ga ldan par bstan pa yin// rtag tu de dag nyid la ni// rang gzugs 'dra bar bri bar bya// dkyil 'khor phyag rgyar gsungs pa ni// thams cad du
381a3(rgyud 'bum): ni spyir gsungs pa'o/ / de dag phyag rgyar yongs bstan pa// gnas ni ji bzhin dag la dgod// dkyil 'khor dag ni kun la yang // rang dang 'dra ba nyid du sbyar// 'khor
381a4(rgyud 'bum): lo sa sgyur la 'khor lo dang / / gtsug tor gdugs dkar nyid la ni// gtso bor gdugs ni dkar po yin// dkyil 'khor la ni rtag tu bri// chos kyi 'khor lo sangs rgyas
381a5(rgyud 'bum): la/ pad+ma pad+ma'i rigs dag la// rdo rje rdo rje'i rigs la gsungs// glang po glang po'i rigs zhes bya// nor bu'i rigs la bum pa ste// dkyil 'khor kun la rab tu
381a6(rgyud 'bum): sbyar/ / lha gzhan gyi ni rigs dag la// dpal be'u bkra shis ldan pa bri// tshangs pa che la ngang pa bri// brgya byin la yang rdo rje dang // dbang phyug che la bri ba ni// rtsa
381a7(rgyud 'bum): gsum khyu mchog yang dag bya/ / skem byed rtse gsum panI sa// mdung dang bcas pa nyid kyang yin// khyab 'jug 'khor lo bri ba ste// lha ma yin la dbus dang // rnams
381b1(rgyud 'bum): sna tshogs brgya phrag ni/ / lha yi mtshon cha sna tshogs dang // de dag gzhan yang bzhon pa ni/ rnam pa sna tshogs de tshe bri// gzugs brnyan ji ltar gnas pa ni// rang gzugs
381b2(rgyud 'bum): 'phos pa bzhin du bri/ / dkyil 'khor dag ni thams cad du// gang yang rung ba 'di gcig bri// gcig dang gnyis dang yang dag ldan// grangs meng gsum la sogs pa bya//
381b3(rgyud 'bum): dkyil 'khor rgyal ba mchog gsungs pa// lan kan 'phreng ni de dang mnyam// gang gi ched du dkyil 'khor gsungs// de ni dbus su nges pa sbyar// rgyal ba'i rigs ni nang
381b4(rgyud 'bum): du bri/ / nang gi dbus su'ang sangs rgyas te// de tshe nang du'ang gzugs brnyan ni// ston pa yi ni kun tu bri// gnyis par pad+ma'i rigs dgod cing // gsum par rdo rje'i
381b5(rgyud 'bum): rigs kyang bri/ / mthar gyis lha dang lha ma yin// de bzhin de tshe thams cad ni// de nas sa kun la gnas pa'i// gnod sbyin srin po mi dang bcas// mthar gyis ji ltar
381b6(rgyud 'bum): gnas pa yi/ / mu stegs rnams kyang de ltar bri// cho ga bzhin du thams cad kyang // phyogs skyong de bzhin bri bar bya// mdor na gzugs brnyan gcig dang ni// gnyis
381b7(rgyud 'bum): dang gsum sogs grangs med pa/ / mtha' yas phyogs la gnas pa yi// dkyil 'khor ji srid kun tu bri// ma mo'i dkyil 'khor nyid dag ni// tshad med de tshe dri bar bya// gzugs
382a1(rgyud 'bum): brnyar gcig la sogs pa ni/ / mtha' yas sa yi steng dag tu// dkyil 'khor cho ga gsungs pa ni// rnam pa gsum du nges bstan pa// mchog dang bar ma
382a2(rgyud 'bum): de bzhin du/ / tha ma nyid du'ang bstun pa yin// mchog la mchog dag grub pa dang // 'bring la 'bring du nye bar bstan// tha mas phran tshegs grub par ni// rgyal ba mchog gis
382a3(rgyud 'bum): sngon gsungs so/ / sems can yi ni rnam gsum gyis// rgyal ba'i mchog gis grub par gsungs// sems can chen pos chen por 'grub// sems can 'bring gis 'bring
382a4(rgyud 'bum): dang ni/ / gsum pa skye bo phra mo yi// las ni phra mor nye bar bstan// sangs rgyas nyid du sems dang la// phun sum tshogs pa dam pa ni// nges par thob par 'gyur ba ste/
382a5(rgyud 'bum): sems can dkyil 'khor mthong bas so// de dus sems ni bar ma yis// rang rgyal byang chub thob par byed// gus pa med pas nyan thos nyid// tha mas nges par thob par
382a6(rgyud 'bum): byed/ / bdag nyid chen po don bcas 'bras// zhi ba'i 'gro ba nye bar bstan// dkyil 'khor mthong bas mtho ris su// nges par de ni 'gro bar 'gyur// de bzhin phyag rgya mchog
382a7(rgyud 'bum): kun dang / / sngags rnams kyang ni rgya cher bcas// rnam gsum nyid kyang rab sbyar bar// rnam gsum bde ba rab tu byed// phyag rgya dkyil 'khor gsungs pa dang // sngags
382b1(rgyud 'bum): rnams bstan pa'ang phan pa'i don/ / de dag rnam pa gsum du 'gyur// sngags kyang rnam gsum mnyam par bstan// ji ltar dkyil 'khor bstan pa bzhin// phyag rgya sngags
382b2(rgyud 'bum): kyang de bzhin du/ / 'di dag cho gar yang dag ldan// 'jig rten 'dren pas nges par bstan// de bzhin de yang rnam gsum 'gro// stong phrag dag ni du ma nyid// rnam gsum rnams
382b3(rgyud 'bum): gsum dag kyang / / rnam pa gnyis dang grangs med pa'o// gang phyir sngags ni sems la ltos// sngags ni sems kyis spang mi bya// sems dang sngags ni yang dag ldan//
382b4(rgyud 'bum): lhan cig tu ni bsgrub par bya// de bzhin gshegs kyi rig sngags dang // gang yang pad+ma'i rigs dag dang // gang yang rdo rje'i rigs gsungs dang // mi yi rigs ni nyid dag
382b5(rgyud 'bum): dang / / 'jig rten pa yi sngags rnams kun// de dag ma lus 'di las byung // gang zhig rgyal dang rgyal sras sngags// sems can phyir ni gsungs pa rnams// gang
382b6(rgyud 'bum): zhig de zlos mngon brtson pa'ang / / de ni nges par sangs rgyas 'gyur// gang yang sngags ni bar ma dag/ gang zhig zlos pa de blo byed// rang sangs rgyas su yang dag bstan//
382b7(rgyud 'bum): nges par de yi rigs kyang yin// sngags ni tha mar rab zhugs pa// nyan thos dgra bcom gyis bshad dang // 'jig rten ma lus kun la yang // sngags zlos pa la mngon
383a1(rgyud 'bum): brtson pa/ / nyan thos rdzu 'phrul chen po yi// nges par rigs su de gnas yin// mchog dang tham bar ma ni// der yang las ni rab sbyar bya// hrI
383a2(rgyud 'bum): bas sangs rgyas byang chub 'gyur/ / rgyas pa yis ni rang rgyal 'gyur// gzhan pa phran tshegs las kyis ni// nyan thos kyi ri byang chub brjod// de ni rnam gsum dbye ba ste// der
383a3(rgyud 'bum): yang sems ni blta bar bya/ / mang por yang ni dbye bya ste// grangs med pa yang dbye bas so// 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi rtsa ba'i cho ga byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod phal po che thag
383a4(rgyud 'bum): pa chen po shir tu byas pa'i mdo las/ phyag rgya dang / sngags dang / las thams cad dang / nges par sdom pa'i le'u rab 'byams las sum cu rtsa gnyis pa rdzogs so// /
383a5(rgyud 'bum): de nas gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon phyag na rdo rje 'khor der 'dus par gyur te 'dug pa de stan las langs nas/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar te/ pus mo g.yas
383a6(rgyud 'bum): pa'i lha nga sa la gtsugs nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// gang bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jam
383a7(rgyud 'bum): dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i khro bo'i rgyal po gshin rje'i gshed ces bya ba bshad pa de'i cho ga rgya che ba bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa lal
383b1(rgyud 'bum): bka' ma stsal pas/ bcom ldan 'das bdag dang phyi ma'i skye bo la gzigs nas bcom ldan 'das yongs su mya ngan las 'das te/ bstan pa nub pa'i dus la bab ste/ 'jigs
383b2(rgyud 'bum): pa chen po rtsod pa'i dus tha ma la nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dag med par sangs rgyas kyi zhing du de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa yang dag par bsrung ba'i phyir dang / chos kyi khams yun
383b3(rgyud 'bum): ring du gnas par bya ba'i phyir dang / rgyal po ma rungs pa thams cad bzlog pa'i phyir dang / dkon mchog gsum la gnod pa byed pa dag tshar gcad pa'i phyir dang / gdul bya'i
383b4(rgyud 'bum): sems can la bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i thabs mkhas pa bstan pa'i phyir dang / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir dang / bsam gyis mi khyab
383b5(rgyud 'bum): pa'i sems can yongs su smin pa mngon par bsgrub pa'i phyir dang / bcom ldan 'das phyi ma'i dus dang phyi ma'i dus su bstan pa rnam par 'jig par 'gyur ba na/ gang 'di khro
383b6(rgyud 'bum): po'i rgyal po ga shir rje gshed kyi cho ga ji lta ba bzhin gsungs pa rab tu sbyar na de la grub par 'gyur te/ nges par rgyal po ma rungs pa bstan pa la gnod pa byed pa dang / sems
383b7(rgyud 'bum): can phyogs chen po dang ldan pa dang / spro ba chen po dang ldan pa rnams tshar gcad pa dang / rjes su gzung ba la rab tu zhugs pa dang / snying rje chen po dang bral ba de dag la khro
384a1(rgyud 'bum): po'i rgyal po 'di rab tu sbyar bar bya'o/ gzhan dag la ni ma yin no// de nas bcom ldan 'das cang mi gsung bar gyur te sangs rgyas kyi rnam par sprul pa'i
384a2(rgyud 'bum): byin gyis brlabs zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so/ / 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'ang cang mi smra bar gnas par gyur to// thams cad dang ldan pa'i
384a3(rgyud 'bum): 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor yang rnam pa drug tu rab tu 'gul bar gyur to/ / lha tshogs dag kyang 'jigs par gyur// byis pa kun kyang rab tu dngangs// lha rnams kun dang klu dag
384a4(rgyud 'bum): dang / / lha min dbang dang ma mor bcas// gza' rnams kun gyi gtso bo dang // lha tshogs mi dang bcas pa dang // ma rungs sems ldan srul po dag/ rab 'gul yid
384a5(rgyud 'bum): nI mi bstan 'gyur/ / mi yi bdag po gdug ldan sems// de dag nyam thag 'jigs par 'gyur// chos kyi rgyal po'i bstan pa la// de tshe de dag skyabs su song // gnod
384a6(rgyud 'bum): sbyin gsang ba'i bdag po ni/ / 'od chen phyag ni rdo rje dang // gzhon nur gyur pa'i sngags rgyal dang // 'jam pa'i dbyangs la'ang de 'jigs nas// 'jam pa'i dbyangs
384a7(rgyud 'bum): kyi drung du ni/ / de tshe de dag dam tshig blangs// ma rungs sngags ni mi bzad pas// kye ma bdag cag nges sreg cing // de ring khro bos brgyal 'gyur zhing // sa yi steng
384b1(rgyud 'bum): du 'gyel 'gyur bas/ / sems can thugs la thugs brtse bas// yongs su bskyab cing srung du gsol// de nas 'od chen byis pa'i gzugs// byang chub sems dpa'
384b2(rgyud 'bum): des spras pa/ / lha dang gnod sbyin srin po dang // lha min thams cad ma 'jigs shig/ mi dang mi ma yin pa dang // 'byung po ma lus lha rnams kun// khyed kyi dam tshig
384b3(rgyud 'bum): ngas bshad bsrung / / rtag tu byams sems gyur nas ni// rtag tu rang gi sngags kyang dran// shAkya seng ge mi yi mchog/ rkang gnyis mchog ni rdzogs sangs rgyas// de nyid
384b4(rgyud 'bum): kyis gsungs sngags dang ni/ / gtsug tor spyan la sogs pa'o// 'jig rten gsum las 'khor lo rgyal// gzi brjid phung po dam pa rgyal// rnam sbyar gtsug tor gsang
384b5(rgyud 'bum): sngags dang / / phyag na pad+ma rngam gzigs dang // kun tu gzigs pa'i mgon po dang // khro gnyer sgrol ma grags ldan ma// lha mo gos dkar mo dang ni// dkar chen ma dang snyan
384b6(rgyud 'bum): ldan ma/ / rig ma longs spyod ldan ma dang // rta mgrin sngags kyi rgyal po dang // 'di dag pad+ma'i rig sngags dang // gtsor ni rgyal bas gsungs pa dang // yi ge gcig
384b7(rgyud 'bum): dang 'khor los sgyur/ / sngags rnams bdag po mnga' ba dag dang // 'od chen sngags kyi mgon po ni// 'di dag de bzhin dran par gyis// gshin rje gshed ces bya ba yi/
385a1(rgyud 'bum): @khro bo'i gtso bo de yang dran// mgon po spyan ras gzigs pa yi// thugs ni thugs rje 'byung ba dang // thugs rje chen pos thugs brlan par/
385a2(rgyud 'bum): sangs rgyas snga mas gsungs pa'ang dran// sgrol ma skye bo sgrol bar ni// spyan ras gzigs kyis gsungs pa dang // rtag dang ting 'dzin skyes 'phags ma// ming gis
385a3(rgyud 'bum): gzugs ni bstan pa'ang yin/ / byang chub sems bzhi ni spyod pa ste// byang chub spyod pa dam pa'ang yin// 'jig rten khams ni stong dag tu// grangs med rnam pa mang por yang //
385a4(rgyud 'bum): sems can rnams la phan pa'i phyir// de tshe lha mo rgyu bar byed// bud med gzugs ni gzung nas kyang // sngags kyi tshul gyis lus can la// de tshe sems can 'dul byed
385a5(rgyud 'bum): cing / / byang chub theg par sbyor bar byed// byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa ni// bsam zhing bstan par mi nus so// phyag na rdo rje dpa' bo ni// sngags rnams kun
385a6(rgyud 'bum): gyi bdag po'ang dran/ / bdag ni rig 'dzin lha mo ni// 'jig rten gsum gyis rab mchod dang // lu gu rgyud dang 'od dpag ma// rdo rje khu tshur snyan ldan ma// khro dbang thig le
385a7(rgyud 'bum): dkar mo dang / / dbyig sngon 'jigs par byed dang bcas// 'di dag khro mo pho nya'i tshogs// rig ma'i spyan du rab tu bstan// rdo rje'i rigs la gtso bo ste// gang zhig dran
385b1(rgyud 'bum): dpan zhing srung / / byang chub sems dpa' rdzu 'phrul che// 'jig rten dag ri spros glang dang // byang chub sems dpa' rdzu 'phrul che// blo ldan mthu chen thob dang ni// sras kyi
385b2(rgyud 'bum): thu bo gtso bo ni/ / kun tu bzang po dge ba ste// de tshe gang gis drar gyur pa// de la 'jigs pa yod ma yin// rtag tu de tsha nor bzang dang // gnod sbyin dam pa dzam+b+ha la//
385b3(rgyud 'bum): nyan thos rang rgyal ma lus pa// dran ra 'jigs pa ga la yod// kun nas de dag mchod byas ra// bsrung ba chen por rab tu bstan// de tshe 'bras bu che lha dang // bsod
385b4(rgyud 'bum): nams skyes dang 'du shes med/ / gzugs med gzugs can lha dag dang // rdzu 'phrul chen po 'dod chags bral// dkod mchog gsum la mchod byed dang // rgyal ba'i bstan
385b5(rgyud 'bum): la rab dang ba/ / sngags dang dgra la rtag 'jigs pa// de dag la ni cung zad med// de ltar dam tshig rjes gsungs pa// sngags pa kun gyis bsgoms min te// 'di ni
385b6(rgyud 'bum): khro rgyal mchog ces pa/ / gshin rje gshed kyis brjod pa yin// sems can dam tshig la gnas nas// mi ri ma lus gnod mi rus// lha dang lha mir thams cad dag/ de
385b7(rgyud 'bum): nas yid ni dga' gyur nas/ / rgyal ba'i sras kyis rab tu bskul// thams cad dam tshig stan gnas 'gyur// gnod sbyin bdag po khro ldan pas// khyad du gsod tshig
386a1(rgyud 'bum): rjod par byed/ / 'jig rten khams ni grangs med pa// de tshe thams cad rab tu 'gul// don med khro bo'i rgyal po yis// ci yi phyir na 'di bstan byas/
386a2(rgyud 'bum): sems can rnams ni gdul don du// de tshe sngon ni rgyal ba'i sras// khro bo'i rgyal po'i nus pa ni// sngon chad bstan pa ma yin nam// rdo rje can gyis de smras nas// rdo rje
386a3(rgyud 'bum): sa la dor zhing gnas/ / rdzu 'phrul chen po byis pa'i gzugs// blo dang ldan pa 'jam pa'i dbyangs// gzhon nu rab tu bzhad gyur nas// tshig 'di dag ni smras pa ste/
386a4(rgyud 'bum): lag na rdo rje rdzu 'phrul che// gnod sbyin chen po sdang ma byed// khro bo'i rgyal po rdzu 'phrul che// 'di ni nga yis rab tu bstan// de bzhin rjes su sbyin par bya// ji ltar 'dod
386a5(rgyud 'bum): bzhin rab tu ston/ / khyod kyis khro bo'o mthu dge ni// yongs su bstan par mi nus te// 'di ni khyod nyid la gnas te// lus 'dir gnas shing snang ba yin// de nyid
386a6(rgyud 'bum): khyod kyis drangs pa ste/ / khyod nyid kyi ni snying la dris// khro bo'i mthu ni khugs pa dang // 'dir ni bzlog par nus pa min// ji ltar 'dod bzhin khyod la bstan// gzhan du
386a7(rgyud 'bum): dam tshig btang ba yin/ / khrus byed rab tu nyal ba dang // grong gi chos la rjes 'jug dang // til mar gyis byugs srung med dang // rtag tu gdug pa'i sems ldan dang //
386b1(rgyud 'bum): sngags mchog thams cad spangs pa dang // bstan pa la ni ma zhugs dang // de bzhin mi ni the tsom dang // dad pa med cing 'gyod par gnas// dam chos the tsom thob pa dang //
386b2(rgyud 'bum): de spong mnyam par ma bzhag dang // gcer bu rtag par lhag mar ldan// mi gtsang spyod pa'i spyod yul dang // mi brtson sngags dang mi ldan dang // rtag tu brtse med lhag mar
386b3(rgyud 'bum): ldan/ / lha yi gnas dang mchod rten dang // lha khang 'khor sa dkyil 'khor du// 'khrig pa la ni mngon dga' ba// khro bos de dag rnam par 'jig/ dam tshig nyams dang

386b6(rgyud 'bum): bo'o rgyal pos 'joms par byed/ / bag med rigs min 'gro ba yi// byis pa rnam kun thams cad dang // rtag tu 'dod chags bral gyur pa'i// rang rgyal dgra bcom

387b1(rgyud 'bum): ngo'i zla phyed dag nas te/ / tshes grangs bcu bzhi'am brgyad dag la// bram ze dam pa mchog dag gi/ dur khrod shi ba'i ro rnye na// de ni mtshan mo nus par blangs// de yi wa//

388b1(rgyud 'bum): spros dang ni/ / zhag gi spos kyis mchod pa bya// ras ris dam pa de la ni// dang po bar mtha' mchod par bya// ras ris yongs su rdzogs byas nas// ri mo mkhan la

389a1(rgyud 'bum): spangs dang / / sngags rnams mchod par mi byed dang // de la dang rten smod pa dang // gang yang zlos pa smod byed dang // de bzhin mchod rten khyad du gsod//

389b1(rgyud 'bum): sems can zhugs nas de bzhin 'gyur// gnyis pa la ni chung ma dang // 'khor dang gtso bor bcas pa'ang yin// de la gsum par 'chi ba ni// gang gi ched du byas pa'o// gang tshe

389b3(rgyud 'bum): 'chi bar 'gyur ba ste/ / mes 'tshig rlung ni chen po dang // char chen dag kyang 'byung bar 'gyur// thams cad bsdus pa'i tshogs dag ni// pha rol tshogs kyis gnon par 'gyur//

390a3(rgyud 'bum): rung / / gcig pu gnyis su med pa yang // rtag tu las rnams yang dag brtsam// dgon pa chen po dber pa dang // lha yi khang pa stong pa dang // khang stong dang ni chu bo dang //

390b1(rgyud 'bum): dang ma mo smos ci dgos/ / dbang ldan dang ni khyab 'jug gam// skem byed dang ni brgya byin dang // rgyal dang rgyal ba'i sras dag ni// dam tshig 'dzin par byed pa dang // sa bcu la ni yang

391b3(rgyud 'bum): stas gcod pa 'am/ / yan lag dag kyang mi tshang 'gyur// sdig can mi ma yin pa yi// srin po gdug pas za bar 'gyur// bdag gi 'khor dang bcas pa dag/ sha rjer za dang

392a1(rgyud 'bum): kyang bzlog pa dang / / gnyen pos kyang mi nus so// thog med pa yi 'khor ba nas// shin tu sdug bsngal rgyu sngon byas// de dag sdug bsngal sdug bsngal

392a3(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur/ / theg pa gsum la brten nas ni// mya ngan 'das pa legs par thob// zlog pa blo ngan gyis zin pa// 'dod chags kyis mdongs dka' thub med// 'khor ba mi bzang tshang
392a4(rgyud 'bum): tshing gi/ 'gro ba lngar ni 'khor par 'gyur// de dag sdug bsngal ldan don du// 'dod pa'i longs spyod brjod bya'o// khro bo 'di ni mnyes byas na// sdig pa kun las zlog
392a5(rgyud 'bum): par 'gyur/ / 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi rtsa ba'i cho ga byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod phal po che theg pa chen po shin tu rgyas pa'i mdo las/ khro bo'i rgyal po gshin rje gshed kyi mngon

392a7(rgyud 'bum): ba 'khor de nyid du 'dus shing 'dug par 'gyur ba de stan las langs te/ sangs rgyas thams cad la phyag 'tshal nas 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su 'dug ste/ bcom ldan
392b1(rgyud 'bum): 'das shAkya thub pa la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas zhabs gnyis la btud de/ gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rje la bltas nas tshig 'di smras so// phyag na rdo rje gang khyod sems
392b2(rgyud 'bum): can thams cad la gnod par byed pa dang / 'dod pa dang ldan pa'i sngags dang rgyud bshad na/ kye rgyal ba'i sras byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis nges par chos 'di ni ma
392b3(rgyud 'bum): yin te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni gang gi phyir snying rje chen pos rab tu phye zhing // byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod cing sems can thams cad kyi don gyi phyir phan pa'i
392b4(rgyud 'bum): lhag pa'i bsam pa la rab tu zhugs na 'khor ba'i 'ching ba las grol bar 'gyur ro/ / kye rgyal ba'i sras gzhan yang sems cad la gnod par byed pa'i chos ston par byed pa ni dbazhin gshegs pa
392b5(rgyud 'bum): dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dang / / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis ni sems can thams cad kyi ched du gsungs pa ma yin te/ snying rje chen po dang ldan
392b6(rgyud 'bum): pa'i sems can thams cad la phan pa'i lhag pa'i bsam pa la rab tu zhugs pa yin no/ / de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rjes/ byang chub sems
392b7(rgyud 'bum): dpa' zhi ba'i blo gros la smras pa/ ji ltar khyod smra ba dang / ji ltar khyod rab tu ston pa de bzhin du/ zhi ba'i blo gros byang chub sems dpas bslab par bya/ de bzhin du bsgrub
393a1(rgyud 'bum): par bya/ ji ltar sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rdzu 'phrul chen po dang ldan pa de bzhin du bdag gis kyang bstan par bgyi'o// don dam par ni yang dag
393a2(rgyud 'bum): pa'i mtha' las yang dag pa'i mtha' la yang dag par brten nas chos kyi mtha' las grol ba thob par 'gyur ro/ / sems can mtha' ni bsam mi khyab// rnam par smin pa'ang bsam
393a3(rgyud 'bum): mi khyab/ / sangs rgyas chos kyang bsam mi khyab// byang chub spyod pa'ang bsam mi khyab// gdul ba'i sems can la brten nas// phan pa'i spyod pa bsam mi khyab// byang chub ses
393a4(rgyud 'bum): dpa'i spyod pa rnams/ / bsam mi khyab par yongs su bstan// rgyud rnams kun la rgyud 'di yi// mthu ni bsam mi khyab pa yin// gshin rje gshed ni bdag nyid che// khro bo'i
393a5(rgyud 'bum): rgyal po'i sngags dag dang / / yul gsum dag kyang bsam mi khyab// rtogs pa'i bdag nyid bsam mi khyab// zhi ba'i blo gros byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i spyod pa
393a6(rgyud 'bum): ni bsam gyis mi khyab ste/ chos kyi dbyings kyi rgyu mthun pa las byung ba'i sgrub pa'ang bsam gyis mi khyab bo// zhi ba'i blo gros byang chub sems dpa' sngags zlos pa na 'di ltar sems
393a7(rgyud 'bum): bskyed par bya ste/ 'phags pa ma yin pa'i sems can 'dod pa la lhag par chags pas bsod nams ma yin pa shin tu rab tu mang por 'phel bas dmyal ba chen por skye zhing / sems
393b1(rgyud 'bum): can 'di dag ni bsod nams kyi phung po shin tu mang po 'di 'phel bar mi 'gyur ro/ / sems can 'di dag byang chub rnam pa gsum gyis skal ba med par mi 'gyur bar bya ba'i phyir/ zhi ba'i
393b2(rgyud 'bum): blo gros de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sngags zlos pas sems nye bar gzhag par bya zhing / thabs mkhas pa 'di la mngon spyod kyi las rab tu sbyar bar bya'o// las thams cad la'ang /
393b3(rgyud 'bum): mtshan mar 'dzin par mi bya'o// mi dge bar 'dzin par mi bya zhing snying rjes brlan pa'i sems kyis sems can gdul ba'i thabs la'ang bslab par bya'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras gzhan yang
393b4(rgyud 'bum): chos dang / chos ma yin pa dang / dkar po dang / nag po dang / dge ba dang / mi dge ba dang / 'gro bo'i bdag nyid chen po sems can gdul ba'i thabs sgrub pa dang / chos
393b5(rgyud 'bum): kyi dbyings sgrub pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis rab tu rtogs par 'gyur te/ de nyid chos ston pas sems can smin pa'i thabs kyang rab tu sgrub par byed de// kye rgyal ba'i sras
393b6(rgyud 'bum): de bzhin du bdag cag gis bslab par bya zhing / 'di lta ste/ sems can gdul ba dang / sems can smin pa dang / bstan par bya ba'i phyir dang / de la rgyal ba'i sras
393b7(rgyud 'bum): khyed cag gang 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor 'dir dam tshig chen po la zhugs pa de thams cad kyis mnyan par bya/ dad par bya/ de nyid dge ba dang mi dge ba 'tshol ba nyid du bya ste/ 'di lta
394a1(rgyud 'bum): ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa chos ston pa la mngon par dga' bar bya'o// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhi ba'i blo gros kyi sa gnod sbyin
394a2(rgyud 'bum): gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rje la rnam par bltas nas cad mi smra bar gyur te/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams ni bsam gyis mi khyab bo zhes yid la byas na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
394a3(rgyud 'bum): la rnam par lta bzhin du rang gi stan la 'dug par gyur to/ / de nas gsang ba pa'i bdag po phyag na rdo rjes thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de la rnam par bltas nas khro bo'i rgyal po'i cho ga yang
394a4(rgyud 'bum): smras pa/ gang dag lha'i tshogs dang / sems can gyi khams la brten pa'i 'byung po'i tshogs khyad cag nyon cig/ dang po re zhig bsrung ba byas la khro bo'i rgyal po'i ras ris de yongs su
394a5(rgyud 'bum): blangs pa/ gnas dben par song nas dbang phyug chen po'i rtags gcig pa'i gnas su rtags de la dug dang / khrag dang / ske tshe dang / rang skyur gyis gtor la/ shing pi tsu mar
394a6(rgyud 'bum): d+ha'i me tog gis mchod cing mi'i rgyu ma rlon pa dag gis bdag nyid la mchod phyir thogs byas la/ mi'i mgo bo'i thod pa g.yas pa'i lag na thogs pas brdeg pa lta bur byas la/ lag pa
394a7(rgyud 'bum): g.yon pa'i sdigs mdzub kyis mtshon gcig pu la bsdigs pa bzhin du byed cing / gtser khro bo'i dbang du gyur pa dang / rgyal po ma rungs pas brnyas pa chen po'i sems kyis byas
394b1(rgyud 'bum): pa'am/ gzhan skyon can gyi skyes bu phyogs chen po dang ldan pa dang / nor chen po dang ldan pa dang / rab tu gtum po chen po dang / gtso bo chen po dag gis khyad du gsod par 'gyur na sgo bcad pa byas la/
394b2(rgyud 'bum): gcer bur byas shing skra bshig pas dbang phyug chen po'i mtshan la khro bo'i sngags ji srid dbang phyug chen po'i mtshar dkyil dugs par gyur pa de srid du bzlas pa bya'o// dum bu gnyis su gyur na/
394b3(rgyud 'bum): yi ge hUM gi sgra chen po'ang thos par gyur te/ de la 'jigs par yang mi bya'o// de thos pa'i dbang gis rgyal po ma rungs pa'am/ gzhan gang la la dpung chen po dang ldan pa'i dgra de'i mod
394b4(rgyud 'bum): la rims chen pos zin par 'gyur ba 'am/ srin po la sogs pa mi ma yin pas zin par 'gyur ro// de nyid du ji srid yud tsam du bzlas pa byas na de'i mod la dgra rnams kyis 'tsho ba ni mtha'
394b5(rgyud 'bum): mar 'chi bar 'gyur ro/ / gal te mtshan mo bzlas na ni gza' 'khor dang bcas pa 'jig par 'gyur ro// gzhan yang las su 'gyur ba ni de bzhin du dbang phyug chen po'i gnas su nyi ma phyed
394b6(rgyud 'bum): la song ste/ nim pa'i lo mas mchod cing sha chen po'i spos kyis bdugs la/ ji srid dgra'i khyim du mes 'tshig pa'i bar du bzlas pa byas na dgra'ang 'dar ba'i rims chen pos thebs par
394b7(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur ro/ / yang na khros pas bzlas pa ma btang zhing g.yas phyogs su rtags kyang yod na dgra de 'chi bar 'gyur zhing rigs brgyud 'jig par 'gyur ro// ci ste slar gso ba byed na ni rtags de chus
395a1(rgyud 'bum): phyir yang rab tu bkrus la shin tu bsil ba'i 'o mas khrus byas na slar yang sos par 'gyur ro/ / las gzhan yod de/ dbang phyug chen po'i mtshan g.yas
395a2(rgyud 'bum): phyogs su bzhag la/ po son ca'i shing dang tsher ma can gyi shing gis me rab tu sbar la/ shing ba kang ta ka'i yam shing la dug dang / khrag dang / ske tshal mngon par btags la
395a3(rgyud 'bum): stong rtsa brgyad kyi sbyin sreg byas na dgra thams cad nad chen pos thebs par 'gyur te/ las thams cad kyis kyang nus pa med par 'gyur ro// zhag gnyis pa la ni rims nang chen po dang /
395a4(rgyud 'bum): zug gzer chen pos thebs pa'am/ nad rnam pa sna tshogs sam/ mi ma yin pas zin cing mthar 'chi bar 'gyur ro// zhag gsum pa la grangs gsum gyis byas nas ni 'tsho ba
395a5(rgyud 'bum): thams cad kyis thams cad du 'dor bar 'gyur ro/ / de bzhin du lha thams cad dam/ lha mo thams cad dam/ 'byung po thams cad gang zhig gang gi lha la dad pa de rkang pas mnan
395a6(rgyud 'bum): pa'i las bya ba'am/ yang na de'i rgyu skar ram/ sngags sam/ ming dag la rkang pas mnan la las bya ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i rig pa ni ma gtogs te/ thams cad kyis
395a7(rgyud 'bum): kyang zhabs kyi bathe bong g.yon pa bzung ste las bya'i/ mnan par yang mi bya/ bsgom par yang mi bya'o// gang yang 'jig rten pa thams cad kyi sngags ni mnan nas las bya'o//
395b1(rgyud 'bum): khro bo'i rgyal po'i bzlas pa ma grub pa nyid kyang bzlas pa tsam kho nas las rnams byed par 'gyur/ sngags thams cad rnam par 'jig par 'gyur/ dgra thams cad 'joms par
395b2(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur/ sngags thams cad nus pa med par 'gyur ro// mdor na 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i sngags 'akyi tshogs kyang ji lta ji ltar rab tu sbyar ba de lta de ltar thams

395b5(rgyud 'bum): ni nyi ma phyed la dur khrod du song ste/ sreg pa'i ras mtshan gcig pa myung bar byas te mar ngo'i bcu bzhi la dur khrod kyi shing gis me rab tu sbar la/ du ga dang brag gis btags pa'i ske tshe sbyin
395b6(rgyud 'bum): sreg byas na de las ha ha zhes pa'i sgra sgrog cing yi dgas thams cad 'ong bar 'gyur na 'jigs par mi bya zhing / dgra la gnod pa gyis shig ces byas na de bzhin du bya'o zhes smra nas mi snang bar
395b7(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur ro/ / de nas yud tsam gyis dpag tshad stong du'ang song nas dgra rnams 'joms par byed cing rigs brgyud kyang rlag par byed do// de la sogs pa'i las mang po byed par 'gyur ro// gzhan
396a1(rgyud 'bum): yang las su 'gyur ba ni dben pa'i phyogs gtsang mar gos gtsang ma bgos te/ khang stong du rab tu zhugs nas mi'i rus pa'i sreg blugs kyis stong rtsa brgyad sbyin sreg bya
396a2(rgyud 'bum): sta/ de nas thal ba de lag pa gnyis kas blangs la gos gtsang ma'i dum bu la so sor bcings te zlum po gnyis su byas la/ kham phor kha sbyar gnyis kyi nang du so sor bzhag la bdag
396a3(rgyud 'bum): nyid bsrung ba chen po byas nas rdzas de blangs la/ khyim du slar zhugs nas mtshan mo dur khrod chen por song nas mar ngo'i bcu bzhi 'am tshes brgyad la ni bsregs pa'i sar bzhag cing / lho phyogs
396a4(rgyud 'bum): su bltas nas kham phor kha sbyar gnyis blangs la/ langs shing gcer bur byas te skrag shig pa khro ba dang bcas pas 'jigs pa med par byas te/ rig pa stong phrag bcus bzlas pa byas na
396a5(rgyud 'bum): thal ba de grub par 'gyur ro/ / mi gang su dag rdzas de slong bar gyur na sbyin par mi bya'o// gal te tshan khar slong bar byed na ni khro bo'i rgyal po dran nas yi ge hUM rab tu sngar ba byas te de'i mod la 'byor
396a6(rgyud 'bum): bar 'gyur ro/ / bgags thams cad rnam par 'joms pa'ang cho go 'di nyid do// lag pa g.yon pa dang g.yas pas blangs pa'i thal bas ni rtags mtshar bya zhing/ bag yod pas bsrung
396a7(rgyud 'bum): ba'ang byas la/ tho rangs nyi ma 'char ba'i dus su slar 'ong bar bya ba na khrus byas shing gtsang ba'i gos bgos te rang gi khyim du 'jug par bya ste/ rang gi gnas sam ji ltar 'dod par 'gro
396b1(rgyud 'bum): bar bya'o/ / de nas lag pa g.yas pa gang gis blangs pa'i thal ba des mi dang / rkang gnyis dang / rkang bzhi dang / srog chags 'byung po thams cad dang / lha dang bcas pa'i klu dang /

396b3(rgyud 'bum): pas blangs pa'i thal ba gang yin pa des mi rnams kyi lte ba'i phyogs sam/ pho mtshan gyi phyogs su gtor na grong pa'i chos sten pa la nus pa med par 'gyur ro// gang zhig bud med la

396b6(rgyud 'bum): skyes pa'i dbang po la lag pa g.yas pa'i thal ba'i phye mas gtor na de'ang gzhan gyi bud med la 'gro ba'i nus pa med par 'gyur te/ yongs su rnyed pa bzhin du de'i de nyid 'byung zhing gnas par

397a1(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur ba'o/ / yang na ni ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du byed de// gal te nar gyis byed na ni gsang ba'i phyogs su srid bu rnams rab tu 'byung bar 'gyur zhing / de dag
397a2(rgyud 'bum): gis zos pa na 'tshe ba'ang 'gags par 'gyur la/ zla ba gcig gi nang du rul bar 'gyur te/ dra mi zhim zhing ro myags pa 'dra bar 'gyur ro// gcin sri ba'i nang la sogs pa skyes

397a5(rgyud 'bum): 'am ma mthong ba la'ang mthun pa'i rlung dang sbar te thal ba gtor te/ de la thal ba cung zad kyang babs par gyur pa'am gtor bar byed pas yid kyis bsams te thal ba gtor na

397b7(rgyud 'bum): nas bud med mkha' 'gro ma ma rungs pa nga rgyal can thams cad la'ang sbyor ba bya ste/ gzhan la ni ma yin no// mthun pa'i rlung yod pa de nyid la gar sa nas bcom ldan 'das yid la
398a1(rgyud 'bum): bsams te thal ba gtor na mo mtshan dang du ma thams cad mi sdang bar 'gyur ro/ / skyes pa la'ang kha spu dang ba spu med pa dang / mo mtshar dang nu ma'ang rab tu
398a2(rgyud 'bum): 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ / de lta bu rnam pa mang po du ma'i las kyang byed pa'am/ gzhan byed du bcug par 'gyur ro// yang na gang dga' ba skye ba de byed du gzhug par 'gyur ro// bung
398a3(rgyud 'bum): ma da dam skyes pa gang la sems dga' ba skye ba de la thal ba de byir na ji lta 'dod pa'i las byed du bcug par 'gyur ro/ / spor ba'ang bslab par bya'o// de ltar nang chen po dag gis kyang

398a5(rgyud 'bum): bar 'gyur ro/ / de bzhin du mthar gyis snying gi bar du reg par byas na snying gi nad ngam lto ba'i nad 'byung bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin du rkang pa gnyis dang rje ngar gnyis la reg par byas
398a6(rgyud 'bum): na'ang khrag las byung ba'i nang khrag khrug pa la sogs pa'i nad kyis 'debs par byed par 'gyur ro/ / mdor na 'chi bar byed pa dang dbang du byed par yang 'gyur te/ ji lta ji ltar rab tu sbyar

398b1(rgyud 'bum): mkhar shir tu 'grod dka' ba dang nye ba mthun pa'i rlung yod par gnas par byas la/ lag pa gnyis kas thal ba de nyid blangs la yang dag par gtor na ra ba dang / sgo khang dang
398b2(rgyud 'bum): yang tog kyang rab tu ltung bar 'gyur te/ mkhar srung ba'ang ltung bar 'gyur zhing mes 'tshig pa chen po'ang 'byung bar ra'agyur/ dpung rnams kyang 'dzag par 'gyur/ rnam par 'tshe ba chen
398b3(rgyud 'bum): pos kyang nye bar 'tshe bar 'gyur/ thams cad bor nas rab tu 'byer bar yang 'gyur/ yang na skyabs su mngon par 'gro bar 'gyur/ de ltar gzhan gyi dpung la'ang mthur pa'i rlung yod pa'i
