460b7(rgyud 'bum): zhes kyang bstan/ / bud med gzugs 'chang lha mo ni// / 'gro ba kun tu rnam par rgyu// snying rjes 'dran pa'i sems kyis ni// sems can rnams la phan don du//
461a1(rgyud 'bum): mjed 'jig rten khams gnas nas// bud med ming gis 'jug par byed// sa bcu la ni rab gnas thob// byang chub sems dpa' rdzu 'phrul che//
461a2(rgyud 'bum): sems can rnams ni 'dul byed pa// lha mo sgrol ma zhes su bstan// 'di ni 'bad med grub pa ste// srung dang skyob dang sbed par byed// longs spyod dbang phyug 'phel byed pas//
461a3(rgyud 'bum): 'dis na lha mo bsgrub par bya// byang chub tshegs kyi ched du ni// skyes pa nyid nas brtsam par bya// snying rjes brlan pas lus chen la// de tshe lha mo rjes 'brang ba// sngags
461a4(rgyud 'bum): kyi gzugs kyi sems can la/ / byang chub tshogs ni bya phyir ro// re ba thams cad dga' rgyas phyir// shar gyi phyogs su gnas pa yin// bdag nyid rnam pa stong dang ni//
461a5(rgyud 'bum): rnam pa mang po byas nas kyang // rgya mtsho bzhi yi mthar thug par// sa rnams kun tu rnam par rgyu// de nas shar gyi phyogs su 'am// yang na wA rA NA sir 'grub/
461a6(rgyud 'bum): lha mo de yi zhing du ni// shar gyi phyogs su rab tu bstar// 'od chen po ni dzam+b+ha la// gnod sbyin rgyal po yang dag 'grub// de tshe longs spyod ma lus 'dod// de tshe dus kyi tha ma la//
461a7(rgyud 'bum): mo blol ma gnod sbyor rgyal// de nor rgyas pa 'dod pas sgrub// de mo bro bo'i sngags dag ni// lho phyogs dag tu bsgrub par bya// kla klo rkun ma'i gling dang ni// de bzhin rgya mtsho'i nang du
461b1(rgyud 'bum): ni/ / stobs chen sgrol ma gnod sbyin rgyal// de bzhin du yang 'grub par 'gyur// ha ri ke la kang dang tsa// ka ma ru pa ga dAhA yo ha// phog mo sogs rnam mang dang // gnod spyan
461b2(rgyud 'bum): rdzu 'phrul chen mo 'grub/ / 'jam pa'i dbyangs kyis gang gsungs sngags// longs spyod kyi ni rgyur 'gyur ba// de bzhin yul der grub pa ste// gzhan yul de bzhin pa yin no//
461b3(rgyud 'bum): shar phyogs dang ni phyogs mtshams su// rnam pa sna tshogs sngags kyi rgyur// de yi dus su bstan pa ni// lus can rnams kyis bsgrub par bya// dbus kyi yul du de bzhir sngags//
461b4(rgyud 'bum): de bzhin sa srungs mang po ni// rgya che thams cad nyam chung ba'i// blo chung rnams kyis rtogs par byed// rgyal po'i gtso bo mdor bsdus nas// ming ni 'di dag nges par brjod// dang
461b5(rgyud 'bum): po'i yi ge sha dang na/ / dang po'i yi ge par yang bstan// dang po'i yi ge ba dang i// dang po'i yi ge ar yang bstan// dang po'i yi gaM ha ra bstan te// dang po'i yi ge bar yang bsgrag/
461b6(rgyud 'bum): dang po'i yi ge dza dang wa// dang yig d+ha ni zla ba'i rigs// yi ge ha nyid rnam bsgrags dang // de bzhin yang ni dang po'i a// dang po'i yi ge sa la yang // bud med rigs min
461b7(rgyud 'bum): 'jig rten sdang / / dang po'i yi ge a dang ma// 'jig rten rnams la mthu dang ldan// rim gyis rim gyis rigs dag ni// bram ze rje'u rigs dag tu 'jug/ phal cher chos mon las
462a1(rgyud 'bum): byed cing / / rnam sdang bud med la brkam chags// sa srungs skyon ni rab mang bar// deng tshe dus kyi tha ma la// yul gyi dbus su mi yi bdag/ 'byung bar
462a2(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur bar the tsom med/ / dus kyi tha mar 'di dag tshe// lo ni brgya dang nyi shu nyid// de yi tshe na mi rnams kyi// tshe ni ring bar rab tu bstan// de dag bar ma bzang po las// khyad par
462a3(rgyud 'bum): ring dang thung ba yin/ / rgyal po rnams ni tshe thung bar// de tshe dus su bstan pa ni// gang+gA'i 'gram gyi ngogs dang ni// gangs can gyi ni ri zhol dang // de tshe ka ma ru yul du// de 'dra'i
462a4(rgyud 'bum): rgyal po 'byung bar 'gyur/ / dang po bar ma tha ma yi// rigs kyi lhag ma brjod bya ste// dang po'i gtso bo chen po ni// rna can rgyal por rab tu bsgrags// tha ma ang ga'i bdag po
462a5(rgyud 'bum): dang / / der ni 'byor bzang 'byor pa dang // legs byin srid pa byin pa ni// ka ma ru pa'i yul du byung // tha mar legs 'byor gzhon nu dang // yi ge ba dang tha gnyis ni// yangs pa
462a6(rgyud 'bum): can du yang dag byung / / gang du thub pa de skyes pa// ser skya zhes bya'i grong mchog tu// tha mar zas gtsang shA ka rigs kyi// nyi ma bu ram rigs skyes pa// tha mar zas gtsang rnam
462a7(rgyud 'bum): bsgrags pa/ / shAkya shAkya'i rnam 'phel byed// sems can brtson 'grus chung bar ni// 'jig rten skyes mchog bstan pa yin// gang zhig rgyal bas gsungs sngags dang /
462b1(rgyud 'bum): de bzhin bran po'i tshogs kun dang // pho nya'i tshogs kun du ma dang // rdo rje pad+ma'i rigs dag kyang // rgyud rnams kun gyi don rig pas// bsgrubs ma grub par 'gyur ba yin// 'jig
462b2(rgyud 'bum): rten kun gyi sngags dag ni/ / yul gyi dbus der 'grub par 'gyur// dbus yul gnas par byung bar du// rgyal bas gsungs par 'asgrub par bya// rnam pa sna tshogs rtags dang ni//
462b3(rgyud 'bum): rnam pa sna tshogs rgyud dag dang // rnam pa sna tshogs sbyor bar ldan// lus can rnam pa sna tshogs 'grub// dbus kyi yul du de bzhin sngags// longs spyod 'phel ba bsgrub par
462b4(rgyud 'bum): bya/ / de bzhin lus can srung don dang // skyob dang dbang dang dgug pa 'grub// dbus kyi yul du ma yi bdag/ 'das dang ma 'ongs rab tu gsungs// rnam pa sna tshogs rtags
462b5(rgyud 'bum): dang ni/ / rnam pa sna tshogs tshe dang rigs// rgyal po thams cad gsungs pa ni// mchog dang tha ma bar ma yin// de bzhin rnam gsum grub pa ste// dus kyang gsum du sbyar bar bya//
462b6(rgyud 'bum): de bzhin sngags kyang rnam gsum du// de bzhin thub pa mchog gis gsungs// rgyal po mtha' yas gsungs pa ni// dbus kyi yul dang nub phyogs dang // byang phyogs dang ni shar
462b7(rgyud 'bum): phyogs dang / / de bzhin phyogs mtshams thams cad dang // rnam pa bzhi ru mtshon pa yi// gling dag de bzhin kun tu yang // sa bdag mtha' yas rab gsungs pa// mtha' yas
463a1(rgyud 'bum): sngags ni sgrub pa dang / / mtha' yas yul la gnas pa dag/ mtha' yas sngags ni yongs su grub// thub pa'i bstan pa nub pa na// tshar gcad rjes su
463a2(rgyud 'bum): gzung bar byas/ / dus su rgyal po dag la sngags// 'jam dpal gyis ni gsungs pa yin// rdzu 'phrul rtse dang rnam 'phrul dang // 'dir ni dus kyi spyod pa'ang bstan//
463a3(rgyud 'bum): sngags kyi bdag nyid sems can gyi// 'gro ba skye gnas rgyal po'i ming // sngags ni sgrub par 'dod rnams la// yul dang dus ni yang dag bstan// bstan pa nub pa'i 'og tu
463a4(rgyud 'bum): ni/ zhar la rgyal po rnams kyis bstan// yon tan bdag nyid che sngags rnams// tha mar 'bras bu rtogs par byas// rgyal po gzhan ni theg pa dang // sngon ni 'gal ba med
463a5(rgyud 'bum): par bstan/ / dus kyi tha ma de dus su// rab tu gnas par the tsom mang // de dag phyogs la gnas par ni// rgyal po thams cad gsungs pa yin// de bzhin shAkya'i gsungs rab
463a6(rgyud 'bum): la/ nges par rab byung gnas nas ni// 'jig rten mig gcig gyur pa yi// thub pa mchog ni med pa na// rtag tu sngags smra la dad pas// bstan pa'i don ni byed par 'gyur//
463a7(rgyud 'bum): de dag gzhon nu bshad par bya// rtse gcig yid kyis mnyan par gyis// ston pa'i gsung rab sa stang du// dus mtha' 'jig rten nyams pa na// sdom brtson rgyal po'i tshul gyis
463b1(rgyud 'bum): ni/ / 'byung bar 'gyur bar the tsom med// dper na ma khol zhes bya dang // me tog ces byams par grags// yi ge ma zhes gzhon nu zhes// dang po tha mar chos la dga'//
463b2(rgyud 'bum): klus bos zhes kyang rnam par grags// rin chen 'byung zhes bya ming dang // yi ge ga zhes gzhon nu zhes// yi ge ba zhes chos sems byed// yi ge a ming bdag nyid che// ston pa'i
463b3(rgyud 'bum): bstan pa gces 'dzin byed/ / blo ldan yon tan kun gyis bkur// dang po'i yi ge la zhes bstan// rgyal po sangs rgyas pa yi phyogs// ston pa'i bstan pa gsal bar byed//
463b4(rgyud 'bum): sdom brtson yi ge a zhes bsgrags// bram ze las ni rab tu byung // grong khyer gnas bcas gnas pa ste// de bzhir tshe ni brgyad cur 'tsho// dang yig yi ge a dge slong //
463b5(rgyud 'bum): lho yi phyogs su 'byung bar 'gyur// blo ldan tshe ni drug cur 'tshe// ka shi zhes bya'i grong du gnas// yi ge d+ha zhes sdom brtson nyid// lho yi phyogs su rnam par bsgrags//
463b6(rgyud 'bum): pha rol rgol ba bzlog nas kyang // de bzhin sdom brtson sngags kyang grub// gzhan yang rab byung dam pa ni// sing g+ha la yi grong na gnas// 'phags pa min la 'phags
463b7(rgyud 'bum): pa'i ming / / sing g+ha la yi gling na gnas// pha rol rgol ba bzlog nas ni// mu stegs rnams kyis sngags sun phyung // de dus 'jigs su rung ba yi// dus kyi mtha'/
464a1(rgyud 'bum): la 'byung bar 'gyur// yi ge da dang la dang por// sdom brtson gang zhig rab gsungs dang // yi ge ra dang ba dang por// dge slong gang zhig rab byung gsungs//
464a2(rgyud 'bum): ston pa'i bstan pa gsal byed pa// 'byung bar 'gyur bar the tsom med// rgyal po nag po zhes bya bar// yi ge ma zhes sdom brtson 'byung // mchod rten kun dga' ra ba gnas//
464a3(rgyud 'bum): rdzing dang khron pa'ang thams cad du// ston pa'i gzugs brnyan de bzhin rtags// gzings dang zam pa nyid rnams ni// byed par 'gyur bar the tsom med// mtshon gyis
464a4(rgyud 'bum): lus zhig mtho ris 'gro/ / de nas yi ge sa dang ka/ dang po dag tu brjod pa dang // de bzhin yi ge ra dang g+ha// dang po dag tu rab brjod dang // dang por yi ge ba dang ni//
464a5(rgyud 'bum): legs bzhin legs te sde zhes bstan// sbyin byed sbyin par byed pa nyid// gzhan gyi grub mtha' sun byed pa// tshong pa sngon dang sman pa sngon// gnyis ka sbyin byed sna tshogs byed//
464a6(rgyud 'bum): yi ge ba zhes sdom brtson bsgrags// de las gzhan pa dang yi ga ra// dang po yi ge ba grags dang // ston pa'i gzugs brnyan don yang byed// blo ldan dang por yi ge ma//
464a7(rgyud 'bum): bzhin sdom brtson dang par 'byung // rnam pa du ma sdom brtson gsungs// de tshe mtha' yas 'byung bar 'gyur// sdom brtson thams cad bsgrags pa yang // ston pa'i bstan pa
464b1(rgyud 'bum): gsal byed pa'o/ / bstan pa de chos steng du// rnam par nyams shing snang med la// ston pa'i gzugs brnyan yid du 'ong // byed par 'gyur bar the tsom med// thams cad byang
464b2(rgyud 'bum): chub lung bstan te/ / nga yi byang chub mchog thob 'gyur// de bzhin 'jig rten sbyin gnas 'gyur// srid pa gsum gyi mthar yang byed// sngags dang rgyud la mngon brtson pas//
464b3(rgyud 'bum): grags pa 'dzin par shes par bya// bram ze'i chos kyi ngang tshul can// da ni rab tu brjod par bya// sngags dang rgyud la mngon brtson pas// rgyal po'i lugs la nye bar gnas//
464b4(rgyud 'bum): de tshe mi bzad dus dag tu// 'jig rten kun la 'byung bar 'gyur// yi ge ba zhes bram ze mchog/ phyug cing rig byed pha rol phyin// de 'dir sa rnams ma lus par//
464b5(rgyud 'bum): rtsod pa'i phyir ni rab tu rgyu// mtsho gsum sa yi mthar thug par// pha rol mu stegs rtsod la dga'// gang phyir dang po gtso bo'i tshig/ sems can rnams la phan 'dod pas//
464b6(rgyud 'bum): gzhon nus yongs su gsungs gyur pa// yi ge drug pa'i sngags kyang zlos// cho ga rab 'byams 'di dag las// des ni de phan de la bstan// rgyal dang legs par rgyal
464b7(rgyud 'bum): ba dang / / grags ldan dge la bde las gzhan// rigs ldan chos dang ldan pa dang // bcon ldan legs pa khyab 'jug dang // sbrang rtsi sbrang ci bzang po dang // de bzhin
465a1(rgyud 'bum): grub dang dregs bral dang / / ra zla ba dang dmangs rigs dang // de bzhin ka shir skyes pa gzhan// gzhon nu 'di yi bzlas pa la// thams cad kur
465a2(rgyud 'bum): yang 'byung bar 'gyur/ / de dag kun kyang bzang po ste// blo ldan mang du thos pa yin// de kun sngags ni sngon du gyur// rgyal po'i 'tshe bas yang dag gnas// de 'og rnam
465a3(rgyud 'bum): par grags pa ni/ / bram ze dang po'i yi ge bi// grong khyer me tog ces bya bar// de ni khro bo grub par gyur// dbul bas yongs su zil mnan pa// rgyal po rnams ni tshar
465a4(rgyud 'bum): bcad byas/ / khro rgyal gshing rje gshed de yi// 'jam pa'i dpyas kyis 'dir gsungs pa// sems can ma rungs rnams dang ni// gdul dka' 'dul bar byed pa dang //
465a5(rgyud 'bum): phan pa min las bzlog don dang // phan pa nye bar 'phel phyir dang // sems can rnams ni rjes gzung dang // sems can srog 'chad dgag phyir ro// bram ze'i khye'u rmongs pa de//
465a6(rgyud 'bum): dbul ba khro ba chags pa yis// rgyal po'i srog la gnod pa'i phyir// khro bo sngags ni zlos par byed// de 'og rnam par grags pa ni// bram ze yi ge dang po a// chos don dge
465a7(rgyud 'bum): ba ldan bdag nyid/ / bden par smra zhing dbang po thul// mnga' bdag mang pos bkur ces pa// de tshe sngags ni zlos par 'gyur// sngags ri sgrub par gyur pa la// dbang 'gyur
465b1(rgyud 'bum): yin gyi gzhan ma yin/ / 'byung po dbang du gyur pa na// de tshe nor dang ldan par 'gyur// de 'og rnam par grags pa ni// bram ze chos don sems byed pa// de nas mthar ni dang
465b2(rgyud 'bum): yig sha/ / ma la'i yul du de ni 'byung // sa steng sngags ni zlos par grags// bstan pa mchod la'ang rab tu dang // rig pa rjes gzung ma rungs dang // tshangs pa'i srin po srin po
465b3(rgyud 'bum): dang / / 'byung po shin tu ma rungs bcas// rnam pa sna tshogs sha za dang // brtan dang 'gro ba sna tshogs ni// de dag ma lus dbang du 'gyur// de bzhin bram ze'i mtshan ldan pa//
465b4(rgyud 'bum): thams cad de yi dbang du 'gyur// de 'og rnam par grags pa ni// lho yi phyogs su bram ze ni// yi ge dang po pa bstan pa// ston pa'i bstan pa de gtso byed// mchod rten kun dga' ra
465b5(rgyud 'bum): ba gnas/ / ston pa'i gzugs brnyan yid 'ong gis// sa ni rgya mtsho gnyis mthar thug/ thams cad kyi ni rgyan du byas// de 'og rnam par grags pa ni// bram ze gtso bo nor chen ldan// /
465b6(rgyud 'bum): dang po'i yi ge na zhes pa// lho yi phyogs su yang dag brten// bdag nyid chen po sngags zlos ldan// nges par byang chub gzhol bar 'gyur// dbus kyi yul du bstan pa ni// bram
465b7(rgyud 'bum): ze gang ba bzang zhes pa/ / 'dul ba dang ni tshul bzang nyid// gang ba bcom brlag dag tu gnas// dang yig d+ha ni nor gyi spun// rgyal po rnams kyi sngags mchod byed// bram
466a1(rgyud 'bum): ze 'di dag bstan pa ni/ / ston pa'i bstad pa mchod byed pa'o// thog ma par mtha' gtso bo ste// rnam pa snga tshogs gnas dang rigs// sna tshogs phyogs
466a2(rgyud 'bum): kyi bram ze rnams/ / bram ze gzhar gyis mched par byed// mu stegs sna tshogs rigs dang ni// rnam pa sna tshogs spyod yul spyod// gnas ni kun tu gsungs pa ste// bram ze'i
466a3(rgyud 'bum): khye'u mang thos yin/ / rang byung sangs rgyas chos kyi rgyal// sems can kun gyi don sgrub pa// sems can rnams ni me lus dang // lha gnas kyis kyang mchod pa'o// rgyal po chen
466a4(rgyud 'bum): po bzhi po yang / / 'jig rten kun la grags pa ste// 'phags skyes po dang mig mi bzang // yul 'khor srung dang gnod sbyir rgyal// brgya byin de nas lha rnams kyis// nges
466a5(rgyud 'bum): pa'i cher ni rab tu bsgrags/ / 'thab bral lha yi bu dang ni// 'phrul dga' gzhan 'phrul dbang byed dang // rgyal po dga' ldan gsungs pa dang // 'dod pa'i khams kyi dbang phyug
466a6(rgyud 'bum): mchog/ gcig gi ming ni brgya byin sogs// de bzhin 'dod khams dbang phyug yin// de yang rtag tu gcig gnas te// rdzu 'phrul chen po gcig gi gzugs// de yang mtha'
466a7(rgyud 'bum): yas dag tu bstan/ / rnam pa sna tshogs gzugs 'chang lha// de las gong du thams cad mnyam// de yang thams cad rdzu 'phrul che// lha yi gtso bo ming gcig ste// 'du
466b1(rgyud 'bum): shes med pa'i mtha' yang bsgyur/ / de dag gtso bo med pa ste// mnyam pa'i tshul du yang dag gnas// 'og tu mnar med mthar thug par// der ni rgyal po yod ma yin// 'jam
466b2(rgyud 'bum): dpal de lta bas na de ltar phyi ma'i tshe phyi ma'i dus su rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la las de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi chos kyi mdzod 'di glegs bam du chud par byas te 'dri
466b3(rgyud 'bum): bar 'gyur/ klog par 'gyur/ kha ton du byed par 'gyur ba 'am/ glegs bam du byas te 'chang bar 'gyur/ gus par byas te yid la byas par 'gyur/ gos rnam pa
466b4(rgyud 'bum): sna tshogs dang / phye ma dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / dril bu dang / rol mo dang / 'phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / spos dang / dri
466b5(rgyud 'bum): dang / dri zhim po dag gi mchod par byed par 'gyur/ ri mor byed par 'gyur/ yang dag par 'dzin par byed par 'gyur/ yid rtse gcig pa'i sems kyis chos byed par 'gyur ba de
466b6(rgyud 'bum): la ni phan yon bcu po 'di dag tu 'gyur te/ bcu gang zhe na/ der 'di la pha rol dmag tshogs kyi 'jigs pa 'byung bar mi 'gyur/ char 'bab pa mi mkhas pa dang / gza'
466b7(rgyud 'bum): dang / 'chi ba chen po'i 'jigs pa 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro// mi ma yin pa'i 'jigs pa 'am/ der 'di la me'i 'jigs pa 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro// phyir rgol ba
467a1(rgyud 'bum): thams cad kyi 'jigs pa 'am/ der 'di la nad kyi 'jigs pa 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro// dus ma yin par 'chi ba'i 'jigs pa 'am/ der 'di la dus ma
467a2(rgyud 'bum): yin pa'i char gyi 'jigs pa 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/ / char ches pa'i 'jigs pa 'am/ der 'di la rlung chen po'i dkyil 'khor gyi 'jigs pa 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro// sha za thams
467a3(rgyud 'bum): cad kyi 'jigs pa 'am/ der 'di la dgra'i 'jigs pa 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro// de bzhin du g.yon cad rkun po'i 'jigs pa 'am/ der 'di la 'chi ba'i 'jigs pa 'byung bar
467a4(rgyud 'bum): mi 'gyur ro/ / gshin rje'i rgyal pos khyer ba'i 'jigs pa 'am/ der 'di la chom rkun gyi 'jigs pa 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro// lha thams cad dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin
467a5(rgyud 'bum): dang / dri za'i 'jigs pa 'am/ der 'di la gzhan gyi sngags kyi 'jigs pa 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro// sbyar ba'i dug thams cad kyi 'jigs pa 'am/ der 'di la nad kyi
467a6(rgyud 'bum): 'jigs pa dang / rims dang / tshad par 'khru ba dang / ma zhu ba dang / yan lag dang nying lag gi 'jigs pa 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/ phan yon bcu po 'di dag tu shes par
467a7(rgyud 'bum): bya'o/ / gang du de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis cho ga chen po rab 'byams chos kyi mdzod 'di glegs bam du byas te bzhag la/ 'dri ba dang / klog pa dang / mchod pa dang
467b1(rgyud 'bum): 'dzin pa dang / kha ton du byed na de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis shin tu bzung zhing chos kyi mdzod mngon du 'gyur ro// dam tshig gi spyod pa la rjes su ma zhugs pa dang / dam tshig
467b2(rgyud 'bum): mi shes pa gzhar dag la ni rnam pa thams cad du bstan par mi bya ste/ gang gi phyir 'di ni gsang ba yin pa'i phyir te/ 'dis ni thams cad mtshon pa yin na sems can rnams kyis
467b3(rgyud 'bum): dran pa med par ma byed cig/ 'on kyang khyod kyis shes par 'gyur/ mchod pa byed par 'gyur/ yang dag par 'dzin par 'gyur zhing / bsod nams chen po'ang rab tu skye bar
467b4(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur ro/ / sems cad skal ba med pa rnams la bstan par mi bya ste/ gzhan du na dbul ba dang / nang dang / mdze dang / 'tshe ba dang / 'go ba'i rang nyid byed par 'gyur
467b5(rgyud 'bum): ro/ / de bas na gzhan dag la'ang bstan par mi bya'o// dam tshig dang / gsang ba dang / gsang ba'i sngags kyi spyod pa la rjes su zhugs pa'i sems can rnams dang
467b6(rgyud 'bum): bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa la legs par bslabs pa rnams dang / legs par rnam par bzhag pa'i dran pa dang ldan pa rnams dang / chos kyi don la mkhas pa dang / bsam
467b7(rgyud 'bum): gtan la rab tu zhugs pa dang / chos la gnas pa dang / bden par smra ba dang / sems can gyi spyod pa la rab tu gnas shing snying rje'i spyod pa dang rab tu ldan pa rnams te/ sems/
468a1(rgyud 'bum): can 'di dag la bstan par bya yi/ gzhan dag la ni ma yin no// de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa stan las langs te bla gos phrag
468a2(rgyud 'bum): pa gcig tu gzar nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te thal mo sbyar ba byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam
468a3(rgyud 'bum): grangs 'di'i mo nga ci zhes bya/ / 'di dag gis ji ltar gzung bar gyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi rnam par 'phrul pa byang chub sems
468a4(rgyud 'bum): dpa'i sde snod ces bya bar yang zung zhig/ ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i chos kyi man ngag legs par bstan pa'i le'u zhes bya bar yang zung zhig/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i rjes su
468a5(rgyud 'bum): 'jug pa rgyud thams cad kyi mdzod ces bya bar yang zung zhig/ theg pa chen po shin tu rgyas pa nges par bstan pa nyams pa med pa zhes bya bar yang zung zhig/ byang chub sems dpa'i
468a6(rgyud 'bum): sde snod ces bya bar yang zung zhig/ 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi rtsa ba'i cho ga zhes bya bar yang zung zhig/ chos thams cad kyi don rdzogs pa nges par bstan pa zhes bya bar yang
468a7(rgyud 'bum): zung zhig/ 'jig rten ma lus thams cad la// chos dang chos mir rnam spong cing // byang chub sems dpa' rdzu 'phrul che// gang khyod kun tu rnam par rgyu// de bzhin chos kyi dam pa
468b1(rgyud 'bum): pa mchog/ gsang ba gzhan ni ma mthong ngo // sngags rgyud don dang mdo rnams dang // 'gro ba yul ni skyon med pa// byang chub chos la rab gzhol ba// dpa' bo gzhan ni ma mthong ngo //
468b2(rgyud 'bum): gang 'di bla ma gsang ba dang // dang don mdo yis yongs su brgyan// rnam pa sna tshogs mdo don dang // sngags dang rgyud kyi rjes 'jug pa// cho ga rab 'byams 'di las gzhan// ma byung gang yang yod ma
468b3(rgyud 'bum): yin/ / rgyal srid chen po longs spyod che// lha gnas dag tu phun sum tshogs// de bzhin lha dang mi rnams kyi// grags pa rgyas pa'ang thob par 'gyur// mi khom brgyad ni spong byed cing // dal ba dag ni thob
468b4(rgyud 'bum): par byed/ / theg pa rnam gsum bdag po dang // de nges sangs rgyas nyid thob 'gyur// mdo 'di 'dzin pa'i bsod rnams dang // de bzhin du ni phan yon no// 'di yi lus la mtshon mi
468b5(rgyud 'bum): 'byung / / dug dang mes kyang ma yin no// ro langs dang ni gdon da ni// de bzhin srul po ma mo dang // srin po sha zas 'tshe byed pa'ang // gang zhig mdo 'di 'don la min// 'chang ba
468b6(rgyud 'bum): dang ni klog pa dang / / yang dang yang du mchod byed dang // 'jigs pa med pas mchod byed dang // rnam pa sna tshogs mchod byed de// phan yon 'di ni rab bstan pa// 'jig rten 'dir ni
468b7(rgyud 'bum): thob 'gyur ba/ / nad pa rnams ni nad las grol// sdug bsngal can ni bde bar 'gyur// dbul pos nor ni rnyed 'gyur te// bcings pa rnams ni 'ching las grol// 'gro ba lnga dang
469a1(rgyud 'bum): ldan pa yi/ / 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal ltung ba rnams// bde ba ni pa mya ngan 'das// mi g.yo go'ang thob par 'gyur// rgyal sangs rgyas nyid dang ni// 1
469a2(rgyud 'bum): thos mthar ni phyin par 'gyur/ / mdo sde 'di ni bklags pa yis// sangs rgyas sku mdog thob par 'gyur// gang+gA'i bye ma mnyam pa yi// rgyal ba mchog ni mtha' yas pa//
469a3(rgyud 'bum): mchod pa thob pa'i bsod nams dang // mdo 'di bton pa'i bsod nams mnyam// 'jig rten ji snyed gang su dag/ zhing ni bye ba mtha' yas pa// de srid phra rab rdul snyed kyi//
469a4(rgyud 'bum): sangs rgyas rnams la rtag mchod pa// rnam pa sna tshogs bza' btung dang // na ba rnams kyi gsos sman dang // rnam pa sna tshogs gnas mal rnams// rtag tu thams cad
469a5(rgyud 'bum): rab sbyin dang / / rnam pa sna tshogs gos dang ni// phye ma dag ni kun gyis kyang // bsod nams skye bos thob gang yin// 'di dag 'chang dang klog pas so// gang zhig rang sangs
469a6(rgyud 'bum): rgyas rnams dang / / 'jig rten nyan thos rdzu 'phrul che// byang chub sems dpa' bdag nyid che// sa bcu la gnas de las gzhan// de rnams tshad ni de mnyam la// de dag
469a7(rgyud 'bum): mchod pa'ang de bzhin te/ / gang gi lag pa glegs bam chud// mi yis de mnyam bsod nams thob// 'jig rten ji snyed bstan pa yang // 'jig rten khams na gnas pa
469b1(rgyud 'bum): yi/ / grangs med sems can ma lus pa// thams cad nad ni med byas te// skye bo gang zhig yang dang yang // bkur stir byas nas de mchod pa// chos mchog 'di la mchod na
469b2(rgyud 'bum): ni/ / blo ldan de yis bsod nams thob// bskal pa bye ba mtha' yas par// rgyal ba mchog gis rtag par yang // 'jig rten mgon chos mdzad mchog 'di// mchod par yang
469b3(rgyud 'bum): ni mi nus so/ / chos mchog 'di ni sa steng du// yid bzhin nor bu rin chen 'dra// 'jam dpal cho ga 'dir gsungs pa// klog pa dang ni 'chad pa yis// des ni 'dod 'jo'i
469b4(rgyud 'bum): bab 'drar 'gyur/ / longs spyod che ner phun sum tshogs// yid ni skyo ba med byas nas// sa stengs 'di ni rab tu sgrub// sngags dang rgyud don drang ba'i don// don yod tshig ni rab
469b5(rgyud 'bum): bshad pa/ / bya ba dus la brten nas ni// sa steng rig pa 'dzin sgrub ni// rin chen phun tshegs rab gang ba// de yi phyogs kun dag tu gsungs// 'bras bcas 'gro ba'i bdag
469b6(rgyud 'bum): nyid che/ / spyod pa bzang bar brjod pa yin// gang zhig rog mchog 'di las// rgyal po sngags gcig 'chang byed pa// rgyal srid phun tshogs 'dod bcas te// tshe ring phur
469b7(rgyud 'bum): sum tshogs por 'gyur/ / rnam pa sna tshogs longs spyod tshogs// rgyal mchog dam pas thob par 'gyur// 'gro dang gnas pa'i dug dag dang // gzhan gyis byas pa'i rig pa dang //
470a1(rgyud 'bum): ro langs sngags kyi sgrub pa dang // mtshon gyis kyang ni gnod mi 'gyur// gzhan gyis gnod byed gtsor byed pas// sa stengs 'jig rten gnod mi byed// chom
470a2(rgyud 'bum): rkun nad ni gzhan dag dang / / me yi 'jigs pa de la med// rgyal po skyes po dag kyang rung // su zhig de la mchod mi byed// gang zhig mdo sde dkon mchog 'di// 'chang dang klog
470a3(rgyud 'bum): pa'ang de bzhin no/ / rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bo nas// dbang bskur yul du nyer gnas tshe// mdo sde mgo la nges bcings nas// yang dang yang du phyag 'tshal na// de la rkun pos mo
470a4(rgyud 'bum): gnod cing / / mtshon gyis de la 'phog mi 'gyur// gzhon nu'i gzugs su yang dag byung // rma bya'i gdan la legs bkod pa// glang po'i 'tshogs ma'i steng bzhag nas//
470a5(rgyud 'bum): g.yul du yang dag zhugs byas na// skye bo rnam sdang de dag kun// mthong ba tsam gyis ldog par byed// byis pa'i gzugs can bzang po ni// gzhon nu rgyal gyis yongs su brgyan// /
470a6(rgyud 'bum): gser dang dngul dang ra gan gyis// rgyal mtshan yu ba bsgreng ba la// de yi tshe na 'jug par bya// rgyal mtshan ba dan btags nas ni// legs dgod legs par mnyam par bzhag/
470a7(rgyud 'bum): g.yul du dgras ni legs gang ba// mtshon cha sna tshogs thogs byed pa// thams cad g.yul du 'dus pa las// de yi tshe na 'jug par bya// rgyal mtshan bsgreng la gnas pa yi//
470b1(rgyud 'bum): gzhon nu las ni sna tshogs pas// rnam pa du ma'i gzugs dang ldan// bdag nyid chen po 'jam pa'i dbyangs// sa bcu'i bdag po'i bdag po ni// mthong ba tsam gyis 'jigs
470b2(rgyud 'bum): par byed/ / rgyal rigs rgyal po chen po ni// 'jig rten sa srungs sa gnas pa// dad ldan yid gnyis the tsom ni// rnam bral chos la mnyes gshin pa// bde bar gshegs la dad
470b3(rgyud 'bum): bskyed nas/ / snying rjes brlan pa'i yid kyis ni// 'dir bshad 'di dag bya ba ni// grub par 'dod pas rab tu byas// cho ga'i sbyor ba'i sngags dang ni// rgyud dang ldan pa sa stang du//
470b4(rgyud 'bum): chos dbyings tshogs pa'i rgyal ba yis// gsung rab 'di dag nges par bstan// chos kyi dbyings dang mnyam gnas pa'i// rgyal mchog snga ma grangs med pas// sa yi steng gi mi
470b5(rgyud 'bum): rnams la'ang / / chos kyi mdzod ni gsungs pa yin// lha dang lha min sngon yul 'thab// pha rol 'jigs pa byung ba na// gang tshe brgya byin sngon gyur pa// dpung ni pham byas zhe
470b6(rgyud 'bum): sdang bas/ / de tshe gcig tu song nas ni// sa steng rnam par du bar gyur// rgyal mchog 'od srungs de la ni// thub pa mchog la de tshe zhus// ji ltar bya zhes tshig tu ni// ba de sogs
470b7(rgyud 'bum): bdag pos rnam par smras/ / mi bzang lha min gyis pham nas// bdag kyang 'dir ni yang dag lhags// de skad bcom ldan gsol nas ni// lha yi dbang po brgya byin gyis// de
471a1(rgyud 'bum): thub mchog zhabs gnyis la/ / spyi bo'i gtsug gis rab btud nas// mig stong ko'u shi ka ni// de yi spyan sngar 'dug par gyur// de skad gsol nas
471a2(rgyud 'bum): thub mchog ni/ / bram zer gyur pa 'od srungs kyis// de tshe gsung du bka' stsal pa// ka la bing ka'i sgra skad du// rgyal ba mchog gis sngon gsungs pa// gzhon nu sna tshogs
471a3(rgyud 'bum): yang dag 'byung / / bdag nyid chen po 'jam dpal ni// rnyed dka' sku ni 'bum gyur pa// yang dang mtha' la gnas de ni// zab mo'i don gyi don ston byed// spros med rnam pa med
471a4(rgyud 'bum): pa dang / / gnas med pa la gzugs byas nas// shin tu don ldan chos kyang ston// lha yi dbang phyug de ni dran// de nas de ni de dran pas// byang chub sems dpa' dran tsam gyis//
471a5(rgyud 'bum): gzhon nu sna tshogs gzugs can ni// der ni de yi mod la lhags// der ni bcom ldan 'das dang ni// bcom ldan lha yi dbang phyug bcas// lhags nas byang chub sems
471a6(rgyud 'bum): dpa' des/ / de tshe rgyal ba mchog la bcud// rgyal ba mchog kun phyag 'tshal nas// 'od cheran 'od srungs la yang btud// de tshe thub pas rjes gnang nas// sngags kyi tshig ni
471a7(rgyud 'bum): / 'di smras so// na maHsarba bud d+ha bo d+hi sa te b+h+yaH/ a pra ti ha ta shA sa ni b+h+yaHoM ha na ha na/ sarba b+ha yod sA dA ya tA sA ya/ mo Ta ya/ tshit+ta/ d+han+ta/ dz+wa la dzA la hUM hUM phaT phaT swA hA/ byang chub sems
471b1(rgyud 'bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas sngags 'di smras ma thag tu sa chen po 'di ri dang rgya mtsho'i mthar thug pa dang bcas pa rnam pa drug tu g.yos te/ sangs rgyas
471b2(rgyud 'bum): bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyi zhing mtha' yas pa 'jig rten gyi khams kyi phyogs kyi mthar thug pa thams cad dang bcas pa'ang rab tu 'gul bar gyur to/ / sangs rgyas bcom
471b3(rgyud 'bum): ldan 'das thams cad kyis kyang sngags kyi tshig 'di dag byin gyis brlabs so/ / de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin 'jigs pa dang bral nas pa spu langs te ngo mtshar rmad du byung thob nas/
471b4(rgyud 'bum): mig gnyis phye ste stan las langs nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la btud nas lan gsum bskor ba byas shing / 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la mngon du bltas
471b5(rgyud 'bum): nas sngags kyi tshig de dag bzung ste yid la byas nas phyir yang shing rta la zhon nas lha ma yin ga pa yin pade legs su phyir par gyur to/ / de nas lha ma yin thams cad rgya mtsho chen po'i mtha'i
471b6(rgyud 'bum): 'gram du gang rang gi grong khyer gang yin pa der mngon du phyogs shing song bar gyur te/ sems zhum zhing nyams la dpung gi 'jigs pas sems dkrugs shing gdong gi mdog
471b7(rgyud 'bum): nyams shing nga rgyal dang dregs pa la sogs pa dang bral bar gyur la/ mtshon cha dang bral zhing ri 'bigs byed 'bar ba bzhin du lha'i dbang phyug de mthong nas byer bar gyur to// de
472a1(rgyud 'bum): nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/ sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams la smras pa/ grogs po dag ma 'jigs shig ma 'jigs shig/ sangs rgyas kyi mthus
472a2(rgyud 'bum): lha ma yin las bdag cag nges par rgyal bas rang gi gnas su 'gro bar bya'o/ / rang rang gi gnas ji lta ba bzhin du song nas khyed cag rtse ba dang dga' ba yongs su spyod par gyis shig/
472a3(rgyud 'bum): de nas lha de dag thams cad yid shin tu dga' nas phyir yang rang gi gnas su log par gyur to// de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin 'di snyam du sems par gyur te/ gang
472a4(rgyud 'bum): bdag gis gzhon nu'i gzugs can gyi gzugs brnyan gyi rnam pa de byas la rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo la'ang btags na/ des ni gong gi lha ma yin gyi 'jigs pa mi 'byung ngo ngo/
472a5(rgyud 'bum): zhes bstan to// de nas/ lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis chen po la 'os pa'i nor bu rin po che nang 'od dang ldan zhing gsal ba'i 'phreng ba blangs nas gzhon nu'i cha byad kyi
472a6(rgyud 'bum): gzugs brnyan byas te/ stang gi khang bzangs su grong khyer chen po blta na sdug pa'i dbus na lha rnams kyi 'dun sa chos bzangs kyi rtse mor rgyal mtshan bsgreng ba legs par bkod
472a7(rgyud 'bum): pa byas nas bzhag par gyur to/ / de nas lha ma yin de dag rab tshim byed dang / thag bzangs ris la sogs pa de dag lha rnams kyi steng du mi 'gro zhing / lha de dag kyang
472b1(rgyud 'bum): zil gyis gnon par mi 'gyur la/ rdzu 'phrul las rnam par 'phrul pa 'am/ g.yul mngon du phyogs par 'gro bar mi nus so// de ltar lo bye ba khri phrag du ma mi ma yin pa'i
472b2(rgyud 'bum): grangs kyis bgrang bar yang lha ma yin gyi 'jigs pa 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/ / de bzhin du phan yon dpag tu med pa bstan pa dang / tshe dang / nad meng ba 'phel bar sangs rgyas
472b3(rgyud 'bum): bcom ldan 'das dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos kyang sngon du gsungs pa yin no// de bzhin du phan yon gyi yon tan mchog 'di dag rgya che ba dang / mtha'
472b4(rgyud 'bum): yas shing mu med pa sngon gsungs pa yin no/ / gang zhig chos kyi rnam grangs 'di spangs sam/ rnam par rtog par byed na bsod nams ma yin pa dpag tu med pa 'phel bar 'gyur zhing
472b5(rgyud 'bum): dmyal bar yang skye bar 'gyur la/ dud 'gro dang / yi dgas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi skye ba ngan par yang 'gro bar 'gyur ro// sman dang sngags rnams med do// byang
472b6(rgyud 'bum): chub sems dpa' med do/ / de rnams bdag nyid chen po rdzu 'phrul che ba dang rnam par 'phrul pa'ang med do// cho ga rgya che ba'ang med do// 'phags pa ma yin pas bshad do zhes byas
472b7(rgyud 'bum): nas spong ba 'am/ yang na 'gro zhing 'di nyan par mi nus so zhes gnas de las gzhan du 'gro na de dag la bsod nams ma yin pa chen po 'byung bar 'gyur ro// ci ste blo chung ba gang gis
473a1(rgyud 'bum): chos 'di ni thub pa mchog dang / thub pa'i sras blo dang ldan pa ma yin no zhes rab tu spong bar byed do// mi de dmyal bar 'gro 'gyur zhing // de nyams nas ni dung
473a2(rgyud 'bum): 'gror 'gro/ / thig nag dang ni yang sos dang // spu gri so dang me ma mur// ro myags chu bo rab med skye// de nas phyir yang spu gris so// lo ma ral gri lta bu'i nags// yang na gyi
473a3(rgyud 'bum): hud zer de bzhin/ / 'jig rten grags pa so tham tham// sdig pa'i las kyis dmyal ba ru// gang gis chos ni sun byed pa// des ni skyebo de dag 'gro// 'jig rten spang
473a4(rgyud 'bum): par rab bstan pa/ / mi bzang mnar med pa zhes bya// ma dang sems kyis chos spangs pa// sdig pa'i las can gnas yin te// gang zhig chos ni 'di 'jig pa// de la skye'o
473a5(rgyud 'bum): de 'tshed 'gyur/ / kun gyi mthar thug mnar med pa// de nyams de bzhin dmyal chen skye// dmyal ba'i sa mtha' mtha' yas par// rtag tu blo med de ni 'gro// mdo sde de ni rgya cher bcas//
473a6(rgyud 'bum): / chos kyi nor kun rab spangs nas// de ni 'jig rten ngan par 'gro// dbang med rtag par dbang du 'gro// gang zhig mdo sde'i cho ga 'di// sngags dang rgyud kyis legs par brgyad// grub
473a7(rgyud 'bum): pa sna tshogs brgya rnams 'thob/ / yang dag mtha' ni sgrib pa med// chos kyi dbyings kyi sku nyid yin// dmigs su med pa'i ngo bo nyid// cho ga cho ga rgya chen bcas// le'u rab 'byams
473b1(rgyud 'bum): 'dis 'dren byed/ / 'jam pa'i dbyangs ni legs dgod pa// phun tshogs dpal dang blo gros mchod// rtsa ba'i cho ga mi nyung ba// rgya che mang por bstan pa yin// rtag dang chad dang thog mtha' ni// gnyis
473b2(rgyud 'bum): ka'i mtha' don rnam par spangs/ / rim bcas rim ni nges par bstan// sngags kyis lus ni btus pa yi// me dang rlung dang nam 'kha' dang // stong pa'i de nyid legs gsungs pa// spangs pa
473b3(rgyud 'bum): rtag tu 'gro ba ni/ / 'og nas 'og tu de tshe 'gro// bskal pa rnam mang gsum gyi grangs// de tshe bsod nams yong bsags nas// de tshe byang chub thob nas ni// bdag dang rgyal ba mchog rnams
473b4(rgyud 'bum): kyis/ / sngags dang rgyad kyi don gsungs pa// 'gro ba yul ni sdig med la'o// rtsa ba'i cho ga dag byed dang // sdig pa med cing bkra shis pa'i// le'u rab 'byams rab gsungs pa// nges pa'i mdo sde
473b5(rgyud 'bum): bzang po yin/ / sa bdag yon tan bdag nyid cha// yul dang dus kyi sbyor ba dang // rgyal sras mi ru skyes pa yin// sa steng dam pa'i chos bstan zhes// 'jig rten gtso bo thub pa ni// rgyal ba bdun
473b6(rgyud 'bum): pas bstan pa yin/ / cho ga rgya cher gsungs pa ni// blo dang dpal ni mngon par 'phel// rtsa ba rab 'byams le'u zhes// sngags dang rgyud dang ldan pa de// gang zhig mdo mchog gtso bo 'di// rgyal bas
473b7(rgyud 'bum): mchod pa'i chos kyi mdzod/ / sa steng mis ni spong byed pa// de ni mnar med dmyal bar 'gro// bskal pa chen por de 'tshed ces// rnam pa du mar dbye bar bstan// nam zhig gang du 'byung ba ni// mi yi
474a1(rgyud 'bum): lus su skyes na yang / / dbul zhing ngan dmang glen pa dang // kla klo dag tu skye bar 'gyur// 'jig rten smad par 'gro ba ste// de ni mdze can nad par 'gyur// lkug
474a2(rgyud 'bum): cing len pa yan lag nyams/ / blo nyams long ba nyid dang ni// rtsub cing rtag tu 'jigs pa'i gzugs// sa steng yi dgas lta bur snang // gos ngan sems ni zhan pa dang // sen mo dang ni lus
474a3(rgyud 'bum): kyang ngan/ / srin bu rnams kyis zos pa dang // shu ba g.yan pa yang dag ldan// mdo sde 'di ni rab spangs na// gang dang gang gi 'gro bar 'gro// de dang der ni skyes pa na// blo ngan rmongs par skye bar
474a4(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur/ / de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la
474a5(rgyud 'bum): btsugs te mig phye zhing mi 'dzum pas/ thams cad dang ldan pa'i gnas gtsang ma'i gzhal med khang na gnas pa'i lha'i bu rnams dang / 'byung po'i tshogs du ma chos mnyan pa'i phyir 'dus par
474a6(rgyud 'bum): shes nas/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das ji tsam du chos kyi rnam grangs 'dis ni ngo mtshar te mchog tu legs par gsungs pa lags na/ de
474a7(rgyud 'bum): la bcom ldan 'das ma 'ongs pa'i dus na sems can ma rigs pa'i chags pas zil gyi nor pa/ slu bar byed pa/ nga rgyal can/ ma dad pa/ gya gyu can/ dmu rgod/ tshul khrims 'chal pa dag
474b1(rgyud 'bum): 'byung bar 'gyur te/ de dag sngags rnams kyi rtog pa'i bdag nyid chen po rgyas pa grub pa dang / dus dang / yul dang / nges par sdom pa dang / sngags dang / spyod pa dang /
474b2(rgyud 'bum): sbyin sreg dang / bzlas pa nges par sdom pa dang / cho ga rab 'byams dag la ma dad par 'gyur/ yid mi bde bar 'gyur te/ sangs rgyas kyi bka' ma yin no zhes byas nas spong bar
474b3(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur te/ de dag nyon mongs pa'i sems su gyur nas dus byed par 'gyur zhing / sdug bsngal drag cing tsha ba'i tshor ba myong zhing de dag dmyal ba chen por skye bar 'gyur/ bcom ldan
474b4(rgyud 'bum): 'das sdug bsngal ba'i sems can de dag la ji ltar bsgrub par bya/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ni thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa lags so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ 'jam dpa'
474b5(rgyud 'bum): gzhon nur gyur pa la spyi bor byugs nas bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal khyod sems can thams cad kyi don gyi phyir rab tu zhugs pa khyod yang legs so legs so// 'jam dpal gzhon nu
474b6(rgyud 'bum): khyod de bzhin gshegaso pa la don 'di yongs su zhu bar sems pa de khyod yang legs so/ / 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa de'i phyir legs par shin tu rab tu nyon la yid la zung zhig dang
474b7(rgyud 'bum): sems can thams cad kyi don dang / phan pa dang / bde ba'i phyir zhugs pa dang / lha dang / mi rnams dang / 'jig rten la rab tu brtse ba'i phyir ngas khyod la bshad do// spyod
475a1(rgyud 'bum): pa thams cad la zhugs pa dang / byang chub kyi lam dang / thams cad shes pa dang / chos kyi dbyings la 'jug pa dang / 'phags pa 'jam
475a2(rgyud 'bum): dpal gyi sku la gnas par 'dod pa rnams kyis rig pa'i rgyal po mchog tu gsang ba/ gzhon nu khyod kyi rtsa ba'i cho ga'i le'u rab 'byams 'chi ba'i dus kyi tshe'ang 'di dran par bya'o//
475a3(rgyud 'bum): de gang zhe na/ na maHs+t+rai ya d+h+ya ta thA ta b+ho/ ar+ha te b+h+yaH/ samya ka si bud+d+he b+h+yaHoM ku mA ra rU pi Ni/ bi shwa saM b+ha ba/ A gats+tsha A gats+tsha/ la hu la hu/ b+huMD+b+h+yAM/ dzi na dziH
475a4(rgyud 'bum): many+dza shrI ya/ su shrI ya/ tA ra ya mAM/ sarba duHkha b+h+yaHphaT phaT/ sha ma ya sha ma ya/ a mr-i tod b+ha ba/ bA paM me nA sha ya swAhA/ 'jam dpal 'di ni khyod kyi
475a5(rgyud 'bum): snying po dam pa yin te/ zhi ba thams cad byed pa/ sdig pa thams cad zad par byed pa/ sdug bsngal thams cad las rab tu grol bar byed pa/ tshe dang / nad med pa
475a6(rgyud 'bum): dang / dbang phyug dang / skal ba bzang po mchog dang / ngag gi dbang phyug skyed par byed pa/ rig pa'i rgyal po thams cad gzengs bstod par byed pa/ sangs rgyas
475a7(rgyud 'bum): bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas 'di gsungs ma thag tu sa chen po ri dang rgya mtsho dang bcas pa/ sems can dang snod nye ba'i mthar thug pa rnam pa drug tu rab tu g.yos par gyur te
475b1(rgyud 'bum): 'gro ba thams cad yi dgas kyi 'gro ba dang / dud 'gro dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten dang / dmyal ba'i sems can thams cad kyi sdug bsngal rab tu sbyangs shing bde ba
475b2(rgyud 'bum): rnams kyang rab tu thob par 'gyur la/ 'jam dpal rig pa'i rgyal po 'di'ang yid la byed cing / de'i tshe dam pa'i chos spong ba'i sems kyang med par gyur na bdud sdig to can
475b3(rgyud 'bum): gyis kyang glags rnyed par mi 'gyur la/ bgegs dang log 'dren thams cad kyang 'byer bar 'gyur ro// 'di ltar yang sems bskye bar bya ste/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan
475b4(rgyud 'bum): 'das kyi sangs rgyas dang chos ni bsam gyis mi khyab ste/ bsam pa 'am/ gzhal ba 'am/ spong ba ni bdag cag gis ci zhig nus te/ sangs rgyas bcom
475b5(rgyud 'bum): ldan 'das nyid kyis mkhyen par 'gyur ro/ / 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi rtsa ba'i cho ga byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod phal po che theg pa chen po shin tu rgyas pa'i mdo las
475b6(rgyud 'bum): phan yon dang nyes dmigs kyi nus pa rab 'byams bstan pa'i le'u sum cu drug pa rdzogs so/ / // bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/
475b7(rgyud 'bum): dge slong de dag dang / byang chub sems de dag dang / thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de ngag dang / gnas gtsang ma'i steng na gnas pa'i lha'i bu'i tshogs rnams dang / sems can bye ba 'i phrag brgyad
476a1(rgyud 'bum): stong du ma dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin/ dri za dang / lham ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang
476a2(rgyud 'bum): grub pa dang / rig 'dzin dang / drang srong mchog dam pa du ma dang / 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang / spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang / byams pa dang
476a3(rgyud 'bum): mthu chen thob dang / mthu chen gnas dang / phyag na rdo rje la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams dang / 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa dang /
476a4(rgyud 'bum): chos kyi dbyings mtha' yas pa na bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi 'khor dang bcas pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das nam mkha'i
476a5(rgyud 'bum): ngo bo dang 'dra bar bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gyis mi khyab pa rnams thugs rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs
476a6(rgyud 'bum): pa la mngon par bstod do/ / 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi rtsa ba'i rgyud rdzogs so// // dpal lha btsan po lha btsun pa byang chub 'od kyi bkas rgya gar
476a7(rgyud 'bum): gyi mkhan po dge bsnyen bo ku mA ra ka la sha dang / sgra bsgyur gyi lo tsa ba dge slong shAkya blo gros kyis bsgyur cing nus te gtan la pha' pa'o//
476b1(rgyud 'bum): gar skad du/ sid+d+hi e kal+lI re ma hA tan+t+ra rA dza nA ma/ bod skad du/ dpa' bo gcig tu grub pa zhes bya ba rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po 'phags pa 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur

483a1(rgyud 'bum): tse dang / 'thab pa dang / rtsod pa dag las rgyal bar 'gyur ro// cho ga bzhin du rtag tu bzlas pas gro khyer bskyod pa skyed par bye'o// oM stam+b+ha ni stan+d+ha ya

483a3(rgyud 'bum): kyi rgyal po chen po las le'u dang po rdzogs so/ / // rab sang legs par sangs rgyas pa'i// slob ma yon tan bzhi yin pas// bla ma la gus mkhas pa

483a5(rgyud 'bum): bud+d+ha shru d+har+m+mash+tsa saM ga sha tsa saM gu Na swa ga raHa na ne sar+yaM bA kye na k+Shi pra mA ba dam Ni/ tad+ya thA/ oM sa ra/ sa r-i/ su ru mu ru maM da ra pra Ni kA sa a ba sa ke la sa kU Ta

484a1(rgyud 'bum): byed do/ / lan brgya rtsa brgyad mngon par bsngags pa'i chus gdong bkrus nas mi smra bar nyal na rmi lam du dge ba'i don thams cad ston par 'gyur ro// oM mu
484a2(rgyud 'bum): tsi li swA hA/ mo ha ni swA hA/ daM ti li swA hA/ sngags 'di khri bzlas na 'grub par 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la mchod pa

484a4(rgyud 'bum): zhing dge ba dang mi dge ba rmi lam du dmigs par 'gyur ro/ / oM pra dzA la hUM phaT/ 'bacom ldan 'das 'jig rten mgon po'i snying po 'di 'bum phrag bcu bzlas na 'grub par 'gyur ro//

484a6(rgyud 'bum): sa mud b+hA ya swa pa nAM ni bed la tha b+hU taM hUM phaT swA hA/ rje btsun 'jam dpal gzhon nu'i sku'am lugs sku'i mdun ni sku gdung dang bcas pa'i mcho rten la ci 'byor pa'i mchod pa byas

484b1(rgyud 'bum): gsum rnam par rgyal ba'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas shing de nyid du mi smra bar 'dug ste/ sha dang / nya sha dang / ma sha dang / 'dzam bu ti ka la mngon par bsngags pa'i

489a6(rgyud 'bum): tshangs pa gsod pa'ang 'grub par 'gyur ro/ / zla ba drug gis dbyangs can dang ngag mnyam par 'gyur ro// ra yi 'o ma a ru ra dang tsha ba gsum// pa ta shu dag sig kya/
489a7(rgyud 'bum): sen nga yi// lan bdun mngon par bsngags pa'i mar dag ni// 'thungs na dbyangs can 'grub par 'gyur ba yin// ra yi 'o ma bre bzhi dang // sman rnams srang gcig tsam
489b1(rgyud 'bum): gyi tshad/ / mar bre gang dang mkhas pa yis// rim gyis me chu la bskol bya// zla gcig tsam zhig longs spyad na// bla med tshig ni thob 'gyur zhing // zla drug nye bar longs spyad
489b2(rgyud 'bum): pas/ / ngag gi dbang phyug mngon sum 'gyur// shu dag shing mngar sen da ba// a ru bca' sga la la pu// ru rta pi pi zi ngar bcas// rnam brtags ngag ni dag par
489b3(rgyud 'bum): byed/ / lha la me tog dri bzang sogs// nang par yang dag mchod nas ni// lan 'dun bsngags byas zos na ni// zla ba drug gis thos 'dzin byed// zla ba gsum
489b4(rgyud 'bum): gyis tshig bdag 'gyur/ / zla ba gcig gis blo ldan zhing // khu byug gzhon nu'i skad bzhin du// dbyangs snyan pa ni skye bar 'gyur// gangs can skyes pa'i a ru 'am//

490a1(rgyud 'bum): grub pa gsung gi rang bzhin ma lus pa'i po ti bsnams pa/ phyag g.yas pashes rab kyi ral gri 'phyar ba/ gzhon nu'i gzugs can 'jam pa'i

496a1(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur ro/ / 'bum phrag gsum bzlas na 'azam dpal gyi zhal mthong bar 'gyur ro// gal te mtshams med pa lnga byas pas grub par ma gyur na de'i tshe nyid
496a2(rgyud 'bum): mtshams med pa lnga byed pa yin zhing / nga nyid kyis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bslus par gyur cig/ rje btsun 'phags pa 'jab dpal gyi shes rab dang dro 'phel ba zhes
496a3(rgyud 'bum): bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so/ / 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi sngags yi ge 'bru gcig pa'i cho ga/ tad+ya thA/ oM k+ShI/ gsang
496a4(rgyud 'bum): sngags yi ge 'bru gcig pa 'di ni rab tu gsang ba ste/ don thams cad sgrub par byed pa/ las thams cad byed pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po/ re ba
496a5(rgyud 'bum): thams cad yongs su skong bar mdzad pa ste/ so shing la bsngags nas bcangs na so na ba mi 'byung ngo // mig na ba la rgya ma tshwa btags pa la lan bdun bsngags te mig bkang na mig
496a6(rgyud 'bum): nad sel to/ / mi'i khong du mtshon gyi dum bu lus pa la zhun mar rnying pa la lan bdun nam brgya rtsa brgyad bsngags te/ blud pa 'am rma khar bskus na mtshan gyi dum bu 'byung bar 'gyur ro//
496a7(rgyud 'bum): zas ma zhu ba dang / spos te gsung pa dang / tshad pas 'khru ba la mu rang tshwa 'am/ rgyam tshwa'am/ yang na lan tshwa gzhan gang yang rung ba la lan bdun bsngags te zos na nad de las
496b1(rgyud 'bum): grol te de nyid kyi nyin par sos par 'gyur ro/ / grad pa na pa la bya rog gi sgrol lan bdun bsngags te byabs na nad de sos par 'gyur ro// 'jam dpal gyi yi ge 'bru gcig pa'i gzungs
496b2(rgyud 'bum): rdzogs so/ / rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya many+dza shri nA ma aSh+Ta sha ka na/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa/
496b3(rgyud 'bum): 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo// shin tu dang ba'i sems kyis su// thub la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ sangs rgyas rnams kyis bsngags pa yi// mtshan rnams
496b4(rgyud 'bum): 'dir ni brjod par bgyi/ / gzugs mdzes gzug dang ldan pa ste// gzugs rnams kun gyi bla na med// mtshan rnams thams cad kun tu rdzogs// 'jam dpal gyis ni dam pa lags// /
496b5(rgyud 'bum): bsam gyis mi khyab bsam dang bral// mthu rtsal bsam yas rmad du byung // sku gsung 'phrin las bsam mi khyab// de bzhin thugs kyang bsam mi khyab// stong nyid sgom pa'i bdag
496b6(rgyud 'bum): nyid can/ / stong pa'i chos dang yang dag ldan// stong pa nyid la lhag par mos// srid pa gsum po stong par ston// thams cad mkhyen cing thams cad gzigs// sa rnams kun gyi bdag
496b7(rgyud 'bum): dang ldan/ / sems can kun gyi mchog tu gyur// sems can kun gyis phyag bgyis pa// ngan 'gro kun dang de bzhin du// mu stegs can rnams thams cad 'joms// phas kyi rgol ba tshar
497a1(rgyud 'bum): gcod pa/ / smra ba'i seng ge mi yi mchog/ dul zhing nyon mongs dgra rnams dang // sgrib pa dri ma kun mi mnga'// sems can thams cad yongs su skyob/
497a2(rgyud 'bum): grol zhing 'jig rten grol mdzad pa// ral pa mun dza brtul zhugs can// tshangs pa tshangs pa'i gnas na bzhugs// bgrang nor thogs shing phyag 'khar bsnams// dag cing
497a3(rgyud 'bum): dag la rnams dang ldan/ / 'jam pa'i dbyangs can mnga' bdag mdzad// pad+ma las 'khrungs pad+ma'i spyan// pad+ma'i ze ba'i kha dog 'dra// bzhugs pa'i gdan khri pad+ma lags/
497a4(rgyud 'bum): gtsang ma ut+pal sngon po bsnams// bsam dag zhi ba'i thugs dang ldan// khyod ni sangs rgyas rang sangs rgyas// khyod ni dang po'i sangs rgyas lags// rdzu 'phrul ldan zhing
497a5(rgyud 'bum): mnga' dbang brnyes/ / bden pa bzhi dag ston pa po// 'jig rten skyong ba spyan stong mnga'// khyod ni dbang phyug skye dgu'i bdag/ khyod ni zhi ba'i sems can rnams// kun gyi mnga' bdag yon tan
497a6(rgyud 'bum): gtse/ / khyod ni khyu mchog skye dgu'i gtso// thu bo de bzhin tshe rabs dgongs// rnam par 'dren dang 'dul mdzad pa// rgyal sras rgyal ba nyid la 'khrungs// 'od zer stong ldan nyi ma khyod// zla ba dang ni
497a7(rgyud 'bum): phur bu'ang khyed/ / rnam thos bu dang chu lha'ang lags// dbang phyug che khyod khyab 'jug khyod// klu yi rgyal po mtha' yas khyod// de bzhin sde dpon skem byed lags// lha min dbang po thags
497b1(rgyud 'bum): bzangs ris/ / mig dmar gza' lag pa wa sangs// spen pa dpa' bo lnga kun lhags// lha rnams kun gyis phyag bgyis pa// 'jig rten chos kyi dri ma bral// khyod ni 'jig rten gang
497b2(rgyud 'bum): zag mchog/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa 'jig rten rig/ ye shes can gyi dam mchog pa// dam pa sbyin dang gnas dang skyabs// bdud kyi las kyis yongs mi brdzi// kha na ma tho mi mnga'
497b3(rgyud 'bum): zab/ / dge ba'i bshes gnyen kun tu grags// khyod ni sman pa zug rngu 'byin// mi 'dul kha lo sgyur ba'i mchog/ blo gros ldan zhing rtogs dang ldan// blo dang ldan zhing mkhas pa
497b4(rgyud 'bum): lags/ / khyod ni bsod nams dpag bsam shing // byang chub yan lag me tog rgyan// rnam grol 'bras bu phun sum tshogs// lus can kun gyi mchog tu gyur// yid du 'ong zhing
497b5(rgyud 'bum): yid 'phrog pa/ / sdig pa mi mnga' tshangs par spyod// khyod ni 'jug rings gza' mchog lags// khyod ni drang srong thub pa mchog/ khyod ni rgyal tshab dbang bskur ba// sa bcu'i dbang phyug gtso bo
497b6(rgyud 'bum): lags/ / ded dpor 'gro ba rnams kyi gtso// mya ngan 'das pa mchog ston bzhin// khyod ni nam mkha' sa chu bzhin// khyod ni me dang rlung lta bu// khyod ni yid bzhin nor bu ltar// sems can
497b7(rgyud 'bum): re ba kun rdzogs mdzad/ / 'byung po kun gyis phyag 'gyis pa// rin chen khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// 'jam dpal gyis ni bka' stsal pa// oM bA kye na ma swA hA/ di skad smos pa'i mtshan rnams dang //
498a1(rgyud 'bum): rig sngags bcas par 'dzin da ni// sdig gyur rnam dag rab tu thob// brgya las rtsa brgyad lhag pa'i mtshan// skyes bu dus gsum su klog pa//
498a2(rgyud 'bum): de 'dod bsam dgu yid bzhin du// gdon mi za bar 'grub par 'gyur// bzang po'i mtshan rnams dran na ni// mtshams med bskal pa mnyam pa yi// las rnams
498a3(rgyud 'bum): mi bzad gang byas pa/ / de dag thams cad myur du 'byung // 'jig rten pha rol 'pho ba dang // 'jigs pa chen po 'byung ba'i tshe// sems can dag pas dran byas na//
498a4(rgyud 'bum): 'jam pa'i dbyangs kyang thob par 'gyur// blo dang ldan pas dran byas te// nges par gnas nas su klog pa// sangs rgyas nyid ni 'dod na yang // thob 'gyur 'di la
